Like others have mentioned it does not come with a micro SD card and recording sound is hard to hear when inside the waterproof case. One of the accessories that comes with the camera is a backing plate that has two holes cut into it. These holes allow sound to enter the case so it can be heard better on camera. Just remember to switch the backing plate to the solid one without the holes in case you take it near water so it can be waterproof again.
Muy buena, trae muchos accesorios y hasta un reloj control para tomar fotos o grabar videos, La calidad del video y fotografías es muy buena, la verdad me encantó, es más que lo que yo esperaba 🤭😍

This camera does exactly what I needed it to do!  Great youtube-ready video quality, clear sound even in waterproof case, battery will last for about 2 hours of nonstop filming, with a backup charged battery to swap out if needed.  We film fishing youtube videos, and so far have filmed in the ocean waves, rivers, on our kayaks, and even on our go-pro dog harness.  Very pleased with everything we've captured so far on this very affordable go-pro alternative!Fits all go-pro mounts for easy accessorizing!

Couldnt get it to work right. Battery didnt last over 1 hr after charging how would I use it on the job site if I cant get it to turn on long enough to take a video clip after charging. Maybe mine was defective? I dont know I returned it for my money back.

Great value for the price!  Easy to use and amazingly affordable.  I found all the accessories overwhelming And no instructions but there are many YouTube videos available to help you with them.  I would like to give 5 stars but the cover to my battery snapped and I can’t get it to fit securely. Really a bummer.  I went through all the accessories today, took me several hours and I was going to do a video.  Then the cover for the battery snapped and now I’m bummed.  I was supposed to go water rafting this weekend and I’m going to have to tape it shut. BUMMER

I purchased this camera for my husband and kids to use on our vacations. My 12 year old son was able to film and edit with no problems. My husband recorded a hunting trip and was able to bring the footage home for the entire family view on the TV. It was great to see the entire hunt from start to finish. We will be using for all of our Hunting, camping and vacation trips in the future. Very easy to use. Great product for the price!

Don't want to talk too much about it. Bottom line, if you take this camera cold places where outside temperature below 0 C / 32F think again.  I took mine last week when I went to Utah for skying . It would not work. When you turn it on it comes on but few seconds later it shuts itself off with some warning that I could not even tell. Later I tried to test it in my hotel room and it worked without any issue. So I figured that when you take it outside and especially when you ski the battery can't provide enough power to keep it running an I did make sure it was fully charged. Piece of garbage. Adding few hundreds more and getting good quality camera not this cheap crap.

Bought this camera to get underwater shots based on the reviews. The picture quality is abhorrent. This is definitely not a 12MP camera. I should know, my phone has one. The quality of aperture and light balancing on this camera makes me feel like i'm back in the late 1990s with a disposable camera.Getting a refund on this and will never think about buying Akaso again.

Excellent price, comes with tons of accessories, appears to be a good quality little camera. Compared it to the gopro and while the video quality and features aren't as high or numerous, for a pre-teen it's priced great and has better quality than expected. This is one that if she breaks I won't have a heart attack and it can be easily replaced, also cool that many of the accessories are interchangeable with GoPro so if I decided to upgrade I wouldn't have to throw everything out.

The camera came in faster than expected, which was nice. Overall, the quality of the camera is nice and sturdy and comes with a whole bunch of accessories.I attached to this camera to my helmet, after about 3 hours of riding a piece from one of the attachments broke off my helmet. I was on a 3 lane road with cars going over 40mph+, the cars ran over my camera multiple times. I was able to find my camera, thankfully still in tact, with only a minor scratch on it. After being ran over it still works just fine.

I bought this as a gift for my husband, on cyber Monday. I have prime and it shipped faster than had anticipated. He is very pleased with it. I have to note that we are VERY new to the Go-Pro world. When it arrived it was packed nice and neatly with the camera visibly displayed in a plastic cover. It came with a lot of neat attachments (most of which we still have yet to use.) He carried it around and video taped us swimming in Grand Caymans, and doing a submarine excursion with our kids.I'm sure it isnt the best quality, but it worked out great for us, with no complaints.

I bought this for our 11 year old for Christmas. He loves it. His only complaint is that he wants a chest harness rather than a bracket on his bike, dirt bike, helmets etc., one chest harness could cover several different uses. I couldn't figure out how to make one out of the straps that came with the camera but I'm sure we'll figure something out. It was a good price for an entry level camera for a kid. I'm sure adults would enjoy it too, we just needed something that we could handle getting lost or broken and this was a perfect gift.

I bought this camera to replace a larger, handheld style video camera that we use to record school events, sporting events and our travel experiences. So far, I am very impressed. I did not want to spend the $$$ on the popular name brand action camera and the price point on this unit was great! The video and audio quality are excellent and it came with a lot of accessories. If you are looking for a great camera at a very affordable price, look no further.

UPDATE* The battery issue was resolved by the company. Their customer service is hands down the best around!*** Video quality is great. Works well enough for the price. The batteries didn’t last long, thankfully it comes with two. Connecting it is a pain in the butt and the password to hook to the WiFi wasn’t included so I had to google it. Works as expected.

From what Ive seen in video quality the GoPro's color is more accurate to real life and not so saturated. But, it is more expensive and all attachments seem to be compatible so thats a plus. It also comes with a built in lcd screen so you can actually see what you're trying to do. This camera does a great job for $80. It came with a few attachments, enough to make a buttstock mount, another mount to attach to my tripod, one to attach to a barrel or rod, a watch to control the camera, and few more odd ends. If you leave a review you get another mount for free and I will choose the chest strap.

Excellent camera especially for the price!  Works well and easily with the Akaso phone (Android) app so I can take before and after underwater pictures of the growth on boat running gear, or I can show the customer real-time images of exactly what I am seeing underwater.  Akaso recommends only using the 32Gb micro chip which is what I'm using with great results.  Also purchased underwater LED light attachment- much needed in the dark green waters of the Chesapeake Bay and tributaries.  Yes, would buy again.

This is my first action camera. This one is perfect for me. I did not want to spend a fortune before I knew how often I would use the camera.  I use it while stand up paddle boarding and kayaking. The quality of the video is good for the price. It comes with some great accessories to start. It is easy to use. I have been impressed.Update: After several months of use, I am still impressed with the quality of the video and how ease the camera is to use. Editing video with a Ipad is easy. The sound is not great, especially if you have the waterproof case on. So think of this for capturing great action not sound. Overall I am very pleased and would recommend.

"You get what you pay for!".  No directions with product and it comes with tons of attachments that we have no idea what they're for.  Tried to link to the app on our phones but it wants to be plugged in and we have Google phones, so cannot connect.  We went in cruise and tried using snorkeling but couldn't tell when was recording.  Had to wait until we got home to connect with computer.  Turns out, only thing that recorded was me turning the product on before our excursion.  In our situation, it was a waste for us.

I know this isnt a high quality camera for the price, but the 4k is very limited and grainy. I tried 3 diff cards too and all same result. All are 128gb and they all work! 1080p 60fps looks good for my application though and it will last longer too! Happy it comes with 2 batteries too! I will set up on my boat with cable to charge while I fish, but when I'm on the shore I will have plenty of battery and space! Might buy another, but I might go for the 1080p one for $45 instead of $70.

This camera at first seemed overwhelming to learn from the instruction Manuel. But once I started to use it, the camera just made sense and was easy for me to use! I highly recommend this product, it is well worth your money and is very easy to use as well as being inexpensive compared to other cameras. However it doesn’t come with an SD card but it when the camera came the SD card (I separately ordered) was in the same box so it was no inconvenience. This camera is great for travel too and is very light weigh which I love! It’s video quality is astonishing and I’m very pleased with this purchase.

I got this right before we left for a cruise, and we loved it! My kids enjoyed using it in the ocean for snorkeling and taking pictures of starfish. I love that it has a screen so you can see what you are doing. It was very easy to learn and use, and since it’s something we will only use a few times a year, I am very happy with the purchase and the price!

I bought this for my 11 year old for her birthday.  We previously had a Hero5 that broke and wanted to try this before spending hundreds of dollars again.  We are not disappointed!  I find it easier to set up and navigate than they GoPro.  My 11 year old says it’s easier for her to use.  Great picture!  App is easier to use as well!  Love it!

The Aakso EK7000 is as advertised, a camera that performs exceptionally for its price. I got mine for $42.00 during a deal day.  The picture quality is good, but could use additional exposure settings. The video quality is good but could use improvement in lower light situations. Video stabilization is average but useable. Over all I would recommend this camera for those just getting started in action based pictures and video. A good all-around performer at a great price!

My Wife and I took our first trip out of the country and I wanted to get a mountable camera.  I opted for the Akaso camera over the much more expensive brand, as we knew we didnt travel often, and I am glad we did.Pros:

I bought this camera specifically to swim with/ get wet. It served its purpose. I couldn’t justify paying that much for the go pro. You can see water can collect on the outside of the waterproof case it goes in. Make sure the case is free of water on the outside before taking the pic. The go pro doesn’t need the water proof case. Quality is decent. We did cliff jumping and the case held up well. (Won’t allow me to upload a video). Overall it was a good purchase.

This is my first action camera and was excited to open and play with it. After checking out the reviews of others on the product, I felt I will make a positive decision to purchase the Akaso EK7000. My first impressions was great with how the price and its capabilities that is comparable to the GoPro. So I will stick with this and if it breaks, i wouldn't be too bothered.When I first connected it with my smartphone, it kind of had a lag in video, but i love the fact that this device has that feature. My kids were amazed that the video can be viewed on the smartphone quickly or on real time.

Great camera for the price! Bought it to install on my bike helmet to record my rides. Took it for a spin and it works great. The setup is easy and instructions are easy to follow. The Wifi connection works similar to bluetooth connectivity for other devices and along with the iSmart DV app (download require) it's great to view live what the camera is recording/viewing on your phone or tablet. NO, you don't connect it to your internet Wifi to function, it appears the camera puts out a Wifi connection to connect to your smart devices. I have not used the camera for long periods of time but one battery lasted for my 1hr 10 min bike ride. The cool thing is that the camera comes with 2 batteries. Looking forward to use this during the summer and try it in our pool. Will update when we get in the water.If you are looking for a decent camera that is not going to break the bank, this is it.

This is a great action camera. The video is super clear and the audio is great if there is no background noise. If there is background noise, it does not tune it out. So some of the video we have shot using this camera the audio is terrible. You cannot hear over the background noise. I do love this camera. It is easy to use and it takes great pictures and video. I just wish the audio was better, which is why I am giving this camera 4 stars instead of 5. Battery life is about an hour and 15 minutes or so. And that is about how long you can shoot before you need to replace a 16 SD card.

Got this for our 8-year old son as he wanted to take adventure videos of his forays into nature. He wanted a GoPro, but we couldn't stomach the price, and thought this might be a good test camera before taking the plunge. Turns out, this one might the long-term camera as long as he doesn't lose it!  I'd buy it again for him if he does lose his current one. He loves the water proof case for taking underwater videos. He's done some great work in our fish tank.

I waited too long to get a small, mobile camera, and I'm glad I didn't wait any longer. It goes with me on bike rides, hikes, climbs, and will be my ski accessory. Like the Minox of 40 years ago, you can always have it with you, mounted where you can use it continuously. Each battery gives a little more than an hour of recording. The accessories kit is comprehensive, supporting mounting in just about any situation, with or without the waterproof enclosure.Great value for the money.

Bought for my daughter as a cheap alternative to a go pro. Needs a very tiny memory card, which fortunately I had already but not realizing this may have lead to disappointment if it couldn't be used right away.It comes with many accessories which have not all been used but my daughter is very happy to have.

Absolute piece of garbage!!! Don’t Buy!!! The 5 star reviews are fake. Used it on the first day I received it. Recorded many videos of my ski trip. Shot video, stopped the video when done as instructed. Came home and all my videos were gone besides for 1 video. Compete waste of time and money

Got this for my 12 year old son for his birthday.  I didnt want to spend the money on a real go pro as I figured he wouldnt use it too much and well is only 12.  I am so glad i bought this one! He has taken it swimming in the springs, thru the woods on his dirt bike helmet,  and climbing trees with it strapped to his chest.  The videos are amazing when put onto the computer and the remote works perfect while he is out riding.

This is a really good camera for the price. It takes a little getting used to and sometimes it’s slow to pair with my iPhone X but overall a great value. If you’re a first time user I definitely recommend. If you’re looking for more bells and whistles I’d recommend moving up to the pro , which I feel is still a great value. It comes with a good amount of accessories but there are very comprehensive accessory kits available and very affordable. I definitely recommend

I primarily bought this camera as a cheaper alternative compared to a GoPro to go fishing with. However, I have mostly used it as a dash cam in my car. Out of the box, with the video setting set at its highest, I was only able to capture 2 videos of about 25 mins each before the batteries died on a full charge. I have since bought more extra batteries, and set the video one resolution down from the best and have had longer battery life as a result. This is my biggest gripe other than having to reset the date and time everytime I have to change the battery. I mostly recharge the battery while in the camera to avoid having to reset the date. I like the remote and the app works ok. It's not a GoPro, but you get what you pay for and what you get is a pretty good camera at an affordable price.

I just purchased this Akaso after reading reviews here at Amazon and elsewhere. I watched the videos on YouTube "out of the box" and samples side-by-side with GoPro. I recommend reading and researching as much as possible regarding this camera.Setting up and starting to shoot was easy & it is exactly as presented, a less expensive alternative to GoPro that delivers excellent quality photos and video. It is easy to use, almost intuitive, versatile and useful. It comes with a nice accessory package with which to get started. I recommend a fast Class 10 SD card (not included) like the ScanDisk Extreme PLUS, or PRO, or the Samsung PRO or PRO+. I use the Samsung, I tried a a slower 32MB card and wasn't happy with the results. I purchased this primarily for snorkeling and diving, I’ll write more to the review after testing it underwater this Spring.

DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF CRAP! They LIE! It is NOT real WiFi. It’s Basically Bluetooth listed under Wi-Fi to make it sound better. There is no way you can actually hook it up to real Wi-Fi. I called customer service and she even told me she Has no idea why they say Wi-Fi whenever it’s not. has no idea why they say Wi-Fi whenever it’s not FALSE ADVERTISING!!!!!! And the protection plan. I called that number and they told me they cannot help me with anything and to just return the camera.

Got this small sized DV Camcorder for my son to use for making short videos. He likes to film our cat doing fun and playful things around the house. This is perfect. Small size, great picture quality and it comes with a waterproof case! Also best of all it's a terrific price. I highly recommend this product truly a tremendous value.

I bought this camera in order to record my practices. So far after the first try, the battery lasted the whole practice which was a little under 1.25 hrs. The files saved, get broken up into 10 minute clips, but here was about 2 seconds of missed recording every time it created a new clip. So if I was performing my program that was running past a 10 minute mark, the next clip picks up 2 seconds later. Even though it might not sound like a big deal, it is a bit annoying to not see that 2 seconds. I'll have to make use of the remote or phone app to intentionally break up the clips so that they won't hit 10 minutes, but wish I didn't have to worry about it when focusing on other things at the moment. The remote isnt always successful with every button press so its difficult to know if youre starting or stopping a record.It's also not the best in lower lighting settings which would result in alot of noise in the picture. For the price compared to a gopro, it does the job that I need.

Purchased this product to see about possible low cost alternative to the GoPro. After several tests, this product holds its own very well. Video quality is amazing and photo quality is great. Audio could be better but not a deal breaker on this product. If you want a low cost alternative for action footage this will definitely fill the need.

I bought this camera for my 11 year old son to use for his YouTube videos. He figured it out quick and even uses it under water with the provided waterproof case. It came with every accessory imaginable as far as mounting goes. Really a steal for the price. The video quality is very good.  Definitely recommend from me over the higher priced gopro cameras.

I was not sure if this camera was for real. When it arrived I figured out how to use it and wow.. it worked excellent. I was totally surprised.It arrived packed nicely with many additional parts to use for mounting. This camera will mount just about to anything. I have used it mounted on my dashboard already and it worked as described.

I gotta say, for the price this is a dang good action camera! This is the first action camera I've ever owned so really cant do a caparison to a go pro or other cameras, but what I can say is that I took it to the beach and tested it out and the videos it produced look just as good as videos shot with a GoPro. Be sure to get an SD Card that can handle the high resolutions and frame speed. I chose a Samsung Pro Plus 64GB SD card and it unlocks all the camera's potential and works great! Camera comes with plenty of accessories the get started with. Yea I'm pretty happy with this purchase and really happy I didn't have to blow a hole in my wallet! :)

We bought this camera for an upcoming trip we are hoping to go on. At the price I assumed it would be like the cheap $30 ones you find at local retailers that overstate their quality.Quite excited to say the quality of the camera, also the fact that we get two batteries. As well as the video quality received is quite impressive. I am not exactly sure how for the price I get this type of end user quality but so far I am impressed.

I just received the camera, and was pleasantly surprised by the quality of it.  My only complaint is with Amazon, not Akaso.  Amazon bundles a 64GB microSD card under the "Frequently Bought Together" section, so I bought one with the camera.  When they arrived,  I read the owners manual for the camera, it stated that it supports up to 32GB.  I'll have to test this to see if this is true or not.  Maybe newer firmware allows 64GB, but I'll test to find out.  Or maybe their manual is just out of date.  The app on my phone works well.  So far, I'm very pleased with the purchase.  For the money, it's a great deal.  The video quality is not as good as a $400 GoPro, but it's really close.  A steal if you ask me.

We're very happy with the EK7000.  We primarily purchased this for use as a webcam hooked to our desktop PC but our kids have also used it to make video recordings for their virtual homework assignments.  The product comes with a ton of accessories, mounts, batteries, etc...unlike more expensive brands (this is awesome!).  It records clear video, we mostly record in 1080p 60fps.  The only shortcoming I've seen is there isn't any image stabilization.  So if you don't use a gimbal, a tripod/mount or hold it very still then the video will be somewhat shaky.  This hasn't been a problem for our use case, we typically have it mounted on a desk or on a small tripod for stable recording.  Overall this is a solid product, great value and we would purchase it again.

Oh my goodness! Can you say "excited?" Yes that I am. A few weeks ago a friend of mine told me about a 4K camera she used to film her Indie short film and I decided to buy me one for my birthday 1.14 so that I can use for vlog's and my TV show: Dat Green Lyfe TV (Youtube). Well when I searched Amazon this one came up and after looking at Youtube reviews, I knew I had to have it. I received my camera today, charged the batteries and played with it. When I say this little compact baby changed my life in 5 minutes, please believe me. I too am looking to shoot my Indie Docuseries with my new Akaso. 2020 it's about to be real 😉

If you buy this camera open the box and check it immediately. I bought it the first time for a trip to Cuba but I lost it down there. I liked it so I bought a replacement and I had to return it because there was like a rainbow showing on the lens. I received the third one and it look look but after a week a black dot appeared on the image even though the lens looked clean without scratches. I kept the camera out of the waterproof case so I would recommend keeping it in the case just for protection and take it out only whe you have to.

I just love these lil cameras.  I purchased two versions.  They both are excellent and offer different capabilities.  I mounted the Wifi version on my front bumper guard of my jeep to see off road trails in real time :).  To be able to see that cam in real time without wires or true wifi on my phone is just #$%# awesome.  10 Stars

I've been playing with it all day and very happy with the pictures. I'm mounting this on my kayak for vacation. My son wouldn't let me play with his GP, so I found this one. So far I'm very happy with the camera and even put it in the goldfish pond! Looking forward to capturing all the crazy things I see while paddling around lakes, seaways and the Bay. Also will be trying it while hiking and Labrador swimming.

Wow! super impressed with quality of video I have an outdated camera Sony Handycam and needed to acquire smaller camera for general purpose. This camera will do it for me. easy to operate without looking at the manual. I like the fact that you have the option to remove date stamp and the application to view pictures and operate camera from my Cell phone. Nice camera and NICE price.

I purchased this  Camera for and upcoming vacation from Amazon prime and appreciated how quickly it arrived. I was so excited I  Opened it that day and had the manual downloaded with a simple scan of a code that was in the Box. I reviewed the instructions and was instantly able to start experimenting with photos and videos once I had installed my  Mini SD card purchased separately. I was amazed how easy it was to use and even had it connected to my cell phone within 30 minutes and was taking experimental video and uploading it to my phone and deleting it again at will.  I also love that it came with a small remote to start video and snap pictures and a whole bunch of other mounting options in the package for no extra charge.

I spent a lot of time searching through reviews for a good outdoor sports camera that wouldn't break the bank and still be really good quality. This is it. We have zero complaints and are pleasantly surprised at the high quality pictures and videos. It also come with a very good bundle. The 2 batteries with charger and waterproof cover were the most that impressed us. You get a lot for the price and that makes it perfect.

I have been riding motorcycles for years and wanted to start videoing my rides.  Looked at a lot of products before I bought the Akaso Action camera EK7000.  I was watching a YouTube on motorcycling videoing and the rider recommended this camera based on the quality, mounting flexibility, and price.  My EK7000 arrived yesterday.  Instructions included were minimal, but provided a QR code for on on-line manual that was helpful.  Setup was easy.  having 2 batteries is going to be great, providing 180 minutes of record time.  I did some testing of the quality and ability to get video off EK7000.  So far so good.  Easy with the app that is provided for Apple and Android.  Just downlad from the respective stores.  I am going to mount to my motorcycle today and test out!  What I have seen so far makes this a great purchase for me.  I am looking for some great memories to be recorded.

This camera is great, especially for the price.  The battery life, picture quality, button responsiveness, and size are more than satisfactory.  I'm new to these types of cameras, but since this is my first purchase, it was definitely worth it.  It came with a whole lot of useful accessories, some of which I haven't used yet.My only complaint is this: There is no way to actually implement one of the included clip accessories that I want to use.  The clip has a wide male-end piece with no female end to context to.

I looked at so many different cameras for my youngest son.  I figured that this would be a great starter camera for him & for the price, I figured we would try it out.  It met our expectations and then some!  Perfect size, waterproof, and lots of extra accessories.  We took it to the beach today and my son had a BLAST with it!!!  Highly recommend! We are very satisfied and it was delivered quickly! Thanks from a Mom with a very happy son!Oh, and get the SD card - I didn’t realize we needed one so make sure to order one.

I purchased this item for my trip to Kauai. I took lots of videos while snorkeling. Videos and images came out surprisingly great for an inexpensive camera. Very pleased with the results. Did not have any issues with water leaking. Once I was hit by a big wave, and the case dislodged. Some water got in, but the camera was operational after that. The only improvement I may suggest is do not reset date when the battery is replaced. The counter starts over. This can be annoying, other than that, great product.

I like the ease of the camera, waterproof case etc.. what I don't like is that it comes with a hundred little other pieces with no paperwork included to tell you what in the world they are for! Some we could figure out, the rest? No clue!! You must have a micro SD card tho use it. You can't take pictures or video until it's installed.

Very good video quality for the price. It’s very easy to use.I was not able to use the helmet mounts as I had hoped. The sticky style won’t work on a rounded helmet and I drilled through the helmet to use the screw mount but it kept turning and wouldn’t stay straight. I found an alternative mount method.

This is a great camera.  I got it for my son and he was so excited to get it.  He plans on using it for biking, in the pool, and on vacations.  He loves the big screen in the back of it and the fact that it has 2 battery packs.  You can use one and the other you can have readily available to switch out and so that you don't run out of batteries.  Looking to use it some more.

I spent quite some time shopping around for a sports camera with reasonable budget. I need some light weighted camera that can record video / photos when I do bicycling, skiing or snorkeling. The EK7000 satisfies all my requirement, it's built with very good quality, provides all necessary features (waterproof, 4K high resolution video, wide angle etc.) and lots of useful accessories. Right after I received the camera, I just charged the battery and mounted the camera on my bicycle then bounced out to play. This camera works perfectly, the video recorded is in very good quality (I set 1080 60Hz resolution), sound is clear, and it's quite stable too. I recommend this camera if you just want to shoot regular video during your recreation.

Nice little camera with great picture quality for the price. Takes excellent pictures and quality 4k video.You need to have a 4K compatible device to play back. Would be nice if it came with the car dash board suction clip in the included accessories, there are plenty of clips to hook the camera to various locations.

This is my daughter's first camera and she likes that it came with a bunch of stuff like two batteries, extra mounts and a waterproof case.  One thing I noticed is that the user interface is a bit clunky.  You have to use the camera a lot to remember what the different arrow keys do.  It could be a little bigger so the screen was bigger and maybe there could be room for more buttons.  Overall, for $50, it's a pretty darn good camera; however, if you are a professional you probably want to look elsewhere.

This is the best action camera you can buy dollar by dollar. Not considered necessary spending $20 or $30 more for the newer model since the previous was enough. Easy to use and excellent video quality. The WiFi feature is a top! This is my first camera so I don’t have criteria to compare but I noticed that on the first use the battery lasted less than 1.5 hrs. Don’t know if this is normal. Soon I will use it for scuba diving and will update review.

Completely disappointed with this product. 6 month after purchasing I’ve found nothing but problems with this camera. The battery cap falls off, the still picture quality is below average, the video and audio quality is subpar and there is absolutely no driver support downloads for PC use. If I could send it back I would. Save your money on this item.

The camera is great for what it is supposed to do. Where it is lacking is around the app to the camera, which kills the camera battery wise connecting by acting like a access point. The directions are limited at best and non-technical people are going to have an issue with the lack of information. All the different mounts need better explanation. I had to go and hit the website and read up on the product. This is a great alternative to G0PRO but I worry about the poor Operating system it uses.

AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle is the best camera I have ever owned! I use it for everything, from still photos to underwater video. I highly recommend this video camera to anyone who likes outdoor adventure photography. Small, lightweight, with lots of battery life. Quick to charge, and easy download. If you need one camera to do everything the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle is the one to buy!

This arrived with the plastic part that holds the camera to the handle broken.  It worked for the first couple of days, then the charging became iffy to the point where I had to hold the cable titled for it to charge. Then the next day the USB port fell inward into the unit and it could no longer charge.  The failure of the USB port after only a couple uses indicates that the manufacturing of this product is inferior. The camera was returned.

I was skeptical of purchasing this camera due to the price. You know... You get what you pay for. After reading the reviews I decided to go ahead and order one. Honestly I love it and it and I’m a so happy I purchased it. The quality of the videos and pictures are very crisp! I would highly recommend to purchase this camera.

The 2 issues would be (1) camera quality and (2) battery life. The better quality you run the camera at the faster it will die. However they include a back up batter so if you have it record about 480p, the 2 batteries together last 4-5 hours. They also include many accessories to hook-up your camera to your bike's handle bars, helmet, etc. They also provide an app to control the camera from your phone. The interface on the camera is also quite easy to use as well.Summary - For how cheap the camera is compared to others, you get what you expect, however the accessories that come with the camera definitely make it worth the buy.

Loved this item! Used it in Aruba for a family vacation to capture on video all of our fun. Was great in the water and on land. Just need to remember to charge the battery when low so it will be ready for the next day. Also purchased the stick to make it easier to use as it is very small—convenient for carrying. Would recommend it for anyone who is looking for something a bit less expensive than some of the other more popular brand names and does not want to sacrifice quality. Isn’t that everyone?

I bought this camera primarily for its cheap price and popularity on this website. This is my first action camera so I do not have the chance to compare it with other cameras. After using it a few times in the past two weeks I list its pros and cons I have found out so far.Pros:

I’ve been using this camera as a dash cam mounted to my windshield. This obviously doesn’t require perfect video quality and so it’s good for that. For the money it’s worth it for the most part. There is definitely room for improving on stabilization, ease of use and of the app. The app crashes quite often and so that’s frustrating as it doesn’t have to do a whole lot. I got a letter saying that if I wrote a review for the camera(which I did buy on my own), I’d get a free pair of shoes and a hat. We’ll see how that goes.

Extremely impressed with this camera.  The quality of it is just as good as it's competitor and comes with quite a few accessories.Seriously, it's a pile of different mounts and extra battery.  Love that they added all the extras that the other guys make you buy.

After a few initial uses, I think this is a terrific product at an unbelievable cheap price.  For the average family use, it will serve our needs just fine.  In addition to the camera taking very clear videos and pictures, the accessories that are part of the basic package are outstanding, including a second battery.  I am really glad I did not purchase any other brand as this offers a fantastic bang for the buck.  I will be ordering additional ones for the family in the upcoming year.

I used this camera to video backcountry mountain snowmobiling for my website and YouTube channel as a way to get more riders in the group to capture footage without breaking the bank. I can’t say enough about the durability and video quality of this camera. The battery lasted about an hour and a half in the snow which is pretty good. It comes with 2 so swapped them out and kept going. Unfortunately a mount I had bought attach to the handle bars broke when we had a sled get stuck and rolled out. And the camera got buried in the snow and we lost it....

I really like the camera because of its size and quality of pictures and videos. I think the price is totally worth it! I plan on using this camera when I go to Ecuador. I am really excited to use it underwater and when I do activities like ziplining. I love the fact that the camera is small because I don't really have to worry about someone stealing it from me when I walk around the city and it won't take that much space in my purse. It's a very convenient camera that produces good quality pictures and pictures.

I’ve tried  two of these.. the first one stopped working after two uses. The second one has a black spot on the lens- inside! Was told I would get upgraded but it never happened..  seller stopped responding and not trustworthy.Buy a brand name camera..

Within 5 minutes of opening the camera the waterproof latch snapped off. Wasn’t able to test if it even worked underwater because the latch is so cheaply made. I’ll be searching for a better camera! Updated to 5 stars as customer service contacted me and issued me a full refund!

Received this camera the day we left for vacation and charged the batteries in our car. 20 min into opening the box the batteries had melted into the dock and the cable port on the dock is warped.Update: 11/29/18

I wanted to try a cam like this but not spend a lot of money for it since I wont be using it all the time. This really fit the bill. The picture quality in video and still format is excellent. I put it underwater to test that aspect and it was  good also.It comes with several styles of mounts, one of which I wasnt sure how to use. I got with the supplier and figured it out. Excellent response from them. If you are interested in a Go-Pro style camera, you might want to give this a try.

I ran a long 12 hour time lapse with this camera and it worked flawlessly - I kept the camera hooked up to power for the time lapse since clearly, the battery wouldn't last that long. I used the included bicycle mount to attach the camera to a pole, and it worked great at giving me a cool look at the fish in my pond.I have no complaints - great accessories included and everything feels well built. The operations of the camera are very intuitive and simple to navigate. I will be recommending this camera to my friends.

Arrived fast and exactly as described. This is a much better camera than a GoPro! I have had a GoPro, and it worked for about 6 months before initial battery failure. It then worked for about 2 weeks after spending the cost of new batteries, and has never worked again. I did some research and found this camera to have much higher review ratings and tried it - it is a great camera and a much better deal!

Wore on a ski trip. Video quality is crystal clear, and it's a good little camera for the price.Not sure what to do with many of the accessories, and I needed to order some others to do the stuff I actually want to do with it. I'm a partner acrobat and wanted the camera to shoot point-of-view video when doing acrobatic tricks, but had to order a separate chest harness and headset mount to accomplish this. Not a big deal, though, as these accessories are cheap and readily available.

We have a youtube channel that film Exotic car owners and the shenanigans they do with their cars. A lot of moving video, close ups, and very fast clips. I bought 2 of these for under the price of 1 gopro. They are awesome. We did buy some suction cup mounts for the cars. If they are good enough to use on and filming  Lamborghinis, Ferraris, Audi R8s and Bmw i8s, going very fast then they are probably good enough for you. Can't beat the price or the quality. Buy one.

Pretty good picture quality. You really get what you pay for with these. Batteries don't have a very long life. It gets the job done for sure. Be aware though thre is no sound when it's in the waterproof case. The case I have seals up very tightly and works great. This isn't a gopro, it's much cheaper for a reason, this is a simple camera.

I bought this because my wife and I went on a cruise and were going swimming with turtles.  I debated about getting one of the waterproof phone bags, but...it's my expensive phone, what if? ? ?  This was a great little camera.  It took decent pics and video.  My wife was SO excited to get to use it when swimming with the turtles and sting rays.  Well worth the price I spent.  I have never used one of the more expensive ones, but for what we needed it for, I'm glad I bought it.  It does "Feel" cheap, and I was worried before we used it and downloaded the pics.  No worries now!

I bought this camera to take photo of my kids  at the beach. I’m very pleased with the quality of pictures and videos! It works great. This camera doesn’t come with micro SD card so if you are thinking of using it as soon as it arrives, you should have it ready.Overall I am very satisfied with this product! I’d recommend it to everyone!

Excellent product for the price!  My wife and I were headed to Bermuda for a week and I was just going to by the GoPro but decided to do a bit more research and came across this.  Watched several videos and YouTube and decided to give it a shot.  I was shocked at how great the quality was and the battery lasted for at least 3 or more hours.  The price, clarity, ease of use, and quality make it a no-brainer when compared to other Action Camera's.  **The company also took the time to write up a nice thank you note and mailed it to my home.  I'm in the business of customer service and that was a really nice touch.  AKASO does it right!**Shipping Time = excellent

I got it for my motorcycle and it has worked flawlessly and is easy to understand and use. I don't like technology typically but I'm already excited to have this little gadget. Used it around the house with kids and pets too and it's a decent still camera as well. Plan to buy another one at least. Good camera good price. Thanks Akaso.

This is an excellent product, especially for the price. I posted pictures with my review that were all taken with the EK7000 Action Camera. The only reason why I gave a medium review on stabilization is because you do have to be still to get a clear picture. The good pictures that I have are ones of me floating above the surface. Action shots, while moving, did not turn out. I do have the one picture of me swimming next to a full grown sea turtle, though. All of these pictures were taken while snorkeling Molokini Crater off the Hawaii Island of Maui.Note: don't forget to order a micro SD card.

I loved all the attachments but in the end the picture quality was unuseable. I bought two cameras of the regular version and 1 of the pro version and all three were very poor in picture quality. It looks like low light grain but in daylight. Cannot recommend. Your cell phone from 2010 records better video I promise.

So when mine arrived, I tried to remove a film on it because there were scratches. That film was on there so very good that even after trying for a bit, I thought for sure there was no protective film over it.I was wrong.  So I tested the item out in the backyard (haven't had a chance to test it in action yet) and it was pretty awesome. Great quality even when I move it quickly.

I've wanted an action camcorder for years, and am glad I finally got this one.  solid picture quality, easy to use, plenty of features and accessories.  I can't wait to try out the underwater capability when the weather warms up a little.  The one thing I need to figure out is the best bike mount system - the handlebar option is loud, a little shaky, and hard to keep fastened....

I found this camera to be perfect for me needs. I cycle, hike and do a lot of time in the water swimming with tropical fish and turtles.. This camera handles them all with wonderful ease and terrific quality of images. This price point also brings the product into the reach of almost anyone. Thank you very much for a wonderful product.

Great value! We bought this for our Florida vacation and went snorkeling, swimming, boating, etc. The waterproof case is 100% effective, although audio is muffled through the case. It takes great pictures but not new smartphone quality (but it's not $900, like a new smartphone would be). We would only take a few minutes of video at a time and pictures here and there and the battery was EXCELLENT. Over about 4 days, I think I only changed it once. The only thing I didn't like is the date/time would reset everytime I turned it on and I got tired of changing it so a bunch of our pics have the wrong date on them. But there's probably a setting I could change somewhere. Would 100% but again!

I received this product today and I am very impressed with it. The camera comes with plenty of accessories including 2 batteries, both were fully charged. The remote is a great feature for my purposes which is mostly fishing. The camera feels solid and has a nice display for viewing the images and videos. I have owned GoPro hero 3 and the video quality is comparable to that. For the price, you cannot go wrong!

We got this for my 8-year-old for Christmas. She used it on the beach, in the pool and all around in side and outside. It is perfect for what you would expect for this kind of camera. She has had a lot of fun creating videos and with the protective case, we don't have to worry about her dropping and ruining the camera. It comes with a lot of accessories that was a nice bonus. Overall, for the price this is a great camera for action and fun videos.

We bought this to go to a water park, not knowing if we would use it for more than that.  Did not want to drop a lot on a GoPro and hardly use it.  I am glad we did because this camera is GREAT.  I cannot fairly compare to a GoPro because I've never used one but I hauled this thing into every pool, ride and slide at the park and brought back amazing pics (above and below water) and videos that'll we'll look at forever.  ADDED BONUS...wife was able to wirelessly download all the photos/vids to her phone on the car ride back.  Highly recommend.

I ordered this GoPro  for my 11-year-old grandson for Christmas. He was quite excited to receive it this morning. It took a little bit of examination to figure out what all of the additional pieces in the box were for and how to get started using it as  very limited instructions were provided, but it was pretty easy to figure out. I just know he is going to love using this, especially when he attaches it to the handlebars of his little motorcycle or to the headband attachment we also purchased. This product arrived on time and in perfect condition. Although we have not had an opportunity to use it much yet, at this time I would say I would definitely recommend this product and the seller.
Extremely poor battery life. Good for short motorcycle rides, but recording over an hour may be an issue. The waterproof case is also prone to inner condensation, at least in San Francisco.Update:

After not wanting to spend the money on a GoPro I did a lot a research and settled on the Akaso EK7000.  The video quality has been great. My only complaint is that I needed to look up how to navigate their menu structure as it was not very clear.  Aside from that small learning curve, the unit has been great.  The build quality of the camera does not feel premium but it does the job. Once it's in the case though I have very few concerns about its safety.  Overall, two thumbs up!

Unfortunately, you get what you pay for. Initially the camera worked fine but after about 6-7 months of minimal use, the camera started experiencing serious issues. I took the camera with me on a uero trip, hoping to film and take pictures of all the places I was visiting. Unfortunely, most of the media was currupted and useless. I contacted customer service (who was nice and professional) but was unable to replace the unit as “the warrenty had expired”. I would not recommend this product and defiantly would not rely on the quality of product again. Looking back now, I think I would have rather spent more money and purchased a high quality GoPro. Memories are priceless and now lost forever.

I love that it has such a wide angle. I love that it’s so easy to get the pictures on your phone right away. The quality is super nice too. One thing I do wish is that it had directions on setting the camera up, like how to connect the WiFi and all that jazz. I had to look all that up on google. But other than that it’s wonderful! ❤️

I purchased this camera due to the reviews and to not spend a fortune on the name brand. Our first use was at Sand Dunes National Park and I was not disappointed in my purchase. The quality of the video is as good as the 2 other GoPro cameras I have owned. The color is great and it is easy to operate the camera functions. Still trying to figure out all the attachments and mounts that came with it but that's a bonus over other cameras  This camera does not have image stabilization but for me thats real life when I am out hiking or Jeeping so its no big deal. I am in the mountains s I cant post any video right now but I can say I would buy this again in a second.

This is a good camera, when it works. However, it is unreliable.I tried recording w/the harness while exercising, w/the car mount while driving, & w/the harness while swimming. In each situation, the recording would stop on its own, the screen would freeze, or it would just shut off. Sometimes I had to pull the battery to restart it other times I could just turn the power back on. Sometimes it would keep the video, other times it wouldn't. I was using a Samsung  microSDHC UHS-1 CLASS 10 Card

We actually loves this camera except for a couple of things. They are an app on our android devices which is very buggy and does not want to connect to the camera. Also, we are  only getting about 25 mins of recording time with the batteries and thought we read somewhere that we should get an hour or more. All in all, just an amazing amount of performance for just a small amount of money. Very good value.

When I ordered it I thought it was going to be similar to every other camera, but when I received it it blew my expectations away!The quality of picture does not match the physical size of the product.  The 4K definition is very crisp and clear and it’s amazing how such good quality can come from such a small device.

This was purchased for a cruise vacation, we wanted something to take some video primarily but also snapped a few pics. I'm not a big A/V guy, but this camera performed as expected especially for the price compared to say a GoPro.My only complaint is that the buttons can be difficult to use with the waterproof case on it. Also to be expected, the microphone doesn't pick up audio as well with the case on.

Bought this as a present for my 9 year old boy. At first glance it appeared and felt like a quality product. The directions are a little tough, but manageable. The photo quality is impressive, as is the video quality. The wi-fi operation via phone is a little sketchy, but that's the least of my concerns. I would recommend this to anyone based on quality, appearance, and use. Our first one did end up with a faulty button on the side, it just depressed one day and wouldn't function anymore. That was about a month after purchase. Got ahold of customer support and they were super nice and took care of the problem. I will definitely purchase Akaso products again!

The battery didn't last very long - a couple hours at most.  The plus side is the camera comes with two rechargeable batteries so I was able to replace it when it died.  Video quality was good, picture quality left much to be desired.  I could've taken better pictures on my phone.  Sound is almost non-existent when in the water proof case.  It comes with many accessories that I couldn't figure out and the manual was no help.  Tons of accessories but not one selfie stick which is really what we wanted.  I bought this for a trip to Kauai and it served its purpose.  If you're looking for an affordable option for a vacation I recommend buying this camera.  If you're looking to get more usage than one trip, I'd recommend investing in a better camera.

Honestly, if this were compared to a gopro at a gopro price point, it would be more of a 3 star product.. However for the price this little guy isnt too bad. Not perfect for the price, but definitely seen worse around this price.Have not tried it near water yet, or even outside in hot cold or dry or even dusty places.. just use it on a camera stand to record videos of me using my LED light up gloves to music.

Wanted to use it to record my son riding his dirt bike so I could help him in motocross,  I cant get the camera to oink to my phone or download to my computer, if I would have know it want going to work i would have sent it back

This camera takes really good quality pictures, and the accessories that come with it are a nice touch, especially the waterproof housing.Easy set up, the smartphone app has not worked, but I'm still trying. - Just finished a week diving trip and this little camera packed a huge punch underwater. Did not work past 100ft and you must buy a red filter for the lense, but other than that it worked really well and took some awesome pictures. See some of my pics.

For $50 you will be SUPER happy. Pay attention when setting up the app. There’s one step that you’ll over look and think it’s not working. Used mine under water in Hawaii, Mexico, and Bahamas now with no issues.  Don’t let the GoPro commercials fool you, shooting underwater isn’t gonna look like it does in their ads. The clarity I saw in the water is what I saw on the camera. Location, depth, sunlight penetration, and water clarity do matter.

This is a great camera for the money, does the job well. Waterproof case works like a charm.As for video and pictures quality, it was supprisingly good & can be adjusted in the settings, and the default works just fine if all you're doing is a simple biking or kayaking video. Another bonus was it excepted a 128Gb SD card for all day video. So if you don't want to spend over of 200 or more dollars on an expensive GoPro, this product is a perfect alternative.

Updated** After posting the review below, their customer support contacted me immediately and sent me out two new batteries with a  charger. It allowed me to use my camera again and capture wonderful pictures of our adventures in Colorado. I'll be using this camera to capture many more adventures and commend their customer support.Old review* Here's the thing, when it worked, I really liked it. The problem is, I only had it for 6 months and then could no longer use it due to a charging error that said it had been recalled for overheating. I used it three times before I had to stop. This was after I got shipped the wrong thing in the first place. I'm saving up for a GoPro.

This product was a budget purchase into the world of action cameras, and I was not disappointed with this purchase! What you get is a great camera with clear, crisp images and video with nearly all the same features of a GoPro. My only qualm with this product is that the microphone is lacking (which isn't a huge deal for me, but could be for some) and that there are no third-party accessories to remedy it. The only way to resolve the microphone is to physically modify the camera to wire a 3.5mm jack in parallel to the existing mic. Not a job for beginners, but with the cost of this device it's certainly worth trying (two wires being soldered on with slight drilling to make the jack accessible).Overall this is definitely a great entry point for action cameras, and worth "getting your feet wet" with.

You cannot beat this camera for the price.  Purchased this for my eleven year old daughter so that she can make videos of all the neighboorhood kids doing what kids do.  It has successfully survived a year of hard use so far and is still going strong.  It comes with many accessories (the clear plastic case was the first casualty, but I believe that to be user error).  The image quality is on par with the big name brand unit, but for a fraction of the cost.  LCD screen on rear and bluetooth connections to your phone or tablet make use a snap.

This was my first time using an action camera so I was nervous making the purchase online when I knew so little. I’ve got to say, so far so good! Even though it didn’t come with a user manual (and the link to a manual they gave came up as a 404 cannot be found page) I was able to quickly figure it all out and we took her out for a snorkeling trip! It would be cool if the remote was waterproof but it’s still a great tool! It was awesome getting to use the app to see the pictures I just taken! The picture included isn’t *super* clear, but only because that was the water conditions. Recommending to all my friends that are inquiring!

This my first ever action camera, I looked long and hard at the Go-Pro options, I didn't want to spend $300+ on something I wasn't sure I would even like. This was a great alternative, less money for basically the same thing, plus it included items like 2 batteries, mounting options, etc... that would have made the other guys even higher. My first impression is it is small than I thought (good thing), simple to operate, easy to understand, video quantity and lens view seem very nice.  The only drawback I have found so far, is that when the camera is in the waterproof case (were it will be most of the time for me) the buttons are harder to push and you have to listen to the sound to verify that you pushed hard enough. It does come with a remote, so after the initial setup it will be easy to manage in the fieldPlan to use for fishing/kayaking

I like the idea of a inexpensive action camers.  This camera is okay but I am very disapointed with the battery life.  Ninty (90) minitutes is far from the max of 20-25 min I get from this camera.  If someone is getting 90 min, please tell me how?  I wish I could return the camera.  I did not use it much due to workload and no time to get outdoors.  Things have changed now so I now have time and used the carmera yesterday.  I got a disapointing 20 min battery life so between the two batteries you almost get one (1) hour.  Vidoe and soum]n quality are good but this battery thing just ticks me off.

Great boxing along with many accessories. Camera is similar to other higher end models. 1080p is best setting at 60 fps. 4k is awful, useless and choppy as hell. No sound with waterproof case on. Setup screen is easy to use with app. Comes with 2 batteries and charger. Full screen in back. Using WiFi tends to make unit warm. Overall, not bad for the money.

I would not suggest buying this. I thought it would be a good cheaper version of a Nother brand that’s popular for active cameras. But this is terrible quality and all the instructions are in Chinese the app is in Chinese so you don’t even know how to set it up. The packaging was cracked when I ordered it and I would not suggest buying it if you were looking for an alternative to other active cameras.

i purchased this for snorkeling. i looked at the pictures on amazon and reviews and was confident about this purchase. however, i the picture quality didnt turn out to be great for me. the pictures and videos under water were not clear and some were even grainy. the videos underwater were not clear either. i ended up returning this purchase. another thing to note is the battery life isnt the greatest. they do provide two batteries though.

Great little camera for a 9 year old when you don't want to spend the big bucks on the more popular brand.  We did have to download a different camera app but I love how you can either use the remote or your device to control the camera.  I am supposed to receive a few extra items after writing a review or something like that but I wasn't writing a review until after the camera had been put through the wringer by the 9 year old, regardless of onus items.  Other than a scratch on the waterproof case (caused by my son) this camera is holding up well with selfies, photos, & action and underwater videos.  Good deal!

We bought this camera to take on a cruise that went to Mexico. We used the camera on the cruise, in the pool, in the ocean when we arrived and we even mounted in to a helmet when we embarked on an ATV ride through the jungle. Overall the device performed great and did everything it said it would in the description. I would recommend purchasing the A bundle full of different mounts for added fun. We have used the chest mount on our dog when throwing the ball and taking him on hikes for a fun POV. Great product!

Honestly, I was surprised to see that this had 4K Video for something this cheap. I figured I would take the plunge and see how this REALLY looks.And honestly? It's not bad at all. It's QUITE GOOD. If you're one of those who are new to having these kind of cameras and are iffy about snagging a GoPro, this would be the place to go.

***Updated***Do not trust the mounts for highway speed wind sheer. Lost my first camera. The company replaced the camera so kudos to them for being supportive of their customers. Should have attached the camera to the leash. Partly my fault. would be nice to have a small booklet for directions on proper mounting.

You get for what you paid for. I bought this to install facing me while on my bike. Picture quality isn’t that great. Camera doesn’t adjust well when transitioning from dark to light environment. Unlike my GoPro, this feels very cheaply made.

I bought this camera for my 6 year old and i have admit that i use it more than he does. The video quality is great, underwater use is good with the volume being slightly muffled by the waterproof casing, but this is normal. Its easy to use and setup is no problem. This thing cost a fraction of the price and works just as good as the brand name competitors. I would definitely reccomend!

I bought this action camera with little expectations.  Just wanted something to supplement my photo shoots mounted on top of my DSLR.  A zoom function would have been nice but or the price, it does the job.  Image quality and video quality is good enough to capture what I need.  This is a good price point for the product.  Don't expect a GoPro and accept this product for what it is and you will not be disappointed.

I mounted this camera to my motorcycle helmet (at the chin). It's perfect for the price and provides a great way for me to look back at some close calls. It's not amazing at reading license plates from a distance since the looping video option doesn't work for 4k video, but it would be perfect for showing a police officer or insurance company who is at fault in an accident. The only other problem I run into is the Date & Time settings reset every time the battery dies.

Excellent stabilization and perfect for people searching for something similar in quality to the official GoPro. Aside from the name, everything is very similar to the quality and size of the well known brands but for a much cheaper price! I highly recommend if you are looking for an action camera on a budget.(Not sure on water resistance, will update when summer time gets here)

My son has been nagging to get a go pro. I didn't want to spend those big bucks on the name. Plus he's 15 and who knows how long it would hold his attention. So I settled for the Akaso EK7000. Let me tell you I was so pleasantly surprised at the quality. I actually bought another one for my husband. It takes great video while fishing, dirt biking, hiking and the list goes on and on. Excellent quality of picture. Video is steady and not shaky like cheaper models. If you are just getting into the world of go pros I would highly suggest starting with this model. You will not be disappointed. I did purchase separately a chest and head mount. It makes taking video a little easier.

I had never tried using an "action" camera before. I read the reviews on the Akaso EK7000 and was impressed enough by them to purchase the camera. We used it today for the 1rst time, on our bike ride. I was very impressed by the clarity of the video and even the smoothness...especially considering that the camera was handle bar mounted.Pros: 1. Price for sure. I expected to pay more than $70 for an action camera.

I am a nature photography and this camera has opened up a new world to supplement my still work.  Placing this camera on an extender pole can gain access to new worlds that have been traditionally difficult to achieve with my conventional gear.  Using this camera and the pole while kayaking has proved to be extremely enjoyable and has expanded my vision resulting in new creative possibilities.  Thanks so much for a wonderful product!

This camera costs at lower price compare to other cameras in the same category. However the video/audio quality is really good for its price, it also comes with multiple (10+) accessories which are compatible with conventional GoPro standard. I would recommend this model to friends and families who want a sport camera or camera to carry around without spending too much.

The day before Christmas Eve I was looking for one additional gift for my son.  I went to Best Buy and was looking at the GoPro cameras but wasn’t willing to spend over $250 for the basic camera.  Was looking through Amazon and came across this camera!!!! BEST DEAL EVER!!!! My son is 10 and wanted to start a YouTube channel.  This camera does it all for him.  It links right to his iPhone, has the adapter pieces that allow him to do his stunts and keep the camera safe.  The picture quality is great and I have a happy kid.  He hasn’t stopped making videos since he took it out of the box and set up the camera, which was super easy btw.  We haven’t tried it in water yet but he’s already planning what he is going to do when the pool opens in the spring.

I purchased two of these to try some different angles for my soccer team and to do some side projects at school. Have been using for a couple weeks now and have not had any major issues.  Picture quality is fine. Sound is decent if not in the waterproof case. I will probably upgrade to a higher model at some point for better image stabilization and maybe some zoom if available(no zoom on this one).  If you are looking for something for tripod use this works great. Most of the attachments that come with it are for helmet and bike handle use.  I'm sure they would work fine if thats what you are going to use it for.

Glad I didn't go all out for the GoPro, this little machine is great!  I've strapped it to my bicycle helmet and hit the trails, the picture quality was great!  It was a little bouncy but that is only because I didn't have the strap tight enough, once I fixed that no worries!  The sound quality isn't that great but I wasn't too concerned about capturing sound so that is not a big deal to me.  I am very happy with this product, price and quality!

I like to attach an action camera to my airplane's wing for in-flight videos.  I was nervous about using my expensive GoPro, fearing it might fall off!  So, I gave this Akaso EK7000 a try and was truly amazed at how inexpensive it was considering the picture quality!  It also came with numerous accessories, too.  It did not have image stabilization but in reviewing my videos, it turned out not to be a problem at all.  I highly recommend this camera if you wand good quality video but don't want to risk the investment in a more expensive camera.

What a super little camera at a fantastic price.  I think it performs as well as a GOPRO at a fraction of the price!  I especially like the underwater housing...works perfectly with no leaks whatsoever!!!  And the remainder of the accessories gave me everything I needed.  I do want to get the attachable float for underwater security.

I purchased this camera for a trip to Himalayas next month, so when a received this item a couple of days ago. I took it for a spin and tested it as much as it can and so far i am impressed. I had a GoPro Hero in the past and i could say the picture and video quality is good and close to GoPro; i still cannot comment on the ruggedness of the device but it feels very well built.PROS

I have had GoPro 2 and 3 in the past and they had less functionality of the EK7000 and cost more.  Not everyone has $400-500 to drop on these things.  Came with two batteries and a wrist remote which is perfect for on the go action.  At the time of purchase, an option to get some additional attachments for 30% was a bonus.  Still need to test the WiFi app but I will expect that to work well.  If you are looking to record in 1080p, the EK7000 will get the job done.Thank you Akaso!

This camera is amazing, I use it for my youtube channel and it's clear, charges quickly and I also bought an extender to be able to take videos from different heights and angles, it fits perfectly and doesn't affect the quality at all. I have yet to try it underwater but from what I've seen of other people's videos it's quality and clarity are incredible. I am extremely satisfied with this camera and I would buy it again as a gift or just a backup any day.

This a toy, not a camera. It comes with no instruction manual. You are totally on your own with this product. Even when you do find the owner's manual on the web, you need to download a bunch of apps to get this running and the apps are terrible.

I would definitely buy again and recommend it - you cannot beat the quality for the price!!  This is an excellent camera and I would say it deserves 4 1/2 stars only because it doesn't come with the underwater filter or separate charger.  It comes with 2 batteries but you have to charge the battery in the camera unless you buy the separate charger.  But given how good this little camera performs that is a very minor thing.  We bought it just before we left on vacation and didn't have time to really check it out before going.  I was not disappointed in both pictures and video.  The kids had a blast filming while they jumped off a cliff into the water and filming things underwater.  The little camera provided great quality video with sound and the "high impacts" from the jumps didn't bother this little camera at all - sturdy.  We used it snorkeling and scuba diving - to about 40' depth.  We purchased the 64GB chip with it and I was glad I did.  The kids were constantly filming videos but we never ran out of memory.  The controls are a bit tricky at first.  At night I'd download the pics/videos to our laptop for viewing.  In the water, out of the water, people pics, landscape shots...they were all very high quality and gave us some great pics/vids to remember our vacation.  The set also comes with a bunch of various connectors to attach to things.  We mainly used the waterproof compartment with a handle (purchased as a separate item).  Great product...highly recommend.

First and foremost: The reason this product has so many reviews is because the company ships a free gift to those who write a review and send them a screenshot. However, the instructions *don't* state what rating to give. As such, it appears to be a genuine effort to have customers write reviews.In terms of actual quality, I wanted a very cheap underwater camera for a trip to Hawaii, and this met the desired criteria. The video quality is actually pretty good (not 4k quality, but certainly HD). The camera also comes with a wide range of accessories. The value for the dollar is great.

It came with everything except a memory card. But I have a spare one, so it was ok. The camera is pretty well built and all the attachments you need were included. It is an extra bonus with the price. Wifi connection is straight forward and no problem at all. All hassle I had was I could not figure out how to detach the camera from the package box. It was easy. I needed to simply slide off  but I had to find out the way through searching youtube video.

The Akaso EK7000 camera is a very good and inexpensive alternative to the GoPros. I use mine in the car (as a dashcam) and on the mountain bike. The video quality is great…I’m only shooting in 1080p 60 and 1080p 30. When mounted on the bike, the camera responds very well to shakes, bumps, wheelies, etc. Nice surprise is how good the quality is even when driving/riding towards the sun. The picture quality can be improved but I’m not losing any sleep over that because all I care is the videos. The camera came with bunch of usable accessories and a remote control. The last is perfect to snap pics but it needs a bit of a push-and-hold to start a video. Also, the battery indicator is not to be trusted to the dot. As a safe rule of thumb, I always deduct 25% of the shown battery level to get a real sense of how much juice is left to shoot with. All-in-all I’m very happy with this little camera. It does what I needed to do and it’s a great bargain for one’s buck.Pros: quality of videos, accessories, stabilizer, it takes 64GB SD card

We bought this for our 12 year old daughter as a birthday present because she really wanted a camera.  It's not what we thought it would be as it is very small and to be used mostly for attaching to a bicycle or something else while you are moving.  She did like it though, and loved that it can be used for underwater picture-taking.
Really cool for the priceTook it diving at 20' for about 1 hour and it took great vids and pictures

Keep in mind i've own gopro products before which are considerably more expensive so i tend to compare to what i know. Package came and look very similar to GoPro. lots of accessories, two batteries, a charger that can charge both batteries at the same time if needed. batteries were charged so i get to play with it within minutes. very straightforward product. simple to use. instructions on paper (6 pages) not a 160 page manual like some others...Image is great and comparable to other action cameras priced 3-4 times as much.

I really like this camera! It's small, waterproof, and affordable. It worked great for our Carribean vacation. I used this camera underwater with no problems. Only thing is that I should have attached a light to see better but that's not this camera's issue. Battery lasted throughout our 7-hour excursion but I didn't use continuously - I recorded bits here and there. But overall a good camera for our trip.

I bought this camera for my 11 year old son who wanted to film action shots of whatever activity he was doing. He wanted a GoPro but there was no way I was spending that kind of money!!! I honestly wasn’t expecting much for $50, but knew he would enjoy it. This camera/video has been so durable, takes great pictures and videos, is easy to use and is waterproof!! I’m impressed with the quality and we are 7 months into owning it and it’s just as good. If you’re in the fence..... give it a try! You can’t beat the price and functionality!

Box came with almost all the basic accessories that you need- 2 batteries, weather proof case, charger, mounts and more. I’ve ridden 1000+ miles on it and the video and image quality is amazing.Additionally, customer service is top notch. I lost my remote control for the camera. Contacted customer service and they sent me one back for free, with prompt response time.

I bought this for my son for his birthday. He wanted a sports* action camera, but we didn't want to buy a GoPro for him because these things can get lost or grow legs easily. This is amazing camera, and not just as a starter camera. The picture is clear, the modes are easy to navigate, and there are lots of accessories to make sure that we have what we need to get set up. A second seal is even included. At this time, we don't have any issues with the camera, especially at this price!

So far so good!! Just received it yesterday and played with it a bit this morning. Time will tell after diving with it and running it on some outdoors gear. Very impressed with packaging and all the do-dads that came with it. I really hope this turns out to be a solid camera. I'll definitely buy more!!

I can’t say enough about this camera. I bought it to bring to the Bahamas and film all of the fish. This is amazing, BUT the app is not.....don’t waste your time trying to watch your footage on your phone....just wait til you’re able to take the card out and watch it on a computer. After getting home and watching our footage, we were very happy that it caught all of the little fish on camera. Also the battery dies pretty fast when videoing, but that’s expected.....just be sure to have the extra battery on you!

I’m new to using an action camera but wanted one to record my rides on a new electric scooter. The gold standard seems to be GoPro, but they’re pretty expensive and I don’t know if I’ll actually get into using it that much. So I figured I’d get the AKASO which is much more affordable. So far I like it a lot. It produces really clear video, and can be remotely operated by app or remote control. I’ve imported videos into iMovie and added sound track (though the camera does record sound too). For a first time or casual action cam user I would say you get a lot for your money.

A+++ I ordered this early Friday morning using two day shipping (free with Amazon Prime).  It arrived the following day at 11am, I was totally blown away!  The packaging is exactly as pictured and included all the accesories described.  I Youtubed how to use it (easy route).  I am very happy with this camera, video quality is excelant!  It is very easy to use and I love the remote.  The app is OK.  My son has a GoPro Hero3.  He viewed a couple of my first videos and said the video quality is great.

I am very pleased with the product thus far. This is my first action camera and I purchased it to get secondary footage when making short films. I plan on using it in 1080 at 30fps mainly. I’ve been playing with the accessories it came with and building some pretty cool rigs. I attached it to the handle bars on my daughters bike and the video quality was great.
