We bought this for our 12 year old. He wanted a go pro but I wasn't about to pay that kind of money. It has held up good and has great video quality.  The sound isn't all that good but it could just be user error.  I accidentally left my phone charging and my husband didn't get videos of a 4th of July event. Mh son captured it on this handy device and we were so excited.

DO NOT PURCHASE. The price is a EYE catch but stay away. I am so glad that I purchased the GoPro the same day. Would not turn on, after 10 hours of charge. Came on WITH PLUG INTO OUTLET. I should have known better. Come with everything needed. All accessories.0 stars

For being a 4k camera, the picture quality is not the best. The pictures are blurry and very hard to focus. As far as the water resistance, I have not been able to test this out but I just ordered a new pool, so will try taking pictures under water and see how the pictures come out and write an updated review then.

Very well designed product with many good features for a great price.  Bought this for my son and myself to make fun little videos and has an amazing picture quality.  The buttons at first were a little confusing on how to navigate through the settings but was able to easily catch on.  The clips and mounting brackets all seem to be of very good quality and do not seem as though they would break easily.  My only concern is if the cap for the battery will holdup as it seems to fit a little loose.  All in all I would definitely recommend this project to anyone looking for a on the go sports camera!!!

It comes with a whole lot of performance, features and accessories for the money. I'm literally amazed that they can sell this for under a hundred bucks and still make money. As far as I can tell, it's on par with the GoPro except for low-light conditions. When it's dark, the GoPro captures better contrast. However, they're both pretty bad in the dark and you really shouldn't be trying to use any small-sensor camera in low light! Get one!... heck, get two!
The stabilization was not good, about the 4th time I plugged the cord in to charge and retrieve my pictures the whole plug in pushed right in.  You get what you pay for. I would not recommend at all.

After receiving this camera it is easy to see why it is the highest rated action camera on Amazon.  I bought this as a follow up to a much cheaper camera, this one has several advantages.  Separate charger, rather than charging the battery in the camera.  Red indicator light when the camera is on and recording, really a great feature.  Works with a 64gb micro sd card, nice set of accessories.  Really a great purchase for a relatively inexpensive camera.

I brought the camera for our upcoming trip to the Bahamas. The camera comes very neatly packaged. Everything is separately bagged and the camera and case have plastic film all over. The accessories that came with package are okay. However, you can get additional accessories for free if you leave a review, which is awesome! Here are my thoughts so far after playing around with it a couple of weeks.  If you use the camera properly, good mounting, you get pretty good video. I'm pleased with the quality for this price (third of GoPro Hero) though! The remote that it comes with works really well. I really like that feature. The kit does come with 2 batteries. I think they're only half charged, and you should charge them before use. One thing I'm being careful of is the lens because I don't know what material they are, on the camera or the case. Would I purchase the camera again? You bet, mostly because of the price. Can't wait to use it in the Bahamas!

Just received my Akaso E7000 4K action camera and have to tell you I don’t think you could go wrong with this camera. It’s a great and cost effective camera that I believe rivals the more expensive go pros. It takes great photos  and videos which I record my bike rides and the stabilization is amazing.comes with some neat little accessories to mount different ways.waterproof case is exactly that water proof .the only negative I could find is the quality of sound in the waterproof case, but for the case to work as good as it does I believe in a necessary evil if you was able to record audio better then it wouldn’t be waterproof. Buy this camera you won’t be disappointed or broke.

This camera was awesome!  However, after the 1st time out using it, and coming back to charge it and use it again, it refuses to turn on.  We've tried everything - removing the batteries/changing the batteries etc., to no avail.  Neat product but . . . and like an idiot I waited too long to do something about it (it's been down about a month now).  It had excellent reviews, so this was frustrating - but I think I would buy one again, thinking from the reviews I've read, that it might be "my turn in the barrel" getting the "bad" one . . .

I bought this and the Akaso at the same time and preferred the VanTop.  Picture quality is very good, the touch screen system is easy to use out of waterproof and buttons still allow navigation intuitively in the case.  The app was easy to use and download though struggled to do multiple big videos.  Only issue is wanting to transfer automatically to your phones photo collection in bulk only one at a time which I couldn't work out how to do (Akaso app could).  Overall though was a better camera and better value

I've had the camera for a couple of weeks and so far it is working great.  It came with a ton of extras one being a mount that fit my motocross helmet very well.  The audio recording isn't very loud while in the waterproof case.  It was also impossible to tell if the camera was recording while using the remote.  It's suppose to beep but the beeps are so quiet you can't hear it with a helmet on.  Other than that the recordings are very good.  Overall it was better than expected for such a good price.

I got this for my on for his birthday. He has used it non-stop since opening it. It came with a ton of mounting options. He especially likes the bike handle mount. We've used it in the pool and the waterproof case works great. Best budget option action camera out there.

We purchased this camera for travel and activities such as tours, and snorkeling.  It was easy to set up wit cell phone via wifi.  Online instruction manual was easy to follow.  Its easy to operate and practice pictures look great.  We're looking forward to our upcoming trip!

Got this for my 17 year old, he likes to record his skate boarding. The quality is great but you do need to buy a SD card. So far so good for the money invested. The only negative is the charger cord has a short in it and I didn’t want to send it back he was so excited about getting it.

This camera was nothing but a headache.  It's difficult to navigate the menu, and by the time I had finally figured it out, the camera stopped recording effectively.  I would press record and double check that it was working, only to later find out that it had recorded 20 seconds then automatically shut off.  Additionally 50% of the files that I have ever recorded on this thing have been corrupted and unviewable.  I can not believe how highly this is rated on Amazon but it makes me question their entire rating system.  This camera is cheap and buggy if not flat out inoperable.  I implore you to look elsewhere.

Got this in the mail yesterday for my son. We took it out for a test run in the rain today and it worked great, the remote works as advertised which will be great for skiing this weekend. It came with everything we needed, plenty of mounts, waterproof case, 2 batteries, remote, extra straps and a charger that will charge both batteries simultaneously (great idea). Only thing we had to supply was the micro SD card which we had extras of. The picture quality is great and the menus on the camera are very user friendly. We are looking forward to making plenty of family ski trip videos this winter and taking it to the lakes in the summer. Great product, would highly recommend!

I got this specifically for Rugged Maniac -- a 5k I was planning on doing.. and wanted to have it recorded and on the info on it said battery life lasted up to two hours fully charged. I literally charged the battery fully the night before and didn't even put it in the camera until I was at the starting line.. when I finished ( about 2 hours later ) the camera was already dead. when I got home and switched the battery out to a new one I realized it had only recorded like 30 min of the race. I was really disappointed :( :(

So I bought one of these to use as a webcam because I couldn't find a decent one anywhere. Hooked it up super easy and was impressed on the quality I was getting. I used it as an action cam for a bit to test it out to see how it performed and thought it was great. 4k 60fps was nice but I thought the 1080p was clearer for some reason. Anyway I ordered 4 more just to have a back up and give to my buddies for when we go camping to get some video and have fun. Will probably order more honestly just to have around. I was definitely happy with the product for the price.

For the price you should not be allowed to complain. I have been shooting with this camera all weekend and love it. It comes with a ton of accessories, and the quality is just about as good as the Gopro costing more than 4 times as much. It is easy to operate and has a LCD screen on its back. It feels sturdy and did not break when I dropped it... only once. Sound is just ok but that really is not what these action camera are for. If you want to see the quality of both photo and video, check out the video I made. I definitely recommend this camera.  To see the video type in, "photojunky drone zone" , and there is a full review with a lot of footage.UPDATED: I have shot with this camera over a month and have made several videos. My final conclusion is... Gopro has set the standard, so most people use the quality of the Gopro as a measuring stick. This camera although good and incredible for the price is not as good in some aspects when compared to the Gopro. The image is more contrasty than the Gopro so in shadows you lose some detail. The colors seem a bit saturated and produce a less realistic image. This can be changed with an editor if you really need to, but not the loss of shadow detail. Build quality is good especially when you take into account the price. and the LCD screen on the back makes everything a lot easier such as settings and actually being able to see what you are filming. After a month of hard use I definitely recommend this camera. If you want to see a side by side comparison, go to youtube and seach "Photojunky Drone Zone" . There you will see two video reviews.

Not a bad camera for the money, good entry level, what it’s missing is the image stability that the go-pro has. I use this unit on my race car and it can get very shaky almost unwatchable, where a GoPro has a solid picture. But if your just using this mounted to yourself or underwater not bad for the money

Had it two days before my friend blasted it when I had it down range. 22 lr so definitely not bullet proof. very good camera though for the price for any general filming and the waterproofing seemed to be sturdy, though i never tried it. this is only a 4 star though because the quality was very skippy when controlling using wifi (video saved is not skippy, just the stream).

in all honesty the only thing I do not like about this camera is the small amount of pixel blur that happens in 4k. Other than that no qualms. Have an autistic some that does not enjoy his picture taken, This camera is small and durable enough to just slide in my pocket and catch his smiles on surprise. Already thinking of buying another!

Very well packaged, box was sturdy which I felt that it would be of good quality.  Very smooth and did not glitch at all.  Pictures that transferred to my phone well...unbelievable.  on its maiden trip I went on a rough bike trail and was quite stable.  Before I forget the instructions were very clear and easy to follow.  Mount attachments were plentiful, and it comes with two batteries.  I am 12 years old and I received this great gift for my birthday

Like other folks here, I had a really hard time getting the mount off of the water resistant case. I ended up using players to unscrew it, and ultimately did a bit of cosmetic damage to the mount.Otherwise, camera works great out of the box and comes with plenty of accessories! I will test it out on vacation this weekend and update when I’m back.

Listen, this is not a GoPro. BUT you're not paying for one either. This is great for what it is and does a great job at what it's designed for. I use it for my daughters dirt bike and I take out the SD card and use it for a webcam.One of the most impressive thing is the customer service. They are very responsive. There was a defect with the waterproof case and a replacement was shipped quickly and at no extra cost.

I bought this camera as a gift to my husband for his vlogging site as a motorcyclists. He loves this camera! He'd been searching for a new action camera and this one has a crisp, clean, clear image! We're going to take it scuba diving in 2 weeks... it'll be our first time using it under water. The only thing he doesn't like is the microphone is internal.

This is the second one i've purchased. I did buy a similar version by a different company and the picture quality was horrible. I sent that one back and got the OKASO as my second cam. Comes with a ton of accessories. They did forget my battery charger but the camera charges one battery at a time and that's ok with me. They also offered return but i opted for a partial refund because i wanted to keep the camera. I'm satisfied with both cameras for flying powered paragliding.

This is a great little webcam.  I bought it to use for a trip to Alaska this coming summer but it has so many more uses.  We have hunting dogs and it is so nice to strap it on them also and watch what they are seeing.  I also bought the accessory kit also sold on Amazon and it has everything in it you could possibly want...the head strap, the chest strap and the floater for watching fish bite your fishing line.

Like the extras and what the unit can do.....but the video is jumpy. I have tried changing the setting on video, converting it to mpg4, wmv, and still jumpy. I will update the rating as I deal with the company. I would not buy them if I new. I bought 2 units and tons of extras. Now may all be thrown awayUpdate....the video issue seems to be fixed. I reset the camera, formatted the memory card, and took it out. It is night atm, and the picture is horrible at night. Definitely not a night camera. But the choppy video seems to be fixed. I try again in the daylight and see. So I bumped it from 2 to 3 stars. Ill give another update tomorrow when I do the next test.

This camera is awesome.  We got it for my son who was turning eight.  The picture is so great.  I am really impressed with the crispness and color of it.  The sound is really quiet when you record.  That was a little bummer, but the picture and easiness of the camera makes up for it.  You have to look up the Owners Manual with the QR code that they put in the box.  It is pretty easy to use.  There were just a few things that we didn't know what to do when figuring out the set up but with some trial and error we have figured out almost everything.  I am really happy with this purchase and my son LOVES it.  And the price is really great too!

Fantastic little video camera! Impressed with how many useful accessories are included for free like an extra battery with charging dock that will charge both batteries at the same time! Once people find this camera I have a feeling they will be putting other brands to shame and eventually extinct!

As someone just starting to take action photography this camera has great quality video and photos.  I  didn't want to spend a lot, so when I saw the price point for this camera ordered it right away.  I want to capture the summer with my kids, and this is the camera for it.  The writs shutter button works great.  I am looking forward to taking it on the bike trails and kayak with my boys.I was also able to download the pictures and video to my computer, but I have not tried the app yet.

I purchased one of these for myself and another for my nephew during Christmas. I love the portability and I carry it on runs. I recommend it for hiking, running, cycling and other outdoor sports. It is great having a camera to quickly catch a bird on the water or a sunrise or sunset.

I bought this anticipating my upcoming trip to Tahiti hoping to take some amazing underwater pictures as one of my fellow sailors did with this camera on a recent trip. But unfortunately my Tahiti trip was a victim of the virus. So I mounted the camera on my bike and am  enjoying the videos I am coming up with on my bike adventures. I have been posting them on Facebook so my friends are enjoying them too. The only mishap was that the camera fell out of the holder on one of my trips but I learned that you have to be sure you snap it in firmly. The attachments are great and give you lots of options.

This camera is so amazing, and I only just received it. I can't wait to do more filming and test out the sharing abilities. Really awesome quality and easy to use. I love that it comes with two batteries, battery life is always such a huge issue when it comes to filming for long periods. Highly recommend this Go Pro!! So far, I have loved using this product.

Great camera !! I needed a underwater camera for my Mexico vacation. This camera was more than what I expected for the price. The underwater case it came with worked ! The pictures and videos came out very clear. I took it with me snorkeling, swimming and at the beach. Transferring pictures and videos to my Phone and tablet was easy! It also comes with 2 batteries which def came in handy.Here are some pictures I took while snorkeling.

I love this camera because it is super small and easy to fit in your pocket. We take it everywhere on vacation. It goes underwater and you can film yourself swimming or snorkeling. Great price and great quality. You can put it on your phone through the app and watch the videos.

Purchased the Akaso EK7000 4K Wifi for my kids to record outdoor activities (biking, kayaking, hiking, swimming and such this summer).  Really impressed with image quality and overall video performance.  For the price you can not beat it.  Easy to use and operate.  My kids love the wrist remote and all the attachments that came with it.  Would have given it a 5 star but my kids use Chromebooks and suggested apps do not run on it so file transfer is a bit of a mess for them since the WiFi does not work with it.  I have to either go to my phone or my laptop.  Of course you can always use the USB charging cord direct and that seems to work as well.  Overall the unit works great.

Tough to beat for $50. Overall great value. Performance is better than expected. I can see why it's such a popular model on Amazon. It's for my son to use on his outdoor adventures so this is a great starting point regardless. If he really gets into it perhaps we'll consider upgrading to more professional equipment. But as entry level, this is super.

I must admit that I was hesitant on buying this. I mean the price this camera is at and the fact that its a sport camera? Come on who wouldnt lol. But when you look at a gopro and this I would choose this. With it being a sport camera 'it will eventually end up broken with that being said this camera is just as sturdy as a gopro with the bonus of having better color and just all around better picture as well. If you're looking for a great camera at an affordable price buy this one. Im going to buy a couple more that way I have extra. If you've had a gopro keep all of your accessories like the mounts and stuff because this one is compatible with them.

So far so good haven't tested it under water yet. Kids seem to love it so far battery's don't last to long but nice you get 2 of them to switch out. Would be nice to get a printed instruction booklet for it but you can find it online. Seems to get a little warm but hopefully that won't be a problem when I test it out more I'll update my review 🙂

I purchased this back in March or early April to use whilst I am away this Autumn. Unfortunately, I didn't open it or play with it until I went away but so far I cannot see how anyone can rate this camera. I cannot get videos to record longer than a few seconds, if I manage to get them to record at all. Then once they automatically finish I have to switch off the camera to enable a new function or to start another video recording. If anyone can help me, I'd appreciate a solution. Currently annoyed I didn't just spend the money on a GoPro, but thought I had researched thoroughly.

So far it's a pretty good little camera. It has lots of different mounts so you can use it a bunch of different ways. So far I've only used it around the house but looking forward to using it on my kayak and for underwater photos on my next vacation! It was a little hard to figure out at first as it didn't come with anything but a quick start guide but once I was able to download the manual it was pretty easy to figure out.

I like how this action camera comes with extra mounts and remote control. The picture quality is very good. Tested some mounts and finally figured out how to mount it on a selfie stick. This will come in handy when we are in motion. Also the waterproof case can also be mounted on a selfie stick which is very cool. Highly recommended.

For how cheap it is, it does it’s job very well. I use it to capture my motorcycle rides. Video is high quality but the photos are not that great. Wouldn’t use it to make high quality youtube videos but nice for capturing videos for safety and insurance reasons. For some reason the video will stop recording after 25 minutes tho. I fixed it by changing the settings to have 10 min loops. Would recommend.

Bought this camera to video fishing in the Gulf of Mexico. The video quality is ok but the audio sucks. I didn't expect it to be all that great with the  waterproof case on but even when it is not in the housing it doesn't pick up audio very well. The wi-fi function works great as well as the remote that came with the camera. It's an ok camera if you don't care about the audio.

Purchased this camera as a low price option to using a Go-Pro. Currently have Go-Pro Hero-3, used primarily as a bike camera recording daily training rides. The GO-Pro batteries were losing charge and the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera looked like a good, inexpensive alternative. I've now used this camera for several weeks and like it very much. The batteries last twice as long as the GO-Pro batteries (using on continuous record), the view screen is clear, two batteries are nice, and the double battery charger is convenient. Additionally it fits into the GO-Pro mounts.A slight negative is the absence of front and back recording indicators, (there is only one on the top of the camera), and the signal beeps are too soft so we don't hear them while riding. Given the very favorable price these drawbacks are minor and I can easily recommend this camera.

My wife got this for me for Christmas instead of the GoPro I had on my list.  I have to admit, I had never heard of Akaso before this, but my wife did a great job with her research.  You CANNOT get a better camera for the price.  Set up was incredibly easy and the 4K UHD video capture is phenomenal.  I used it for the first time out on the ski hill and it was so so easy to operate.  There is an included wrist remote control, but I downloaded the EZ iCam app for my iPhone and found this to be a better option seeing as I could watch the playback right then and there after I was done recording.I would have been fine with just the camera for the price that was paid, but Akaso goes and throws all the accessories in when you buy the camera; extra battery included!  The battery along with the water proof case and array of mounts is a much appreciated value.

I purchased this for a ski trip that I just returned from. When the package first arrived, I plugged it in, waited for it to fully charge, and turned it on. It appeared to work. But then when it came time to use it on the slopes, I realize that the product DID NOT WORK AT ALL when it was not plugged directly into a power outlet, which obviously defeats the purpose of a 'Sports Action Camera.' I therefore missed out on a lot of good footage during my ski trip. I was pretty bummed about that. Take my advice. Just get a GoPro. It's worth the extra money and you'll be supporting a US company that doesn't just make cheap knock offs of other's innovations.

This is a cool little camera! Easy to use, easy to setup with instructions available online. Comes with accessories for mounting the camera on a helmet or bicycle handlebarsConnects to your sell phone via WiFi which makes it easy for viewing your videos/photos

Just got it today. So easy to work with. I love all the accessories it comes with! The remote made it easy to begin recording with it on my chest. The WiFi feature makes it easy to download videos. Thank you so much for all the accessories and easy management of the device!

My son just had to have a "Go Pro" for skiing and biking, but I wasn't willing to spend that amount of money on something like that. I found this one, read the reviews, and decided to buy this instead. My son loves this camera! I've watched the videos that he's made with this camera and I'm amazed at how clear and steady the camera is. The only thing that might make this better is possibly a better mic, the sound isn't as great as the picture. Overall, my son says, and I agree, this is an awesome camera.

This is a great little video camera. Takes pictures too. Use this while doing projects or doing some activity and it works great. comes with two batteries which is really nice as for long projects I usually have to replace the battery at least once. For long recording (greater than 1 hour) the gadget gets pretty hot but I haven't noticed that being an issue with the quality of image or video. It has a nice view so it gets a lot in the image. I've used this for 3 different video projects so far and am happy with the purchase.

Never had an action type cam before and didn't want to sink the $$ into a GoPro, yet. Does what it's supposed to do. Takes nice pictures, very decent video at 30P; I haven't tried 60P yet but will next week for my wife's charity bike ride and will report back. Plenty of doodads and gadgets come with it, and the extra battery is nice. Remote works perfectly.Not so perfect: the WiFi. Added the app [with it's 1-star rating on Apple AppStore], fired up the Wifi on the camera, connected on my 4S phone without a problem. Live view with a little lag, pretty cool. But hit record and what's going on? Is it recording? All functions on the app not responsive; couldn't stop recording. Couldn't shut off the camera - camera totally locked up. Had to remove the battery to get the camera restarted. Tried this 3 or 4 times with IOS devices near the camera. Did not try photo shooting, just video.

This product fit the bill perfectly for what I was looking to do.  I couldn't afford the more expensive options, so my expectations weren't too high, considering the price.  Having said that, the quality of the product would be worth it at twice the price.

The shipping was next day, no better than that! This is my first action camera purchase so when I opened up the box and saw all of the accessories I was stunned. The mounts for the camera are Very High Quality. I was able to navigate the menus following instructions. I do not have experience  with another brand to compare the camera quality so I gave 3 stars. I am happy about my purchase and recommend that you try this system.

I really enjoyed the ease of use and all of the extras that came with the product when I bought it! honestly I have not fully tested the waterproof feature but I intend to in the future. I use it to record videos for my bands and some content for my YouTube channel. I've even taken it for a few rides on my bike with a handlebar clamp and it works great! I honestly haven't had any issues, I have been using a friend of mines for a long time and it made me want to buy my own! Definitely affordable and definitely worth the price!

Picture quality might be fine, app is bad, audio is horrible! You can almost hear nothing that is 6 feet away. But why they have so many good reviews? Because they offer a accessory kit, including a memory card, if you write a review!

I’m no expert when it comes to sports action cameras, but I didn’t need to be. Right out of the package, it was easy for my wife to set up the camera and link it to her laptop. The picture quality is absolutely fantastic. The camera is a gift to my wife and she’s continuously excited about the activities she has already captured in video- swimming, and paddle boarding, and the activities she’s currently planning. She’s also excited about the possibilities of recording activities with her art students once school is back in session.

For the price you can’t beat it. I use it on my fpv quadcopters (sometimes I don’t like putting a 300 plus dollar GoPro on something I occasionally crash). Wish it had some image stabilization but what do u want for $50 bucks? 2.5k 60 frames is best for fpv footage imo. I designing a 3D printed case for my GEPRC KX5 Elegant In TPU.

records better contrast IMO than alot of the modern 4k cameras, it syncs with your phone to watch live feed (although it requires to sync with wifi instead of bluetooth. works great, ive gotten underwater basss fishing release videos with it, the microphone is pretty quiet and i recommend you just buy a good field recorder for video production.  any camera with a plastic case will end up getting scratched and can be used with a fine plastic polish to clean up the scratches. it also comes with a bunch of mounts and straps and a buckle looking clip i still havent figured out the different configurations

Camera takes fabulous pictures and comes with a ton of accessories and is far less than some name brand competitors.  We have found two flaws- the app is terrible (we hope they will work out those bugs), and the batter door is a poor quality and broke almost immediately even with gentle usage (camera is still functional. We have not yet tested how water proof it is.

so far the camera is working well. took a little time to get used to the menu and settings.  really like the app that lets you connect via wi-fi  from your phone so you can monitor the video and start and stop recording.  also the remote wrist strap control. i have recorded a few videos and photos and the images are good quality once viewed on my PC.  i bought a 64 GB card, but i believe it only recognizes 32 GB. the camera comes with a lot of very useful accessories and attachments. i plan on using the camera to record fishing trips and other outdoor adventures. will also try using it as a dash cam.

Honestly a lot better than expected. It is good for a camera that you need for risky shots where you are fine if the camera gets lost or damaged. Basically a burner camera lol. However it doesn't record 4K for me very well. Keeps crashing on 4K, even though I have a really fast Micro SD card. 1080p is perfectly fine and 2K.

I was going to buy a Go Pro, but then saw a comparison video on Youtube and decided to try Akaso instead.I'm glad I did! I'm a photographer, used to a quality produced by Canon L series lens, so I really did't expect much. For the price of this action camera, I was stunned how great the photos and videos look. I have zero complaints!

It's a basic 'action' camera but not great video quality as there is no image stabilization.  Only really any good for1080p @60fps. Sound quality is also pretty poor with wind noise a real problem at any speed.

I autocross on pavement and rallycross on dirt. Both noisy, shaky, and hard to video capture. This camera has great features not found on all models. I LOVE the "upside down" feature. I mount this camera upside down so I can see the lights and hit buttons as needed. But the Upside Down mode rights the picture and records it right side up. This means I down have anything to do in post-production. Saves me hours of frustrating editing with expensive software. Its just download straight to internet media so all can see in minutes. Wish it had Driving Mode though. It would turn on/off with ignition. I bought this one so not to hurt my prized V50 Elite. That's for hiking & climbing.

This camera broke within a month of purchase. It was never used in an extreme sport, but somehow an internal component came loose, so that as the camera is moved, the color of the image changes and sometimes a black line appears in the image. It looks like an internal filter fell off and now moves freely around inside.I've owned 2 other action cameras, but have never had a failure mode like this.

I am devastated! I just came back from my vacation and not one video or photo saved. I have used this camera before for previous vacations and it worked. I do not know what happened this time. Lesson learned only ever use my cell phone atleast I know that backs up on wifi to the cloud

This is an amazing camera especially for the price. I use this a lot for fishing and the battery life is pretty good. It also comes with an extra battery if needed.  The remote is also an added benefit because you can turn the camera on and off without touching the camera.  For me this is great because I fish from a kayak and accessing the camera can be cumbersome.  I guess the only downside is this doesn’t come with a SD card, but I needed additional cards anyway so it’s not that big of a deal.  Great camera, awesome picture quality, reasonable price! I would recommend this for anyone getting a camera for the first time. You can’t beat it!

I was wanting to buy a action camera for my son to use at the beach this year for vacation, but couldn't justify the gopro price. So I saw this camera and read the reviews and watched youtube videos on it and decided to give it a try. It was priced in a range I could afford. I have used a gropro before and knew the quality video it produced. The camera was ready to go out of the box minus a micro sd, I walked around outside the house and shot a test video. The led screen on the back makes it easy to see what you are filming. I came in hooked up the transfer cable  and was amazed at the quality of video this thing can record. Is it as good as a top of the line gopro? probably not, but for the price you cant go wrong with this camera.  So after the test run I tried the include remote out and it works great starting and stopping the recording from a distance. I tested the waterproof case without the camera in it first. It was good to go no leaks. The real test will be when we hit the beach in a few weeks, if anything happens I will update review.

This is a great sport cam for the price! I received it with a bunch of cool accessories for mount connections! The wireless remote that came with it had a mal function after a couple days; yet, they replaced it after a few days! They have good customer service, I also thank amazon prime to guide me through it! I definitely recommend this product if you are looking for a great sport HD camera for a affordable price!!
Pros:1. Works with Gopro adapters and mounts
I loved it! I gave it to my son and he says, "It's LIT!" He specifically likes the fact that it can take 4K video, great for filming him doing stupid stuff.

Awesome and really I love the AKASO camera. I bought the "AKASO EK7000 ULTRA HD 4K" camera, after a friend of mine recommended me. It excellent 4k video quality and easy setup.  The battery life is 60-80 minutes, pair batteries really full the purpose of my road biking on country roads and trails.  It records audio too.  Awesome camera for reasonable price and its compared GoPro, which is very expensive.  Few weeks back, I went to mountain trails and it capture nice video quality with no vibrations, nice image stabilization.  . Definitely I recommend my colleagues and friends.

Have had this camera since May.  My 11-year-old son love's it.  Take good pics and videos.Syncing did not work and crashed my computer each time I tried to use it- itmay have workedbetter with a phone app so I don't know-. But the camera is great and the amount of accessories it comes with are amazing.  You also cannot beat the quality you get for this price! Definitely worth getting before you break the bank on a g0-pro.

I am a virtual science teacher and I plan on using the camera to do experiments and take my kids on virtual field trips. I let my 11-year-old test drive for this and it was awesome. It works great with the head straps or with chest straps that you can buy separately as part of an accessory package.  It's so lightweight and tiny and it has a housing that is practically indestructible and waterproof. Love it!

I bought this for my 10 year old son as gift for our trip to Mexico. It definitely did not disappoint! Picture/sound/color quality all comparable to our GoPro. We were able to share attachments between the two devices as well.

I bought this camera for my daughter so she could use it at camp. Easy to use, very compact. My 10 year old was able to master the features within minutes and took great pictures and videos. The waterproof case made it worry free for us and for her since it rained quite a bit when she was at camp. We plan on using it underwater on our next vacation. The only thing that could have been better was that there was no user manual in the box. However, I was easily able to download it from their website so no real issue there. Would recommend this camera for anyone looking for an action camera at a cheap price.

I've used this for recording video while flying and am amazed at its performance and clarity. Crisp and smooth video, good battery life, robust camera - wish I'd bought it a long time ago!Can't go wrong with this one. I'll be buying more for more perspectives. :)

My parents got me this camera for my 12th birthday. I love this so much. the picture quality is very good. it comes with a ton of accessories like a bike mount and helmet mount, there are a ton more but those are the main ones. it comes with a waterproof and shatterproof case. It is also very light weight. This is a great product for the price.

Use this for my motorcycle. It does the job for cheap if you're looking for an action cam. 1 thing I would advise is to stock up on extra batteries. My daily commute is approximately 20 minutes and when I arrive, battery is near empty already. Maybe it's my settings(?) Not bad, just expecting a bit more.

I purchased this action camera with vacation, but before even going on vacation I am seeing the worth of this camera. Is the video quality as good as a GoPro? No, but for the price point and someone that is not a youtuber, its fantastic! Even just for taking pictures in the pool with the kids its great since I don't have to worry about it getting wet. I have just been playing around with it filming everything I can thing of. It also works for a web cam on the computer if you needed as well. I can't wait to go on vacations and capture memories with my girls hiking and horseback riding!

I haven't been able to take the camera out in the wild yet, but playing around with it in the house, it seems to be everything the descriptions said.  The only complaints that keep it from five-star so far, are the scanty instructions, even the downloaded PDF, and the lack of ability to download picture content directly to a PC via USB.  And although there are lots of attachments, need better instructions on how to use them.

This is a great camera.  We were in the market for a GoPro for our snowboarding trips and saw this deal yesterday and decided it was worth trying out for only $45.  It just arrived today and we are really happy we decided to order it.  The picture quality is great and it's super easy to use and it comes with a ton of accessories.  Haven't had the chance to test out the battery life but it comes with 2 batteries so no concerns there. You can't beat this value.

I do a lot of road & Mountain Biking along with kayaking. I use my phone camera a lot, though during MB riding its iffy.  This cam works great, getting more and more use to it.  have connected app to my phone, which I like. Will be taking a 335 mile MB trip this fall, and hope this works as good as it has been.  Only issue had I known more, I would have bought more attachments, like using this in my truck, chest harness for kayaking.. It did come with a handlebar mount for my bikes..  This is a great product for the money, as I was concern at first what the quality would be, though so far I am 100% satisfied..

I had been wanting an action camera for over a year. After our trip to Costa Rica I knew I should get one. I didn't want to invest tons of money on a GoPro incase I never used it. So I chose this Akaso camera. For the price is does its job, but I feel like all my photos are the wrong color. They almost seem more warm/reddish. For that reason I have not used it much. But maybe it will be a good camera for underwater. If anything my kids enjoy using it.

This product is amazing. It has great lighting And the waterproof casing kept it dry. 10/10 would recommend to a friend if I need a new go pro I will for sure buy this product again it's light so you won't get the tired out feeling you get from your phone. It's super cool to because you can use a remote to take a picture or start a video with it. Can't wait to film videos with it for YouTube it was a little too wet for it today.

Ordered back in May 2020 for a gift to my 8 year old grandson. After some getting use to it, he was off and running..skateboarding, in the pool hiking trails and on his bike. Make sure you buy a large Micro SD card. It will get used!!  Made it through the summer with no problems well built!  8 year old approved!

You are getting what you are paying for , 2 stars because 85$ is really cheap for what specifications say, but to be honest 4k looks like 720p, its a piece of cra* who do i want to lie, dont buy this unless you really dont care about how the pictures or videos are going to be, it lagged the first day for nothing it freezes for someone who has patience is good, definitly not for me, i bought it to save the money difference between the go pro 5, returned it the same day , i guess im paying 400$ for the go pro 5

Great little camera. Will be using it to film hunts. The 4k resolution is a bit lower FPS when watching it back than I'd like it to be but I find that 2.7k is a fantastic quality and playback. For the money you really can't beat it. The wrist remote is a very nice feature. I plan to do a lot videoing with this!

I love the price and all of the accessories that come with this perf camera. It has great quality videos and is reasonable.  The only problem is that 56 GB is the highest micro SD card that works well with this camera but they should be enough.Love it will but it as a gift and would get another one if I lost this one.

I bought this as a present for my son, who loves to do mountain biking, and he always wanted to capture his adventures on the bike. He got really excited, at first it was complicated to watch the videos until we figure it out that we need it to download it from the memory to the computer, so we bought an adapter to do it directly instead of two steps. Very recommendable, specially for teenagers who are a little clumsy with pricey stuff, and this camera is very sturdy. Pricewise it is very good for the quality you get. My nephew got the same one after watching my son's videos.

This camera and included hardware are a great way to get started making videos of your adventures. The various mounts provide many different options. Handlebars, helmet, tripod, clip to your jacket, pole, and underwater.Comes with a remote to take those drive by videos or stills.

Awesome camera to record our next vacation.I was looking for an excellent camera for this vacation, I checked the specifications on the Internet, I watched videos on YouTube to compare and see which one would be the best option, when I saw all the qualities of this camera I was convinced, I am a systems engineer and I can say that this Camera is amazing since it lends itself to the editing of photos and video in good quality.

I would give this a 5 star but I'm reviewing this product with the mindset of everyone buying this. Everything is awesome except the sound, the sound quality is so low and hard to hear in and out of the case. Now this product for me is  a 5 star because all I want is the video and pictures I create my own videos and always put music over my sound so this product is perfect for me. But if you're a YouTuber or want this for sound I would say stay this may not be the product for you.

For the money it really is a good deal. What I don’t like is the video Is .mov format. IF you are wanting to do any editing you will have to convert the file or find video editing software that recognizes the .mov format. It’s easy to use. Setup is pretty straight forward. I’d pick up an external mic or use something else to record sound. The battery life could be better but at least it comes with 2 batteries.

This is a great camera for the price.  We do atv riding and this camera works perfectly.  We have to other 2 other 4K HD mini cams and they are no where near the quality of this one.  Picture in the video is bright and clear.  No edge blurring at all when running at speed thru trails with brush and trees near the trail side.  Waterproof case is very tight, and brings peace of mind that the camera is safe.  Sound does pick up thru the waterproof case.  We have it mounted on a chin mount and it had no problem picking up the wearers voice.  I will be buying a second one for our next trip.  Its also a plus that it comes with a mini charger and has 2 batteries.  We are able to charge on the trail should we need to,  The batteries also seem to have a pretty long life.  Much better than the last camera I had.

Well for 50 dollars it good. Just not for Running or jogging or probably riding bike because the video ain't stable. But they do have software u can make stable more. But fishing I can't complaint. battery life isnt the best so it best u use battery bank.

First I have to start with I bought the wrong action camera, I meant to buy the one with image stabilization but by accident got the $20 chapter one with out it. Aside for the "meh" battery life (good thing they sent 2) and the fact that the native app kinda suck, not the best. I hope it can support multiple Cam. I like the video recording. I know it's not the best high end action camera but I love I can live stream, use it as dash cam, webcam. I definitely going to get the next model up so I can record on the trails.

I'm pleased with the camera overall and the image quality is good. I received new batteries from the seller and they are SO much better than the ones that came with the camera originally. I'm testing one now and I have been recording for 45 minutes and the battery indicator shows a half-full battery. I can now use my camera!

Build quality of the camera feels good.  Nice and ruberized texture, buttons feel nice and it looks good in black.  Picture quality at 1080/60 is smooth and impressive out of the box.  2.7k and 4k are a stretch for this little guy but it works...  Sometimes.And there's the catch. This camera crashes once just about every time you take it out on an adventure.  The app that goes with it crashes even more works about 65% of the time.  So there is the gamble, video quality, compatability w/gp, and price point are all really good!  But reliability is only 80-90% which in the action packed world that kinda sucks sometimes.

Was received earlier than promised, packaged to prevent damage.Bought this to use in the water primarily.  The camera, case work as expected.  The remote stopped as soon as wet.  After the wet vacation, I wanted to mount in the truck.  Can't seem to find the setting to keep the camera active longer than a few minutes.  I guess I could look in the book, but working through the limited buttons is tiresome.  There are a lot of attachments which is a bargain.

This camera was everything I was hoping for and so much more! It came with a ton of accessories! Comes with batteries. It does not include the micro sd card, so heads up when purchasing. It has everything you need to first get started besides that! Each battery lasts about 2hrs of straight recording. Over all extremely happy with my purchase and the quality of the product for what I paid.
This is the a great little camera! I have used it to make YouTube videos (Google XB42n5tfbRw or search it on YouTube for actual footage) and a time-lapse of my 3D (also purchased on Amazon

I've used my 2 new Akaso cameras for recording my band's concerts.  They have amazing quality and such a wide angle to capture everything going on.  With the upside down feature I'm able to hang one camera for a top view and it's really easy to do.  Although recording concerts was the main reason for my purchase, I've used these gems to record family gatherings, and now that we can't gather, my solo bike rides through the neighborhood.  Amazing cameras and at such a low price, I'll be using my EK7000 action cameras for many yeas to come.

This is the BEST Camera that I have found any where.  I have several of these cameras that I like to use while Fishing in Canada.  It is small and the easiest that I have found to use.  I take a lot of group shots while in Canada with my Fishing group.  I usually make a DVD of our trips and give everyone a copy. So is you are looking for a small, light weight waterproof camera you have found a great one here. I strongly recommend this Camera.

Excellent camera. I haven't used the remote yet so I can't speak to that but the camera works great. I've used it mostly for mountain biking and purchased an optional chest strap. Several accessories do come with the camera so depending on your intended use plan on getting on of the many GoPro compatible kits. Battery life isn't great (~60 mins per battery and you get 2) and the camera just turns off when the battery is about to die. There's no warning beep or light or anything like that. Documentation is also a little on the slim side. There's several pages in English that cover the features but not in depth. Not a huge issue as the interface is simple and easy to use once you play with it. I also have not tried out the 4K mode yet. Fort most action sports 1080p at 60 FPS is fine and for biking provides smooth video. Overall a solid camera, very affordable, and functions well. For the price you can't beat it!

So far so good,It takes great videos and proabably pictures as well, but my issue is im not able to download the pictures from the app for some reason, they all say complete but they arent on my phone.  Most likely its a user error and not the product.  I plan on taking it on vacation here soon and really testing it. I will update my review if anything changes

First action camera. Worth the money. Picture and video quality seems good. No complaints. 1/19/20- after purchasing I gave a review. Submitted the review (per request) to Akaso. Was sent an ungodly amount of accessories!!! Make sure to do this when purchasing. 👍🏻

First, let me just say I am a casual user and don't write reviews of products for a living.  If I like something / not like something, I will say so.I got the product and have been playing around with it most of the day.  The bought this for one purpose and that is for capturing videos of my flying  RC planes and helicopters. The stuff I read about making videos recommended no to shoot in 4k but to shoot 1080 at 60fps.  It makes editing easier. The iSMART DV app works on my  Acer tablet (4.4.2)  and phone (5.1).  No problems connecting to the camera and using it to preview the field of view.  I'm impressed with the quality of the videos and very happy with the purchase.  I'm sure there are better cameras out there, but I do have a budget to need to consider.

Takes amazing still shots at 60 fps while traveling at 55+ mph. Do not buy this if you are mounting it to anything that goes down the road. Instead spend a few dollars more and get the Brave 4 which is the upgrade to this model, which includes image stabilization. I can't report yet on how good that feature is on the other camera having bought it to replace this one. However, this one creates unwatchable video, at least mounted to a motorcycle. The image shudder is horrendous. You see some four different layers of the horizon jumbled together when playing back the video on the computer.  On this lower model the remote required the camera to be active for the two buttons to work. They do not turn the camera on. They don't stay lit as an indicator. On the back the lcd is nice, but to determine which mode is active, you have to look closely for the white camera icon to go red, when recording. When taking a snapshot, the screen flickers and resets to the camera, non recording mode. I used this flickering  indicator to know if the camera was recording, while looking through a tinted windshield where its mounted on the front of my bike.The upper model seems to have addressed some of these concerns, for the better. I'll have to review it once i get out on the bike and test it. There is yet another model that is even higher priced than the Brave 4, that one s You tuber claimed had real 4k and not digitally processed 4k like these two lower models, if that's a concern. I had no complaint with the still frame on this camera at speed, set to 60fps, even if it is not true 4k.

The picture and video clarity on this camera is great, the microphone is pretty low quality and low volume with volume adjustment from 1-3. I was hoping it would be louder but you could always purchase an external mic. The camera does what we need it to, my boys can mount it to their bikes, helmets, fishing rods, etc. It comes with multiple attachment mounts.  The settings buttons aren't real user friendly and takes some getting used to as far as toggling between options and viewing pictures or video on camera. Overall a decent cheap alternative to a Gopro.

We absolutely love this camera. It was an early Christmas gift for my husband so he could film all of our holiday happenings. So easy to use right out of the box and with not much experience using other types of video cameras and so many accessories that it comes with. The small size is great for traveling and the picture is amazing. It works with GoPro mounts which is a huge plus. We have two very active boys and this is easy to use on the go and be able to keep up with them. I like the feature of being able to download an app to control the camera and view the live video on my phone.

The camera is excellent, the materials are of good quality and comes well protected, also has all the necessary accessories for a lot of situations. The one that comes with two batteries makes it extremely profitable. In terms of its use, you connect it with your smartphone and you can see in real time what you are going to start capturing.

Just opened my package and am a bit overwhelmed with all the mount options. Everything appears to be well made and I am excited to use it on my vacation. I wish the manual went a bit more in depth and showed images of each mount in use so I know which one to use where. Not included in the manual are nylon clasping straps as well as Velcro straps. The zip ties and a cable fastener are shown in the manual but no description of how to use them. I am giving this a 4/5 star because everything (and more) arrived in the package but there is little instruction on where/how to use them.

I picked up this action cam for a youth hockey trip to Quebec in early 2020. I brought it everywhere we went, including: restaurants/bars, sledding/skiing, sightseeing, hockey rinks. I would bring a spare battery with me for the day, and most of the time I was fine with battery time. I noticed it seemed to drain faster when we were out on the mountain skiing/sledding, but I was also recording a lot of longer runs. I was able to easily pull the videos/images off after the trip and save them to my computer. I'm happy with the purchase and look forward to using more of the accessories in the summer months.

I bought this to use in Hawaii and downloaded the app. It only records when the app is open. I've had so many issues with it. I press record only to get back home and discover nothing recorded. I absolutely hate this device and the app is even worse.

We purchased this camera for our 8 year old for his birthday.  He wanted a go-pro but we figured a cheaper alternative would be best since he is a beginner and not necessarily responsible enough yet for the real-deal.  I was very pleased to see all of the great accessories that this camera came with, including mounts for his bike, helmet, etc. and the wrist remote.  We downloaded the icam app and he thinks it is really cool how he can see what he is recording by way of the iPad screen.  I like how we can easily download videos to his device wirelessly without having to remove the memory card or use my computer.  The only thing I am not 100% crazy about is the lack of a case that is NOT waterproof.  The nature of a waterproof case is that everything is completely enclosed and I feel like it causes the sound to be muffled.  However, we don't want him using the camera without any case to protect it and as far as I can tell, the cases available for this camera are all waterproof (unlike the go-pro, which don't look to be compatible due to the buttons and such being placed differently).  My son is over the moon for this camera and we plan to upgrade to a go pro after he proves himself responsible with this one for a while.

This is my first camera like this and it's great!! Good picture and video quality, focuses well and the case and gear that comes with it are in excellent condition. None of my order was scratched up or beaten. I'm not one to buy expensive things so if you're looking for a good on-you travel camera that won't cost a pretty penny then I recommend this one!! Also, I love that this camera comes with the wrist "watch". It's easy to use especially if you're not wanting to touch the camera, easy pic or video all on your wrist. The straps that came with it were crazy long but you can easily cut it off to whatever length you want. Also comes with a spare for it.

So far GREAT!.  I took pictures and video around the house to check and really like the quality.  For a little camera it does a very good job.  The fact that it comes all the accessories and two batteries is just icing on the cake.  I'll be taking this on vacation in a couple weeks and look forward to using it for video and wide angle landscape photos.  The remote control will work to capture pictures of me and the wife.  I can actually be in the picture instead of behind the camera.

For the price of this camera, it is better than I expected it to be. It comes with so many attachments you can use that I don’t even really know what some attachments are for. I didn’t need the attachments yet. I also like the size of the camera. It’s small and convenient for excursions.

I want to thank this company for standing by their product.  You reached out and made sure the customer was satisfied. I will be ordering more for family and friends and mentioning you to all my SXS riding crew. Product is great. Love the push video/photo button whiling at the dunes.Thank you.  Very happy customer!

We purchased this product because the price point was perfect. It comes with everything that you need and takes pretty awesome pictures. it is a great alternative to some of the more expensive models. I have yet to try out the waterproof feature but I am certainly looking forward to taking some really great videos with it.

After having this camera for a few months i need to say that it is not worth the money at all.  It is certainly not a replacement or alternative fir a go pro...and the remote is crap.  I say save your money and buy a better quality.  All the pieces that come with it are just a bunch of junk.

I love this camera. It has such great features as burst photo; it comes with two batteries; the instructions are clear and in English; the remote is great for easy, quick operation and the app for cell is great to control it also.It has a 2" inch rear display. And the 4k on top of all. My only concern is will it allow for an external microphone. At this point, I do not know.

Outstanding for the price and fun. As in any action camera, trial and error is needed. The app didn't work at first, but the maker emailed a link to another app that is amazing. The app is awesome to put on my bike as I ride to see the video being recorded as the camera sits on top of my bike helmet. Turning the video on and off while I ride is much needed and works great. Very happy with this product and I'll probably buy another one at this price.

Our teenage son loves to run, trail bike, play Frisbee golf and all kinds of other outdoor sports. He wanted a "helmet cam" type product to make little movies of his adventures. I was worried about spending hundreds of dollars on a product he's very likely to lose at some point. He has a habit of misplacing things. This was a perfect compromise and reasonably priced enough that if he does lose it, he can afford to replace it himself!

Sturdy, quality video and clear photos,light weight !!! Perfect for the price. Work great for my trip even I have no chance to take picture underwater yet.Pros: good price but performance, smartphone app works right on iOS , Allowed shoot still pics, burst photo and timelapse ( that what I need).

Getting the instructions was not easy as we had to get them online and they were not compatible with every phone. Setting up the products took two people. We’re still not sure of the whole thing works as it’s complicated to use but it seems decent

This is an awesome camera.  And, you can't beat the price.  Also, it came with two batteries and lots of mounts and straps.  I just got it for fun, and the quality of pictures and videos for me has been perfect.  Works great underwater.  I also mounted it near my hummingbird feeder and got great video and stills.  Very glad that I made this purchase.

This camera is amazing for the price. Go Pro is 500 alone and that doesn't even include accessories. The quality is amazing and we are super excited for using it on our upcoming vacation. This will allow us to capture all of our important memories. The attachments we purchased separately are for every single activity I could think of. I'm excited for all of our upcoming memories that we can now put in our photo album. We will use this and cherish all of our memories!

I was skeptical of how good the quality would be with this camera but I didn't want to spend the money on the GP brand. It's going on my motorcycle after all. I'd be a bit disappointing if it fell off or got hit by a rock/bird or who knows what else.To my amazement the video quality is great at 1080P which is all I need. The audio is a bit muffled but that's with the waterproof case on. As far as underwater performance goes, I couldn't be happier with that also. I took the camera to a water park and my kids loved filming themselves going down the slides and attaching to their snorkeling masks which have a mount. Truly waterproof!The software works great on my Galaxy S7, all of the different accessories serve their purpose and the remote is a nice addition.

Camera freezes 3 seconds into recording 4k video and never recovers without holding the power button or removing the battery to force shutdown.  The image quality is horrific (and for this price I didn't expect it to be very good).  I really don't understand how this got positive reviews.  There is a lot of horizontal tearing in videos when panning or watching fast-moving objects.  The app and wifi functionality also seem to crash a lot.This is one of the really rare cases where I buy a well-reviewed item on Amazon and it turns out to be trash.  oh well

I use this for autocross--- so it is in an "interesting" environment and I was looking at others, including GoPro, but I just can't seem to justify the price. So with it showing up in an Amazon search for action cams, I added to my list and had to think about it. That lasted a few days and I ordered one. It came nicely packaged and so on...had one snafu with the case in which Akaso promptly shipped me out a new one and I had it in a couple of days...nice and responsive...thank you!Performance wise, I first tried the 4k setting and the frame rate is too slow for me, so I went for 1080p which looks great at 60fps, the video feed is smooth. The sound is muffled as I used the waterproof case but considering it was in a sealed case--- it sounded pretty good. The remote works well and overall I am very pleased with the camera. The only thing I wish it did was have the red light on the face of it versus the top... would be easier for me to see it when I use the remote to start and stop it--- and with that the light is slow to blink/ respond on the camera to my remote control inputs....but...for the price and how it has worked for me--- it is something I will adjust to without issue.

Wow what a disappointment! This camera, while maybe has the pixel quantities to be 4k or 1080p, does not have the lens or ISP quality to produce images anywhere near that resolution.  I would say maybe 720p is the photo and video quality you're getting.Product was received with a cracked housing, and the lens got foggy after use in scuba diving. The remote is utterly useless and doesn't work- rather it got in the way rather than helping.  Returned product and going to buy a GoPro instead. Don't waste your time unless you want a 720p camera.

This is great camera for the price and the remote just tops It Off this one is way better than all the others I seen I had a little trouble at first with the interface and at first thought that the case front lens was damaged once I contacted them after the follow up email they sent me a swift response telling me to just remove the protective film over the lens that I didn't even notice was there thank God it was. while giving me awesome instructions on how to work the interface for a certain function I really needed. Overall I am super happy with this purchase you can't beat the price and the quality is way better than expected the remote control just tops It Off even though you can use the Wi-Fi option and use your phone as a controller also but the app could still use a little work on certain versions of Android the customer service was great and willing to fix the problem instantly with no questions about who was in the wrong which is very rare these days. The 4 k was amazing as the 1080 wide lense I mostly got this to record some of my first music videos for my band and was not disappointed!

I was looking to own a high end action camera like those go-pro kinds. So I thought lets get used to these by starting low. I got a deal on "AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera" which was very reasonable. I read few reviews and bought and was not expecting much.  The package arrived nicely packed.I was totally surprised by the output this camera produces. I compared it with one of my friends high end action camera and we didn't find differences.

I started snowboarding this year and needed a camera to review my riding skills. Go Pro is too expensive and I didn't want to loose it since I fall pretty often. This camera is a great substitute. The price is perfect for the quality of video and sound. Although the color is not as vibrant as I wish for it to be. It comes with a lot of different stands to use during different activities. I love to travel as well, so I think it will be very useful and easy to carry around with me. Overall, this is a great buy for the price.
This isn’t a bogus review, this one is legit.I bought this camera to record my son’s baseball games so that we can make baseball videos for college.

I just received my EK7000 and I really like it. For everything you get as well as the quality of the camera, it is very much worth the cheap price point. I didn't want to spend a ton of money on an action camera because I would be using it in harsh environments where there is a lot of dust, noise, static electricity, etc. The camera is working great. The only problem I've had with it is that I cant sync it with my iPhone 6. Other than that, great camera, great price.

I've just started using this camera as a replacement for my older GoPro cameras.  I love the amount of accessory mounts that come included in the package.  The image quality is excellent and rivals the much more expensive GoPro's.  Having a second battery standard with the camera is a plus.  It is super easy to setup and use.  my favorite feature is the remote control that allows you to take pictures and video from the press of a button. I will probably buy one or two more shortly.

I just received this camera and tried it out with our dog on the hiking trails.  It is a great value for the price.  The image is crystal clear and the sound is really good.  There is a little bumpiness, but I was running after our dog and holding the camera by hand.  I hope it will be better stabilized once it is locked into place with headgear or on abike.  The camera is easy to figure out how to work, just a few simple buttons.  The wrist remote is super convenient.  Its small and fits nicely into a small bag.This is a great action camera for the active person who wants video and pictures on the go!

This is my first action cam and am not upset with my purchase.  At this price point you get several attachments and can pretty much mount it anywhere you would like.  It has 2 batteries and each last around 90 or so minutes for me.  I like filming in the 1080p 60fps or 30fps the best.  Another nice feature is this has a remote to start and stop video or to take pictures with.If you are looking for a camera that will stabilize this is not the model to go with there is no stabilization and probably my only regret.  If you have a gimbal or purchase one would be perfect setup.

This was a gift for my grandson. He is enjoying it but the down button on the side of the camera is stuck. Working with manufacturer on this. According to claim it should be covered.  That’s only reason for three stars.  Great price compared to go pro with same functions.

I was looking at the usual competition and I am SO glad I tried this one out first. The transition using the remote is amazing - just a quick click switches you from video to camera and back, no futzing around on the actual camera avoiding need to adjust angles, or fat thumbs in your image :p  The fish-eye lens covers also a great span of scenery as you can see, without too much curve, just a cool enough effect. Go Get It!

It is wonderful if you are going on vacation because it is very small and it is waterproof. We found a lot of wonderful videos underwater and above it. My only drape comes with the picture quality is good but not great, video quality is very good though. I would definitely recommend if you don’t want to spend a lot of money but you want something that will get the job done for cheap

I bought this camera for my wife and I to take on our Honeymoon to Hawaii. I didn’t want to spend a ton of money on a GoPro so judging by the amount of positive reviews, and good price, I went with this camera. We were very impressed with the video quality, and while the still images are not the highest quality, overall for a $43 camera I cannot complain at all. I shot in 1080P the entire time and had great video quality. The only complaint I do have, is that the time stamp resets to 2018 every time you change the battery, so I just turned it off.

i was looking for something to use on my motorcycle when I take my trips.  I didn't want to spend the $$ for a go pro, I'm not that savvy, or plan on using it THAT much to invest too much into it.  I played with it the first day and it's cool!!  granted, I had to watch a you tube to figure out some of the things (again, not tech savvy).  I'm waiting on an accessory kit that I ordered also so that I can just harness it to myself.  I'm not too keen on attaching it to my helmet as of yet, but who knows, maybe in time I will be!  I used it this weekend when I went for a ride and other than I need to mount it to a better location, it was awesome.  we also have horses, so it will be neat for trail rides as well.  and, I always wonder where the dogs go - now, I just may find out!!  for the cost, I don't think it can be beat.  I'm very pleased with it!

Got this for my daughter for our mountain bike ride. She really liked the remote to start and stop the video recording. Installation and set up was easy as there plenty of videos on YouTube for the same. We found it to be really amazing for the price.

My husband wanted a Go Pro but I know he abuses his equipment, plus I thought it would be smart to test drive a less expensive product before investing in something like that.  He's very happy with the camera so we won't be getting a Go Pro anytime soon!

I bought 2 units Akaso EK 7000 and I like love it so much.. the Wi-Fi connection on my phone and the remote control are absolutely flawless. for the price you can't go wrong the best deal so far. It comes with a LCD screen at the back of the camera... and tons of accessories that you would normally buy separate don't forget to batteries included.. The list could go on and on I would recommend this to anyone who has limited budget but want a great performance..

Got this for our son for Xmas present, as its less than the GoPro. It has surprisingly good video quality, streaming from laptop over HDMI to 65in tv.  The sound isnt there but thats fine. it doesnt have the full fisheye view of a GoPro, but it does have a good field of view. overall its a good camera...for a 9yo.  I may borrow it for my own purposes eventually, or buy one (or 2) for myself.

Bought this camera New came through Amazon, upon receiving camera had scratches on camera case right where the lens was as well as the display screen of the camera itself. I wasn't going to even return the camera even with the used condition it was in until the same day I opened it the display screen started to glitch and camera would freeze up had to pull battery and restart to get working again. I want to get another cause they do seem like good camera for price but no garuntee this won't happen again.

My son "borrowed" my Go-Pro Hero III and I never saw it again.  When I went to replace it, I found this AKASOEK 7000 on Amazon.  It's a great camera and is just as good as or better than my old Go-Pro.  For my needs, it's  everything the Go-Pro was and much more when you look at all the accessories included in the package that arrived from Amazon.  I added up all the similar accessories & camera from Go-Pro  and they came to almost  7 times more cost than what I got in the AKASO EK 7000 kit.  Dollar for Dollar ---the AKASO EK 7000  camera package from Amazon  is well worth what I had to pay for it.

I've been very happy with this product. It's as close as you could possibly get to a GoPro Hero, without buying a GoPro price. It should be noted that the higher resolution you record at, you lose out on framerate. 4K resolution goes down to 24fps or so.I still like it with that compromise, and I believe there's a similar problem on a GoPro.

For the price point, it’s a great camera. Used it while scuba diving multiple times (60ft depth), cliff jumping, snorkeling and shark cage diving in South Africa. Results were always satisfactory, very close to that of a GoPro for a fraction of the cost.

Unit worked great! I have never owned a GoPro unit before, and I'm sure that the GoPro may have better resolution, but for the price and what I got from this unit on vacation, I am thoroughly impressed and happy about my purchase. Videos came out great at 1080p, and pictures were awesome at 12mp. Underwater footage was awesome and took some great pics and videos there too. At a third of the cost of other brands, I would definitely buy this again.I did buy some additional accessorizes for my trip like a bobber and mount for the car. Great value and great product!

This was a good camera to record riding on my motorcycle. It did great for one trip until the adhesive came off and blew the camera away. It was strong enough to stick to my helmet but not to the mount apparently. I also broke one of the clips when disconnecting it.

Good little camera for the price.  I mean little it is so small its great.  Very light.  Waterproof case is great.  I bought it for my son who is going on a cruise.  It is easy to use and at that price I won't be as upset when he breaks or loses it on his trip.  It came with tons of accessories.  Wish it came with a micro as card also though as it does not.  So far the quality is fine.  I dont have another camera of this type to compare it with.  Works great for what I needed.

We bought this camera for out trip to Playa Del Carmen ,MX. To tell you the truth we purchased it from both the reviews and price and it was well worth the cost. Unfortunately we didnt use it as often as we would have liked, not because of quality, but because I forgot to take it out on occasions, it worked very well. We used it in the rivers of Xcaret and at the beach. It holds up extremely well while being submerged. The picture quality didnt drop at all. I really liked the fact that it comes with a wristband that you can use to take pics. So if youre looking for a good but price worthy camera this is the one for you.

Amazing product for the broke guy trying to go pro! I have always wanted to get amazing shots riding the motorcycle right down to scuba diving but could not afford to.....GoPro. This whole setup not only gives me the ability of amazing videos/pictures but knowing I have to gear now to share my experiences with family and friends is so worth the money.The only problem I have now is I got all this gear for my Akaso camera and have no idea how to use it all!

I've been a loyal GoPro customer in the past, but seeing as their quality has gone down after the Hero 4, I've been trying out more affordable action cameras. I purchased this one specifically for videos on my fishing kayak and out of the box it seems great for the price and came with a lot of accessories that will help me get all of the shots that I need.
I wish there was a little more image stabilization as my video was a bit shaky riding my longboard.Other than that, I can't wait to explore more areas and videotape some more extreme.

I bought this for my 7 year old grand daughter who loves making videos. It was easy for her to figure out. She doesn't like that there's no sound when she plays s video back, but had no problems with removing the memory card and playing it in her tablet. She got great videos underwater and loves her camera!
