Love this camera!!!!! Video recorded two trips, one to Blue Ridge Georgia and one to Gatlinberg Tennessee. No problems, video looks great and the camera is compact to take along anywhere. Battery life is very good!  I highly recommend this.

great little camera, works as well as they say.  takes great pictures and great movies.  The only down fall that I have with it is that every time you turn the default setting is move where I would rather have picture.  Alos hard to see what the ready out for the settings are when you are out in the sun
Update 2..  camera is officially dead...Stopped working completely... what a piece of junk....
A month ago, I bought this action camera.At first I doubted the quality due to the low price.

I got this camera to record my home/work commute on my bicycle. The picture quality is very good and the camera itself is easy to use and has tons of features. The camera itself is attached to the handle bars of my bike using the mounts that came with the camera. I use the remote control on my wrist to star/stop the video. Also, since it brings 2 batteries plus charger, I can always carry a charged battery with me in case a need it.Overall, and comparing it to the more expensive cameras that are around 7x more expensive, I'd say this was a very good purchase.

This is an amazing compact sports camera right up there with the overpriced GO Pro.  I love all the accessories that come with this camera as well of the fact that it has a water proof case that is good up tho 100 ft.  the WI-fi enabled feature is great as well.  I bought this camera to go with my Akaso v50 and in all honesty i think it stands up right next to it.  The only big difference I can find between the two is the v50 has a touch screen and the ek7000 dose not.Love this little camera so far!

has all the features of a couple generation old Name Brand model but for this price its outstanding.  Used it for some racing and the remote works great, just have to figure out a way to tell if its on or off from a distance.  well worth the cost if you need an action cam

Just received the camera today. I had a chance to test it out and the picture quality is good. Video quality is pretty good if you have good lighting. There's many accessories and it appears to be pretty good quality made. Overall it's a great value for the money and so far like I said picture qualities pretty good

This camera is great. I was a little hesitant to buy because they say you get what you pay for but this purchase proved that wrong. I bought this for our trip to Mexico knowing I was going to visit the Mayan ruins and also snorkel. The underwater quality was great and the hike through the ruins didn’t record all bouncy. I am very pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone.

I love my AKASCO EK7000 camera, however there is a glitch I have discovered.  When the camera is in the waterproof case it will not record live sound or voice.  If you want to record live sound or voice you must take it out of the waterproof case.  If you want it in a case and still be able to attach it to the various mounts they give you you have to put the camera in the open framed case.  While in this case all of the buttons on the camera are accessible, but the on button will not work.  You have to remove the battery and reinsert it every time you want to turn the camera back on.

Video decent for price point. Difficult to verify when recording mounted outside of vehicle because remote has no indicator light.Product rattles violently in provided clear plastic weatherproof clear case, distorts sound production.

I bought this to document my motorcycle rides and as a safety measure if I am ever in an accident. It brings a lot of peace of mind as a rider. The image quality is outstanding for such an inexpensive camera. It is a great way to start as a newbie in the action camera world to determine if you will use it enough to upgrade one day. Although, with how well it's working for me, I may not ever need to upgrade.

This is a very nice little camera for such an affordable price.  I bought it to take on my next cruise and I can't wait to take it snorkeling in the Caribbean.  After spending money on the cruise, it's great to not have to spend $300-$500 on a go pro.

Is this camera flawless? No, but the features it has for the price are outrageous. I got this mostly for my kids to make videos with while they ride waves, snowboard and really whatever else. It comes with 2 batteries which is good enough for the price, but then there are also other accessories in the box. I also purchased an optional accessory kit that came with a case. In total with a memory card it was 1/3 or less than the cost of the famous brand's camera alone.  So far it has stood up to drops, waves & sand and I expect it will last a whole lot longer than one night out for dinner, which is about what it costs to purchase.

Very happy with my purchase, great buy for the price. I do wish the instruction guide was a bit more in-depth as this is my first action camera. But I am very satisfied with the camera itself, would recommend. A lot of cool mounts and two batteries are included which is a plus as well as the remote to take pictures and videos.

I got this for a helmet cam for riding my motorcycle. It DOES NOT come with a clamp style for a motorcycle helmet. Instead it comes with an adhesive sticky pad attachment.  I stuck it to my helmet and less then an hour later the adhesive came off.Also, the app will not connect to the camera. I've tried several times with no success. According to reviews of the app in the Google Play store others have the same issue.

The camera works great but I had a hard time trimming and saving the videos after I used the camera. It took me a little bit of digging to realize the .MOV files it creates are for Apple products which I don't have. I downloaded an app to my android phone that will convert them to a different file. (The app I downloaded is called YouCut) One I figured out how to actually get my videos off the sd card I was happy!

I was very skeptical before buying this item due to the significantly lower price as compared to the GoPro models. I did tons of research and watched every review video I could find. I thought to myself: "Surely this Asako camera can't compare to a GoPro camera that is 4x the price." Boy was I wrong.I tested the camera and I was extremely surprised with the quality. Super clear, easy to use, and very cheap. Most of the negative reviews I have seen are just being nit-picky about little things that don't matter much. I highly recommend this camera!

Hello all. I highly recommend getting this camera.. I was searching for a GoPro but didn't REALLY want to buy a used one, and a new one is very expensive. To be honest, this camera is definitely worth it. I use it for recording myself at the drag strip and on my bike in the twisties. Great camera, even comes with a wristband that allows you to pause and continue videos. Very useful. Plus the screen on it is awesome, but I just use my phone mounted on my handlebars to check what the camera is seeing to get the right angle using their App.

I have owned a Go Pro 3 which sold along with my last motorcycle. I now have a new bike and saw the reviews and favorable price point of the Akaso. I find it totally comparable to the Go Pro and IMHO, far easier to use while riding with less settings to be concerned with.

I frequently lose or break action cameras, so I try to get less expensive models to soften the blow. I found this nifty camera after I accidentally damaged my last go pro. I couldn't be happier! The price is fantastic and I actually prefer this camera to the GoPro. The photo quality is great and the battery life seems excellent. Even better - they include TWO batteries in the base bundle.  I also think the wifi connection and link is more stable than what the GoPro offers.Overall - very happy!

Works great.Easy to use.Excellent video quality.I put it on my hat.Blacked out the name with a sharpie for stealth,HA!  Comes with a remote too and a bunch of good accessories...You will need a micro SD card class 10.Price a Go-Pro and look at the difference...

I have used it for 2 bike rides and used softly as well but the upward button is not functioning now. I have brought it from my cousin from New Jersey when he was there. now I am not getting how to resolve the problem. and the batteries are not durable at least 3 hours even charged fully.

You get what you paid for. Cheap junk camera, low quality video is dark, image stabilization is poor if any at all. The water resistant case was filled with water after few minutes underwater and I've never dove more then 2 yards deep.  Remote control is cumbersome, with just two buttons on it - you never know when the camera is actually on. It leaked water at the first use and is all rusted inside. Please save your $$, look somewhere else for a small camera.

It is such good quality for the price! Wanted it to make a little montage while at the lake and it was perfect. Easy enough to use when switching from video to picture and the phone app the camera wirelessly connects to is also extremely helpful and amazing.

I was really excited for this camera... we purchased for our upcoming vacation and figured we had a bit of time to learn. After 10 minutes of its arrival and a little bit of footage I realized the video quality was really really poor and grainy.... returned in a heartbeat.. I paid $43 so I understand I’m not getting gopro quality but I think I’m just going to spend the money and buy something I trust.
This item takes awesome videos and comes with tons of attachments for just about any application.Takes surprisingly good audio as well as video.

This is my first action/sports camera.  Price was great.  Came as expected with all accessories listed in ad.  Batteries charged up.  Not much for instruction provided with the camera but gives a web site for better instructions and app information for WIFI connection to smart phone.  Didn’t have any trouble starting and taking basic photos or videos and they looked great.  Remote worked well too.  Did the WIFI connection as instructed, no problems, and works well with my Samsung smart phone.  I’ve only used a couple of times but all has worked as expected.  My son has a $200 plus GoPro and he said the pictures look equal. Look forward to using it a lot this summer.

For reference, I was comparing this camera to another similar priced action cam. The image quality on this EK7000 was far better, even at just 1080p settings. The color and contrast was superior, in tough theatrical lighting conditions. However, it has much less configurability than the other - no ability to set picture settings the way other cameras can. The menu is shorter and simpler. The audio was also much more muffled sounding.Overall, it was great image quality, poor sound quality, and since I have other sound recording gear, I'll probably get a couple more of these thanks to the great video in dark, spotlighted conditions.

Never had an action camera before did everything with my iPhone but on my last trip to the BVI I noticed people using their go pros underwater. I promised myself I would have one before my next trip the following year. Had a little bit of sticker shock until I found The AKASO EK7000 I wasn’t familiar with the brand but for the price I figured what the heck give it a try I also purchased the waterproof case for some deeper diving. Got to say I love the no fear of losing my phone in the ocean took lots of underwater photos and videos. I highly recommend it.

This may be one of the best deals I have ever seen.  I was just expecting the camera with a battery charger.  Not only does it come with a water proof case but virtually every attachment you will ever need.  I ride motorcycles and this will attach to my helmet without any problem.  Without a doubt this is the best deal you will ever find on a 4K camera. If you are looking to buy a sport camera, this is the one to get.

When first buying this camera I was a little skeptical on the price. I did not believe you could get 2k resolution on a $50 camera. Until it proved me wrong! The camera quality was stunning and very clear. The rechargeable batteries (which are included) charged up quickly. Also, the extensions included in the package made it simple to mount the camera anywhere I needed to. Overall, I recommend this product to anyone!

Bought this for a trip to Maui to use for some snorkeling, and general video shooting. I have to say that it did a great job. it has a mobile app that allows for connection and download onto my iphone. Also the video was pretty good underwater. I also bought the accessory set that included a float handle that I kept on it for almost the whole trip.

I wasn't crazy about spending a couple of hundred dollars on a Go Pro camera so I purchased the EK7000 for a fraction of the cost.  The camera takes beautiful video as well as pictures and the sound is pretty good.  What I like is that it ships with just about every type of mount that you would need.The water proof enclosure is very nice and works as expected.  Anyone looking to purchase a Go Pro should purchase this instead and save yourself some money.

I've wanted a GoPro for a long time but they're out of my price range. I'd seen good reviews for this product and decided to try it first. So far it has been easy to use. The picture quality of video and photos are not high end, but so far I have not had anything come out poorly enough that I feel the camera wasn't worth it at this price point. I've enjoyed that there is a screen flipping option so I don't have to fight with the way I hold the camera as well. I haven't experimented with it underwater yet, but I intend to test the case a few times before filming under water as it can be finicky to get to seat fully. I would say it is a solid buy if you want to start making videos before committing to something pricier, or if you just want a cheap camera that you don't have to stress over.Pros:

This camera does make great videos, and is probably a nice alternative to a much more expensive GoPro.  It does come with lots of accessories.  The WiFi feature is nice, but just to be clear it's a way to view the video your camera is taking, on your iPhone.  It's not for transferring data.  The firmware, is very buggy, which is why I'm giving it 3 stars.  A frustrating example: the camera will not put the correct date/time on the video file!  This is pretty important to me since I use Google Photo, which sorts by date.  Fix the firmware, Akaso, and I'll gladly update my review to a 5 start review.

I really like this little camera.  Ive been using it for a bit and it has exceeded my expectations.  I take it on fishing trips with me and it has survived well.  Also can be used as a web cam.  I am very happy with it.  Should be aware that if it is in the waterproof case, the audio recording is greatly diminished.

This is a terrific camera. Picture quality is perfect, accessories fit perfectly, easy-to-use, easy setup. But two thumbs down for the ez icam download link. Scanned the box and downloaded easily, worked great for two days and an update download made it stop working. Reviews show everyone in the same boat, no phone access! So, unless you have a laptop or PC to connect to via USB, you are not going to be able to review or share online. Hoping they fix this problem. Again, camera itself is terrific!

I purchased this for an upcoming snorkeling trip next week. I've never owned any action camera so for someone with zero experience its confusing to open the box with so many unlabeled parts. The only attachment I need is a wrist strap so I dont have to hold it while swimming and it doesnt come with that. A little cheat sheet to show what's what would be helpful. I'm never going to use those pieces if I have no idea what they are. I'll provide an updated review once I've used it underwater.Update: videos and pics came out great underwater. Easy to use. Better than I expected for the price.
Customer service followed through by replacing the camera for me and all is well now.  Very happy with the follow-up and product is working great!Original Review:

I am impressed with this little action camera. I bought it as  complement to another brand name camera I have (for different angle shots. The picture quality is comparable with my more expensive device on the same settings. The major difference is the stabilization, which I already knew this camera did not have before my purchase.  I have tried for only one day, but overall I am very satisfied with the cost-benefit relation of this product.

We purchased this camera for our preteen son. It is his first underwater camera.The camera is small and light. It took me a little time to get used to hold it without touching the lens. It has wide screen, stable image. We wish it had zoom function, but that is available in pro. My son is a great swimmer, he took some amazing underwater photos with camera. He will be taking scuba lesson next month. He can’t wait to bring it to the open water scuba!

If you are looking for a cheap alternative to the GoPro. The AKASO EK7000 4K is the way to go. The camera it’s self takes some decent pictures for being a cheap camera. But right out of the box the water proof case it came with broke. The plastic that is attached to the clip and the part where the clip locks down broke. The adhesive on the sticker mounts came off right away as well, almost lost the camera in the river if it wasn’t for my cat like speed and reflexes!

I bought this camera for my son to film his snowboarding runs. Since he was 10 at the time, I didn't want to spend a ton of money on a camera that he would potentially misplace or be otherwise careless with. I had read other reviews of this camera and made the purchase based on those. This is truly an impressive value. Not only was it a simple camera to operate, the image quality is solid, it comes with every attachment you could think of, and the remote control was really handy when attached to the top of my son's helmet. I highly recommend this product!

Don't waste your money on the name brand, this works amazing, worth the money! My husband went onto youtube to see what he could do and found out it can connect to his phone via the phone app. You can view the images from the app. The pictures it takes are very clear and it works under water. If your hesitant youtube the product and you won't be mad you bought this.

Great for the money, that is if you don't want to have high quality video. It was rated very high on amazon, so I assumed the quality was going to be great. The video quality is worse that the original Go Pro. You get what you pay for. I'll still use it as a 5th camera when I need multiple angles, but it will never be a primary camera. I will be sticking to Go Pro.

I was impressed by what all was included in the box. Also it was easy to use and find instructions for the things I didn't know how to do. The camera functions well, I like the WiFi option, the software on my phone crashed a few times, but mostly when I tried to do more than one thing without waiting for the first thing to finish. Great product for the price, I am excited to get to try it on my vacation.

Great product! It works well and the mounts are nice. My husband really likes it for off-roading. This was a great value! The only downfall was the lack of instructions, but there are YouTube videos available that helped explain exactly how to use it and what attachment did what.

Not sure if its the programming I am uploading the video with (final cut pro and I movie) but the picture is pixilated pretty bad. Uploaded as 1080p. Uploads perfect from my sony a6000. But this camera is 720 at best with proper lighting. At night its almost useless. Still giving it and overall 3 stars because its a good price. Recommend if you need one on a budget.

My husband and I both own a Jeep and go out most weekends on 4X4 adventures through mud, dirt and ponds. I bought this for him for his birthday as he loves to record our adventures and using our phones made it hard to enjoy the experiences. This product has an amazingly wide picture angle and the picture and video quality is top notch. We also love that a computer is not needed to be able to access the pictures or videos off the SIM card as everything is available on the app that you download on to your phone or tablet. I will be investing in one for my Jeep shortly. Thank you for such an amazing product.

So excited for this Akaso action camera!! I can’t wait to take it out when I kayak and video record in the car too! The shipment came right away and customer service for the camera wrote me back same day! I will write another review after taking the action camera to the indoor pool! So happy about this purchase!

The picture is of a farmers market stand, looks pretty great. I just bought this action camera and after 2 days of experimenting with it I am very very impressed. For the price of 60$ you get a lot of bang for your buck. It comes with lots of cool mounts and I've already tested out one of them on my bike. It worked great and the video was fairly stable and recorded all the sounds, including my squeaky brakes. This camera is definitely worth the buy and I'm excited to put it to the real test this year in Costa Rica.

This is a very user friendly and kid friendly device. We opted for this one over others because of the great reviews and we were not disappointed! The waterproof case has been great for swimming pool and outdoor adventures. The picture quality is amazing!

I was looking for alternatives to buying another GoPro when I came across this camera and figured for the price it wouldn’t hurt to try it out. I got this camera to use on my helmet during my track days and so far I am impressed, the video quality was very good and even when driving through the bumpy spots on the track the image was really stable. I can’t speak for the water resistance as haven’t used it in water but the case seems well built and doesn’t look like it would have any problem handing it. Overall for the price you can’t beat it and will be buying another one soon.

I have never owned a GoPro or other brand of "action camera" and I chose the AKASO EK7000 4K Sports Camera because at the time when I saw it was listed at a very reasonable price of $ 84.99. That price alone warrants it 5-Stars, without taking into consideration the accessories included. I haven't tried it underwater or mounted on my bike yet, however in my testing of it's abilities it's performed adequately. Obviously, you won't see the 4K video in 4K unless you connect it to a 4K monitor. It blows my mind how many people complain when they try to view footage on their standard 720/1080p monitors, or look at a review on youtube and go "Hey, that's not 4K! 0 Stars!" Please understand the way video compression and FPS work at different definitions before you start shopping for a video camera. I also recommend using the appropriate high speed/high capacity SD cards and formatting it using the camera's format function. For a fraction of a GoPro, you get a camera that has an LCD display, many mounting accessories, and two batteries that seems like it can keep up and you won't hate yourself too much if you lose it in the ocean or wherever your decide to film shenanigans.

Hard to beat this camera. I was initially looking to buy a GoPro but couldn't justify the price. This camera is affordable, and for kids, perfect. Good quality pictures so far and no issues.The only issues we had were with the charger and battery as one of the sets wouldn't work. We got the issue resolved though.

We bought this device for our daughter who had been asking for one for a long time.  She found it very user friendly and lightweight.  It's good value for money and she has been having a lot of fun with it.  She loves it but has yet to try it in water - she is so excited to take it to the lake later this summer. The customer service is very good - they are very attentive and will respond very quickly with answers to your questions.

easy to transfer videos/picture to the phone. I bought this product for multiple out of the country trips I had coming up. I have a heavy cannon camera that is not feasible sometimes for travel. this is good quality. I told my mom about this product and she started to make youtube videos with it.

I had wanted to get an action camera for a while but wanted to get a well-rated one at a reasonable price.  this camera meets both requirements.  Over the next few weeks, i'll see how well it meets my needs...at the very least i won't have to risk my more expensive camera by putting it on a bike mount.

I've only tested the Akaso for an hour thus far, but so far so good. Video quality is good @ 1080/60 and the camera comes with several attachments. Unfortunately, instructions for said attachments are almost non-existent. Sound is a little muffled, and imagine/video quality would have benefited from optical imagine stabilization. However, EIS does an okay job by action camera standards. Low light performance produces grainy video/pictures. Overall, great value vs GoPro competition. Set expectations appropriately. I'll update my review after further use.Update: After using the Akaso EK7000 for a few weeks now I have to say I am impressed. Is it as good a GoPro? No, but it is comparable enough at a fraction of the cost. The accessories, video quality, and overall quality have impressed. I've updated my score from 3 stars to 4 stars.

I purchased this for using it for youtube and other videos, I was hesitant at first with everyone screaming get a go pro.  But with so many purchased and so many reviews I figured I couldn't go wrong.  I received it and it came loaded with accessories, so many that I had to watch a video to figure them all out LOL  Video quality is top notch and the sound is awesome,  Make sure you use a MICRO SD card 10 otherwise not all video capture options are available.  Buy it and you won't be disappointed

We got this camera for my sons 12th birthday back in January.  This little camera has been perfect for all his needs, including outdoor adventures, making movies, going down water slides. It has had its share of falls and mistreatment but has survived through t all.  It takes great pictures and still works like a champ! He loves it and uses it at every opportunity! Thanks for a great product at an affordable price!

Overall a good camera for the price - as long as you do not need it for long periods of time. The battery life is laughable. I went on a 4-hour rafting trip and the camera only recorded the first hour. I never had one of the more expensive action cameras on the market and have no way of comparing. But if the battery on the other cameras can hold four hours or more, then I would be willing to pay more for those. Having a camera that will die in the middle of your adventure sucks.

Just yesterday I wrote a review (pasted below), about how this camera is "Almost perfect" because of the great quality and value, but that the app did not work, which caused the WIFI feature to be useless. Well, this morning I saw that AKASO reached out and explained that the app is being fixed but we can use  "iSmart DV" on the App Store and/or Playstore. I immediately tried and BOOM, it works! So now I can safely say its perfect and a great buy. Love seeing Amazon merchants reading their reviews!**PREVIOUS REVIEW**

We bought this for a trip abroad in February and it was terrific!  It was great to not have to worry about it getting wet.  It also took clear videos but I don't think it recorded very loud.Was really easy to connect it to the pc and upload the photos to our Amazon picture drive as well.

If you’re considering getting this camera bc you don’t want to spend money on a GoPro - DO IT! Picture quality is great, lots of useful accessories included (the remote comes in so handy) and it is super user friendly. A friend recommend this to me and it certainly didn’t disappoint.

I am a customizer who was looking for a better cam than my iPhone that was also affordable at the same time this was NOT it all the pics they show bs. I couldnt take pics with the cam and see it on my phone it was either or you take the pic and wait to unconnect from the wifi to reconnect the cam to my phone I took about 20 pic none came up I had to manually save them to my phone sad. I read all reviews and it was a million good ones to like 6 bad ones I'm sure that's the family and friends reviews

Took on a mud run obstacle course and it got great images, was pretty stable despite being chest mounted and even picked up some sound despite being in the waterproof case.Only draw back (and it may be user error) is it seems that the recordings stops when the file hits 4 gigs in size. Could just be the format of my mem card but thought it was worth noting.

It feels cheap, shoots poor quality video in dim lighting, has low contrast backlight-bleeding display, 4K video did not work for me - the option was simply disabled in the menu. I chose to "format" in the menu, but my card was not formatted. The Android application works, but again is poorly designed and you can't use it to copy files or watch the photos/videos on the SD card (maybe GoPro app doesn't have this feature either, to be honest). I wasn't able to open the battery cover with my nails, too hard, had to use a knife.On the pros side: of course, it is nice to have a GoPro-looking camera for a fraction of its price. Also, it comes a ton of extra gear. And it works more or less. The best of all, however, is that you can send this thing back to Amazon.

I am really impressed by this little device. Have been interested in portable action camera for awhile but didn't want to fork over the $$$. But for $50 I was willing to give this a try and so far it has passed the trst. Attached image shows the action drum cam in effect! :) The picture quality is good to me and the mounting accessories give a lot of options. My one complaint is with the wireless software to transfer to phone, which I still haven't gotten to work. But I just connect to computer via USB and transfer is a snap. Overall a quality product, especially considering the price.

I loved how easy it was to transfer to my phone, way better than my last faux-pro. Takes nice video, I only really used it for underwater stuff. Battery lasted a good while. Plus it came with all sorts of attachments.

Great deal for 50 bucks. I really like all the mounts including the bike and underwater case. I’ve gone snorkeling and was able to capture some fish. Doesn’t come with SD card, but I bought one separately and it wasn’t that much extra. So far so good.
Quality of video and photographyQuality of video and photography

I am in no way an expert with action cameras and I purchased the EK7000 to get started. The camera is well made and quite small. Yes the body is plastic but I have to say that someone in the design team made an effort to pay attention to details so it feels nice to the touch and well made. Image quality is surprisingly very good for the price and size!The amount of accessories that are added on is incredible! Best bang for the buck!

Just received this yesterday. I have downloaded to apps in order to get videos. One says it download once you go to it you can only hear it. The other one let's you download it but can't share it anywhere because it's only the sound as well. You need a better app for people who only have phones to use. I'm going to try a couple more things but so far not really that great because of the app. If someone could let me know what they use for their phone that would be great. Thanks

I am so impressed with this camera. I'm shocked at all the accessories that are included with it. I downloaded the android app and it worked flawlessly. I would recommend this to everyone. Even if you just wanted a second camera.

Great video quality and camera appears easy to use. The documentation that is provided is clear and written in good english which I appreciate. It does not go far enough however. I initially couldn't  get it to connect  to a network. The sticker on the outside of the box solved the issue, the app is now called "ismart dv". Once I did that, I connected the camera to wifi in settings, and then opened the app and apped the camera. Aloha! It's great!!

great purchase price. plenty of attachment  hardware and 2 batteries with charger. I purchase a 128 gig mini sd card for extra memory and an Anker battery for extra operational duration. I can almost record for 24 hours. This is my first camera so I can only attest to the fact that it is a great pic at 4k and the waterproof casing seams very sturdy. I like the handheld remote for pics or video recording alos. great purchase price for the beginner.

Great camera for the money.  Takes great video and pictures. We use 128 gb and works perfect.  Worked great in the ocean with surfing/boogie boarding (until I hit wave hard and lost it....my fault). Anyway, bought this one for motocross riding.

The footage this camera records is excellent considering the price. however the computer inside it that saves data to the memory card doesn't work at times. I will find that a whole day of recording has been wasted because the footage does not exist on the card or has been corrupted. have tried different memory cards thinking that was the problem. the problem is the camera itself. besides this one bug the camera works great. unfortunately it is such a huge bug that it makes me leave only 2 stars

I just received my AKASO EK7000 today. After trying the still shot mode as well as the video mode I have come to the conclusion that this camera is definitely better (quality wise) for the video feature. The remote control makes filming as well as taking a picture extremely easy as well as user friendly. For the price and the number of accessories that come with the camera it is a great deal. My only complaint so far ( in just a few hours of use) is the audio recording quality which could be better.

For the money, I don’t think you can do better. This little guy exceeded my expectations. I’ve used only for a few days, but m impressed. I do wish it had an external mic input, but for the price point I can’t complain. I use this for in car and outside use at the race track. Definitely for out door use, video is pretty dark without lighting when filming in car. Besides that video quality is impressive. I plan on buying more for different angles. Money well spent to get me started out.

This camera is a nice product. I use it to record my drive to and from work each day. The battery runs down after 30-40 minutes, so the battery charger is a companion you want to keep with you. I don't want a transformer cable in the car, so I stick to the battery. It comes with a dozen mounting accssories that I cannot figure out, maybe it is designed for ex GoPro users or something. Has been reliable so far. Good value.

Wasn't expecting much with the camera, but it ended up being a pretty solid piece of equipment.Pros: It's light, the video quality is good. The attachments it comes with are plenty. The navigation of the menu and setting is easy. You have some choices with quality of video and photographs.

This is a recent purchase and my first action camera. I have found the operation of the camera, software, and mounts all to be intuitive. The quality of the video and pictures have been satisfactory to me so far. I purchased this for an upcoming trip to Hawaii where I have lots of activities planned and hope to get good pictures/videos using this. As I've not done this before and based on the reviews I read, seems this was a great way to start especially given the costs. There are several excellent YouTube videos showing you how do everything from unpacking when you get the box to how all the features work.

I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend because he loves outdoors and doing spartan races. So he was really excited that it was water resistant and could use it while racing. The only issue he was having was that it is difficult to figure out how to use. It didn’t really come with the proper instructions on how to get it started and use it. He had to look up everything on YouTube which was okay for him but annoying because the instructions should have been inside the box of the product. Overall he loves the gift but is still trying to figure out how to work the camera. He has issues with it deleting and keeping some of the files as if it’s overwriting footage.

I purchased the Asako EK7000 camera to replace my GoPro and was rather skeptical at first but after using the camera it really is a no brainer. This camera is so simple to use and  takes great pictures and video. I partically like the screen on the back.  I would highly recommend this camera over the GoPro Hero  to anyone considering purchasing a small camera.Jim Anderson

I purchased the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action and it was one of the best purchases I have made in years. I originally was torn in between the Akaso and GoPro, but once the camera came in and I compared it to my friends GoPro I understood that I had made an amazing Purchase. The bought the camera to attach on to my motorcycle helmet and thanks to the mounts that came with it, made everything super simple. Honestly couldn't ask for a better camera to ride with, the clarity is amazing and very stable. I highly recommend buying this camera especially because camera/video quality is stunning and the price is so affordable.

Purchased as a gift for my teen son and budding YouTuber. Excellent value, for the price. Very similar to GoPro in features and quality, but a small fraction of the cost. Also it comes with 2 batteries, which is a bonus. The only area that could be improved was the manual. The instructions are REALLY lacking on how to set up and how to use. Luckily, there were some great user videos on YouTube, which filled in the knowledge gaps.

Very easy to install. Clear and easy instruction. Connects to phone through app with no hassle. Unsure of sound and picture quality (just received and tinkered with. Need sd to actually save and send/post. Unsure if sound. Reviews say sound and some say no sound. Nothing mentions sound quality in description. Only known downfall. Given 2 batteries, has a 1 hr life. Overall worth the price and comes with a spare everything.

I took it with when I went to Ireland for my vacation. It is absolutely working fine, battery holds charge, the product comes with all the essential attachments that you can imagine, the quality of the product and the quality of the pictures and videos the camera takes is absolutely good. Especially when you use it in good lighting the video's quality is very very good. I really like this product. You cannot zoom but that is how these kind of cameras are made. I used a 64gb card and I was able to use this camera without even worrying about space as was able to take tons of videos and pictures. Thanks.

This camera is truly the best you can get for the price! Bought three of these cameras without any expectations since the price is lower than many others. After receiving the cameras and using them while skiing, mounted as dash cam, and mountain biking I am really impressed with the image quality and color. Easy to cycle through the different modes as well as the settings. Great value, and an amazing camera!

I bought the AKASO EK7000 Sports Action Camera for an upcoming trip to the Bahamas, and I believe that it definitely served my purposes well. I was considering buying a GoPro because I wanted to capture footage in the water, but I am glad I didn't because the AKASO camera served all my purposes very well. It was easy to use and connect to my smartphone, and the video quality was very good given what I paid for it. The camera also came with a ton of accessories and mounts. If you are in need of an action camera but do not want to shell out over $300 for it, I believe that the AKASO is your best bang for your buck.

This camera comes with two batteries. Yet, if you switch the batteries, you lose all time and date settings every time. I went on a camping trip to another country recently and wanted to use this. My time and date in all the pictures are messed up because of this, and wish I had known beforehand. This is only meant for up close action shots and not to be used for distance or anything else.

This camera is AMAZING! Pictures and video are so beautiful that it doesn't even make sense at its price point, the quality is that good!The battery lasted the entire time I was filming under water while floating down a river, with some to spare. Even after filming for 2 hours.

Definitely not 4K. No image stabilization makes it very shaky. Decent at 1080p 60fps. It is very simple to use. Okay for the money if you're using it for non-professional uses or giving it to your kids to mess around with, but even then there's better options. I'd recommend spending a little more money and getting something better. YouTube reviews of this camera will show you better options for the same price. I want to like this camera but can't get past the poor image/shakiness.

I like this product a lot so far.  Haven't been able to really put it through it's paces yet, but so far have been taking random videos and pictures so far.  You cannot beat the clarity and the quality of product you receive for such a low price compared to it's other well known competitor.  Can't wait to really get out there and use it for what I bought it for which is my trip back to Asia next week.  After that I'll be able to really share my experience, but so far so good.  I noticed a lot of people complaining about lack on instructions, but the interface is pretty intuitive and easy to figure out.  All in all a great buy so far.

We bought this for our son for Christmas. We figured let's buy something cheaper than the GoPro for his first "stunt" camera. My husband and I didn't think it would compare to the GoPro but it's actually an excellent deal for the price and quality. You also get extra accessories with this buy as opposed to buying it separate like you if you bought a standard GoPro. My son enjoys using this little camera when he is outside riding his bike up and down the hill or while doing flip stunts. We highly recommend this stunt camera.

Got this Camera to record my bicycle commute to work. The Camera works well without the App. The Remote control works well. All the fittings and accessories allow you to mount the camera to do different things. For $50 this camera is pretty good. The menus and app are pretty user brutal and can be made more user friendly. The manual is biased towards apple computers.

Great camera and can't figure out why you would pay so much more for a Go Pro.  I used this on a canyoning and surfing trip in Australia and for some snorkeling in Hawaii in addition to some local mountain biking.  After about a year and a half with the product I had an issue with the firmware that the customer service team helped me troubleshoot.  Troubleshooting didn't work so they sent me a brand new one of the more recent model even though mine was technically out of the warranty by a few months.  Wouldn't hesitate to buy another one if needed.

I bought this camera because my 8 year old son wanted a Go-Pro camera so he could start his own YouTube channel and for the price, it made a great Christmas present. This is a great camera for a novice or kid that really just wants something to play around with or someone who wants to get started doing video. Since I didn't spend a lot of money on it, I'm not too worried if it gets lost or broken. Getting started using it was a little bit of struggle since the instructions are digital, but once you figure it out, it is not to bad. Still waiting on my son to start that YouTube channel though.

I was considering buying a more expensive camera but this one works great and it comes with a lot of great features.  I like the wrist band remote the most and all of the different mounting options it comes with.  It also connects to an iPhone or other smart device to control the unit and take pictures and video and use as a remote view screen and download saved content.  Great deal and tons of fun!

This is a good little camera for the money.  We used it while snorkeling in Mexico and I was able to get some very nice video of the sea turtles and fish.  What surprised me is how well it works for still photos, much better resolution than the camera on my phone.  Hard to beat the accessories included for the price.  My original camera had a spot in all of the photos and videos but Akaso replaced it with a new camera.  So far I’m happy.

So, let me say, for the price, compared to a GoPro, you can't beat it. Compared to LiDow brand, it's better than that too. I would recommend this to a friend, however there are some Cons that make me a little hesitant.Pros:

I bought this product to go on a cruise with my sons (8 and 11). Initially, this was a great purchase. Similar items are more than twice the price, and for an underwater camera, this was a great option. All but one thing about the camera was great. The wifi did not work correctly. I called the next business day and spoke to someone who said to send it back and they would replace it. I did and am very happy with our new one. It all works great and even upgraded to the Pro. Thanks for making a great product reasonably priced.

I bought this for my 13 year old to use on a trip to Hawaii. I used a GoPro Hero Black 7 and he used the Akaso.  When I uploaded the video, I could barely see any difference in the shots. It worked flawlessly. Highly recommended for water, and other action video and stills.

Bought this item for some family pictures and videos of our vacation to California. Beautiful quality, shipping was fast, and you cant beat the price. I would recommend this product and would definitely buy again.  I have plans to buy another to start my new YouTube channel. This product comes with 2 batteries that last a g amount of time.  Cant wait to capture more memories. Also means the wife have used it to make our own videos at night time if ya know what I'm saying and the picture quality in the lighting is amazing. My wife and I are very satisfied to say the least 😁

Firstly, maybe I didn't notice when I purchased, but there are a lot of little gadgets in the box. This was nice. We bought this to record our biking outings. The camera is very clear, very stable. I haven't tried the water resistance as yet but it looks very secure. This camera is awesome value for money. My only complaint is that it doesn't pick up audio very well. Maybe because the camera is locked in the waterproof holder.. other than that, awesome buy

Haven't used it in water, purchased it for filming automotive repair work and for my particular application so far it's worked great, especially for the price. Would definitely buy this product again and I certainly would recommend it to others looking for a camera like this.

I purchased one of these a year ago and was highly impressed with the quality of the video for the price. I was so impressed that I purchased another one in January. Now after little use, like clock work, both of them have ceased to function completely. You turn on the power, see the product screen, then nothing. There is still power, but no display. I effectively have a load of mounts and 2 ultralight paperweights. Don't go the cheap route, get quality gear that stands the test of time. These unfortunately don't fall in to that category.

Just like your favorite name-brand action camera but less than half the price. Very basic functions but the app control works very well. I haven't dropped it yet but it seems sturdy. Overall a great camera, for the price you can't get much better.

I bought this for my 12 year old daughter and she loves it. She already used it in the pool and it’s 100% waterproof. She also went on a bike ride and got it all on camera. She’s absolutely loves it. I would recommend this one.

The camera itself was good but the attachments are next to impossible to figure out without any instructions.An update to this review.  I was recently contacted by customer service concerning my comments about my purchase .  I was offered a new camera with the correct attachments for the application I want to use the camera for.  They were very helpful in resolving all the issues I told them about.  As I indicated originally, the camera is good quality so I anticipate the replacement with the correct attachments will be just as good.

This turned out to be exactly what I wanted. It is a perfect camera for my needs. I wanted an action camera, but didn't want to pay the high price of some brands.Once I got it set up and used it some today, I am not sure how I could get better out of one of the more expensive cameras. I would recommend this to anyone for normal action use.

Good for the price. Not the most clear or HD camera but it is good for the price and comes with TONS of accessories and different attachments. Looking forward to use this underwater!UPDATE: After leaving a 3 star review on this camera, AKASO emailed me offering a refund or replacement and wanted to ensure my 100% satisfaction. I have since used this camera underwater in Panama and the pictures turned out good. No complaints at all about this camera, and very impressed with AKASO's customer service.

While this is still not a GoPro, by any means, the newer version is a lot better than the previous incarnation.  Firstly, the battery lasts a lot longer.  Secondly, the colour balance is much more "real."  Thirdly, the files no longer curt when you try to transfer them.  It is still a little "foggy" in low light conditions, but for outdoor sports, it is almost indistinguishable from a Go Pro.

The video and images you get out of this camera for the price makes it a no-brainer instead of spending almost 10 times on the well-known brands. And the fact you get a screen with super simple interface makes it that much sweeter to use. Waterproof to larger depth and two batteries in the pack means this will be the highlight of any holiday that's by the sea.

UPDATE:I wanted to let people know that the company was very responsive to my  concerns and replaced the remote controls for the cameras that I bought. These are good cameras for the price, hopefully they will make the remote waterproof in the future, so it can be used with the waterproof housing. It doesn't make sense to not have it all waterproof.

This little camera packs a punch with regard to quality and cost. I wanted a compact, high definition action camera to take on bike rides and other action events and didn't want to pay the high cost of a GoPro. With this camera, I not only get the comparable features, but the quality is equal to the most high priced GoPro. Has Wifi and 4K resolution which makes great videos and transferring easy. The attachments that it came with let you mount to just about anything. I was pleasantly surprised.

Great camera, and it was nice to have so many of the accessories included.  Picture quality is excellent and controls are intuitive.  Our kids have the cameras on their helmets when downhill skiing and we've taken some great videos on a ski vacation in Montana this winter.  Our only complaint is that the battery doesn't perform well in low temperatures - even with a full charge, with some time in the cold the camera/battery registers that a low battery signal.  A minor issue that we learned to work around...overall an excellent way to capture family memories and a fun thing for our kids.

I was quite skeptical given the price of the camera, but overall its performed great! I use it as an action camera on my motorcycle helmet and it works great. The only improvement I could suggest is a longer battery life! You can pickup some replacements pretty cheap.. still way cheaper than a gopro though!

I like how the camera comes with all sorts of accessories. The instruction booklet is easy to follow. I did notice that the casing bracket on tripod mounting is a little loose so we'll have to watch out that the Akaso doesn't fall out. Doesn't come with an SD card but does have two batteries. It's charging right now so I haven't tried it out but I'm excited to see how epic this little guy is going to make me look.

I bought this for my son two years ago and it sat unused until now when I decided I needed an action cam for myself. I ”borrowed” his, thinking I would surely need something better than a camera at this price. Better than expected - great picture, great accessories. It can also be used as a web cam - I’ve used it in video conference calls.

Great video quality for the price,BUT:  Battery lasted under 10 minutes in cold weather. Wifi remote that connects smartphone to the camera worked well the first 3 times I used it then struggled to connect at all. Wrist remote did not indicate if it was in fact recording. I had to keep asking people around me if the camera was on or recording when it was mounted to my helmet. Easy return via Amazon. Oh, wrong color was shipped to me as well and the camera came off the mount and bounced around in the box prior to arrival. So that wasn't good. I was excited to record my kids skiing, but this is not the proper camera for that.

My daughter loves this camera! She downloaded the app and loves that she is able to send pics to friends right from the app instead of having to upload them with the SD card first.  She can’t wait to take it on vacation.  Great camera overall.

Love it, bought it after reviewing the high price sports camera's. Took it on our 10 day trip to Hawaii and it is an awesome camera great quality video, pictures not so good I think I might be able to adjust. Was able to get the whole trip on one 32g card. I couldn't be more please with this purchase. Thinking on buying for for our friend in Hawaii. Easy to use to boot.

I got this because of a lightning deal, thinking it was to good to be true.  Since having this camera, I have been on vacation, used it on roller coasters and the pool and normal day to day activity.  I also have a youtube channel and I have used this camera in almost every video I have made since getting the camera.  Very easy to use.  I even let a someone I know from, I won't say the name but it rhymes with (snowglow) take a look at it to compare and I was told virtually the same.  except 1/3 the cost.  The only thing it can not do that a go pro can is time lapse...let me rephrase,  It can time lapse but it can not convert all the images into one video of time-lapse like the newer go pros can.  I love this camera and can't wait to add more to my collection.

This looks to be a very nice little camera. It appears to be as represented  and the price was very competitive with similar cameras. I really wish it had come with an SD card, but I think I have found one that works. I would like to see at least an 8gb card included to get started. That would be convenient for buyers. The number of accessories is good and the size is just right for use on my helmet. There is much to learn about the settings, but it is not as complicated as other cameras I own. In general, it looks like a good buy.

I just played around with this camera today. I am amazed that you can purchase this camera within a reasonable budget as well. You can do anything with it as you can with a Go-Pro. The mobile app is pretty neat as well, my mobile app keeps freezing, but I haven't put too much time into getting it to work. It comes with all add-ons you would need and makes for a complete kit. I'm looking forward to using this product for many projects in the future!

For the price its okay for basic recording. The picture quality isn't great and the sound quality is really bad. You can tell by holding it that the camera and included accessories are cheap plastic. The screen on the back is very poor quality so don't expect to be able to use that for anything other than judging whats in frame.This was purchased for online college as its required to take video of yourself performing certain tasks. It'll work fine for that, not sure what else I'd use it for.

I needed a webcam, and they are in short supply these days. But this action camera works as a webcam on Windows, could not get it to work on a mac though. On windows, plug in (it turns on and connects as an SD card reader), push the top button so it says PC Camera on the back, and it just works.  I use it without a battery installed. All the extra accessories, batteries, mounts, etc are a great bonus for me use case. Only Caveat is that it's a 170 degree wide angle, it's much wider than a normal webcam.

So here is the story. I got this wonderful AKASO EK7000 for Christmas. It was totally awesome!!! I went on vacation to California, tested it out in the water, and you won't believe it!!! The camera view was amazing, the sound affect was clear and not annoying, and it was like looking through goggles. So Clear!!! I loved it. The only downfall was the fact that it came with a backup back to the waterproof case, and the back is not even waterproof. Luckily I didn't find out the hard way. I had heard this from a friend and tested it to find out for myself. Dodged a Bullet there!!! Though the one downside, it's only minor, and is not part of the camera, just sort of useless. Love the Product and hope to see more like it.

For a fraction of the cost for what you'd pay for a GoPro, I couldn't be more thrilled with this camera.  I'm just a casual user taking various video of kids events, travelling in a vehicle, etc. and both the video and audio quality are great.  Everything works as advertised and after owning it now for a couple of months, I don't have a single complaint!  I'd highly recommend it for those wanting an inexpensive entry into the small, portable, HD camera market and not wanting to spend more than you should have to!

I needed a good camera that could easily be mounted at karate tournaments so I could get a good recording of the fight.  At ~$50 I figured it would be "good enough".  Its actually a good camera that takes nice video.

It produced good pictures and video. Excellent for the price. However the arm band remote just stopped working after a couple weeks. Worse though is that the mount broke ( the plastic just broke) and my camera went to the bottom of the San Francisco Bay. The base of the mount remained attached. It was attached to a kite that hit the water but the plastic mount on a sports camera should endure that. Disappointing.I am changing to a five star review because they sent me a new camera. SUPERB AFTER SALE SERVICE!

I like it so far. Picture and video quality are clear and honestly for the price, this is a great little camera. I like the versatility of the different mount options it comes with as well. I’ll primarily be using it on my tripod, but if I’m feeling extra adventurous I have the option to try something different! The only reason I have for knocking down a star was the very vague directions that came with it. Sure, it tells you how to use the camera, but not what each mount is for or how to take the waterproof casing off from the display mount. I literally had to google all of that and watch a YouTube video. Other than that, I’m liking it so far and hope to do a follow up review some months to a year in 😉

Loved this little beauty. It takes great pictures and video and is very comparable to a GoPro. Only drawback what so ever is when the underwater cover is used the sound muffles a bit. But your underwater so what do you expect. Lol

I was a bit skeptical to only spend $50 on an action camera! But I took the chance and I'm so glad! The quality of the camera is pretty good and I can't believe it came with so many attachments! Usually you have to buy all the extras but the pack came with plenty! The camera also has some pretty cool features such as the wireless remote, the wifi connect setting (which allows you to take pictures/videos on your phone and quite a few resolution options (many other cameras I looked at only had one or two!)If you're thinking about buying the Akaso action camera EK7000 - DO IT!

I purchased this on a whim because I was taking a trip to Florida. After hours of recording footage I got home only to realize that the video quality is absolutely terrible. The audio quality is even worse than the video quality. It seems like a great idea because you get so much for a small price… But you definitely get what you pay for.

I have never had a camera like this before, I am a mobile dog groomer and people love to see their dog being groomed. I have tried it out around the house and at the football game last night and it worked amazing!!! I am so excited to try it out while grooming!! The only thing that I found out that kinda stinks is there is no time lapse video. I like to do that every once and a while from the whole groom or bath. But other then that LOVE IT!!!

I bought this camera in order to record action videos with my friends for youtube purposes and this camera has exceeded my expectations. I love the wide angle view and the 4K is beautiful. It catches all of our movements without any falter. The underwater case works well and no water leaked into the camera while I was recording in my pool. I would buy this product again and I plan on buying another one in the future.

This camera does the job. My wife and I purchased before a trip to StThomas along with an inexpensive accessory pack. We took some great photos with it and actually used it as a regular camera more than a video camera. We also took it snorkeling and were able to get some cool video. All in all, this camera is a pretty good value for the money, (I paid $59.99) although you have to charge the batteries in the camera unless you send them a review and choose the charger as your gift =)

The photos taken with this camera on dry land are of good quality.  Unfortunately I bought this for use as a dive camera.  Underwater pictures and videos are washed out in bright light.  In low light, the images and videos are so dark you cannot make out the subject.  Looking at the images other reviewers have posted here, I am not the only one with this issue.  Looks like it's hit or miss and I got a miss.

Originally in the market for a GoPro to use for recording my deliveries. However, my budget convinced me to search for a camera that was a little more budget-friendly. At a fraction of the cost, I have found this little camera to be everything I need to take HD pictures and record HD video. Night-time quality not so great but all of my deliveries take place during the day so all-in all it works well for me.  It's really easy to use and comes with all the accessories you will need with the exception of a tri-pod and SD card, which I found on Amazon for pretty good pricing as well.

We bought a couple of these for our daughters to take on vacation as their first action cameras. The only complaint they have is the speed being a little slow. Otherwise, they are very easy and fun to use and they have survived being exposed to snow and water.

Do not get fooled by the low price of this product! the video quality is absolute trash, it is super blocky and pixelated. also, there is no image stabilization so get used to having shaky videos. Forget about recording in dark environments because nothing will make it on to the footage. The battery life is less than 1 hour about 55 min. the controller that came with it stopped working after 2 days! Anyways, don't make same mistake as me and invest more and get a better product!

The camera was very intuitive to use and included a ton of accessories.  I charged the batteries put a micro SD card in it, (not included) thew it on a selfie stick, and got great videos. I would not hesitate to purchase again. This camera is inexpensive enough to take risk with and still provides great shots. I could not be more pleased with it.  I used one of the included mount adapter to put it on the selfie stick.

Ok.  For the most part this camera seems pretty decent. The functions are easy to understand and operate. The reason for two start is the screen on the camera. I’ve never had an electronic scratch so easily. It definitely needs a screen protector. I unpacked the item and used the blue cleaning wipe provided which caused this permanent damage shown in the photo. This item was received on 7/1/19 and arrived two days late.

I am so happy that I came across the Akaso during my search for a new GoPro. This is a great action cam that is high quality and loaded with features and accessories. We are going on a cruise soon and I am excited to use it there and will update my review. Also excited for year round outdoor activities. I have tested all features including wifi app and very impressed.

This camera in every way. Portable and very useful. I like the image quality of it and how i can even record without feeling like I'm being watched. There are a lot of pieces which confused me at first but later i figured out what they are for. Other than that i haven't not used this camera since I've gotten it. Perfect for almost anything and so simple to use. Though try not to lose it is pretty small

It was awesome.  I used it to take videos of all of my kids wrestling matches.  I have never had an issue however last week and I have only had it since November It suddenly stopped charging the batteries in the camera.  I can connect it to some other power source and it starts up fine and works but both batteries fail to charge.  Very Frustrating.  Outside of that the camera was awesome the video quality was perfect.

I bought this mainly for snorkeling but hope to use it for other purposes in the future. Took it to Hawaii without much of a chance to look at it before going and was a bit disappointed that there was no wrist strap included. However, I fashioned one easily enough with hair ties and into the water I went. I fumbled around a bit trying to use it but it took good, clear footage. I used it only in relatively shallow water but I am happy with the camera, especially for the price. I've always wanted an underwater camera and this worked out perfectly for me.

A very solid little camera with tons of extras included. No need to buy the accessories pack as there are just tons of mounting options included in the box. The actual camera chip performs as expected, nice images, low FPS video. The screen is really great. Super clear.HOWEVER: The camera came broken! It's not important but the battery door on the camera was broken out of the box, making is very hard to open the battery door. I will be 3D printing a replacement battery door, making this a nuisance but it still feels cheap and crummy to have such a beautifully packaged, nice camera come broken.

I was surprised how much was in the box, mounts, remote, extra battery, straps... Easy to use. There's a lot of you tube videos on this camera that show you everything you need. Wifi control worked great and quick downloads to my samsung.

I bought this for my son to use at the beach. It is a wonderful camera. The quality of the videos is clear. The waterproof case worked perfectly to keep water from damaging the camera. Batteries charged quickly.The only aspect I found to be lacking was in distant photographs. I feel like a smart phone camera does a better job capturing detail. However, I purchased the camera for the videos. One surprising and fun feature was the burst photo option.

I can't believe how amazing this is and for the price. We opened it last night and played around with it. Can't wait to take it on our cruise coming up! Its just as good as its name brand competitor and for a fraction of the price.

I received my camera the other day.  It was easy to set-up and great quality.  I purchased the camera mainly for the WiFi functionality and was pleasantly surprised with the high video quality. I work for a international company selling essential equipment into the USA. Due to all that is happening with travel restrictions our equipment support team has been unable to travel to perform installations.  With my new AKASO EK7000 I am able to attach the camera to my head and stream live video to the support team in the UK, allowing me to perform the tasks required with their guidance every step of the way.

Gave to my 11 year old son as a bday present and he was able to figure out how to operate mostly by himself.  We did purchase a memory card for it as well.  It records audio and visual decent enough for our purposes.  We took it swimming in the pool and did plenty of under water and it held well.

This is a very good quality Sport Camera easy to use and set up come with a few attachments to help you with your set up Also comes with two batteries. You can recharge in 15 minutes. We were in a baseball game of my Granddaughter and I were impressed with the quality of the video and pictures we took.

The AKASO EK7000 was a fantastic gift. I was surprised by the quality of the video. The mounts make it easy to attach to anything. Sometimes you may need to get creative but it can be done.The instructions helpful but not as clear as I would like. The good news is the camera is easy to navigate and tune to you preferences. It is easier than programming a VCR.
I should have played with the camera before going into the water, user error. Camera is a nice size and easy to use once you play with it. THE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS ABOVE AND BEYOND!!

Awesome camera! Using this for my quadcopter to get HD footage of some of my flights. Camera is small and light, which is a major plus when every gram counts, and the footage is awesome. We got a GoPro Hero Session for christmas, and I wanted something cheaper that I wouldn't be *as* disappointed if it was destroyed in a crash. Found this deal and jumped on it. The whole lower half of the box is jammed with accessories, way more than we got with the GoPro. Footage is roughly comparable, although some of the colors aren't quite as vibrant, but that can easily be adjusted in typical video software. 3D printed a mount for the drone, which I had to make by hand, as this is not quite as popular as the GoPro where thingiverse has a plenty of GoPro prints available. Not the end of the world.No disappointments. If this craps out after a month, I'll update my review, but as of now I'm completely happy.
It's a shame because the image quality is good for the price, but you'll be lucky to get an hour of continuous footage on a fresh battery.

I got this for my husband for a gift, the app didn't seem to work well with his Motorola phone, sinking issues and gave up on it. He has recently uodated to a new Samsung Galaxy 10, so hopefully will be able to get it to work w/it.

I just purchased this AKASO last week and have already had some fun using it!  So far it works great and its at a great price compared to the GoPro.  We will see how it holds up over time but for $65 ... its a steal!  Its also great that all the GoPro accessories seem to fit this as well...however I could be wrong on some but I've had zero issues so far.

It's a great little camera. I haven't taken it under/in the water yet. But I know/learn more about the camera I'll be sure to update my review. But thus far it's just as good as my GoPro and between two and three quarters of the cost ( Sorry GoPro ). It also comes with most of the accessories needed to mount to the more commen places including bike and car windows.

We purchased this as an alternative to the GoPro cameras and have not been disappointed.  4 stars because the audio is just not there, however, this will be a great stationary camera to catch action and we can dub audio over it.  The video quality is excellent for about $60 bucks.  I have not compared it to the GoPro cameras, but couldn’t be happier with the video quality.  If you are looking to just capture the video and not worried about the audio, make this purchase.

This handy camera came with every connector or attachment you could need for every adventure you might go on. We used it for hiking and ziplining and it worked very well. The sound was a bit muffled, since it was in it's protective case, but the picture was clear and the video was very clean and even transferred well onto a large TV screen.

We bought this for our son who loves making his own action videos. He has rode his horse with this as well as other activities and the videos turned out great! Sound quality was good as well as picture quality! Would highly recommend this action camera, especially for the price!! Great value!

Sucks.  Two weeks after Amazon return date, just as I was leaving on a bike packing trip, the thing won’t turn on.  Tried everything in the manual but it’s dead. Guess going cheap is cheating reliability .  Will have to purchase a GoPro (gulp) to start my trip.  Don’t know who was rating this camera so high, guess they are not using it!

Camera works great. Put it on my helmet to video my quad and rzr rides. Picture is great and sound quality is remarkable even through my full face shield helmet. I put a 64 gb in it and it works great. For the price you can't beat it. Love this little camera. Had this camera 3 months now and not a problem. I use it 2-3 times a week. I have never had a gopro but I can't see it being 3 times better to justify the price.

I recently purchased this product not really knowing alot about it.  There was good reviews and bad reviews, but I decided to take a chance and purchase it and so far I like it.  I am definitely taking this product to universal with me in May and I am sure I will still get great pictures and videos with it as well.  I am excited about purchasing this product for all my outdoor outings.  I feel like I am definitely getting my moneys worth out of it.  You can't complain with the product for the great price it was.  I love my new Sports Camera.  I definitely was impressed on how fast I got my product as well.  It was at my home at the date promised can't get any better than that.

This is a great little camera for the price. I have been shopping for a decent action cam for a price that is justifiable and this fits the bill. Works great for what it is. It is not a professional grade camera however it works awesome for me! I use this on dive trips and the waterproof case is great the buttons are easy to use and it is pretty simple to use. The battery life is adequate it comes with 2 if you need more get more. People complain too much! Many cameras are battery hogs it's a fact of life. Personally I love this little thing.

This is a great camera!  I never did an underwater video before.  This was easy to set up, easy to connect to WiFi and my phone.  It took great videos even though I had no clue about how to use it correctly.  Plus I took it to 93 feet deep thinking it would flood.  Nope. It was bone dry.  I recommend it highly.

This thing is awesome right out of the box! For the price, with two batteries, and all accessories, you can't beat it! I used it all night in a race car at Daytona and it survived the heat, humidity, and vibration. Image quality was awesome. May not be for the ones shooting "professional" video, but surely good enough for those wanting to share their action adventures.

This is a great action camera, considering the price in contrast with an actual go-pro and this thing is awesome. Im not exactly a tec guru but the photos are high quality as is video. It is easy enough to use that my 7 y/o daughter makes videos of her own just like her favorite YouTube videos. Tours of our vegie garden, tutorial on riding her bicycle. Anyway, unless you are looking to make professional productions (Probably would work for that as well) this is the best choice.

Honestly I purchased a GoPro hero session and I just wasn’t satisfied. I did my research and looked around and found his beautiful camera. When it arrived first thing that stunned me and made me fall in Love was how it came in the box. Compared to my GoPro, it was like gold bar that came in the mail. Next, the amount of accessories was amazing and very appreciated. The remote, very important Nd handy, also very appreciated. Finally , quality of product, amazing. The clear image and the nice sound, I was happy of the purchase. definitely would try out this camera.

Love this little camera.  Takes some Google searching to learn about how to do some things because the manual is good but not detailed.  I've never used any kind of action camera so I was bewildered by some of the mounts and brackets.  But I will be using a tripod 95% of the time so that's ok.  It was easy to setup.  I have an iPhone so I'm using the iSmart DV app and it was also easy to setup and use.  I love the size and features on this camera and love the price point even more!

I had been wanting a camera for some while not to record the things I do outdoors but did not want to sacrifice quality.  This camera has been almost PERFECT!  The app that it connects to is super easy to use and a great tool.  The quality of this camera and the extras it comes with is absolutely unbelievable.  The only downside I have had using this camera revolves around the battery.  I feel as if the battery runs out too quickly and that directly affects a key function...the time stamp.  Any time a battery is taken out the camera it resets the time on it which is extremely inconvenient when in action.

Wasn't sure what to expect given all the reviews and the digging I did about this product especially after I received it I understood why it had so many reviews.  Lots of reviews due to the free gift they give you if you write a review, hence why I'm writing one.  Some would say this is deceptive marketing, I would say so too if the product in fact was crap which it isn't.This sports action camera so far for me has been a great purchase.  I've had it for about a month now and have taken a few videos.  It's very easy to use and the quality of the videos from what I have taken so far is exactly what I expected.  For me this was a very good alternative to the much more expensive gopro and this camera comes with a variety of accessories. I'm very pleased with this purchase and can't wait to continue using it.

I haven't used it for long, but it's a fun little camera that is great for beginners who want to try out action-type videos without a lot of financial risk. It's just okay as a camera, but again, a really good starting point for those with an interest in trying it out. The video is just some snow outside my door, but it shows the general quality.Biggest upsides: easy to use (except for the wifi connection thing, it's much easier to plug the camera into my computer), fun, waterproof, and inexpensive
Absolutely fantastic company, couldn’t be more happy with costumer service, they went through serious depths to help fix my issues, even years after I bought it. Well worth the money!

So far so good! Bought this camera to use for a cruise trip. Tested it around the house and outside, and the picture quality is pretty good for it being winter right now. I assume bright sunny Caribbean will be great. Lots of accessories come with the purchase! Will provide an update once it's really tested.

We bought this for our son. We've seen the quality of the photos and videos which are pretty decent. All of the attachments are amazing. He really doesn't use it though. I would definatly purchase again for the price and quality.
