This camera is pretty cool, I really like it so far, and for the price you cant beat it. I like how the app works I have to admit it's much easier  to use than my other action camera that was more than double the price

I love this camera, I first purchase it in 2017 and it still working as of today, I had it in my car but now it’s on my electric unicycle, I am gonna purchase another one for summer! Don’t think too much just get it you won’t regret!!!

The GoPro Akaso Ek5000 is a great camera overall. Everything about the quality of the picture, to the sound is great. I find this product useful wherever I go. I live the way it feels like there is nothing even on you and everything is normal, but your recording your every step. Only problem is that getting the micro SD card is a bit of hassle. I was running from Rite aid to Walmart trying to find one and finally succeeded. One other problem is that I could have got some great footage but did not know when my camera was ready to record. I recommend if you are wearing a helmet of some sorts, ask someone to check if your camera is on(It always sucks to lose great footage from a great camera:) Overall the Akaso Ek5000 GoPro camera is cheap, well workling, and a great camera.

This camera is an awesome value!  The price is reasonable.  The quality of the camera and accessories is excellent.  And, there are more accessories than you'll ever use, for almost any application you could think of.  The camera is easy to operate, and the waterproof case fits snugly.  The wrist-strap remote is incredibly handy, and an extra battery is included.It does not include a memory card, which are easily purchased.

Bought this product due to the high review ranking. Don't be fooled by this. After getting it home and using it for a few days it began to start freezing and failing. The camera got very hot after just a few mins of use. Returning it and buying another camera.

The camera is a great price for what it is and comes with tons of accessories. It says it has 4K picture but I don’t think the quality is up to standard on that could be a lot better. It’s kind of pixel looking compared to the go pro. With all the said it’s a decent product for the price.

I got this camera to film my driver's around the state. Once I figured out it connects via wi-fi and not Bluetooth, I was set. Connects easily to my phone. Easy to use, I do recommend reading manual. Picture quality is great once transferred, hard to see in the cam itself and is easier on the phone. Using an Android phone btw. Comes with a bunch of accessories and straps. Definitely worth the buy if you want something cheaper then the go pro.

Very pleased with camera. Learning to use it but that is seemingly easy. Easy connection to phone via the app. Pleased with both video and photo quality. Only reason for scoring of stabilization is it is not available on this model. Two thumbs up!

Purchased the camera to shoot some training videos, and to use for live music sessions. Have used it for the training videos so far, and it has worked great.The one suggestion I have is to not charge the batteries and let them sit for a few days before using them. They have a slow discharge, so they don't last very long if they have sat for days.

Kinda a cheapy device. Advertising makes it seem as strong as a go pro but its no where close. It is good for little small things like recording while driving ( dash cam ) or simple picture taking, dont expect photographer quality images tho.

We use this camera while we are jeeping mounting it to our jeep and using the remote to control when it records does a great job easy to use easy to take off and then take stills as well also nice to be able to get wet when we go thru the creeks and rivers.

It’s a decent camera that comes with a ton off add on items. The wrist remote is a cool addition to the camera. The sound quality is very poor. The WiFi feature does work but I had to google the password online being that it wasn’t in the instruction manual. Overall it’s decent but the sound quality is very low. Also there’s an app where you can do playback and other things.

Very pleased with this product. Feels like a quality product, the packaging is nice and comes with a lot of accessories. I bought it for an upcoming family trip to Costa Rica to get some action shots in the water, in the jungle and zip-lining and I think it will be a perfect fit for that. I'm excited about the waterproof case and not having to worry about damage in the water, on the beach or in the jungle. I also like that it fits accessories from other competitive products.

This is my second AKASO action camera. I bought a second one because I have had no issues with the first one. It is light weight, takes a great picture and video, and is easy to use. The accessories that come with the camera are an added bonus. The only thing I haven't liked is the battery compartment -- it is a little difficult to open. I broke the tab opening it on my first camera. Even though the tab broke the hatch still shuts and stays closed. You can't go wrong with this purchase in my opinion.

This is a pretty great camera compared to the other high priced ones in the market. It comes with so many accessories that you don't need to go out and buy anything right away. The wrist camera and video buttons is great and makes taking shots on the go really easy. The picture quality is great! The indoor shots are a little dark but thats to be expected in my opinion. When its bright out the pictures turn out great. Ive taken many under water creek shots and they are great! Sound is good even with the water tight case on.

I had a GoPro Hero, this is way better value for the money. Especially for hard use, you could burn through 5-6 of these for the cost of a GoPro.Pretty easy to set up and connect to my phone. I bought it for my kids they have fun with it.
It's not 4K. If you're buying this for 4K, don't.It's ironic because this company DO sell 4K cameras... not the EK7000 though.

Want an action camera, but don't want to spend $300?  This is definitely the camera for you!  I have had it for a few days now and have been playing with all the features.  I have an iPhone 6 (iOS 10.2.1) and the camera wirelessly connects to it without a hitch using the Ez iCam app.  You can control the camera from the app or upload photos/videos to your phone - this is my favorite feature.I have hooked it up to my bike and gone for a ride, the video quality is excellent.  Would recommend this action camera without hesitation.
Bought for my daughter - for YouTube videos.- Great value, compared to more expensive GoPro Cams

This little guy does an amazing job. I have been using this go pro for film recording and I love it. The battery life is great and really want to buy another one just because of the price. Great job AKASO! Very few products impress me nowadays. This one has been amazing.

I'm still struggling to get the iPhone app to work (it tries to connect to my home wireless instead of the camera in my house, then it won't connect to anything outside of other wireless connections).  Also, some of the hardware is not stainless for the attachments, and they corroded when I took it to the beach.  The camera itself functions good though.

Even though this camera isn't a GoPro, it's a steal for the price. The image stabilization is okay. It just depends on how you hold the camera. I bought a separate stick attachment so that helps with the stabilization. The picture quality is great, especially for an action camera that's 60 bucks! It's not as good as other action cameras such as a GoPro, but it's still good quality. The waterproof case works great. I've taken it underwater multiple times already, and so far, nothing has gotten damaged. Overall, I think it's a great camera to get, especially if you don't want to spend 300 dollars on another action camera. The Akaso does just the trick.

This product is really good, fits my needs and it is really easy to use. I'm just using it for small musical practice recording just for improvement purposes, but nothing really pro.The product is good for the price.

Haven't had any hardcore experience yet but so far it takes good enough photos and videos for the price. At least as good as a iPhone 5. The battery life is about 40 min and it comes with 2 1050mah batteries. The plastic lense on the waterproof case scratches very easy so be extra careful not to wipe it clean with anything other then a soft silk cloth similar to the one provided in the kit, product is packaged very well and it's really easy to use.

For some reason, they don't have a driver for this that allows access to the built-in microphone. Disappointing - bought a separate microphone.Not enough features for my wife - it's little more than a high-resolution camera

Just spent the day with this camera. I can't get the app to work on my iphone, I have the password of1234567890, but it says it can't connect. I need to find a filter for underwater filming, but none the less kids are having a great time taking pics and filing the fish they catch underwater. The video quality is good for us, but we are just having fun not a professional. I would buy it again for the price.

This camera works well to capture pictures and video.  I had trouble getting videos from the iSmart DV app to Google Photos.  After much trial and error and a bit of research, I realized I had to upload videos to Google Drive, not Google Photos.Thanks for the great camera at a practical price!

This camera is the tits. It takes great pics of the giant bass jumping out of their natural habitat and into my boat. All my friends are jealous and want to borrow it for family photos. The battery lasts so long I may just let them. Thanks for a great product in a poor fisherman’s price range. -Steven

I purchased this camera for an upcoming dive trip.  Arrived fast and undamaged.  Easy to set up and test.  Then the coronavirus changed everything.Needing to do remote work, this camera is an AWESOME webcam.  Plug and play in the computer.  Great image, no refresh issues with Zoom, Skype or Webex.
Positives:--Incredible price

This is a good price for such a small action camera. Too many accessories, but it may be great for others. I only wanted to use on my dash in car and that accessories is not available.Buy a memory card, not included.

Overall for the price is was an okay product, i was excited at first when i learned i could use an app to manage my videos.However, after 2 weeks the camera would no longer connect to the app, i am guessing the app was extremely out dated.

This was bought as a Christmas gift for my husband we ride motorcycles, boating, travel, and many adventures. I debated on this and the go pro, this fit our budget and he absolutely loves it. So save yourself the money and get this in my opinion this is the better choice, you're buying quality not a name brand

I was very excited to give this camera as a gift this holiday season. Our friend has the same exact one and showed us how to use it during hunting season. We loved the quality of video and ease of use. Unfortunately when we finally opened ours to use it, there was no sound at all recorded on the videos. We had to return the product because of this, and never got to use it outdoors.We are hopeful that after a full refund we can re-order the same product and have a full functioning camera.

Gave this as a gift to my father, he likes to do science experiments for educational purpose. He records experiments and share them online. This camera proved to be the right choice, not overly expensive and comes with right accessories.

I have just received the camera and have not fully utilized it, so I will add reviews later. The most annoying thing is that I was offered to get promoted for writing Amazon review. They offer you either sd card, batteries or mounts set for the review. And number of reviews for this product was the key factor for me in considering it.

For anyone skeptical on the other reviews saying they had trouble with video lag/ issues along those lines , I'm guessing they did not format the SD card to the camera. When you first insert the sd, it will allow you to record video but will have lots of lag, and only record for a few seconds before clipping it into multiple videos.Format the card, and there's no issues at all.

Ordered this to attach to motorcycle helmet for safety purposes. Fit really well into the clip I got and works well for my intended purpose. Feel a bit safer out there riding since it’s at least on video. Highly recommend this product

I was initially hesitant to buy this item however the price point was worth the try and I am so glad I did. So far the camera is awesome, the kids love it and I find it a handy little tool for 4k quality video at a fraction of the Go-Pro price. I absolutely recommend this for folks who want a affordable means to capture their memories and I look forward to using it for kids sporting events and summer fun!

recently purchased this camera on Amazon I was a little concerned about the quality of the product due to its low price, but when it arrived I was stunned. The camera itself is great and works well within the waterproof housing. I was very surprised at the number of attachments that came with the camera, and plan to use them all in the near future. Additionally, the batteries had some charge right out of the box which doesn't happen too often. It was nice to be able to inbox and use the product immediately. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for a quality action camera

Ok, over 9000 reviews are 4.3 stars? Yeah sign me up for 1/6 the cost of the popular one. You can't hear much with the waterproof case on but you can take it out and use the bracket supplied with the camera. Any I am happy with the 720 60FPS video. Have at it...enjoy

I wanted to buy a good quality camera without spending several hundred dollars for a GoPro. I went with this one because of the reviews and the price, and I am very happy. The camera is very easy to use and the quality is great, and it came with several mounts and accessories that made it even better. The only problem I had with this camera is that the image quality and sound is not as good as other cameras, but that is to be expected because of the price. Overall this camera is fantastic, and I think it is one of the best GoPro alternatives you can buy right now.

At first, I was very skeptical getting a non GoPro camera after having / using a few of the older go pros (Hero , Hero 2 Black, Hero 3 Silver).  However, for the price, this Camera delivered.The Akanso 4k version of filming only shoots in 30fps, so if that bothers you, don't get this camera.  The 1080p shoots in 60fps, and it was more than enough for what we do (car racing, snow sports, motorcycling, rock climbing, snorkeling)

I purchased this camera for a vacation that was cancelled due to the pandemic, but have since used it for several outings with the family and it has worked great.  The picture quality is great and the camera is easy to use, even for my 9 year old who wont put it down.  One of the biggest drawbacks is the sound quality when the camera is in the protective case, but its not really any different than my husbands GoPro.  This is a great camera for someone who is getting into the action camera game.

Video quality is fair in well lit environments only. Photo quality is poor when well lit and extremely poor in dimmer environments . Overcast day caused very poor lighting (usually optimal lighting for photography).

I really like the camera pretty easy to use if you just read through the answers on here. Great picture. The app on the other hand I have had no luck with at all. It works maybe one time after I install it than says the contact the dealer about over heating issues. After you uninstall and reinstall it may work one or two more times than pop up with the same message. I do not care if there may be a recall you should still be able to use the app the camera functions fine. I do not even think the app knows what camera is connected there doesn't seem to be a way to select you device. And it says I am using some 360 degree view camera not the ek7000.

Video quality on every setting sucks. Pics are great if you are inches away. Always blurred video unless very still and inches away in optimal lighting. The case is waterproof at least. Good camera for kid's to tinker with. 8 to 10 year old range.

This was a gift for my 13 year old son.  It was well worth the price for all the attachments it comes with.  Easy for him to navigate and switch out different mounts He’s used to to mount to his bike, helmet, water toys, etc.  We didn’t want to spend the money for go pro brand and this definitely met our needs.

We bought this camera for our daughter because she asked for a GoPro. Decided to start with something less expensive in case she loses interest quickly or breaks it. The picture quality is quite good and the video is okay: definitely higher quality on both than we expected. A great intro camera.

I'm only giving this a 4 star because of the lens. It's small and in close areas distort the image, rounding it like a fish eye lens. But the little camera is good. I'm going to be using it for dash cam for video of a trip and possible posting it on Youtube and it seems to be well suited for that. But if you win any video or photo contest with this camera, it will be because of your skills (and maybe luck...depending on the shot).

My 10 year old daughter bought this camera with her own money, and she absolutely loves it! We sat together to learn how to set it up and use it. All the directions were very clear, and she's on her way to becoming a famous youtuber with this thing ;). It is very user friendly, and its nice that we can upload to the computer and also use the phone app with the camera as well. I am no technology wiz, so for me to understand setting up this camera was crucial. Would definitely buy again!

This product performs very well for it's price point!  I was impressed with the included accessories and the picture quality for such a low price point.  It fits the bill as a second shot camera and does a great job as a mobile action cam.

This is my second action camera I purchased because I really enjoy the product. I have taken this on long distance trips and use it daily in my car as a dashcam. The picture and video quality are great and the battery lasts a long time. I recommend this product to anyone that wants to record special moments in their life! Great quality for the price.

I received this yesterday and although it all looked okay when I unboxed it the image quality is not at all what other reviews stated for video or stills.  My two year old Samsung  s5 shoots better video and pics.  Also the camera freezes when I try to use anything higher than 1080p mode.  I have another sd card on order that will arrive tomorrow in case that is the issue but I don't think that is the problem.  I leave for a trip that I purchased this for in 3 weeks and don't have time to mess around with trying another one.  Most likely I will have to bite the bullet and get a real one from GoPro.

I purchased my AKASO EK7000 on Dec. 29, 2019. I loved everything about it. All the accessories and the wide angle, HD, 4K. The picture is awesome and as good as the GP For a lot less money.Finally had a chance to fire up my replacement after my first one crashed. Everything is back to normal and pleased with the camera. Probably would have got a 5, However to charge you for assistance on their product should be re-thought.

I bought this early for our trip to Hawaii where we plan on swimming with dolphins and sea turtles! I read plenty reviews before purchase. I just received it and adjusted the settings to beat picture/video quality! So far the camera is super clear when turned on! My micro sd card isn’t here so I haven’t seen the actual picture quality but if it looks like the screen does then I’m super impressed! Will be doing a pre-trip water test on the case (it appears to be really secure) and I may come back and update this review after! Definitely happy with my purchase so far!

This camera is really a joy to use. It took me a little while to become totally familiar with how to adjust things...but once you do it becomes easy to do. For the price you cannot beat it. The AKASO EK7000 performs as well as the high-end competition!

I was surprised by this camera, the video looks really good, and the camera is really easy to use. The pics are really nice as well, looks great underwater took to local pool to try it out. Going to be my action cam when I am in Hawii, leave soon. But for the price I do not think you can get a better action camera

So I’m trying to get into making church promo videos at my church so I had to look into buying one of these small cameras I was gonna buy a go pro but it was way to expensive for a high schooler like me so I looked into AKASO and the price looked really good a little to good if you know what I mean but after using it for heavily for a day it’s great the quality is super good I charged the batters and used it right away. We played slip and slide kickball and It was so handy and the shots it took looked soo good. 20/10 for someone wanting to buy one and not spend 300 dollars

For the price I paid, this thing is fantastic!! Picture quality is excellent, beats out my more expensive action cam. Fits all go pro accessories which is nice. Super easy interface to use. Battery life seems to be pretty good as well.

The case filled with water the first 5 minutes we used it. We are hoping it was just a defective case bc the reviews are so great! Reordering today with fingers crossed!- update! The company contacted me and replaced the camera FREE of charge! How cool is that?! We are excited to give it a try again since everyone else raves about it! What great customer service! 5 stars!

This camera is absolutely wonderful. I was looking to get a GoPro and didn't want to spend $400. I couldn't believe when I saw the price.  I thought it was a joke.I was hesitant,  but I was willing to try it.

This is my first go style camera. There are lots of components inside the package that will allow for many mounting scenarios. It looks to be of good quality. The waterproof case appears to be water tight. I'll know more after my off shore trip next month. There is one curious component - a back cover for the waterproof enclosure that has slots for mounting with a strap - the slots of course make the enclosure not water tight. All in all a great value for the price.

It took a little while to figure out how it works and where the manual is, but now that I think of it it's just like my unpacking experience for my go pro camera.  This comes at a fraction of the cost and works well for a similar purpose.  My kids will have loads of fun with this filming his bike ride and swimming adventures.The wifi connection works well and frankly is less cumbersome than the connection process for go pro.

Speechless. We purchased this for the kids to play with in the pool and to our surprise the quality of photos and videos was amazing! So easy to use our 9 year old son can operate it with no issues. We will be taking this with us everywhere now!If you’re second guessing this product... just don’t! It’s worth every penny!

Nice product and considerably cheaper than the competition.  Wish it had a true time-lapse mode.  (Mode works, but display remains on and drains standard battery in <1 hr.  Only real disappointment is that I was hoping for a crisper image in photo mode.  Still, very happy overall. Used in some extreme conditions, (caving & kayaking), without a single failure.
This camera is awesome!! The price can't be beaten!! It came with alot of accessories which in my opinion is a PLUS! Great quality and very easy to manage. Great buy! 💯

I’m so happy with this camera! I bought it to have something to take pictures underwater and it does great. It took a little research to figure out how to set the exposure and some other settings, but once I played around with it the quality of my pictures and videos were outstanding and you can’t beat the price. I really like how I could access the app on my phone and see what I was viewing through the camera on my phone, sometimes it was hard to see how good the quality of the picture or video would be viewing it though the camera as the screen is pretty tiny, but I’m very pleased!

The picture quality is fantastic on this camera. It has a nice wide angle lense that captures a fantastic field of view. The "Burst Photo" option is a nice feature for taking pictures of moving objects. The audio is good for a device of this size.The only con I've had so far is with clip 2. The camera can only point in one direction with this clip making it very limited. All of the other mounts are interchangable and quite versatile.

My son loves this camera. It’s easy for him to use and he is 12. Image clarity is great for the price of the camera. He opted for this over the top name brand camera and he is not disappointed. His YouTube channel will soon be filled with even more action! Thanks for an awesome at an affordable price! We would purchase again. Sturdy construction

I compared this to the GoPro and was skeptical at first.  I can say this was probably the best decision I made as it is just as good if not better than the GoPro at a 3rd of the price or less.  With all the accessories it comes with plus remote, A++!  Why pay for a name(GoPro) when the AKASO is just simply better in my opinion.  A co-worker who owns three GoPro's is now jealous of my AKASO.  Easy to use, just plain EXCELLENT!

This camera is great for the price listed. I am using this camera for my certifications and exams as they request for in-person. The picture quality is great and does not fade away. i was debating to buy the camera reading the initial reviews, but i love the camera..would recommend to buy it to my friends

I purchased this to video and provide lesson for tennis.  The camera is perfect especially with the camera remote to turn the camera on and off when I need.  The only problem I have is the camera turning off after it's been running for a while.  Perhaps its the heat that shuts it off, not sure but this is usually after about 15-20 min of filming nonstop. Overall happy with the product.

I was hoping for a slightly longer battery life, but the fact they give you two batteries is definitely a plus. It's just a matter of remembering to change the battery after 60 minutes of activity. Otherwise, exactly as advertised.

I received this camera as a gift.  I had asked for something like a Go-Pro but less expensive since I didn't know how much I would use it or if I would manage to break it somehow (mountain bike crash perhaps?).  So far I have been pleased with the camera.  I was amazed by all the accessories and that it came with a spare battery. The remote is a nice addition but the strap is uncomfortable and not adaptable to a handlebar.

tested out some features. The battery life is short, it says it's only 90 minutes and it's quite accurate. It may seem troublesome to walk around with this camera plus a lot of extra batteries, but for the price it's worth it and plus the batteries are small as well. This little camera serves it purpose, the video quality is awesome and we purchased an SD card to go with it. It came with a lot of accessories, no explanation on how to use them, but we can figure it out. We are not professionals, but it will serve the purpose of preserving our vacation memories.

bought it because of the decent reviews, not sure if its only mine that was acting up but it wouldn't record anything sometimes, sometimes it would do its own thing and time loop by it self by 10-15 seconds for a few vids then record normally or it would record for 15 seconds and stop recording completely , I tried taking the batt out and putting it back in, it still continued, and the settings wouldn't save at all.

A great video camera, but not the best pictures. I just came back from a trip were I got to try the Akaso EK7000. My comments are: for the price unde $70usd I think is a great video camera, I took great underwater videos and I loved the quality, I did not try the 4k resolution, but the 1080 was just fine. The camera is easy to operate once you start playing with it. As for all the gadgets that come with it, the best is to look for a youtube video on how to use them, as the instructions are not detailed. The cons, the pictures I took were not good, and the video quality in low light conditions is not great. For the price I would recommend it if a sports video camera is what you are looking for

Is a cheap camera with good resolution but it overheat after 5 or more minutes of using, even sometimes the mobil application doesn't connect because the camera is overheated. On the other hand sometimes the button to take pictures from bracelet doesn't work it seems like it no respond when theres a lot of wifi connections near. Anyway it has a good features but it still needs some fixes.

I have had this camera for a day and I am already loving it! It has a great quality waterproof case and a lot of accessories that come with it. You can mount it on a helmet, kayak, go underwater, mount it on a tripod, and other cool things. It would be a little more convenient if the image stabilization was a little better. I also don't really like the mic. It is horrible. I had to buy an external mic to use with it. Overall I would give this camera a 7/10 for this price.

Update:  Akaso went overboard with customer service to make sure that I was satisfied with the camera.  Sent two replacement WP cases to replace the broken one.Nice and small, lightweight with many extras.

I bought this camera as a gift becuase I wanted something similar to a go-pro but more cost effective and I was not disappointed. We compared this to the footage from our go-pro and it was very similar. The design and features are as well and it is an extremely high quality camera. We have used it in the pool as well as traveling. It has been a great camera and I would highly recommend it to anyone!

Amazon states that the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports camera is their choice for “ Go Pro” and I AGREE... this sports camera is well built easy to use and has many of the same functions as a Go Pro has but is a lot less expensive. I dunked it underwater for a few minutes ( maybe 10’ ) and no water leaks and picture quality was amazing..

Very difficult to figure out what parts go to what and what they are used for. If you give them a good review they’ll give you another accessory that you’ll have no idea how to use. NO INSTRUCTION MANUAL INCLUDED. I guess you get what you pay for. I should have checked YouTube before purchasing this. Got it today, returning tomorrow.

EK7000 comes packaged with 90% of what you need.  I would have said 100%, but it does not include a memory card as shipped.  Plenty of adapters for most users.  Easy to get the camera operating and ready to shoot video.  At this price point, if it falls off my track car and is destroyed, I can afford a replacement.  Sorry about the no track video, but I broke the engine last time out.  I am looking forward to using this soon.

The AKASO Action Camera is an amazing camera for doing any outdoor activities. I took some videos with this camera when I went kayaking and I have to say the picture quality was better than I thought. The wide lens allowed me to capture great pictures when I was on the ocean. And the price for this product is much cheaper than any other camera I was searching for with this good quality.

This is my second Akaso (lost the first one over the side after two years)  I am very satisfied with the quality of the videos and the ease of use.  The remote start is essential for starting the camera after getting a fist on the line.  The other biggest selling point for me is the adaptability of all the go pro accessories.  I love this camera and the price fits my budget.  Thanks

I've always been an outdoor guy, and after much research watching youtube videos that compare this camera with the GoPro, I decided to buy it.  I have absolutely no regrets.  The camera delivers astonishing pictures and videos.  The accessories are extremely affordable, and it comes with an array of mounting brackets to include the head mount.  It is well worth the money.  I recommend this product without a doubt.

Worked great for maybe 2 hours of use. I was very impressed to start, but that quickly changed. This camera is complete garbage and I’ve gone through 4 cameras trying to resolve the issue (all 4 have had the same issue). After 2 uses, the screen would go black after turning it on. Save your money and buy a legit GOPRO. The contact I’ve been working with has been helpful and considerate, but in the end I am stuck with a camera that doesn’t work, I missed many trips that I would love to have on film, and spent money shipping my faulty cameras back to the seller.
Video quality is very good at this price point.Battery life is good and it does depend significantly on whether you're shooting in 1080p or 4k.

The sports camera is the best product I have purchased so far this year. The picture quality and ease of use far surpasses the Go-Pro brand. The accessories are interchangeable with Go-pro and with the click n play hand carry device makes moments to capture effortless!Now AKASO is in 4K resolution and demonstrates brilliant picture even in low light settings. I highly recommend purchasing the 32 gig flash card around $8-11 which enables short 60 seconds bursts of action.

Takes nice pictures and video but the battery life has been really really bad.  Even with the two included batteries, I was having trouble keeping the charge on.  Also, even when fully charged, sometimes it won't power on without connecting it to live USB power.  When I connect it to a USB battery pack, it jump starts the camera to turn on, and works.  Also, removing battery and re-seating it will get it to boot.  Simply pressing the power button has been a problem for me.

I use this camera on my my bicycle trips. The image stabilization is pretty good and the 4k videos are a treat. The pack came with all needed accessories to mount on a bike (except for the SD card). For the price you pay, it's more than an awesome deal.

This little camera is great!  Comes with an awesome bundle of accessories (2 batteries, several mounts, wrist remote, etc.).  Takes great photos and videos, clear LCD screen on the back, what more can you ask for?  This is a no brainer when comparing it to a Go Pro...you can get 5-6 of these for the price of 1 GoPro, and the picture and video quality is basically the same.  Highly recommended!

Bought this for my 7 year old son and he absolutely loves it. Easy to use, surprisingly great quality. Seems very durable. It’s exactly what he wanted for far less than the name brand version. We’re very happy with it!

Really pleased as compared to the price for a ‘Brand Name’ such as GoPro.  Went whitewater rafting with a friend and could not tell the difference and the case on the Akaso gave better sound quality after being submerged.  A little fog in the case first use and be warned the arm remote is not waterproof I killed it (but it told me that it was only resistant that’s my fault)! Very happy with this unit!!

Love this little camera. We used it on vacation & the quality was awesome! Only complaint is the remote isn’t waterproof, so you have to hit the main part of the camera to take under water pics. Still like it though!!

Couldn't be happier with this camera.  Bought it for my son's 13 bday.  He uses it to video his hockey tricks for his Instagram page.  Picture quality is just as good if not better than Go Pro at a fraction of the cost.  Highly recommend this camera.
Received wrong wrist remote, Akaso is going to make it right when I bought camera in 2017. EK7000 is a good inexpensive action camera.

I purchased this camera on a chance. It arrived quickly and was just as described.  The camera appears well built and durable. The weather proof case also appears durable.  It comes with a fair amount of extra mounts and other items.  Battery life is great as well.

I bought this camera to use in my inspection business to replace the one on my extension pole. The camera keeps the wifi connection even 35 feet away from the phone. Picture quality is excellent and paring with the phone is easy and fast. For the price this is an excellent camera.

Very good camera for the price point.  Records in 1080P at 60 or 30fps and 4K at 25fps.  Takes 12MP still photos.  Easy to navigate menus.  Removable battery and memory card.  Comes with a load of accessories including a spare battery, waterproof case, wrist remote for pics and video control, and mounts.  Videos record in .mov format so no custom software is required to view.  Has the ability to interface with an app to control camera and video functions, download from the camera, and change some settings.Picture quality degrades in lower light.

This is a good product but the problem I had was the poor battery life.  When it is fully charged, you are lucky to getan hour of recording time.  It comes with two batteries so I am constantly switching out batteries while I am on the road.

So far so good!This is my third attempt and so far the BEST at trying a "Non-GoPro" action camera.  The first two cameras a bought both had issues shortly after purchase. First the Lightdow LD6000's USB port broke and then, my second try, the Lightdow LD-V3 4K FHD would not completely download videos on my computer.  Thankfully Amazon has great customer service and both were returned.  I thought I'd spend a bit more to see if the Akaso EK7000 was any better and it looks like it is!
Great camera for the price.Not too fantastic for night filming.

Great camera, high quality picture. Had to search for some basic set up instructions, but once it was up and running I was blown away by the quality the camera produced. The wide angle made it incredibly useful for shooting sports action as it showed the entire field. The mounting system is a little clunky (too many connectors) but they did their job and kept the camera in place with very little wiggle in the frame.

Bought two of these, one for me and my husband. Great for the price. Arrived on time and as described. Be sure to purchase memory card separately. I’ve always wanted an underwater camera, glad I discovered these.

I didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a Go Pro as my typical usage is very basic. I was looking for a camera just to record outdoor adventures. After looking on amazon I came across this camera AKASA EK7000 and I could not be happier with my choice. Yes it doesn't compare to Go Pro's but for my needs it does just fine. I took some practice videos and photos and they have meet my expectations. I like the app for my iPhone allows you to control the camera from the phone. All in all what a great camera at a great price point.

Seems like it might be an okay camera, but there are a lot of small bits and no instruction manual so we're having to hunt around the internet for articles and videos on how to use.UPDATE: Seller is assisting in locating a manual. Thanks.

Picked this up for my son as a birthday gift (11yrs). I hoped it would be as good as the "bigger brand" and it has not let me down. Quality is great and it comes with a decent amount of accessories. My only concern is the battery cover seems a little wonky but not enough to deter me from recommending the product. If you want to play around with this type of camera but don't wanna drop big $$$ I suggest trying this one.

This little camera is 1 amazing little jawn, if you're thinking about buying 1 don't think just buy it my brother has the GoPro and this by far is superior if not 1,000 times better.  I use this camera down the shore for fishing and capturing the moment of the big catch sometimes I even take pictures of my little cat skeeter.  This camera I threw it in the ocean it's so good it' swam back to me no bs.  I don't have any bad 👎 things to say about it.  Just do it

We bought two of these for our cruise where we scuba diving and snorkeling. These were outstanding!  We used it on water slides, on our scuba dive, and our snorkeling trips. They were very easy to use, and we never had a problem with storage or battery life, even when we had it on 4K settings!  The video came out great (although deep underwater videos have to be color corrected, but that isn’t the fault of the camera).  We couldn’t be happier with our purchase!

The camera is okay. I've had issues with it so far. Some user error and some on the company. The battery was bad so I had to go through customer support several times to remedy the issue. Yesterday, after finally getting a good battery, I went for a short ride and the adhesive failed on the clip side of the helmet mount. It fell off and slid across the road. Case is scratched and ill have to buy a new mount but at least the camera is okay. The app stops your recording if you leave the app too so I didn't even get a recording of it falling off the helmet.

We purchased this as a Christmas gift for our 8 and 10 year old children and couldn't be more pleased with the results.  They have taken this in the water, snow, etc. and thoroughly enjoy the camera.  They are able to upload videos, edit them and post to you tube without issue.  The quality of the video is decent and given what you pay and that the kids tend to be hard on things it was well worth it.  It may not have the name of a go pro, but for what we use it for and the kids and the results it has given I'd recommend this to anyone that would use this in a similar way.

I was really surprised by how well this camera works.  Great quality.  Battery life is a little shorter than hoped but it isn't a deal breaker.  Very good image quality.  Priced surprisingly low for a 4k wifi camera.

I am really impressed with how much camera you can get for such a low price. The picture quality is pretty good and the 1080p 60fps is the sweet spot for me in terms of quality and framerate. I plan on using it to record track days on my car and this camera fits the bill perfectly. It even includes in the box about 10-15 different accessories that can be used to mount the camera to pretty much anything. When you are in low light situations, the picture quality does drop a bit, but for my use case it's still perfectly adequate.

I bought this recently as I started hiking on the trails in my area and wanted to share my adventures. The picture quality is much better than I had anticipated and is very clear. The external case works well and I was able to mount it without an issue. The camera is small and compact but still very powerful.I'm able to record my own voice clearly when I was carrying it, but there was a loss is sound volume for others

For under $60 not more than I could ask for.  Easy to use and set-up.  Just follow the instructions.  Plenty of mounting accessories and mounted right to the GoPro mount installed in my Toyota Tacoma.  Video was great with no noticeable vibration.  For some reason I thought there would be sound but not in this unit that I can find.  No big deal did not buy it for that reason.  Can't wait to mount it to my ATV on my next excursion to the North Georgia Mountains.

The AKASO EK7000 is a solid action camera for beginners. It is easy to use with only a few buttons and many features. I enjoy the wifi capability which allows me to see the direction of my camera if it is clipped on my backpack or my bow, without taking it out of its case. In addition it comes with two batteries which is extremely helpful for the long trips. The image quality is respectable for the price. If you are getting into action cameras like me, this is a great starter camera for anyone on a budget. It comes with a host of attachments as well, which allows for unique mounting.

We just got our camara and are impressed by all of the accessories that come with it. We got two batteries, a charger, a replacement top for the case, the control remote, as well as a ton of different mounts. The only thing I don't see is a mini SD card that I wish came included so we could start using it right away. The camara itself looks very nice and easy to use. The Akaso App also looks pretty good.I will update my review after I get a chance to play around with it some more, but so far, I think this is a great product and you can't beat the price!

This is a nice compact camera that is a great value for the price. It comes with many attachments and a water proof case. So far it has worked very well. You can expect decent quality video and picture. I found the 4K quality to be underwhelming but the 1080 options worked very well. The WIFI app integration is easy to use. If you want to shoot more professional grade then you may want to buy one of their more expensive options with the better 4K rendering capability. Overall I am satisfied and would purchase the camera again.

This little unit is pretty good.  Good quality video for a great price.  You receive a ton of accessories.  I like the WiFi connection to my phone so I can use this as a back-up camera for our travel trailer.  With so many accessories, it's easy to mount the camera on the back of the trailer.  In addition, I can mount the camera on our tow vehicle when I'm hooking up the trailer.  Lots of options.  One downside is sometimes my recordings would get lost.  When I uploaded the videos, I would occasionally get an error message that rendered the recording useless.  Can't figure out how to fix that.  Totally bummed, especially when the DeLorean passed us on the freeway.  I recorded everything only to find out later the file was corrupt.  But overall, for the price and quality of the recordings, it's a good buy.

I got this to mount on my ATV to capture footage while riding and I was very pleased with its quality and build. The remote works great and using the menu is very easy. The footage is a bit shaky but that was expected since I have it attached to my front rack. Overall I'm happy and will be buying more cameras from akaso.

Bought 2 for Christmas gifts. Plastic wrap on both had a perfect flap cut out at the bottom, boxes have obviously been opened.  Will be returning as i am not comfortable giving a gift that is so sketchy.

I was very disappointed... great reviews but it’s not up for the Texas heat. I’ll be recording for 10 minutes or less and it’ll over heat and freeze. It won’t save when it freezes,  so you’ll loose whatever you had recorded.
This camera is great easy to setup and works perfectly! WOWInside the box has many mounting brackets for most any application.

Purchased for 13 year old son. Works perfect. He spent a whole day at a water park making clear videos. Waterproof case worked a treat. Came with lots of accessories (not sure what they are all for). Great value for money. Haven't tried the wireless aspect yet - but so far so good.

The camera works well and I'm pleased with it overall, but a couple of the brackets aren't very useful as they're such a tight fit the camera doesn't sit right, and vibration from a passenger vehicle will work it out of the stand. The batteries charge fast. The camera is tiny, but just weighty enough to feel sturdy which is nice. I've submerged it in the waterproof case and had zero issues with leaking.

I ordered this camera on the recommendation of a friend after coming back from his honeymoon. I myself am going on my honeymoon soon and am eager to have a camera to take video of the excursions i have planned for my trip. From what he has shown me the video quality is great and managing the photos and video through the app is super convenient. I received my package today and was pleasantly surprised with amount of accessories it came with and the detailed easy to follow instructions it came with. There was plenty of different accessories to customize how you want to experience your video recording experience. All in all a good affordable product.

Our 10 year older daughter is fascinated with YouTube, and she wanted a camera that she could use to record more traditional video, but also record in the water.  She has been able to record all of the video she needs, and it has been a great opportunity for us to work together editing and processing the video.  It is the middle of the winter season so we've not been able to test the equipment under water.  The price point is great for our needs.  An entry level, versatile video recording system.

Software is a little flimsy, crashes a lot. Make sure to get the ISmart DV app, it works a little better than the Akaso app to view, but still crashes repeatedly. Downloading a 20 min video was going to take about 1 hour. Price is low, so no regret. Customer service is very good, and offered to refund 6 weeks after i posted 3 stars, so they deserve another star. The product itself was not expected to be a pro, at this price, but it’s ok.

This was intended to be a Father’s Day gift. My family and I were traveling to Hawaii for vacation and I bought the camera for my father. He can’t swim, so he asked me to take it snorkeling with me so he could see all the fish, turtles, etc.The quality of the pictures/videos that I got is awesome! The underwater case worked like a charm! I purchased a $12 mount/handle from Walmart that was waterproof and floated to go with the camera and I honestly can honestly say I like this set up more than the go pros!

This product did not disappoint! We took our AKASO to Costa Rica where we tested it’s limits. Under water, off road in the rain forest and with some crazy unpredictable monkeys. It held up through it all and the quality of the videos and pictures were perfect. Definitely recommend!

I don't have any experience with gopro's so I don't have a reference but this one works great for me. Great video. I get about 23 minutes per charge. The camera gets warm/hot after that time. Not so much that you can't hold it but but I was a little suprised. I like it.
The camera is great value for the price!I bought for my son's birthday. He is loving it!I t's very easy to use and has pretty robust waterproof case.

This camera was an Amazon daily deal that I bought on a whim and I'm glad I did.  I went on a camping trip with friends the next weekend and this little camera did exactly what I'd hoped it would.I do wish they'd included a little more information in the online manual. When I first started charging the camera, a blue light came on. Usually red indicates when something is charging so I would have liked clarification that I was either charging it correctly, or that it was already charged.

I've never used a go pro before, but these things work exactly as I expected them to. Underwater shots were clear, fast moving was easy to follow with no lag, and the quality of the video is amazing. There are some times when the light changes that it takes time to adjust, but it only seems to happen in extremes (really dark to brightly lit). The Wi-Fi functionality is cool, but it's often leggy and unnecessary. Overall, these things are awesome and a fraction of the price of the top brand name.

This camera is absolutely awesome.! I’m not going to lie, I was a little nervous to buy another brand other than GoPro, because of them being so mainstream. But this camera is out of this world. The picture quality is perfect and I went ahead and got the larger SD card so it can keep up with the 4K capability. I can’t wait to take this camera on all of my adventures with my family. Also, the shipping was way faster than anticipated even with all this craziness going on with the corona virus! If I could give more than 5 stars I absolutely would!

This is a very high-quality action camera. The same thing but GoPro brand is $398.99. this product saved me a lot of money and it is very awesome. It comes with 7 mounts, 2 clips, and 2 helmet mounts if your helmet doesn't already have a mount on it, they are extremely sticky stickers in the bottom of the mount and you just stick it on. There is also a little charger box that you plug a phone charger into and you can insert both rechargeable batteries at once and they charge quickly. Great product and its just as good as GoPro brand.

My son wanted a “GoPro” but he is 6 1/2 and had $100 so not gopro for him.  But honestly he doesn’t know the difference and this works just fine for a 6 1/2 year old who thinks he is making YouTube videos

I loved the video on this camera but could not get the audio to sound good...even with the skeleton case. I wasn't expecting high quality audio but it sounded pretty bad. Not sure if I got a bad unit or not but I couldn't get past the bad audio.
This camera is really good for the price,  I check, have basically what we need to start shooting a good video show, I'm using like a WEB camera and is fantastic the quality and the easy to connect.

Bought this specifically for my Toyota Tacoma since they come with a factory GoPro mount installed on the inside of the windshield. The camera angle isn’t as wide as I expected but enough to catch whatever is in the proximity it is facing. I’ve never owned a GoPro and this is the first camera I’ve ever purchased so let that speak for itself. But if I ever was to need/want another camera for my truck I wouldn’t have a problem purchasing another one of these.

The camera its self is ok. But they give you a bunch of free stuff to leave a review. The free stuff had a very toxic, super glue smell. And the camera case is not waterproof. Very short battery life. Made in china.

amazing what you get for the price. tempted to give only 4 stars due to buggy ap. but $50 for something that takes good underwater pictures and video! the ap will eventually do the job you want it to.

You get what you pay for. Works GREAT for the price but it doesnt compare to gopros, at all. Quality is nice but with such a small aperture low light and indoor is VERY POOR quality even at 1080p. I'll def upgrade to a gopro and this will be a backup. Battery doesnt last super long.

Bought this camera a few months ago off Amazon, and for the price, this camera is amazing. While it may not completely measure up to a true GoPro, this is the best bang for your buck. Camera is very light but durable. I have used it under water and outdoors a lot so far for my BoyScout trips. No complaints so far! The screen on the back is extremely convenient and the camera comes with everything you need to get started. While it is debatable whether or not it is "4K", I mean come on, it's $85. Definitely would recommend. Totally worth every penny.

The camera arrived on time and with all parts. Previous reviews warned me it was a bit confusing since there are only 5 small instruction pages. However if you read the reviews and research a little online you can find out everything you need. I did not realize a Micro SD card was not included and thank goodness I started playing around a week before my trip so i have time to get it. I agree, if you are trying to get this for a vacation or an event give yourself plenty of time with the camera first.

Hi, few weeks ago  I got my new Akaso Action camera the EK7000, that I'm very happy with. It is well constructed and I like the picture and video quality. I would like to have a couple of screws a little bit longer to attach to my motorcycle easier but so far it's working really good, easy to set up and operate. The water proof case is easy to install in and out.So, I recommend this camera to anybody, even my wife likes to have one to carry in her purse !!

This is an amazing action camera for the price!! I was debating between purchasing this product vs. a GoPro, but after reading over the reviews for this product I must give it a try for the price!! I’m so glad that I purchased this product because you definitely get so much out of it!! I love hiking and being outdoors, so I tested it out and the quality of the camera was amazing!! It’s also very light and portable, which is exactly what I was looking for!! Highly recommend this product, give it a try!!

this camera seems to be made of a cheap plastic but doesn't matter because of the case in which the camera sits in doesn't feel cheap. feels to the same quality as a real go pro which is nice, picture quality is pretty good and the camera is very easy to set up and use right out of the box. Overall I firmly believe this is one of the best budget action cameras to buy for those starting out in making videos with out spending a fortune.

For the price it’s absolutely worth it! I was surprised the picture quality was excellent. Totally worth getting this instead of a $300 dollar one. The only thing negative I can say is the battery died after an hour of recording. Luckily it comes with 2 batteries. I just have to have one battery on standby for my son soccer games. ⚽️⚽️⚽️

We had been looking at another action video camera to use with the kids and with our Jeep adventures but the price was always a stopping point. We found the AKASO camera on Amazon and figured we would give it a try. The quality is good and the video quality is great, easy to use app for downloading videos. We have been more than satisfied with our purchase and look forward to capturing many more memories with our AKASO camera!

I am changing this one star review to a 5 star review because of the first camera i recieved was defective. I contacted customer service and they had a replacement sent out quick. The new camera works great as described. If you want a good budget camera at a good price with awesome customer service please buy a akaso!

The camera was a bit smaller than I was expecting.  Once I started using it, the setup, picture quality and features arebeyond what I expected.  There are enough mounting accessories for any use.  The remote control is a great feature to start/stop video and snap pictures with ease.  The battery life seems a bit short, my experience is about an hour but on the plus side two batteries are provided along with a dual usb charger.

Great product for the price.  I have used it for some basic testing (walking, riding bike) and have no issues or problems with it.  The video and picture quality has been great.  The product is easy to use and the LCD screen makes filming/photographing much easier.  The app that goes along with this product so far has worked great as well - very simple but effective.  NOTE:  I have never owned an action camera of any type so I cannot compare to other brands or models.  I can say that I have been pleased with this product, performance, and accessories to date and would highly recommend this to anyone looking for an action camera without breaking the bank.

My sons #1 christmas wish list item was a go pro camera, after much reviewing and comparing decided to give the AKASO a try since I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg on a 9 year olds action camera...couldn't very happier with my decision!  Not only does it work great, my son absolutely loves it.  It took a little to figure out (non-tech savvy parents) but once we did my son has been using it daily.  Lots of accessories included, most we haven't tried yet...good quality pictures/video, exactly what son wanted minus the go pro price tag.

I bought this camera to use on my dual sport motorcycle rides. I have had a couple of GoPros that were probably better cameras but did not last very long. This camera fits all my GoPro mounts and comes with a wide variety of mounts also. Video recording is pretty good although possibly not quite as good as the latest GoPro. But for less than $70 and is a winner in my book.

We used this to video manatees underwater. It was an affordable little camera and so we were surprised at how well the pics turned out. I use the images as my wallpaper on my PC screen at work and everyone comments about them and are impressed when I tell them we tool the pictures ourselves. They look professional.

This little camera does basically anything you could ask for if you plan on filming shots that require one of these little go pro-esque devices. I've only used it for personal use and the filming quality, the waterproof case, and the ability to control it from a phone (although somewhat limited) are more than enough features for what I intend to use it for. I can't speak for where this camera lands on a professional scale, but it's great for amateur recording.

This Akaso camera has everything you need to get some amazing video shots. You don't need to to be a video and photo expert to use efficiently this cam. It's very easy to use even in strong sport situations (Kayak, climbing, tuba submarine, moutain-bike, ...) Moreover all the features included, the easy way to use it, the cost has achieved to convince me and now my family is happy to enjoy this amazing product.As I'm convinced by this solution, I recommend you tu use it for your hobbies, holidays and fun moments. You'll get nice souvenirs.

This is my first action camera and I was a bit skeptical due to the affordability of this product when compared to the price of other action cameras (GoPro). I purchased this for my trip to Hawaii and I was incredibly impressed. The video quality I was able to record while snorkeling was exceptional. I've only used this while swimming, so I can not speak to the quality of using it in other situations, but I'm sure it will be just as impressive. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this camera and I look forward to testing it out in other situations.

Got this for my 9yr old to track her adventures. Looks nice and comes with a lot of accessories. Doesn’t come with a mini SD card - you will need a 32GB. Charges fast. Instructions could be better-onlyPictures

The camera comes with a lot of useful accessories. The setup is easy and user-friendly process. The camera works as described in the manual available from the website (make a search with the camera name). The quality of a wide-field images is good to see all details (see attached photo and details of the painted wall outside the picture frame). With the power and memory saving options (I used in the setup) the battery lasts to make a number of video files up to the memory card capacity. The change of a backup battery is easy. I am fully satisfied with this camera.My rate is five stars.

Less risky then GoPro for the price. Comes with much more that you have to buy separately everywhere else. Came fast. Could use some better instructions on how to use the attachments but I’m sure I’ll figure it out.

why spend the $ on branded cameras? video quality is very good and also picture quality, battery life is better than my friends Gopro,  had a little problem with the configuration settings, contact customer support and in no time Sunny was able to solve my problem, will recommend this product to anyone.

I was actually totally surprised at the video quality and ease of use with this device. You cannot beat the price. I would never buy a GoPro after purchasing this! I’ll be buying more for myself and recommend this to everyone.

The camera it self, i would rate a 5 star. The camera case i had moisture getting inside it alittle. The quality of the pictures is good and the videos are good as well. I used this camera for snorkeling and parasailing and i can say i was very please the way the pictures and video came out. Once you figure how to operator it, it works good and easy to function. I would like to get a better waterproof case for it.

I purchased this camera to use in the shelter. As a volunteer I do not have a lot of money to spend, I did not want to spend hundreds of dollars on a camera but wanted a way to document progress with the dogs I am working with. The Akaso ek7000 was just what I was looking for. It arrived earlier than expected. It does not come with the sd card. Installed one I had and charged the batteries and was ready to go. There were quite a few mounts that came with the camera, and I was able to use it right away.

Same day I used it in the water I realized 2 things, pictures came out with water drops because the Lena doesn’t repel immediately and I also got some digging inside the water case which made the videos come out with some blurry spots, wish the sellers would send me a new plastic waterproof case, glad the camera still works.

This is my very first action camera and I love it!! I researched for days all of the less expensive action cameras and this is the one that seemed to have the best reviews. I’ve used it several times already and I absolutely love it. The picture is great. The operation is easy once you’ve learned about it. There are several accessories included. You cannot beat the quality of this camera for the price. I am so pleased and would highly recommend This to anyone looking for a camera on a budget. Enjoy!! I surely am!

This was the first type of camera like this I have ever gotten and it’s a great camera. It is very easy to use and it was very easy to connect to the wifi and get it to connect to my phone. It’s a great camera for beginners and I think the picture quality is really good for the price you’re paying. The only issue I had with this camera was that I couldn’t get one of the screws out of the mount so that I could take the camera off of it. I ended up having to use several screwdrivers until I finally got it off. Otherwise this is a great camera that I will definitely continue to use!

This camera is awesome and worth it for the price. I use it for different outdoors activities such as biking (downhill on trails, through NYC [ALL BOROUGHS], and day to day) and hikes. The resolution is great at 4k but you get more record time when you use a lower resolution (1080p).

So I got this camera a couple days ago and have been running various tests with it to test quality of both build and recording. Immediately upon receiving the package, I was impressed. There was like 15 included hooks, attachments, and extra parts which to me is huge knowing I can take this thing out as soon as possible. Everything seemed to be built well, and I see everything lasting well into the future. When I first bought this camera, I was skeptical yet hopeful. I had really been wanting action camera to record mountain biking, climbing, and skiing but did not want to dish out hundreds of dollars for a Go Pro. After watching my first recorded video which took into account various levels of lighting, distance and close up shots, and varying degrees of motion, I was sold. And each video since this point has been equally impressive. Yes, the company does offer me a free gift for giving this review but I would have put this review up despite this. Take it from me, DO NOT BUY A GO PRO. Buy this camera.

I bought this camera for my boyfriend to mount in his dirt track car. I didn't want to invest in the GoPro in case it were to fall out of the car or get damaged and I'm SO happy I found this camera! It comes with a ton of accessories, including a waterproof case that WORKS! We have ended up using this camera to document lots of our outdoor activities. I'm extremely happy with how this camera is holding up and even happier I didn't have to invest a ridiculous amount of money to get it! I'm not even interested in a GoPro at this point!

this Camera does the job advertised for 100%. with the accessories we receive with it it makes it even better. most of the gadgets are compatible with GO-Pro Camera.-used it with while on my mountain bike, while watching the video again gives back the excitement again

I bought this as a gift for my adventure loving boyfriend. We are both beyond happy with the quality of the camera and accessories. The selection of mounts for the camera gives him a lot of different options for using it while he hikes, kayaks, hunts, skydives etc. It works with his laptop and phone without issue, we even casted to the television to watch with no hiccups.

I broke the integrated case on my GoPro and needed a replacement and I did baulk at their price - Did a search and found the Akaso and thought it can't be any good for the price - How wrong I was! I bought it with a bundle of accessories and we've used it in the pool, on rides at Theme Parks and even on the front mudguard of a motorcycle touring New Zealand - It's been impeccable and the App works perfectly too. I have no regrets in purchasing the Akaso and its really easy to get the videos and photos off the miniSD card on the Mac.

Bought this camera after purchasing a similar one for about $40, this one blew the other one out the water! I was able to capture some amazing moments during my trip to Hawaii and I was happy the camera worked so well!If you are looking for a great value and good quality (and don’t want to pay hundreds for a GoPro), this is the camera for you.

Bought this camera to use on a road trip, hiking/camping trip to Utah. Never tested out the 4K, I only shot in 1080p video and overall I have to say the quality of the video surpassed my expectations especially for the price of the camera. The quality of the pictures that the camera takes you can easily see the difference when comparing to the quality of a GoPro, but for me I just screenshot parts of the videos that I take because the quality of the videos is so clear. I rarely do reviews for items but I was so pleased with the quality of the product that I decided to do a review. Overall if you’re planning on just using this recreationally to get footage it’s a great alternative to the higher priced Big Name Cameras.

Very impressed with this camera, it comes with a ton of accessories and takes great pictures and video for the price. You can download an app to your phone or tablet and control it from there or use the included remote.  It even comes with a battery charger. It has far exceeded our expectations! Great buy!

I got this camera 10 days ago, and it is amazing!! I captured some cool footage when I went to the pool! And, a plus, I figured out that you can do slo-mo if you set the resolution to 720 at 120 fps!! I would definitely recommend this to a friend!

The product was actually surprising with the features that it had but it was not advertised. This thing is the best alternative to not spending a fortune trying to capture activities. I have used it on a golf course and while paddleboarding in the ocean. It has worked flawlessly as far as taking video. The only thing that I can say that might be my ignorance is the sound quality but again it was me using it for the first time for two totally different scenarios. I will happily endorse this product to anyone who is not looking to break the bank for it!

We purchased this for my son as an economical alternative to the more costly small action cameras.  He wanted something small and could be attached to things like a helmet, bike, or scooter.  He has used the included waterproof case and likes that it isn't too bulky on the camera.  We also purchased a small tripod separately and it makes a good combination for recording videos of activities.  All in all, we're happy with the purchase and would recommend to others looking for an alternative to other costly small action cameras.

This is a great little camera for the price. I have used it a little and it has worked well. Comes with a ton of accessories and two batteries!  The remote is also a handy feature to have. For the price, it is tough to beat!

Es mi segunda cámara de acción, la anterior de más alta gama, y tenía muchas ganas de tener una más batallera a la que sacar todo el provecho. La recibí en el día de ayer y aunque la he trasteado poco aún la presentación me ha sorprendido. Naturalmente no puedo esperar que se comporte como una cámara de 150 dólares, pero sin duda tiene unos acabados de primera fila. Viene además con un buen set de accesorios que le dan versatilidad. Otros de los aspectos que para mí ha sido un punto a favor es que es muy ligera, lo que me permite llevarla al practicar ciclismo sin problemas.

We bought the EK7000 for my son’s 15th birthday — he opened it today and was very excited. We unpackaged everything, went through it all (LOTS of mounts), and got the batteries charging — everything worked as expected. The EK7000 looks to be an excellently designed and well crafted product — high quality manufacturing. I will add to this review once we get the camera going and put it through it’s paces — but I’m impressed so far. Don’t forget to order a Micro SD card — the camera does not come with one.

My son loves this camera. He has mounted it on his bike in the rain, on remote control cars, and even on the dog's collar. It's very simple to use and the batteries last a long time before needing recharged.

Sorry for the title. But I just used once! Not two o three times, just once, and it didn’t want to record anymore. Even the buttons didn’t work anymore. I just throwed in the garbage. That’s why the title. Thanks but no thanks... i didn’t expect a GoPro, but come on bro, at least a camera wich last one month....bad product, bad quality..

First off let me say that this action camera is a FANTASTIC camera for the price. I have mounted it to the front of my ATV for taking video of trail rides. I put it in the waterproof case and it endured the snow & mud that we encountered thus far. I have found what works best for my needs is recording video on the 1080p x 60fps settings, with a 32gb micro sd card that I can get about 3 hours of recording time.  The only disappoint I have is the the length of the rechargeable battery life. It didnt seem to last all that long especially in the colder temperatures, however it does come with a second battery so if your willing to change out then your set.. I highly recommended this camera and my friends are convinced it's the camera they will purchase in the near future.

This is my first action camera so I have no expectations of what one should be like or do I have anything to compare it with. However, so far I am enjoying the camera. They sent a bunch of accessories and cool stuff with the camera as well.

this camera out performed way beyond my expectations. We use it sub winging (underwater). Picture is great and battery life is very good! All accessories work like a go pro at a fraction of the price!

"Santa" got this for our 6 year old son for Christmas. Mainly purchased it for its price and what appears to be good durability. Well worth it! All the adults at Christmas ended up playing with it as well. After watching a few YouTube videos, we downloaded the app and can view videos on our phone both as play-back option and live-stream. It also comes with TONS of different attachments and 2 batteries that seem to last quite a while. Great product for the price.

My older adult son bought this and he has had it for about 2 weeks, he loves it and was so impressed by the movie quality, so we decided to get one for our younger son age 12 for Christmas.He also loves it and immediately started making movies it was easy for him to learn to use and was very happy with the picture and video quality..Works just as good as a go pro but with a smaller price tag...

This is a great budget option for those looking to get into 4k action cams. The remote works well, still playing with the optional app. The video is good although I do wish we could get bet that 25fps at 4k. It comes with a really good assortment of mounting options and two batteries so it s a really good starter pack. I ordered two of these and I already have one of their older d40 models.

The action camera is perfect for what I love to do... Catching huge game fish and recording these epic moments.  This camera help me do just that without spending too much money.  Very easy to work with and I love the difference methods of recording.  Great job Asako 👍🏾

Few weeks ago I made a low review on this item because it developed some issues on it. But the BEST thing happened is that when I asked, through e-mail, the Akaso Customer service on my experience with their product, they knowledge it and corrected the issues. This is despite that this order is already beyond the allowed "return date". Kudos to Akaso!NOTE: I only put out 4 stars here (for the time being), but when I receive the replacement item they promised, I will change this for 5 stars since I will be fully satisfied with their Product and SERVICE!

Solidly made product. Easy to navigate around the controls. This is my first camera of this kind so I can't comment on the comparison between this one and GoPro, but I could say that I'm satisfied with the image and video quality. The remote control can be left in a pocket or on a strap that can go on the wrist, quite handy. Comes with a ton of accessories that you can use to put the camera on helmets, bike handles, etc. I don't think there's a chest strap tho, you might need to get one of those to go hand free.
This camera honestly works so well. I am so glad I read other reviews. This camera works just as well if not better than the (overrated, overpriced) GoPro.

This is a quality camera for an affordable price. Much better then spending several hundred dollars on a GoPro. We purchased this camera for our 10 year old daughter. She has enjoyed making fun and adventurous videos. The only problem we had was when she took it into the ocean and lost it. She dropped it when she was playing in the waves and since we had no flotation equipment it was gone. So we had to purchase a second one. So my advice is to make sure you have some type of flotation equipment mounted to the camera before going into the ocean.

I am a youtube content creator and travel with my teens. I purchased this camera to avoid giving my sons my expensive GoPro during action shots on rides and snorkeling and also to have different camera angles for the videos. This camera performed like a charm and you can barely tell the difference between the two cameras in each video. I may purchase one more of these so that both boys have one for their videos when we are separated on our adventures.

Don't pay all that money for gopro!  Everything about this camera is professional and works asesomely.  First time that we used it was on a roller coaster and it was perfect as far as clarity, steadiness, etc....  Worth it!!

Top Notch Affordable Action Camera Even For BeginnersI am not “tech savvy”, so I was apprehensive of using the Akaso EK7000 Ultra HD 4K camera. My fears were misplaced.  It was super easy to set up right out of the box.  The attachment to my full face snorkel was obvious.  The underwater video was superb on my very first dive.  Plus  I downloaded the 9 minute video wirelessly to my iPad in about 10 minutes.  The still photos were also high quality.  The device is rugged and has mounting adaptors that even a person with no common sense could hook to handle bars, dashboard or helmet.  This beauty will be my regular traveling buddy.

Used this camera on a river kayaking trip. Trust me, I tested the water resistance all day. Worked like a champ. Display was kinda hard to see in direct sunlight but manageable. Comes with a whole bunch of accessories that I did not expect. Highly recommend this item.

I did not like the image quality. My iPhone XS is way better quality for video and picture. I bought for vacation and sadly half the videos didn’t turn out as well. Also the app crashes constantly and way more difficult app to use and view pics then the GoPro.
