Invest in the better action camera.UPDATE: I bumped this up to 3 stars after their customer service reached out and offered me a replacement or refund. Their customer service rep was very friendly.
This camera has high quality high resolution images and videos. It is very portable and easy to navigate through the modes. Wish it came with a carrying case, but for the price it is a good value.

I work with a sailing charter company and bought the Akaso action camera to take videos and photos while on and in the water, mostly seas and saltwater bays and beaches. And I'm not the only one to get the camera-3 charter clients had the same one! The product description is accurate. The features and quality are comparable to higher priced products, and I got great, useful gear. All of which is compact, easy to use and truly waterproof. I do remove the camera from the case and air dry it. I also use dialectic grease on the cases metal screw fixtures because they did show slight corrosion. If the case doesn't fair well, I will ask for a replacement. All fixtures should be stainless steal. Regardless I am pleased with my purchase and have recommended and showed it off plenty.
There was a small problem with the camera but Rebecca was quick to help. Very good customer service!

Update: Akaso reached out and replaced the camera with the newer V50 model.  I have used it several times and it appears to be better constructed and held up to the it the few uses that we have put it through to this point.  It always nice to have a manufacture respond and try to improve the experience of the users of their equipment.The video quality is acceptable, and the camera is easy enough to use.  On mine the down button sunk into the camera making it impossible to press the button.  This occurred after about four or five uses of the camera. Losing the ability to use the down button means that you can no longer access the Wi-Fi mode. Without Wi-Fi mode you cannot set the time on the camera, nor can you take advantage of the phone app.  Know that you are not purchasing a device with a high build quality.  You are getting exactly what you paid for, a disposable low end action camera, it is not built to last.

Great little camera so far.  I have had a GoPro before and this camera is not quite as nice structurally but it is comparable and at a fraction of the price. I will probably be purchasing a second in the near future.Pros

Video is decent. Audio is terrible, even with no case on it. Battery life is sub par, but it does come with 2 batteries. Basically, if you use it for video only and don't need the audio, it will be fine. If you want audio that can heard, don't buy it. I have to turn the audio all the way to max and can still barely hear what was recorded.

Got the camera and dowloaded their APP in 4 different types of phones and it would not work no matter what type of phone I used with their "WiFi". So I bought a SD card reader and all the files were corrupt. Reformatted the card and retook pictures, same problem. Called for support. They don't have any. I was requested to email them about my problems and they would email back their solution in a couple of days!? Call Amazon and their response it to return it. Great now I am crunched for time, out money for days, and no camera for my vacation.

For the price, you can't go wrong.  Limited, but simple functionality, along with great quality images...and lots of accessories if you opt to buy the Luxebell Accessories Kit.I would have ranked this item as 5-star, but received a unit with a remote that does not work.  Since this company only sells through Amazon, it is difficult to get information and support.

This is a great camera, especially at this price. My daughter wanted something she could carry around and use as a POV camera for the videos she makes with her friends. She is really into contortion and gymnastics, so she needed something that could keep up with her. This camera does an amazing job at what she needs it to do. We compared it with a friend's GoPro camera in the same activities and this camera was the clear winner.

I personally really enjoy this camera. I bought it to record some of my daily work while operating heavy machinery. The stabilization and image quality are fantastic for the price. You truly can not go wrong with this camera. I encourage anyone who is on the fence about purchasing this camera to go for it. You wont regret it.

For everything that I have used so far, it has been a wonderful camera! The quality is great and I find the app to be interesting to use at times! The sounds quality is pretty good and the image quality is great! My only complaint is that one of my clips came broken but other than that, great camera for the price!
I was impressed with the quality of this small camera! I went skiing and hiking; the quality of  the images was remarkable. Another thing I was impressed with is the length of the battery life.

I just started using it today. At first I could navigate the menu fine, able to select 4K (which isn't even 30 fps). I was going to try recording for the first time in my car, connected to wifi and guess what? I'm unable to select other resolutions. This part of the menu is stuck on 1080p 30 and won't change either in the app or on the camera's menu itself. I disconnected from wifi and even took out the battery for 30s to see if once I put it back and turn it on, it'll be back to normal. No success, still stuck. I did a reset and still stuck. I think you guys need to come up with a firmware update asap or I'm getting a refund!

I purchased this camera and exchanged it for a new one because it was damaged. The replacement I received was damaged, as well. It is usable by the app, but there is a button that does not work on the camera itself.

Easy to use and great quality.One issue was getting the manual that contained the password for connecting to the camera through WiFi.  I sent in a request and Akaso helped me within hours of receiving the camera.  Thanks Akaso!

Great product, great videos, great quality, for the price - it is amazing! My husband uses this while he goes fishing and has it mounted on his boat. I enjoy watching his trips! You do need at least 2 batteries if you want to get all the footage. I think on 1 battery he gets about 1.5 hours of footage. !!

This product was very easy to use right from the start.  I was able to find detailed directions on YouTube.  I can not believe all of the attachments that come with the camera.  I have been waiting for a low cost, high quality camera comparable to the GoPro.  I think this one is a great choice and so far i am impressed with both the quality of the video and photographs it takes. I really like having the remote control to be able to just strap it on and then start the video or take a pictures.  I think the quality of the camera and case are sturdy and well built. Overall, I am happy with my purchase and look forward to capturing many moments with it.

Had another brand of similar type of camera near the same price point.  Needed a new one for an upcoming trip.  This one comes with a boatload of mounts and accessories.  The best?  The remote!!!!!!!!!  The others don't all offer this.  This is a key accessory.  With camera mounter to helmet, handlebars, etc., it's a snap to start / stop video or take pics.  Easy to connect w app via wifi from phone for full access to camera memory.  So far so good.  Got a zipline trip  ahead - plan an strapping this to the helmet for some great video!
Great for up close shots of my tattooing.

As a camera that performed as I would expect however the waterproof case had a broken tab the instructions were horrible and after I figured it out the phone app constantly crashed and never did work you would have to go through a lot of effort to display a video on your TV considering the connection process to be fair there was lots of accessories which was good and the camera itself performs as expected

I was not on the look out for action cameras, as I’m already completely satisfied with my phone’s camera most of the time. But I couldn’t pass up when this unit went on sale and just had to grab the chance to try and own one. I have to say I did not regret the purchase. From the initial experience, I think this could easily rival other top-tier action cameras in all aspects. Not to say that the accessories are also complete, and if you wish to get more, you can do so at still a much better bargain that the competitors. Money well spent! 👌

I was very hesitant in ordering this as you never know what you're going to get. I'm very pleased with the quality of the picture and the accessories and mounts! comes with two batteries and a slew of mounting options including a waterproof one. Love the app on Google play as well. Nice to have a remote to start it too. I'd recommend everyone who is teetering between ordering this and another brand to give it a shot.

My husband and I bought this for our cruise to take on our snorkeling excursion. Best thing we bought without paying a fortune. The instructions are simple to follow and the app worked perfectly. I’ve attached a video I took with this.

Bought the camera for my husband to take for his ride in a vinatage airplane since I didn't want him to use his phone.  It worked great!  Although new to tech gadgets other than our phones, the camera was simple to set up.  There were lots of parts and pieces and there was a sheet of graphics to identify these.  The remote control made operating the camera very easy.  We look forward to using it often.  And the price isn't bad.  I plan to get one for each grandkid this Christmas.  They'll have so much fun with all their activities!

I bought this camera as a last-minute idea to take with me to document a missions trip. Because it was last minute, the memory card was coming separately and after I would be leaving for the airport. So, I stopped at a well-known store to get help and buy a memory card. He was so impressed with my ASAKO camera and wanted to know where I got it! I felt like quite the smart shopper!I also have really enjoyed using it. My only wish is that it had a way for me to zoom in.
Bought to take on cruise. Picture quality is good. I had my trip cut short & didn’t get to test it in the water. I do have lots of beautiful pics.Great little camera with a nice price point.

I purchased this for a vacation trip. While that trip is still a month away i was excited to use it and get familiar with the camera before the vacation. I have found that it exceeds my expectations. It is a great price point and i sm happy with it. It comes with several accessories that i think will certainly come in handy. The picture and video quality are much better than what i had expected. It doesnt do quite as well in low light but i am still pleased with it.
Great quality camera, especially compared to the GoPro price tag. Perfect for using with my bike or on the river or lake. Can't wait to try it out for other uses like in the car/around the house.

I love the AKASO EK7000. I took it on my ski trip to Whiteface Mountain in NY, and got some awesome videos on the slopes. I was pleasantly surprised by the camera quality and would highly recommend for any type of skiing. I also took it on my trip to Florida and went under water with the camera. The hardware held up very nicely and having the extra battery in my beach bag was super convenient. I LOVE the camera.

i got thia back in december 2016. got it for christmas. i know ita been a while since i got it and i havent wrote a review but.. i put this camera through some serious tests. sadly, for three months i couldent use it on my helmet due to a motorcycle accident. but: once i got my bike back this little guy went on my helmet again. i have a go pro that i spent alot on. this camera does a better job then go pro!!! it has tons of capabilities. it has crystal clear video and has a speaker too built in. the little speaker doesnt sound all that good on the camera but it gets the job done.and let me tell you, customer service?!?! maaaannn, its amazing! these guys want to make sure thr customer is happy. my battery died after having it for almost 7 months. i reached out to these guys and got an immideate response and got two batterys with a docking charging station! shipped for free! i havent delt with a company that wants to make sure people are happy.

I got this for my 15 year old son.  He got it working in no time.  He says it’s easy to use and takes good pictures.  I’m not worried about him breaking it because the price is right.  He is looking forward to using it on our next island vacation. (If that’s ever allowed again😳)

UPDATE: after getting in touch with me. The customer support rep sent me a new replacement for the camera. It works as a charm now. Satisfied with the product as well as prompt customer service.We bought the camera for our trip to Florida and was hoping to get a good use out of it. It was a cheaper alternative to getting a GoPro, but that being said. Cheaper products are not necessarily always a good thing. The side button on this thing broke on our very first use. It might have been the water-logged casing it came with or just the overall quality of it. But really disappointed with it. It would have been better to invest on a better quality product than this.
Edit.They are sending us a new one to replace the one that did not work. We will try again. It may have been just one bad apple in the bunch. More later after we use it.

This is the worst action camera I could've purchased. I bought this a few days before my family vacation and it constantly kept turning off ever few minutes. I missed key moments of my family's life because I chose not spend additional money on a more quality camera.It got even worst I went on a sight seeing adventure and got up close to bears with my camera turned on and a few secs later the camera continue to turn off. I ended up using my phone to take pictures for the rest of both trips. I'm highly disappointed and I do not think I would recommend this camera to anyone.

As soon as I Received the product I began to test it , I use this camera for my Motorcycle for insurance purposes. The amount of accessories it comes with is more than should , its a great deal for this camera which has a 1080p 120fps recording option or for myself who wants to record more than 5 hours on a 32gb MicroSD card using the 720 60fps option. It comes with 2 batteries which is way more than enough for a full day of extensive use riding and catching the scenery. Would recommend for Bikers and or Hikers.

I am having issues with this camera out of the box: It freezes 9 out of 10 times when recording. There is no other way to reset other than taking the battery out. It is not practical when you are snorkeling. The only way around this is to keep filming without every pausing/stopping. Not sure what to do. I will use another set of cards to check if the card is the culprit but this is a fast card that I use on other cameras filming at higher resolution and frame rate combination. Chances are I will end up returning this camera if it keeps failing/freezing during normal usage.

Reasonably priced action camera. The SD card makes a difference.  4k video requires a name.brand high speed card. The instructions are a bit turbid but understandable. Barely opened the box and began playing with it but so far all is well. Video and images seem grainybhut I'm attributing the images to the lighting and the video to the cheap sd card

I ordered one of these a while ago and had a couple issues and returned it before giving the company any time to troubleshoot the issues.  I probably jumped the gun, as I came around and ordered another one to give it another chance.  I addressed the settings I was not aware of the first time around and I have not had any issues with this one.

Wow! This little workhorse camera is well worth the price. I ordered a few extra batteries because I like to stay out on the trail all day. The accessories are plenty to get started. Hooked it up to my full face snorkel with ease. Several tutorials on YouTube that go in depth to get you started on the fast track.

We purchased two EK7000 4K cameras for our teenage sons.  I was excited to find this product because we would have only been able to purchase one GoPro.  These cameras are terrific!  The video quality is clear.  In fact, when my boys compared their AKASO footage (set at 1080 p) to the footage of their friend's GoPro (set at 720p), they liked the AKASO Clarity and color quality better.  We were extremelymely pleased with all of the attachments, too.  I had never heard of this brand, but I'm glad we decided to give it a try.  Five stars!

We got this for our daughter for her 11th birthday. She absolutely loves it. It came with lots of accessories. She can attach it to her wrist. The picture quality is pretty good. I’d buy this over and over before a GoPro.

Awesome little device. Does everything I need to record our biking and hiking trips. Also used it as a dash cam and even a pseudo-body cam. I was able to reformat a 64Gb microSD card with it that I had lying around and it works perfectly. So, the 32Gb limit in the manual can be ignored...at least for 64Gb. Loving this thing so far!

Been using this since I got it and man it's super fun for me and my little brother. I'll mostly use it as a camera mounted to my helmet for when I want to go off road or just for commuting. I would like it if the 4k had 30fps or 60fps, however I still like the quility of the 4k and the 1080 60fps.

This camera was a little difficult to set up but once I downloaded the correct apps (akaso dv and smart dv) it was easy to operate and understand. We took it skiing and it withstood blowing snow guns with no problems. Camera was stable even through the terrain park. Would purchase again.

I just received my Sports Action Camera today. And I need to share my first thoughts. When I saw the box I was greatly surprised because it was a very nice box. Then, I opened it and BOOM!!! I found the small camera with a bunch of accessories and this is really really great. The camera comes with 2 batteries and some other things that I am still discovering, but I can assure you that I am very happy with my purchase. This is my first action camera and I think I am all set to get it on my bike and make some good videos.

Half of my video’s are corrupt & my engagement videos are forever gone. The videos it does manage to capture includes time stamp in the left top corner that you’ll have to edit out by cropping screen to a smaller size. Otherwise, it’s a good throwaway to have if you don’t want to expose your more expensive camera to potential damage. You get what you pay for. Plus side, you get plenty of accessories with it, which was awesome.

Bought this camera as a last-minute purchase for our family trip to Jamaica which included scuba certification for several of us.  Camera was easy to strap around our wrist and was able to take some great pictures and videos at our depth of 40 feet.We are not hard-core photographers and have not used other similar products to have anything to compare it to, but we sure were glad to have it to document our wonderful memories.

Bought this camera to get some cool shots on my ocean swims with the local sea lions that swim around, and to capture some clips for a friend's music video, our in the ocean water. Loving what this camera has to offer and how compact it is. Great Buy!

What a great surprise in very attractive price range. I owned go pro. Before and used for many adventure trip but this little jam stand up to go pro. I am very pleased with it and planning to buy this camera for all my employees for Christmas gift.Highly recommend.

For the price of this camera, the videos and the pics are very good. It was a little weird that the bases are completely flat. I thought it would has a little bend for to stick in the helmet. Another thing, the video files are .mov, it's too big. The video files should be .mp4, smalls, easy to upload in the cloud.

Great camera! This is the second one I'm buying. Very happy with it. Picture is great and battery life surpasses the GoPros I have I have replaced both of my GoPros with these cameras. Wish I would've got it from the beginning rather than having to spend all this money on GoPros. Anyways, great camera! A++

I bought this for a trip to Oahu specifically to use when snorkeling. The waterproof case that was included with the camera worked perfectly. No leaks, no issues. I've never used a camera like this so I can't compare but the picture and video quality seems very good. The camera was easy to set up and use. I'm very happy with my purchase!

I needed something cheap I could bang around and possibly break. After some frustration with the initial setup (the app required that I disable mobile data to use my phone as a monitor) it ended up working really well for how much I paid. I'll be honest, I have absolutely zero idea what 80% of the stuff that came in the box is supposed to help attach it to anything. Video quality is excellent for the price. I've attached this thing to a drone, a rifle, and an extremely tall friend and it functioned flawlessly across all applications.

I got this to try a re-create a youtube video where a squirrel steals a go-pro. Since I wasn't willing to drop $200 to amuse myself while stuck at home, this product was perfect! It also comes with a crazy number of mounts. Like, I have no idea what I would ever do with all of these mounts, but it's cool they have so many options. Highly recommend this product if you're looking to endanger a camera without feeling too guilty about how much you spent if it all goes wrong.

My first time using EK7000, and I can confidently say this is what I have been looking for!! Best quality, clear. 4k!! And can be controlled using your phone. The product is the best. I am that person who reads review before deciding what to buy. I felt for EK7000 and I am very much contended. Worth my money. I recommend this to anyone looking for an action camera!

You get what you pay for, the waterproof case leaks. We used it at the beach in waste deep water to try and film underwater the case quickly filled up with water near the lense and now the camera, if it turns on, gets really hot and shuts off within a couple of minutes

I love this product, brings lots of extras and it does the job just perfectly fine. The picture quality it’s great too. I used it on my helmet and was really satisfied. I would recommend this product to anyone.

For the money there should be no complaints with this camera. The video quality is very good, the audio quality is decent (for those complaing about the sound while in the waterproof case, they need to replace the backdoor with the vented one), and the accessories that come with it are very versatile. In 4k the video is slightly choppy (could be because I'm viewing on a 1080p screen), but other then that everything else is great. I'm using a 64GB Sandisk Class 10. I do wish the waterproof housing was designed in a way to protect the lens portion (currently is flat and can be scratched if dropped), but replacement cases are less then $15 so it's not a big deal.

I was browsing to purchase a small, compact, water proof camera for my family and I. Got lucked out and came across this camera. We often go fishing and camping by the river. I always like to take pictures for our memories. As you can imagine, walking down the river while holding our fishing poles and trying to take pictures at the same time can be tough also risking dropping the phone in the river. So this camera is perfect! Takes great pictures and water proof, best of all has all the accessories you need to have the best experience.

Tested it out and the kids love the camera already!  Originally, I was going to buy the more expensive GoPro model, but when I saw that over 300, I went to look around for another brand for kids.  Glad I found this brand.  Great value for 1/4 to 1/5 the price!Already charging it again (includes the charger and 2 batteries!) as I used it all day long.
Compared it to a GoPro and it has almost all the features for a LOT LESS $$$!The quality seems to be excellent although I haven't gotten the SD card to give it a good try.

Got this as a gift for my cousin that is in China with her high-school senior class and she loves it.  The pictures she has uploaded look amazing, crisp, clear, sharp, and with incredible color saturation.  She loves the LCD screen, it is genius, it makes it really easy for her to take pictures and the chest harness that we bought her separately lets her share the experience with us without distracting her from taking it all-in in real life.

I have had a $200 GoPro before and I wanted to start recording some things again but didn't have a ton of money to spend on a camera... The picture quality and sound quality is great on this guy and I am happy to be shooting some great videos again...

A great action camera that comes with all the necessities. Wifi and wrist remote controls are amazing. Great resolution on still pictures and video, even at 1080p. 4k mode is fantastic. All around great camera.

At first this worked really well, but after a few weeks of use, the camera locks up when powered up and sticks on the start up logo and will not go to the camera screen.  The battery for the camera needs to be removed, reinstalled then powered back on for it to work.  Not something you want to do when you are already in the water snorkeling!  If the return window hadn't passed while I was on vacation, I would return this.

Ive never owned a camera like this before, so I don't really have anything to compare it with but I LOVE the camera.  Especially for the price.  I purchased this right before Summer because we had a few trips I really wanted to use a multi-purpose/ underwater camera with.  Great quality video.  The waterproof box works great.  Unfortunately, I had taken the remote snorkeling with us and ruined the remote  (NOTE: remote is "water resistant" NOT waterproof.  Which is clearly stated in the instructions.  I'm just an idiot).  I contacted  Akaso customer service and they worked with me to replace my remote.  They were super easy to deal with and attentive.  I would absolutely buy this camera again.

I am planning a vacation cruise this coming summer and wanted an action camera to document my travel.  After exploring the numerous options, I decided on the Akaso EK7000.  The economical price of this camera compared to others is what initially caught my attention.  The numerous features and included accessories are what closed the deal for me.After having a chance to use and explore what this camera can do, I am very satisfied with the video and picture quality.  It would be nice if there was an option to using an external microphone.  All in all, I am very satisfied with this  camera and look forward to using it on my future trip.

I received this product and when I turned it on, it had two very noticeable black spots on the screen that wouldn't go away. I tried cleaning the screen and lense multiple times, but the dots wouldn't go away-seem to be dead areas on view screen.  Then I couldn't get the camera to connect to my wifi for the life of me to stream to my phone-No matter what I did! And yes my wifi was working! Severely disappointed and will be returning the camera.

This action camera is great!  I wanted a GoPro, but didn't want to spend over $400 so I thought I would give this a try.  This little camera is well made and performs very well for the price.  We have used it in the pool several times now and had no problems at all.  Comes with many accessories and is easy to use.  Battery life isn't very long, but that is to be expected in such a small camera.  The app that goes along with it for android works fine, a little buggy, but gets the job done.  I have recommended this camera to all of my friends because it works so well and costs so little.

this was a gift for my son and he has been enjoying it very much because it works great and has many accessories to use in different ways.  The remote control is a hit because allows him to start recording without holding the camera

Works amazing! We bought one for our honeymoon cruise and we love it. The camera takes great pictures, the plastic casing works great not one drop of moisture inside. All the attachments are cool too. If using underwater though I would recommend getting a red filter, one thing that didn't come in the pack that we probably could have used but pictures were still good just really blue. Really recommend especially if you don't want to spend the high price for a gopro

Very good camera. I was a bit skeptical about the quality for such a low price but it works well and is very comparable to the other well known big namePro camera. I haven't used it on my motorcycle yet, which is why I purchased it but for videos I have taken it's done a great job. For some reason it breaks up longer videos into shorter multiple videos. Not sure it's the camera or using a 64G sd card

Way over sharpened video with no apparent way to reduce it. Okay for a junk camera but no way near a GoPro in quality. If I could reduce the sharpening I might rate this better.Update: Great customer service. They sent me a new one for free and seems to be a little better.

Love it so far. Even took it with me for a test ride on my motorcycle and caught my first crash video when I wiped out in mud. Impressive resolution, and the interface has been fairly intuitive.  Got the extended protection plan through Amazon, we'll see how it holds up over time.

The audio leaves a lot to be desired. It's not super clear and sounds a little distant. The water proof box eliminates sound which is natural do to the box you put it in, but I would like to hear the burbling sound of water. For the price though, it's not bad.

I have never used any of these type of cameras before, I bought it to record my daughters softball games and practices. It worked really well for the low price and very easy to use.I did buy a 256gb memory card for it and seemed to have trouble using that. It wouldn’t record for more than 5-10 min, it also would show a memory card error. I then jumped down to a 128gb mem card and it worked and recorded very well. The sound was very faint unless you were standing next to it.

After doing some homework, reading the reviews and having experience with the GoPro, I opted for the Akaso. I am very pleased with the purchase and the capabilities of this action camera. It more than meets my expectations and is comparable to the GoPro on all fronts. Excellent product and an amazing price. Set up was simple as well as connecting the wifi to the app on my iPhone 7. It comes with a good variety of accessories, and additional accessories are cheap and easy to get. Great product all around. I would purchase this again and would definitely recommend it to anyone who is in the market for an action camera.

This camera is such a great alternative to GoPro.  I don't like buying mainstream stuff but the problem with doing that is sometimes you get bad quality stuff.  This is far from that, it's a great price and still made well.  I would recommend this to anyone who is looking at buying a GoPro, so instead of spending $300+  spend $50 and be just a pleased with the quality!

I bough this for my husband for Christmas and it was the best investment! He has brought this with on every vacation. It has captured hiking, paddle boarding, kayaking zip lining and all of our outdoor adventures. The quality is amazing. Way better than expected and much better than a cell phone. Definitely recommend

I like the size and weight of camera. I found it confusing with all the accessories included but no information what they are used for. YouTube helped a lot so that's what I would suggest. No manuals are includedGoing on a long trip so hopefully I will be seasoned in the use.  I would buy this again

Disappointed.  Luckily my first use was my most important water tour with mantarays but when I tried to use this after that, it was constantly getting cloudy with moisture inside, on the lens.  I can't use it anymore.

Bought this so my 7 year old has a "GoPro" on his motorcycle like daddy and believe it or not the thing has good battery life, sound and video are good quality, came with lots of mounts and the remote worked flawlessly.I'll update though if it only works a few times... I'm like that.

I have a friend who has this camera so I ask for her link and now that I  have mine in my hands it's just what like hers and just as it was described in the listing! everything was packaged for maximum safety of the device I can really appreciate that attention to detail!

I bought this camera for my son and it turned out to be really good. It says it has 4K quality but it only went up to 1080p but it still looked like it was 4K. The battery lasted pretty long and it also didn't take much time to charge. I love all the accessories. I also found it very useful to have an extra battery. Something else that I love about it is that it comes with a remote and wifi. Also with the instructions you get a card giving you the choice to either claim an sd card, extra batteries and charger, or an accessory bundle. I found that very cool. The recording quality is not 4K as it said but it is still very good with 1080P. The picture quality is VERY GOOD. I will leave a picture taken by my camera down below.

Great little camera. I bought it and use it to record and take pictures while riding my ATV, the case seems very waterproof and durable. The picture quality is great as well. No need to spend hundreds on other cameras this one will not steer you wrong!

Got this for my son for Christmas to video his bike trips. Picture and sound is just as good as my GoPro 4. People complain about the sound quality when inside the case, but what do they expect, the mic is INSIDE a plastic box. Lol. Great starter for kids and teens if you're worried about them breaking the expensive brands or they're rough on stuff.

Everything worked great 80% of the time. The video quality was great when it worked but It seemed to freeze intermittantly when switching from standby mode to video mode. The only way to unfreeze camera was to to pull the battery out. I used this to scuba dive and to un freeze the camera as u can imagine in the water with wet hands while floating on the surface was extremely inconvenient (impossible). I missed some great footage. I'm going to be sending it back and getting a Gopro.

This action camera comes with every accessory you can imagine.  Everything is very solid and works as advertised.  I use the camera on my road bike and can get 2 hours of use on one battery and the video quality is perfect.  I get about 4 hours of video on one 32GB micro SD  card.  I highly recommend this camera and other Akaso products because I haven't been disappointed yet.

My 8 year old son saved up his money for this-I was super skeptical and afraid he’d be disappointed... nope!! It’s been in the bathtub, strapped to his mountain bike, and on his go-kart... does a great job and he’s in love with it!
Really really poor camera and sound quality. Waste of money to be honest. Bought to record vacation memories and aircraft takeoffs and landings. The sound quality is the worst.

Update: I received a replacement after my first one had a lens problem and this one is what I was expecting from the beginning. Great action camera for the price. Customer service was exceptional. Happy with my purchase.

Just got it and have been messing around. Picture quality is amazing and has been very user friendly in figuring out. For what we needed guidance on we found easily through the online manual. The app to download is as user friendly and is very helpful. It allows full control of the camera as well as the settings! Can't wait to use it for the first time! Will it be my husband on his pontoon or me on my paddle board!? With all the included accessories for mounting makes that easy as well!

I got this product yesterday and already  love it. Really great video and picture quality. Super easy to use the Wi-Fi feature and also easy to set up.The battery lasts long and the package come with everything it needs and more so good quality for the price. I recommend 1080p @60 FPS settings. I cant wait to start my adventure and capture the amazing moments.

Comes with every attachment needed to get the best pictures.  I have not used this underwater yet. Only issue is the tab for battery case (battery cover) and sd card is not anchored to camera so i feel like i will eventually lose it
Cool size and cool price. Not the best picture tho.Updated Review:

This is my first time owning an action camera, I originally started looking at Gopros but was not a fan of the price for a first time camera. So I went on Amazon and came across this one. Overall all I am pleased with this camera and you cannot beat the price. I was a little skeptical because of how inexpensive it was but to be honest it gets the job done. The camera and case are very sturdy and set up wasn't difficult at all. Only negative I came across was the battery life and the sound quality could be a bit better but that was not a deal breaker for me. I will definitely be ordering more.

Love the video quality of the camera. Fairly easy to setup and use. Jury still out on the WiFi portion. Only addition I would like to see is a zoom feature. Battery door could be designed a little better. I could see where it might break after multiple uses . Otherwise great value for the cost.

Not 4k in any way.  Only has the option for 1080p and 720p. Though it says 4k all over it.That said,  it's  full hd cam that's got ease of use and great picture. Just don't expect anything above 1080p30fps

Can't go wrong with the action camera.  The high number of reviews and stars speak for themselves.  It is a great camera.  1080P on 60 fps shoot great video.  The waterproof case works well also.  Can't recommend this camera enough.

Small, simple, easy to use with a ton of accessories. If you're like me, and not sure how much you'll truly use an action camera as such, this is a great starting point.  From what I've tried thus far, good picture quality, the case appears watertight, and everything was included.  Does require a MicroSD card FYI, which is not included.

Just arrived and so far it’s more than I expected for the price. The manual is a bit tricky to navigate but I managed. I like the IOS app accompaniment and real-time WiFi connection.I can’t wait to test it out underwater and on my bike.

This is the best bang for your buck action camera you can get! I use it for motorcycle rides to document and just keep everyone else on the road honest! Battery life is great and mounts on and off without ease

A gift for my daughter. She installed it on her kayak at the start of her vacation kayaking through a chain of lakes. She found it easy to use and was extremely pleased with the quality. I was extremely pleased with the value. She has several top of the line cameras, but this is the first one that is waterproof. She found the AKASO EK7000 to be a  great addition to her photography tools.
Although I had issues with this model, there customer support is outstanding, for this alone they deserve five stars, in the meantime I'm trying their pro model and will update.

We have vacationed and done many activities that would benefit from an action camera like snorkeling, zip lining, parasailing, etc. However, we didn't have one and were nervous to take our phones with us for fear they would be lost, broken or stolen, so we sadly missed out on capturing many of those experiences. This product is perfect for what we needed! It takes great quality photo and video and can pretty much be taken anywhere and comes with accessories to safely mount. The best part is if something were to unfortunately happen to it while we are traveling we aren't out much money and they are so affordable everyone can have one to record their own experience.

This is a great action camera for the price. Pretty easy to set up also. I formatted my sd card and started taking videos right away. My Chromebook accepts a micro sd card so it was very easy to pop it out of the camera and into my chromebook to view my videos. Lots of accessories come with the camera and my daughter is excited to use the waterproof case to shoot videos under water.  I would recommend this product to anyone who needs an action camera.

Excited to see this in action! It arrived quicker than expected and has been a joy to unpackage. Took a few videos/pictures to test it out, and I have no complaints! You can’t beat the quality for the price!

So far, I am very happy with the EK7000.  I have been testing it for a few hours and it has surpassed expectations.  The Wifi connected easily after I slowed down and paid attention to what I was supposed to do to it.  The overall use of the camera is straightforward and easy to use. I am also impressed with the amount of accessories that come with it, as well as it coming with two batteries.Overall, I am very happy with this purchase, and will update once I use it more.

I got this camera from my parents for my birthdayI'd say it is a pretty good camera I put it on my dirt bike and the video was good and easy to watch one problem I had with it though is When I was swimming in the lake with it the battery died and didn't save the footage another problem that's not that big of a deal but it comes with a lot of part and I couldn't figure out what they were for or how to use them. Overall I'd say I'm very happy with the camera
Wow! I wasn’t expecting it to work as good as my dead GoPro 4 but it did way beyond with 4K images!!!Lots of

Right out the box, sqeezing the tabs for releasing the camera from packaging it broke...seriously?  Haven't taken any pics yet so may update stars as I use it, however the initial impression is sub par

At first the camera seemed like it was going to be great. Lots of parts to use it in different ways. During the first week of my son using the camera, it became difficult for him to turn it off. The on/off button wouldn't do the trick so unbeknownst to me he would just leave it on and let the battery die. He'd be able to recharge and use for a bit before the same on/off button wouldn't work again. It's finally at a point where it just doesn't work any longer and I am unable to return. I should have paid better attention to what was happening so I found gave returned or replaced it.

We are glad we got this camera.  The quality is great and the accessories are compatible with all of our GoPro stuff.  We are taking it to the Caribbean next week!  Delivered quickly and all was as promised.  We are considering buying another one.

Definitely not the most stable video on a mountain bike helmet. And adhesives don't stick worth a darn. Definitely didn't even attempt it on dirt bike helmet. But comes with many different attachments, some of which work great, especially for the price.

This is the first time I get a camera like this. I'm planning on taking it to Puerto Rico when I go in a few months. I've really enjoyed just messing with it and using it. It's really good quality and I love all of the attachments that came with it - an abundance of ways to attach it. I recommend it for anyone, but specifically people who just want to use it for fun. I'm excited to use it on my next adventures!

We bought this camera for an upcoming trip that involved a lot of outdoor activities. We wanted something that could get wet and potentially even get dropped with little to no damage.Overall we are very happy with the product especially for the price! Its extremely lightweight and easy to use. Although I did have to watch several you-tube videos to figure out the various functions and how to upload videos to my phone as it does not come with instructions.

The camera’s controls are pretty easy to use. No complaints on the quality of the footage other than the fact that some of the burst shots were a bit blurry. The included foot is a little wobbly but still does its job. The bike mount fits onto every handlebar I’ve tried it on (can’t guarantee it fits all handlebars, though). All and all it is better than what is expected from an average $50 camera. (This is the first action camera I have ever used so for all I know it could be better than a $300 GoPro.)

The quality of the pics is amazing! I was septical about the fact that the water could go/through the protection. I'm not anymore.  The camera is super lightweight, you don't have the feeling you use it. I don't regret my purchase at all.

I'm pretty impressed with this camera for the price. It takes pretty descent photos and videos as well. Its definitely not a go pro but for the price difference it's a good starting action cam. I purchased this with the intent to record while fishing but I plan to use it for much more now. I am using a samsung evo 128gb micro sd card and it works perfectly with this camera. Overall I would recommend this camera to someone looking to buy a cheaper action camera.

Just got the camera in the mail and am extremely happy with the purchase, especially for the price. The image quality is as good as my iPhone 6 camera and the app to upload images to your phone is quite easy to use. I used a 64GB SD card and had no issues. Looking forward to taking it on vacation in two weeks.This things comes with a ton of accessories, however be aware it does not come with a simple wrist tether....but that is just a 5 dollar add on. Totally worth it for the value you get with this camera.

The quality of the video and the number of accessories you get at this price is amazing. The kit includes two separate batteries so that you can charge the second one while using the first and then immediately use the second one if the fist gets discharged.I haven't had any issues with the connection and setup. You could easily connect to your phone over Wifi and get a live feed from the camera. You get roughly around 50 minutes of video record time on a single battery. I must recommend this to anyone who is looking for an affordable sports camera.

We are using this for a vacation we are taking for the dogs also to get some great action shots at the beach. So far this camera is awesome. We will be able to make some great memories. Would recommend this camera over others.

I'm so excited! I honestly didnt do very much research and bought this on a whim before a fishing trip, but after a bit of a steep learning curve, I'm very pleased!! Some of the accessories are confusing and I had to look up what to do with them, but in the end the clip was my favorite! Definitely going to be getting some more soon to stock up for my next trip. Very excited to learn more about this little camera and everything I can do with it. Next purchase: dog vest. Do they make that? Hopefully!

I've never taken the time to write a review until now. Perhaps I got a lemon, because I don't understand why this camera is rated so highly. From day one, I had it issues with it turning itself off even though the batteries were fully charged. It was also getting quite hot to the touch when this was happening. I've tried using external power without the batteries, but the camera still unpredictably shuts itself off within one to a few minutes of use. I got so frustrated with it, that I smashed it with a hammer for cathartic release.
The Camera is good, I use it mostly as a Dashcam for my bike rides, I have zero worries about this thing breaking or damaging it since I spent a fraction of the price of a Go Pro.

I bought this for my daughter and niece to use while snorkeling on our vacation. I didn't expect much but just wanted something they could play with. This little camera exceeded my expectations. The images were very clear and turned out great. I read other reviews and purchased an external flash. I think that really made a difference as no pictures were dark even 20 foot under when they would dive down and collect conch shells. Great camera! Don't hesitate to buy!
My son loves this camera.  It is just what he wanted.  Good quality.  Good price. We haven't used it underwater yet. Very fun having a remote with it. I recommend this camera

This camera surprised me tremendously. After having it for several months, I can say without a doubt that the quality is just as good as a GoPro, for a fraction of the price. It has more features than other GoPro competitors, especially 4K support. The video is stable and clear, and the camera is easy to use. This is definitely a high quality alternative to GoPro cameras, one I'd buy again if mine becomes broken or lost.

This camera although good and incredible for the price is not as good in some aspects when compared to the Gopro. The image is more contrasty than the Gopro so in shadows you lose some detail. The colors seem a bit saturated and produce a less realistic image. This can be changed with an editor if you really need to, but not the loss of shadow detail. Build quality is good especially when you take into account the price. and the LCD screen on the back makes everything a lot easier such as settings and actually being able to see what you are filming. After a month of hard use I definitely recommend this camera. If you want to see a side by side comparison, go to youtube and seach "Photojunky Drone Zone" .

I bought this ***Akaso*** Action Camera because I have a granddaughter that I want to take Photos of without using my Cell Phone and while we are playing and out and about. I also Hike and Travel a lot so maybe I will use it for that. I am excited to have it. :)

So far so good. Would have been 5 start except that the waterproof case came broke. Purchased another waterproof case. Too much trouble to send the whole camera and odds and ends back. The card that Amazon recommended (64 Gig) wont work. The maximum that the camera can handle is 32 Gig. Don't make the same mistake I did. The app works great except that you have to switch off of your home network to use your device with the camera's WIFI. If it could connect to the camera and home network at the same time, it would be even better.You get load of accessories with this camera. Everything you could think of except a carrying case and tripod.

So far it’s awesome for the price. I’m not a photographer, just a typical person with a camera who has no clue what they’re doing when trying to edit. That said, I’ve had a GoPro hero 4, and so far, this camera does just as well if not better. Again, I’m no pro, just raw footage sent to my phone for uploading to social media etc. Can’t say how well it does for the pros, but for everyday propel, wanting a cheaper alternative....this is the one to get.

Purchased this for my husband for a dashcam which he uses and it works great, but we ended up having a vacation scheduled and brought it for a underwater camera. It has adapters that allowed us to attach to our snorkel masks. Worked great and we got lots of great videos of the fish and the reefs.

Good video but hard to use and batteries drain fast.  Good for the price,  my problem was I needed to keep it in the case to protect from dusty conditions but needed to be hardwired for any extended use (batteries died fast). Customer service was great,  responded to my review and worked to remedy issues.
I am SO excited about this camera. The price is great especially compared to name brand cameras. I took it out immediately and filmed some footage of a SUP trip and it looked great.

I got this for my husband for Christmas.  He wanted it to use for shooting video for his Youtube channel.  So far he seems happy with it and the video quality is excellent.  A great little camera for the price.  I cannot believe how much cheaper it is vs the leader in the action camera field.

So far this Camera has exceeded my expectations!!  I love the ease of use the picture quality is better than I expected.  The wifi is a plus being able to use your phone to control the cam is a nice feature.  Overall for the money you pay for this and the better known camera this camera matches the performance of that unit.  Packaging was great all documentation was included although it may be a little date for this particular camera it was there is nothing to download except the software.  All in all I would recommend this camera to anybody I cannot wait to take it on my next cruise.Hope this helps your decision on which cam to buy and you can save a ton of money to spend on accessories...

Purchased this to film family white water rafting trip.  It came with a ton of attachments for all manner of helmets, bike handles, etc.  The camera takes 4k video and 12mp pictures wide angle and does it with a wrist remote.Couldn't be more pleased.

Great camera for the price, image and video quality is good, sound quality is ok . Action videos are great and son loves using it on his bike and Rc cars with great results. Hard to gi wrong for the price.

This is my first camera used for underwater footage and it works great. For the price I would say this is well worth it, it comes with different mounts and a remote control! One thing that I noticed was that if the video recorded for one minute, the screen would turn off but would still record. Turns out all you do is have to press any button and it will turn on and still be recording. The battery life is pretty long and I would say that this is probably as good as a GoPro.

I love what this camera can do. I'm just getting started using it. It's long on features and capabilities, but for me a little short on instructions. I may be over complicating things a bit. I would like to see more how to's about this camera. Additionally, I'd like to use it to record speeches I'm giving for class. Does anyone know of a wireless headset that transmits well with this camera? All in all great value in hardware, though you have to do some of the figuring out for yourself.

This camera is amazing!! I bought this just days before leaving to go out of the country. I took this camera with me kayaking and swimming. Some activities we did you were not allowed to take your phone so this was perfect. It took great pictures in the water and not. Even better I was able to upload my pictures to my phone without having to use a laptop. I would recommend this to anyone that wants a go pro but can't spend the money for one.

The AKASO EK7000 4K WIFI Sports Action Camera is not bad at all. Results have been good. Initially I could not get the camera to connect to the recommended app called EZ Cam, as they suggest in the little book that comes with the camera. I went back to the product listing here and saw that you should use the iSmart DV app. I installed iSmart DV app on my iPhone and it connected with zero problems and works great! I also own a GoPro Hero5 Black, GoPro Hero2, and an APEMAN Action Camera FHD 1080P WiFi. The AKASO EK7000 and Apeman cameras are not GoPro Hero5 Blacks. However, they are very good cameras for general use. I've been a professional photographer/film maker for 40 years and have relied on GoPro-type cameras since they arrived on the market. Make sure if you get one, purchase a top-of-the-line ultra-fast card for it. Again - the AKASO EK7000 4K WIFI Sports Action Camera is a very good camera and the build quality is very good. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone that is wanting a good action camera with WIFI and good quality imaging.

Case is sturdy and the camera works great. Be sure to read the instructions as it explains how to navigate the camera options. I used this camera in the Bahamas and it worked great under water! The case attached to all my go pro accessories. Perfect for traveling! Works the same as a go pro for a significantly lower cost!

I was a bit disappointed when the camera arrived without a SD card, but I was so exited about finding the product in amazon I didn’t read all the information. However my disappointment quickly faded when I found the “share your experience” note that offered a free card and more accessories which is amazing since it already came with so many, to write a review. I can’t wait to write one after I’ve actually used the device, because if it’s half as good as the fantastic customer initiatives offered, I KNOW I’m going to LOVE IT!!!!

Great (nopro) alternate at a fraction of the cost. So far picture quality is great, the frames seem a bit choppy on my PC once downloaded, I might have to play with the file or adjust on my video editor. They record in mov. Files so I'll likely just need to convert or have the correct player.Pros: great quality, price, etc

Great camera for the price - small, lightweight, comes with 2 batteries and many accessories. Recording video at 1080p is very good but 4K is disappointing. I found recording at 4K or even 2.7K was quite glitchy. So if you all you need is to record at 1080p, then this camera is hard to beat at its price.

So glad I went with this camera!  I was right there, gonna spend 6x as much and figured to try AKASO since all in $75.  I was concerned about no stabilization but after buying a chest strap/holder the video look great - even on the worse single track Mt bike trials.

Camera is really small. Sound is horrible when in the case. Makes it sound muffled and like its under water but without sounds ok. But you need the case to mount it anywhere. No instructions,  you have to scan a barcode to get any direction. And make sure you buy whatever SD card they say. I gave 5 stars because although the camera wasn't what I needed the customer service went above and beyond to make sure no matter what I was happy.
I used it to play a prank on my daughter and it works perfectly. I am very happy with it! Haven't used it in a wet environment yet but the hardware it comes with is nice and well made!

I had a GoPro and lost it, and decided on the AKASO due to price and the positive reviews. It looks exactly like my old GoPro and comes with several attachments as well! For the value it’s a good deal - for basic photos and for when traveling.

This is a great hunting camera. We took it pheasant hunting and got some great video. We still have to edit it.The con of this is that you can’t see if your video is pointing in the correct place until you review it. The only way to do that is have someone else looking at it from behind you.
Does not actuate with movement, truck was broken into and video footage was old footage...  find something else with real value... the mount also broke so its been put in a box of junk!

I gave this to my boyfriend on Christmas last year. He loved it since he likes to go out hunting. The camera is easy to set up, he was surprised by how great the picture/sound quality looked and specially he was excited about all the extra stuff that came with the camera. The remote it’s definitely a plus on this one. I have tried the camera myself on our camping trips and it works smoothly. I wasn’t so sure when I purchased it but now I know I made the best decision. Cheers!

I bought this for my son for Christmas, and he absolutely loves it. He finally gets to record himself when he rides his bike, snowboards, and water boards. He's most excited that it is waterproof and he can take it under water with him. The only downside, is that it comes with a lot of pieces. That can be overwhelming for a kid, let alone a parent. But we downloaded the manual and it was pretty easy to put together and figure out how to mount it on his helmet. Overall, this is a great product.

This is a great camera for the action-minded person! And the price point sold me. No need to spend 2-3 times more for a GoPro. We used it on a recent trip to Hawaii and it worked well. The waterproof case works as advertised and it's fairly easy to operate. My only challenge is getting the wi-fi to work, I've tried several times and can't get it to connect.Still need to mount the attachment so I can put it on the handlebars of my bike. And, I love the remote wristband, makes it much easier and safer to operate. Being not super technologically-inclined, I've found the sequence of buttons a bit daunting for me to figure out!
The Camera is very cool it take real neat pictures and very versitile. My Girlfriend love it. I also will buy a second one to vlog my bee keeping ventures.

It arrived the day before I went on a cave exploration just in time. I used the included accessories to mount it to my helmet and was ready to rock! It got banged around a lot but the mount held FIRM. The included two batteries are great! I had one charging while using the other and during the whole 4 hour expedition I only had to swap the battery once. I haven't had time to look at the footage yet but from what I can tell by using the remote viewing app....I'm impressed!!!

I am very amazed with this camera, especially since the price is so  low.  I mainly use it to record while i go off roading. and it takes real good video.  What i like is that it comes with a lot of accessories to get you started and it comes with 2 batteries. The camera is very easy to use it only took me a few minutes to figure out the menu system and how to change all the settings.

I got this for my 11 year old daughter. She loves everything about it.  She uses whens she goes mountain biking.  She says it is great picture and sound.  Would definitely buy again. I will probably borrow it when I run trail Ragnar lol.
I bought it for my boyfriend , I got two actually, hes into storm chasing and does amazing pictures and i knew he needed this and he loves it, it works great and its sturdy and still going strong!

As long as it worked, I loved it.  Died after a month of use.  I'll be interested to see if the seller stands behind it.Let me add, I complained to the manufacturer and was immediately sent a replacement camera.  They responded quickly to my issues.  This little camera is a lot of fun and has limitless uses.  Thanks for backing it up, Akaso.

I liked it because the camera quality is really good and it’s nice and small so it can fit any where it was a little difficult to connect it to the WiFi but all you need is the password which is 1234567890 and it should connect you to it it was rlly nice and Easy to put the bundles on and it has great camera quality under water I recommend it.

I received the camera on time. I used the camera several times and it worked great. The only 2 negative parts about the camera is that after extended use, the camera gets extremely hot and the battery life is not 90 minutes I got 30 minutes per battery. Other than that the camera is a AWESOME DEAL!!! I  thought which should I get a  Go Pro or  the Akaso , But the prices made the difference in my decision. Under $90 for a Action Camera verses a few hundred dollars. I recommended this camera to my friends and they all ordered it. The one feature I like most is the wrist control. It makes taking action clips or photos a lot personal. to control at a push of a button to capture life's greatest moments. I really like my Akaso EK7000. I also can control all functions on my cell phone once it is connected to Wi-Fi. This Action Camera is a great buy.

For a beginner this is a wonderful set. I was impressed with the variety of peripherals that came with it and, while not the best, the battery life is suitable. This is a great tool for learning how to shoot various videos and its size and stuffiness ensures that it can last. I think this will eventually be upgraded and when I do I will look into the Akasp line.

On the surface...I thought this produce would be a alternative to a GoPro (tm). Not so. The accessory package was the best part of the item, although the self sticking mounts don't stick, so plan on buying command strips or something else to use to adhere the mounts. Additionally, the batteries don't last more than a 20 minutes and in the cold, maybe shorter.  I even tried to use the camera as a dashcam and plug the camera into the accessory charging slot. It worked for a short time but it seems the camera uses more juice than what is being replaced by the charger. 1 hour tops and your done.  Buy accordingly.

My original purchase came in damaged so I returned it.  The replacement came perfectly packaged and had more pieces then the first order.  Which makes me wonder if I was originally sent a returned item.  But the camera works great and is a great (cheaper) alternative to the GroPro.  It’s easy to use and has a lot of mounts and components to use with it
Once you get past the unboxing and figure out the accessories (many you-tube videos later!), it's a great camera - has everything you need, and it's a great price.

Got it for the dash cam usage, good to have for insurance purposes, looping recording and lots of other settings that make it useful. Am excited to take to the mountains when I go skiing but need to remember to get a second memory card so I don't accidentally delete my skiing videos!
I like to hike, bike, camp, and snorkel.  This camera takes great video and still at a good price.  It comes with lots of accessories.  I haven't used it underwater yet.
We will be spending a year in Europe and I needed a 'go pro' type camera for a variety of situations.The Akaso EK7000 saved me tons of money and comes with an extensive set of mounting devices.
Bought for my fiancee so he can have it when hiking, diving, and other adventures! Will update once it's used to inform of quality but reviews where great and cant wait to try it out!
Amazing camera for the price!First of all, great quality, and the accessories are ideal for the average day to day tasks.

We called this our "Faux Pro".  Wanted a lower cost alternative to the GoPro for our snorkeling adventures and this worked perfectly.  Simple to use for still photo or video.  No issues with water resistance. The app that goes with the product is pretty bad but we didn't care. Looked at all our videos connected to laptop at end of day and were thrilled with what we were able to capture.  Overall picture quality very good. (Color of our photo due to murky waters.)

My gopro started to freeze so I needed a new camera. I refuse to spend 400 to 500 so I took a chance on this camera and I'm glad that i did! So far so good! Great picture quality and I love the remote control to take videos and photos.  The sounds quality is so so if you are using the case but it doesn't really bother me anyhow.

I bought this product to video tape patients (wearing device on my head) and use footage for lecturing.  Easy to learn how to use and was able to manipulate footage with computer software in a short period of time for high quality videos to present in Power Point lecture.  Had bought another product that was more expensive and did not compare in ease of use.  Extremely impressed and cannot go wrong with pricing.  A bonus is that you get several different attachments to use for various set-ups.

I received the AKASO EK7000 today and was happy to see that the build quality of the camera was better than expected. I plan to use this camera for recording my daily mountain bike rides through the hills. Camera came with many accessories that I am still trying to sort through. I will update my review after my first couple of rides.

I bought this as a gift for my teenage daughter. She uses it for all kinds of video, from playing with the dog to skateboarding to fishing. The video quality is excellent and it's totally user-friendly and easy for her to figure out. I bought an accessory package with it that gives it a ton of versatility. Overall price still lower than just buying a bigger brand name camera alone. I would give it 5 stars but she hasn't used it enough for me to say for sure how it holds up over time. But we are very pleased so far!

The AKASO EK7000 is one heck of a camera at a great price. I’ve only had mine a few days but already gotten great use while biking and kayaking. The picture quality has been amazing and file transfer is a breeze (I used an SD USB given file size). The provided clips and waterproof case are a great start and fully rounded out by the mounting accessory option.I highly recommend this camera for anyone looking to chronicle their adventures who doesn’t want to sell a leg to get it.

I have bought this camera for capturing skiing, roller-coasting, biking, under-water swimming activities.  It works well for all of these.  It comes with enumerable adapters for various mounts to bike, helmet, etc.Unfortunately, the camera stopped working after nine months.  However, customer service has offered an excellent communications in the debugging efforts, and after we could not revive the camera, I have received a brand-new replacement.  Therefore, I stay a happy customer! :-)

The AKASO EK7000 has been a wonderful addition to my newly growing collection of cameras. I wasn't about to drop hundreds of dollars on a big name action camera and the positive reviews of the AKASO led me back to it over and over again while I was searching through the many options online. The videos from this camera look great (I only bother with 1080p video...I have no desire to mess with any higher resolutions at this point in time). The photos are fine but I don't see myself needing this for still shots. The accessories that the camera comes with makes it easy to use it anywhere you might need and the ability to connect to a smartphone through an app is super convenient for starting/stopping the video recording as well as setting up a frame since you can view the camera's video live from your phone. This is a great product with great value

I purchased this to record my travels and outdoor activities. I also have been enjoying the time lapse shots to add some different shots to my videos. I mainly work in 1080 60fps and this has been ideal. I have only shot a little footage in the 4K format, but not really worked with it yet. I started with a 16GB micro SD card which only allows the 720 60fps and 1080 30fps settings. I switched to a 64GB micro SD card that allows all formats. The pictures are nice a clear excellent burst shots and time lapse. Good price point for a fun little action cam.
Hands-down this is just the same as a go proAt a much better price though

I am happy with my camera especially for the price.  Purchased for use on kayak excursions and so far I really enjoy the color of the photos and video.  I am not too happy with the stabilization of the camera for videos but personally I am not really interested in upgrading at the moment so for the price it suits my needs! The accessories were a little overwhelming that came in the box but I found a you tube video that explained them. For the price i think it preforms really well.

UPDATE:  Still love this camera, had the opportunity this summer to use the camera kayaking, It's pretty easy to operate and took great pictures and video. Really fun to use. Great camera, came with two batteries, intuitive to setup, easy to operate.
Good camera, but it records in mov format.  You cannot edit your video, or upload it easily.  Spend the money, and get a gopro.

Really enjoy this camera for taking action video hiking, biking, and paddleboarding.  It’s portability and mounting possibilities allow me to mount it on remote boats and vehicles for videoing.  Not great for stills but then again that’s not what it’s made for!
This is an awesome little camera, with a truckload of accessories!Not only does it take nice clear movies, it also takes snapshots.

**5/13/20 I bought this camera for my son. It is user friendly, powerful, and compact. He was disappointed the camera doesn’t zoom. The attachments were difficult to figure out, because the instructions are complete garbage, but the product itself is worth the price. I do recommend.*

This is my 2nd purchase of this camera !!This little camera is amazing! And the amount of accessories you get with it is incredible for the price. The video quality is great ( I also own a GoPro Hero 6 ) and this does the job. Also I was able to navigate the menu within 2 minutes ! ( very straight forward )No Brainer ....Buy this .

Looked for an "Go Pro" like camera for my adventurous husband for Christmas but he did not want me to waste hundreds of dollars.  We didn't open it until Xmas morning.  My husband was very surprised!  He immediately charged it up and started messing with it's features.  It is compatible with his Iphone and tablet as well.  He also looked at youtube videos on how to use it.  It has a built in Wifi + HDMI, a waterproof case, helmet mounts, handlebar supports, as well as adhesive mounts for multiple surfaces.  It has a lot of functions such as time lapse video, video mode, burst photo mode, still photos, and other trinkets not yet explored!!!  Sadly, it didn't come with a SD Card but we had one on hand.  It's a great little camera for the money.

This is my first time using a Go Pro type camera and i must say it didn't disappoint !!!Once you read the manual carefully this baby worked like a charm!! What a great value and what a great time i had with this. Like i said for a beginner this model is all you need for the average novice user like myself!! 2 thumbs up for this baby!!

After purchasing this item, I didn't quite like it so the company contacted me via email and is replacing the item with another product. The representative was very nice about it. Love the excellent customer service.
I am very pleased with my purchase! The AKASO has really good picture quality and steady stabilization. The only negative to this product is the sound quality, but other then that its great!

Small and powerful.  Great little camera.  Camera is very easy to use. Easy set up.  Great picture and battery life lasted longer than I expected.  No complaints.  I had to contact customer service and they were amazingly accommodating.  They really care about their customers and their product.

I like the size, the ease of use, the picture quality. How to manage to but this much functional into a device this compact and provide an equal output that in other similar units would cost hundred's more beats me

I absolutely love my new camera. The photos and videos are very clear and are at quality. I put it on my ATV and it captured the ride in awesome quality. I am going to love taking it to Creekside off-road Ranch this weekend for 4th of July! Can't wait to catch some awesome footage! And the price was way worth it! Will definitely recommend spending the $50.00 . Amazing product!

I've got friends and famy that have the newest latest and great gro pro hero 5 or whatever. they easy paid well over $500 for them. I was a little hesitant on buying this because of the price. O thought cheap price cheap product, WRONG! This has great video and photos and you still have the same functions as a gro pro were you can connect it to your smartphone and control it. The 4k streaming is not the greatest but for what I use it for I don't care to much

Works just like the expensive Go Pros. Lots of you tube videos on the comparison of the two. I highly recommend this over paying a high price for voice activation of which my daughter had constant problems with her Go Pro while in Cozumel.

This camera is truly amazing, it can shoot at stunning 4k quality and is great for underwater sports. It won't let you down and can even shoot at 120fps and you can even plug it into the computer to view things in slo-mo. The remote was always easy to use and still hasn't ran out battery. I suggest you buy this even if you have any doubts. Really amazing, and hope you have as much fun as I did with this camera!

Amazing performance for such an affordable cam system.  The complete package with waterproof case and the many attachments for boarding, biking and even climbing are beyond "Super Cool".  Cant beat the performance and price!

Product works very well. Comes as described. Image stabilization is not the best but you cannot expect a $400 go pro for $60 either. The fact that it comes with two batteries is amazing. It even comes with a separate dual battery charger so you don't have to charge using the camera. I happen to have plenty of mounts but if this is your first camera it is so cool to be able to mount it on something immediately and start to record. The batteries even had a partial charge in them. Happy enough to where I am ordering one of their V50 Elite at $140 it also seems like quite the bargain for the specs.

Took to Maui on a family vacation. Loved the video quality. The WiFi sometimes took a little work to activate but the video quality was great. Had in under water for better than 30 minutes at a time no leaks. Easy to download video to my phone. Great little camera and the accessories it came with were great quality.

I lost this camera while scuba diving in Puget sound. Another diver found it under water a month later and returned it to me after finding my contact information in one of the videos I shot while testing the camera. The camera was in perfect working state. The remote controller had water in it. I opened it, cleaned it and replace the battery. It resumed working like new. I honestly doubted this camera quality because of the low price. Trust me, it is worth much more than what it costs.

He camera and assocories you get at this price point is amazing. The video and audio quality is on par or better than any of the other cameras I have tried. Love that this even has a rear screen. Packaging and instructions were great. Keep up the good work on the tiny little wonder of an action cam.  Off to shoot some runs down the ski slope. Yeah for winter.

Definitely worth buying! I bought this camera to use while I’m traveling and doing active things like zip lining, rafting, etc. I especially love how great of quality the photos turn out even when I have clearly been shaking or moving the camera while in motion! It comes with so many accessories as other cameras do not! It does not come with a micro SD card just an FYI.

Amazing quality for the price.  The sheer amount of included accessories is staggering, and you get 2 batteries AND charger.  I use this camera for scuba diving, and like the peace of mind that if something happens and I lose the camera, I'm not crying over a $500 camera.  Also, the premium price on other action cameras with a small subjective quality increase is, in my personal opinion not even close to worth it.  Look on youtube for examples of this cameras output.  For a non-photographer who just wants to show people cool things on a dive, this camera gets it done far better than I was expecting.  I am considering buying another one to have as a backup.

For the price, this camera is awesome! I use it mostly for my dog or as a 2nd or 3rd camera angle when making videos to make sure I get all the action. It's easy to use and has tons of support online in case you get lost while using it.

For $50 lightning deal, it does everything you need it to do. For action sports, I'd rather buy 3 of these and set up multiple angles then drop $200+ on a GoPro. It all comes down to what you use it for. If you need perfect video quality with image stabilization, save for the GoPro. If you need a camera for capturing weekend warrior activities, this is perfect.
