Love this camera! It was really easy to set up. We used it in Destin while jet skiing, parasailing, and swimming. It held up and the pictures and videos turned out great. I also really like the WiFi transfer capability. Probably buying one for my brother for Christmas!
Its ok for the price . Worked great underwater . No zoom so that sucks. Pictures are ok . Battery last a while so thats a plus.  No delays when taking pictures but quality is ok .

For the price, you can't beat it! I took this camera to Colorado snowboarding and it did the trick! Everyone just assumed it was a 'GoPro" and the pictures were the same quality as if I were really using one! It came with a lot of attachments so I had the option to put it on my helmet with a head strap, The reviews about the BATTERY dying fast are true. ( I realized this the first day). The second day I just made sure to turn it off after I got the shots I wanted, then back on, so forth.

This is a good action camera/recorder especially since it is a reasonable price.  You won't notice a difference between this and a gopro because gopros try to rob their customers by being unnecessarily expensive.  This is exactly what you want while still reasonably priced.
Pretty handy and great for the money. I use this at work with the remove to look at equipment where I can't be due to powered up equipment. Wifi and app are okay...funcational.

I got this camera for my son to use in one of his classes for school. I had my doubts at first because there's just not that much to it, but it does exactly what he needed it to do without breaking the bank. It took a while to figure everything out at first but overall  I'm very satisfied with my purchase. I would buy this camera again.

I bought this action camera to use on a cruise I was about to go on. Unfortunately due to covid-19 the cruise was cancelled. However, I have used the camera around town to test its function and so far it has not disappointed. The picture and video quality is great and camera is very user friendly in general. So far it has felt worth the money and I  hope I get an opportunity to use it underwater as planned. If you are looking for a good action camera to use on trips and not break the bank, this is a great choice.

I have wanted an action camera for years but couldn’t get myself to spend $400 for one. I found this camera and figured it was worth the risk if the quality wasn’t good. I couldn’t be happier with this camera. In the three weeks since I purchased I’ve used it for swimming with the kids, skiing, snowshoeing, mtn biking and everyday pictures.The still pic quality is decent but where this camera shines is when filming in 1080p. The videos look awesome. I was concerned about the lack of image stabilization but have not seen any issues with this.

I was looking for an action camera for a trip I'm taking to Costa Rica this April.  After reading numerous reviews on several action cameras i decided to purchase the Akaso ek7000.  It came exactly as described and with a handful of accessories that i would have purchased separately. I tested the camera at home and it looks good but can't say how it performs in real life scenarios.  So far so good I'd  recommend it to a friend.

Excellent little camera for a fraction of a GoPro. Purchased for the purpose of mounting to motorcycle /helmet for proof if anything should happen accident wise, had a friend just get blamed for an accident that was not his fault and I am determined to not let this happen to me. Camera has a nice wide view of field and great clarity,  also works well in lower light. Does not have all the features of the GoPro but we'll worth the price at around 85.00 you can't go wrong.

the camera has great video for my ATV rides. experimented with different placement, I even bought a chest harness and found it was too small for a Man, was made for a boy.I  mounted camera on the visor of my helmet and have nice crisp video and no shaky viewing , can't beat it for the price.
My son absolutely loves this camera. He puts it on his RC truck and drives it all over the place. He even recorded my fireworks display. We put it on the TV and it came out great!

Love the camera and all it’s features however it came with a screw in the mount that is totally stuck and can not be moved. I bent my own screwdriver trying to get it out and partially stripped it as well. I think this is just a factory malfunction. Will be returning it and getting another, if the same thing happens again I will just be returning it.

I wanted an inexpensive camera to capture occasional video/photo family footage used when skiing and snorkeling. This camera is perfect for that. It has everything which I have been looking for: 4k mode, Wifi, remote control, LCD display, 2 batteries, charging station and many more. I used it only once during my last skiing trip. So far I am happy with the purchase. Maybe it is not as perfect as latest GoPro, but it is good enough for me!

We bought this camera initially to film while swimming with manatees.  It worked well.  Since then we have used it to film piano recitals, kids swimming in the pool, and other things.  No more shaky video from a smartphone.Pros

I purchased the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera for my husband as a birthday gift. He and our two kids 16 and 19 love the camera!! My son captured some great video of the fish in our lake as he jumped off our boat with a friend. We also use the camera while wake-boarding. The camera is tough, easy to use and after some minor easy adjustments produces great quality photos and videos.  I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to capture adventures to share.

Bought this camera to take on a family trip to Cancun and it did not dissapoint! My husband and I used it but not as much as our 10 year old and 12 year old! Great pics, great videos of playing in the ocean, great videos of the water park! Very happy with the purchase!!

I was extremely impressed with this product.  Bought it for a trip to the Galapagos Islands because it was affordable and if it wasn't good, I hadn't lost that much money.  It was 1/4 the price of the equivalent Go-Pro.  Pictures were great even in murky water and couldn't tell any difference between the go-pro shots in the group and the Akaso shots.  Simple instructions.  The only problem I had was remembering to click past the movie part to get to the still picture setting, but that was not the camera's problem but user incompetence.  Also had some random movies because I had it on movie setting thinking it was on picture so I didn't turn it off.  The provided extra battery was a very useful perk. Glad I bought it!

I love this little camera.  I am a teacher who is about to video tape everything I do for my remote learners and the hybrid kids.  I am not the kind of person who ever liked video at all.  I rarely tape anything, so I was hoping to find something to help me teach this year.  This little camera is amazing fory purposes.  I don't plan to go skydiving or white water rafting, but who knows!  If I do, I will be sure to take my little camera!  Thanks Akaso!
I purchase this item to use as a helmet cam. There are multiple mounts for your helmet, handlebars, etc. I was very please with the ease of use and picture quality.  Highly satisfied.

I bought this action camera for my 11 year old grandson as a Christmas gift.  He has found it to be user friendly and fairly simple to use.  The case provided with the camera creates a waterproof barrier which has proved to be useful in outdoor scenarios.  Image stabilization and quality is great for the price range of the camera.  Perfect beginner action camera at a great price.

My 10 year old son has been wanting a GoPro for a long time.  We decided on this one based on the reviews and price.  It seems to be great quality and very easy to use/navigate.  We haven't uploaded pictures or videos yet but very impressed overall and it comes with a great bunch of accessories.  So far very pleased!

This is a follow up to my initial review below.  I want to note how attentive the company representatives were to my problems.  The service was great.  I recommend trying out this camera and the accessories in sufficient time to determine if it will meet your needs.Initial review:  Difficult to setup and use the first time.
Awesome camera. We lost our GoPro and didn’t want to spend the money again. I can’t tell the difference between them. Seriously video quality is the same
So far, so good. Sound is surprisingly clear and video seems very good... Still testing it out at various locations and conditions. For the price, totally love it.

I have got this camera for my birthday. The manual is in such small letters i need to use magnifying glass. I try to find and print it online but no success, but when you read,  it very easy to use. And this month i had chance to test it. This camera small and light which is convenient I enjoy filming and making picture under water . It was a real fun,  the pictures came very sharp, good quality.I have to charge both batteries every day and it is not convenient without wall charger. I also decided that a floating stick would be very handy.

My wife and I bought this as a gift for our son.  He enjoys this camera tremendously in all sorts of circumstances like on his chest harness while riding his bike and even in a kayak.  He's put the on his helmet to film his driving on our new side-by-side.  He's even attached the camera on a floater to film under water.  The quality of the video is pretty amazing.  This camera and all its attachements made for a great gift. Definitely recommend it for any outdoor enthusiast.

For those that claim the 5 stars are fake or people are just writing a review because of the card that came with it says "write a 5 star review and get a gift" where does it say that exactly. I attached a picture of the card. It simply says " Share your experience by leaving a review" you could of left a 1 star and still gotten a gift.I love this camera, I've taken very good pictures and videos. For those that are bitching about it, go buy a 300 dollar camera, you bought a 70 dollar camera and expecting it to be better then a 300 dollar purchase. Ive compared this to gopros and this camera is just as good.

I bought 6 for all my kids. They work great for each of them to do their own vlogs and adventure footage without me having to sell my left kidney, left arm, and right leg on the blackmarket to afford all of it. 4/5 will buy again.

Got this for our grandson to use while surfing and skateboarding, and he's super happy with it - takes good video and pics, and the waterproof case is great! Terrific alternative to a GoPro, and very affordable!
Works as expected, perfect for those who want quality video without spending so much on the name brand. Perfect for toying around with the R/C’s and drones. Very light.

Best camera for the price, go it on sale for $45, i was thinking to get a GoPro and got this one instead, I don’t regret it at all, best camera for the value out there, perfect for snorkeling, scuba diving and any water, sports activity.
Reason I love my AKASO EK70001. It record video at a professional quality level

I found the AKASO camera while looking for a replacement for a GoPro I lost.  I figured for the price is was worth checking out. I am not disappointed. This camera is great. I am currently using it to catch time lapse of a bird nest in our back yard. It has been raining off and on, but with the waterproof case I have not had to worry about it. The camera came with lots of extras, including a second battery, Overall very satisfied.

Great action camera as an affordable alternative to GoPro. It performs as expected, and comes with all kinds of attachments. The waterproof case works, though I have only use it lightly in water a couple of times. With the limited interface control on the camera, I have not figured out how to edit/delete recorded photos/videos. However with the app installed on an iPad, it is not a problem, since it is easier to do it that way.

Bough this camera and I couldn't be any happier with this purchase! The accessories that came with it is complete! You can't really ask for anything more. I had a defective product initially but it's all good, the customer service was real helpful and just told me to return the item and get a new one. Camera is easy to use! Very responsibe buttons and the video and picture quality is definitely on par with the GoPro! I will buy again for sure!!! Highly recommended! You won't regret this purchase!

Very disappointed.  We bought this for my Son's Birthday along with all of the accessories.  The WIFI is very hard to connect.  The wrist remote doesn't seem to work.  We had a lot of trouble even getting it out of the package.  We probably should have spent the extra money on the actual GoPro
Dude... seriously.. this is just as good as a GoPro... but this. I use it as a camera on my motorcycle helmet... it’s perfect. Screw GoPro over priced crap.

I ordered the AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle for my up coming Marathon I have in March @ The Antelope Canyon Ultra. U have used it twice and I was amazed on how clear & visible the camera takes Pictures & Video's. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone that is looking for a really great action camera. Here's a picture I took with the camera wearing the head gear, I'm standing at the top of the mountain looking down,

This is a very good action camera and at a price much less than the well known go pro. I will practice with it in the am. I took a few still shots and they were very good. This camera comes with two batteries and enough accessories to keep even the most avid outdoorsman busy filming there exploits. I will be documenting my groups fishing exploits this year. Should be fun.

When I bought this, I haven't heard about this product before. I bought this when I saw a review on a tech site as a gopro alternative. Akaso turned out to be a really good product. The number of accessories that comes with it, is well thought through. The camera is rugged, with intuitive interface. This is definitely worth a buy.

I have a gopro hero5 black and like to get a good backup for it.  I bought this action which is only 1/3 oricr of the cheapest hero5 on Amazon.The video quality is comparable to the gopro as seen in the picture (left is this camera and right is gopro).  Although it didn't have built-in GPS as gopro but the Wi-Fi connection is a plus.  And accessories are also more than enough.

Great camera for the price point.  The user interface is fairly intuitive, everything can be done with four buttons.  The ootb selection of accessories is solid.  Comes with two batteries and a charging station (super convenient).  This is our first  action camera and so far we are happy.  GoPro is 8x more expensive but I am not convinced that it provides 8x value over this 4k camera.  Keep up the good work!

Merry May Christmas to me. For a few years I had heard of GP and thought it too expensive and I would not use it.  Recently, I found myself needing a camera to film an upcoming wedding for friends. Of course, my friends suggested GP. I bought myself the Akaso EK7000 after reading great reviews. The low price of this camera and accessories made it a no brainer, especially when I realized it was made by high quality Sony. I received it today and tore open the Amazon package like a 3 year old at Christmas. I charged up the battery and began filming everything. I had no idea an action camera was so easy and fun to use. I can not wait to film the wedding. Thanks for making a great product at a third the cost. Bill

I didn't see many comments in the reviews about the audio quality of this camera. This would be my main complaint. My son wanted the camera to document things, make mini movies, etc. However, the microphone or audio recorder is very poor. I suspect if the protective cover is removed it might improve things, but then the camera is so vulnerable to damage that it's not worth it.

My son is 13 and got this as a Christmas gift.  He doesn't volunteer much information (typical for his age) but he did tell me he likes this camera.  He has used it while playing with his Airsoft gun and I've learned that he posted some videos online but I've never seen them.  Wish I could do a better review but it was like pulling teeth just getting this much info.

Great product that performs well at a low cost.  After installing software, connection to the EX7000 was a bit fiddley at first.  Have made several videos and watched on my iPad via WiFi.  Also have cable connected to 60” 2k tv.  Video resolution, picture quality and contrast most satisfactory in both cases.

This camera is small so it can be packed and ported with ease. The picture  quality  is good, attaching to a snorkel easy and so much fun to use. Memories of vacation are so much more interesting now!

Everything about this camera is comparable or better than a GoPro. Easy to set up and use, mounts easily with many types of mounts (included). Has a remote control, which I didn't get with the GoPro I bought earlier.

I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  It was mainly for her to take pictures and video of her and her brother snowboarding.  The quality was excellent and it was easy to use.  She ended up taking it with us to our trip in Cancun and attached it to her snorkel mask and was able to take pictures and videos while she was swimming in the ocean.  It is a great product and the price can not be beat.  I would not hesitate to recommend or buy another one.

I've wanted a GoPro for a while, but it was outside my budget. I took a chance on this camera and I was pleasantly surprised. It's easy to use and the video quality was surprisingly good. I'd recommend purchasing an accessory kit with it. I've worn it on a head strap and used it on a selfie stick and it's great. :)

This is my first waterproof camera. I bought it to use while kayak fishing. This camera produce quality videos and very easy to operate out of the box. Two batteries included so you don’t run out of action time. Not mentioning all the goodies that comes with it in the box. I’m so pleased with my purchase and thinking to buy another one or two for gifts to relatives and friends.

It's a reasonably priced GoPro alternative, but it's not quite as good as advertised. The image quality and features aren't as strong as you could hope for, but for the price you get what you pay for. Still enjoy it and all the accessories that easily work with it.

I was a little hesitant to buy this product because I thought we should have went with a Go Pro. After reading all the reviews we went ahead and ordered the AKASO. We went on vacation and filmed all our adventures. I loved watching all our videos and camera shots. Great picture quality, great for making videos. Easy to transfer all your pics to a device. Absolutely wonderful investment for a fraction of the cost. I'm so glad we bought the AKASO EK7000 for our family.

I was surprised at the number of parts and accessories that came with the product. I got this camera to take footage of my bike rides. Make sure you have a flat surface on your helmet to mount the camera to. I love the fact that they gave two batteries so I can always have one charges and ready to go. I probably won’t need to use all the accessories but I’m glad I have them just in case! Can’t wait to go and edit my footage!

The picure and video quality are really bad. some pieces were cracked out of the box. For the money I wasn't gonna complain but it doesn't take good pics at all and stabilization is crap. maybe I just got a bad one

The camera works right out of the box as expected. Make sure you have a decent sized micro SD card or get one so you can actually use it right away. The connection to a smart phone is a really cool feature and works surprisingly well for seeing the cameras view in real time. I was impressed by the audio quality too. All of the different mounts that come included area huge bonus and makes the price hard to beat. If I ever want another one I would definitely get a second one.

Amazing camera for the money. I purchased this camera for one of my quad-copters and it is extremely lightweight, incredibly small and the video/camera quality is phenomenal for the price. This also comes with every attachment I could ever need and then some; clips, straps, mounts. I was not expecting the amount of accessories included,

As the "stay-at-home" order extends, the needs for a good webcam increased. I was looking at the webcam from Logitech and other popular brands but their price was way to high. I read the reviews on this camera and decided to give it a shoot. Maaan, this has been one of the best cameras i have ever use for computers, and some of my friends can agree with that. Whenever we are in a zoom meeting, my camera is the one with most resolution. Recommended 100%.

Used this camera for a ski trip and pleased with the quality.  I had one small glitch; The camera would automatically stop recording during a few episodes when I had it mounted on my ski helmet.  I wish there was a way to know when the camera was recording without looking at the camera itself.
Sweet Camera and Accessories!Can't wait to set up a Youtube Channel with this...

I love that you have the option of clipping a photo from a video you take. The photos are really clear. However if using under water be sure to check the lense when bringing it back out or you'll have water spots in all your shots. Battery lasted a long time. Great price & Quality I would definitely recommend.

Honestly, this camera is not worth buying. After testing it the first time, the firmware was freezing to the point of unuseabillity. Second, after mailing with tech support, I completed the firmware update EXACTLY as instructions by akaso support team said and the camera had only a black screen. After leaving it alone for about half an hour, the camera is dead and practicly does not turn on. Battery works, SD card works, camera doesen't. Not worth buying if you want a functilnal sports camera.

I have been using this product for s year now, it holds up to the claims and product description. I use this camera for mainly water shots and video and have never had a problem. Great product and worth the investment.

My first action camera purchase and definitely happy I bought this. Quality is good and it takes terrific video. Comes with a bunch of accessories, mounts, two batteries and even a wristband remote control. Since this is the only action camera I've owned I can't compare it to other ones but it definitely does what I hoped it would and at this price is pretty incredible. I only needed to purchase a MicroSD card but even with the additional cost it's a great purchase.
I really like this camera. Best product for the price. This is the 3rd one I get for me and family members. Fast shipping. I highly recommend this product.

This action camera is pretty awesome for the price! Comes with a ton of accessories and the instructions are simple to follow. The overall video picture is surprisingly very good! Also, the app was really easy to download and simple to export videos/pics to share on social media. I ordered a dog harness for my Blue Heeler and can't wait to attach this camera to the harness and video her chasing squirrels and chipmunks!

This Camera is definitely not a GoPro but it is great for the price, I used it for surfing and the footage is clear and stable. It is certainly water proof and had no issues with overheating of fogging like GoPros do. And the price of this camera is so great considering the competition. Overall, this is the best camera if you have a tight bugdet and you aren't the director of Star Wars.
Pretty clear and honestly not bad for the price! I do recommend!!. Battery is long lasting and it comes with two batteries for all day adventures!

I am still learning how to use this camera and will update this review later.  This is the first sports camera I have owned so can't compare it to GoPro, but so far I have made several pictures and a couple of videos and am satisfied.  I wanted to let people know how quickly AKASO is at responding to questions.  So nice to get a response within a day.  Also WIFI code is 1234567890

I was of course skeptical due to the price, but I read many reviews which led me to purchase this and I am not at all disappointed! When I got it I immediately filmed some action stuff and put it on my computer and was blown away by the quality.  And that was in the 1080.  I have not tried the 4k as I do not have anything to play or edit that on yet.  But after having my GoPro stolen I didn't want to pay hundreds to replace it and I am glad I didn't.  I have told all my friends and it would be a great gift.  It comes with so many accessories.  The remote alone would cost you $70 for a GoPro.  Totally worth it.

Great little camera for the price and features. I am having problems getting the camera to record without glitching & skipping in 4K or even the 2K mode. The battery seems to die fast when recording sready. Great thing is you get 2 batteries and you can buy 3 more for 13.99 and up... Overall I would recommend this action camera to anyone looking for an inexpensive high quality action camera.

A little disappointed in the product. For one they send a bribe with the product asking for positive feedback in return you get free accessories. So that could be the reason for all the high ratings. Wi-fi was the biggest reason I chose this cam and it's useless. The app for the camera doesn't work and there is no other app that will work. Id give a higher rating if this was fixed but right now I'm not happy at all with this purchase.

We use to record videos for my daughter and this is her favorite  toy now. She uses the remote to record her own videos.  Tons of accessories to fit this camera anywhere you like. the extra battery definitely helps.Overall the battery life span isnt much.

Very Impressed. I bought this with a ton of skepticism the first time and was blown away. The picture quality was on par with m friends go pro which he spent 3 times the amount on. The battery life could be better but with the inclusion of the second battery it was fine. Buying it again cause I was reckless and lost my first but it is a great product.

The waterproof case is great, but you really have to be SURE it’s on right. Don’t take anything for granted. Pics from far away look great. Once you get closer up, the quality of photos start to decline.

I bought this little camera for a couple reasons.  I am using it as a dash cam for my daily commute and I also find it useful for taking videos of my kids.An added benefit is that it is smaller than I expected.  The multiple accessories it came with are great and make it super easy to attach to my dash or use a selfie stick.

I was so torn if I should invest in a Go Pro for our vacation and snorkeling that just passed. Having no experience with a product such as and not being savvy with cameras I seriously cannot say enough good things. This is so user friendly and the quality is beyond what I expected for the price. It comes loaded with accessories (besides a SF card, which are cheap enough) and the package was aesthetic! If you’re hesitant to purchase this don’t be!
This camera is fantastic. Have used it for snowboarding, motorcycling, and flying. Fantastic imagery, especially for the $45 I paid!! Am super happy with it and will probably buy another one or two.

Used this underwater twice. The battery lasted about an 1.5 hours each time, then just switched out the battery. Picture quality was good for the price and the water clarity. So glad we had this for swimming with sea turtles. :)

The video itself is great. Everything works really well with it, except the batteries last maybe 2 hours if that! That is when you are recording a video the entire time. I used it on an off road truck and it worked great minus the part that I missed 1/2 the trip on it because the batteries died so quick. It also would get moisture inside the waterproof case.

This camera has worked perfectly as a helmet-mounted "dash" cam for my motorcycle. Battery life is good and at FHD 60 fps it can record for about 2 hrs before needing battery swap. Side note; if you spill gasoline on the camera housing it will suddenly shatter and crumble. There is some weird reaction that happens with the material and the gas.

I was a little skeptical about this camera but i was completely wrong. It is amazing. I ride horses and i love to capture my trail rides and outdoor arena work. I didn't know how the quality would stand up with the changes in light from riding in a sunny arena to woody trail rides but it was fantastic. I love this little camera. The video quality is amazing as well. The HD quality was shocking, it was so clear and crisp. It is very easy and simple to use. It charges insanely fast and it hasnt died on me and I have use it quite often. I use a mount on my riding helmet and there was no shakiness or unwanted noises when i edited the video. I cannot wait to take it to horse shows!  I recommend this little great action camera to everyone. If you are on a budget but want great quality then this is the camera for you.

I purchased this to capture my daughter's volleyball games and it works great. The wide angle lens allows you to place this almost anywhere and still get a great shot of the action. I was looking at GoPro's, but they are on the high end of my budget. For what I paid, this is an amazing little camera. I use a 64 gig sandisk and it gives me plenty of storage for video. I haven't taken many pictures with it, but the video/audio is great. The remote on/off feature is nice too. My only complaint is that the "wifi" APP is not reliable at all. It will connect, but only for a few seconds at best.

Unit arrived neatly packaged with all contents. Upon opening I discovered the clear plastic protective housing around the camera had a massive crack right across the lens which pretty much means my camera is now useless. I cant take any videos because the crack will show up and distort the footage. I'm not sure how the lens became cracked because its securely locked down inside the box its shipped in?

The reason this product have good rating because they send you frew battery if you give them posative feedback.This product is garbage .mic audio recording is pathetic .battery goes down very fast when video recording.video quality is ok .i climbed up a mountain and record my video and when i play it on laptop i cant hear any audio at all from the recording.

This camera has been living up to expectations.  All the accessories make it seem a bit complicated but it's actually quite easy to use, and the iSmart DV app (free download) allows it to work with your iPhone or tablet.  The quality of the videos and photos is good, and the wrist-band remote is a nice feature if you have the camera mounted somewhere difficult to reach.  Cameras with the features of the EK7000 generally sell for quite a bit more.
Great value!!! I am very pleased with quality and price. I bought this for my boyfriend to use on his side by side. We had fun and I didn’t worry because it was such a good price.

I am using the official GoPro motorcycle helmet mount but this camera is great!  if it flies off while on my bike helmet then im only out 60 bucks...very easy to use and the app is pretty good too...Would buy again.

Uodste- We've been using this camera for several months now. We're really happy with it and the kids love it and uts suoer easy to use.. definitely recomend this to anyone.We bought this camera like a Christmas present for my kids. We didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars in an Action Camera so the kids could break easily. I want to tell you that They love the AKASO EK7000. They use it while biking, skateboarding, and at the lake. It was really easy to set up, Overall a great product for your buck!
Packed with features you would normally find in a camera $100's of dollars more expensive.The camera operation is pretty intuitive and easy to navigate, picture and VDO 4K quality really nice.
This is a great camera. Works really well and easy to use. Built well and takes great pictures.

This is our second Asako camera. we initially bought one for our daughter a few years ago, but liked it so much we bought a second for our own use. The quality it's surprisingly good for the size, my daughter entered a photo contest for school and was able to submit a picture taken with this camera. The waterproof case is durable (but scratches, so pack carefully) and holds up underwater.I have been very happy with this camera, appropriate for all ages.

This is an awesome camera for the price! I have not been able to put it down since I got it using it to film my family to filming my car rides. I can't wait to use this on vacation. After 3 days the closure on the waterproof case cracked and broke so I emailed the company and they sent out a new case right away they have awesome customer service

When I get the camera it is packaged great camera very supported the look of the camera is great the camera is well built it is definitely worth more than I pay its got that picture. I highly recommend this camera in just starting out and I will be definitely buying another one maybe try a new model next now that I know there quality.

Purchased this for my son.  Haven't had a chance to use it yet because no SD card included.  My fault for probably not reading the fine print.  Therefore hard to give it anything other than average not knowing how it works.  There is an offer for free accessories with a review that includes a SD Card...why not just include a free SD card with the camera?  That way the camera can be easily used prior to a review?

A high quality action camera. We bought it for our grandson who loves it. We liked the solid build of it and all of the features it has ......video, single shot, burst shootings and time lapse shots. The accessory pack including a second battery is comprehensive for all  kinds of mountings.The instructions could have been more comprehensive.

This camera far surpassed my expectations. Upon first opening it, you get many accessories and the build quality is very nice. I tested it out and took a video after I put in an SD card and the video quality is much better than I expected. My favorite part is this camera has WiFi and that function works flawlessly too!

What a fantastic first go pro camera at a great price!, there's alot of tools that come with this camera and thats awesome, and the capabilities for this camera so many settings and options for video and photo to make anything you capture look 10x better than if you were actually there. I took this on vacation with me as any other person would and had a great time recording stuff in water and out too! Overall this is a good 5 stars for me.

I had one of the older models and wanted another! The app is free (unlike GoPro) and the expectations are more than exceeded. This camera is the best for action and Youtube blogs. This coming from a Videographer/Photographer/Editor. I reconmend this to people who want to be big with small. Love it. Thanks Akaso!

This camera is great!  Very easy to understand (even for the 6-year-old we gifted it to)!  Very clear and sharp pictures and video.  This is a good camera for the price point and I would definitely buy it again.
Mounted this on my bike. It is awesome.Having the 2nd battery is a great idea too; I had to swap it out while using it; I forgot to charge the other.

Bought this camera for Christmas for my 9 year old son.  He loves it!  Uses it for all sorts of active events like when on bike or hoverboard or just chasing the cat around the house.  He really likes the feature where he can sync it to his iPad and watch on iPad what the camera is recording.  He figured out the camera and most of it features by himself so I would say it is user-friendly.  Great little camera at a great price!  I would recommend buying it!

We bought this camera to use on cruise excursions and the quality of the audio and video were great.  The camera was fully submerged most of the time as we were swimming and jumping into natural waterfalls and I was just amazed at the quality of the video as well as the audio.  Definitely worth the money.  Works like a go-pro but for a fraction of the cost.  Very happy with the purchase
This is a great product for a great price. We loved having a price option less than the name brad sports camera. My 12 year old is excited about using it while surfing, boogie boarding and biking.

This action cam is easy to use and works with majority of the action cam sticks. I like it a lot, but unfortunately the battery doesn't last long. It says the battery should last about 90 minutes. It comes with two rechargeable batteries. One of the batteries lasted about 2-3minutes when I had fully charged it. The other lasted maybe 50 minutes. It comes with minimal instructions. I googled how to use it and set up the wifi. I also can't figure out how to save the videos to my laptop. I would recommend this product, but maybe some extra batteries!

I love this camera! Everything in the box was perfectly packaged! All accessories where in small safe bags! The camera had protection films on it! It came with two batteries, and so much more! I live this camera, it's super clear, I haven't used it yet because I need to get an SD card. Although it does not come with an SD card you can still turn it on and look at the screen. It's super clear actually! I love the camera and I've only had it for about an hour already!

I bought this camera for my parents, and I have no regrets. It worked great in the rain with the waterproof protector, and my parents were thoroughly impressed. It comes with a lot of mounting gadgets, is hardy, and is easy to use. The picture quality isn't great in my opinion, but it was good enough to take pictures to record a trip. Same with the color. But at the price, can't complain at all.

This camera is pretty good for the price. Pictures are ok. Video is awesome, audio is pretty bad when in the waterproof case.The only negative i had about this camera is battery life. It comes with two batteries(i lost the second one). But, one battery barely let me record for an hour. We took this on a cruise and i ended using my phone for anything not in the water.
I used this product in Cancun and captured some great video.  I did not have any trouble using it under water.  I would consider buying a hand held gimble or stick for use.

My 9 year old son bought this with his birthday money and I'm super impressed!  Great quality video at a great price!  Audio is pretty sketchy with the case on it but that is to be expected.  Definitely worth a try if you are looking for an entry level action camera!

I recently upgraded from a cheaper model because I wanted the features that the AD7000 offers. I'm not sorry! I spent all day yesterday using the video, time-lapse, and camera modes and had a ball. The camera is easy to operate, and with all the excellent connection accessories, it's easy to put it wherever I want. The video quality is very good, even in low light; same with the time-lapse function. What really blows me away is the quality of the still photos I took in the camera mode. I printed 9 photos from inside buildings (hence often low light and always tungston or florescent color). The camera was set of "auto" white balance which I did by using my WiFi/tablet connection. I made only one adjustment: noise reduction, because the photos were noisy due to the low light conditions. I am amazed by the excellent 5x7s and even 8x10 prints that came out of the printer this morning. I"ll upload them if I can.I have two suggestions for ADASO:

for the money, you get a great compact, both video, and pictures camera, that my son managed to figure out how to use with the remote control in less than 20 minutes. It may not be pixel-3 quality video / picture, but it is robust for him to take on a trip, waterproof casing adds security, and it is compact. perfect idea...

We purchased this to celebrate our children’s birthday party.  We rented a water slide and we were able to capture such loving images.  Had so much fun great quality will definitely recommend to everyone.

Got this for our trip to Hawaii. Quality of picture and video was pretty good. First action camera I've owned, so I cant compare to anything else. Had it under water a total of an hour without any issues.I would definitely recommend

This little camera is awesome.. I use it for offshore fishing, attached to a pole, so I can film the fish when it is being reeled in. It is better than my Gopro and cost 9x less.  Would buy again 100%

Received my Akaso ek7000 today, one day earlier than expected.  I found it easy to unpack.  Battery took only 1 1/2 hours to fully charge instead of the 3 hours noted in manual.  I am pleased with the photo and video quality, I need to say that I am not a pro, but someone who enjoys photography.  Finding the correct positioning of camera while wearing the headband took a little trial and error.  The only negative thing I can say is that the manual is limited in explanation how to use all of the camera's functions and the font is too small, at least for Seniors, even while wearing reading glasses.  For the money, I believe this camera is terrific, let's see how long it lasts.  I recommend it!

We have purchased this camera mostly for our snowmobiling trips and the quality of pictures and video is great. Also it was very easy to set up. It came with different attachments, that was nice. Giving it 4 star only because sometimes camera will shut off while you think it is still recording so we missed some awesome scenes. Overall it is a nice action camera for the price you pay.

Excellent option for those just exploring the action cam market. I don't have any experience with these types of cameras previously but found this one to be easy to operate and navigate through the options/functions. I haven't been able to test the durability as of yet but will put it to the test as soon as boating season arrives. For now it takes excellent mountain bike vids and dash cam vids. I don't think you can go wrong for the price.
Putting it simply - this is a awesome product. We have loved it and wouldNever again spend the money for a go-pro when you can get a product this great at this price !!!

This is a lot of camera in a small package. Brilliant 4K video, plenty of mounting gear for helmets, tripods, handlebars, wrists, ankles or whatever. It’s the hit of Christmas and has already been outside twice for a road test. Couldn’t be happier.

Akaso ek7000 appears to be a great camera and video camera. Came with a ton of clips and brackets that I have to figure out how to use. Did not come with a disc kind of disappointed me. Also did not come with a brochure on how to use all of these different gadgets to mount your camera. However everything else seems great and world great

Good camera for the price. It does well under water. This is a good starting camera to get you started on action shots, I would suggest to get a more expensive model as you get more comfortable using this one.

This was a surprise gift my twelve year old to use as he discovers Florida reefs.  He is so impressed that it looks and feels just like the more expensive versions.  It feels like a quality item at an affordable price.  Also it is easy enough for a twelve year old to use and understand. Love all the ways it can be mounted.  We are still just beginner users, but so far very impressed.  All the mounts are quality material and easy to use.
Had a small problem after one of my trips and they sent me a brand new one for my next adventure - they stand by their product. Thank you for caring!!!!
Easy set, connecting and use.  Great value for the cost.  I'm not afraid to take it everywhere!  Great product to capture memories expecially with all the accessories!

Didn't feel like spending an arm and a leg for a Go Pro so decided to try this unit out.  I took it on my trip to Mexico.  Went diving with it and got to 60 feet down.  No leaks!  Very good quality pictures.  I like it has the LCD screen so you can see what you are taking pictures of.  Battery life is great.

I decided to get this camera for my husband since he is planning on hiking up a mountain this year. I didn’t want to spend too much money on a camera and I foun this one. It is rated really high compared to cameras of better known names as replacements for the GoPro. Definitely worth buying. Comes with two batteries so, as long as you’ve charged hem both, you won’t have problems with power.
This is a good little camera for the price. Compared to a go pro it is basically disposable. It works well and I won't feel bad if I break it.

Excellent picture quality I’d compare this little camera with go pro anytime very easy to operate and transfers pictures and videos with  ease to my Apple devises and great customer service what more could you ask for

You really don't need to spend the extra couple hundred $$$ on a GoPro when the Akaso provides a very similar experience.  I use mine on my fishing kayak and it gives me all I need and more.Wireless remote control for hands free pictures and videos.  4K resolution for high def videos.  All the extra mounting accessories one would need.  2 batteries, charging mount, and waterproof casing.

Love this camera. Great camera for a beginner trying to get good video and pictures of all the fish I catch. It's sleek and fits perfect with my Scotty fishing accessories. I haven't had any issues with my battery which is nice compared to cheaper quality cameras I've tried. For the price. Giver a try. You won't be sorry

I bought this for my daughter to use for filming as she currently uses her phone and I must say we both love it! It came with a plethora of accessories for mounting, extra battery, necessary cords and a charging station. Needless to say, we are thrilled with our purchase.
Battery life is too short

This camera is exactly what I expected.  It fit some existing go pro mounts and accessories that I had and everything works as expected.  I've taken a few videos and pictures so far and the quality has been good.  The battery door is hard to open like others mentioned, but it's getting better the more I open it.  I'm glad I decided to buy this instead of spending too much money on a new go pro.

Product is great! I am so glad I did some research instead of buying a higher priced item. This is amazing and I hope other buy it. We made moving to the beach and it will be great for our beach videos and photos

My old go pro broke and I looked extensively for a product that could match the same quality, but not for $400. I came across this product and instantly fell in love. I took it to Puerto Rico and got awesome surfing/hiking footage at crystal clear quality. It's extremely easy to operate and the screen on the back is the cherry on top. The battery length is long and it comes with an extra. If you're looking for high quality product at a low price, this is it.

Easy to start recording video and dropping movie files on my laptop. Good video quality for an affordable price. Within a few minutes of trying it, I learned about it's sound pickup range, and how it records when worn on the body. Sound & volume of your own voice is great worn on the body, but a bit hard to hear voices more than 10 ft away that aren't intentionally loud. This will be an asset to my hobbies filming martial arts and making instructional videos.
the detail should of been more clear on how product work, but overall it good for price And very good customer service and good pictures quality
It’s good. I am so good with the product. The price it’s very good.

I ordered this camera in January before a family vacation. We went scuba diving and the camera captured every moment. The 4K video is fantastic. We tested it 65 feet deep and it worked perfectly.After that, I have been using it for mountain biking and the stabilization is good.

This is a great little camera.  The price makes it even better.  If you have some recording requirements that might be risky e.g. could get damaged or lost, then this inexpensive camera should be part of your kit.  Use this instead of a more expensive camera.

80% of the videos I took this weekend ended up being corrupted .mov files and are unrecoverable.The camera shuts itself off(or rather the device crashes) after five or so minutes of use- meaning the videos I did actually record successfully all end prematurely.

I've been thinking about getting an "action camera" for some time now. Obviously I looked at the gopros first, but I was always hesitant because of the price. The I came across this one. For the price you cannot beat it. Great video quality and easy to use. Love all of the accessories that come with it. The remote is very useful.

I have used this cam mounted on my RC car, doing stills and video and I couldn't be more pleased based on the price. Naturally, when 4K cams first hit the market, they were a tad spicy in price. But, I would've never guessed I could get something like this for the price. I am pleased that versus the GoPro...I can get a quality camera for much less.

I bought this camera to do footage for ATV touring and Kayaking, after several uses I've decided to use it for much more. It is very easy to use, durable and the videos/pictures are terrific. I also plan on buying more cameras for other projects I want to do. While I haven't used for a long period of time, I have shot alot with it and so far, I've been very happy. If you are on the fence give this camera a shot.

The AKASO EK7000 is not a GoPro, but is a good quality product for the price. The images do not compare with more expensive and higher quality products, but does produce decent quality images and videos. The image stabilization is okay. It is significantly lower than its competitors and you get more than what you pay for in the quality and the accessories that come with. Definitely recommend for amateur videos.

Pretty good camera....no sound as it is in a waterproof case.  Doesn't have anyplace to attach it handles/harness without the waterproof case so no sound is available unless holding it in your hands, which is pretty dicey on a sailboat!  Otherwise, works great via bluetooth to my phone or tablet.  Good picture quality.  Pictures aren't as high quality as my iPhone and is very subject to "vibrations" on the boat so manual filming is the only way we've been able to use it.  Not used underwater much yet.  Also never received the "free month" of Lightroom that was advertised when we purchased her.

Es una excelente cámara y tiene la mejor calidad precios, estaba a punto de comprar una gopro sin embargo me animé a comprar este modelo por sus calificaciones y la verdad no me ha decepcionado.Los puntos a mejorar son: hacer un video explicativo de cómo abrir la caja, aunque parezca básico este modelo tiene sus particularidades como por ejemplo que es necesario tener un Desarmador estrella a la mano, especialmente importante si estás de visita en los Estados Unidos.

Way cheaper than the GoPro - I've been running this on my bike and figured if I fall at it breaks, it's cheaper to replace. I've been using it to record my commute and the batteries have been lasting my whole 10 mile round trip. I'm going to buy another one to put on the back of the bike.

I purchased this for my 10 year old. He wants to be like Dude Perfect. I'm not sure he will every be Dude Perfect, but the camera is Perfect. Even though my son uses it, it works for all sorts of great picture and video conditions. You really can't go wrong with the price.

I use this camera mainly when I'm out fishing on my kayak/boat. The video quality on the camera is good, plus it's really easy to use. For 50 bucks you can't beat it and it comes with tons of accessories. I would definitely recommend buying this product.

We bought this action camera for ourselves to record our adventures on the ocean in Hawaii while the magnificent Humpback whales are here and we go out to watch them from our kayak and paddleboard. So far the camera works awesome, it is easy to handle and makes our fun more fun 🤙. We recommend this action camera to everyone!

It's a nice action camera for the price but its accessories are junk it breaks easily.New info: Got a hold of their customer service for this camera and found out they have a very good customer service. They sent me a replacement for free which is nice of them and this time the camera is working great based on my expectation.

I ordered to action camera to recording training videos on how to operate machinery in my laboratory. Due to COVID, it is difficult for new hires to learn how to operate the machines without them being in the lab physically. The camera allows for me to record the process and it does so in a good quality. It does record sound fairly well too. I don't plan to use the camera for other things but if you plan to use to record stuff like this I do recommend it.

I have two boys age 9 and 6. As all the kids at that age, they are both very active, and surprisingly enough, this camera lasts pretty long with them making action videos. We have used it to capture great family memories in water, mountain biking, skiing...and the quality of the  picture is awesome. When used in the water, the sound is muted due to the hermetical box, but when i put the videos together adding my own music in the background, it all turns out pretty awesome.We are first time users and i think we will stick to AKASO with the next purchase.

I like everything about it, but I just wish you could get an external mic for it, I got this for Motovlogs and I just can't do it with this. Over all its very good but motovlogs arent exactly possible with this.

It's pretty good.  As good as it's going to get for under $100.  The glass for the lense is not super good quality.  One of the mounts don't fit right, so it won't completely seat into it.  Therefore, I'm stuck using the water proof case; and, had to remover the protective lens off to get good resolution.

We ordered this for our active 10 year old. So far he's used it during a Nerf war and on the slip and slide. He knows to be careful but he is still 10! - I'd say durability is good. Images came out nice. Definitely worth it for a 10 year old!The screen is small so it's trickier to take a traditional photo (compared to my phone screen). But definitely do-able (I snapped a few extra pics in case I moved and one was blurry).
Great mini camera, great accessories, easy to use.  I love the water proof case, especially when when my son accidently drops it in the rain puddle.  Over all good quality.

I purchased this camera to go on vacation and it worked great! I loved that it wasn’t heavy and I could wear it in multiple different ways depending on what I was doing.  I had some issues getting the camera and mount off of the box it was attached to but finally was able to figure it out. Their customer service reached out to me and were extremely helpful and genuinely cared! I highly recommend this product and if you have any questions, they will be more than happy to help!

We have used this playing hide and seek and bike riding.  Kids have had a lot of fun with it, and its taken some good pictures.  My daughter enjoys recording things so I just give it to her and let her go.

This is great in my opinion. Still have to get the right angle on my helmet. Remote works good. Lots of mounting hardware. Still need to work out some bugs but it is my error, not the unit. Comparable to go pro hero 4 or 5 I think. I have only used the 1080 setting. Will try 2.5 and 4k soon. Battery runs low fast in cold conditions but it does tell you what temps you should use it at. Very pleased so far.

I'm not a Camera expert so i can't tell you if the picture quality is better or worse than other. I can say though i enjoy this camera. Its easy to use once you read the instruction thoroughly. A hour battery life recording is fine for me, I haven't ran into any problems with this but i use a timer for it anyway. The picture quality is great in my opinion and comes out clear. For the value i really like this camera and i have bought 2 so far.

We bought this for our 8 year old grandson.  The set up was a bit tough but once he started using it he loved it.  The waterproof case was his favorite.  The only thing that would have been better is if it came with a cable to upload videos and pictures.  We had to get a cable with a converter to save his videos from the micro disk to his iPad.  But that is a minor suggestion.  We give this camera 5 stars.

I used the camera for a couple days outdoors. I used it more for videos than photos, and I'm pretty happy with how they turned out. The videos were taking while in a car driving/off-roading, so considering the activity the video was actually quite stable! It was also very simple and quick to transfer the videos from the camera to my phone with the app. I would recommend using the open back door for videos for better sound quality. I also own a GoPro, and this device comes quite close in features and quality. For the price, it's a great camera!

What an awesome action camera! I have a GoPro Hero 2 and was looking to upgrade and get an additional action camera when I came across the EK 7000. I couldn’t believe that it was 4K AND WiFi  for such a great price. I was skeptical when I bought it until I tried it out. As a private pilot, it is great having the screen so I can see what I am filming BEFORE I get home. The clarity is unbelievable and the remote control is an absolute safety necessity for my needs. I will be purchasing a 2nd EK7000 to augment the one I currently own. THANKS AKASO for such a great AND affordable product!

The size, weight and quality of video/photo are great. The two batteries are handy.Be careful when opening the battery latch. I broke mine, but it was my fault (partially. the manual should give some information about how to open it). But even broken, it closes properly.
Beats the heck out of the high priced action cameras. Plenty of accessories.Does not have head accessory though - wish it did.
Bargain camera. It works just as good as a go-pro, it has the same features and it also comes with extra items. Such as mounting brackets, remote control, etc...

I was trying to find a more affordable version of GoPro and I happen to have read an article regarding the best waterproof cameras. Akaso was picked as "best bang for the buck" according to bestreviews.com. I went ahead and ordered it and I am so glad that I did. I have tested the camera in underwater and regular conditions and it has worked perfectly. I was surprised that you can still hear a bit of audio even underwater. The tons of attachments and the second battery are a plus for me. It works well with my phone and the app as well. I look forward to using it on our cruise. Great product and incredible at the price that I paid.
UPDATEI take it back, this is terrible.

I'd give it -5 stars if I could.  I turned it on, the screen in the back flashed on for literally one second and then turned off.  Now IT WON"T DO ANYTHING AT ALL, no screen, no lights, just a dead piece of plastic.  Even with charged batteries.  Piece of garbage.  Save your money and get a Yi.  There are small bubbles under the rear screen (no, it isn't the protective film) with small pieces of dust or something.  The charger light is red until I remove the battery, then it turns blue.  The problem is, it stays blue even after I put the battery back in.

The best of all, the price for this action camera is unbeatable !  A very honest price for what it is and all the accessories that comes with it. Actually, it is a real, real bargain!  Very impressed with the 1080p video quality, something I think is key for an action camera.  Has a high quality look and feel.  Very easy to operate. I have to say that I am very pleased with this purchase. if you are thinking of buying a action camera, I would definitely recommend this one !
Amazing little device that totally beats the prices of their competition!  Waterproof case and many more little accessories that come with it not to mention an extra battery ! Love it !

I loooove this mini camara, was the perfect last minute shopping. We have all the great moments on video thanks to this.... we spent a lot of time in the water and works perfectly, no water inside. Sound is good too.

Easy to use out of the box, delivered on time and as promised without damage. Used one time and worked without any issue. Haven't tried wifi or included remote. We will update this review by end of Jan 2017 as it will get a lot of use over the next several weeks.Edit: 2/20/19 - Still working well without problems. Can't comment on wifi or remote - never needed either.

The build quality on the one I received was sub-par. The spring for the up-button is broken and it would jam rendering the camera useless. Unfortunately I really needed the camera for a trip I was leaving for the next day so I decided to tinker with it and I got it to the point where it was usable. However, it is still very frustrating because I had to fix it myself, I have to press very hard to make it work, and it still doesn't click to let me know that the button push has registered. I give two stars because the camera still seems to function correctly and the video/picture quality does not seem bad for personal use.

I love the quality and is really small. It is like a go pro without all the extra features. I din't like how it only does 4k in 25 frames per second. I bought with think cheap camera it is more of an action camera still use and love it.I noted it kind of has a fish eye effect but still love.To unlock all options for resolution for video you need an 32 micro sd card.The door at the bottom for the battery was hard to open so I took it and works fine just can't be jostled around or it falls so I lost the two batteries it came with.Great camera hope this helped you know about the product.

Got the product about a week ago and have been fiddling with it and am very impressed! The quality of the images is very good and the fact that it includes a waterproof case for underwater video and pictures is fantastic. I will be using it heavily during my upcoming snorkeling trip. While it is a good value and comes with a lot of accessories, it surprisingly doesn't come with a wrist strap so I've had to rig one up with the provided accessories. Battery life could also be a little better, but it does come with two batteries and a charger so that definitely helps.

Overall product work as expected. Picture quality was great I have it mounted to my motorcycle helmet and it captures great video for when I ride. One of my only cons is the battery life is very short I can probably get about an hour worth of ride before I have to change it out which is expected. With the typical go pro battery I don’t believe you get that much battery life out of it either.Luckily they give you a second battery so I can just switch it out once I reach my destination.

I'm incredibly surprised about the quality of this camera for the price. It works well, is extremely tiny and portable and comes with tons of accessories for mounting and stabilization. This camera is meant for action filming, so if you don't want a fisheye lense then it isn't for you. The screen also is quite small, therefore the quality on the camera itself is a little low. But it works well for my purposes and I'm very satisfied with the end results.

I love this camera!  It came with everything I needed to get started, and even came with 2 batteries so I can always have one on hand. I love how small and light-weight it is.  It works as well as any camera I've owned, is waterproof, and really affordable.

I like it.  It's a good little camera.  Me and the kids have been using it to take short videos and pictures too.  It's neat that you can use it as a webcam too.  Might be helpful since we're doing virtual school this year because of the pandemic.

Camera works great under water. The case is very sturdy and doesn’t leak. I have taken it approx 8 feet under water without any issues. Download the Ez iCam app if you have an iPhone to transfer photos and videos that you would like to post to instagram or Facebook.

So far so good for this camera!  I've never owned one of the more expensive ones, but this one has been fun so far!  We plan to use it on some of our adventures of hiking, biking and kayaking!  One tip I would add is definitely download the app first and connect to the camera to update the date and time.  I didn't do that and we have some things dated for 01/02/2019 - Oops!

I used the camera for 2 days of diving in Roatan. First 2 days everything was fine. On the third day of diving half way through the first dive I went to take another video. Unfortunately the housing was half full of water! I had taken a few video at start of the dive so I know it had a seal when I got in the water. That afternoon. After a dive I took the housing itself into the water off the beach and in about 4 feet of water it flooded again. The camera was very good and took good videos and was easy to use. But the housing failed.

I recently retired and bought this as a gift to myself. I had seen all the advertising about these type cameras and decided to try it myself. Easy to setup, use and operate. I taking it biking and kayaking, have enjoyed it immensely , highly recommend

This camera does exactly what it is supposed to do.  Instructions were easy and we were up and running in no time.  Easy and fun to use.  Great picture quality.  Love the accessories!!!  A big thumbs up for this camera!!!
This works great for the money, I use it daily for my 1 1/2 hour drive to work. I don't think it has a stabilizer. My son also purchased one loves it.

Just got my camera and can't wait to have some fun recording some crazy stuff! Very easy to use, very efficient and it comes with tons of mounts and 2 batteries. The higher priced competitor seems like a ripoff after buying this camera. Very happy with my purchase.

This is just an excellent cost-effective sports camera. The fact that the basic camera comes with a complete set of mounts, where other brands typically sell those as a separate purchase, was a nice bonus. I use the camera for river rafting videos and photos, and I know I will soon be adding more of these cameras to my outdoor activities.

Nice little camera and comes with a ton of different mounts, I have never used a go pro so can't compare quality but I imagine the price difference is a big plus, easy to switch from video to photo, the remote wrist band is really useful and being able to connect remotely with your phone is an awesome feature to remotely photograph wildlife etc.can't wait to take this on a shark dive
I bought this for my husband and he loves it. He loves to ride his bike, windsurf, swim etc. and he wants to add more extreme hobbies to the list. Love all the accessories and extras.

I couldn't believe there's a cheaper good quality version of a go pro. it's very easy to use and there's a lot of video tutorial online.. i just wished they worked on the app for the wifi connection, it keeps disconnecting.anyway i haven't used it for a big adventure so i might change this review
This product is a great value and awesome capabilities. Great video and a fraction of the cost. Came with lots of extras, including an extra battery. Definitely a great deal.

LOVE LOVE LOVE this product! My boyfriend and I used it on our trip to Florida and it was perfect. Very cheap and high quality for the price. It's just like a GoPro. Small and compact so its easy to carry around with you and its a great camera overall. The only bad thing I have to say is that some of the mounts are a little confusing just because theres so many options on how to put it but its a great product.

So far this product is amazing. We weren’t sure how we felt about a camera and didn’t want to pay 200+ for one. We decided to grab a cheaper version and honestly it’s really nice. There’s two apps you can download. I love being able to see the videos/photos straight on my phone (side note be sure your volume button is on or there will be no sound). I haven’t tried the water proof case yet but it seems pretty solid. The picture is really nice as well. Definitely worth the money!

I had thought about buying myself a GoPro for years. I frequently attend large conferences and travel to new places often and was looking for something to document my experiences. I came across this MUCH CHEAPER camera one day and thought what the heck I'll give it a shot. I have not been disappointed! I used it over the 4th of July to capture some awesome videos at a family picnic of my cousins and I will be brining it to Chicago with me in a few weeks while I volunteer at a World Leadership Congress.  What a great purchase!

I order this product 8 days ago, I try everything on it on it so far and is amazing the easy use of it. For the prize of this product you will get your mind blow. Ill will buy more for Christmas presents, for my family.

When I say this has to be the best purchase I have made in a long time I am not kidding. The features are incredible. I'm still trying to learn all the different things I can do with it but the best thing I like is being abke to connect the camera to my phone through Wi-Fi and being able to control it right from my phone. Can't wait for the summer to try out the water proof case and get some sweet action shots. As of so far I don't have anything bad to say about it!
Works well
recording various outings while boating or hiking on the trails. Versatile with all the mounting attachments. Extra battery comes in really handy.

It is an awesome action camera with touch screen, remote control , WiFi & HDMI features. It is waterproof too which makes it usable while snorkeling which I love. Pictures are good and the video is crisp. The package include mounting  accessories with a battery, charger, cleaning cloth etc. I recommend this product who is looking for a GoPro like camera but for a lesser price
I am very pleased with this camera. It is very similar in quality to the GoPro! So many features and accessories!  Highly recommend!
The small size, ease of use, and simple construction are big pluses. Also, the variety of attachment adapters are very handy. It's a convenient little waterproof camera, a good value for the money.

have not tested water resistance yet but everything looks great and there are many pieces that come with the camera . the video looks great and battery life could be longer but since they give two batteries , no big deal . with the money you save on this you can buy multiple one of these to rival one go pro . will update as I use the product more and more . so far would buy again.

My husband and I are traveling to Southeast Asia in a month and this is what we got the camera for. We have toyed with it for the past few days and think it is exactly what we will need for our trip. We aren't professionals but simply want to log our journey for ourselves and family. We think the quality and options this camera offers is perfect for the use and was easy on the wallet also.

Our son wanted his own camera for making videos while biking or playing in the yard etc. This was a great option at an affordable price. He loves making short videos and taking lots of pictures with it  and the quality is nice, so no more blurry tablet pictures. We gave this to him for his 7th birthday, so great for kiddos.

I’ve had this product for a little over a year. Initially bought it for a scuba trip but didn’t receive it in time. Only used the camera one other time not even in the water just as a regular camera. Today I went to charge it and see if there was anything on my SD card and after charging it the camera won’t even turn on.

though I have not yet been able to get the camera out into the wilds as I intend, just going through the initial setup has been pretty cool.  The instructions were very clear and well laid out.  Once getting the initial understanding of what buttons did what, going through the settings and different functions of the camera where fairly simple and well laid out.Sure, its not a gopro...but not everyone can afford those.  I appreciate that this is not complicated,  I appreciate all of the attachments that came along with it.  I believe it will serve my desires quite nicely.
Pros:  Cheap, 4k videoCons:  Zero ability to set any 'normal' camera settings - aperture, shutter speed, ISO, white balance, frame rate, etc.

Great kittle camera. Good video, good pictures. Works well with wifi to my phone. RecommendedRevised 5/13 - had to re-install app, and the app no longer works. The app thinks it's connected to a 360 deg video camera, which I can't remove. Deleting & reinstalling the app doesn't fix this. So, I can no longer remotely control the camera.

I bought this camera for my 13 Year old for Christmas she loves it and has been using it all summer swimming and doing crazy things like flips etc on the trampoline it was super easy to set up and super easy to use I would buy this item again if I was looking for another action Camera.

I purchased this product for an 11 year old who really wanted a camera for his scooter. This fit the bill perfectly so far. For the price, it delivered a great quality picture that was so simple to set up, my 11 year old did it without my help. Great affordable starter camera!

I bought this camera as a gift for my father, who put it to the test soon after on a cruise of the Caribbean. We had no issues with setup or usage, and it performed well in all situations (kayaking, swimming, etc). This camera is a solid alternative to the GoPro, but is much cheaper.

I now own two of these cameras and use them in my car and when I film or take pictures at car shows. I love it. the image quality is excellent to say the least. the only thing I would improve is the sound quality and battery. However, I have extra batteries to exchange when I need.  I would recommend this camera to anyone getting started with recording their favorite hobbies/activities.

After doing some extensive research I decided to purchase the akaso ek7000 4K action camera for my trip to Hawaii next year. After messing around with the settings and practicing on my runs I have to say that this was the best decision I could have made. The picture quality is amazing in the video is just as good. The built-in e is is also an amazing feature. I can't wait tell my vacation now and see videos and pictures when I go snorkeling and volcano climbing.
The camera does not connect to WiFi. Other people have had the same issue, but it’s lighter than the GoPro, turns on quick, and easy to use.

Works fine. But..... After 3 month of use inside truck, battery expanded and stopped working. Is obviously the heat in South florida. Also, it should have an indicator in back of camera showing that is on and recording. New update... Now it won't charge at all, inside connectors are no longer working.

The EK7000 is an excellent value.  It does everything that the listing claims, and does it well.  I am very glad that I was able to save some money purchasing this camera instead of more expensive alternatives.Packaging, fit, and finish are very good.
Pros:Nice-looking video

This is a great camera, BUT FOR THE BATTERY. Seems like if you have the Wifi On, you get about 45-1 hour of useable time. Other than the battery, it is no different than a previous GOPRO Hero 3 that I previously purchased. The video quality is great at the referenced 4K and looks just like a video taken by a GoPro. It also comes with a bunch of accessories which otherwise would cost you hundreds of dollars.

I love this little camera, I was worried because I'd never heard of the brand but it works VERY well. I have no complaints about it except maybe the battery life, but I've no comparison. I get about an hour or so of recording 4k video. So it's not that big of a deal, especially since it comes with two batteries. The picture quality is amazing and I'm really happy I have this in my camera bag.

Was looking for a replacement for my Hero 3 that was lost at the bottom of the ocean, while surfing.  After playing with the settings and evaluating the results, the Akaso when set at 30fps-2.7k took better images than the GoPro. When using freeze frame in Amersoft Video Converter the image was much better than that of the Hero 3.  This coupled with the added features of the Akaso, made it an excellent choice in it's price range.
I’m very satisfied with this camera, the picture and video have an excellent quality. You have an excellent product for an excellent price. I recommend this camera.

This camera works well and is easy to operate.  I use it for a backup camera to my boat and on my boat backing it into my very tight garage.  Also use it on my cross bow for hunting.  The battery does drain in extreme cold but I expected that.  Second battery comes in handy when out in very cold weather.

I had told a friend I was looking to get an action camera but didn’t really want to spend the amount of money I thought I was going to have to. He recommended this camera instead of ones that costs hundreds. I watched a couple of his fishing videos and I was sold. After I got one and started using it I see absolutely no point in getting any other camera- will probably end up getting one for my wife as well. Hands down the best value for the cost!!!!

I did a lot of research before purchasing this item and I’m so stoked to be able to use it! I’m always hiking and chasing sunrises/sunsets so the various modes/functions of this camera are perfect.It takes a MicroSD card so be sure to have that handy!

seems like the video is fine so far, battery life is not that great. I guess the screen eats up battery time too. first use with go pro mount already on my ski helmet was a bust, The camera rocked back and forth and made for unusable footage. I swapped the camera mount with a real go pro clip and its tight now.

For the price i paid, it's worth it, amazing color and definition, not problem with the water proof case. No worries if picture on the camera itself is small but when downloaded to a computer and watched the footage on a monitor, you won't be disappointed

I was thinking of getting the GOPRO after seeing it used on a cruise last year. Price was the problem. This year we are going on another cruise and I decided on the Akaso EK7000 4K after reading many reviews. It takes small learning curve but every time I use it I am impressed. I was very disappointed  about the LOW audio when using the water proof case. Then after reading more reviews I discovered that there is a second rear cover that is vented and it was in the box. Problem solved. The camera is better then I expected given the price. Included are many attachments and bands to attach. I also bought on Amazon a kit with many many more for 24 dollars.

Was going to get a GoPro, but this was an amazing action camera as well. Maybe better! It was cheap as well. There was a lot of qualities packed into such an affordable camera.
