Also, it came with extra small excesories that I can clip on to things. Has a great image as well. Very clear and has different modes like video, burst, picture, time laps, slo-mo, and some others. Has waterproof case with it too, which I wasn't expecting. It really did fit all my needs.
I like the price and the cost performance.Comparing to Go Pro which are much higher price, this unit can deliver good value.

To me this action cam is a really good bang for your buck. I've used it kayaking, mountain biking and hiking. It takes good photos, and stabilizes well while movement is heavy and fast. I've used it underwater as well, and the image was phenomenal, very surprised. To me, there this for it's price or you can double, or triple the cost for something pretty similar. So to expand any more gear you want to get, this product definitely does the job.

I just picked up the EK7000. AKASO doesn't disappoint! With the moble app menus sharing is super easy , it still integrates perfectly with my phone via Bluetooth, has the great little remote control, and takes incredible photos and videos. Came with a whole box of accessories too.For the price, quality, and ease of use I can't imagine go going back to paying for a name.

What a great price for this fantastic camera. I can't believe how good the quality is for the Akaso! Having always bought GoPro's before, I thought I would give this a try because of the low cost. I can't tell any difference between the Akaso and the GoPro's. The mount's are not compatible between the two units, so you will probably want to get the Akaso accessory kit. I bought two of these, and I am very happy with both of them.

Awesome camera! For the price you really can't beat this camera it is much better than the GoPro does the exact same thing as and is made with high-quality product material but the only thing is you have to find a compatible software that will let you edit the video. Comes with 2 batteries and a charger as well as many other accessories. But where the secondary faceplate cover is not waterproof but the one that it comes with already intact is.

I just bought this gopro for my son for christmas because he is wanting to start his own YouTube channel! He absolutely loves it, he said it is better then the other gopro he has. I love that you get 21 items all together for a great price, and that it comes with a waterproof case, and you connect to wifi with it. I also received this item with in a couple of days from ordering. I would highly recommend buying this item. Love it!!

Bought this action cam for my son so that he could make Youtube videos and record our trail rides.  Decided on this one based on reviews and price and it has been fantastic.  Would definitely recommend.

Super great value. Ya get what ya pay for. It really does work well. I got it for my kids they had a blast with it but be sure not to get it wet! It doesnt have a very wide range but like I said ya get what ya pay for. Super awesome action cam for kids to start out with!
Bought this camera for my son to make youtube videos and he loves it. Easy to use and easy to set up once you download the pdf file to install it all.

I am very pleased with the  AKASO EK7000 Action Camera 4K.I  wanted a camera I could attach to my back pack strap, to show my gran kids the wonderful views of being outside in the woods and mountains.  I have used the camera multiple times and have been VERY pleased with the durability and ease of use.  Bottom line it meets my needs and exceeded my expectations, also it was something I could afford.
It came with nice accessories and a coupon for more.  Two batteries and a water proof or water resistant case. I’ll probably get another one.

Did a lot of research and decided for this option instead of paying a lot of money for those GoPros. This camera is a win-win, very affordable price, good quality. That remote control is a life saver when you need to record or take pics in extreme situations and don't have anybody to assist, also great when used as dash-cam. Will buy more for sure!!

Easy to use pictures outside/inside of was super great. Videos under water were great quality but not as good as a $400 one. Totally shocked how compared to expensive cameras, you could not tell a difference!

It’s a great product. I have it mounted on my motorcycle to help be an extra story coverage. People don’t watch for motorcycles much. So this camera will assist with covering me in the instance anything happens. The picture is great, sound is great. I have zero complaints
This camera is awesome. Excellent photo quality.  Nice and  easy to use.  Better than a go pro by far. Excellent package. I reccomend it for any event needing to be in water.
Nifty little cam - great product for the price!  Still in trial mode but so far, so good!Capturing video of my MTB rides - fun stuff!

I would never have considered purchasing a "Go-Pro". It wasn't worth the price but thought I'd try the Akaso EK700  and I am pleasantly surprised at the quality and versatility of this little camera. I can shoot a video of my grandson diving into our pool and not only catch his above-water form but also the entry and below-the-surface action. We're considering getting another for him.

On the beginning I was skeptical reading certain reviews but after trying it I am pretty satisfied with this product.Recording in 4K works as expected, the videos seemed to run very smoothly. Runs better in 1080.

I bought my son (14) this for his birthday on June 15th. I recieved the item by noon the very next day! He has not put it down since. He is wearing it for everything he does ride a bike, baseball practice, swimming, running, he put it on the dog and so much more! Each night he sits and watches his videos that are crystal clear! Great product for a great price!

Bought this for my trip to Maui in June! researched all the other options in the price range for weeks....ordered this and couldn't be any happier! this thing works great and held up trekking all over the island and lots of time under water. mainly bought for snorkeling and it payed off! video looks great. highly suggest buying a underwater case for a gopro because the case that comes with does not offer filters. the gopro cases have tons of them for cheap!
*This review will be updated after use.I’m going to start with 5 stars, because of how much you get for your money. Assuming quality of footage lives up to my excitement, the stars will remain.

I have nothing to reference the quality of the video I took too but I thought it did just fine. The picture was clean and clear. The camera is very simple to use.  I purchased to take some video for when I go hiking and I think it is going to work just fine. If I enjoy the hobby of recording my adventures via video I can upgrade later but for now I would say this is the perfect introductory camera to play around with.

This was the perfect camera for my 12 year old boy who is super involved in skate parks, biking, hiking and water sports. In family of 6 where everything gets broken, this was far superior over the more expands brand(s) and fit the bill for fun and excitement. Would purchase again.
Returned the first one because it leaked at 35’.  Second one seems to be working fine at 60’. I have only used it once so far but was fine. A good substitute for a GoPro for the price.

Camera arrived super fast and I immediately proceeded to test it. To my surprise, this camera blew my mind with the quality of image. I own a GoPro and I can honestly say that this camera is as high quality as a GoPro for a fraction of the price. I wish I came across this camera before I bought my GoPro and I would have save a lot of money without compromising quality. Do yourself a favor and get this little camera ASAP. You won’t regret it!

This action camera has great quality videos and pictures, nothing compare to the GoPro though, but for less than $100 I can't complain!  Great for a starter cam and also if you are on a budget.  It comes with 19 additional accessories!  I couldn't use all of the accessories, but it's good just to have them.  I especially like the waterproof case that came with it.

I have had a great experience with this seller. They've gone above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my purchase. There definitely needs to be more sellers with this kind of ethic. The camera works great and is packed full of features like a higher priced action cam. Highly suggest buying from this seller!

This so far has proven to be a decent investment for the price. I mounted the camera to the handle bars on my bike to record my rides. So far I have had success getting video recorded and downloaded to my phone and tablet. I did not rate a  5, since I have no other product or use to really compare it to, but for me so far it has performed usefully.

I took this product out snowboarding and got nothing but unless footage. The listing claims 1080p but looks closer to 480p.Also, when opening the package I found a paper claiming that if I leave a review on this product they will send me a free SD card, which is required to use the device.

All the affordable webcams are sold out because almost everyone is stuck at home and has to work or attend school online. Well this little action camera hooked right up to my PC and was good to go. The microphone doesn't work with the live camera (recording only) but we have headphones with a mic. Comes with a ton of mount options and we can now make our own "action" movies while we social distance. I only wish it came with a micro SD card.

Just opened the camera and, after figuring out how to remove it from the packaging, everything seems pretty good. The controls are fairly straightforward, as are the menu options. I have tried several different video resolutions/frame rates and find them all to be pretty good quality, especially for the purposes of this camera. The photos are not as impressive, but that's not what I purchased the camera for, so no big deal.I am particularly impressed that it comes with TWO batteries.

I received my akaso today.  I took it to the pool tonight and used it under water for about 5 minutes.  When I got out I noticed a few drops of water in the case.  I know the spare back isn't waterproof, but I wasn't using the spare.  I took it back to the house, removed the camera, and stuck the case under water in the sink for 15 minutes.  No buttons were pushed, but when I took it out there was water in the case again.  I'm leaving for vacation in two days and I can't use this camera.  I'm sorry I purchased it, and I'll be sending it back.

Its not the best quality out there. Its by no means an "amazing camera". But for the price, its pretty sweet. For sure worth it. Quality is pretty decent was actually kinda surprised. Connection to the app was really easy and quality from videos look better when viewed through the app.  Would recommend to anyone wanting a camera but don't want to splurge on a go pro.

I don't know how this camera got all these great reviews. Had to return mine because it would keep freezing on me. It would record for about 20 seconds, freeze, and the only way to unfeeeze it would be to take out the battery. The audio was also extremely muzzled. Couldn't make out a word that was being said. Maybe I just had gotten a bad camera, but sometimes you get what you pay for. Oh well. Going to go for the GoPro Hero 4. At least with that one, it has earned a reputation for itself.

Nice camera. Quick shipping. I'm editing my review. The case wasn't scratched, it was a plastic film. Don't know why it was that difficult to see/remove but after another camera part left an intention on the film, only then could I see it and remove it.Anyway, after going back and forth with the seller, I figured it out. The seller was very accomodating and answered all my emails in a timely manner.

Its off, the unit's box was placed in a larger box with zero packaging around it. thing was just bobbling around inside during shipping. rather unusual for Amazon orders, more often it's over sized boxing with overly stuffed padding.Now on to the unit it's self -

Holy cow this camera is awesome.  Just got back from Hawaii and we have some incredible footage.  We went scuba diving in 40' water and took great pictures but even better video.  Also did a ton of snorkling with the same results.  Used the camera out of the water and it worked great.  The accessories are killer!

Love my new camera good sound, picture and stability. Comes with plenty of accessories to get you started and mount camera to your body, bicycle and motorcycle. I’ve attached them to all my toys’ so far super satisfied. Not bad at all for the price.Company also has a great customer service department, prompt professional and helpful with any questions and concerns.

I ordered this camera to use a webcam for video conferences.  The video is really dark, so some manual adjustment to the exposure settings is crucial.  Also, the phone app makes the device MUCH easier to use.  If you plan to use it as a webcam, I'd recommend ordering a microHDMI to HDMI cable/converter.  The USB interface as a webcam works, but the throughput on USB makes the video very jerky and not pleasant to watch.

Bought this for my husband. He uses the hat attachment the most for hunting, going to the lake, fishing and much more. Love the ease of the camera. Setup was fast and simple. Picture quality is great as well. The battery stays charged for a long time. We have had this camera for 7months now, and have not had any problems. We have told some of our friends to get this one when they were looking at getting a GoPro camera.

From my 12 year old son: I got this 2 years ago for Christmas. I love it because it's super durable and doesn't leak when put under water. The photo and video quality are great and it has a long battery life. Remember to buy an SD card also because it doesn't come with one. I've attached it to my helmet while riding a bike, attached it to an RC car, and used it underwater both in a pool and in the ocean. Doesn't disappoint! I'd recommend this product to anyone.

I just received my also in the mail today after quick 2 day shipping and I am very pleased. I did not read close enough and did not realize no micro sd card was included so I have to purchase one of those as well, but that is not a big deal. This little thing looks like it packs a punch and I can wait to see how it performs . This is the first time I have purchased a action cam like this and figured you cant beat this value.
Just bought for use out of canoe and with our kids. The picture is clear, fast shipping, great price for all you get. Highly recommend to buy.

I am giving this a one star because in less than three months after purchase this charger broke.  I am the only one who uses it, it is very light and the end just broke.  Cheap.  Now I have to find a new one.

Initially bought this to record some skateboard practice videos and dint want to take the plunge with a gopro, so this was a nicely priced alternative. It quickly became my everyday camera because i love the wide field of view im always wondering what next i can capture and record. This is a nice little camera for the money. I amazed at the functionality. Stills, burst mode stills and video along with Wifi and remote control make it very useful.batteries so you can keep having fun with it for quite a while.I can't believe the size of it!! I

After doing a lot of research, I decided to purchase the AKASO instead of a GoPro. I’m so happy with this purchase!!! Great price and the action camera looks and feels of high quality.This purchase also comes with a whole box of accessories. (GoPro doesn’t come with any).

I could not believe everything they included in this purchase.  You get all the mounts you need and I am mounting it to a boat.  The stability of the image is amazing considering I am filming skiing from a boat mount.  Battery life is good for the size and the app/wifi control works very well.  I cannot imagine what the $200+ competitors offer beyond what you get with this camera.

Awesome camera and even better price! Very good quality. Picture is very clear with good color. The play back feature on the camera is nice to have. The only thing is the sound quality is not as good as we'd like it to be. The plastic casing around the camera doesn't allow the sound to record as good as it should. But for the price I would buy it again!

Have not had a chance to give a performance test of it. The box ship in was way to small for the item and it could have (lucky it did not) get damaged. So right now only can say packaging was not good. Will see later this week if camera is any good.

This camera is an awesome alternative to the overpriced GoPro brand. Although the still images aren't as good as a decent smartphone can produce, it shines in the video realm (what it's meant for as an action cam). The video quality is astounding for the price of this camera. It's super light weight so it's easy to mount on just about anything, including your body. All of the accessories make it very versatile. Overall I'm happy to give this camera 5 stars and I would recommend it to a friend in a heartbeat.

DONT DO IT!!! My husband and I got this for our cruise and the SD card wouldn’t go in the camera. It’s like a piece was blocking it from going in so we couldn’t use it at all. Tried to get in contact and nothing. Spend the extra money for name brand of this is what off brand is like.
Battery compartment is flimsy . The plug ins are even worse, poorly built for a go pro like camera. The customer service representative issued a full refund, so i added two stars.

The company sends a card in the box offering free product for a review. I can confidently say that's where this high ranking came from. It is a worthless camera and I have a very disappointed kid. I'm returning it but not sure I can afford a decent replacement that actually works. Do. Not. Buy. This.

I bought this for my husband to use with a drone. When comparing this with others - it has the same features and specifications as many more expensive models. After reading the reviews I decided this was the best value for my dollar. I am so glad I went with this! The quality is great and it works perfectly with the drone. My husband has already crashed it a few times and the camera has held up great!! Since it wasn't outrageously expensive, I'm not freaking everytime he takes the drone out!! This makes him VERY happy!

Overall the camera is good and have used it at the beach several times. However, the wrist remote control flooded on the first use. Company response was quick but could not offer a replacement, only a 20% refund, disappointing.Update 2 weeks later, after posting my review on Amazon, the company sent me a 20% refund and 2 new wrist remotes no charge. I was then informed that they are splash proof, not waterproof, problem solved.

The video quality is outstanding as I mainly use the 1080p with 60fps video settings. High battery consumption plays a large role as you may need several batteries for continuous or lengthy use. After using mine to video paintballing, I had to change out the battery after about half an hour or more of use. I have also "torture-tested" it by helmet mounting my akaso while whitewater rafting and under the conditions it served me well.

The camera performed well. The waterproof housing kept its integrity but has a tendency to scratch easily. The instruction manual needs to be more comprehensive. Especially when it comes to the accessory clamps and mountings. Took a great deal of time and trial and error to figure out how and when to use them. It would also be nice if the camera came with a wrist strap since it is to meant in part to be used underwater.

This camera performs very well for its price tag. $50 gets you 4k video at 30fps, all the way down to 720p at 120 fps. The camera buttons are responsive and satisfyingly clicky. The included harware feels as if it will hold up very well in hot and cold temperatures and any amount of water. I haven't tested the water resistance yet. Wish that it came with a small sized micro sd card so that it was ready out of the box. Overall, definitely worth your money.
Unbelievable value for the price. Bundle has all the right accessories and the picture quality is amazing.  One of my best amazon purchase. Just look at all of the five star reviews - they don’t lie.

My son was looking for a cheaper alternative to a Go Pro, we found this camera and it had very good ratings so we decided to give it a try. We were very surprised at all the different attachments it came with.  Some of the attachments we were not quite sure how to use at first but we watched a video on You Tube that does a good job of explaining how to use them.  My son is very excited to try different things with it, he loves to snowboard, snorkel and ride bikes, I am sure the camera is going to get a lot of action!
Fantastic Value!Lots of accessories, easy to use interface, durable batteries, and decent resolution of images.

Camera itself works well, certainly can't complain. The waterproof housing on the other hand does not close ... Sort of defeats the waterproof claims of the device. The metal clip is the wrong size, almost like it was never meant to clamp shut. Since this is a fairly important accessory to the camera, I give it only 3 stars since now I will have to figure out a way to jury rig the enclosure.

Did a lot of research for a sport camera for all of the family outdoor activities, but couldn’t break down and pay the price for a GoPro. So after many review from amazon and off the internet itself I chose the Akaso. I bought the model that doesn’t have the image stabilizer and I couldn’t be more happy. I extremely recommended this as a high quality budget camera.  If you our on the fence about spending the money or trying this one out. Give it a shot you won’t be disappointed !!!!

We went to the Bahamas for our honeymoon. I knew we would be doing a lot of activities in the water so I didn't want to risk ruining by cell or camera. We loved the small size of this camera. It was easy to pack and carry along. We went snorkeling, and though small, this camera takes some great, quality pictures and video. I am so grateful we got it for our trip, and that we have these special memories captured.

i had a issue with it freezing but when i let the cam format the mini sd card i never had a issue after that this is a great cam for the price and with all the extras is definitely a big plus i would highly recommend getting one to save the money form a go pro i haven't been able to adjust the video length but i will survive with the 10 min video increments it dose record. it very clear and it has sound which is a big  plus to.

We have been very pleased with this action camera and you cannot beat the price! The kids (age 5 and 8) immediately took it to the pool and used it all day. The battery lasted longer than they played, the pictures turned out great and the videos were so much fun to watch. The water proof case has held up to the test. I would not hesitate to buy this action camera again for myself and/or as a gift.

Hi thank you for fast shipping my husband is super happy with his cámara this is the one he choose. He is a gamer and plays and records his games to teach others. So many thanks great product love it will be ordering more stuff for it .

Quite a surprise! I purchased this 4K camera after reading several reviews and watching some user submitted videos. I am not familiar with this brand and hadn't heard of this product before. So I was a little reluctant to buy this product. But I am totally impressed by the video quality, wifi connectivity, and large assortment of accessories bundled with the EK7000. $74.99 makes this hard to pass up if you are looking for an inexpensive 4K camera.

This is a great buy. I bought it to my trip to Israel and the quality of the pictures and VIDEOS is amazing. I was able to use it under the rain water and still being able to take great pictures. In addition to this, it was so convinience being able to use it from my wrist. Over all it is a great buy. My son is a graphic designer and asked me to use it for his babys picture and he was very sorprise with the quality of the pictures.

We have never used a camera like this so for our limited experience with all the many accessories that come with it, over all the experience was good.  Trying to use the little cameras thru the view finder is a little difficult with a dive mask on.  The colors are good, the picture quality was good but was hoping for it to be a little more clear.  I would buy this product again  My daughter has used it and hasn't had any problems.

Bought this camera because of the low price. I had pretty high expectations given the strong reviews and high ratings. It lived up to most of my expectations! I took it snowboarding and had no problem recording my runs with the provided waterproof case. It was easy to use and recorded everything very nicely! Only two things I wish were a little better were how long the batteries lasted and the iPhone app, but otherwise, no complaints!

New to the age of recording travel, we purchased this so that we could document our travels in video form in a compact unit.  This camera exceeded our hopes!  The images are clear and the wide angles ensure that we capture both sides of the road when we are driving!  We love this camera!  Can't wait to take it on more adventures!

We chose this camera for our trip to Costa Rica, knowing we were going to be hiking, swimming in waterfalls. Rainforests. We were not disappointed!! The waterproof  case worked fantastic! Captured us swimming underwater, we were able to strap on to our back back for hands free videoing. Great picture quality. Would def recommend this over way more pricey cameras! Thank you for the great product!

This camera gets the job done. Mic picks up well. I just recorded my granddaughter's jujitsu competition and it did a great job. Picked up in low lighting and the sound was great. Loved using the remote control. All in all. Great camera.

Bought and used this camera for my first ever scuba outing.  We went cenote diving in Mexico and I was completely impressed with this camera! The video was sharp and easy to see even though we needed dive lights to illuminate anything we wanted to see.  The audio as good too even when filmed in a waterproof case.  It was easy to use underwater and just as easy to view/offload the videos. Could you spend a ton more for a different action camera?  Sure...but why would you?
Video works very well, unfortunately the microphone is very weak. it is very quiet if to want to make videos with audio I have a two year old 5000 model that works better

1st time I used the camera diving, all was well and it beat my expectations for the price I paid. I did notice a little water had seeped into the case but it didn't cause any issues. The next time however the case leaked and camera quit working. After drying it out it appears its still dead.  Would be an OK camera for dry applications but would not recommend for any water activity.
This is a great little camera! No need to spend hundreds on a name brand the little thing can record just as good as the big guy!

Akaso read a recent complaint I made and did everything in thier power to make it right. Most companies ignore bad reviews or at minimal make an empty apology and move on, but akaso cares about thier customers and asked what they can improve and looked for my feedback to actively make thier product better. Would recommend this product and company to anyone
Can’t view with out a phone and an app. Not what I expected. Just a lot of cheap parts or plastics pieces with no instructions!!!
Water got into the inide easily. The picture quality is fair. Doesnt come with memory card which is good to know and the stability is less than fair

It's an awesome little camera for the price you just cant beat it. Only dislike was the fact that it didnt come with any instructions to how any of the accessories worked or even the names of each one. You have to have an app to scan the code and two of the apps I tried didnt work. Needless to say it took a few weeks but we figured out how to use everything without instructions.

I've been impressed with the quality and all that came with the camera for the price.  Good picture quality and great integration with the app...I'm impressed with what I got for the money. My kids and I have had fun using the camera so far and look forward to making some new videos on our upcoming vacation! I've also been impressed with how well the camera works with the app...didn't expect this added perk to be worth it, but its great.

Customers service is on point. Just use this for the bike tour and it work great. Only downside was battery life is a little bit weak, but they came with two battery u can change it which wasn't that bad. I will recommend to other.
I like the price for the product, I dislike, it doesn't have night shot features and wasnt able to link to the wifi feature but overall I love this product.

I took the camera out for the first time yesterday and the latch on the waterproof case broke.  Upon inspection, it looks like the design is very flimsy.  You also need to buy an SD card reader if you want to be able to transfer images off the camera - it estimates that it will take 60-minutes to transfer photos from the camera to my iPhone via wifi and the camera isn't recognized by my computer when I try to connect it via USB.

It does: 4K video–check. Timelapse, burst mode, and still photos–check. Built-in wifi–check. Comes with a waterproof housing (rated down to 100 feet / 30 meters)–check.The quality of the photos and videos are really really good and it comes with 2 batteries, one is a back up.

Great little camera at a very affordable price. I use it to capture off-road video in my Jeep. It mounted to my dash and takes great action video. Came with a large selection of mounting brackets so you can set it up about anyway you want. Easy to operate and battery life has been great.

First time ordering a camera and NO REGRETS! I loved how it came with not only the camera but with several accessories!There was so many pieces, but instructions were super easy to follow. Pictures helped a lot!

We got this as a starter camera for our grandson's 8th birthday.  The camera seems to be simple enough that he should be able to start using it immediately with a little guidance. He is becoming quite active in outdoor sports and activities so I'm sure he will start experimenting with the included mounting options soon.  I am confident that he will grow into using  more advanced functions with a little experience.

It is a handy little action camera. It takes decent picture and videos which I think I could compare to more expensive cameras. It is perfect for taking with you on a trip or under the water. It takes a little bit of time to get into the function of the buttons but after a short amount of trying it's easy.There is only one thing I don't like, if I took pictures and wanted to look at the last ones I took. I couldn't find it directly because they are in the reviewer mixed up.

I ordered this primarily to make drum videos. I wish the recording sound quality was a bit better, but for the price it does the job pretty well. Picture quality is quite good. I've only had it about three days now, but it's done everything I've asked of it. The accesories that came with it are plentiful, although the online manual only has pictographs to help with assembly, so it's a lot like trying to put together IKEA furniture. Looking forward to a lot of use from this in the future!

I bought this camera for use on our JetSkis but didn't want to pay the high price tag for a GoPro. This camera was a great price and the clarity and color quality of the picture is amazing! Super easy to use and I love the remote. I also have used the app that allows me to use my iPhone to control the camera as well as view the video and pictures as the camera captures them, very handy, especially when the camera is mounted in a position that doesn't lend itself to immediate viewing of the images. I definitely recommend this camera for the outstanding picture, ease of use, and great price!

Seems like a good camera. You get what you pay for definately, although i feel like this camera is better than other 50 dollar cameras on the market. The picture quality is pretty good and videos seem pretty smooth. All the accessories are jumbled together pretty confusingly in the box but taking them all out and organizing them is not hard.

I really liked this product right when I opened it from the package! It was very aesthetically pleasing and the product itself along with the accessories it came with are all good quality. They even give you the full manual online which answers  many questions commonly asked (I had a few so it was reassuring). I can’t wait to start using it on adventures and I definitely will recommend it to others who are looking for something like this!

Better quality than a GoPro for a fraction of the price! Easy for me to use, and I am technologically impaired. Enjoy high quality images without the guilt of spending hundreds of dollars on equipment.

Couldn't wait to get this thing out of the box and get it to the track this afternoon.  I love the remote switch it comes with, very simple and convenient accessory.  Pretty smooth video on bumpy roads and for the price, it's an unbeatable product.  Not many action cameras allow a 64mb card or an extra battery.  Why would anyone pay 4 times the amount for a GoPro camera is beyond me.  The accessory bundle it comes with is pretty great as well.  This little camera will definitely be on my list of referrals to friends looking to capture life when they live it at its best.

January, 2017: Just received. Instructions are clear. I've been through all the instructions in the menu everything works except I couldn't get the "Quick Modes Menu" to work. I did download the Android APP to my Samsung S6 and was able to operate the camera from the phone. The HD video playback is sharp. Battery life may be shorter than I was hoping, it seemed to drain quickly while I was learning the camera. I'm hoping it will last at least two hours, anything beyond that will be a bonus. I'll return to update this review when I get a chance to try it out.February, 2017: I've used the camera for two weeks as a dashcam, hiking cam, bicycle cam. I'm very impressed with the quality of the video and with the quality of the accessories. The battery is a 1050 mAh Li-ion and lasts only a bit more than ONE hour. That's a disappointment. I'll be checking for a battery with more Amp hours.
Great action cam! Haven't taken it under water yet, but so far definitely worth the money. My father in law has a go pro and can't tell the diff.

I haven't gotten to use this yet but I am taking it on my trip this weekend. It's a little hard to maneuver through it since it isn't touch screen but overall it resembles a GoPro pretty well. I had some problems with my goPro and only had it for 2 years and customer service sucks and wouldn't take care of it so I hope I have better luck with this camera and if something goes wrong, I can get help getting it resolved. I sampled some videos and pictures and they look great. I love that it came with 2 batteries but I wish it would've come with an SD card even if it was a smaller GB. I am excited to use!

For the price, you cant beat it. But like the other reviews say. The display on the back SUCKS! The recording quality is great. Look it's not a Gopro, but then again it's not over 300 bucks either. Bang for your buck? Definitely!

I purchased the Akaso EK7000 to use for in-home concerts from my home studio. Great value for the $$ and while I upgraded to the V50 Elite from the EK7000, I still use this device as my primary studio webcam! If you want solid quality & 4K at 30fps, get this - otherwise, spring for the V50 Elite for 4K at 60fps - you will not be disappointed!

Worked amazingly well.  Was concerned that for the cost I would possibly sacrifice performance or quality... BUT the was not the case!!This camera is amazing and simple to use.  My kids have used it many times snorkeling and paddle boarding.  I have used the accessories to video off-road driving adventures and been extremely pleased with both the video and photo imagery.

First POV type camera I’ve owned, and its been great so far mounted to a bike helmet and handlebars. Advertised as 4K, but seems to produce less choppy video on the 1080 setting.  It would be better if there was a louder beep when you start and stop recording. You also have to wake up the camera to stop the video, so you actually have to hit the button twice to stop recording. Overall it works great and I have some great bike ride videos now.

Wow this is actually really good quality. Definitely bang for the buck. The wide angle lens is amazing probably my favorite mode. And the battery level is really good too. It’s my first action camera and it’s like perfect. looking forward to go trailing with this.

I was having problems with my older gopro and figured a few years had improved technology on the market.  I was pleasantly surprised that the current entry level cameras definitely meet (and in many instances surpass) the specs cameras had just a few years ago.  The 4K on this camera is outstanding.  Same for the 120 FPS.  Transfer to phone via app is quick.  Overall, I'd recommend this camera.  And for the price, it can't be beat.

I am a go kart racer out of Pennsylvania. I was given a GoPro a couple of years ago. My brother in law recently recommended me to try the EK7000 and wow... the color and sounds absolutely blew me away! I’m loving this camera way more than my go pro! I can not wait to use it more this up and coming Race season! Great price and great picture. You can’t beat it. Give it a try if you are looking for a great camera! You won’t be disappointed!

This camera has a really good picture & sound. It's lightweight & easy to use. I bought the chest strap to go with it. Also the app is pretty easy to use to watch your videos. Be sure to "format" your SD card.

For the most part the product seems like a quality product. It does take a while to get the process started. Download or get the user manual on your phone via the website/QR code provided. Highly recommend getting an micro SD card with a Class 10 to handle the 4K quality and speed playback. My biggest drawback is the lack of a case/bag to carry the equipment in and a useful Phillips Screwdriver to switch gears.

I have had this camera for 2 weeks now and it has already surpassed my expectations!  I have not taken any action video yet, but I have taken pictures and the quality is great.  It is easy to use and it comes with several attachments and accessories.  You definitely get a total bang for your buck.  I am extremely satisfied with this product!

So far so good want to get it out for some actual action but testing it out for the price it beats what i was expecting. Would highly recommend to friends and family and anyone interested in a good little action camera. Also love how many accessories it came with

We bought this for our vacation and it was very useful. It was light to carry and easy to figure out the functions. We especially enjoyed the waterproof case and used it to film underwater on our trip. I have not used many tech devices and this was easy. I recommend this!

If not for poorly written instructions would have rated higher. Received the product in timely fashion. Opened packing and read instructions. Very hard to understand. They seem to have been written by someone with first grade or below communication skills. After I finally got the directions De-ciphered, I got the camera to work.  So far it seems to be functioning as designed. I have not cycled through each of the designed features,but the ones I have tried seem to be OK. Then I tried to figure out how to redeem the free Gift offer included in package. Took two emails to figure it out. Again poor communication skills on other end. Product itself seems to be as described.

I have purchased 2 cameras as presents for my children.  I have unpacked and charged the batteries. One camera functions properly while the other camera does not function  properly. The other camera button has to be pressed for a long time and when the camera turns on, all you can see on the screen is the snow gif. This camera is malfunctioning and I am writing this review in hopes the manufacturer will provide a replacement camera.

Price is fair for the quality of the camera.  I use the camera to record sport matches and it attaches to most phone tripods.  I also removed the case for better sound quality.  I used a 64GB SD card which worked fine, but after about 25 minutes of video capture, it would reset to a new file.  I'm not sure if it's better to use a smaller SD card for continuous recording.  Overall, still a good camera if you're not looking to spend too much money.
Works good, battery gets warm, lasts about one hour good sound and video. No problems
My husband loves this camera. It is great for wide angle and close ups. He uses it on his daily runs. This is a perfect camera for action footage!

Received my action camera and loving it so far! Needed something for my upcoming vacation for underwater use and after searching and looking at many reviews came across this camera. This camera was a great price and included many accessories along with 2 batteries for longer use. After testing it out I can say the picture quality is truly great. I am looking forward to really using it during our upcoming trip!

I bought this camera for future snorkeling trips.Right now tried it out in the pool with mask with attachment for camera. I love the hand held remote. Everything works well, for price point you can’t beat it!

When I first ordered this product my initial intent was to buy a GoPro. I continued to this products page and started looking at the specs and realized that this product and the GoPro specs matched almost identically. After receiving this product I then tried to attach it to the, already owned, GoPro accessories that I had purchased earlier. I proceeded to download the free app and checked out its features. The only thing that I am not impressed by is that the app is not compatible with 4k or it is not updated enough to recored and take stills in 4k. This was my only gripe with the product and is still not a gripe with the actual product itself. This is an amazing camera and will recommend it to anyone on a tight budget or just wants a GoPro like camera.
Great action camera, high quality 4K video but best of all it worth for only 60..I’m hoping for image stabilization for future updated product otherwise I’m happy for it

I purchased this camera during the peak of the pandemic. It was impossible to find capture devices at a decent price.This camera works great as a webcam with no additional hardware needed. It has worked for me in Streamlabs Obs, Obs Studio, Zoom, and Xsplit with no issues. Picture quality is excellent.

I did lots of research before choosing to go with Akaso.  I could not be happier with my purchase. I recently took it scuba diving and it performed wonderfully.  For the price you can not beat this product

This camera performed as advertised.  We are planning on taking it on vacation for use in water.  I have tested it out in advance and found it truly is waterproof.  The remote works (but not through glass).  WiFi ap performs.  Be aware that it is a wide angle lens that will distort shapes on the perimeter of the image and is best used to capture images less than four feet from the camera.  Great for remote shots of birds.  Have had a lot of fun testing it on my bird feeders.
takes awesome picture and video, I had it totally submerged under water for awhile and it held up, no leaks, I use it on my jet ski, bought a chest harness of course, so it is always in water

This is my fifth camera. I love them. The picture quality is as good as a GoPro at a much better value. I use them on my rc airplanes and the videos are beautiful. I don't cry when I lose one like I would with a GoPro. I am sure I will buy more in the future. Great product!!

I was looking for an alternative to a Go Pro for a trip to Hawaii. I didn’t plan on using the camera for much more than my trip and for that reason, I didn’t want to invest a lot into a camera.This little camera is great! So easy to use and takes great photos and video for my needs. Tested the waterproof case by submerging it in water with a paper towel before putting the camera in there and it did it’s job... it stayed waterproof.

Just received this camera today & I had no issue taking it out of the waterproof case to remove the protective film covers. However when I went to put the camera back into the waterproof case the latch snapped off and now the case can not be sealed.  Poor case design.I haven’t used it yet so can’t comment on the quality of the camera itself

This is a great camera for the price. The picture quality is great! Why buy a Gopro when you can buy an Akaso EK 7000 4K sports  action camera for a lot less.  This camera is well worth the money. It's  easy to use. YOU NEED THIS CAMERA!!!!

This little camera is really cool, it’s smaller than I expected but I like the size! All the attachments are really helpful. The waterproof case is secure and sturdy. I was able to connect to the iPhone app and WiFi within seconds and the camera quality seems well made. I haven’t been able to explore with the picture yet but plan on taking it on vacation. I’d say so far it’s definitely worth the price.

I wasn’t sure what to expect having never owned an action camera. I strapped it to my bicycle handle bars and went for a cruise around downtown. Upon returning I connected it to my laptop to watch the video. Wow! Turned out much better than expected. Very easy to use and it didn’t require any directions. Simple and easy to use, with great video quality!

The image quality is good and there are a ton of connections/attachments available for your basic setups (bicycle handle, helmet, etc). Connecting to the app was a breeze. The remote control is a nice addition though I don’t see myself using it very often. I really like that it comes with two batteries. Action cameras use a lot of battery life so it’s nice to have a spare when on vacation or out and about.

I used this camera on a recent trip to Puerto Morelos. I really had very little time to learn how to use it- and at 62, I'm not quick with new technology. However, I found this camera was perfect for snorkeling and did just as well as a regular camera above and below water.  There are lots of features that make it easy to use and I was thrilled with the results. Highly recommend this camera!

This cam was easy to use and good quality.  Still learning the ins and outs of recording and editing.  I recommend if a person wants to learn how to record and edit this is the right price range and a stepping stone toward a goal.  One can learn a lot about what is needed with out the high cost of trial and error.  I recommend a great buy  for all newbies and anyone needing a kick around cam.  Have fun with it and use it to the fullest.  The cost is right.

I bought this to lower down a well to see what was blocking it. I rigged a small light and was amazed at quality of the focus inside a 4 inch pvc pipe 80 ft deep.Edit: The above review was many months ago. Since the I've purchssed 2 more for hunting. Great camera!
I like the quality and features of the camera but the live HDMI output has many icons that cannot be removed

We bought this for record tennis matches. However the 1st try not very successful: the video quality is clear but the two batteries only last 25 minutes each(we record with1080P/60FPS)  which is not even enough time for a match to finish. We also found the camera very hot overheated. Another issue, although Wi-Fi provided, ok to download to Android phones/tablets but cannot download to IPhone/I-Pad which is not convenient to share.

Love this camera! After weeks of looking and comparing it to other cameras, we decided to go with the Akaso. We have never had a go pro or anything, but we were excited to receive this one and try it out. And also at such a great price. It did not take too long to figure out how to work it. Figured out which buttons did what and we were off taking pictures and video. Went to the pool to try it out underwater and it worked perfectly. Can't wait to take it on our cruise in a few months.

This product is a great value for the price. The picture quality is quite good and the mounts for the camera hold up amazingly in extreme conditions. It comes with a ton of different mounts for the camera and you would have a hard time finding something this camera couldn't stick to. I would say the only problem I had was that I had to go and purchase a micro SD card but that wasn't a big problem at all.

I returned my GP7 Black because I was disappointed by the video quality. Decided to give this one a chance and I am blown away by the quality of this camera. There is no image stabilization, but that can be adjusted in post production. I took this on my Hawaii trip and I'm very happy :)Seriously, you cannot go wrong with this camera for the price!

This camera is a great alternative to the much more expensive Go Pros. I purchased 2 for when I am riding my motorcycle. I have used them a few times now and had no issues at all. The quality is actually really great! The reason I docked 1 star, is for the EZ iCam app you use with the cameras. It is not great, and I have only gotten it to connect to the cameras once using my iPhone. It isn't a huge deal breaker for me, and hopefully this is something that will improve in the future. For what I need the cameras for though, these have done me well, without breaking the bank.

Wow! This product is great. Have to say better than a go pro, especially for the value! The picture quality is amazing! It comes with all kinds of mounts and straps, even an extra battery! If you have been looking to join the go pro like family, this is for you! Recommend by a friend and glad I bought it!

I had done a previous review. The camera I had received was not that great. No sound. It worked only as a photo camera. I have gotten a replacement camera, and it works amazing. Pictures are excellent (4K quality) and the video looks great and there’s actually sound. I’m very pleased with this product.

I got these for my niece and nephew that wanted go pros. This is a great alternative and the loved it! The first day they took 500 photos! Highly recommend as a cheap alternative to a go pro model of the like.

Needed an action camera for my trip to Singapore and this inexpensive yet good quality camera was the best option at the time.  Comes with many accessories that alone adds value to the purchase.  Camera works very well and doesn't disappoints.

Great small camera. This is my second one, and I use both of them as dash cams in my work trucks. Love the wide angle- 170 degrees and quality of the video. Also, you you would like to use it like a dash cam, you can simply use mounts, that already comes with camera. All you need to buy longer power cable and good to go!
Very surprised with all the attachments and very simple to use.  Quality construction and TWO rechargeable batteries!  My son absolutely loves this!
This is a pre review ! The packaging was nice and camera seems good quality. I need to try it underwater and then I will update it !

I bought this camera specifically for my travels in Asia. This camera has captured some great footage, and has helped me document my unforgettable experiences! I am so picky, and needless to say I am quite pleased with the quality of this camera.

I had a friend refer this to me and it did not disappoint. It came with a good amount of accessories and very easy to use. I charged the batteries and took it out on my quad. I downloaded the app and it was easy to transfer the videos to my phone. I was very pleased with the video quality and would highly recommend it.

My favorite new toy. Had this for several months, the vids are good. I've made several YouTube videos with this and the accessories are plentiful. External mics do not work, the software is ok, but for the price you can get several compared to gopro. I recommend addtional batteries.

I bought this to record my daughter's softball games.  I am using it with the Link Spyder fence mount and it is a great set up.  The build in wifi is very nice so I can instantly see videos and photos on my phone.  Battery life is sufficient for at least one full game.  I power with external battery majority of time to ensure battery doesn't die though.  It never has but just in case!

Absolutely love this Camera, I don't see why people would buy a GoPro when you can have one of these that's way cheaper. This Camera is phenomenal at picture taking and video taking. And they include so many camera mounts and parts. I absolutely reccomend this product to anyone interested in buying a waterproof camera. I love Akaso! If I could rate this camera with more stars I would!

I bought this to use on my motorcycle to capture scenic rides. I haven’t been able to test the 4K out because I don’t have a 4K device to view the videos on, but I’m doing 1080p with the highest FPS and I’ve been satisfied.The videos take quite some time to download to my phone via WiFi, which is my main complaint because you have to keep the app open and keep the screen from locking while it downloads otherwise it will cancel the download.

My granddaughter loves to go snorking and wanted to take her phone underwater in a lunch bag I saw this camera on Amazon and she is in love with it well worth the money and she got a ton of different accesories.she can put her camera on her bike , helmet , Also it has a wristband remote and she plays spy games hiding the camera and shooting pictures.

Bought to test my interests in action cams. It worked just fine, I mounted to my car's towhook and the included remote works pretty good. You can take a screenshot or video by pressing the button on the remote. No negatives other than some of the mounts are a little iffy, they look like they work with go pro ones so they are pretty universal though.

This is a good camera for the price. The software is not the greatest, it takes a bit of work to transfer the pictures to your phone wirelessly, but the pictures are decent quality and it’s easy to use. Unfortunately, we didn’t notice that our strap got caught in the waterproof case and allowed it to leak, so we’re planning on rebuying.

For the price I would buy it again! Took it to Belize and used snorkeling, caught great video and decent but grainy pics. The downfalls, no directions included, couldn’t see the date so it was wrong on pics, and it did fog up after some use.... BUT I loved I didn’t have to bring my nice camera and it was worth getting for underwater photos!

I got this camera to aid in diving videos. Im amazed at the quality of the video when i connected it to my laptop!!! Had a go pro....this is sooooo much better for the price! Deffinitely recomend this if your in a budget.

4k with a good image, and will do 720p at 120fps. The audio quality needs some work but typically I use my own sound track so it's not really an issue. Mounts and accessories are included. I'm pleased with my purchase and plan to buy at least one more.

Opened the camera yesterday, we bought it for our teenage brother who loves recording himself playing sports and doing other activities. Lots of mounting accessories included and it mounted to our tripod easily. We had to rely on YouTube for the less obvious setup, didn’t see a manual in the box. Also had quite a time connecting to WiFi, but are looking forward to using the camera for all of his ventures!
Can't wait to take it diving in the ocean. I'm still learning everything about this camera. It seems to be good quality, come with lots of accessories and was a great deal for the price.

Bought this mainly to record some snowboarding footage, we recorded in 1080p and instead of 4K but the footage is still beautiful. With two batteries to switch out the battery time was plenty for when I was using it. Very glad that I bought this, now I can look back at the memories from the snowboarding trip. Will definitely use this for other things besides just snowboarding. I was hesitant to buy at first because its a quite a bit cheaper compared to an actual GoPro but in my experience it can do everything that a GoPro can!

We haven't fully tried it out yet as it doesn't come with a sim card. My tech savy 18yo son recieved it for his bday. Hes fiddled around with it& seems happy. No complaints so far. Shipped quickly. Price was nice

Ordered this for my son as he has been asking for a go pro for quite sometime. He is very happy with it so far. Downside to this is there are lots of pieces come in the box and there is no directions as to what they are or how to assemble. This does not come with a SIM card so until we purchase he cannot fully use the camera. Did arrive pretty fast.

I bought this to take with me when my phone would be too risky to take photos or videos.  My primary uses are for magnet fishing, kayaking, anything near water, and it has become my primary!  It takes excellent video and photos and I am so impressed that I may buy a couple more for when we RV to get different shots when we are driving.  If you are on the fence about buying this camera do yourself a favor and purchase it!

I purchased this camera a few years back and was highly impressed with the value and what this camera provides. This is my first ever action camera so I dont have much to compare to but its easy to use. My previous one was brought to Jamaica and took great videos underwater and out of water. Audio was good even in waterproof case. Only reason I purchased another was due to me losing the previous one. Other than that perfection!

I think the quality was amazing it doesn't look that good on the camera but through the app it looks amazing.  The sound on the camera is horrible but when you hook it up to the app it's not that bad.  The waterproof case and all of the accessories seemed to do the job. When it came in I was very surprised by all of the features it had and all that it came with. I definitely recommend this camera it's simple and has lots of features.

Very frustrating. Some days it appears to be be recording and even though everything looks right, it is on the right setting, the record light is on on then you get home and check it to find that nothing that entire day recorded. After several different days of this and missing some amazing experiences I am going back to Go Pro it is worth paying more. I guess you get what you pay for.

One of the best customer experiences I've ever had.  I bought this, used it scuba diving for two days, and the third day the case leaked and ruined the camera.  When I reported this the company offered to replace the unit at no charge and was very apologetic. They followed through and I'm looking forward to my next trip.  Regarding video quality, I did get two days of underwater footage and I do have a 4K tv.  The video is beautiful both on a computer and on the 4K tv.  For the money, I think this is a great product and I highly recommend it and the company.

Just got camera. Seems like a really good deal so far. Instructions only say up to 32gb micro SD card, but my 64gb works with it which is awesome. I don't care for the unlock/lock mechanism for the waterproof case. The black piece comes off every time. I've yet to hook it up to my computer but I hope there is a program for editing videos from Akaso.
Great product for unbeatable price. Charged the battery and inserted 32 gb of ssd and out to capture some footage till now enjoying this cam .

If I could do a .5 rating I would.. when I received this product it wouldn't get of the presentation screen that appears. All it would say is "AKASO EK7000" I only got to see see what the picture on the 2" display looks like once for all of half a second then the screen would go black and would have to pull the battery out to "rest" the camera. Then it would either not turn on at all or go to the presentation screen.. not fond of it. Returning it as well

My 11 year old got this for a Christmas present. He thought it was a great camera straight out of the box. But the first time he went to charge the batteries the housing on the charger's USB port pulled right out. Since I was SO clever and finished my shopping in October, the return window had closed. Fortunately a helpful Amazon rep offered me credit to return the broken unit and purchase a new one. Not sure how good Akaso's customer service is, but Amazon saved the day! Hopefully the second one holds up.

I can't believe I almost bought a GoPro.  I'm sure they're awesome too... but for like $50 you can have a camera that does the same things at the same level.  I know...you're scared to buy it because it's so cheap.  So was I.  Glad I didn't give in to fear.  This thing is the deal.

This thing blows me away for the price.  Came with a box full of accessories and shoots great video.  I get about an hour and a half out of a charge.  I've mostly shot in 1080p at 60fps mode.  Nice clear shots.  Really looking forward to getting it out for some sport vids this summer.
We got this for our vacation so I haven't used it much yet but so far it's been great and pretty easy to use. Excited to capture some great pics and video on our trip through the mountains!

There were various things about the camera i received that were undesirable. The manufacturer offered to send me another one to try, i declined and received a refund instead. Maybe it was just the camera i received, but i cannot confirm.

Before I bought it I was doubting about the quality of the camera, but once I got it in my hands I was pleasantly surprised.The image is pretty sharp, it has a lot of accessories and the colors are bright  and clear.
I don't know how they achieved this lower price, but I love this camera.Certainly can't beat the latest GoPro but who cares when the price is so attractive.

After looked  for a small action camera with affordable price and many features in it, I found AKASO EK 7000 4K was the best for me and comes with a lot of accessories and the most I liked is the remote control was very helpful,

I don't have experience with a name-brand (GoPro) thing.  But this thing works great!  Videos, pictures, and you can activate the camera with a wrist worn activator button.  Very nice.  It's better than throwing $300 at something you don't understand.
Great camera, very easy to use.
I use this camera on my helmet.  When I'm working Utilities an riding my motorcycle.Overall it's a good camera.

This thing surpasses my expectations. We've had it for 3 months and we've taken it on bike rides, mountain hiking and tide pools. Image quality is great and the fittings are extremely versatile. My only issue is that I wish it had a night mode setting.

The camera takes pretty good video. However, half or more of the video files were unreadable using a SanDisk 32gb class 10 sdhc card.  Upgrading to a SanDisk 4K uhd sdhc uhs-1 card worked better.  But there are 2 main reasons I gave it 2 stars and why I sent my back: 1) the battery life is horrible - at 70 degrees F., you get an hour or less from a battery, as opposed to the 90 min that is advertised.  At 30 degrees F., you get about 25 min of battery life.  Not good when used mostly for skiing.  2) The date/time keeps getting reset to Oct 1, 2016.  This is very annoying,  Especially because the timestamp is used as a file name.  It's impossible to keep track of your videos and photos when the time stamp keeps changing.

Using this camera for action fishing videos. Very easy to use with the remote start/stop that's included in the package. In my opinion the only thing missing in the accessory package is a cap clip. All in all a great bargain for the price.

Love this camera doesn't do to good for night pics and videos but day time pics and videos are great worked out great for my vacation with the family wanted something small and easy to use and it did exactly what I needed
Too many accessories  to carry around and not a permanent place to put a strap for the times you are a hundred feet down you don’t want to drop it. I returned it

Originally looking up go pros, I saw this, very glad I ordered it. Awesome video quality and picture modes. With the water proof case on, sound is not recorded well at all. The kit comes with all kinds of odds and ends for depending on how you use it. Batteries hold a good charge and charge quickly. Overall impressed.

We bought this action camera for my nephew as a gift as he is  very active and into technology.  The setup was easy right out of the box and he was capturing in no time.  We added an additional memory card and that worked with no problem.  The wide ange capability is a nice feature and we have enjoyed the action videos our nephew has sent.  I would recommend this camera as an affordable option for an active technology driven individual.

I love this camera for when I go on trips.  It's very small which is always convenient when your packing light and has a waterproof case which is great for backpacking and camping.  I can't wait to use this camera this summer on trips!  It came with a ton of gear in the package as well.I recommend watching "AKASO EK7000 4K Action Camera Unboxed, how to use with LOADS of Test clips" video on youtube if you are clueless about cameras like I am!

This thing is pretty impressive. So far all of the features work. The WiFi works great. Your able to pretty much do everything from your phone except change the system settings on the camera. You can change the different video modes and picture modes on your phone. Many accessories included. I had a gopro once but I got a bad egg I think. This is a cheaper alternative that delivers results. Video uploaded is at 1080p/60fps. Of course the quality is lowered after uploaded online.

Horrible product.  Worked twice and only recorded video no sound at all not even when downloaded on the phone.  After the second use it never turned on again. Not even with a brand new battery.  Quality of video was horrible.

Camera worked great and filled a void when my gopro gave out. I also like the screen on the back to see exactly what you are filming. Only complaint I have is the waterproof back did not work! I used it for the first time about 2 weeks ago when we went tubing and it leaked. So now camera is no bueno. So word to the wise, don't use in water period!. Would have given camera a higher rating but now that its not working.
You can not beat the price!!! This is a great deal! I might get a bunch more and use them to make great vacation videos. 10/10 would recommend.

It works fine and the picture quality is "good" for OUTDOOR filming. No matter how high I set the quality, it seems it's only 720p. There's a lot of grain in dark places or indoors. The photo feature is a joke. For the money, it's not terrible. But if you're looking for serious video for film etc., maybe invest in a real gopro.

I'm really impressed with this camera and accessories. I think the picture quality is excellent, and the camera is easy to use. The mounts are good, maybe even better than some GoPro mounts I've used. Some GoPro mounts don't snap together tightly, which creates a rattle in the camera. These all snap together tightly and produce good video quality.

Affordable and comparable product to the expensive GoPro versions. Good picture quality (though you couldn’t tell on the Akaso camera display itself, when downloaded and played on TV or other, it looked great. Although not thrilled about the battery life and so glad the box comes with an extra battery.

I really am amazed at the picture quality and sharpness of video for an action camera of this price. It goes toe to toe with any name brand action camera double its price or more. I will be using it to make and film for my own YouTube channel and found this to be the best option for new commers.

This tiny camera is a fantastic device for basic shots.  The pictures are plenty clear and the attachments are all easy to use.  I purchased a separate underwater camera case to take it scuba diving so I have not used the case that came with it.  Everything is easy to use and no issues.

A fraction of the price of a GoPro, haven't taken it on a dive yet but my 18month old has thrown it around the house without any I'll effects. I do wish the camera had a degree of water resistance without the dive case on, as the ports are exposed, but not a big deal.*A prior answer on this item noted a 64gb card would work, but when i could not get one to work- swapped for a 32 which is what the manual states, and it works fine.

Compact camera with a dozen or more attachments. Seems well constructed. I had to go to youtube to figure out how to use the different attachments. 2D bar codes take you to the manuals in different languages. Unbeatable price. Buy this instead of Go Pro.

What’s not to love? It does everything the GoPro does, for less than 1/4th the price. I bought one to start off with its very easy to sync with your phone and get going. If you want to shoot 4K get at least the 128gb SD card. I only gave 4 stars for water because I haven’t gone deep underwater with it yet. I will definitely be ordering at least one more if not two so I can get multiple angles.

Purchased this for my husband for Christmas, he loves it!  He uses it all the time to record videos.  Picture quality is great!  He loves the voice control as he does not have to remove it to start playing or to stop.  Great product at a cheap price.

I purchased this camera as a substitute for a webcam, with interest in using this as an action cam secondary. Sadly, even though there is an HDMI output, it only displays the screen on the Akaso (including all meta data). This was a bummer and the pc mode was less than ideal. Returned it to purchase an Akaso V50 elite and I'm much happier with my purchase.
Excellent performance way better than any well known brand that are ten times pricier than this one. I love it.

So far I have used on a scuba dive and a couple of snorkel sessions.  Works great,  biggest issue for me is actually being able to see the screen and settings underwater as I need reading glasses. Would love if it had a zoom feature,  also need a red filter as everything haa a green tinge.So far great value for the money

Quick delivery and enough accessories to need everything you need the price is right had to replace my go pro have a kid now can't justify to buy another go pro for the price decided to try this brand glad I did nice quality haven't use it much yet going for a ride soon so I'll give a full workout but looking at it not worriedGive it 4 stars for the wonky app and the remote only stop and play camera it doesn't turn it off but I can live with it.

*Update*  Akaso has replaced the camera with a newer revision model.  I hope to test the camera soon.I recently received the camera and during the initial setup and config I noticed that the LCD on the camera itself has bad pixels straight from the manufacturer.
We bought this to take scenic pics while out on our motorcycle. Very pleased with the pics and the ease of use.

Totally worth the purchase. Made our trip to Italy into the coolest video. Video Quality is strong (not the audio but who cares I put a song over my video) - I couldn't even notice a difference between the GoPro and this. Honestly, save yourself some money and go this route. You'll be happy.

Updating my original review.  Bought this for my 11 yr old for xmas.  Found it very easy for him to use and a great first camera.  One button started to not work and attempted to contact company.  Apparently problem with return contact mentioned in last review was due to COVID issues.  Company has now been extremely responsive and has since sent a complete replacement camera.  My son absolutely loves this thing.
I bought this for my six year old son.  It takes good pictures and video's and he is able to make his own "movies".  For the price if he breaks it, it won't be a huge deal.
Perfect...compact and easy to use. I bought it for my 14 year old son and he absolutely loves it. The remote is a nice feature.

I swam with sharks with this camera mounted on a selfie stick. Great footage. You can hear the water noises and everything. Really glad I got this before going to Hawaii for the first time. Also went snorkeling with it mounted on my snorkel mask. The only problem there was that it was impossible to tell if the camera was recording and the remote is not waterproof which seems a little odd.

The AKASO EK7000 worked one day, then, while trying to download via Bluetooth the camera started to freeze. I turned off the AKASO and it turned itself on. I turned it off, it turned back on. I finally had to take out the battery. The next day when I went to use it. With a fresh battery, all it would do was turn itself off after I turned it on. Once it turns off I have to take out the battery and put it back in to turn it on again and it shuts itself down immediately. This camera is cheap and now I know why.

this is a pretty good quality item for a first timer. I bought this for my daughter and didn't want to spend too much but also wanted her to be able to have good quality pics. this product meet both requirements. of course it's not 100$ amazing pictures but they are still awesome and again at this price point they quality is still great.

I actually really like this camera! I wish It came with a micro memory card but other than that it's great. I got it for Christmas so I haven't had it for very long but I love that it can go under water. I'm take a scuba diving class to become certified and I really wanted a camera that I could bring down and take pictures! I'm so excited! I'd give it 5 stars but I just wish the battery lasted longer. But for the price I really can't complain! It's awesome!!

I purchased this camera for my son for his 7th birthday.  He had been interested in an "action camera" for quite a while and when i found this one on Amazon, it seemed like a good value and a reasonable option considering his age.  The camera arrived quickly and in excellent condition.  We charged up the battery and everything worked perfectly.  My son loves using the camera to film himself and his friends playing around and we find the quality of the video to be very good.  Now all we have to do is keep it away from my wife, who wants to use it too!!!  All in all we are very satisfied with the purchase and can recommend this camera to anyone who isn't looking to spend a fortune to have some fun taking pictures and videos.

I've taken this with me surfing, skateboarding, and mountain biking. While some of the mounts inevitably fall off or loosen up, I've nonetheless always gotten great usable footage from the Akaso. You have to figure out all the accessories for yourself, but it isnt too difficult to do. Only wish was that the micro USB came with an adapter to put into my laptop - you have to buy that yourself.

Without any doubt this camera is certainly very useful in many occasions and it doesn't cost too much. The only thing I haven't seen it working is the application connecting to the camera. Maybe they need to be on at exact the same moment. Based on its price and usability, it's really a good deal.

What an awesome camera. Great wide angle captures everything. too bad there is no zoom, but for the price and all the accessories, its totally worth it. I've used it several times underwater also and the shots come out really well . Great!

Bought this to film travel trips and it works exactly like a GoPro, but hundreds of dollars less! Highly suggest getting this along with a "gopro stick" to hold the camera on. The camera came with so many attachments and with a remote to take photos from a distance if you place it down somewhere. It's also most certainly waterproof! I filmed a bit while being in the ocean and after taking it out of the case, it was dry as can be. Worth every penny!
We have been wanting an affordable camera that works well and has good picture quality. This is our first action camera and we are loving it!

Simply amazing for the price! The ease of use, quality of picture and durability is well beyond the price paid! I am not the most tech savvy person but easy to set up and even WiFi the videos to my phone through the app! I love it and have even purchase one for my brother!

I highly recommend this camera for anyone who wants something GoPro-esque but can't quite commit the resources to get one.  It is pretty straightforward, and you don't get a lot of bells & whistles (like touch-screen capacity), but it has been durable so far.  Haven't gotten it out in the weather just yet, mostly just chasing the dogs around with the camera attached to a selfie stick or strapping it to the headstock of my guitar when I noodle around :)  I would definitely spring for one of the many accessory packages - just so you will be able to mount the camera to yourself or other objects when out & about!

I really like this camera.  I bought it to mostly record live music sessions, so I usually use the clip mount on my music stand.  The wide angle lens makes it easy to see the whole band playing in one shot.  I also used it with the bike mount and the colors are awesome!  The 1080p 30fps is my go to setting and I highly recommend it to save battery power and make use of space in your mini Sd card.  I highly recommend this camera!
Great product for the price!

My boy owns two of these so I already knew it was a great product. Finally got the chance to get one of my own and absolutely love it. No complaints what so ever esp for the price and what I will use it for. Only thing i was i realized in the description is it not coming with an SD Card but other then that I highly recommend.

So far so good UPDATED: battery charging station that comes with it crumbled in my hands only the 2nd time I used it. The charping port broke right off the little chip inside the charger. Now i have to buy a new charger and i cant use the camera for the trip i am on now that i bought it for.
I pleased with this camera it's a bit different to operate on till you get the hang of it it take good quality pictures and videos

This item came on time and packaging was neat. Item did need to be charged but came with two batteries so that was a plus. Did try item in a sink full of water and did not have any issues picture was still very clear. Would recommend this to others.

Need a camera for stuff you can take photos on dangerous hikes so your phone doesn't get messed up? Then this is the camera for you. It has been so great to have a camera with me on great hikes, taking pictures and videos.I went into a cave and took a fantastic pictures so now I can look at them forever. When you get all the accessories it is amazing. Even though the sound is not great this camera is great
Works great, but the first camera was not advertised, it was only 720p. They sent me a second camera that was as described. Works nicely and was easy to set up.
