Can't tell when the battery is low.  Can't tell when it in still frame or video mode.  Can't tell when it is on.  Can't tell when the twistband control activates the camera.  Bought for my kayak but don't use anymore.

Bought this for my son for Christmas 2018. He kept it in the waterproof case just to make sure it was nice a protected. After a handful of uses it now now longer turns on properly, juts a solid red light comes on. Screen does show anything. Seems like a common problem as I found others having the same issue online. Disappointing. I am not looking forward to going through the whole warranty process. I would not recommend buying this.

I'm satisfied with the quality of the video and the resolution of the photo is a bit disappointing. When I tested the watertight case, I didn't know the water. It's small and light, so it's good to carry around. It would be nice to see more details on the manual to connect accessories.

I just received the camera today and the product came on time. Packaging seemed amigos and nothing was broken or missing. There are a ton of attachments. The manual does not explain how to use all the attachment and I’m not sure what to do with some of them. The camera has a lot of good reviews and I will soon find out how the camera performs. Stay tuned...
So far, great camera for the money. It doesn't have all the fancy features as the high end models, but I don't need all of that. Very easy to setup and start using. I would recommend it to anyone.

After buying another low cost GoPro alternative proclaiming to provide great picture quality and being disappointed, I'm happy to report the Akaso is a winner!  Quick delivery, easy set up and enjoying using the camera so far!  Great product for the money!

This thing is really cool and the image is just spot on and i have never seen one of these in person but its smaller the i anticipated and the accessories it comes with seen pretty solid compared to store bought ones i know because i have but some just incase i didnt like the ones it came with ended up taking the ones i bought back lol good little action camera
Great deal, comes with loads of accessories. The accessories alone from other manufacturers would probably run you as much as the camera.

I wanted a simple and easy to use camera for the kids when they are playing in the pool underwater.  The price was right if they broke or lost the camera.  To my surprise the package came with extra mounts that you didn't need to pay for.  So far the camera is working out just fine for my need.

Out of the box the camera had a dead spot that I assumed was on the LCD screen, after recording video several times I came to realize the dead spot was in the camera lens and was appearing on all the videos I took. It works and functions great besides that issue however that's kinda a deal-breaker when your camera takes video with giant dead spots in it :(

Great entry level action camera that suited our family holiday needs ~ theme parks and snorkelling! We couldn't justify the cost of Go Pros, and after reading the amazon reviews, I bought this.  It arrived just in time for our trip to Dubai, and the resultant videos and shots from Aquaventure and theme parks are brilliant! Great quality even at 720fps and super easy to use. The spare battery is very handy.  The sheer number of accessories it comes with is impressive and great value for the price!All in all, super glad with our purchase and highly recommend for families!

Sound Quality went out. This is a cheap alternative to a GO Pro but will never by again. Do a lot of trail riding and a friend of mine has a GO Pro and there is no comparison. So if you want something reliable for Motorcycle trail or woods riding stay away from this cheap alternative if you want reliable performance.

Great product for the price, does everything I need it to do, comes with lots of extra parts and mounting accessories. Have to download instructions but it's not that hard to figure out the setting and modes.

My husband LOVES this camera.  He has positioned it in a few different places on his bike for different angles, I will be ordering another one so he can have multiple mounts at the same time.  Great quality, good size - Great Buy!

The company has contacted me several times to try and "Make things right" and offered to send me other items at no charge. They seem to care about customer satisfaction.I expected too much for my money and that’s my fault. It was not misrepresented by the manufacturer and functions as advertised. Apps required are rated very low. 32 GB max storage.

This is a great little camera! Your can't beat the price for all the features it offers. Excellent picture quality. Comes with a bunch of accessories for various mounting options. Battery life is good before it needs recharging. 2 batteries came with my camera. I got a lot of time on each charge/battery. I used it to record long drives. I haven't used it a lot but I have used it enough to know that its a great camera for the price.

This camera performs amazing considering its price. The wifi remote viewing is a nice touch and works flawlessly in my opinion. You also get a plethora of accessories. The stuff you get as well as features exceed the price point. Would be nice if it came with a starter memory card  so it can be used out of the box. Still gets 5 stars as that is really my only complaint and it is not detrimental to the product.

This thing is awesome! Just about every mount you could think of. Picture quality is top notch. Sound isn't perfect but for $60 you can not beat this camera. Our 7 year old is very excited about making slime videos, scootering around with her helmet mount, and making videos of playing with friends.

This camera comes with lots of mounts and accessories as well as a waterproofing case. Works really well in and out of water especially for the price. Definitely worth the price for this well-working of a camera.

My teenaged daughter has long wanted a sports camera, but as I can't figure out the purpose of the post-experience footage (who really wants to continuously relive skiing down a mountain), I have long resisted.  After reading a recommendation for this camera, I decided to try it.  It is truly a great deal for a great little camera!It works great and the photo quality is excellent!  A great entry point into action cameras, and you won't feel too badly about your investment if it eventually gets lost on one of its high-risk adventures!

I find this camera to be an excellent value for my usage case. I do not require software or optical image stabilization as I prefer to use a gimbal. If I had paid more for a camera with these features, it would have been a waste. I also preferred the fact that it uses mechanical buttons instead of a touch screen. The video quality is more than adequate, especially at this price.

I bought this camera for my granddaughter for Christmas. I checked out several reviews on this and most were very good. so I figured for 60 bucks what the heck. We were pleasantly surprised great video quality and surprisingly steady even on the four-wheeler. my granddaughter is 9yrs old and had the operation figured out in no time. the only thing I wish is that you could connect an external microphone, I haven't read anything were you can but maybe I'm wrong. but I cant complain she loves it. and I think I'm going to buy me one !
Camera is easy to use while surfing and my grandson uses it in the pool along with the accessories that come with the camera
Bought it for my son, as his 1st "GoPro" camera and he loves it.  Quality pictures and good for a first timer to learn with.

This looked like a great GoPro-like camera.  I just got it to play with.  I don't really have a strong need for a sports action camera.  I opened it up and checked and the battery was already charged.  Cool.  I already had a 32GB microSDHC card for it and it slid right in. I had this camera up and running, taking videos and pictures in less than 15 minutes.  I haven't had time to check out a lot of the features, but the operation is simple and the videos/pictures are high quality.  The wrist remote is really useful, and the iPhone app works as described.  This seems like the perfect sports camera for the person who thinks he/she might want a GoPro.  Once you get this one, I bet you never "upgrade" to the GoPro because you'll never notice the difference between the two.  Yep, this Akaso Ek7000 is that good.
Very handy, easy to setup, awesome picture quality! All for very affordable price. I bought this for my 8 year old for her birthday as a starter cam. She loves it! All for an affordable price!
So far so good. But the down side was no sound recorded when encased, but I guess all action cams are like that but other than that, it gave me everything I need

I liked the price and the quality of workmanship. I mounted it in my Polaris side by side using the mounts provided with camera. It was easy to setup using the guide on the internet. Unfortunately I have not been able to really give it a real test yet due to the Covid curtailments. Looking forward to the future. Thanks Dan

No sd card or sd reader included? Buying this product is like buying a pair of shoes without the soles.  Useless. The product comes  with no instructions but comes with five different useless pamphlets for consumers to be interested in other products.  Instructions need downloaded,  which requires internet access. Good luck to those without internet. Brilliant technology.  Stupid marketing.
Easy to use, and the kit with all the brackets suits most mounts. Be sure to print off the manual online.
My son loves this!!! Great product for the price. We are very happy with it and everything it comes with.

This Sports Action Camera does a great job, good quality and easy to use. Comes with  a lot of accessories, 2 batteries and charges quickly! Very affordable, easy to figure out and if I had an issue figuring something out I went directly to YouTube tutorials. There are plenty of tutorials if you need assistance! My favorite is how affordable and comparable it is to the more expensive brands! Will be using this Sports Action Camera in Florida while snorkeling! Can't wait!!

I bought this video camera to wear when we go quad riding. It does a great job capturing the video there is no lag and the video quality is great. It was easy to set up and use. I like that you have attachments so you can wear it in different areas to get different video angles. I will be ordering one for my son for Christmas.
Just as good as my gopro hero 7. Video and pic quality is the same, and $250 less l!

This camera is really good quality for the money. It comes with a bunch of accessories right out of the box and super simple to use. It has a really nice feel and captures pretty good video for the money.

Was looking at the competition for this product and determined that it would be worth the lower investment to see if I even wanted to get into using a camera system like this.  The camera came with a bunch of accessories for mounting and the image quality is great.  The software was a little buggy but I was able to get the job done.  I would recommend buying this product.

So I was thinking of buying something a little more high end but I couldn’t bring myself to spend a ridiculous amount of money on something I don’t use often. Well I got this on Father’s Day and have been playing with it since, taking still shots and even some pool side and inside pool pics. I’m looking forward to see how the pictures come out from my travels to Puerto Rico to visit family

My sister and brother bought this camera for me and I liked how easy to carry around for anywhere I wanted to go and the fact that it was so easy to learn how to use it, but also I wish that the battery could last more but besides that I recommend this camera a lot to anyone that wants to buy it.
Love this camera, as good as a go pro.  Comes with a ton of awesome accessories and two batteries!  You just need your own SD card.  Great buy!

So far the camera works great!! I only have two issues currently: The camera was loose in the container and was bouncing around, it seems undamaged from this from what I have used it. The app currently does not work with this model, however it seems the app has worked in the past and may be a software issue.Overall, especially for the price, it seems like a good little device, however the real test will be our upcoming trip to the Dominican.
Good quality photos and awesome attachments. However the audio sounds very muffled. This makes creating videos for YouTube very difficult. Wish I could still return it.

I am so excited to use this camera this is my very first action camera and so far so good! Everything seem to be in working order I just bought a SIM card and it’s looking great good photo quality the mount and cases all work every well haven’t tried it out yet but I am super excited to!

A bit frustrating that the date and time stamp is lost when you replace the battery. Still haven't found the way to re-program the correct date and time on the camera.Otherwise, great value for money with excellent image quality and battery life.

Product broke first use. Followed instructions for accessories and on my first day on vacation the waterproof case broke, ruining the camera.Update: The seller went above and beyond replacing my camera, i have yet to use it as it's winter but I'll be testing it at the lake soon!

In the past, I had one of the first generations of the Go Pro and it was always freezing, and you couldn't get it functional unless it got connected to the computer to get it to work, once again.  The AKASO EK7000 hasn't given me any problems and the picture quality is great!  Everyone who sees the videos taken with it are surprised about the quality and clarity of the videos.  It also has a great price.  I love it!

I just bought my son the new GoPro for Christmas, and looking at it I decided I needed a new camera for skiing (I have a Hero 2).  I saw this camera, looked at the reviews and checked out some videos on YouTube.  I got this and am very impressed with what it comes with (accessories, 2 batteries, a remote).  The quality of the video and photos is really good (not quite as good as the GoPro, but great for the price).  YOU HAVE TO READ THE INSTRUCTIONS in order to get the phone app to work, but it is really easy if you do.  Overall, very impressed.

I brought this camera with me on my trip to the Galapagos and it was amazing! I took the camera in the ocean when snorkeling, inland, even to the top of a volcano! Considering the wild conditions, the HD made all of my pictures and videos come out so clear! I got so many amazing wildlife photos! Thanks to this product I have amazing documentation of my trip that I will never forget. 10/10.

I bought the AKASO EK7000 4K to replace my old GoPro Hero 2.  I mostly use it when I go diving or snowboarding.  I've had no leaks or issues with it at a dept of around 50 ft.  The most useful feature is the wifi link to my phone to quickly view the pictures/videos that I've just taken.  On the GoPro I needed to remove the SD card, insert it into my computer and dump all the files before I could view them.

This camera is pretty awesome for the price and it comes with all the mounting accessories you need! While it doesn't come with an SD card, you can actually buy one since the camera is just that much cheaper than a GoPro.Quality is superb too when it came to video. I was genuinely surprised to be quite honest as I didn't expect to see really clear image quality.
Great little 4K camera. We’ve taken it on many vacations and got great results. The only downfall is that it does not have image stabilization.

Akaso EK7000 - The camera works well.  For the price ($59.99) the video and pictures are adequate.I had an issue with the camera bracket but after I contacted Akaso customer support they took care of it.

I have never owned a action camera before, yet I found it so easy to use and figure out the menu. I found YouTube videos very helpful. I am quite impressed with all of the accessories and the amazing low price. You couldn't possibly expect anything better for the money. At this price anyone who does anything they would like to record should own one. I will be using this to preserve my hunting and fishing experiences

The picture quality is good for a $50 camera.  Picture quality is not as good as my Samsung Galaxy S7 phone camera but is easy to use and versatile.  I like the remote.  The accessories are useful. I am happy with the camera so far.

I love the video quality and many ways to mount this camera. The uses can go from dashboard camera to scuba diving if that's your thing. The price for the quality of this product really makes it a great deal. I gave it 4 stars because the battery doesn't last very long but there are backups so you just have to switch it every so often.

I am rather impressed with the quality for the low price they are asking for this camera. I was able to do a time lapse driving video and it turned out great. It also comes a bunch of extras i.e. anchoring accessories.

The value is definitely there!  I've taken a few videos with it mounted on my eBike and I'm impressed with it so far.The instructions out of the box are just a QR code to scan.  A quick start guide for basic operation and how to get the video off the  SD card would be nice.  I had to hunt down these things with youtube and their website

I dont think I could honestly say anything bad about this, besides to be able to use a bigger micro sd card like a 128gb. Other than that its well worth the buy, the picture quality and video is just amazing. Good lasting batteries also.

Bought this in hopes of using it out on RZR rides. Unfortunately, the image is not as stable as I would've hoped while riding. Other than that, the video quality is good and it takes decent pictures. I like the the wristband photo/video buttons. Definitely a great convenience feature.
Great product, so far Iam very satisfied. I will update after I have had a chance to use it some more.

I enjoy paddleboarding and fishing! I bought this for my bf and I for Christmas so have only used it a couple times so far. The battery seemed to go somewhat quickly but I kept it filming the entire paddleboard ride today, it lasted about an hour and a half. So not awful and it's easy enough to bring another battery since it does come with two. I haven't tried the waterproofing yet.

The camera works very well with very good video quality. Construction seems very durable. The waterproof case is also well-constructed. Operation is quite intuitive. There are a variety of mounting brackets included for various uses. The wrist-mounted remote is very handy and works well. This was a birthday gift for my 9-year old son.  He has been very happy with it! He primarily wanted it for skiing, which he has done with great results. However, his favorite use has become pairing it to a phone with the built-in WiFi for a live video feed and leaving it around the house as a spy cam! He has been using it for over a month at this point and it continues to work very well!

It got arrived within 1day. Package was well packaged with air bag. It has so many types of mounting accessories. Easy to control. Color balance is good. Image stability is not perfect but great enough. Also I think that is something I can control when shooting. As video filming amateur/beginner, this is a great product to start. I am so excited to try this one out.

I got this camera today and it is great. It has great picture quality and the waterproof case works well! The only problem that I had with it is it is kinda hard to figure out how to control it but once you figure it out it is very easy. If you are trying to make something that requires a camera but you are a beginner and don’t want to spend too much money, this is perfect. Overall this is a great camera for the price!

Great camera for the money, in my opinion it's better than the Gopro, good image stability, I had to reset the camera twice because it went to white screen and froze, other than that haven't had any more issues yet, I would recommend it to anyone who wants a good camera.

This little camera worked perfectly for what I needed it for. I mounted it to my windshield on our vehicle and was able to take lots of video footage of our road trip. At half the price of a Go Pro you can't go wrong with this little camera. It comes with some additional add ons to help with functionality for all your on the go needs. I would recommend this product to others.
the remote is really nice to have but it doesn't have some of the features of the sjcam 4000, like FOV. HDMI connection isn't so hot either. great price

This is a great action camera.  I've used it for lots of action videos and it holds up great.You should buy this for videos where you are ok with having a fixed wide angle lens.  Also, I tried using a 128GB sd card and it had some issues playing back videos on the camera.  I was able to download the videos to my computer just fine though.  I switched to a 64GB SD card and video playbook on the camera itself worked just fine after that.

Not a GoPro but doesn't have to be. Amazing video and photos at this price point. I'm using it on a Syma X8C quadcopter with an anti jello mount and the images are stunning. No wonder why this is the #1 best selling action camera on Amazon. Very very nice.

Very good purchase. I used my EK7000 with several of the accessories I purchased with. I have used as a dash camera, taken on 4-wheeler rides, bike rides, and used while hunting. I have been very satisfied with the picture and video quality. It is very easy to operate and I have downloaded the phone app and have enjoyed viewing my videos and pictures with it also. It is an excellent product for a very good price. Look forward to using lots more in the future.

Great camera, surprisingly small but records beautiful .excellent for the beginner and advanced novice . underwater case works great . I've made a couple short videos and I enjoy the quality of this product and the price doesn't break the bank compared to others .. I highly recommend it

I really like this camera!! Seems just like the gopro I have used in the past! All of the buttons, functions and settings are the same. Seems like great quality! The reason I gave it 4 stars is because they sent a blue camera which is different than in the picture. Also because the battery life seems poor. They give you two batteries, but they have to be charged individually and they take 3.5 hours to charge. The gopro I had could charge both at the same time. But that's okay. I'll just have to be mindful of battery life when using this. Overall, great price for what you get! We are looking forward to using it for our ski trip in a couple days!

This camera was amazing. Few things to note. Battery life isn't much, so get extra batteries. And being in the water proof case it is a little difficult to hear. but over all you won't be disappointed.

Was honestly surprised by this camera! It’s truly amazing! I was thinking it wouldn’t be as good but figured I would try it and am so happy I did! Got it for my husbands birthday and he loves it! So very pleased with this! Even tricked our son thinking there was a camera in his room lol

We are absolutely in love with this camera. Granted we haven’t used it to its full capabilities yet, but it’s still wonderful. The price of a GoPro was just too expensive as a gift for my young son, so when I heard about this option and had a great review from a friend, I was all for it! I recommend it as an equal comparison to its pricier competitor for sure.
I really finde great The quality, choice of attachments and price.As a diver and motorcycle rider

The water resistance is not as much as I thought (100ft rather than 300ft as I thought but that’s on my part). The image quality is excellent and knowing how to work the camera is very intuitive. The only thing I wish was included is a guide on how to use the different accessories that are included. There are so many different parts that it will take me a while to figure out what is what and how to use them. Overall excellent purchase though!
I really haven't had that much opportunity to use this camera . But the photos i have seen are pretty clear

This thing so far has been really good, especially considering the price compared to the GoPro line.  I purchased this to replace my hero 2, and I am pretty much geeked about how well it is working, how good the video is, and all the accessories besides.  The remote alone is worth it.Make sure you order a micro SD with it, that's about the only thing it doesn't come with.

My original plan was to make this camera as a back-up to my GoPro......happy to report that this camera is now replacing my GoPro. Better battery life, way easier to use, and most importantly, it works better in the cold (welcome to Iowa in the winter). I don't you'll find a better camera, especially for the price.

Great camera for the price, this one has replaced my $120 web cam easily as it has better quality and a great wide angle lens. Works great for online streaming as well and the pieces all included make it easy to customize. I have the option to connect it with my tripod as well which is awesome.
This product is great and the company and customer service is wonderful. Highly recommend ordering from them
I was able to understand how to use the camera after watching a YouTube video. I put it on my horse back riding helmet and got some great video. It was a little heavy at first but I got used to it.

Such a great camera at this price point!Pleasantly surprised by the quality of video and audio and it’s really easy to operate. The amount of accessories included alone is worth the purchase, never mind the great camera and two batteries. Love that you can connect to you phone and control it from there and it also comes with a remote you can use. Can’t wait to take this on more adventures!

We love this camera! We have purchased a different brand before but this AKASO is better than a previous one.  We use it for sprint car racing and the sound and picture quality is excellent! The only negative that we have is that the accessories that was given don't fit the tubes on the car and need longer screws.  We just put it in our old case which fits the tubes correctly! Would definitely buy again!

I ordered this because I wanted to video myself paddling my OC-1 so I can review my stroke.  There is a bicycle mount combination but you can't use these mounts while it is in its water proof case.  I was hoping it would mount to the support bar from the AMA to the Canoe.  To bad it doesn't have a swivel so you can turn it facing out or towards the paddler.  Hoping I can find an adapter to use on my OC-1
No comparison to the GoPro.Not many features. No zooming capabilities. I guess you get what you pay for.
I gave this 4 stars because the directions are not very good,if you are not very pc literate (which I am not)the directions suck.I have not used the camera yet but it seems to be of a good quality
Works as it should, great quality and value without costing an arm and a leg. Great for capturing moments while riding my motorcycle.

My daughter would always record videos of herself so I decided to buy her this camera. Given that she is very young, I did not want to buy a camera that was really expensive but I also did not want to buy one that would stop working after a week of use. I chose this camera and it is really great for the price! I also love that it comes with a lot of accessories and with two batteries so you can always capture the fun.
We traveled to Canada and my husband recorded beautiful videos so close to the falls. We were really surprised with the quality of the images.
If you are buying this for diving, make sure you buy the warranty.  Camera got water in it after 2 dives. Disappointing.

Great action camera for a cheaper price. Set up was fairly easy and it wasn’t too difficult to figure it out. However, the instructions were not included on the WiFi set up so I had to google the information.

I bought this for my 12 years old boy for Christmas gift last year, and he was so excited to use it to make some films for our ski trip. However, the battery only survived for 5 mins and the camera turned off automatically during the very precious 5 mins while we were skiing. My son was so upset. This is the worst Christmas gift I had ever bought.

I love this camera but there are some huge problems as well. First of all the audio is terrible If I were you I would use some external microphone if you can. (Boom mic, phone mic, etc.). And with the camera I bought the waterproof case, the buttons on the side would not press the buttons on the camera itself. I know I made this camera seem terrible but it is a great camera for the price and God bless!
5/5 I am definitely satisfied with this purchase.

I received this camera as a gift. It is not a Go-pro but it gets the job done. On natural light the pictures and videos are amazing, in a dark room not so much, so mind your light at all times. I haven't had the chance to test it under water but I have to wait till the summer, since its winter season. So far I love and cant wait to put it to the full test. This is awesome and affordable. I truly love it.

Purchased as a gift.  Recipient really likes the size of the action camera and the bunch of accessories (including the remote).  Also, seems to pair easily to the app to control and view on the smartphone.  Have one concern so far...the power/mode button did not turn off the action camera on two occasions so far, so had to take out the battery.  Need to keep an eye on this issue.Seems to do most everything the higher priced competitors can do, but at a much more reasonable cost.  We'll see about the longevity of the product....

After own an old GoPro for a long time. I keep thinking to upgrade it, but didn’t want to spend too much money. After checking lots review and found a deal, finally bought one to try it out. Overall EK7000 is a pretty good deal. Like the pictures and videos’ quality. The setting system pretty easy to use. It even with Chinese language option. And tech support Anna is very helpful.You won’t regret.
I bought this to have a second action camera for different views. This is really easy to operate and it produces great quality images.

I bought this camera for a Snorkeling vacation. I read the great reviews and, compared to the big name cameras, I went with this Akaso for the price and am glad that I did! The camera is easy to use, light and delivers great quality photos and video. I used it under and above water. I recommend getting a “selfie stick” specific for this camera for better capturing your surroundings. Definitely a great buy!

I was a little apprehensive because this particular product was a bit more affordable than other similar products.  I read the reviews and they were highly favorable so decided to order.  So happy I did.  Easy to operate.  Comes with a bunch of accessories.  Great value for the price.  All in all it delivers what it promises and I would recommend without hesitation.
Purchased this action camera for my son’s  quad .  He said it was easy to set and has great quality. He’s able to view his recordings on his phone . He’s 13 and he loves it .
Bought this camera for my husband to take on deployment and he loves it! He can easily edit the videos & attach it to his kevlar to record when he’s doing demo or on the range.

We returned this camera and decided to purchase the GoPro instead.  When we were first trying to set-up this camera, we could not see how to take pictures or videos in 4K.  I am pretty sure we could have figured it out if we spent more time on it, but we just didn't have the time. My boyfriend just was not sold on this one.
I am a true novice when it comes to technology, especially underwater, but this camera is easy to use and gave me exactly what I wanted.

Easy to use. Mounted in the truck easy as can be. Not to happy with the  battery life, but you can connect to the car for power so that is great. Same connect as any non iPhone, so that’s easy to.  Haven’t tried it in water, but that’s not why I bought it, so can’t give you any review there. Otherwise I love it. This is a very small camera so if you have a hard time with small things...
Not bad for the price, take it out fishing pretty clear mic is kinda quiet with the water proof box

This was a gift for my soccer-playing preteen grandson to use to film his games.  He said it’s great and takes “nice and fast pictures and has good attachments of great quality”.  And he added that it’s “very durable because he has hit it with a soccer ball a few times and it still works perfectly “.
The case leaked water and ruined the camera right away. Didn't matter much though because the batter only lasted about 30 min so it was all but useless.I can't state it enough. DO NOT BUY!!!
So far, this thing is pretty cool. Lots of accessories are included and it’s fairly easy to set up. Now it’s time to put it to the test!

Fantastic price on this cam. Lots of attachments to give you flexibility in shooting. Picture quality is good, not great, but I've only messed around in my house so far - hoping for natural light to give it extra oomph. The mount that it was packaged on had the screw on so tight it took several people, and finally some pliers, to get the thing unscrewed. Clips easily imported into Premiere. I'm looking forward to working with the cam and footage!

This camera is very good and anyone who wants to make entry level content. The wide angle view is amazing and the app works really well with the camera. However, nighttime recordings/pictures are barley visible. Another issue for me was the audio usually comes out somewhat muffled. I usually record vehicle POV videos and it works well for me!

Was looking to buy a GoPro but wanted a cheaper option.  I am more than happy with this purchase!  this is a great little camera and when paired with a 64Gb micro SD card (not included) is perfect for hiking, climbing, Kayaking, or whatever extreme sport you are into.  If you are looking for an action cam but don't want to spend hundreds on GoPro, buy this!  I wish the display was touchscreen, but the buttons are easy to use once you get the hang of it, even with the waterproof case buttons are still easily accessible.  5/5 *s

I ordered this camera with very little expectations because of the price but boy did it exceed what I thought it would do. The pictures look great and the video even better! It comes with most of the accessories you need but it would be nice if they included a headstrap. I took it to my honeymoon in Cancun and was able to talk amazing video snorkeling, zip lining and just exploring the city. Definitely would buy again.

This worked really well as an action camera. It is a great value considering how expensive GoPros are. The casing was almost completely waterproof, although a few drops managed to seep through. I think this is what caused my photos to be slightly blurred. Despite this, the camera itself was undamaged and the pictures I took with the camera outside the casing were crisp. I really like the ability to take 4K photos in electronically unfit conditions!

I couldn't get it to record anything riding on my motorcycle. At home sitting still yes. Cheap camera. I wasn't happy with it at all.I bought it so I could constantly record while riding motorcycle. Didn't work.

the AKASO is an amazing camera that has very high resolution.  it comes with multiple mounts that you can use for different purposes such as car mount, bike mount, helmet and etc.  the fit and finish is very high end.  the packaging is amazing and very professional.  the delivery was very quick.  i highly recommend the AKASO EK7000.

This camera has been amazing so far, the wireless networking, waterproof casing up to 98ft perfect for scuba diving which I love to enjoy, and the 4k quality are absolutely beautiful. The price that they have this camera for is definitely the best part if you're looking to get a great camera at a good budget price. Perfect to start recording and saving all those memories you make while doing stuff.

I am very impressed with the video quality of the EK7000.  The camera works especially well in outdoor environments.  I have attached the camera to my bike using the included mounts, and the two battery packs combine to over 2 - 2.5 hours of recording time in my recent testing.  The camera is easy to operate, and I was able to change settings quickly.  Compared to other cameras for 2 or 3 times the cost, I think this camera is a great value.

I took this tubing recently and it fell out of my hand and I thought it was lost for good. Amazingly enough someone in my group person actually found it under the water near the bank the next day. I was so relieved and even more surprised when it was not damaged at all by the water! I would Definitely recommend purchasing one definitely recommend purchasing one!

I've only used this product once for testing and it seems like a serviceable alternative to the incredibly expensive GoPro. Films in 1080p and 60fps and it has only a few buttons so it's very simple. I like the addition of the remote control too but I haven't tested how far I can be to activate the buttons on it.

The AKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera is very new to us, but we are enjoying it so far.  I did a water test on the case by first placing a dry paper towel inside, and then submersing the closed case under water for a significant amount of time.  The paper towel stayed dried which was very encouraging.  I also really appreciate the offer for free accessories from the company - that's a great bonus!
I would recommend this to anyone who wants to record or take a pic underwater it has similar qualities like a gopro camera for half the cost.

Great quality camera for the price. it doesn't have an iPhone 11 camera obviously but for $50 you can't be disappointed. You get many accessories with it for attaching it in different ways. YouTube has some good tutorials for knowing what all the parts are for

Camera quality is ok. Paid about 70$ for a action camera. Plastic case was very cheap. I was removing it from box and it already broke. So that lasted about 3 minutes. I’ll try to get a new one sent to me. Replacement was sent right away and service was great.

This camera arrived in a few days and it's amazing the package content that this camera has. I loved the WiFi feature and also how it really connects with no issues with your phone by only downloading the app. Also, it has a remote controller that takes pictures or video without touching the camera. Pretty amazing waterproof case and it comes with an extra door panel in case that you need it.

Lot of great things about this camera to say the least. Bang for buck is probably the best. The video and sound quality are great, but it was difficult connecting to the app it recommends. Do not download the EZ iCam. Download the iSmart DV app and you are golden. A few of the mounts were great while some were cheap. Not a big deal though. I also had trouble with the 4K at first. The video was super choppy while out on a bike ride and I'm not sure what the issue was on that quite yet. Going to some more testing, but overall it is a great camera. I plan on taking it diving here pretty soon so I will leave another review soon!
Este sitio no me deja subir ni fotos ni videos.....la cámara de referencia: AKASO EK7000 Ultra HD me resultó excelente por lo sencilla, liviana, económica (precio bajo) y fácil de operar.-
This camera was perfect for my trip to Wolf Creek Colorado. Camera worked perfect excellent camera for the price would definitely recommend.
I bought this as a camera not for video.  The still shots are crystal clear.  And the waterproof camera is a nice feature.

In all fairness, I drive fast. Had it mounted on my mirror and made it about 3 to 5 miles on the I-25 before the mount broke and I spent about 45 mins trying to find the camera (was inside the case) but never found it. Had the camera less than 6 hours after delivery and lasted about 10 mins on the bike. I didnt find anything wrong with the quality of camera other than that. I did think it would have been worth $10 more to get the EK7000pro which has video looping though

You need this! I got this action cam for a vacation I was taking to Jamaica. I loved the price and that it holds it’s value so well! I have no issues with this and think it is now a vacation essential! My pictures and videos came out great, the sound is pretty good although I have it turned off in this video. It is lightweight and easy to carry around. 100% recommend!

Just opened the package and looked at it.  Took some footage and writing now.  Good toy for the money.  Took good quality videos and pictures.  It came with lots of accessories.  Footage looks good, video and voice quality pretty good.  Easy to figure out too.  I would recommend.

I was referred by one of my friends that had this camera as we were on our jet ski and i fell in love with everything it could do.  I have had GoPros in the past and they are great but to my surprise AKASO EK7000 is as good or better!I can not believe the price of this camera due to it's great video quality and endurance.
make sure you use a class 10 card otherwise it will not work for you!! Great camera for the money

Right now I cannot give this camera anything but one star. I cannot connect it to my phone due the the error given as "This is not a registered item. Return it to the seller."  I have watched youtube to help see what I might be doing wrong. I still get the same error message. We wanted it for our vacation this year to get some of us on the beach and underwater shots too. Disappointed and looks like it may be returned.

This camera rocks!  I compared video quality to a GP with a guy swimming under water next to me on my Carribean vacation.  The image quality was identical but the sound was a bit louder on the GP.  Overall, this camera is awesome and I would definitely buy it again.

For $50 you can't go wrong. It comes with many accessories, 2 rechargeable batteries, the charger port, an extra plastic back to the waterproof case and a remote so you can take pictures remotely. I would recommend those who are wondering to buy micro SD cards because this does not have internal memory.

I got this camera for my son, as I was hesitant about spending so much on a go pro. I have to say this was a great investment the video quality is great. I'm pretty happy about the stability of the footage, i cant complain at all given the cost. if I had one complaint it would have been that I would of like better audio quality while the camera was in its case.
GREAT INVESTMENT. PERIODIF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A GO PRO ON A BUDGET, BUY THIS FAUX-PRO.
As a beginner, I hesitated to invest over two hundred bucks on a GoPro. The little device records sharp video when I did kayak fishing. It definitely worths the money.

We bought this for my 7 year old son so he could start taking some pictures and videos!!! it looks really good and the quality for the price is really amazing. did not expect it to be that great. However, when it did show up it was really good. My son is happy and i am as well. haven't tried the remote quite yet but if it works like everything else i'm sure its a great feature to have!!!
I absolutely love this camera. The quality of the videos is wonderful. I cannot wait for my daughter to be able to go up and co-pilot her first plane and capture it with this camera.

I got this for my vacation in Dubai and Island hopping. The videos were very comparable to the GoPro I previously had. For this price point the pictures were great and what I was excepting. The underwater videos turned out pretty good. The water quality really depends on how close you are to the object and the clarity of the water. The battery life was decent. The bundle accessories and mounting gear was amazing.

This camera is small and easy to use.  It come with many accessories including the underwater case.  The quality of the photos and video are  good for such a small camera.  It also can be controlled remotely with a Akaso Wi-fi app.My only regret is that I did not purchase the model with image stabilization.  The price is very reasonable for the quality of the results.

First of all, price is great. If you want to try an action camera out for the 1st time, I'd suggest this one for sure. The video is great in sunny outside but not so clear in the dusk or very cloudy day. (Gets a little muddy)The pictures don't seem to come out as good as video but that's ok for what it is...it's for videos! Try it out!

Would have given four or five stars but the remote control does not work.  I went to Akaso's website and left a tech support request.  It's been several days and no response.  I get it...sometimes things don't work  and at this price point I am not surprised.  But at least try and fix it.  Or acknowledge my request.  I don't think that sounds unreasonable.  On the plus side I did download the app for my phone and it works well.  I just don't want to rely on my phone for remote control and also further degrade battery life of the camera by utilizing additional wifi functionality.  Akaso: reach out to me, fix my problem and I'll upgrade the rating.

Bought the camera so the kids could take water photos on our cruise. I was amazed at the photo quality!! We paired this with a full attachment kit and have the most amazing videos and photos from our family cruise!! We use the camera all the time now!

I just received my camera in the morning  and was using it for the whole day. The reason I got it was my planned trip to Philippines. Since I’m not a professional and only need something to help me keep some memories from the trip I wanted something not that expensive as GoPro.At first I really doubt that Akaso ek7000 could be something good (the price made me doubt) . But it surprised me. It comes with a lot of assesories, it is very easy to use, and the camera looks nice itself. It works great, for a person who just wants to make some fun videos is just perfect choice.

I was nervous about purchasing this, but for the price figured I would take a shot at it. I am very pleased with the overall quality of the images and video I record. There are some people who say it can only take a certain memory card, but I have a 128 gb that works just fine. It comes with enough adapters and mounts to get started recording on anything you need to mount it to.
Awesome camera. Wanted a camera that wasn’t too pricey but also had great quality and this was it. Also, so happy it has a waterproof case for underwear footage.

Didn't realize how weak the audio is, almost non-existent!  Picture is OK, but considering it is 4K, I would say disappointing.  But overall I would balance the negatives with the low price - for ~$55.00 , it was good enough for the orientation day at my daughters college, especially when getting it a week before the event (without doing the usual in-depth research on the product)
Have only been using for a few days but seems a better quality that my hero4 black.  Easy to navigate and photo quality is perfect!

Snagged this camera for our Hawaii honeymoon/Adventuremoon, we were doing tons of hiking and snorkeling and zip-lining, and this camera went everywhere with us.  Took great photo and video, easy to use.  A great price to its comparison, and same specks, so a win win in my book.  I also purchased the accessory kit, and was not disappointed

This is an amazing camera for the price. We bought this as a budget friendly option for my son's birthday, and are very happy with it. He took it to the ocean on our vacation and was able to take pictures and videos after being submerged under water. That tells me it seems to be very water tight and holds up to it's water rating. The pictures are decent quality and the videos work well. I'd certainly buy again.
No mic.  So that makes it hard.Not the best for Moto vlog since I wanted to talk and share my ride.

I just received this product as a birthday gift, and I absolutely love it. There are so many advanced features on this camera. I think it has a sleek look, and the waterproof case doesn't distract from that. I find the battery life to be excellent. The camera is very easy to set up, and definitely a good choice if you've never used a camera like this before. I love that I can connect this camera to my phone and have everything I need in there.

I am still in the unpacking phase, but everything seems in order so far.  The item arrived as anticipated and camera and accessories appear to be present.  The protective covers that other reviewers have pointed out seem to be present.  The camera battery is a PG1050 and more can be ordered likely be contacting the Akaso store or by searching for PG1050 and seem to be readily available.  I a still trying to figure out the remote batteries and if they are replaceable.  This camera appears to be a good value and I will know more once we put it to use.

This is my first action camera and wanted to see how it would go using it without a huge investment.  Very impressed with with this camera for only 50 bucks.  Got great underwater and biking shots with the kids.  They think we are now our own Youtube channel.

Definitely some issues with this camera. Not ready for prime time yet. The image is not very stable, it will look very shaky compared to higher quality cam. Also the range of lighting is not very good. I have also had several issues with the wifi disconnecting when moving away more than a few inches from the phone. I really wanted to like this camera, but I think I would spend more on a higher quality unit.

This camera set up is great addition to my camera collection without breaking the bank!  Quality set up with many accessories included with the deliverable.  I look forward to great documented travels

This camera takes great pictures. The accessories with the camera make it a great purchase. I have used it while kayaking, on a underwater robotics, and while ATV riding. Image quality is great as well as video. I love the fact it came with a remote, as it makes turning the camera from video to picture mode super easy when the camera isn’t in reach. Great camera, great price.

Very easy to set up with a lot of mounting hardware options.  The audio quality is understandably not great, but the video and images are crystal clear.  Who needs to hear road noise anyway, I'll just add some music in post!  Plenty of battery life with the extra battery, and hours of storage capacity with a 64gb SD card (not included).  I'm so excited to take this out on my bike this weekend!
I questioned if this camera would work,  because the price was so low. For the price,  the picture really is quite clear and there is very little lagging in the video. I am impressed.
Really like this camera, same quality with a much better price as competitors. I would definitely recommend.

This camera is more than what I expected. It exceeded my expectations by a long shot. The image and video quality is awesome. The most important feature for under the water video is amazing I can’t believe such a smal camera has tremendous video quality. I’ve had it for a day and already recorded a few video in my swimming pool 10ft below and is perfect!

Purchased this camera for use with underwater snorkeling footage in Maui.  Quality of the build and pictures/video was excellent.  I even mistakenly dropped the camera to the bottom of the reef and was able to recover it and everything was still working fine.  Highly recommended.

Good camera especially for the price, came with plenty of accessories, works well.  Very satisfied, meets all of my expectations, maybe even exceeds them.  Note:  If you plan on using video editing software like Lightworks or Openshot, you will want to run them through some encoding software like Handbrake to change over the format that will make them run smoother, but I think that is more of a limitation of that software than actually of the camera.
Super easy to use, very good quality for the price.many different kinds of mounts make for good creative options.
Good GoPro alternative for a fraction of the cost!  It has pretty good video quality and the accessories are nice that come with it.  Simple to use and easy to navigate menu/options.

My husband and I have taken this snorkeling a few times (twice to the beach and once to a natural spring) and it is so much fun! It's great to be able to show our kids what we've seen. The wrist remote doesn't work perfectly but we don't really need it. Having two batteries is fantastic in case you forget to charge one. So far it's been well worth the money!

Don’t waste your money! Bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. Came with no directions. We use it once. We couldn’t zoom up on anything. So the picture is way distant. Didn’t come with any cord to hook it up to the tv or computer so we weren’t able to upload anything. Disappointed

Amazing little action camera for the price. Item came as described. Very easy to use and the picture quality is great. Came with a ton of accessories as well to use in any situation. Would definately recommend to anyone who is looking for a small camera and is looking to stay under a certain budget. Dont let the price tag fool you. This is definately a steal.

I rarely write reviews, but the Akaso ED7000 is absolutely amazing. Video quality is just as good as my GoPro. The mounts and accessories are ok, but definitely a little flimsier than those provided by GoPro. But they all work well and you cant beat the price. I sumed up what all that equipment would cost if I bought it from GoPro and came up with about $800.Can't say enough - highly recomended.

So right out of the box the screen picture is a little fuzzy and distorted. I’ll update later after I check out a video from walking my dog. The accessories are super nice and convenient but you def need to buy more to hook to the accessories you get in the box. Only complaint is the clip on does not swivel. Overall, seems great so far. Again, will update later after it gets more use in my hiking adventures.

I just got this camera the other day and was very surprised at the quality of the video and images. Videoed over two hours using the two supplied batteries which is an extra plus that you get two batteries. Very easy to operate. The app is a little wonky in that sometimes it has trouble connecting to my phone but works well when connected. Over all a very good camera package for the price.

For the price its no brainer. I tried it today going to work and i just love the quality of the camera. I'm not a tech person but i know this is a solid and more affordable sports action camera out there. I like the fact that it has a remote control and i can connect it to my phone. I can control the camera and download photos and videos through my phone. Great camera!UPDATE: 3/31/17

So far, so good. The camera was a great price. I feel comfortable experimenting with this before diving into a more expensive model. I would love of there were an option that came with different accessories. I haven't been able to really use it yet because I am still waiting on the 64gb micro SD card as well as the additional accessories. Plan on spending an additional $30ish to really be able to put it to the test. But hey, I didn't pay that much for the camera.

Yes it came with different attachments for different  things you wanna put on and Camara is fine also change from 60 HD to 720 HD or whatever you choose too. extra battery but one battery holds out pretty good haven't test out the water proof yet and wireless connection is great

Had an earlier version but new one has remote capability. Good picture quality, easy to use and never had a problem with water use. Comes with many attachments and can fit on almost anything. Good stabilization and ease of attachment to computer for editing/playback

I bought this camera for my husband for Christmas. We are going to the Bahamas this summer and will be snorkeling. He LOVES this camera. He was so excited to see all of the things that came with it. It was an incredible steal based on the price point and the quality. We are very pleased with our purchase!!
Awesome price for a tiny waterproof camera with a bunch of accessories.My kids love it
Product has great picture quality and plenty of extras, only wish it would have came with the SD card included. My son enjoys it and is making some great videos.

One great little camera, senior citizen and haveing a ball with it, my buddy has a GoPro we were at the Same place at the same time, on playback we couldn't tell witch pic's were take on witck camera!

Worth spending $74 for this camera. I was about to buy GoPro and then decided to give it a try to AKASO. Earlier I found one issue when 4K option was not available but it was not camera fault. After upgrading my low speed memory card with high speed one (@10), all the video resolution options became available. This is a good action camera and no need to go for higher version. I am using it only for videos, either 4k or 1080p.

I absolutely love this camera! It fits in my purse and I pull it out and only really use it for picture taking because I don't really record anything interesting, but the burst photo option is my fav. I love to take pictures of my kids playing and the burst photo option makes my photos look cool. I will be buying another one soon for a friend as a gift.

My husband and I got this camera for our vlogging purposes.  It has been our go-to resource for timelapse videos.  I have no complaints about this product and have been very pleased with the outcomes.  But to be honest, I haven't previously owned another camera like this in other brands to compare it with.  It's easy to use, takes good quality footage, and was a great purchase for the task!

Came with all sorts of useful attachments, making it an awesome value. At first it was kinda tricky setting up the camera to the phone, but once connected, it ran smoothly. Picture quality and battery life are pretty good. I am happy with my purchase!

This is an excellent substitution for a go pro, it is well made and shoots quality video up to 4k. I am taking this on spring break because it has been such a reliable and useful action camera. The footage is easily manageable with any photo editing software or the app that comes with the camera. This camera has all of the capabilities of the Go Pro Hero5 at less than 1/4 the price. The only thing that I wished to see on this camera was a touch screen but the screen is easily navigable and the settings are also rather simple to understand.

I was looking to get a GoPro and a friend told me about this camera.  I love it!  I got it a week ago and I've already been using it.  Quality is great, size is perfect, has 4k and wide screen.....I would recommend to anyone looking to start out doing action video and underwater photo/video.
This product was bought for my 12 to son for Christmas.  It was amazing, at least for recreational, fun use!
What a great camera for the price. Came with so many accessories and ready to use. Easy download to computer and great picture too. Very pleased.
Look, this does what theirs does for a lot less. Don’t be stupid and flush money down the toilet for a brand name! I love this camera.

Both batteries that came with camera die out in less than 20 minutes. One of the batteries  never fully charges 100% and it dies really really quickly. Not very satisfied with the product... Also when i received the product in mail, the camera had broken off from its place on the pictures.

Great quality for the money. I have had no problems recording in 1080p at 60 frames per second. The waterproof case works great. I have used the bike mount and it works great. The batteries are easy to change. The microphone picks up good sound while it is out of the case. There are so many included mounts that I can mount it almost anywhere! The quality of the mounts is really good which surprised me. Overall this is a great camera for the money.
This camera is a great value for the money. Works great with all action camera mounts and I've recorded many videos with it. Great product

This camera is awesome for the price and everything that was in the description came with the package. I've played with it for about half a day already it it does everything you need it to. The battery holds a charge for more than enough time while running in 30 FPS at 1080p and the video comes out crystal clear and since it comes with a second battery, you'll have plenty of recording time. It also very convenient that you can use gopro attachments for it as well so you have a bunch of different mounting accessories to choose from. If you want an action camera that can do everything while costing less than half the price, this is your camera.

Bought the product for a family cruise. Used it on a zipline in Honduras and while snorkeling. Zipline worked out great. Would have liked that the wrist remote for the camera was waterproof. Was tough to make sure it was recording while in the waterproof case and mounted on the snorkel. Didn't do full 4k quality to conserve storage space and was pleased with image quality. Would recommend.
Very surprised. So much in such a small package. Looking forward to using this little guy.

Although I have briefly messed around with other people's Go-Pro cameras, this is the first Action Camera that I owned so I don't have much to compare it to. I like the fact that it comes with several different types of mounts and other components. The underwater recording was great but I didn't do much else with it yet. Overall I think it's a great little camera and I don't regret my purchase.
keeps shutting off.

It’s a great camera for the price. qualities good mic works but you’ll wanna get a better one if you care about audio. Only thing I’m not a fan of is if you’re  not keeping an eye on it mine only records for about 25 minutes before shutting off. Not sure if it’s just my camera or not. Other wise absolutely would should buy if in the market for a cheaper action camera or just getting into using them
Had issues with my first camera, but  was contacted by Akashi customer service and they made it right.

Great camera, works amazing and it hooks up right to your smart phone which is nice because I don’t have a laptop. Sounds quality is also great. Only thing was when I got the camera and opened it up the screw that was connected to the water proof closing was broken so it’s not water proof anymore. I will just get a new one for like 10 bucks but it was a little disappointing but the camera is definitely worth the price.
Awesome action camera for the price. There is very little video quality difference between this and top tier brands!
out of the box this thing looks cool. really light weight. tons of mounting options,What I really like is how simple it is to operate couple button clicks and your recording instantly

Bought it for an upcoming trip where we will be scuba diving.  Took it on a local dive today and it worked great.  (Or as great as it could in a murky, Texas lake.)  We did have some issues figuring out how to change the settings, but eventually stumbled upon it. I would recommend it!

EK7000 is a good device; It's only been three days since I started using it and I can assure you that my expectations are met. Very easy to use and not bulky especially with the remote control. The videos and photos are of exceptional quality. I can't dream better; the different moments with family and friends will now be immortalized.
Thank you, very appreciative of this new camera now it's time to go some have some action-packed fun!

I bought this and was excited to try it. We took it to the beach and tried to film our snorkel. First of all, the fps was 10 or 15 at best when set to 4k and 1080p was more than just grainy. Video was choppy and even though we came within 5 feet of a tarpon as big as me, you could barely make it out in the video.Turns out you really do get what you pay for.
So far I'm impressed with this product. One things for sure no matter what u plan on mounting it to there's an accessory included to do so. I've only had it for a day but so far so good.

It took a couple emails but now it's working great.  Service was very helpful.  This replaces my old hero3 and is 1/3 the price of the competition.  Plenty of accessories which I may not ever need since this is compatible with my hero3 accessories.

This is a great camera. It is very affordable. I think you should buy this. Works like a charm. I"m thinking of buying one myself. The waterproof case is great Ive already used it Underwater a couple of times. And there is so many mounts that it comes with. It works with all of my gopro mounts.

We love these I bought both the black and the gray one. You get tons of accessories to go with it. Amazing value and picture is awesome as well.Update... played with it a while recorded some video and I love it. Definitely worth the price. Customer service responds quickly and are helpful with any questions you might have.

I got this camera for my friend for his travels, and he was very happy with the pictures he captured on his trips. The quality was up-to-par with many of the sports camera in the market right now, but doesn't completely break your bank account like the GoPros with their brand name. Overall, a great product for first-timers to try out if it works for them without the weight of more pricier items!

For the price of this camera you really can't go wrong. I bought this camera to bring with me on an extended trip to Colombia. The combination of it's compact size and seemingly durable construction will be perfect for this trip. I also bought some go pro accessories and loved that this camera's attachments all fit. I can't speak much to the underwater components as I haven't tried that part out yet. The accessories that come with are a little tedious to put together, but are great for people who want to mount to helmets/bikes. All in all, I highly recommend this camera for someone who wants to try out this type of camera before making the investment of a gopro.

This camera is for our son who wants to shoot videos ( YouTube obsessed) , so far its easy to use and the picture quality is good ! Was very happy it came with 2 batteries and a nice accessory package ! Also like that you can still use it while charging ! If you are looking to try your hand at action video for the quality and price I’d recommend this camera !

What not to like or love about this camera?.. the answer is nothing, I ordered this  And received it so fast. I open the box it’s amazing how many attachments you get with this camera and for the price wow.The picture and video quality is top of the line crystal clear, I love this camera I am very pleased with this purchase and best money spent. This is a MUST HAVE, you will not regret it I am true fan from now on...

My daughter loves to shoot video on our lavender farm while we're working.  We plan to bury 1500' of water line this year and install 3000' of lavender beds.  We're starting a YouTube channel about farming this year and this camera is perfect for our tight budget.  She plans to use this camera for the shots on the excavator arm, trencher and tractor.  The video is great... especially for the price.

Excelente calidad de imagen, bien empaquetada en su envío, sus accesorios son de buena calidad. Práctica en almacenamiento y en uso. Perfecta para usar en mi bicicleta, en mis trotes diarios y por supuesto en mis prácticas de natación de aguas abiertas. 100% recomendada por su excelente relación precio - calidad.Jose Albarran - Miami. Fl

There’s practically nothing to dislike about this camera. It works amazing and just the same as the expensive competitors. I had been debating on purchasing the expensive ones but I decided to search on Amazon for one. I’m glad I did. It’s very affordable and you get more for the price you pay. The images are great and so is the footage. I highly recommend this camera for someone who isn’t looking to spend hundreds of dollars and willing to not look for brands. This has the same quality. Awesome purchase.

I bought this for my husband who is a tree climber. He loves wearing it while he does climbs! The quality of the images and video are good for the price. The batteries are keeping charge and it is a reliable camera. The only thing that he has noticed that he does not like is that the time lapse function is for setting a timer before taking a picture, not for doing an actual time lapse.

*Update* was contacted by customer service who offered me a refund or a replacement. They sent me a new one and it arrived within 3 days. Camera worked with no problems.Turned it on and the LCD screen will not turn on. Top red light comes on and stays on, but you don't know what mode the camera is in. Research told me that the battery might be bad so I purchased a new one and find out it wasn't the battery. So now I have extra batteries for a camera that does not work. You get what you pay for!
This camera is definitely worth the money!! I can capture these moments without having to carry my phone around.

I fall in Love my new Camera . Very easy to use  its got a whole bunch of accessories. Whoever figured this out was thinking on you and whatever you could need . Very well planted top notch ! Great pricing to definitely make your money  worth . I buy a SanDisk Ultra 64 GB at Walmart for 35 $ put it in and ready to go ! Works  Perfect :) Lots of videos on youtube how to use .

I wasn't too sure how well it was gonna work since it's so cheap but it worked very well. The image on the videos has amazing quality and the sound is very nice. The waterproof case works very nice too.

I bought this camera for my son,and he has loved it. He has mounted on his bike and other places. He wanted an action camera for a while and I did not want to spend a lot of money on a gopro. So I bought him this and its been great ever since I bought it.

I use to use a Go Pro until my son borrowed it.  Well that was the last I saw it so I decided to get a new one.  However, when looking around, I found this one and ordered it.  I have yet to use it underwater but looking forward using it.  I love how simple it is to use and the wrist band is great.

Not the best camera.  After about 5 dives the image all washed out.  No color even in the pool.  All the pictures turned to a whiteout and could hardly see the image of people.  Threw it away.  Not worth the money and by the time I used it the return policy ran out.  Out 60 bucks.

I bought this camera to help record a ski trip with my kids.  The biggest negative I have for it is that the camera is not waterproof.  I couldn't get any audio with the camera because it was stuck inside a waterproof case the whole time.  The worst part is the case got scratched on the lense so now I cant use the case and cant seem to find a replacement.

Works as well as my gopro hero 3 did. Its a good little camera. I like that it comes with the battery charging dock. Makes it easy to always have a battery that is charged up and ready to go. The image stabilization could be better but it isn't horrible. Great camera for a ¼ of the price of a gopro.

Of course, most will compare this camera to a GoPro. The GoPro is an amazing product but it costs hundreds of dollars more than the Akaso. For under $50, this is a great value. Good quality, tons of helpful accessories included. I am very impressed!
love this camera.  I can use it mountain biking and my husband can use it for his horse training videos.  plus can use as camera.

I just received this camera and it comes with lots of accessories and two batteries, great!so far it works fine and I will update on the video quality since I intend to use it on my motorcycle as a rear camera attached to my sissy bar.

I bought the camera for our trip to Cancun. It worked great for couple of days, but after 3 days of use, it froze up. When I start the camera, it freezes at the start and it will not turn completely on or off. Not able to do anything with it. I loved the fact that I was able to connect to the camera with my iphone through built in wifi connection. I will return this one and may buy the same one again at another time.

The camera itself is all right. Both video and photos are pretty good. The batteries for this camera suck. I let both batteries charge completely before using, each lasted for about 5 minutes of video (not even set on 4K) and got extremely hot. Thankfully, you can use the USB cable to shoot when it's connected to a power source (I used a power bank). The batteries do not need to be installed when connecting it to a power bank and the camera stayed nice and cool. I wish better batteries were included with the product, but aside from that, it's a decent camera.
Had to switch to a 9 person small wedding due to the pandemic.  Got 2 of these cameras to video the ceremony.  Very good and happy!  Cannot beat it for the money.

Very well worth the money it surpassed my expectations. Video i shot was in 1080p camera is easy to use and understand. I am very pleased with how the videos come out. Photos meh.. so so phone takes better pictures but if you know how to edit mabe you can fix the issues... once you download the app you can easily tranfer files from the camera to your phone. Sound quality i give a 8/10 sometimes it sounds a bit muffled and i used it without the wateroproof case. For the money you get waaaaay more camera.
I have used this a few times and I really like it. It's easy to use and was a great price. thanks!

I did not expect much when I bought this camera. I distrust phone cases that protect against water, so I figured I would buy this camera for a diving trip I have coming up. When I received the camera it was really well protected and tons of attachments for the camera as well. It is super easy to use and all around a really good purchase for low budget action cameras.
Gave a try again and it look great, I strongly recommend to watch Youtube video about it to oearn about all the functions I used it for rick climbing and the image look great
Used my camera for military recording and it caught everything perfectly. the audio quality and waterproof feature both excel in the field as well.

I ordered this camera and received it quickly. I received a box full of accessories. We tested it out at home and it takes great pictures. I was able to connect the camera to my phone without any issues. Definitely worth the expense. We will be using the camera when we go to Florida and taking some pictures in the water. Thank you for a great product!!
Great little camera would recommend to friends or family member. Especially for the price.

You get what you pay for.  It appears these cameras stop writing to a 64GB SD card when it's half full with no indication of a problem.  I bought two of these and they both did the same thing using SanDisk Ultra 64GB micro SD cards.  I lost enormous amounts of video from a once in a lifetime trip.  Spend your money on something reliable.
Love this cam.  It cost a fraction of the amount of a gopro and its way easier to use and the picture quality is way better.

I was very pleased with how compact and easy this is to use. Cannot wait to take snorkeling on our next vacation. I like the viewing screen unlike the other model I had were you had no idea what you were taking a picture of. It was easy to see and a big plus. Good product and at a great value compared to the other ones on the market. Comes with a good assortment of attachments.
El articulo llego en excelentes condiciones, por igual muy buena calidad visual, super practica y linda. In love with this product! Lo super recomiendo

Finally, after wasting my money on two low cost cameras and dumping them, I bought this Akoso EK7000 camera. After unpacking and installing battery, I was amazed with quality of video and easy set up. It is easy to use and quality is great. Only thing if they give detailed explanation on mounting accessories, it will make it perfect product for beginners like me. Highly recommend it.

You cannot beat this little guy. The picture Quality was absolutely insane. I almost gave up hope looking for a small action camera that didn't cost a arm and a leg. I took a chance and couldn't be happier with the outcome. From the picture Quality to the accessories it came with. This camera will do it all and at a affordable pirce
I ordered two of these, and both quit working. Could never get ahold of customer support either to file the "warranty" claim. Don't waste your money. Save up, and get a gopro.

Bought this for my 11 year old son, who is determined to one day be a you tuber and he loved it, quality picture is great, just as described and for him it was perfect. I will definitely upgrade in a few years but it’s serving its purpose for now
DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! If your looking for a GOOD action camera, stick with Go-Pro!
Nice Camera. Easy to use and less then a GoPro and just as good. Definitely recommend it to others who want to save money.. Lots of  accessories too.
It seems like a good camera. I have only used it in the pool so far.  I won't do scuba diving with it until June.The instructins are VERY lacking so it makes it much harder to figure out how to use.
Pretty worthless.  It shuts down in 88° weather and doesn't retain any video up to that point.  That narrow of an operational temp range is pretty unacceptable.

The packaging was perfect, as secure as a GoPro would be. Setup was easy after using the online manual & charging both batteries. The picture quality is great. I would recommend a class 10 Micro sd card though as it wouldn't record in 4K without it. Very satisfied with the accessories that came. Can't wait for summer & using this for beach movies.

I am so surprised at how awesome the video is on this product....especially at it's modest price!  Everything is how described.  I haven't taken any exciting video yet but we're headed to Central America next week and I can't wait to use it there.  Thanks AKASO for making such a great product!  Definitely will recommend to anyone interested in a camera for there sporting adventures!

The camera came with a lot of accessories that you can use for almost anything, I can put it on a helmet, bike, backpack or on a dashboard and turn it to a dash cam. But it does not come with a memory card which I believe is a business decision since you can get a free memory card and extra accessories if you leave a review and contact the company after. Overall it’s a good product does what I needed.
Was looking for something more affordable and just for occasional use. Worked well as a body cam for event.Super good price.

Got this for Christmas for my teenage boys to share. They have loved using it! Easy for them to use. Only thing we don't like(and maybe we just haven't figured it out) is we cannot here the sound from the device, only once we put it on our computer. If we needed another camera, I would order this one again!
Great camera! Not sure about the water resistance because it's never been in water.Fast delivery and follow-up, too!
