I mounted this to my kayak and was very impressed with the video quality. For the price this works great. Only issue was I am having a hard time syncing it to my blue tooth. But that could be just me.

Probably one of the best action cameras I have purchased at a great price! The underwater video quality is amazing as is the video quality overall. If your looking for a camera for your biking trails and weekend trips to the lake this is a great little action camera. Dont expect amazing quality regarding photos because this isn't ment for that I would look at this strictly for the Video.

my mother purchased 2 of these action cams for my daughters. these cameras are awesome they take great video. camera gets a little hot when using 4k and batery drains rather quickly however when recording in 2.7 picture is excellent and battery is a little longer. came with 2 batteries and lots of accessories. i have the go pro version of these action cams and there is very little difference for the costs.

The camera has definitely met our expectations. It's a great little unit that's easy enough to use. One of the great upsides is that it comes with so many mounting options that it saves a good deal of money just on the accessories that you would have to buy to get the action shots you're looking for. Well thought-out product. Very happy with it.

Pretty pleased with the camera so far, but I'm still getting used to it. It could come with a better user manual, but scanning the QR code gives you a helpful pdf.  As the listing states, you need to order a separate SD card.  It came with more accessories than I saw in the listing, but not the most important ones to me (head mount, chest mount, floating handle), so I'll have to buy an accessory set. Much better value than gopro.

This camera is better then a go pro, there price is reasonable and there pictures under water look outstanding. I didn't upload them yet off the camera, but reviewing the pictures on it they look awesome. My son is so excited to have gotten this for his birthday!

I bought this camera for our Carnival Cruise and it is a great camera. The picture quality is really and and I took it under water and it worked awesome. At first I was skeptical because of the price, but after I used it I couldn’t be happier. I recommend it for anyone who wants a good quality action camera and doesn’t want to break the bank

Quality was okay, but not great (you get what you pay for).  Biggest problem was it was difficult to know if it was recording or not.  Using this snowboarding on top of a helmet, we ended up with the camera not recording more often then expected, because it wasn't easy to tell.  The remote was useless, as it didn't work very well and again, it still wasn't easy to tell if it was really recording.
We bought this for my son and he loves it. The only complaint is the camera formats the video in such a way that my son's iPad does not recognize it. My husband found an app to help with the issue.

This camera is easy to use and really fun to have with you! The quality of the picture is only okay on the little screen but once you load it to your computer its a lot better. Good camera for how cheap it is
Pros:- lots of accessories come with this

It feels a bit cheap and plastic, but it does it's job well. It has a good picture and battery especially for the price. This is not a camera if you want picture perfect moments, but If you needed a camera for fun like hiking or dashcam this is one toseriously would consider.

This product is amazing! We take it with us fishing all the time and we are able to record all of our catches to be able to watch over and over again! Would definitely recommend to anyone not willing to pay for an actual GoPro! It has super good quality for what we use it for!

I got this camera to capture all the fun moments moving forward in 2020. I’ve always wanted a go pro camera but wanted to test a similar one first. I have professional Nikon camera but they are not waterproof. They are big and some times I do not want to bring them on vacations with me. I will be using this camera tomorrow at 6flags with my siblings

I am giving this 5 stars due to the fact that it is a fantastic camera for the price. The picture quality is much better than my aged Gopro. It is very easy to use and very lightweight. It comes with more mounts and gadgets than I even know what to do with.  Overall, I am shocked at how good a deal this camera is.

This is a go-pro knockoff.  Bought it, used 1 day and video started to hang. Only way to make it work again was to turn-off and on again after taking each video.  Best part, this thing didn't save any of my videos as it would hang right in the midst of recording video. Returned it to amazon the next day.

I used the camera for a motorcycle video. I had to screw the mount to the helmet because the adhesive is useless,I like the WiFi to the phone app but the batteries only last about 30 minutes each.Picture quality was decent and the price way better than Go pro and that is why I gave it 4 stars.Have not tried it under water yet but did use it on a rainy day and it worked well
Awesome action camera! It is worth the money. Perfect for hiking, fishing, biking, etc. Really good quality of videos and pictures!

I bought this gift for my dad who wanted to use it for motorcycle rides and hiking. It's very easy for him to use and to pull media off of - he loves showing the family all the 'neat footage' he gets from his rides! The pictures and videos are surprisingly clear for constant movement and I borrow it when I do hikes myself.  I would easily recommend this camera.

I ordered this camera having doubts. However to my surprise the picture quality was outstanding! And it fits into all GO-PRO mounts! Definitely worth buying. Only downside is, battery only last about an hour. Other than that, quality is just as good a GO-PRO, trust me don't waist $300 bones unless theres something specific you're looking for.

The 4k video at 25fps is better than I expected, however the problem I have is the date and the time. When I switch out the battery, the date and time revert to some random time. This is really inconvenient since I rotate between  batteries after each ride.

We bought this camera for my 14 year old daughter to use for a cruise. We wanted a GoPro-like camera, without the cost. With some research, this was found to be the best choice. The camera has great quality, was easy to set up, and is overall pretty amazing for the price! Definitely will recommend this camera to my friends and family.
Couldn't find setting to activate WiFi.  Turned out it's the Down button.  All good.  I'd buy it again.
Connected up great with my phone . Takes great pictures. I really like the wrist  controller.
Great little camera,that takes great pictures and video..Down side is..the battery life sucks..15 of video after 3 hrs of charge in-between locations..
Great camera. Used it to take pictures and video while in the South Pacific for 18 months. Took some great underwater video in Papeete Tahiti while staying at our resort hotel.

Arrived perfectly safe and sound. Everything appears to be present, looking forward to getting to use it soon. I've seen how well this camera works with various YouTube channels I watch and the clincher for me was Deuce and Guns Honestly.

Just received this camera and was pretty excited to start testing it out. I wasn't expecting a super high quality product or anything, just something to take some short video clips with during my hiking. While the camera and video quality itself are just fine, I was pretty disappointed that the Wifi feature doesn't work at all. When connecting, I'm presented with an error message that says "Product is not registered. Please return to seller" (what?) I'm going to mess around with it a little bit more but if it still won't connect, I think I will be "returning it to seller". And I never return items. But this feature was one of the reasons I bought this camera.

Purchased this camera to record autocross events with the camera mounted on my car. The video quality is fantastic at 1080p. The 4K video quality is very good but the lower frame rate isn't suitable for the fast action of autocross. I have tried mounting the camera a few different places on the car and the only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars is the audio quality when mounted outside the car. The microphone primarily picks up wind noise. Unfortunately, there isn't a way to connect an external microphone to mount elsewhere inside the car.
Great quality. Haven't purposely tested for water resistance but did get it submerged a few times and all is well. Good buy!

Had issues with camera under water and the customer service was phenomenal. They were very persistent in making it right. They make a very good camera, especially for the price. Buy with confidence...if there is an issue, they will treat you well and do the right thing for the customer. I’m excited to take their latest version which I just purchased to the Caribbean snorkeling! Will share video after.
I've really enjoyed this little camera so far. We've only had them for a few days, but so far, so good. I'll put it through its paces and update my review.

I live in a community with around 12 miles of hiking trails. This community also has a lot of older people who can not hike these trails. Thats the whole reason why I bought this camera. Yesterday was the first time using it. I and about 10 others were very pleased watching it back. I would recommend this to anyone looking.
This item have been open before arriving to me . It box was without its brand new warranty seal, it is very shame why is happening it ? . It is lack of respect to the costumer;  please.

I bought this for my trip to Grand Cayman and was amazed at how clear the pic/ video quality is with this camera. The controls are a bit clunky and the audio isn't good with the waterproof case but other than that it's worth the cost.  3 1/2 Stars on performance,  5 Stars for cost
Removed

We love this camera! The image stabilization is great even during action shots. The color balance is beautiful even underwater in the ocean. The picture quality is good. There are limited buttons but the camera has multiple functions.  Once you get used to the button combinations, the functionality really opens up.  Wonderful camera with a ton of accessories for a great price.

I purchased this camera for an upcoming trip this summer, and so far, I am extremely impressed. After debating between this camera and versions by SJCAM and Lightdow, I originally ordered the Lightdow. The pictures taken by the Lightdow were very blurry, lines kept appearing across the display screen, and the battery window was cheaply made and almost broke on the first use. Needless to say, I quickly returned that model and purchased the AKASO EK7000. This product is of much higher quality, and the pictures are extremely clear. Plus, this product comes with a remote. So far, I am extremely pleased with my purchase!

AKASO EK7000 4K represent a significant alternative to the exceedingly higher-priced GoPro. The video quality is excellent. It came with lots of clip accessories. Two batteries and a charger. I takes about 2 hours to charge batteries if totally dead. Charges two at once. The waterproof case worked excellently! No leaks as my kid tried in the bath tub for more than 45 minutes

We ordered this for my 7yo sons birthday.  This was only a little more than a kids camera and we figured this was good for adults in case my son didn’t really use it.  It’s easy enough for him to use himself which is great.  We also can’t wait to bring it on our next Caribbean vacation to use it snorkeling!

Yes I just bought this and I've only been playing with for a couple of days but so far...it's pretty amazing at this price point.  Zero complaints I would 100% recommend to someone that's been afraid to buy the more expensive name brand versions of these cameras.

This product definitely exceeded my expectations. Great price, nice quality and easy to manage. Definitely worth the price compared to a GOPro. I went looking for a go pro and I definitely did not regret getting this camera. Used it the same day I got it under water and it definitely took nice videos and pictures under water.
I had this for 2 months and used it 3x for about 30 min total. Stopped working after 3rd time. Make sure to buy the extended warranty if possible. Not happy.
I will never buy a Go-Pro. This thing is all you need.

So far this product has worked great without any issues. The wireless remote for picture or video capture works flawlessly. Coming with an additional battery, and plenty of accessories is what makes this purchase worth it. Video quality is nothing to complain about, there won't be any concerns or problems with your video, I recommend 1080 60 as the best option.
I used this camera to capture a fishing trip with 4' seas. Awesome video camera! Comes with many accessories.

It's way cheaper and comparatable with GoPro attachments. All fine and dandy. But, it makes you download an app to transfer your video files. Also not the end of the world. BUT, it is not compatible with my Galaxy S5 even with the app downloaded. Is gives me the error message "This camera is not a comparable device. Please return it to your seller." What the heck Akaso. Mind getting back to me?
It is really great camera if you cant afford a Gopro, using it in diving, its not as great as the new gopro for adjusting coloring settings.But its a great action camera
The camera is good for the money. The sound is not the best but the image is good. It comes with a lot of accessories which is very cool. I certainly recommend it for recreational use.
Good little camera for the money. Only complaint is poor sound quality. Has good battery life, up to 2 hours on a charge.

I love the picture quality. The accessories set doesn't include the dashboard mount. Some zoom function is necessary [available in the higher model] and should include a carrying pouch otherwise too may small mounts to carry. Again for the price a great buy.
So far so good. The sound isn't so great while its in the waterproof housing but out its fine.The video looks great.

It's ok but not the best quality it will be an ok backup camera the batteries are junk they don't last long at all an the charger is completely junk also. It's nice that it comes with all those different kind of mounting brackets

I bought this for my husband so he can record his roller hockey games. For the price it is an amazing product. Daytime use it amazing as well. When recording at night the picture quality is very grainy. We had to purchase different batteries as the ones it came with would only last fifty minutes. Which might not be an issue for other uses.

This is now my third review of this product. I was initially very satisfied with the camera as an affordable alternative to GoPro. The side buttons then broke off on me after little use. And now Akaso has fully replaced the camera. They've even sent me replacement accessories - really going above and beyond in my opinion. So I'm changing the review back to 5 stars based on their customer service.

A great buy! Far less expensive compared to the competitors and this EK7000 does everything I need it to do. It's easy to use and I had it up and running in no time. I downloaded the Akaso DV app from the app store. It work well with my LG phone. I will purchase another soon. To anyone considering buying this camera I can honestly recommend it without hesitation.Truely a great value!
Works just as good as my $500 go pro. And I don’t have to worry about smashing it.  No issues here.

I have been enjoying the video quality, the wide lens pictures, and the amount of recording time I get with the biggest memory card allowed.  However, the sound quality suffers, and it would be cool if there was some sort of zoom. I had the camera mounted in a car, and, even with the windows closed and no radio playing, the recorded audio is barely there.

This camera is excellent value for money. I was looking for an action cam that does underwater photography, time lapse, video and stills and this one has it all. The package included several accessories, extra batteries and the wrist remote which is super handy. It also connects to my smartphone with the EziCam app which essentially allows me to operate the camera remotely from my phone.

Provides as good of photos and video as Go-Pro in my opinion and for a lot less. Menu isn't quite as intuitive as I thought but its not too hard to figure out. Comes with a write remote shutter switch, two batteries, charger and a ton of accessories.

This fun camera meets the needs of what we were looking for.  A fun way to capture our skiing adventures, without freezing our hands.  Batteries appear to be draining faster than expected and the remote occasionally does not always get the camera turned off , but those could both be attributed to still learning the product!  Video quality is great!
I wish I got something with image stabilization because this one sucks for that but I still can't complain for the price.

I've never owned a GoPro. But I'm pretty sure this camera is very close. Only draw back is when it's in its waterproof case, it records sound like it's muffled. Other than that, it's an amazing camera for the price.

Got it for my kids for Christmas and so far it has been great. I mounted it to my daughter’s scooter to get some action video and I like the quality of the video. The only negative I have so far is that I have many mounts and I am not sure how or where to use them.

Great little camera! Many different mounting accessories for car, bikes, helmets, etc. Manual says no sound when in waterproof housing, but mine did pick up sound and clear too, while in the case inside my vehicle.
I use this camera for snowmobiling and dirt biking. It is great and very comparable to my go pro but a fraction of the cost. I would buy this over a go pro for sure. Easy to use and great picture!

So i have had this for a while and have used it a lot.  From hiking to fishing to rescue efforts after hurricane Harvey.  It still works but sound quality goes  bad after the outer case gets wet and the wrist piece broke fairly quickly.

Everything is great but the waterproof case. I took this camera down on my 1st scuba diving of the day at only 40 feet to try it out. The inside got a little wet. Most likely from a leak on the front button that changes the mode/settings/ON button. The back was not wet. Device is still working perfectly, but I did not dare to try it the 2nd time and risk destroying the device.

I was first skeptical about the price/quality ratio, after using a couple times, I just love it. Video quality is beyond my expectations. Everything is easily configured with the mobile app which is very convenient. The camera comes with a lot of accessories that cover pretty much all needs. Extra battery in the package was a great surprise, perfect for long vacations.

great camera for the price. only issue is ability to see screen when under water or using and switching from video mode to camera mode. i inadvertently took videos when i thought i was taking pictures. with use i’m sure i’ll figure this out. new user. looking forward to free accessory pack.
I like this camera. Definitely a great comparison to the more expensive brands. It functions as a product that was well built and cost effective. The picture and video quality is great!
Great value for the price.  Does a good job.  Comes with many accessories and best of all, two (2) batteries!

While there is so much the camera can do and I have yet to try it all, for what I've needed (capturing sports), it is all I can ask for. The linking to the phone works so well.  The video compares to the more expensive name you all know. I'd buy again.

Great camera, takes great footage, but the software available to edit is not of good quality.  Only good for posting an entire clip on youtube or something. Would not advise getting one if you intend to use it to make movie type files

I have had plenty of experience with GoPro equipment and was looking for a less expensive alternative. I must say that I expecting a lower quality knock-off but am pleasantly surprised. Quality is on good. Plenty of included accessories. I downloaded the app and was able to get that working immediately. I haven't tested out the waterproof aspect yet but the case looks and feels exactly like my GoPro.  I would recommend.

This camera does an amazing job recording video and sound. Even under the waterproof case, they record sound no problem. The wrist remote is very convenient, although sometimes it requires multiple clicks to make the camera react. All other accessories are also convenient for any situation needed for mounting, hanging, etc.  Would definitely buy another one.

This camera is really awesome for the price!! Only around $40 and maybe even better than a gopro. It comes with so many extra accesories and even two batteries which is really nice. I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone looking at getting an underwater camera.

SUPER LOVE IT. Takes great pictures and awesome video. I do wish however that I knew why it splits the videos up during recording. If someone knows I would love to know how to get one continuous video instead of several split up videos.i'll change my 3 star to more as well

This camera is fantastic. I bought it as a gift for my daughter for Christmas and was blown away by the packaging and the quality of the product. She as been testing it around the house and the photos and videos it takes is incredible. She has a trip planned soon and is planning on testing out the case in the ocean but based on the performance here we are not concerned. Could not have been happier.

I love this 4k camera. Its light weight and it has a clear image. I use it in pool etc. I came with all the accessories as shown. I dont know how long it will last, but I haven't had a problems so far.
The only thing I dont like about this camera is that it doesnt have a dash mount, otherwise its AWESOME!!

This camera is packaged with a full amount of accessories. Videos are in good quality and is very easily. I have enjoyed using this on motorcycle rides. Do not forget to buy multiple memory cards it is a must!  I bought 32gb and 64gb with plans on trying a 128gb. The 4k recordings will eat that memory pretty quickly.

The biggest letdown with this product was the inability to use a microphone with it. The internal mic does not pick much up and the quality is very poor. Everything appears fish-eyed too, which isnt always welcome. All the mounts are sturdy. The battery life is decent and I like the charging station. Video clarity is great!

Picture was satifactory but only used few times and it wont power on past logo screen and both batteries failed completely all within a few months. Not bashing to be hateful would have been well worth it aside from.. it dying from very little use. Save your money and get a go pro or somthing, was a waste.

First impressions are that this camera performs well beyond its price range. Stabilization and picture quality are both excellent.  The amount of accessories included are overwhelming (in a good way). If you’re looking for an action camera that performs well at a great price, you can’t go wrong with this.

This camera takes great video. I use it to record basketball games for the coaches to watch. With the wide angle we are able to catch all of the action on the court without a person having to rotate it back and forth. Battery life is excellent, especially compared to other cameras that I have owned. Great camera for a good price!

I use this camera to record sporting events.  I get about 1 hour and 20 minutes out of a full battery recording at 1080p 60fps.  The camera does require a microSD in order to use it.  I'm not sure it specifically says that in description.  I haven't used a goPro so I have nothing to compare this item to but I can say for what I use it for I couldn't imagine a goPro doing a better job especially when you consider the difference in cost.  Directions are difficult to follow but all the information you need can be found online.

I gotta admit i was on the fence about purchasing this but after unboxing and going through the setup phases, i was pretty confident taking into the small pool we have to test it out (ill upload photos later)This camera’s easy of use and overall quality give it the 5-star rating and will be something i look to incorporate into my social media course at the high school level!!!
Buggy, for what you pay for it, it's not a bad camera.  But I will say it doesn't seem to work as well as more expensive ruggedized cameras.

After looking at all the reviews for this camera, I decided to go ahead and buy it, and this was a big disappointment. The menu is actually good and easy to use, but the image quality and audio quality are not that great. It has the grainiest video footage I have ever seen. The audio quality is equally bad, practically unusable. I will be returning this thing immediately and just go with a gopro or a DJI.

I bought this to play around with. Nothing very serious. this is the perfect camera for that. Not very expensive. The features are good. The picture quality is good. Cant say anything bad about it with the idea that it is for me to play and experiment with.The only thing that I think could be improved though is the battery life. Its ok, but I want it to last longer.
the picture is definitely not 4k, not nearly close to 4k at allthis picture is yellow in the picture.

This camera is easy to operate, takes clear photos and videos, has good sound quality, and is great for family adventures!  Used mostly for recreational use, this has been a great device to get the entire family involved and creating.  Great alue for the money.
I was surprised how well it worked. The wrist capture is surprisingly fast. Video capture is easy. Messing with settings couldn't be made easier as well. I actually prefer it over my GoPro

The camera itself is exactly was is described and is a great value. It shoots in lots of different modes and does indeed shoot 4k if you have the right micro SD card. The only thing preventing me from giving 5 stars is that the Android App actually does not work very well. It is difficult to connect the camera and the app features are fairly limited.

I use it to take videos of my kids as they learn how to swim.  Just received it, so far, so good!  All the different mount attachments it comes with have been extremely handy and allow for tremendous flexibility.  This makes the value of the camera even higher!

This camera is nice and small and has incredible picture quality. I bought the extra bag of attachments and you can mount the camera in any way you want. The camera itself comes with a lot more attachments than I thought I would get, I didnt know it came with anything besides the camera. The water proof case it goes in is great as well.

So after doing alot of research for a cheap action camera, I decided on purchasing the AKASO7000.  I was very hesitant to invest in a fully priced gopro because I wasn't sure if I would use it or not.  But in the few days I have had it, I don't regret my purchase.  My family and I are going on a cruise in April and I plan on getting alot of great shots for it.  The AKASO is very intuitive and a great purchase for some one interested in action cameras but hesitant about paying big money for a gopro.  AKASO7000 is a great purchase

This camera takes great photos and videos.  The color is clear and the videos are not blurry.  Good value.  Make sure you have plenty of memory on your card.  It does not stop filming when you run out.  It begins to run backwards and erase footage.  The remote is not waterproof.  Also, the user booklet needs more directions on usage and diagrams on attaching the mounts.
It is such a cool little device for the price. It has cool features. Way better than I expected. Thought it would be crappy. Its not. So excited! Great picture. Easy to use.

Hands down best money spent.  Great quality for the price.  Have used it in Florida and made great shots in the ocean. Two batteries is a plus. Daughter also uses it on here go kart. The saying you get what you pay for does not apply here . This is way more quality than expected for the money.  Wifi is a plus also. Videos viewed instantly on my note 10.

This device is so easy to use!It takes great photos, time lapse photos, video, and more, all at the click of a button. Comes with a waterproof case, an extra battery, and a bunch of mounting accessories to fit your needs. The two batteries even arrive fully charged and ready to use!

So i bought this camera for my husband so he can record his activities. I must say that I really was not expecting for it to be this good. Its super lightweight, you barely notice it. Decent quality video, he hasn't jumped out of a plane yet with it! Easy setup, great accessories to fit any needs. overall its a great product. Not the best, but great.
This is my first action camera,I enjoy it so much! For the price you pay, it just worth it,would recommend!!

I received this camera for Christmas and I'm really happy with it.  The camera works well with all of the many included attachments.  The manual allows for easy video tutorials.  I'm very impressed with the water proof case!  Overall I'm having fun using my camera in all the different ways that it allows me to.

Quality cam for your money! Great value!Much cheaper than a GoPro and every bit just as good. Quality video, sturdy stabilizers, nice waterproof case included. The one bummer we found was that the bar stabilizer mount that was included was fairly small. It, unfortunately wasn’t big enough to fit onto my son’s four wheeler bars.

Overall this is a pretty solid camera with a wide range of view and a variety of different quality settings and options. Is it the fanciest thing in the world? No, it's simple and works great for outdoors and sports video and photography. I haven't had a chance to test just how water proof the camera is, but from other reviews and videos, it's what you'd expect of an action camera.

Okay so quick little review, audio is meh but expected. I used for AutoX event, Simply mounted it, used the wrist remote and slapped the memory card into the computer to review. Overall, I'd say this would be good for maybe a windshield or helmet mounted action cam. Also the remote didnt always pick up the command. Would like for it to have some overlay feature but I guess for the price range it can’t be beat

I bought this on whim. For the price it works great but this model only handles the 32G card for a few dollars more you can purchace anAKASO that handles 64G card. But if this is not a problem then this model works just fine...

I liked how this camera came with all these mounts to put on, not to mention this fantastic water-resistant feature that is able to go down to some pretty deep depths. For the price this camera is, I believe its definitely worth your time to invest in one of these. I'm mainly using this camera for snorkeling and filming skate videos and so far so good.
The exact same thing as a GoPro but way less money and more accessories, including an extra battery.  I have had a few GoPro cameras and this is just as good.  I highly recommend this action camera.

At first, I had y doubts about this camera, but I can honestly say that this camera is a dupe for the Go Pro! The image quality is above and beyond, it has a really nice view of what you are trying to see. It comes with a lot of accessories depending on what you will need, and it even has a convenient button bracelet that helps you switch from camera mode to video mode. This camera is a real treasure!

This is my first time buying a cheap action camera, and I can honestly say I am impressed. I bought this for a snowboarding trip and it held up really well. It is very easy to use and operate and has pretty good picture and video quality. The only problem I had with it was the battery life (about an hour for each battery) but that may have been due to the cold weather?!

This was the first camera of its kind that I have purchased and I love how easy it was to use. I got an accessory kit for it and will be ordering extra batteries because it tends to die after about 1.5 hrs of continuous use.  I cant wait to take this thing EVERYWHERE though. just have to make better use of the shutter button remote.
Love this camera. Great picture quality and sturdiness. Excellent product, especially for the price. The only thing I'd say is the battery doesn't last as long as I'd like but it's not terrible. L

Great camera. Would recommend to anyone looking to keep those important memories alive. Customer service was wonderful as well in helping with any concerns we had about this camera. Makes for a great gift idea as well. Have a great day thank you.
Great camera once i figured it out.  The 4k feature is jumpy but the 1080 is spot on for video.  4k is crystal clear for pictures

We love this camera. We use it when we go 4 wheeling. Its been in mud, water, as well as swamps and it still working great! This is definitely a great camera especially for the price and quality. I love how it come with different attachments. It made mounting this camera even easier to my ATV. I would definitely buy this item again and strongly recommend it.

I was all set to buy a much more expensive version of an action camera. You know the one I’m talking about. Anyway, I saw this one and said I’m gonna try it out and see. Wow! I am very impressed with the quality and the amount of accessories that came with this camera. I haven’t used it very much yet but with what I’ve seen so far it looks excellent. I’m very happy with my purchase.
We ride ATV'S in the woods and this takes great pictures and videos from my helmet mount . Would definitely recommend this product.

This camera is an upgrade from what I had, and works very well and the issues I had are no problem now.  Rebecca Luster was very helpful all the way through the process making sure I was happy and satisfied with this product.
Looks like it's going to be a great gopro! Can't wait to get an SD card to put it to the test!
If you are not meticulous about video/image quality, this camera will do the trick. The sound quality is the worst of any negatives but it's not all bad.
Was not impressed! Batteries lasted15-20 minutes tops. Bought for a ziplining trip and the lens fogged up to a point you could barely see anything. Daytime picture quality ok night time very bad.
It's a very easy to use, comes with instructions that are very easy to use and follow!!

I really like this product so far, especially for the price.  It is small and compact while being easy to set up and use.  I looked at a youtube video for further understanding and all information about this product made it more relevant for its intended purpose.  Awesome product.
Its just like a GoPro but at a fraction of the cost. That's a big deal if you've always wanted a GoPro but couldn't afford it. Well here you go. GoPro quality but not at the outrageous GoPro price.
Positives:-Video is great quality

Took me forever to pick out a decent camera that between reviews and price point I could be happy with. This is to share my memories of my Kids growing up. Used it on the Trampoline and despite the little bit of fog that formed I am beyond happy with this purchase. Decent price, great quality equipment, love that it comes with two batteries and all kinds of different accessories to try/use.

I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas this year.  So far it's wonderful.  Very simple and easy to use, and the picture clarity is second to none.  I was surprised by the number of accessories that come in the box.  The first thing she did was attach it to her handlebars and go for a ride.  She loves it!  Great product!

Awesome camera, awesome picture, very simple to use even in motion and for the price of a gp you can get 3 or 4 of these and have the same quality at different angles at the same time. Also comes with enough mounts to mount pretty much anywhere you want.

Just as promised. I brought this for my trip to St. Lucia last year. The underwater capability is perfect. Sound good but when in the water protective case, it gets muffled. Remember to take it out of the case time to time to cool off after use. I definitely recommend.

This camera is awesome. I put this camera in my car on the whindshield and left it in there in very low tempetures -28 to be exact and believe or not still working.  I was very amazed and please with this product. I will defintly recommend it! :)

First time owning an action cam.  So cool! Took it out to capture photos and video from an ATV tour. Can't wait to see how they all turned out. Very durable and tough little piece of equipment. If you are thinking about it, just buy it! Very comparable to the big name brand at a much better value.
I got this Camera for my daughter and she loves it she immediately thought of a GoPro! This is exactly what she wanted.
Product was delivered on time and package included everything as described.  Camera is good for the price.  I am happy with this purchase.

This product is worth every penny. It comes with so many parts that shows how much they really want you to excel in making your videos. It even comes with spare parts such as an extra waterproof case and battery. So far between my and my brother I have definitely ordered the better GoPro camera.I cannot wait to use it and make videos :)

I enjoyed this camera and enjoyed the price. Basically the same thing as a Go Pro but much cheaper. I used it when I was traveling across the country to document my journey and it was very durable through all my packing. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars was there are so many confusing attachments that require you to buy tripods, bands etc.
Camera seems to be working well! :)

This camera is by far one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. First off the price is incredible. The extras you get with the camera are top notch. The camera itself is so easy to use and the quality of video and stills is on par or better than most cameras in this class. Very happy with this purchase. Will absolutely by more Akaso products in the future.

This is man excellent value. The controls are easy and intuitive. The waterproof case is great and allows easy use of the controls. It comes with numerous mounts. And it even comes with an extra battery.
The video loop feature is disabled when you record in 2.7k or 4K. You CAN loop in 1080p at 30/60fps.Also does not have usb-power on mode for dash cam use.
Awsome little Camera for the price!! Came with TON of accessories!!! Well worth the money!! You got my approval! 🤗

This product does everything it says it does. I was very pleasantly surprised. The settings are easy to navigate and understand, it works well with my Macbook, it's an all around intuitive to use device. Worth the purchase.

Update to review:  customer service was prompt to contact me in regards to my problem. Fortunately for both of us, it turned out I am a bit of an idiot and had merely overlooked the charger that came with my product. Dang thing was a lot smaller than I’d imagined.The camera works great and I am very happy with the clarity of the images.
Devuelta. Bajé la aplicación y no logré acceso al menú ni se conectó wifi
The pictures and video are great quality. I was holding the camera in mt hand while filming and it stabilized the video really well. The app was easy to install as well.

My daughter uses this for her horseback riding lessons, trail rides and outdoor horsebarn activities.  It is really easy to use and provides great video and still pictures.  Even with the riding videos and fast pace the video stability is great.  Use in the rain is not inhibited because of the waterproof.  Excellent choice in action cameras and cant beat the price!

I bought this camera to go camping with for Labor Day weekend. I read the reviews and figured it was worth a shot for the money. And it is. I got home and uploaded the videos to my computer and they were fantastic. I was even able to share a few quick videos with people after loading them directly to my phone. I love this thing will probably be buying another soon.

Forget paying GOPRO price this little thing works great! Picture quality is amazing for what you pay for. Make sure you get 64 mb or higher to experience the 4K action. Really very impressed with this camera. Waterproof case is solid!

We purchased this for a specific adventure, with the idea that if it only worked for that, it would be worth the money. It has lasted for many adventures since. Note: Do not purchase this if you are looking for phone app use. The app for this camera is barely usable.

In the beginning this only happened every once in awhile. I haven't used it very much and lately videos only record for a few seconds anymore. Every once in awhile get one at the length I wanted but at least half the time it shuts off prematurely.. and has a full battery! Junk.

This camera has worked incredibly well for me - camping, driving, and motorcycling. The battery life is better than I had anticipated as is the quality of the camera itself and the waterproof case. I especially like the ease of the wifi button on this unit. Very fast interface with my phone and app.

Very happy with the EK7000 love that it has 2 batteries and a charger.  easy hook up to tv -- phone -- great remote -- I had to call customer service and the service was excellent - no waiting took only a few minutes to help me. I recommend it is a Wide view too

AKASO EK7000 is great affordable action camera for someone that doesn’t want to pay hundreds of dollars for GoPro. I brought to Hawaii to take some videos at beach and pool since I didn’t want to lose my cell phone in the water. The box comes with lots of accessories and I hope to use them soon.

This is my second Akaso camera, I also have the EK5000. They are affordable for the general hobbyist, are easy to use, and take good pics. My wife and I use them when we are snorkeling. They come with more accessories than we will ever use.
Great for the price. However, it only takes good video and pictures in high light. Low light settings look terrible. Definitely not 1080 p.

I told my friend (a user of the well known action camera brand) what I got (Camera, 2 Batteries w 2 battery charger, Waterproof case, all sorts of mounting devices and an offer for more free stuff). All at a price that is a fraction of that well known brand's camera alone. He couldn't believe it but, now, he is going to get an AKASO  EK7000 too.

Very nice camera. It takes great video and still shots. I live using it attached to my kayak, making great movies with my daughter. And I have great some great bald eagle shits. On the Delaware River. Definitely worth every penny.
I couldn't even pair this camera with the app! Let alone use it! Do not waste your money and buy a better product.

I bought two of these cameras. One works great! The other wont turn on at all. I have tried all 4 batteries I have and they are fully charged, nothing, cant even get it to respond at all. Tried plugging the camera directly to the charging cable, still nothing. Pretty dissapointed with the 50% chance of getting a working unit. Might have to try another brand although I hate to do that because the one of these I have that is working is amazing!

I had bought this for my husband, as he wanted to record himself while riding his 4 wheeler. I didn't want to spend an arm an leg for a GoPro. It works perfectly for him. It came with lots of different mounts so he can use it whenever. Bonus.. it comes with a remote which he loves because he can set record without having to do it on the camera itself (if it mounted to his helmet)

This is my first action camera, and I am very happy with this purchase. It's very easy to use and comes with a bunch of stuff. The WiFi can sometimes be a little wonky, in regards to the fact that I sometimes have to go forget it fromy network and reconnect every other time in turn it off, but it's not a big deal. I havnt used it underwater yet, but will be soon. I feel like this was a good camera to start off with. Would totally recommend to buy. I had a hard time posting a video, but below I posted a picture taken on the camera.
I don't like how the camera gave fish eye appearance.3/5 for the camera but 10/10 for the customer support!

I am very happy with this product thus far. Came with tons of accessories and an extra battery&charger. Am very pleased with the fact that they include a case with the camera. Picture and video quality are good for the price and the connect ability to the phone via WiFi is impressive , overall pleased and impressed enough to buy another  in the future
This is an incredible camera it is outstanding for the price. I wasnt expecting the quality and accessories to be of the quality they are. Good buy.

When i ordered this only i had only done a little research on it. I had been back and forth on either this or the GoPro. So i had low exceptions for the price. But i figured i give it a try. When i got it i was shocked by how many small accessory's that came with. Still not sold, I tested some photos and videos of me goofing around. I am extremely impressed and am very happy with my decsion. Saved a ton of money and my expectaions were well exceed. I would recommend it to you myself.

Great little camera! You can't beat this for price and functionality. The only trouble I had was the EZ iCam app didn't work with this model. But after 1 quick email customer support I was given a QR code to get their iSmart DV app which worked on my iPhone. Then I could control and view the live video from my camera. I would definitely suggest this camera for anyone wanting to do action cam work. The accessories and mounts that work for the GoPro name brand also work with this camera. This even comes with a remote to take photos or video, you don't even have to set it up, IT JUST WORKS!
its a good camera for taking pictures and videos of actions. I would recommend for people who don't want to spend $300 for a GoPro.

So far this camera sits right next to a go pro hero in my book. The quality is real nice and video is also excellent. Haven't had any problems with this product. Also I purchased the extra attachments for the camera as well. Everything this camera has to offer is outstanding for the price value. I will be using this to make more valuable memories and adventures

This little camera works well for what I am doing there is no zoom just whatever you can see the camera will record works well comes with some stuff to get you going and for the price you can not go wrong
Decent little camera for outdoor daylight photos. Stayed dry and battery life was decent.

I bought this as an alternative to the much more expensive GoPro because I wanted to take some underwater video while on vacation in Curacao without spending all our vacation money on the camera.  The camera worked flawlessly in and out of the water and I am very pleased with it.  The pictures/videos were very good, the waterproof housing worked perfectly and for the money you can't go wrong.

I am very surprised by the quality of this camera! For such a low price, it really knocks it out of the park. The picture quality seems great, even through the waterproof case. I can't wait to try it out next time I go skiing. I especially love the time lapse function. There are so many options to customize the way I take pictures and record video. Would definitely buy again.

I received this camera from my hubby for Christmas since I am always the one taking videos and pics of the kids. It's nice to have to such a portable lightweight camera that I can take anywhere. I love that it has a waterproof case and a bracelet to record with. It has every mount you could think of which is another thing I love about it.

I bought this camera as a gift for my son.  I think it is a very good value for the money, since a GoPro camera is probably 4 times more money.  It seems that the camera works but the instructions are minimal and we have to search on the internet for instructions on house to use the software.
We love this camera! We debated between this one and the more expensive GoPros and we are so glad we choose this one! The batteries have a long life, and the picture is great!

There are many many things to like about this camera.  Converted from a go pro whose batteries kept dying to this and love it.  The remote wrist band is the nearest thing ever.  Clever and cool with so many attachments.

We got this camera on a whim to take with us on our family cruise.  It could not have worked better!  from underwater videos snorkeling to poolside splashing the waterproof case was perfect.  The images and video are crystal clear and are easily as good as camera much more expensive.  We could not be happier with our camera and will use it a lot in the future.

I was debating whether to spring for the GoPro, but didn't want to shell out 300 bucks.  This camera does everything I need without the hefty price.  Quality is good and so is the battery life (this comes with two batteries + a double slotted charger).

I'm 13 years old and this is my first camera. It was easy to set up and it has been easy to use. I love this camera. It is a perfect first camera for me.  When I had a question and I emailed customer service, they emailed me within a day and gave me every thing I needed to know. I really recommend buying this camera.  Also, the price was much cheaper than other cameras.

This is not easy to use. Many of the mounts are very cheaply made and flimsy. Some of them didn't even fit the camera. We would have kept it despite those issues, however, we returned it bc it says it's 4K and it is definitely NOT 4k! Fast, easy return though. :/

I'd been looking at action camera for an upcoming trip.  Whitewater rafting, zip lines, and more are part of the trip.  So I wanted something which could do a good job, be safe in many environments, and be less costly than a Go Pro.  I saw this camera with many reviews and side by side footage versus the Go Pro.  Pretty impressive and the cost was beyond reasonable.  The camera arrived quickly, was well packaged, and worked fine right out of the box.  For the price, I am very happy.

We loved the camera! It has good picture quality and really a good size.We use it for nerf gun battle :)) between 5 siblings and it was exciting to see what we look like playing and having fun! I would probably buy this as a gift for a cousin or family member.
"4k" looks terrible. I dont know how this has the reviews that it does.
Seems nice picture is better than expected can't wait to take it on our family trips.

My 11 year old wanted to practice shooting video/ wildlife and THIS fit every wish bucket! The AKASO truly came bundled with many accessories/ways to mount the camera and the best part has to be the waterproof case. I was nervous for him to try it out but straight into a creek it went, totally dry! Thank you for creating something affordable, durable and all around great.
Love it! Received it for my birthday and use it daily! Great camera easily worth hundreds more!

This camera is good for filming your adventures. Whether you do something safe like mountain climbing, or dangerous like peacefully protesting in a democratic country, this action camera will capture moments worth remembering.

I purchased this for my husband. He races go karts and we were missing all of the best action shots. This camera is great at picking them up now, good sound quality and stabilization especially when he’s bouncing around on the go karts. Great camera for the price.

After one use, the start/stop record button stopped working. Sent it back for a replacement. Took the replacement out and halfway through using it for the first time, the device would no longer read any micro SD card I would install into it. Returning today for a full refund and trying a different camera.

Wow, very nice package. camera works great. so many accessories included i didn't need to order the large accessory package. plus a free gift of your choice. really excited about our future trip to Maui Hawaii!thanks Akaso for a great inexpensive and powerful product.
If you don't want to shell out and buy a GoPro, this is probably your best bet
This camera is great for its price. It's so close to the 500$ gopro I can't believe it!The one thing to note is that the still images are not good. So don't even try to take pictures.

I'm giving this item three stars because of the quality of the images and video recording. Images do not look 4K or anything close to high quality resolutions. Videos and images are grainy even with editing. Played around with the settings but did not make the quality any better. I guess for the price the low resolution is expected.

The camera is very good, great deal.  I will probably buy another one!The remote is not waterproof.  I had hoped to use my waterproof camera with a remote while in the water but quickly learned, the hard destroying electronics way, that I cannot!  Camera is fine underwater with the case.

Really awesome quality and only a fraction of the price of a GoPro. Bought this for our son to use in the trails when dirt bike riding, surfing, etc. The wrist remote is very handy. We Love that it came with two batteries!

This was a gift for my son in law and he has had great success by mounting it on his border collie. The action videos were amazing. The pro picks up the background color and landscape perfect. I highly recommend this camera.
Excellent price for a 4K action camera.Good selection of mounting accessories included in this set; compatibility with GoPro (most? all?) accessories is a definite plus.
Glad I got this camera works well underwater and has a ton of features . I connect it to my phone and onto my motorcycle  it's a great action camera to capture footage with .
Works well check out my YouTube channel Get@itOutdoors for the quality of the camera.

This item was great! I went to the mountains with my family and me and my dad went snowboarding and the video cam out perfect. One flaw is when using video you don’t get as much battery life with the camera.
Looks to working good easy to use was told by gopro owner this looks to be better then his
Got this for my son's gift and he uses it all the time what a wonderful way for him to share his adventures with us

This was an awesome Christmas gift for my boyfriend! He has mounted ot to his helmet and cant wait to hit the mountain on his snowmobile. Just a note, it does not come with any cords , we had to order a HDMI cord but it was only like 10$ on Amazon.Overall we are happy with it and the price was great considering I bought him another camera for his truck lol !

Product was shipped to me with in 2-3 days ingreat condition. The video quality and picture quality are amazing. The camera comes with a lot of peices for different mounts and makeshift grips.The main selling point for me, was the water proof/resistance feature. Witch works perfectly. Only draw back about it is that fact that with the water proof case on, no sound can captured.

Camera takes great quality photos, the 1080 HD is amazing with the frame rate high enough to have a continuous smooth video. The 4k take great photos and the video is pretty good too. Just an amazing device, only downside is its battery life, glad it came with 2 batteries as it seems to enjoy its power. Great little device video quality is excellent and the value is unbeatable.

Great camera! If you are looking for a good way to document family trips, parties, or adventures, this camera is the perfect item to do so. The amount of camera you get for the price makes it a wonderful budget friendly camera. Our family loves it!

This is my second review after being contacted by a representative from this company concerning my first review I was not happy with the product.  I bought it for my grandson for Christmas the pic/vid quality wasn't good, however I was sent a replacement and well it suits it purpose for am 11 year old.
Great $70 little Action Camera. It’s a clone and has all the features of my GoPro hero 4. It will do everything a GoPro hero 4 can do for less money.

I bought this for my upcoming cruise and it was perfect. The videos that were taken are awesome and the Underwater photos (I will attach some soon) I was so impressed with it and for the price and all it comes with it is so worth it.

Bought this camera for an upcoming trip. I was excited to receive the camera when they said they would deliver. This morning I opened the water proof cover and the clamp broke. Camera "might" work well but, I cannot take any under water video!!.After using the camera I will write a review about camera quality later.
I love the camera and all of the include components however I wish that an SD card were included.

I bought this camera after I lost my GoPro Hero7, because I don't want to spend that much again. I used AKAso EK7000 for my skiing trip, I was very impressed by the quality of photos and videos captured from this camera. The quality is same as what I use to get from my go pro.
This weekend was the first time I used My Akaso and I absolutely love this camera.I filmed my family under water and the videos and photos were amazing.
We placed the cam on our Waverunner and it works great. We are so happy that we did not spend more money on the brand name version. Love the remote control to toggle video on and off while at speed.

I have worked with GoPros before and this is the best bang for the buck! I'll be buying more of these in the future when I need extra static cameras! The image stabilization is equivalent to a GoPro 6 so it keeps up with the competition really well!

We are treating the kids for on a cruise for Christmas and I wanted to get an action camera. I have searched and searched. Most are really expensive! We already spent so much so I wanted to get something within my budget. I have tested it and and can't believe that the quality is this good for this price! Plus I can connect it through wifi that makes everything so much easier.
It wouldn't sync with my WiFi. Other than that I haven't had to many problems. Haven't tried the micro card in my computer yet
Great camera. the only problem is the water proof housing slowly leaks at about 40-80 feet on a dive which is what I got this thing for.

This has been a good little camera.  The video quality is excellent and the water proof case works well... The only down side to the camera is the microphone doesn't pick up sound when the waterproof case is on.

Just received this camera, it looks great and comes with a lot of accessories. The manual is downloadable online. The quality of this camera and the products are awesome. Also, the customer service is outstanding!

This is a great product that holds up and has a great picture. The wireless compatibility is awesome! It lets you check videos and photos whenever you want. the batteries charge fast but they seem to only last like 2 hours and videos split up in sections of about 30 minutes. Its defiantly worth the buy if you need a camera for fun activities or car dash came.

I bought the Akaso 1800 HD and the quality was good... But then i recently ordered this camera 4k way different way better quality if your not sure if to get the camera this comment should be the one that you say “okay I’ll get it” it great and if your just starting to blog then this should be the one to start with have fun!

I just got this and been playing with it for about an hour and so far I love it. I don't really have anything to compare it to since I have never owned another camera like it but when I purchased it most of the reviews did say it was the same or better than a GoPro so I just went from that. The main thing I love about it is the price definitely now I just have to figure how to change the date

Haven't tried it underwater yet, but topside, what a great camera. Great for someone like me tgat has no camera skills, none whatsoever. Price is great and arrived super quick. I look forward to lots of memories.

Received it in a good box with great packaging, checked it out, read the manual, charged the battery and it was working great. It was easy to use and nothing seemed wrong with it. I took it with me to use for the first time in a race and it started fine. Battery was at full and it started to record fine, but about halfway through the race a checked it to make sure and found the battery to be dead and the inside of the waterproof housing was fogging up. Later I checked the SD card to see if it had the camera had recorded anything and there was absolutely nothing recorded.

The only problem was the waterproof case seem to get moisture in the front around the power button.  It did not effect the camera, however I do see it being a problem in the future.  Hopefully seller sees this and offers a solution.

My wife wanted a GoPro for her upcoming trip overseas.  But we didn't want to invest a fortune for an action camera.  This one is a really good value for the money.  The User Manual, which must be downloaded, could be a little more detailed, especially with respect to the available mountings.  But she is thrilled with the overall performance and features of the camera.

I like the remote which is very important to me and all the accessaries, as well as the packaging, I own a GoPro too and this is the best action camera for the price it is almost equal to a Go Pro for a fraction of the cost.

This thing is great! I had been waiting for a log time to get a camera for my daughter who's one that she found  in the dumpster 8 years ago stopped working. The video quality is good and so is the sound. The only thing I don't like is that it is that there where no instructions for how I can use all the stands. Thank you!
Love this, mount it on my head and swim around, look like I'm from under the sea.

With real estate agents encouraged to only show homes "virtually", I had to find a quality, easy to use camera to do video tours, virtual showings and virtual open houses. This camera is amazingly simple to use and is excellent quality video. My only complaint (and a small one) is that when you download the user's manual the print is tiny.

Bought this for my 10 year son. It has worked well for the 6 months we've had it. He has used it for downhill skiing and some indoor video recording as well. For outdoor the microphone is muffled with the case on. One small complaint is he accidently broke off the battery cover the first day so the design of that part is a little fragile.
I just got it delivered.When in Video resolution setting menu, there is only one resolution active 1080P(30fps), rest all are greyed out, and cannot be scrolled to.

We bought this camera then the pro version 2 months later for my other son. The pro version is much better. This version has a delay when hitting record before it starts recording. Plus we have to wait before stopping or the end will get cut off. So this camera does not allow quick unplanned action recording.
Has held up agaisnt kids; doesnt come with memory/storage. Had to purchase a $40 memory card and that only does approx 1.5 hours

It took me a little bit to figure out all of the pieces that came with this GoPro, but I am also not planning on mounting it so I wasn't too vesting in figuring the different mounts out. Pictures look good, and the device is easy to use! Definitely recommend to buy as it is much cheaper with what seems to be the same quality as other more expensive GoPros.
Loving this camera. Great picture quality. Easy to use. Comes with a bunch of mounts. Cheap. I highly recommend if you can't or don't want to spend the money on a Gopro.

Pretty awesome little camera for the price! Used it this weekend while snowboarding and had no issues with it. Accessory kit that comes with it is pretty versatile too. Accessory kit came with enough different mounts that I can leave them in places permanently.
need more clear instructions on how to download pictures other than that great product

We've owned several GoPro's in the past, and they're great - but this one is honestly just as good and at like 1/5 of the cost! Great quality, sound, and battery life! We're getting a second one because we're starting a YouTube channel, and at this price, why not?! Love it!

This camera is Amazing! No need to spend tons of money on the name brands. My husband is a Hunter and outdoorsman and uses this for action shots on his rifle, archery bow, etc! Was a Valentine's gift for him and he couldn't believe I got him one. Didn't know I spent less than $100 on it lol. Great quality and easy to use!
this camera had good video,image,and sound. for me it was great and the under water worked very well. also it was a very good price for a camera.
Just got this camera and tested it, pretty decent picture and video quality, with some needed accessories, I like it so far!
I was a bit worry that the quality of the camera wouldn't be as good as others. but i was wrong... This little thing is as good or better than the hd proI would totally recommended to anyone
It was good on the beginning but a month later the change port broke down so it’s trash now

Bought this for my husband for Christmas and he loves it! Great value with all the included mounting options. I should have looked a little closer at what was included, because I thought it would have a memory card with it. He was able to order one, so he won't be able to play with the camera for a couple days.The wifi connection to the app works great, too!
Happy CustomerRec’d the product in new condition and well built.

Ran into this camera while looking into action cameras and can i say i made a good purchase. I use the camera to record videos while i go on drives. The camera quality is really good. You get a few mounts you can stick to places so you don't have to hold the camera. While the setting are not on the camera the app is pretty simple to use.

I don't have much good to say about this camera, especially after buying a used GoPro Hero 3 + Black Edition for the same price. I'm only giving it 2 stars instead on 1 because I don't know how well of a still image camera it is. Planned on using this for recording track days, but doesnt work with my app(Harry's lap timer), and is poor quality when matched with the GoPro at the same settings.

Beautifully packaged. Easy instructions.  Epic video quality.  This thing actually blew me away how great it is.  Awesome price and it came with so many mounts too.  Love it.  Probably going to order 1 or two more.

Needed a action camera similar to the GoPros of the world. Read the reviews and figured I would give AKASO a chance. So far it's a great little action camera for the price. Plan to use it for a science camp trip coming up. With the prices of disposables and not knowing what pictures are going to develope, this to me is worth it so far.
This is an amazing camera! It takes great photos and videos. Definitely worth the price. Love it and would buy it again.
It gets pictures but not good quality like i had hoped. But you definitely get what you paid for. It’s good for a quick project tho

Usually I you can expect to spend 200+ for a camera of this quality. The app is also great and makes things EASY To shoot on the move. I love this product and would buy if you are on the fence about it. You also get a ton of accessories that you wouldn’t normally get with more expensive products. This camera is rugged and easy to use for any environment.

The camera works well and was easy to set up. The wifi feature is easy to use and the camera fits all the easy to find gopro and other brand accessories. I marked it down one star due to the design of the round lens on the case, I want to use some diving lens filters, but can only find square shaped ones at this time.
I'm loving this camera!  It does everything I need for a great price!

This is a very good action camera for the price.  Hooked it up to my quadcopter and it works wonderfully.  Tested the waterproof case and it works great.  A lot of accessories came with this and they seem to cover a vast amount of scenarios.  Picture quality is good.  Not the best but for the price it is better than expected.
Customer service wants you completely happy. That's nice to deal with.

Purchased for our teen. He has used several times while biking and kayaking. Water proof case works well. Easy to sync to iPhone with WiFi. Battery life could be improved. Lots of accessories available for this camera.Overall great product for price!

Took a long time to ship. Good condition on arrival.  Remote arm band will not turn on/off video cam.Picture is quite good. Minimal software capability and is not able to edit video or add music. Have to load video from card directly to my computer then edit using different software. Video dize tends to limit your ability to send video via email. The suggested software does run well on my android S7 phone for live viewing and wifi. Vague instructions and no trouble shooting guide. Lots of accessories but you will need to order chest strap seperately if that is the desired camera position.

I just got my EK7000 camera and was very pleased with the product and accompanying accessories. I like that there are a lot of options for attachments and upgrades with these cameras that are totally affordable. I recently began creating stop motion animations and short videos and this is going to be an amazing asset to my productivity. The remote clicker and wifi capabilities are ideal for what I had in mind when purchasing an action camera.
This is a great camera! We have several for our business. Hold up well for our water rescue  training and downloads are easy!We will buy another for sure
For the prices look good. With the app in my iphone i can look what the camara recording. I say for the price is good

Very solid for the price. We are about to take a trip to Kauai so, I've been testing it on a few bike rides out here (Texas) and I'm digging the 170 degree aspect, the battery time and the memory (about 79 mins after I adjusted settings). Why pay so much for the go pro when you can get this?

This camera is very compact and very easy to use. I was able to get it working almost right out of the box. Note: you need to get your own Micro SD Card to begin using it.The image quality is great, especially for the price -- compares to the GoPro, minus the hefty price tag. It also brings multiple accessories to be able to use it on a helmet, etc.

Camera has worked very well for what I needed it for. The simplicity of operation made it great out-the-box working. The wi-fi connecting and control with the phone app worked well, but did deplete the battery faster than not using the wi-fi, but still worked well. If your looking for a great sports camera for an affordable price, look into this little gem.
Great product at great price. Worked perfectly for our Hawaii vacation. Price beats the gopro.

Ok, so I haven’t used this yet HOWEVER, this review is specifically based on how many extras came with it. I had no idea it came with so many accessories. A bunch of different sized/shaped things to screw the camera into tripods and what not. Comes with TWO batteries. And even a clicker to take the picture/start the video! Will update when battery is charged so I can take pictures! So excited!

This product is a great alternative at a great price.  I bought this for my daughter and didn’t want to spend too much as a start up and I could not be happier.  I comes with basic accessories.  SD Card is not included though so don’t forget to add this to your order.

We bought this camera to shoot outdoors on hikes and sporting events, great buy for the money.  additionally we bought the accessory kit that came with all kinds of goodies.  So far it seems durable and made well for all weather.  you will need to read the instructions for settings in different light and events, not difficult to understand and it was easy to use.

I use this camera on my Polaris RZR.  I didnt know what to expect considering the price.  After reading numerous reviews and several others using the product on their UTV's, I decided to chance it.  I have been pleased with the quality.  It comes with several attachments, batteries...basically everything you need to get up and running.

Awesome camera! Def cannot beat the price for the bundle. The shipment was fast and came carefully packaged. No issues with the packages, everything was sealed as should be. I couldn't believe all the different mounts it brought with it. I did a video test over the weekend and I can say for the price of this camera, I am impressed. I do photography as a hobby and I can admit that for what I need this camera for it def meets my expectation.
I have to say that this is almost as high quality as a gopro. I cant see much difference in build quality or video quality. Amazing choice for the money you spend.
I Love this camera and the abundance of accessories.  The company is wonderful to work with.  I would however recommend the AKASO V50 MODEL for the touch screen option.
Image is a little shifty from using it as a dash cam,  but once I get the resolution right I'm sire it'll be fine. Bunch of stuff with it. Really good picture quality besides that...

I purchased this camera to record my very first skiing experience. I am using a 8GB memory card. Still figuring out how to use some of the mounts. When I go to Settings>Video Resolution I notice 1080p and 720p as the only options I can choose. Could it be because I am using a 8GB microSD card?Yet to explore and use this camera. I'm sure this will be great.
I was lied. i thought quality would be ok, but it's really bad. i mean go pro hero 1 is much better and sound is also terrible.do not recommend at all.
Great deal when compared to the gopro.  Videos are great quality but kill battery life very quickly.  Photo quality was not great and definitely not as good as the sharpness in video quality
I bought this camera for snorkeling. It was a great buy, and the photos turned out much better than I was expecting. Only complaint is that the buttons are fiddly and irritating to navigate through.
Don't waste money on the overpriced GoPro, this has everything you need for less than 1/3rd the price.
This camera is great !!!!I needed a camera for underwater pictures and videos , the result was very good , good price and good  quality
I had been wanting a Gopro but didn't want to drop the money they were asking. Came across this one and its well worth the investment. Great pictures and videos!!!

camera takes great pictures and video, easy to use and love the price. I do a lot of horse back riding so can't waitto take it with. I can really like the water proof case as my horse loves the water, and I usually go in with her.

My sister got one of the same. She told me about a accessories kit you receive when you leave a review. Here's the best part; I only messaged the seller asking about the kit and in TWO DAYS I got the kit, so here is your review. I don't think I ever received service better from any seller. I didn't use my cam yet but my sister's is great!! DOES NOT GET ANY BETTER!!

Great started cam but the stability isnt on par. Battery life when cold is horrible, less than 20 min while snowmobiling. Easy to use and lots of accessories! Wish the battery was better. Overall it's ok as a cheap option.
I need an action camera for my DIY gutter cleaner, and this does the perfect job for me! I absolutely love it! Good price with good quality pictures/films. Highly recommend it!
This camera far exceeded our expectations! You get an amazing camera for a budget price. I will be purchasing more in the future

I bought this. camera for my 10 year old son and it has been wonderful.  I wasn't about to spend the GoPro money for something he may lose in a week or keep for years.  It has been great this summer as he rode around the lake on his kayak or his 4 wheeler around the farm.  Picture/Video quality has been great.  Great camera, especially for the price.
I bought this camera for a white water rafting trip.Pros:

I bought this camera as a substitute for a GoPro. It is very comparable to a GoPro. The quality of the videos and pictures is great and it is waterproof! The only thing that concerns me, if you have the latch set wrong on the case, the case leaks, so watch out for that. Overall, the camera is great, and if youre looking for a good subistute for a GoPro, buy this camera!

Mounted on an ATV and seemed to work fine. The down side, out of the box, one of the control buttons (the up button) doesn’t work, seems frozen. Also can not get the time stamp to turn on. Used for about an hour and the battery go very hot, and stopped working. Changed batteries and seemed fine.

This action camera was used at a Thanksgiving party outdoors and also, at a class reunion inside a party hall and the pictures came out to be awesome. I was surprised with the quality of the pictures. The only thing that was a bit of a disappointment was the stability of the moving shots. For the price, I would buy it in a heart beat.

Product was easy to set up and worked as advertised. Comes with mobile app that allows you to control the camera remotely. Came with many accessories to mount on handlebars, dashboard, harness, selfie stick, etx. Very happy with quality of video. Comes with 2 batteries, which extends battery life. Overall, great product for the price!
bought this for my wife to use on motorcycle trips. We mounted it to her bike on a NYC trip and got some awesome video going through the tunnels.

La compre para el cumpleaños de mi hija en la piscina, Es mi primera cámara de este tipo, me parece excelente producto, apenas 1 dia de uso. Fotos y vídeos bien.  Buenos recuerdos de la celebración tanto dentro del agua como fuera.
Great assembly. Light but solid. So far picture quality has been great! lots of extra accessories.
It works super good! The quality is amazing! Great for a great price!!!
My Grandson really like this camera.  Good starter when you can't afford the more expensive ones.

This kit is complete with lots of mounting options. The waterproof feature will be great to use on the boat this summer. the quality of the picture from the camera is really good, not as high resolution as a Go Pro, but for the budget friendly price it is a nice camera.
Good quality and specs for the price, many accessories including on package, 2 batteries very long recording each, very impressive really

We purchases this camera because it was an affordable option to use as a water/action camera for kids. We have a 10-year old that loves to use it and has set it up for lots of activities.  It's easy to use, has solid quality and takes up little space.  The wrist watch remote control is a good option that my child likes to use.We'd recommend buying !
We've been using it a ton, especially in these times, to record our at home projects and also to submit homework for PE, science, even English!Easy to use and reliable!  Highly recommend.

I'll start by saying that this has got to be one of the best reviewed items on Amazon based on thousands of reviews and a mid 4 star rating.
