If you remove the poor reviews from the people too stupid to peel the film off the lens or the waterproof casing to see it isn't scratched, or the morons who dive into the ocean thinking it's waterproof without the casing, I guarantee you this review would be near a perfect 5 stars. That said, this is a fantastic little camera. I wish people would keep in mind that it's under $100 bucks and comes with so many extras, it's easily worth twice that. Is it as good as a GoPro? No but a GoPro 4 is going to run you twice to three times this price while a GoPro 5 is bordering on $500 for 4k recording. The fact is this camera is a really good camera. Not just for $85 bucks, but just really good. I'm able to use it on my motorcycle, around the house to harass my dogs who somehow know I am recording them,or at night time to piss my wife off when she is talking to me in the bedroom about nonsense things and then learns I recorded her whole spiel. The picture quality is fantastic. The audio is pretty good too if you are within a 2 foot radius of the camera. Outside of that, you probably need an external mic which this does not allow for unfortunately. The instruction booklet is sparse but it helps. This isn't exactly made in an English speaking country so cut them some slack. It doesn't feel like it's made of much, but the little guy is pretty sturdy. This is easily one of the best deals anywhere for anything.EDIT: 8/13/17 update- I've now had this camera for nearly 5 months and it has been really great. I have purchased several add-ons for the camera, namely a good mount for my motorcycle. I've recorded hours upon hours of rides, dozens of gigabytes worth of time on my motorcycle, and this little camera keeps on ticking. The video is really good, the photos are decent (though my Samsung phone does better) and the build quality of this little knock-off is extraordinary. Buy yourself some of the extended life batteries that will give you 1.5 hours of recording time in 1080p/60fps and take them with you. Eventually, I will move on to a Gopro for the video stabilization and noise reduction, but for now, there is no better camera for the money than this one.

Just received it with some accessories and overall everything is expected.  Camera functions well, takes decent enough pictures.  Phone app 'iSmart DV' is simple and works surprisingly well to interact with the camera (using on a Pixel with android 7.1.2).  Plan to use for scuba diving in a few weeks so I got a separate housing:https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B019Z2HJMU/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o03_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1

good camera, compared to the $400 hero it is fantastic, good pictures, does what I need. and I will not be crying if lost or damaged.  Appears to be well built. time will tell. water ski season right around the corner. Just retired and want it for water sports, skiing, and snorkeling also will be my go-to backpack camera.  has way more accessories with it than my sons Hero 5.
I got this for my trip to Hawaii and it stored my entire 5 day trip. I recommend it. Great quality video even under water.volume is okay, but i really recommend it.

Works as advertised.  Unfortunately the 30FPS video speed isn't fast enough to do what I wanted it for which is to video my golf swing and analyse in slow motion later.  When I review the video it jmps in slow motion.  Guess I should have spent the money on a go pro which films at 90 FPS.

Absolutely loved the camera! Great quality for a super reasonable price. As well as the battery last a sufficient amount of time unlike some of the similar model cameras. Loved how it  came with a lot of accessories to help capture all the best videos and pictures in all my adventures. If looking for a good camera with a reasonable price totally recommend it.
Happy to have brought this product. Picture quality is better than what I expected for a waterproof camera. Used it to capture pics/videos underwater during Snuba/Snorkel.
Any tricks to getting max battery life? I cant seem to get more than 5-10 minutes.

La peor cam 4K que eh tenido, se congela a cada momento y tengo que quitarle la batería para poder reiniciarla, súper mala no la recomiendo y no la puedo usar un reembolso  porque se cerro mi ciclo 👎👎👎👎👎

Received my new Akaso EK7000 4K Sports Action Camera today. Really happy with the entire package for price paid! The fact that it has 4K, plenty of modes (i.e.- Time Lapse, Burst mode, etc..), and a TON of mount accessories totally impressed me, as well as the waterproof case being included. Keep in perspective that you are paying less than $100.00 for a High Def video camera plus accessories. It is not necessarily flashy to look at, but it is completely functional. I would totally recommend this camera.
A little confusing to use, but it takes good pictures and video, also has a decent battery life and comes with 2 batteries

Battery life is horrible. Quality is ok, but the poor battery life makes it semi-useless. I guess you get what you pay for. Do not buy if you plan on doing long shots while not being able to change the battery.

Taking a trip to Belize in December and wanted to get an action camera to document our trip. Found the Akaso EK7000 on Amazon. Got great reviews and the price was great. Comes loaded with many assessories. Love how small it is and waterproof. Will be taking underwater pictures. The waterproof case is amazing and so easy to use. Been testing is on walks and paddle boarding. Love it!
Great quality for the price. Came with lots of cool accessories. Picture quality is much better than we expected.

great build quality for the price and a ton of accessories. video quality is awesome too! you get two batteries, which is really nice. I only wish it came with more instructions on how to put together everything but I eventually figured it out!

Decent camera.  Lots of accessories.  What bugs me is that the wrist remote cannot be used when using the software to watch live on a cell phone. tablet.Bonus tip.  The camera comes mounted to a plastic stand that is part of the packaging.  I kept that plastic stand to use as a nice, wide base for the camera.
Super easy and straightForward to use! A great deal for the price compared to most other cameras in general.
Like:The video is a great quality in the daylight.
Loved it great podcast. Needs s cover for the out putts and a cover for Memory cardAll in all loved it use all summer long and to the Apple orchard and garlic festival.

This model will only connect to your phone with wifi.  You cannot connect it via your wifi router.  You cannot connect to the internet while using this camera with your phone.  Haven't tested the waterproof yet.  Other than that, Its a GREAT BUY still!

I needed a small camera with mounts for recording painting videos. The interface with my laptop was pretty self explanatory and overall and i am satisfied with my purchase.

For the price, you can't beat this camera. I bought for an inexpensive camera to use in situations where I didn't want to put my gopro7 where it might get damaged. But now I may have to find something else, cause I really like what I am getting for my money here.  Is it as good as a gopro, not quite. Is it better than you would expect for the price..YOU BET

I purchased the Akaso EK7000 to mount it on my motorcycle and/or motorcycle helmet.I am not very familiar with electronic, but this camera is very very easy to operate. I manage to operate every fonction within an hour. The multiple mounting brackets of all kinds provided makes the mounting possible just about anywhere. Nice compact camera. For the price, you can't go wrong, I recommend this camera all the way.

The Akaso EK7000 is a very good value for the price. Takes crip clean videos. easy to use. only negative that I have is when I have it hooked up the windshield a "jumpy type video is produced. the "jumpiness" is caused by hitting bumps on the roadways so it is not the camera's fault, just need to seek a better mounting for my '90 Miata. Good Buy overall. definitely recommend.
So far so good, I've only had it for a day so far and seem to work well. I was a little confused at first with it but figured it out easily. I'm happy with my purchase so far.

Great camera!  Took it on our vacation this past January to Mexico.  It worked great walking around touring the Mayan ruins.  Then I used it while I snorkeling. It took Great video and pictures.  Then I put it on while kayaking.  Again worked awesome.

Didn't work, the camera took one two minute video and then went black and wouldn't take any more videos or pictures. Due to this I couldn't test it underwater or take any videos of my trip. Disappointing, but I guess that's what you get for the price.

Excellent product for the price. This is my first camera of its kind, and I have no reason to regret buying it. I mounted it to my dirt bike handle bar and rode all weekend. I have excellent quality footage with little vibrating motion on the video. Highly recommend if it's your first time buying. The remote Start/Stop is the bomb as well.

My son (11) bought this from his own well-earned money and is over the moon. He hasn't yet explored all the features, but is very satisfied with this product.
This is the Best camera I have ever purchased.- Price: Great price for a camera like this.
I tried the camera AKASO, and is excellent, a good quality and very versatile, buy it to use in the pool and it worked amazing!

I was a little skeptical about buying this but honestly I loved it. If you dont want to spend too much on a GoPro I'd totally buy this. I took it on my trip to Cancun and the picture were pretty decent. Even my techy brother was surprised.

Bought this for when I go paddle boarding. So far, this camera seems excellent! The quality of the pictures is very good, especially for the price. Way cheaper than a Go Pro. Only drawback is the directions aren’t included; however, there is a site to view directions.
Quick shipping, Easy setup, everything you need to get out there and go straight out of the box. AWESOME VALUE AND GREAT QUALITY!!!!

So far so good! I was looking for an affordable action camera that was compact and had a remote control. The Akaso fit the bill and so far has worked very well. For the price, even with limited testing, it’s already looking to be a great addition to my backpacking/canoeing kit.

Other then that I’d recommend it

I love this product! as an avid go pro fan, i was hesitant to make the switch, but for the price i figured i would give this a try and i am so glad i did ! the camera works just as well as the go pro for a fraction of the cost! the quality is good, not as great as the go pro but it’s still well worth it! I love the added accessories it came with as well! big plus!!

Easy to set-up and use, great photo and video quality for the price, and a great camera to purchase if you're unsure if the filming option is for you.

My 10 year old daughter has been saving to buy an action camera and finally made her goal and bought this camera. She loves it! It’s easy to use and the clarity is amazing. It’s durable on bike rides, in the hands of a little brother, and in the pool. Great buy!
Best bang for your money. Make this your first action camera & you won’t regret it. Very nice for the price.
No sound ???? my fault for not knowing it has no sound ....going to GO PRO 8

I’ve this go pro .Was a gift.But I was able to see all the stuff they did .Swim ,ride bikes or just walking around. Was for my 10 year old nephew.We really like when they went to the pool.Wow !! Was so clear.

You know, for the price I paid for this. I think it was a really good value. To be honest the video isn't the greatest in the world for an action camera. But at this price I wasn't expecting that. It works great for my needs, and that's all I could ask from it!

Bought this camera because I don't plan on using it a lot and didn't want to spend hundreds of dollars. Was very surprised by the quality of the videos and ease of use. I plan on using it more than I thought.
This thing might be a great camera, but the batteries go dead so quickly that I'll never know.  Went sport fishing in Florida, and the batteries were dead after 15 minutes.

this is a great little camera. i use it for fishing all the time.  underwater footage is awesome.  amazing to actually the fish on your line coming out of the water!  id definitely recommend this for outdoor sports footage.

Camera works great if it works at all. It freezes almost every time i try to use it and the wifi feature doesnt work at all. And when it does manage to kind of connect it prompts that the device is an unregistered product and to return it to the vendor which effectively means that this dealer is not authorized to sell this product... I tried returning it to be told that its past the return policy even though it showed up two weeks ago.
Love this product. Pictures are as good as my buddy's gopro.the size and light weight so helpful. Truly worth the money. Little cam big punch for your buck
Waiting to really use the camera in September but took it out in the pool and the quality,  ease of use and durability are great!
This camera is amazing for the price. Good image/video quality. Plus all the accessory’s it comes with. Great product would definitely recommend to friends and family.

Was in the market for an action camera for my trip to big bear but gopros were too expensive. I searched on Amazon came across this camera had pretty good reviews so I purchased it. I tested it out at home and I liked it video resolution was good picture quality was good and the remote is good comes in handy. Overall I recommend this camera

The video was great for the price. Accessories are a step down from name brand GoPro mounts. The killer for it was how hot it got. I put it on my motorcycle helmet and after a 20 minute ride it was too hot to touch. I don't know if I got a bad one, but I returned it for how hot it got alone. The battery was too hot to hold.

I love this new camera I just got. Getting ready to take a family vacation to Orlando Universal and Discovery Cove. Trying it out before we go and the picture quality is amazing, can’t wait to record and take pictures. Did a few pictures and videos to get use to it and we couldn’t be any happier. Thank you for such a great camera and it’s so worth the money.

I bought this to get action POV shots for when I go snowboarding. Originally, I combined some of the accessories that came with the camera (there are a lot, and it made my head spin) to make myself a headstrap, but it was too front-heavy and unstable, so I ended up buying a goPro head strap instead to go with it. It also does not come with the selfie stick, which would be the only other accessory I would use very regularly. The rest of the accessories are specific - for strapping to handlebarsIt can take a little while to get used to, at first. Navigating the features of the camera can be a bit confusing as the functions of the buttons change. However, once you're familiar with it, it's not bad.

Bought this camera because I was looking for a less-expensive alternative to the more expensive, name brand camera. I'm so glad I did. It works perfect for snorkeling and even just sightseeing. The pictures and video are very clear and it's easy to use. The remote is awesome feature too. My husband went ahead and purchased the Go Pro 5 and all of my AKASO pictures and videos are as good and most of them even better than his. I would highly recommend this anyone. My assistant liked it so much that she purchased one for herself to take on vacation.

as you know everyone of us wants Gopro camera the best action camera, but it's a bit expensive, i try this Chinese one and it's OK especially in the sunlight, at night i think it's not as clear and good as in the sunlight.

What an awesome camera for 2x less then the real thing. Yes please do use the real go pro accessory as you cant beat the quality of a go pro accessory. The camera quality is rather very nice compared to go pro, very easy to use. I have had a ton of fun filming with a camera for $80 rather then $450. Of course its great for beginners, but for someone filming everyday i would recommend buying a go pro because the app that this camera uses needs a lot of work, sometimes it doesn't connect and or shuts down at random times, especially when you have the camera on your roof of the car and your driving down the highway and you loose connection with the phone to camera, then you dont know if its still there or not.. and no you cant use it with the go pro app. The batteries die rather fast.. Bottom line, awesome camera FOR THE MONEYUpdated. Been getting a message.
Looks like a gooed solid unit, will not know until June how well it is underwater
I wouldn't call this 4K but for the price, its still pretty good and OMG, it comes with everything you need!

This camera is amazing! It comes with just about everything you could possibly need for $50. The quality of videos and pictures are also really good. The company is very thoughtful with respect to the fact that you receive a waterproof case, and attachments that allow you to record all sorts of activities. Overall, very versatile, inexpensive, and good quality.

Amazing camera for a amazing price! We used this for our snorkeling adventure on vacation and it performed remarkably. I would highly recommend this product to those on a budget and want to record their POV experiences.

We have purchased 2 of these camara. Both for grandchildren. Both boys. The are rough on anything. I can say these camara hold up under the boys roughness. This Camara is very sturdy, good quality  material, and the video quality is better then expected. I would recommend this camara to anyone in need of an action camara.

This little camera is great. We have taken it to sea world water park and to Italy. It has great mounts that we used on the rearview mirror while driving around the beautiful coastline and the waterproof case was great for the beach and exploring the grottos.
It works amazing and has lots of accessories and great battery life.
This camera came with loads of mountain gear, and two batteries, which is really great. It’s easy to use, has clear directions and takes good pictures. Definitely recommend.

I am looking for a camera can connect with the TV with the HDMI, my friend recommend me another top brand, but the price is not that friendly, so I turn to this model, I am totally shocked when I receive it, the quality is much better than my expectation.But there are so many small accessories, I need to learn how to use it.

It is not a suitable camera for mounting to motorcycle directly but other functions were fine compared to the price, but their customer service is awesome. They contacted me after my review to arrange return and refund.

This camera is great. The lens quality is very clear. The battery lasts a long time. The Wi-Fi feature is easy to use, and it can shoot at multiple resolutions. The protection case protects the camera very well. The 4K Ultra HD is no joke. I'm looking forward to using this product a lot. Overall it is a great camera at an affordable price.
Absolute GarbageIt got stuck on loading/boot up. Pure crap. Garbage like this is what gives plenty of other made in china products a bad name.

Wow! This little camera has an excellent picture! I have been told that some only the cheaper sports action cameras blow gopro out of the water. I recently bought a dbpower camera and the inside battery housing melted and almost caught on fire. Upon sending it back, I ordered this as a replacement. We are completely satisfied, it does more than a gopro for a quarter of the price!
As advertised. I like it, my fourth of this genre.

Was looking for a small video camera with good picture quality. I am very impressed so far. Not only is this camera much more affordable, but the picture quality is great and this video camera is small and lightweight.

En comparación al precio y calidad el producto está súper bueno. Además que me llegó demasiado rápido.Las características de la cámara están muy buenas, en mi caso, me permiten grabar videos de excelente calidad para mis redes sociales y potenciar mi emprendimiento.
Bought this to use for hiking trips and a recent trip to the beach. Did great under water, overall pictures of the scenery and action videos of snorkeling and boat rides. Would definitely buy again!

Good Purchase - This is my first action camera. Took it to Grand Cayman for underwater shots. We were really pleased with the photo quality, both in and out of the water. We have not use the video feature yet. Camera came with 2 batteries, remote control, and many accessories. The camera fits snug in the underwater case, so it was a little difficult to remove. I would recommend this camera to friends.Pros:

This camera is a great camera!  So far, I've used it attached to my bicycle, just to take videos while riding around, and also plan to use it when driving around, and on a motorcycle.  Comes with a ton of accessories, big plus.  Provides excellent video as well.The only reason I gave it 4 stars rather than 5, is that I've found the camera to heat up fairly quickly, even when using outdoors.  Otherwise, I have no complaints regarding the camera.

So far very impressed with this camera. I bought for my Daugther and she is having fun with it. Quality is pretty good. The WiFi feature is nice because you don’t need to connect the camera to a computer or take the card out, etc.

I was looking for something compact, affordable and water tight.  This was it!  Palm sized and video quality is what I would expect for this low price.  I was also surprised (guess I didn't read that much about all other items included) about the accessories that came with it.  At the same time, I ordered another accessory pack.  Don't!  It's likely included.
Cheap and great quality! Used it for snowboarding and it works great.
Got this camera to go diving.Worked fine for a couple dives, but the case leaked on the 3rd and 4th dive.

Good quality for the price, exceeded my expectations, but that's probably because in just getting started on this action camera game, which is why I think this would be a good starting camera for a novice.

An absolute amazing camera. Perfect video can see the details behind every portion of my run. The wide-angle gives me a clear picture of the scenery surroundings and the path that I was on. I would highly recommend this to everybody for obstacle course racing.
Great camera. Currently using it to record cooking. Very clear and easy to use
It’s so tiny but effective and directions are easy to follow to set up

the camera works pretty well i took it snowboarding and it took great video and really stable to.The only negative i would say is the app they use for your smartphone is kinda weird but it does work and then i was unboxing it, it came with alot of accessiory  but not realy any guides on what is what but other then that great camera for the price.

We gave this as a gift to our daughter for her 7th bday.  She loves it.  She was able to figure out how to work it pretty easily and images seem decent.  It's great that it came with all the accessories.  It would have been nice if there was some information describing how to use them but we were able to find a youtube video to explain what they are for.
I've had this camera about 6 months now and I am pleasantly surprised with how well it work. It does everything that I need it to do while being 1/5th the price of a Gopro.
We bought this for our trip to Hawaii. This camera is great to capture under water pictures, this made our snorkeling trip worth so much.
Nunca llego elProducto ni la devolución del dinero

This camera was a Christmas present and I am very happy with the quality for the price. The product was professionally packaged. The camera is easy to operate with nice buttons. I can't wait to use it on the ski slopes, when I'm sledding, water skiing and other activities. I would recommend this camera for the price.

We ride Trail ride ATVs and bought one of these for my wife for Xmas.  Was hesitant about it for the cost but wanted a cheap one incase it got damaged riding.  After using it for a couple rides the picture quality is awesome and haven’t had any issues with it.  I have since ordered a second one for myself and will problem buy 2 more for the kids.
I really liked that it has two batteries and a dual battery charger. I like that the price is very reasonable.I like the wireless part and that it has several accessories.

I absolutely love this camera! I bought it because I go hike a lot with my dog so I wanted something small to carry with me and make some videos and this camera is great! Everything works great and it has an awesome quality image. Everytime I go camping I bring it with me even to the rivers and lakes. I am very happy with this purchase.

I have used another popular brand camera for scuba diving and snow skiing and was skeptical making this purchase.  All these concerns disappeared after the first use.  The quality of the footage taken with this camera is remarkable.  I would recommend this camera to everyone.Great job on building a quality camera for a great price

Bought this for my wife for a Christmas present. She loves it. Came faster than expected!  However this product is soliciting five star ratings in exchange for free accessories.  I bought this over the go pro because of its rating!

Works great for the price and will save a great amount over a GoPro or similar action camera. Image stabilization is the biggie, however with still shots or walking (not running), the cam may offer just what's needed with this slight deficiency. Suitable for many easygoing purposes. For full movement action, another cam would be needed.
you pay for what you get and this was definitely worth the price
Great for the priceMicrophone picks up great

Great camera record in 4K really well comes with 2 batteries, durable material dropped it a few times already no cracks. Only drawback is the image stabilization but for the price if your recording from one point of reference you can get by without, definitely would recommend to anyone in the market for an action camera.

Update: this camera did not last one season. It would randomly cut off after you turned it on, then randomly turn back on in the middle of sitting on a lift. Fast forward half a year later, I cant even turn on the camera or connect it to a laptop. It says connecting and wont move passed that screen.
Something I disliked is how it didn't come with a memory card

It was bought for my 9 year old son, and I have to admit the camera is excellent!!! Great quality and performance, overall very satisfied with making my kid a very happy swimmer with his waterproof camera.

Great action camera for the money. I'm not a professional photographer, but for my "weekend warrior" use, the quality is great.  In some instances, this appears (to my eyes) to be better than the "other" more expensive action cameras.  The wrist remote is a great bonus, especially with the head or helmet mount.  The one con is that currently the Ez iCam app they have you download does not work with this camera. It keeps displaying a message on how this camera is not supported in preview mode and will not connect.  You can download another app that does work. It is called "PNJ iCAM" and it works just fine.  It says it does not support a 64gb card, but that is what I'm using.  I don't know if it will only utilize up to 32gb of the 64gb.  Time will tell.  The accessories are plentiful, but not the same quality as the GoPro, but this would be expected with the price.  Even if there were no accessories it would be a great value.  5 stars if they fix the app problem. Over all, I would recommend.

Bought this for my wife. She likes it. I don't think it rates five stars like everyone else seems to say. But it is a clear video image. The camera image is not so great. The application is recommends doesn't work well at all. I had to find another app and it is mediocre at best.
For the money I paid for this camera, I’m thrilled.What i was looking was a cheap action camera that I can take to vacation, record some videos and take pictures.
I’m so stoked on this camera! I bought it as a Christmas present, and decided I had to buy one for me too!  You can’t beat the quality and price compared to GoPro.

This product is comparable to much more famous brands, with great value, and comes with all needed accessories, except the mini-SD Card.  Take note this must be ordered separately.  Everything works great, connects the way it's supposed to, etc.  Great value for the price, especially in comparison to the famous brands.
Came as described. Wow,  can’t believe all I can do with it . Can wait for the adventures to begin.
Purchased this because I am going on vacation and I wanted something that I could use in the water, on the beach, and while doing excursions. Can't wait to use it!
Used once and it quit. Picture quality was good. Very disappointing

The camera works nicely. What I didn’t like was that when I first opened the box, I couldn’t figure out how to get the dang thing off the mount that it came with. I wish the instructions manual explained how to do this. Spent half an hour trying to figure it out before i found an answer in the YouTube comment section.
I am happy with the camera, and the extra items it came with. The camera is easy to use! I am excited to try this out underwater on my trip.
Looks like a great low price alternative to much more expensive cameras on the market. Comes with the waterproof case and and a bunch of accessories. Charger and 2 batteries, great!
Products is good. I use it for my motorcycle. Wind noise is down right terrible even inside the case. Other than that it works
a Waste of money! Stupid thing won’t ever download my videos.... the WiFi is a joke, connects to your phone but won’t download anything off of the camera to the phone...

I purchased this item for my 7 year old who loves to mountain bike with us. The picture is super clear. The wide shot is great and all the accessories it brings helps to mount perfectly on his bike. Very very Happy with purchase.
Delivered a day early. Going on a cruise and can't wait to use it. Played around with it a little, pics look great. Many extras for multiple mounts.
quality 10/10durability 10/10
The picture quality is amazing and its a great way to record and share your experiences. Easy to use.
I don't know how this product has good reviews. It is absolutely useless. It doesnt record video or audio. It's a terrible product. Do not buy.
I havent tried the camera from anything moving or wet but it has a very wide focus and is easy to navigate. It's amazing as far af I can tell.
Awesome buy, purchased as a gift and it was a hit. Great quality, easy and quick set up.  Love the fact that it includes so many useful accessories. You will not be disappointed.

I recently received this camera for my boat to record my kids out fishing with me. I was hesitant because of the price tag but after playing around with it I am impressed. It does everything I could ask for in a camera and more!

I got this camera for my husband and he was beyond excited. He's wanted a GoPro for idk how long but didn't want to spend the money on it. I saw this had great reviews and it's deff living up to the rave! It came with so many items that he was like a kid in a candy shop when he was setting it up and playing with it!

This camera is amazing, very cost effective, and great quality. The accessories that come with the camera are very sturdy, and there is a wide variety. I am super excited to see all that I can do with this product, I highly recommend for anyone is physically active and looking for a great, low cost camera to record their adventures.

AKASO EK7000 was a great purchase.  I have used it attached to a ski helmet as well as under water -- it is durable and waterproof; what more can I want? Was looking at more expensive models but got the same quality for less money.  Picture quality was great and came with LOTS of useful attachments.  Highly recommend!
The camera quality isn’t what I expected. Looks a little grainy. I have not yet tried it under water
not a $400 gopro but a nice $50 action camera.nice view finder

Got this camera to use as a webcam option. Saw a testimonial that seemed promising.  After plugging it in instantly I know I was mislead lol.  The picture quality was incredibly dark even with a good amount of light on.  I didn’t use it as a stand-alone camera so can’t speak on that, but as a webcam I’d pass on this one.  Going to return now.
Fantastic product we highly recommend this camera! The picture quality is excellent, it’s simple to use,  and it’s durable. We use it mounted on our surfboards! Five stars!
Videos are great, but pictures are awful. Old Polaroids and first gen cell phone cameras are better. I'm returning it.
Awesome little camera! Get yourself a high quality memory card and you’ll get great videos and pictures. A 64GB works in this camera.Haven’t used the waterproof case yet so I didn’t rate it.

Best bang for your buck camera. Started getting into vlogging and recording our offroad adventures. It took alittle to get use to the features but overall an amazing camera.Now after using this camera for about 2 months, it is amazing. The video does bounce when in bad areas but does stabilize after a few seconds. Video quality is very good.
Surprising quality and features for a reasonable price.  Purchased to use personal projects (not professional publishing) and am extremely satisfied,

Camera works super. Well worth the price. Will give it a true test when on vacation and in the water. So far so good. Only one thing they should tell you in the book and they don't is when you want to sync with your phone is that they are asking for pass code. It is 1234567890. Found it on youtube. Otherwise GREAT cameraThanks
Bought it for a present and grandson was delighted with it!

This camera is great for a beginner. I got it for skiing and to record my soccer games amongst other things. The packaging is very impressive considering the price, and the accessories included are everything you need to get started (minus the SD card). The only concern I had was the helmet mount. Helmets are rounded and the helmet mount are rectangular, I was able to get it with hardly any work, but wish the mounts were slightly curved to match a helmet. Overall very satisfied , and recommend this camera to anyone Looking for the best bang for their buck.
The camera works at it should! Feels well built and sturdy, also very light at the same timeLots of accessories. All the functionalities of the GoPRO... with a fair and accessible price.
I’m at first I wasn’t sure that this camera was going to work out for me, but it is worth every penny spent on it. I actually also purchased the newer version of this camera for our business.
This little action camera does a fantastic job. Glad I didn't spend the money on a name brand. I would purchase this again
I bought it for a vacation as a waterproof camera. First day I had it inside the pool, the waterproof case leaked and the camera broke down.

Great action camera that does everything that the big "expensive" brand sells; but for a fraction of the cost. Quality images and videos, great in the water for surfing, and perfect for those epic shots while riding on your motorcycle looking like a boss. Comes with a lot of accessories and a back up battery. The wifi and app are great too. Nough said, get one!

You need an SD card to use the camera’s main features. It's easy to use, durable, good quality video. It comes with a mud and waterproof case. Everything I was looking for without the price of a Go Pro.

Was very happy with the quality of this camera.  I bought one for my son and took it on a trip skiing and he got some great footage.  The HD quality is fantastic.  Camera is easy to use the remote option is great.  The only complaint I have is I think in the cold weather the battery life is sub par.  Other than battery life the camera was fantastic.

Awesome little camera.Included, you will get the camera, a waterproof case, several mounting options and a wrist strap remote. This camera will fit in any Go Pro mounts and cases as well as after market kits that you can find here on Amazon.

I got this camera on a whim and absolutely love it! it does exactly what I wanted at a great price! The video quality is pretty good but the sound quality is a little iffy if the camera is in the waterproof casing which was expected. I love this camera and would definitely buy it again!

We purchased this for a nephew who is interested in building his YouTube channel and is getting into action filming. This camera does a great job for what we bought it for with a great picture and the ability to do under water video and be able to link to WiFi is awesome. Definitely would suggest this to anyone getting started into action filming

I was afraid of getting a sport camera that I did not have on hands before BUT I got my Akaso EK7000 4K and I've been doing videos all week. I like the color on the video and the qualify. Also you can record a video on 60 fps and it looks very real so it's pretty nice. I recommended to my friends already since we're going to scuba diving.

I purchased 2 for gifts (for two different people), neither of them was able to use them due to the difficulty of operating this camera. Although they read the instructions several times, they just gave up on them. I wish I would have known this in advance, money in the trash.
Perfect for outdoor video used skiing out west
The waterproof case is perfect! Great image quality as well
Good little sports camera. Camera is as described. Very cool Wifi connection enabled. Plan to use for winter sports videos.
I bought this for my Polaris Razor XP Turbo S. Battery life is short but for the price, one can’t complain. Nothing else bad to say about this camera. Excellent in every way.
It worked great. Used it all summer in the pool and during vacation. Easy to use.
Got it for my husband, he loves it! He used it to ay soccer with friends and we also took it to our vacation trip. Very good camera

For the price you pay. This camera is amazing ! I love it ! Fast shipping ! When purchasing this camera.  You will need a micro SD which does not come with the camera to record or capture pictures. If anyone is thinking of purchasing this camera.  Go for it ! Can't complain at all!

I bought this camera as a gift for my 10 year old grandson who is into producing his own videos. Very pleased with the clarity of the video. He used it three times this week and is still discovering new features that he loves. He especially likes the wrist remote  and using my iphone to view what he is shoting while his camera is on the tripod ( included in assesory kit we purchased) this is our first time using a sports camera so Im not sure whay other more expenive brands can do , but for a beginner and for the price i think this is a great camera
Very good for the price. 4k frame rate is 15 but the 1080 looks phenomenal. Really impressed so far.

Look no further because AKASO is HERE!!We love to travel and this is a must have for all you travelers.  We have gone through so many different action camera options and this one is by far the best of the best.

I purchased for my 2 preteen grandsons who are very active in sports and other outdoor activities.  This camera is very easy to use and the overall picture and video quality is very good.  It is great to watch the videos that they made, and it really brings their adventures home to enjoy. Money well spent and very rugged product.

What a bargain, we were looking for an inexpensive waterproof camera for our trip to South Africa when we go shark diving. This can not be beat! 4K, water proof WiFi it’s for it all and comes with loads of mounts. So happy with the purchase
I bought mainly for the ride on the motorcycle. Works pretty good. I don’t like how it dies quick using 4K mode. But with the price of $50 it’s worth it.
This camera works very good.Pictures and videos arw excellent. Easy to use. Very affordable!!
Gave it to my niece she loves it well worth the buy!!!👍
Instructions were hard to use

Update:The customer service department was amazing to work with. They quickly replaced the item. Very professional.  We have the replacement camera and I am waiting to see if it lasts longer than a month.  I have raised the rating due to the great customer service!
Is the camera supposed to get so hot when recording that it melts the mount you're using and melt the top corner of the camera itself? I was just wondering, because that's what happened to mine.

I just expected a camera- instead I got loads of of extra mounts and loads of useful items. The camera itself is small and simple to use VERY simple. I am excited to take this on my next scuba trip - compare this to other cameras and you will why this 4K is the BEST for the price. HAPPY!

Amazingly fast delivery.  Ordered at 9 p.m. and was in my hands by 5 p.m. the next day with Amazon Prime free delivery.  Unfortunately it is a really crappy camera.  I tried 1080p at 30 fps, 60 fps and 4K at 24 fps.  In all three cases, the slightest motion created a blurred image. There seems to be some type of software interpolation to create these image sizes and they are not really at the resolution they claim to be.  In other words, it is not done optically.  Seems deceptive to me and the camera is useless for drone videography.  I'm going to try to use it with 12mp time lapse photography. They probably have a 2mp image that their processor is interpolating and blowing up into a 12mp image - sort of a built-in digital zoom.  So, if I don't get a crisp image it's going back.  So disappointed.  DBPower is better.  -  John Gochenouer
I regret purchasing this. The footage isn't really 4K, it's upscaled 2.7 and the quality is not great. In addition, the batteries don't seem to hold their charge.

I purchased this for my husband for when he goes fishing. So worth it. I was so afraid of paying for a high dollar one and it falling in the water so we decided on this one. The picture quality is great and it comes with a lot of accessories including and extra battery. Very much worth the purchase!!!

Got this GoPro for our son (12 yrs old) and he loves it. Great for swimming & water sports, snowboarding, biking, etc! Takes clear pictures & videos! I also thought the wide lens was Awesome for those big pictures you want to take but can never fit it all in, with the wide lens you can!Would def buy again! We've have been very pleased with all Akaso products we've purchased!

Good camera! Comes with all of the attachments and pieces listed. Shoots in 4K and 1080 HD great. Simple to control. Sleek design. I tested the waterproof case prior to use and discovered one or two TINY drops of water inside. I don't think this would be an issue once the camera is inside to help create a better seal.I haven't tested the wireless remote yet. Sorry.

Great camera, Honestly rather have this than the comparable go pro. I have a go pro 3, this one is so much better. I only wish I bought the V50 pro elite instead, now that I know Akaso makes quality products!
This camera is dope... I really appreciate how easy it is to use...I use it as a body camera,  while I make my meals on wheels deliveries. THANK YOU SOOOOO MUCH AKASO!!!!
Me llego la camara hoy a la 1:41 desde las dos de la tarde vengo tratando de conectarlo via wifi, habiendo bajada dos veces los dos app, pero hasta el nada, estoy a punto de devolverlo

Hello Can I get please get a replacement for this camera because as soon as I put this camera in the water it stopped working I put the cover on with no air holes. Also the seller said it was waterproof but it was not. So please can I get my money back or replacement. I have one year warranty also.

Great action sports camera. Use it to video rides on my wr250r motorcycle. Crystal clear video quality. Don't understand why other brands are soooo much more $$$$.. will buy another to mount on my motorcycle helmet.

I just received the Akaso EK7000 and it met my expectations the minute I took it out of the box. I’m am very happy with my purchase, even order another one! For the price this thing is the best buy of any action camera. No complaints in the image quality, I am still trying to figure out the phone app. I am yet to test more video or water resistance.
This is great for the price.  If you dont need all the whoopla and fanfare of the far costlier brand, buy this.  Good stills, Good videos.
Great product, user friendly. I wish it could capture sound better because I like to use it to film my children.

It's been hard to get a proper WebCam these days, so I chose this action camera to get a twofer.  It'works fine for me on Teams and WebEx and I can attach to my bike and record my rides.  Nice.  Good value for money.  I recommend this device.  (EK700)

This is a great addition to any vacation or adventure. The camera is simple and easy to use. It comes with plenty of mounts to fit your needs. And the quality of the pictures are pretty good. Keep in mind that your nor filming for Nat Geo. Great bang for your buck.
Picture quality is good, The WFi feature is poorly implemented couldn't get it to work and I am a technical person.  The remote works well. comes with a ton of mounting options.
Battery only lasts 23 on full charge. Image quality is horrid.

Pretty decent camera. No play back function on the LCD. They will give you a free gift if you review it, Accessories, Batteries or Sd Card. For the money i really like it tho, wasnt willing to make the investment for a Go Pro, and the quality looks the same in video . i took a video of me riding my bike. Looking forward to using this

I love this camera. It is so versatile and will utilize it both indoors and outdoors. I am a hunting enthusiast and it will come in handy to capture my trip experiences. I have shared this with others and they are just as happy with their purchase.
My son really loves it. The quality is good for the price. My son took a test when we ride to his friend's house.
We bought 2 of these cameras to record our games of pond hockey and were pleased with the results from them. The battery life is a little low in cold weather, but love that it comes with 2 batteries!

You get what you pay for. I purchased this because the image quality looked pretty good on the reviews, but sadly that was not the case with my unit. Image and video quality was horrible. Sound wasn't that good as well. Navigating through the menu's felt clunky. I ended up returning it for a refund and invested in a real action camera the Sony fdrx3000.

I bought this camera for use on a trip to Hawaii.  The waterproof feature was important to me because I wanted to use it while snorkeling.  The camera worked excellent.  Was extremely pleased.  Also used it while biking and was happy with this application as well.  The camera and accessory kit were well worth the money spent.
This is a nice, sleek, and affordable action camera.  It includes various attachments, which is great for starters! 2 batteries and the charger are included.  It's a great deal for a great price!
It arrived on time and early no problems with the cams can't wait to set them up  and use them thank you your very happy customer

Only complaints are, battery doesn't last very long. About 1 hour on constant record. And the sticky pad on the mount keeps falling off car window. I've been using the camera as a dash cam. Works great!

I had a hard time trying to connect the camera on my phone. If I try to connect it to the app his message pops up. That it is recalled. Its great just for a simple dash cam but not really worth investing.

Update: the seller sent me a replacement. I am not experiencing the same problem with it shutting down any more so I am updating and giving it two extra stars. If it keeps working it is a good value.First review: Charger broke immediately. Used twice in 5 months and camera now shuts off randomly while recording, doesn’t save the video it was recording when it shuts down, and is out of warranty.

The camera does a great job of adjusting to the changing light.  The uploaded photo was taken in difficult light and turned out well.  The variety of included accessories makes this an even better bargain.  Will definitely recommend to my friends.No cons.

After much research and YouTube videos for an underwater camera I finally decided upon this camera and am so happy with my purchase. It comes with many attachments and 2 battery packs! I have only started using it and the phot quality is amazing. I can not wait to capture footage for my upcoming trip in the Bahamas.
Great camera. My only complaint is the low resolution lcd screen on the back.
We love this camera. It works great for what we need. Image quality is perfect for price. Buy it! You won't be disappointed.
I do appreciate all you have done, I know this company will not let you down camera was replaced thanks to Jennify will be using very soon thank again. M

UPDATE ON REVIEW 10/8/18After writing review seller contacted me and offered to send me a new one. Wasnt expecting that but was very happy so i took seller up on their offer. I have received my new camera plus batteries and as of now it is working great. Thank you
Just received the product is beautiful 4K waterproof housing removable Untold number of accessories I have to look up to even figure out how to use so far so good beautiful price can't complain

This is my second purchase of this camera. The first was a gift, and after using it I decided to buy myself one.  We used it underwater, in a lake and while hiking and were very happy with the videos.  Highly recommended.

I like its photo and video which are so natural, and I can quickly check it by phone due to the convenience. It is easy to use under the water and there is no worry about leaking water since waterproof is perfect.If you expect the same or over quality compared to go-pro, then it can be best candidate.
Bought for Boyfriend for a Christmas gift, he loved it well while he was able to use it. Took it to AZ and CA and lost it in the ocean...
Love this camera. It works very well. I have mounted this on our sxs. It gives us a very clear recording. Pretty cool

After reading all the reviews on Amazon and watching all the videos on the web this camera preforms very well for what I am using it for. I would recommend this action camera if you are on a budget as I am.
like the camera, its a good one for the price.

This camera is awesome. We got it for our daughter to make videos and take pictures. She is on the younger side and we didnt want to spend several hundred on a camera. The image quality is awesome and its pretty easy to use. She loves it and takes it every where with her.
They were gifts to my nieces and nephews

I got to record my mountain and fishing trips and like an idiot I dropped it opening the package for the first time. The case is fine, the camera still works, microphone still works. I have no doubt it will hold up.
Worked great for first time scuba diving in Costa Maya.  Very pleased.

Just got this yesterday and right off the bat i notice overheating issues. It gets really hot to the touch. Also the video/picture quality doesnt seem to do very well in shadier settings. Even in 4k mode you can see some graniness. It isnt that bad, but it is noticeable. Price is great otherwise. Ill test it for a few more days and hopefully the price oitweighs the quality.

Bought this for my 7-year-old who wants to vlog and take videos with her friends. So far, it has been exactly what I expected. When we are finally allowed to go back to the state parks, etc., I'd really like to take it kayaking and hiking. Partly just to test the waterproofing.

The camera takes good quality pictures and video. Definitely comparable to GoPros but only a fraction of the cost. I'd recommend trying it out if you're interested. I primarily use mine for Scuba diving. Easy to use and it has a screen built in which my older GoPro was lacking.
Wow!!! So impressed with this!! We took it to Hawaii for our honeymoon last year and it worked beyond great. Picture quality was better than expected and it was in the water a lot with no issues!
Camera is great so far,  only issue is waterproof case getting rusted after one snorkel use.  Wish they have a quality on that. Too bad case cost me $20 to replace
This camera is amazing for the cost and I can't find anything better. It comes with two batteries and allows for plenty of recording in great quality!

So excited when opening up this powerful little camera. The accompanying accessories allow for so much versatility and the camera quality and settings make for a huge upgrade from previous handheld video cameras. The waterproof case is solid and the clips and handlebars attachments are great! Cant wait to test it out on my next adventure.

The camera was awesome! I've never had an underwater camera so I have nothing to compare it to.These pics were taken in 2019 but I wasn't sure how to change the date from 2018 to 2019 so that's the only issue I had. I had to end up cropping all my pictures to get rid of the date when I posted them
We love this camera! It comes with every attachment we needed. It’s small, takes great wide angle pictures and videos. We are really excited to take this to ocean or even the pool!
My older grandson likes this action camera so much that my younger grandson asked me to order one for him.

Although the camera claims a resolution of 4K the quality of the pictures is awful (I made the comparison for several situations on a Mac with a 5k screen), compared with another, more expensive, action cam with 4K (Yi). Something in this cam , apparently not the number of pixels, causes the bad image quality. The lack of image stabilisation even adds to the low rating, as does the fact that the internal time stops as soon as the camera is switched off. Akaso also does not seem to have a helpdesk. For me, the low price and many accessories does not justify this lack of quality.
Everything I could have wanted.  I just wanted a video camera that was affordable and worked under water.  This checked off all the boxes for me.
My  12-yr-old son loves this camera, which he bought to film his snowboarding adventures.  It's waterproof, durable, and the video footage is very clear.
For the money it's hard to beat.  Easy to use comes with a tone of goodies.  Buy it!
Pictures seem to be good, but is hard to operate while riding, even when using the wrist remote device.
So far so good!  My son hooks it on the front of his 4 wheeler.  Have only used it a couple days

Love how compact this 4k camera and recorder is. The picture is great and the extra attachments that allow you to add to your bike and helmet are awesome. Have yet to add stuff online but I'm sure it will be a breeze to do. Very satisfied with this purchase. For $60.00, you cant go wrong.
This is great camera especially for the price.Comes with all types of ways to attach it.

My wife bought me this and I was skeptical, because I wanted a gopro, but the packaging was awesome, it came with every attachment that I would want. i was still Leary about the camera but it quickly showed me that it was far easier to control and far superior in its camera quality. I love the controls on the wristband, easier to manage while hunting. It's just awesome for the price. It can't be beat!
Do not buy this camera. It has so many bugs that it's just not worth it. Spend the money and don't get a knock off. I got all the accessories, and the camera won't stay on for most of them.

This is a great little camera for the cost. It is well worth it for the attachments alone- I use them with my GoPro and everything works great. Only issue is videos are uploaded in .mov rather than .mp4 so you have to convert them with newer computers.

If you want the most bang for your buck, here it is! This little camera allows those of us who enjoy in "investing in the adventure" to capture amazing images in places you wouldn't want to take your DSLR camera. At the price I was totally amazed with all of the little accessories that came with the little booger. Game On!

Excellent picture and video quality for the price.  I initially bought an XtremePro camera, but the capture quality was terrible.  So, I decided to buy this AKASO camera, since my friend bought it and had a good experience with it.  Now I can say that I've had a good experience using this camera - with some great video of racing at autocross as proof.  So, I decided to buy one of these cameras for another friend as a wedding gift.

I was looking for a budget action camera on Amazon and I came across the amazing Akaso. I went to do my research on how good the quality was and I was not disappointed for when I first tried it out. Seeing why all of the reviews were positive, I decided that this over all the other cameras at this price could not be compared. Some useful features I love is, seeing the capacity of how many videos and pictures you can take is very helpful and the burst mode were pretty neat.

Product is of good quality. Comes with numerous accessories, and a not-so-user-friendly instruction manual. Had to look up a video on YouTube to learn how to use each accessory. However, it covers basically every attachments and harness you could want or need. The picture and video quality is good, at least commensurate with the price.
Great performance for the price! It handles very similar to a GoPro for a fraction of the cost.
Best investment of a waterproof video camera, I use it in Iceland and the quality is amazing clear.

Some problems with this cheapen the entire device. Getting straight to the points, the waterproof case is crap, the buttons on it don't work. On examining the buttons, I can see on two of them that don't work the plungers are just a touch shorter than the others, maybe a millimieter or less, but enough that the plungers can't properly press the buttons on the camera itself. To prove this, I slid a small piece of folded paper inbetween the camera and the corresponding buttons that didn't work to account for the short plunger and viola, the buttons would now work while inside the case. So that might be a work around but I think it's an unacceptable solution. Next is the "EZ iCam" android app - TOTAL crap, doesn't work. Phone says its connected, cam changes from waiting for wifi to wifi ready but no difference on the app - there is no control at all. Usually it would connect without asking for a wifi password but a couple times I could get it to prompt (but can't remember how I made that happen) but still no difference. The camera is usable outside of these problems. I don't have a 'real' gopro to compare it to, but my son who has one (but is only 12) is not impressed with it. However, the low price is the only thing keeping it in the competition, because you can buy 2, 3 or 4 of these over a single gopro. Overall, if you can live without the wifi and are willing to dink with the case if your buttons suck then I'd say its a good choice to start with instead of a several hundred dollar gopro, especially if you are planning to use it for any gnarley stuff that risks damaging your cam. The wrist remote is probably an okay substitute for app based control, but there's no feedback for you to know if you are really controlling it without looking at the camera itself. If you get it, I'd recommend getting the 3 battery plus charger you can find on Amazon for only about $17, which would arm you with 5 batteries total. Hope this review helps!

Love the Akaso  E700. I'm a 10 year old boy and my parents gave it to me for my birthday. It is easy to put together and take apart (YouTube can help). The pictures are great and it's easy to use. It is small and light. If you have the waterproof casing on, it is waterproof for a long time. I can't wait to try it out in all sorts of sports.
Wow.. Great deal and works better than I expected. Simple operation. Pretty similar to my far more expensive other camera.

Purchased this to record my shots in pool. COVID broke out and havent had a chance to use it for that purpose but the little I have tested this camera impressed me. WIFI feature is a bit convoluted but workable. Came with a ton of accessories and add ons. Cant complain at all!  Great deal.

this camera was loved more than the hero camera by my 11 year old this Christmas. but i will say the battery life is less than would want but still workable. good enough for her to create some videos. recommended.
Video looks like it came from a 2012 action camera.

great cam sent my go pro back and purchased akaso ek 7000 couldn't be better great on drone. There is one thing i dont really care to much for is the cheap remote, digital display would be nice the two button it comes with you dont really know the function the camera is really doing maybe you didnt push button hard enough you wouldnt know until the camera came back to you (i use this with my go pro dog harness) so i just start recording from the camera itself

For being so small, it sure is packed with features and  provides a high quality output. I love the remote, I attach it to the steering wheel when off-roading to take those on demand shots and videos in the middle of the action.

Camera takes great photos. Recording time is good too. It's a great deal for your money. I don't like the idea that the charger wasn't included....if I didn't need to use the camera for a week, it would be no big deal, but I wasn't able to use the camera for the reason I purchased it. But I guess that doesn't matter now.I'd still recommend camera....just order at least 2 weeks ahead of time😉
I bought this as Christmas present for my husband and he loves it!Everything works great, comes with a lot of extra accessories and the pictures and the videos have a great quality.

Great camera for the price. I use it for taking videos of driving antique cars. Picture is crystal clear and steady.  It comes with a handy remote so I can turn it on and off from inside the car without getting in the picture. Lots of accessory's and two battery's plus a charger. It was a great buy.

I love this camera for the price.  I used it to video fish under water and the resolution was awesome.  I recommend this camera to anyone that is not able to spend a ton of money and just wants to capture general evernts.  I bought two and I very happy with my purchase.

I truly enjoy this camera for its compact size and price. I use this camera all the time but most recently I've been using it for filming the kids sporting events. It fairly decent and does what I need it to do.

My wife and I were debating on whether to buy a GoPro or the Akaso EK7000. After researching and reading reviews on both we decided to purchase the Akaso. Our first experience with it was in Florida on vacation. We were absolutely AMAZED on how clear the videos and still pictures were!! The camera performed as good under the water as it did out of the water. And it is very easy to use! We would recommend this camera to anyone who is in the market for buying one.

Picture quality was good enough for kids to take on Disney cruise and play under water. However, out of the water the audio had so much static the. Idio footage isn't useable. Will be returning and hoping for a better replacement. 1 star given due to bad sound quality. This is a REAL review from an actual normal buyer...if audio were better, this would have been an awesome camera otherwise.
wouldve given 5 stars but it did not come with instructions or the paper that tells what all the attachments are and how to use them

This camera produced high quality images and video and came with a lot of mounting accessories and spare parts.  There are plenty of online tutorials on how to set up the camera and even one that shows all the different ways the mounts work.  This is my first "action" camera, but I'm very impressed so far!

I bought this as a safety camera for my bicycle. It can be hazardous in NYC and I wanted something to track my commute. I tried it today and played the video back on my 4k tv. I was blown away by the quality. Really fantastic little camera with a lot of good attachments. I can't wait to take it underwater.

The camera performs great for the price point. My only complaint is there's no real computer software for easy use, you have to download and android emulator like blue stacks just to be able to use the app. I would really love some PC support for this camera so I can edit my videos online and stuff easier.

Bought this camera for my husband and son. They race off road motorcycles. The sound quality and video quality both exceeded our expectations. Much better than we got out of the GoPro. Even in the rain and mud, there was no interference in performance.  The battery life is great.  Easy to operate. We will likely be being a second one soon.

Takes pretty good pictures, video looks ok when it'll take it. It cuts off and locks up when I try to video so most of the time I can't video very long. But it's a economical camera, not bad for less than $50.

Just purchased this camera for my 6 year old son.  He has found it very easy to use.  All of the mounts come in handy when he wants to attach it to his bike or scooter and document his trips.  We love how easy it is to use with the app.  Awesome product!

great for the price. Battery is extremely short. quality of the actual cam is great, i would def still buy this but the adhesive pads area an absolute no. it fell off my helmet, luckily not during my ride. buying separate adhesive pads is a must
The range is very far, the picture quality is crystal clear and it is super easy to set up.  I love this product, and I can't wait to film my upcoming biking trip.

My parents' bought this camera for my 15-year-old niece for Christmas and I asked her what she thought of it.  She said that it has good quality images and that the battery lasts pretty long, but unfortunately because of Covid-19 and a being packed into a box because of a move she hasn't been able to really use it.

I use it as a dash cam and it works great. Great stabilization great picture quality and I can leave it in the vehicle plugged in it’s survived summer and so far into winter temps outside the vehicle varying from 100 to lower 20s

Purchased because of great review but will return since its too heavy for my needs.  Looking forward for next generation hopefully with reduced size and weight.  Reminds me of early generation big blocked cellphone which reduced in size and weight after time.

The camera in plain HD mode is fantastic (not even in 4K mode).  Viewing my drive to work this morning I could see and read license plates, etc.  This camera is a really good value.  Also, I put a 64GB card in it and it works fine with it.
Ordered as a gift for my dad.. He loves it

I needed a camera that would also record, could easily be mounted anywhere, and less than 100 bucks.  This fit the bill, and I couldn't be happier with the buy.  It has worked great for everything I need.  The remote control is a HUGE bonus!
We are looking forward to using it on our upcoming vacation. Will defiantly use it underwater with the grandkids!

Cheaply made. Before the first day was through with this thing, the clasp for the waterproof case was broken. The app. is poop, battery life is short, the operations are counterintuitive, and to top it off, the whole device gets very hot after operating for only 10 minutes. The price was right, and I guess you get what you pay for...

This is a great first action camera. Has great picture and video quality. It comes with tons of mounts/attachments too. It is very easy to use and setup. I couldnt have asked for a better action camera at a better price. I would definitely buy again and it may be what I get for a few friends for their birthdays. Well worth the money.
Great quality product , works perfect. A gift for my nephew and he loves it.

These little cameras are six extremely high-quality and packed with features normally costing three times as much. Purchased two of them for my boys and they love them!  LCD screen, wireless connectivity and wrist mounted remote control are just a few of the features my boys rave about!
Bought this for my brother in law because my sister wanted it for him, it’s an amazing camera! I definetly recommend
Great product for the money.Really good support even though its coming from China.
used it on my fishing trips with my buds ..great item very happy
Prefect for the water got it as a gift and use it in a water park and it was prefect easy to carry and hold and a plus it is affordable !!!!

I bought this camera to take on my fishing trip  to N. Minnesota. I mounted it to our canoe on a portage and fishing on a remote lake.  It is a great value with a great picture...a great entry level video camera. I have also used it to film myself driving my classic car around. Lots of useful attachments and accessories.

video quality is very good for the price. Has bug in the software/firmware. Create duplicate files. I have observed that if the camera is not moved somehow the long hour recordings get corrupted and I lost footage couple of times. I hope the company takes care of this issue.
This was purchased as a Christmas gift for our daughter. Its compact and works great. Would recommend this for active young adults.

it's pretty compact. the picture quality is what you expect from a 12 mega pixel. the video quality is amazing. the audio isn't the best and we also haven't taken any videos yet in the case it's probably not going to be the best with the case on. but over all I love it and i can't wait to use it for our vacation. definitely recommend.

I really like the camera for my motorcycle. I do have a windshield so its easier to capture images when the wind is not at play.The reason I make it a 4 star is the little metal pieces at the end of the screw bars come out from time to time when screwing in the bar. Make sure you hold them in place. Other than that it's really good.
My 12 year old uses this for snowboarding and biking and he loves it! He's had a ton of fun making videos with his brothers and friends. And it's such a great price!

This is not the best action camera on the market. This is an excellent camera for the price, and the accessories seem well made. Quality leaves something to be desired, but i an genuinely impressed.Do not  buy this looking to match a gopro. This camera is good, but don't knock it if you spend asking price on it.

i love this camera!!!!  I couldn't believe how many mounting accessories it came with, I was so pleased to see I didn't need to buy a ski pole mounting kit.  The pictures outside have come out great, and the app is so easy to use.  A total steal!

Great product! It comes with lots of accessories. The video quality is awesome! No need to go waste money on GoPro. This is way better and way good price. Don’t even hesitate to buy this product. The video quality and the voice quality theyre both great.

Great action cam for the price. Shoots solid 1080p video for b-roll and case and accessories are useful. Recommended if you need an inexpensive way to shoot video. Only downside is audio. You'll need another device to record sound. For this price, it's an impressive little action cam.

We are very pleased with this product.  I bought the camera and  accessory kit for my 10 year old son a year ago and he loves to use it at the beach, outdoors when he's riding skateboard and four wheeling.  Most recently he went on vacation to Mexico and was able to capture video of different things he did there.

I have been using this camera to record my bike rides, it comes with plenty of accessories to mount it on to the bike. I also plan to use it to attach to my guitar’s headstock to record guitar playing from an angle only a camera like this could. Good image quality for the price and overall very happy with it.
Piece of crap. Gave a million accessories but none are allowing me to mount this to helmet

record decent quality video and photo at depth, user manual could be improved especially regarding the attachment pieces. color distortion was significant without red filter lense, but with filter was greatly improved.

Bought this on a whim as I'd been wanting a new action cam. Checks all the boxes- waterproof, small, great battery life, lots of accessories - at a great price. Don't forget the memory card. You really cant go wrong with this purchase at this price point. Would buy again.

I bought this as an alternative to the pricey Go Pro for my son for Xmas. It has worked out so well!  He has since attached it to his helmet for his bike and on top of his remote control car! The movie quality isnt as 4k as i thought, but the 1080p is great. Images are good too. Recommended for any child or beginner.
The EK7000 is a cool sports action camera. It’s not perfect, but for the price, I think it’s worth trying. The customer service is excellent! I will definitely try more products from them.

I purchased this camera for my 10 yo who wanted a Go Pro. It's a great substitute for the price.  He has been actively using it and exploring its options. I'm very satisfied with this purchase and recommend it to others seeking to buy a camera for younger children.
Don’t buy!! Had it out the package for 3 seconds and latch for the water proof case broke.  Didn’t even waste my time turning it on or seeing what it looks like.  Very frustrating
Works great on my bicycle helmet.

Was really surprised with the quality of the camera and the pictures. Came out a lot better than I was expecting. Definitely a good buy for the money. Would totally recommend this to whoever is in the market for a camera like this or go pro. Save your money and get more with this camera. Very happy.
I don't know anything about this item it is a gift for our Grandson.

Pretty good image stabilization.  Though, I'm probably pushing the limits by attaching it to a dirt bike- which is most likely more extreme than what normally everyone else would do.  The quality of picture is fantastic as is the color balance.  Overall a pre incredible bang for the buck!

I couldn't be happier with this purchase.  What great value for a phenomenal camera.  Works as expected... exceeds expectations, in fact.  Quickly connects to your device, incredibly responsive, great accessories, great options within the camera.  11/10 would buy again.

Second feedback:I got this one for my kid as a cheap replacement for the gopro hero 2 he lost, and I was pretty impressed by the video quality, battery life, accessory package and remote. This is way worth the price. The only thing I would do different is make a light on the remote that tells the user if the camera is on/off. I can't see if it's recording while on my helmet and missed some really cool stuff thinking it was on.

There's no settings to get HDMI out on the camera itself. I hooked everything up and it simply doesn't output. with the complaints others have had with burned in images on the output This isn't a camera you can easily set up to be a webcam.
I got this for my 7 year old.  It is very good quality and it's super easy to use.  I suggest this product.

I am so glad I didn't waste $400+ on a GoPro.  This camera has all the features of its more expensive counterpart at a fraction of the cost.  Image and video quality are superb.  The included accessories are sufficient and the optional kits are economical.

This action video camera records great quality and is a good alternative if you're looking for something inexpensive compared to a GoPro or other name brand. It took me a bit to figure out initial set up and all of the attachments, but has been easy to use since understanding the camera's buttons and attachment gear.

Great camera I attached this to my windshield and drived arrounf to test it and works great, however the battery didn't last as long as i though it will. Has a remote that works also great, I love this camera, and i have to say for the price and quality is much better than some go pros.
Biggest pain to attach to a helmet. But works well otherwise.

Picture quality is actually much better than I expected but it’s difficult to hear when you turn it on and off so I’ve had times where it was running for a half hour straight. I used it for hunting with it on top of my head and without taking it off to look you don’t know for sure what’s going on. I’m excited to use it in other applications though.
Easy to use and works wonderfully

We bought this camera for my brother who is a club fisherman and is required to take pictures of his fish while on his kayak. This was the perfect gift to free up his hands so he didn't need to worry about he dish jumping out while trying to snap a picture with his camera! We would totally recommend this!
Time lapse and regular video works great
no tira fotos de calidad, muy mala la calidad

I've used this camera multiple times, however turned it on before enclosing it in the waterproof container. On my most recent trip to Cozumel, I attempted to turn it once connected to my snorkel mask and realized the power button doesn't line up with case. The case that came in the kit is the wrong one. After trying other optional mounts, I realized, this isn't the only thing that didn't work as advertised. Check your package and items as soon as you get them.

i like the fact that this action camera is cheaper n price than a go pro is and it has very similar quality's of a go pro plus it has a remote witch is fantastic for when you are trying to take a picture or video from a far. i definitely would recommend this to any one who is looking for a action camera on a budget.
We used this one time and that was all. The next time we went to use it, it wouldn’t work.

This product is of very great quality and comes with many usefull accesories when you buy it. We are also very happy that it is waterproof, and even has a 170 degree wide lens which helps us capture all the places we record better. In conclusion, we’re very happy and impressed with our AKASO camera.

I purchased this for a trip to Costa Rica and it worked perfect! It's small, easy to use, good quality. Came with plenty of accessories. The only thing I wish it would have had was a float able attachment, in case you did drop it in the water it wouldn't sink.  Very happy with it though and recommend it.
I like how i can connect directly to power bank for max battery use my 5000mah power bank lets me record for longer periods this is great.
This product was for our eight year old. It works perfectly for him. There are so many options with this camera.

Product arrived yesterday. Packaging was ok, but camera was packaged nicely. Great clear picture with the screen and through the app! This is a great alternative and more affordable than other leading brands. So excited to bring it on my trip!
I bought this for Maui trips. It works amazing in water and out. I love it.

I've had the camera for a couple of weeks now and it was worked out great.  While the battery life is not stellar, the package arrived with two batteries.  The picture quality is great, the sound is decent, and the entire thing comes loaded with optional extras including several different mounts.
