I mainly use it when I'm riding my motorcycle and I have not had a chance to take it underwater, but for this price you really can't beat it. I would recommend.
Quality photos and videos. Compare to gopro for faction of the cost.
It’s great for web cam as well as taking professional pictures was to use this is the second one I’ve brought so happy
Unable to connect to the internet. Scanned you are code was it told unable to identify. Camera is okay for price expected a little more out of it. Does not stand up the current reviews.

I'm so excited for this product. We will be using it at our destination wedding. It comes with a ton of accessories. Does not come with a battery charger or a micro SD card. But appears to be a very well put together camera. I haven't used it yet, but am very excited. I have a micro SD card ordered.

I bought this for my truck. I am a truck driver and wanted share with my family and friends some great places that I get to travel through. And also to share some unique experiences. This camera works for that purpose. It has many attachments and two batteries with charger. This item is a great value for the price.
Took this swimming and on a couple of rafting trips.  The case kept it dry.  User interface took a little bit of getting used  to, but it is a great take anywhere camera for more adventurous trips.

I think the hype about the camera is that it's inexpensive, and that it does basically all a GoPro does for nearly 300$ less (with the exception that it is NOT touch screen). I found the photos were really REALLY grainy, and when taking photos of people it distorted their facial features. There is an app you can connect to, but it's kind of a pain because it times out pretty quickly and once it times out you can't do anything with the camera itself so you basically have to shut the camera off and turn it back on. Overall, "you get what you pay for".  It's good for the price, but I'm glad I bought this and tested it out before I went on my trip to New Zealand because I doubt I will use it when I travel.

Love this camera the picture is great came with a lot of  mounts!  By only problem was there was not enough paper instructions for all of the amounts and how to set up the camera although they do give you a website where you can find a full manual. I  I definitely recommend this camera and can’t wait to use it all the time !!!!

I have used camera's worth 10x this product and have never had such quality results.  I would and have genuinely recommended this camera to friends and family.  I always have it with me as it is so small and convenient to use!  As a vlogger this contraption is perfect for my uses.
Good camera, quality picture, wish it had a zoom feature. Good deal for cost.
Arrived today and was incredibly easy to set up and love how user friendly the app is.

Good film quality and airtight waterproof case, with sooo many mounting options.  The price can't be beat.  One star off for difficult button navigation and the occasional required "turn it off and back on" moments.  Wonderful overall though, and I got some great footage of Iceland!
I owned a GoPro for years I would never go back after buying this Akaso EK7000

Completely worth the money I'm planing on buying a few more to film other stuff.  I'm excited to use it on my hikes and other adventures.  Haven't had a chance to use it on a hike yet but so far it's held up and quality is surprisingly very well.  Hesitant at first but I watched reviews on YouTube and I went with the purchase.

been using it for 3 weeks already and it helps me alot when im traveling on my electric scooter, comes with alot of free accessories, 2 batteries in case one dies, surprised with how good this camara is for the low price.
Didn't realize i couldn't change the ratio to narrow the field of view however there's another model that does and I will likely purchase it as well!!
My son was so happy with his Christmas gift!! Takes nice pictures and videos are clear!! Haven't done the underwater.
Pretty sweet cam! Works like a charm for an average person. I mainly use it for family trips

I bought this product for motorcycle riding safety and documentation of my ride.  I recorded on 1080P and it looked great after the fact.  Only issue so far is the water tight case.  A small bit broke off, but it doesn't appear it'll be an issue.  Just gotta be careful.  I look forward to using the Akaso EK7000 Everytime I ride.

I was excited to get this but it's not what I hoped for. I don't have any sound. I have tried to figure out why, watched you tube videos etc. It also does not record a smooth video. It stops and starts. Again, perhaps it's a setting but from what I can see, it's set correctly. The manual for this is worthless.I don't know if it came defective (most likely) of I'm doing something wrong. As I have been trying to figure it out every way I can, I am guessing it came defective. It's probably too late to send it back and I have had it out of the box and attached to various mounts so it's probably not fair to send it back but it's a real annoyance. I guess you get what you pay for.

I like that it is easy to hold and that you can attach it to an RC car with the sticker attachments.  The picture quality is good and has a stable video. This camera is simple and easy to use. I like to use it for making fishing videos, filming rides and vlogs. - 10-year-old user

This camera has so many features and gadgets. It is so great to be able to connect it to our cellphones and get a glimpse of the image wherever the camera is placed. The remote control is also very useful. We love using it for outdoor activities and the colors and quality are really good. Definitely recommend it.

The packaging of the product was good and the product is as advertised. A great variety of accessories.I just received this camera but already have used it and am very happy with the ease of use, quality if the equipment and of the video.
Love the wifi and the size of the camera. Great picture and video quality.

An excellent camera. Fully charge batteries before using and you will be happy with thier life. Picture and video quality is excellent and there is no problems in the videos I took riding my motorcycle. Smooth and great quality. Why bother with a 300 dollar gopro when this exists.

I didn't want to spend $500 for a go pro and wasn't sure if I would use it.  This comes with a waterproof case and some accessories including and extra battery.  I used it for snorkeling and during a 10 feet deep underwater excursion.  It worked great.  I also bought one for my brother in law who mountain bikes.

What an awesome camera for the price. I was skeptical at first but the more i use it the more i like it. The only feature i wish it had was a low battery warning of some sort to let you know when it's about to die.
Can’t wait to give this a go. Feels nice and sturdy. Lots of fun toys with it too
First purchase of a sports camera the AKASO EK7000 is very easy to set up and use. My family has enjoyed the captured moments.

It’s pretty cool so far. I’m not big on taking pics but for the price I decided why not. Plus, I’m trying this vlogging thing and I was told this is a good camera to do it from. I haven’t used it since I bought it though.

Very nice camera. It's small and portable just hat I needed for my Motorcycle trip up the California PCH. Well packaged and so many other attachments I'll have to experiment with on where to mount. I would recommend this at this price point.

I am so happy I found this product. I've used them to take action B-roll footage for a music video, and couldn't be happier. The fact that I got a great accessory pack with it and an extra battery and charger seals the deal --  will definitely purchase more!

No way that this is 12MP. No. Way! Also (and this was the main reason why I returned it)), the batteries lasted less than half an hour on a full charge. And, for some reason, the only way I could have turned on the camera was if I removed the battery from its compartment and re-insert it.

Great value for the money.  Video quality is great.  I am not a pro so I am sure there are things that I pro would like but for me, this camera works great.  Would be interested in a model that allows an external mic to be attached to it as I use it for flying and would like to push intercom audio to it.  Hard to beat for the money.
Good camera until it fell off my helmet while riding
Great camera and picture quality.  I haven't had time to see how water resistant it is yet.  I would greatly recommend

This camera is great! I haven’t had it very long yet but it does everything I need it to. I use it as dash cam, and I will use it with the WiFi as a backup cam for parking my camper in tight spots. It takes great videos and pictures.  It’s very easy to transfer videos and pictures through Wi-Fi to my phone or iPad . I think it’s just a great action camera for the price.

This camera works wonderful for the price. We use it for my sons YouTube videos. Haven’t had any problems with it so far, have already recommended it to a few friends who needed action cams. We have used it on the water, underwater, it’s gotten soda spilled on it, still works wonderful and takes great quality footage.
A great camera for occasional snapping, not the greatest action cam quality, but not bad for the price. Lots of attachments too.

I just received my new AKASO Camera, I am very excited to start playing the device. It has the same look and feel as a Go Pro. I need a less expensive device to take on trips instead of climbing everywhere with my expensive phone. I will update my review once I take it underwater.
Bought this for a friend for Christmas. It made a great gift and has been a lot of fun.

Camera arrived as described, build quality is good etc.. There are many accessories included in the box, some of which I don't even know what the function could be, anyways for the money it's definitely worth it instead of buying a go pro for 4x the price. Don't forget to buy an SD card though as its not included
I had some off-brand SD cards saying High speed but were not. You must have real class 10 FAT32 SD cards, exFat will not work.This camera is worth the price
Akaso will stand behind their product. Make sure to contact them if you have any problems. Camera is good quality, great bang for the buck. No need for expensive GoPros.

Just got this camera for Christmas and am already pleasantly surprised. The quality and options rivals a GoPro. If you have a GoPro and want a second, buy this instead. If you are considering a GoPro and are unsure, buy this and find out.
I like it. The capacity compared with cost is good.
I use this during my mountain bike trips, used it once already and so far not disappointed. Might have some features tat still need to check on, but overall good for price.
The product representation is accurate in every way and price point versus quality is outstanding.
Only received it yesterday, but have been messing with it ever since - used it in the pool, outside on the RZR, will be taking it on a Gulf fishing trip this weekend. Super excited to use it more!

Been using my camera for a few days now and I love it the image is much better then my older 1080p one and all my old accessories mate up to this one no problem. The HDMI out is a amazing add on for in house recording and remote and screen view via WiFi makes getting them actions shot that's much easier!

I was surprised when I received the camera, because it looks really high quality, it includes all mounts and it's all solid and seems durable. Even though the pricing of the product is way lower than its competition, the quality is impressive. Definitely recommended.

I bought this camera to take pictures while scuba diving. The cameras picture quality is very good. I am not a professional photographer but the quality is exactly what I needed. The camera is user friendly. My only advice is buy the sd card at the same time as you will not be able to take pictures until it’s in the camera.
I was excited to play back our boogie boarding for the day after testing out the new action camera.  We were not disappointed.  The playback was clear and great quality.
Hard to follow instructions not in English

I gave this to friends for their wedding. They are what you call Adventurous People. They are going on their honeymoon to Mexico and i believe this will not only enhance memories but will be able to capture video and pics like never before. I am excited to see what they come up with after they come back.

I bought this camera for my 11-year-old daughter. The only reason I didn't rate this camera as 5 stars is the interface into the camera is a bit awkward. The navigation through the menus is adequate but clumsy. Aside from the less than an ideal interface, this camera is great.

It has no real manual or instructions so I have no idea what the 50 different attachments are for or how to set any of them up but other than that it’s a great camera 😁 customer service is absolutely outstanding though ❤️
Easy to use...... I like the remote on and off option. I was looking for a video camera that wasn't too expensive and this is doing the job.

Ok so this camera is pretty awesome for the money. It’s very small (which I’m not a fan of) however the quality makes up for what it lacks in size. I’d recommend this camera to anyone who wants excellent quality for a third of the price!
I've been using this camera on my window sill to capture some great birdies feeding. It's worked great!
We use this on fishing trips. The picture and video is really good quality. Easy to use.
This camera is pretty impressive for the price point. The instructions are not very clear on setting up but once you start playing with the camera it gets easier. I would refer this to a friend.

This has been my favorite camera for a cheap price and i use it every where i go to get relly beautiful images and the water proff case is the best since i can take it swimming and take really cool videos of it too!
works excellent, takes great still shots and videos. comes with battery, charger, remote, and a bag with too many attachments. Does not come with body and head straps.

I absolutely loved this camera . I took it to the beach and it was perfect pictures and videos . I can even download the videos or pictures to the app in my iPhone and share it to media . I think it’s a good product by the price .

Bought this for my 11 year old step son for his birthday! He thinks he’s a famous YouTuber. Haha.He loves it! Works great for him and his tricks and Xbox videos. He played with it in the pool and it worked great! Great picture quality. All the mounts it came with are very useful. Definitely worth the buy!

I knew what I wanted- a high-level camera, that was easy to use and easy to maintain but also provided a great overall experience. This is exactly what this camera provided. Forget the illusion of needing to spend several hundreds of dollars on a piece of equipment- this camera provides it all at a great price.

Camera worked well for horseback riding and whitewater rafting on a family vacation to Colorado. It was used for downhill biking also, but the video was quite jittery for that. However, that may be normal for these type cameras, so I plan to try to post process with software I found online. Overall, quite satisfied with the camera. The water resistance worked great in the provided case when I ended up under the water.
I got the camera for a Christmas present, but we lost the batteries. i can’t wait to try it out when i get new ones. it seems like a very cool camera , just like a gopro
★  from PhilVery confusing camera! Hard to remove your video from camera,  app that goes with camera doesn't work , poor customer service...lost my vacation videos

Poor performance out on the water, however you get what you pay for. If you’re going to use this for normal activities then this is a good deal. If you’re using it for sports, save up money for another month or two and just get a GoPro.
Doesn't include sim card so you can't use it until you purchase one.
It's not bad. The price is right for it, but I find myself feeling like I wasted the money because I just want a better quality one.

I bought two of these cameras. The first one stopped working after 15 minutes recording video. The screen in the back started showing colored lines and then turned off. Never turned on again. I tried with different batteries but no one worked. Very disappointed.
After 4 hours I could not get it to work.  My laptop was getting down load failed messages as well.  I asked for a refund and shipped it back.

Love it, easy to use and mount. Camera menu is very intuitive, recordings are high quality (both pictures and video). The wristband remote control is fantastic when recording while on a motorcycle. Highly recommend this camera for the conscientious shopper.
Works fantastic. Love the features and literally does everything the 4X priced high end cameras do. Beat the heck out of it in rain while hunting....came through like a champ. Highly Recommend.

Great little camera, especially for the price point which nothing else compares to.  Had it a short time, but so far, it's been a great purchase.  Nice user's manual online.  Planning to use it further out on my sailboat and the ultimate test - attaching it to my Golden Retriever who is a diving fanatic.

Obviously this camera is comparable to a GoPro. I've never owned a GoPro and now I don't really see any reason to.  This camera takes excellent video and is fairly easy to use. My only complaint is with the instructions. I am still trying to figure out how to delete videos and pictures from the camera. The only way I know how to do it is though the app that you use to access the camera on your iPad or iPhone. I would buy this again.

The packaging was a little daunting and there were no instructions for all of the included accessories with the camera.  You can scan and download a user manual.  Camera is smaller than I imagined and is very light making it good for sports/action camera.  Resolution is good and the camera seems very easy to use.

Very easy to use right out of the box.  Great assortment of mounts and within minutes It was mounted to my bike on tested on the road.  However, there was no sound or anyway to adjust the sound.  After spending some time with technical support, it was returned to Amazon

I bought the 5000 camera first which I really liked then decided to move on up to the 7000.  This camera is easy to use. The picture quality is great and I love the wrist remote.  I wouldn't hesitate to buy this camera again or recommend it to a friend. I give it a 5 star rating.  Can't wait for the next generation of the AKASO Sport Camera to come out.
Great camera good quality but it should have zoom

This is my first venture into the action camera world and this is perfect for what I need.  Using it while taking the family on a cruise in February for action captures but have already used it for work purposes at my full time job.  Wonderful christmas gift and perfect for first time users!  Highly recommend!
AAA fast shipping AAA item

I bought this action camera to capture all my adventures during traveling. I loved the amazing quality in the photos and videos as well as the 180 degree wide view. Overall this camera is very useful because of how small it is and great for underwater captures although the sound of ur content might be affected by the waterproof case.

My 10 year old son has been looking at this camera for a long time.  He used his Amazon gift card to purchase it.  He loves it.  We haven’t tried it underwater, but it is definitely meeting his needs.  It came with a lot of things.  You do need to get a micro SD card to use it.

I bought this camera last month and it proved to be one of the best amazing buy for me.. I was looking to buy Go pro but then i found this camera in deal in amazon and believe me it is really very good.Its quite handy and picture quality is good and its wide angle is very good.

Very poor quality overall. Picture, sound, stabilization are all not very good. After reading the other reviews that were positive, I don’t know if I even had the sam camera. Used it for a few hours and tried to be positive. After that, I returned it and got a Go Pro and I am so much happier.
Purchased for our son.  He enjoys the ease of use and picture quality.  We enjoyed it's value.
The camera is surprisingly small and light, can’t wait to put it to work! The interface is simple once you’ve gotten the hang of it. Easily pairs with my iPhone 8 and the app is also pretty simple.
I actually like them very good for the price

First and foremost, I want you to know I was given an infinitive to write this review and there are subtle messages that suggest leaving a 5 star review. Given that I just received the package, I can say it was packaged nice, send quickly, and the camera appears to be good quality so far. I’ve turned it on and it appears user friendly as well.
Kids love it while skiing

Camera came today and we took it out for a try. I’m always recording while we fish. It was a surprise gift for my husband. He hasn’t stopped smiling. The quality is awesome and the fact that it’s waterproof makes it even better. Now we can get footage underwater of the big catches coming in.

I bought the AKASO EK7000 as an alternative to the GO PRO cameras. I found that the camera is a great product which is complimented with an amazing price!!! I have used the camera several times now and am very pleased with the outcome. I look forward to any innovations the company adds to the camera in the future. If you are searching for an alternative for a sports camera give the AKASO EK7000 a good look.

I bought this camera for my 13 year old son.  He loves this camera.  He loves putting it on his bike.  There are numerous mounts that work well for many applications.  He also liked that it came with two batteries and a dual charger.It would be nice if this came with a memory card and an instruction manual in print.
The video was great but the camera heated up and shutdown in minutes. Maybe we got a defective unit.  I am glad to try a replacement. The camera, app and accessories were awesome.

The camera works good for the price. I have had no issues and works good at HD and SD. But does not work so well when above true HD. The wifi connection is nice and easy. But the video file is just different so it needs to be converted to run on most devices as a normal video file. Besides that it is a good camera.

Well so far I have not used the camera for what I bought it for which is underwater snorkeling but right off all the stuff I read when I bought it said that I could use up to 64 GB SD card which did not work. First page in the owners manual says that it supports 8gb, 16gb & 32 gb. Now I am stuck with a 64 mb micro sd card and I had to purchase a 32 gb micro sd card to get it to work. Also, instruction manual does not include instructions on how to use accessories. Also, in the whats in the box section it says 1 x ac adapter and there is not one.
This is what he takes pictures of.
Great quality, comes with a lot of mounts. Video and picture quality is clear.
It's exactly what I was looking for. Is good for the price, the quality of image is really good, not a GoPro, but really a good option.

I looked at alot of cameras like this and this one really stood out for me.  I was very happy with the large amount of accessories it came with and I was shocked at the quality of the video. Great Purchase!

I just got this and am really impressed with everything that it comes with and how well it was packaged.  The camera  looks robust from the initial lookover.  I will update once I play with this more.  So far, very happy.

For the money, you can not get a better Sports Action Camera. I was pleasantly surprised at the number of accessories that came with this camera. I am very pleased with the whole package and would highly recommend  this camera.The one big drawback is the lack of Image Stabilization, but it is still very versatile as is.
I bought this camera because I didn't want to pay for a GoPro and this was an affordable alternative.  The setup was super fast and easy.  I took it surf fishing and it worked great.

This was a great alternative to the more expensive gopros. We got them for our 6 & 7 year olds and they love them! Very durable, the quality of the pictures and videos are much better than expected. They worked well in the pool too. Bonus that it comes with accessories. Great buy!

Having had one GoPro so far, I love this camera. It delivers the same quality, if not better, than the GoPro. You get so many attachments and the picture is amazing. I've not had one jitter in either of my cameras (I bought two). The picture is crystal clear and the set-up is easy as pie. There is no reason to not buy these cameras that I've found thus far. I'm going to buy two more to give as gifts. They rock, just make sure you get the correct speed, class 10, micro SD, cards to realize their potential.

Wanted a small camera to stick to the glass at the hockey arena to record my grand-kids games. The first video was from the corner glass and it was surprising how clear the video was, even at the far end of the ice. The camera surpassed my expectations. I would recommend it for anything similar to this use.

This camera compared to more expensive ones shows virtually no difference. The images are crystal clear and the color is very close to being accurate. All that said the camera is doing exactly what I purchased it for. This package is a great value and comes with all kinds of mounts included.

So far I'm happy with the price of this. I haven't used it much but I did ready reviews and YouTube videos of this camera versus a go pro. Only difference I saw was it doesn't work as well in low lighting. For what I'm going to do with this it was crazy to buy a go pro. I'm going on a trip soon and this is you I purchased it. I'm still playing with it but I'll try and write another review after my trip. Plus when you get this camera there afreebgift inside of your choosing!!! I got 2 batteries and another charge! $25 value on Amazon!!

So I received this Akaso Ek7000 after scouring the Amazon, internet & youtube for endless days. All because I wanted to get the best bang for my buck. And this little cam is top notch without question. I've used it swimming at the Ymca, strapping to my boys life jackets & going down the big twirling slide, the video is amazing. I use it at 1080p at 60fps. The waterproof case works flawlessly. It can go to 2k & 4k HD resolution for the video, and the camera pictures at 12mp is excellent quality as well. I've so far taken this Akaso everywhere. Even out in below zero temperature with my dog, running around, even tossed it into a fluffy snow bank with the case on just so I could watch it afterwards on my computer. The watch button style remote control does wonders for when you have the camera away from you. The buttons for camera & video start/stop are on time & gives ya a mission impossible feel with it on, cause no one knows what it's for or what your doing when pressing the buttons, haha. I can honestly tell other customers to buy this without hesitation, because I've done extensive research & played with this nice Akaso Ek7000 for several weeks & it's performing fantastic. Meeting & exceeding my expectations. You won't find another action cam under $100, with countless attachments mix & match plus an extra battery! Hope this helps you with deciding to purchase it, cause you won't be disappointed. :)
I took this camera traveling and it was so easy to use and handle.  I highly recommend this camera for capturing great action and color.
The quality on this Action cam is excellent. Got them for our boys to record while dirt biking. This made their day!!!

This is a great action camera that works extremely well. I do not own a GoPro however I could safely say that this camera rivals every aspect of a GoPro's. The picture quality is fantastic and clear and the sound is not bad for an action camera. I used this while skiing with a friend and the video came out perfect and the camera stuck to my head the whole time. Overall I am very pleased with this product and I would recommend it.
It would be very hard to beat these action cameras for the price.

This is an incredible camera. I am not too tech savvy and it was so easy to learn and use! Most of the accessories I probably won’t use, but the water proof part is great! I highly recommend purchasing a flotation device with it. Also, the camera doesn’t come with a SIM card. I highly recvimmrnf this camera!!!

Purchased for my 9 yr old's birthday. He was very excited to open and has enjoyed using thus far. It was easy to set-up and start using right away. He's created several videos all on his own. Great quality. Lots of helpful videos on how to use the accessories on-line. Couldn't be happier with this product.

I  downloaded the Ez iCam app to an iPhone 8 in late December 2017 and had no problems operating the camera and downloading pictures and video from it.I love the quality of the images and video, and the 170 degree viewing angle captures so much.

This is the best waterproof camera we ever had, good quality for the price, it came with the controls, 2 bateries a waterproof cover and much more. My son really love it , he uses it every time we go to the beach. Is just what I was loking for.
Outstanding item. My grandpa bought it for me.  I love it. Have friends that want one.

This camera is amazing for its price. Of course, if you pay $500 for an official GoPro camera, you're going to get wonderful quality. But for less than $100, this camera has far surpassed my expectations. It's easy and quick to use. I love the ease of traversing through the menus. The quality of the videos is awesome.Just a side note, "timelapse" is not actually timelapse. It's just a timed photograph. I believe there is a function for actual timelapse, but I'm not too sure how to do it yet.

I really don't know if this action cam can be compared with GoPro or other more expensive action cam as I haven't tried those.I was looking an affordable action cam that can record 1080p 60 fps. After searching for a while and reading reviews on variety of action cams, I've stumbled upon Akaso EK700 and decided that for my needs this action cam will suffice. I was not disappointed and the cam is great. The video quality is amazing( I've only tried 1080/720p). The accessories bundle is amazing, especially at that price.
Overall a good camera but short battery life.
Took it snorkeling in Hawaii and was so surprised by the quality of the video. The wifi aspect is garbage, but I didn't care about that anyway. I've never been happier with a camera purchase.
Great cant wait to use it everywhere

We bought this camera a while ago for my daughter and all the kids keep getting it out and using it!  They love it.  It was a Christmas present.  We have one battery that is bad, but considering the length of time it lasted I wouldn't expect anything else, batteries just don't last in anything that uses them.

Can’t beat the price of this and the quality is great! We got it for a trip and I knew it would be mostly the kids using it, so I wasn’t looking to spend a fortune. I was pleasantly surprised by this and the quality of video and pictures and the kids love making little videos!

This Action Camera is a very well designed one. If your looking for a cheep action camera that shoots as well/ if not better than a go pro than this one is it. It comes with many accesories for any mount that you can imagine. Although, it does not come with a head/ chest mount. It is very easy to move around the screen and get were you want to go. It also shows how long/ how many pictures you can take. The camera shoots very smoothly and very good quality. I highly recommend this product if your looking for a cheap but well designed action camera.
Video mode only will run for 15 minutes before battery over heats and shuts off. I recommend spending the extra money for something better

So far love this product picture and videos are great quality just make sure to not use the water proof case if you want sound other than that clearer instruction would be helpful but over great bang for your buck
For the price its great

Great camera, unbelievable video, I didn't think it would be 4k. It's so crisp it has to be 4k. Software sucks, you have to find something that works with it on Android. Videos are .mov, but for the price I will be buying a second one.
-Great for beginners to action cameras-Cheap! 😀👍

This camera is a steal for the price! I have used it several times and could not be happier with the picture quality. I was very excited to get this camera. When it showed up at my door and I opened the box, it did not disappoint. I would rather buy three of these instead of buying a go pro. If you were looking for good quality with excellent value this is the camera you want. I could not be happier with it
Amazing product, sturdy, easy to assemble and wonderful price!
This camera is exactly what I was looking for! Great quality for a great price. We are going on a big friend vacation and this camera is going to be perfect to capture all of our fun moments!

This is the real deal! I have own other brands that commanded higher prices. The picture and video quality is amazing from this compact camera. Included two rechargeable batteries plus a lot of different mounting options. If you're thinking of purchasing this, do yourself a favor and do it. You will not regret it

Good action camera. Easy to set up and manipulate. Not quite Go Pro professional quality, but for weekend warrior fun it can't be beat. You get a lot for the price. Veiwed a few YouTube videos for set up and all is good.

I purchased this camera 2 weeks ago, I knew I had to write a review because this camera is amazing, for $50 you get the amazing quality just like a  go pro, if you want to save money get this camera, I already know that it was going to be a good buy, I might get this for others as a gift.

Cant beat it for the price. The cover case isn't the highest quality but itll protect it from scuffs and scratches. I use this for my motorcycle helmet for insurance purposes. The kit it comes is very nice to with two batteries and the charger for long rides.

This is the first action camera I’ve used and I found it very easy to get started. I did download the manual (it doesn’t come with one) and found that useful. With the default video settings, I seem to get about half an hour of filming with each battery - which seems decent to me. For the price, I am very impressed.
Just as the description says. Everything is in fine order thanks everyone involved.you guys rock

I went skiing this past week and I used the Akaso and I loved it! It has great picture quality and good audio. I used the waterproof case and it kept the camera safe! Overall very pleased with the product, would recommend to everyone!!! It comes with many useful attachments and I am very happy with the purchase!

I use this for trail riding and it delivers very clear images. The stabilization is not as good as a GoPro but it still delivers clear video and pictures. I am bouncing around more than a typical rider would due to me riding a minibike with no suspension. Your definitely getting the best bang for you buck.

This camera more than exceeded my expectations. I was skeptical due to some of the reviews, but for the price it was so much more worth it than a GoPro. My batter life is better than what people have said it was. I am extremely happy with this purchase and can't wait to use it on my cruise later this year.
For the price, just as good as the Gopro.
Easy to use and set up. The picture quality is good and customer service excellent
Great product. Quality and the amout of things you get with it are very nice. Will buy again in the future if possible
So far it's worked really great for me. I 100% recommend as a cheaper version of a GoPro. It's basically the same quality.
I was amazed what came with the 60 dollar camera. Haven't used it yet but so far I am impressed

Great product for the price. No need to spend $400 for the GoPro. The set up was a bit confusing ... the manual doesn’t include the password to connect to the camera’s WiFi but a quick Google search brought it up easily (it’s 1234567890 ... you know, the kind of password an idiot would put on his luggage.) haha

This camera comes with everything we needed and seems easy to use, although we have not been able to get on a trail yet. Look forward to using it as the weather improves. The remote seems very useful. I would recommend this camera to friends.

This is a great choice camera for all my outdoor sporting needs. It even goes 100 feet under water which is a plus! Shipping and handling were taken care of promptly. Much better deal for the price then an expensive go pro. Let’s see if it holds up like one.

This is an awesome product.  It delivers on everything that it advertises.  I love that it comes with all the accessories so that you can immediately get active and start recording videos with it.  The quality of the videos is great.  I would recommend this product to anyone.
Worked amazingly well, I’m glad I didn’t get ripped off by getting a go pro

The picture quality of the video is excellent for my use and I was really happy with the wide range of accessories that came in the package. Also really like the fact that 2 batteries were standard. Operation is pretty straightforward once you figure it out. The wifi connection and app worked first try.

I like this product because basically it’s almost the same with other leading brands. It’s affordable and its working fine. When it comes to picture and video recording it’s clear. Easy to operate. I thought when i put the water proof case the sound will not be recorded but it did. All in all thumbs up!

This camera is literally the best, I was worried it wouldn’t perform like a GoPro BUT upon using it and testing it, I was amazed with the image stabilization, sharpness, quality, etc. This camera blew my mind and for the price! You can’t beat that. I would recommend this camera to anyone. I will be ordering more soon for my cruise.
Used it for snorkeling on our recent cruise. Takes awesome videos. Great value.
Works well and provides similar performance to more expensive brands

UPDATE:  After using it no more than 3 times I picked it up about a month later and found that it would lock up at the splash screen.  The only way to get it off of the splash screen was to remove the battery.m  But that wouldn't fix it, because the next time it I would try to turn it on or even plug it into a charger It would lock up at the splash screen again.I got no response from the distributor (Tablet Express) and Amazon would not help, apparently because it had no warranty.  They never said why.
I set to 4K the video quality is terrible. Absolutely not 4k
Yay!! I’m starting a YouTube channel and this is perfect!! I can’t wait to play around with it!! Small but mighty!

Good price but takes terrible videos. It’s not worth the time to even save these videos. Look at the videos on the feedback, I don’t know why people think this is a good camera. Don’t waste your time.

I used this camera to record a concert and the picture was kinda "fuzzy" and the sound was not great. If you plan to use this for basic action recording or looking for a cheap alternative to a go pro then this will work, but remember you get what you pay for.
Works great and great budget camera . I like it !

I have had this for a week now and used it at my airsoft games with some friends and it works wonderfully on 1080p at 60fps.The wifi remote definitely comes in handy when its mounted on your hat! I was searching for an action camera that was inexpensive but still of decent quality. I searched all other results and kept coming back to the EK7000. Im glad I chose this cam. It comes with an insane amount of accessories as well. This action cam is definitely the best value for what you pay. Five stars.NOTE please get a UHS-3 Micro SD card to record in 4K. I purchased a sandisk class 10 UHS-1 card and it cannot keep up with 4K recording. It works fine on 1080p 60fps though.

Every thing works as advertised.  Only draw back is that the microphone does not work that great when the camera is in the waterproof case, but I guess if I read closer in the product details it might be in there.
My grandson loves it.

I'm buying this product for my trip to Hawaii and wanted to test it out beforehand. I really enjoy it but would like to be sure to remind people to have an extra microSD card as it doesn't come with one. And I fully charged it since purchase and battery life is good for multiple trips.

Just received my AKASO ultra HD 4K edition and I’m so glad I didn’t waste my money on a Go Pro. This camera is perfect for kayaking, fishing, hunting and hiking. The assembly was quick and easy and all the attachments are very affordable.
The camera worked as described and I am happy with my purchase. I look forward to using it again at the beach and other places.
Our daughter loves this and it was so much cheaper than a gopro and works great under water!
This is a great little camera for the price! I’ve taken it on several vacations, hiking and underwater and haven’t have any issues.

This is my first action camera. I did not want to spend a couple hundred dollars on a big name brand camera. Immediately after opening and using this camera I found myself comfortable with operating it. It is simple and the video and sound quality are great! It comes with many great accesories that all fit GoPro items. This really is a great camera for the first time user as well as the experienced as it has great qualities with the video!

for $80 I was okay with the possibly crappy video, I just wanted something to use on the bike for awhile as a possible slow roll up to something nicer.  that didnt last long as the very first time I used it half of what it recorded was corrupt and battery was dead in 40 minutes or so.  memory card checked out fine and I'll keep trying to work with it but every so often I guess we all need to be reminded:  you get what you pay for.  Wish I had bought it when I could test it thoroughly like I did today so I could have returned it.pros:  cheap enough, takes pictures, records video and probably works under water

This is a great camera for any hobbyist, such as myself, who'd like to start recording their entirely uneventful trips to work and back. That is, until summer, when I'll be able to record my much more eventful trips to the lake!Easy to set up. Easy to use. The remote is excellent. Couldn't ask for more for the price.
The app is awful.The file type is .mov this does not work with Android.  You cannot view it, you cannot edit it, you cannot upload it to Google or YouTube.
Bought two of these to help record soccer games at different angles and we were very, very happy with the results. Pretty amazing product for the price. Highly recommended.

Camera worked great, lots of accessories provided for all mounting situations.  Wide angle field of view, takes good photos and videos. Fantastic band for the buck.Only issue was wrist mounted remote control failed the first time it got wet.
Excellent Camera with like every mount imaginable.
I just got this camera, easy to set up and use but camera became very hot after about 10 min and the case fogged.

these cameras are just amazing, the Quality of the images is great, they are easy to work, the battery life is very goodI actually bought 3 more, that's how good they are. just bought another 2 on Jan 15th, 2020 truly amazing

EDIT:  the company has contacted me and has sent me a new camera.  They clearly stand behind their products.  I have changed my rating based on their customer service.This was a great little camera.  Unfortunately, it broke after 3 months.  It will not turn on anymore.

I got this camera and it came in two days. It does take videos and photos. The burst photo takes a bunch of photos. The time lapse doesn't take pictures and put them together into a film. It just takes photos, for example, every five seconds. So if you are looking for a time lapse camera, don't get this one. Other than that, it's really good.

This is my first sports camera,  but compared to the price of the big brands, I believe the quality is quite decent for the money. Comes with a bunch of mounting brackets. I shot videos driving as well as fishing and I'm quite pleased with both, though I wish the audio recorded louder.

Decided to try this instead of GoPro and was not dissapointed. Really awesome for its price.The video quality is quite amazing.Comes with a lot of different mounts,also compatible with my previous GoPro mounts. The smart remote is a really handy accessory which can be strapped on the wrist like a watch.The buttons on the camera need a little improvement.Overall experience is amazing!! Highly recommended if you dont want to end up spending too much on an Action Camera

Love it but I'm sure it may not be possible to add some type of shock absorbing to it out it on my motorcycle and the roads around here are not great very bumpy so it make a bad video other then my own problem with it this thing is awesome I would recommend it to anyone

Arrived in 2 days. Took 10 min to download app and take off and running. Very excited to use underwater to take videos catching fish in the boat. Picture and Video quality are as expected for this model (EK7000)
Bought this for my son and he absolutely loves it.  The picture quality, stabilization and color balance are fantastic.

I am very happy to receive my Christmas gift and to thank God for such an incredible gift, nothing is more important than the family and saving those beautiful memories with such an incredible camera was an unexpected but incredible gift I could save the beautiful Christmas moments of this  year 2019 and by 2020 new memories blessings.

This thing is great! Amazing product for the price. Got it in today and took it out in the pool with the kids for a test drive. Easy enough for my 8yr old to use and the water resistance was perfect. 4K video is 25fps but still comes out with crisp video. Can’t wait to take this on some family trips.
Bought this camera to take to Sea Base with my grandson. Did great!

The reviews looked fine so I decided to give this a try. What a mistake. I followed all the instructions, bought the right mico sd card, formatted, fully charged battery. But then every time I record a video the screen freezes and no video is saved. It can take pictures fine but when I view photos on my laptop, I saw that I was missing an entire day's worth.What a waste of time and money.
I loved this product! My kids wanted to start a YouTube channel and we bought this so they can use it to take around different places, it's small and works great!
I purchased this camera for a specific project, but after working with it I was so impressed that it’s become my go-to camera... it may well become yours.  You can beat the price ... or the value!
No instructions.  Not senior friendly at all. Hard to open.  Wifi doesn't work for it even after googling all the information about the product.  Waste of money for myself.

This is most definitely the best camera for the money. The quality of the video is so unreal and I love it so much I just ordered my 2nd one. I would highly recommend anyone looking for a action camera to really consider the Akaso.

I bought the camera for snowmobiling with my boys to have memories that will last.  Even though I have it mounted to the hood of one of my snowmobiles the picture quality is very good and not shaky.  The case keeps the camera dry and didn't fog up the lens in the cold.  Looking forward to trying them out on a jet ski this summer.  I would buy again.
Really good camera for the price. Lacks certain features like zoom, but works well for outdoors
Bought for active grandson. Mounts on bike, scooter, helmet, or tripod to post video of flips, jumps, and crashes. Post on line. Easy for 8 yo to use. Never regret the purchase.

I was not sure what to buy for walking around and biking in the neighborhood. This worked out great and I can also put in my car window if I need. It came with so many pieces and I was not sure how to use them all. Overall, I am glad I bought this as I am not tech saavy.
Work just like my GoPro.  WiFi connects easily to iPhone though their app.  Fantastic for the price!
So my mistake was trying to use a action camera as a dash cam, excellent video but not what it was intended for. Thanks for correcting me.

Great camera! I can’t tell a difference between GoPro. I have 2 GoPro cameras, and so far I can’t tell a difference in anything battery life or picture quality. The other up side is it comes with tons of accessories that you have to buy with the GoPro.I would recommend to anybody!
Not what I expected.
Works ok good price

My daughter wanted a GoPro for her birthday for her first attempt in video recording.  We opted for this lower cost camera as a trial.  Three months in, it's still going strong!  Picture quality is excellent, the wifi signal works flawlessly - she's a happy camper!  I'd buy it again!

My AKASO EK7000 arrived in mint condition. It is small and carries well. I carry it everywhere and can take pictures when I see a good photo op.  It takes good pictures.  I have not tried it under water yet but I did test the case under water and there were no leaks so it should protect my camaraderie.

I was looking for a reasonably priced action camera with a remote for snowmobile riding. This is good quality for the money and easy to use. I would by again. Beats the name brand product at 3 times the price.

Camera operates and functions very well, i use it mainly for band performances and cover videos. image quality is great, i used to have a go pro but lost it, was going to buy another one but ended up getting a few of these bad boys for the same price as a single GoPro, does everything i need it to!

My 8 yr old son bought this with his own money and he is using it like a go pro on his motorcycle helmet. It works fantastically and is easy enough for him to totally operate himself. He has figured out all the settings for pictures and video, so it's pretty user friendly.

We bought this camera to take with us on a trip to Cancun, Mexico to capture our experiences snorkeling among other things.  The underwater videos (4K and 1080p) we recorded turned out really good as well as the ones that were taken on land.  The camera comes with a variety accessories to use and two batteries.  The battery life was better than expected.  You can't beat this little camera for the price as compared to the hundreds that you would spend on a GoPro.  I would definitely recommend this camera to anyone!
loved everything about this camera... great picture and excellent accessories. Totally worth it!
So glad I didn't bother paying for a GoPro. This works just as well, in my opinion.
Wasn't bad... Right side button broke after 4th time of using... CUSTOMER SERVICE IS NON EXISTENT!!!!!!!!!
Great value for the money.

i was looking to buy a high priced camera but then i found this. this product has a great quality for the price. i use it to film my motorcycle rides. its the perfect product for me. i used it today on just a small ride and the video quality was perfect. i could read the licences plates fine and it got some great shots of the view. im gonna order 3 more!

I have never owned a go pro, but i always wanted to try and capture some video of my outdoor adventures. I was very reluctant to try this unknown brand, but after seeing all the positive ratings and the great price, I figured it wouldn't  be the worst investment I ever made if it didn't work. I should also add that this company offers free gifts for your reviews which might be a motivation for all the glowing reviews. Disclosure: I have no involvement or affiliations with this company and have not applied for the free gift.So, I am not a tech geek or a technology master by any stretch. I typically dread having to deal what seems like a never ending battle of technical glitches with computers in constant need of updates, and compatibility issues with this or that device or program.

I bought this camera to record videos during my motorcycle rides and I have owned a Gopro in the past and I would say this camera is great for the money. Great picture quality and decent stabilization. I havent used it underwater yet so I cant comment on that. But based on my usage so far I can say that you cant go wrong at this price point.
We used this on our most recent vacation. It took high resolution pictures underwater, and above. It's a fraction of the cost of the GoPro. Nice buy.
Great little camera. Super lightweight. Great choice over the much more expensive cameras.

Used this camera on a recent Idaho hunting trip. Camera held up great and captured the scenery much better than my iPhone X. Audio was a little muffled in the protective case which is to be expected. But 5 stars for the value vs price especially when compared to the more popular GoPro.

I love this little camera, I put it in my scooter and it has very amazing quality!! The recording is awesome. Water proof!!. It came on time, very good experience with this camera. Better then Go pro.

Sound was bad, video was bad, but hey, it worked. Wasn't really expecting much for the price, but it works fine if you can't afford a gopro. If you can, definitely go for that, you shouldn't be recording anything on this that you want to display. It did have one issue of corrupted data when I tried to get the videos from the memory card the first time, have yet to run into that again though.

I've had my camera for a little while now and stopped using it when I noticed the audio quality was garbage. How do you fix the audio issue? I was walking around the office, narrating, and it barely picked up my voice in a quiet office setting, no background noise. Is this thing defective, or is it made to be crappy on purpose?

Before anything I need to say that an action camera with all the accessories that you get with this one, for a little over $80 is a great deal. However the word "great" starts loosing value as you start using the camera. First, this is the least durable action camera. I used it in my racing mini quad(drone) and after a crash or two the screen is messed up, the battery door got lost and the whole thing started to fall apart and the worst part is that the camera didn't touch anything in any of the crashes. Action cameras are always at risk so you want something durable. Second, the footage is is very disappointing. At 60 frames you get a lot of blur, low light detail loss is an issue even when there is light and colors are washed out. I really wanted this camera to work so it would embarrass companies like GoPro that inflate their prices just because the name but it didn't do it for me.

I was skeptical at first due to price of the product. Once I received the product I was extremely surprised and pleased with the product and all it’s accessories. Due to the price and quality I shared my purchase with family and friends. I also plan on purchasing several cameras for Christmas gifts. Thank you..

Was in the market for a go-pro type camera, but couldn't see spending the money for a go-pro. This got the job done for the right price. Easy to use and good image quality. Haven't put it through any rigorous tests, but it survived on my backpack walking in the freezing temperatures.

This is a great starter camera for me being my first of this type. The picture quality is clean and had no issues with image stability. I like it a lot and looking into getting some cool accessories for it too

I have 3 trailers so I find my myself hooking up to a trailer a lot. I back into a trailer so much that I am pretty good at doing it by myself but rarely do it get it in the first try. I started looking at truck backup cameras and all of the wireless ones had just average ratings and were $150 or more. One of the bad reviews mentioned that they used an action camera and it worked great. I found this one for half the price and it fits my needs plus I might actually use it as an action camera. Obviously it wouldnt be ideal to use as your everyday backup camera but for hooking up to a trailer it works great.
This Camera is a great alternative to a expansive camera brand like gopro. It came well packaged and I cant wait to use it while camping on fourth of July.

The quality of the pictures were really good. The quality in video was good. When you created a video and it was inside the casing you could not hear the people talking. The battery would only last about 50 minutes fully charged. Good thing it came with two batteries. A lot of accessories included which was a huge plus. If you think about it the camera is only $59 while the accessories added $20 to the total value

I haven't gotten the chance to take this camera out on the slopes yet but from the pictures and video I have recorded, it seems to be exactly what I was looking for. For those of you looking for great pictures and video at a reasonable price, this is the action camera to buy! The package deal with the AKASO EK7000 makes it that much better! It comes with multiple attachments and the REMOTE which is perfect when the camera is attached to your helmet and its difficult to reach. It is also compatible with a 64 GB memory card, allowing for extra storage space. The second battery that comes with the package is a great add too!
We love this camera. The quality of the camera is amazing. Only thing that we noticed is that the sound quality isn’t that great but the picture quality makes up for that!
Really impressed with the quality of the camera for the price point and being able to connect wirelessly with my phone is a huge plus and simple to do

This is the first small action camera that I have purchased. I bought it for an upcoming trip to Hawaii where I will be using it mainly for snorkeling. So far I have loved the camera every minute since I have opened the box. It is small, compact and very simple to use. It comes with several accessories in the basic package and it is at a great price. The pictures I have taken so far have been great and I have tested it out in the pool with great results and no issues with any water leaks. I look forward to using it on my vacation and don't believe I will have any reason to regret this purchase.

bought it for a trip to bali, thailand and the Philippines and it broke on the 2nd use in Thailand. would not charge and the case lock would not close. contacted customer service and they ignored my complaints. i was able to get 50% refund from amazon customer service not the companys customer serice. I would not recommend (very cheap)
Great for someone who wants a action camera and doesn’t want to spend a lot of money. Got the for Christmas and have used it a few times.The picture and sound is good.

Son used it for a concert in front of 15,000 people and it was great. Sound wasn't tested as he used it for a shot down the neck of his guitar, but the video was clear and they cropped it into the stage video. Pretty cool.

Video is very good - audio is incredibly disappointing though. Almost embarrassing. You can barely hear the voice of the person wearing it, let alone anyone they’re having a conversation with. Genuine review: 5 star for video, 1 star for audio, hence 3 star average.

After using this camera for a week, this is the best possible camera you can get for the price in my opinion. I am very happy with my purchase. I purchased this one for my son, but will be buying another one for myself as well...great price, great quality...a combo that is tough to beat.

The camera does everything you expect it to. The picture is clear and app works great! For 50$ you can't go wrong! The added mounts maklde this an insta buy for me, especially since its computable with go pro accessories.
Durable unit great value for the price would highly recommend
For the money is great so far. Helmet mounted for riding quad.

This camera is very decent quality for the price! I was stunned by how clear is the quality is and how many accessories came with the device. I am continuing to test it out in different situations (pool, hike in the rain, trampline, etc). I am college student who lacks the budget for a device like the GoPro cameras so this is a very nice alternative!
Daughter fav xmas present

I use this camera while commuting on a motorcycle. The video quality is great and the app is easy to use. Love that it comes with 2 batteries and a charging station. Just wish the batteries lasted a bit longer, but having 2 of them makes up for that.

Overall a good cam for the price. good picture quality and the waterproof case also serves as nice impact protection. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because while it comes with over a dozen ways to mount it, there are no instructions at all about how to use any of the mounts.

This was a gift and I am so happy with it, great accessories and compatible with gopro stuff.  High quality with nice resolution for on the go video recording.  Perfect as a dash cam too.  I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice mini action camera, you will not be disappointed…
For the price of the camera it’s what you expect. Operates as promised. Good quality.

I was looking for an action camers for an upcoming trip. I wasn't willing to spend $400 for a camera with a fancy name. This camera does everyone that I wanted it to. Great video quality, lightweight and easy to mount on almost everything, and comes with lots of accessories.
Very pleased with the cameraGreat assortment of accessories

I love that the camera is small and compact but has great image quality. It is helping me free up space on my phone but not using my phone to record so much. Great accessory come with it. It fits in my purse and ready to go when I need it.
This camera is just as good as a go pro. Nice clear pictures and videos.

Love this camera. Works great and quality is great. Use it for mountain biking and it's great.  For the price, you get alot of extra accessories.  2 batteries is a nice surprise. I have no issues with this camera and recommend it to anyone looking for a more budget friendly action camera.

Just gave it to my 9 year old daughter who loves taking videos on my phone!  So far, so good!  Was easy for me to set up, now just have to figure out all the mounts and pieces!  I was a little disappointed that it didn’t come with an SD card, as I thought it did.

As advertised. Great action camera, no frills needed. This little camera has everything you need and more, without the high price tag. For casual users this is perfect! I also bought a compatible pet harness and can’t wait to use this at the beach with my pup! This comes with all accessories you could possibly want, plus the opportunity for a few more if you write a review. I recommend checking out tutorials on YouTube for info on how to use each attachment.

You can't find a better $60 camera on the market. I've used this for baseball and go karting and it has surpassed my expectations. The interface is easy to use as well as the app for the iphone. If you're looking for a beginners camera to learn the basics of action shooting this is your best bet.

You’re not going to get something as good as a GoPro for this price, but it’s not a bad product. Just don’t go into it thinking you’re going to outsmart the world by getting a GoPro-quality camera for a steal.

We just received our camera today. We couldn’t wait to use it. Downloaded the user manual, charged the battery and headed to the lake. I must say, the picture quality is superb. It is easy to use and comes with plenty of accessories to configure it any way you want. The remote is super cool. Recommend highly.

I just received the camera and l certainly enjoy using it. The only thing you have to make sure is to get a micro SD card that is at least “10 class”  otherwise you will not see all the video options available such as 4K or 1080 60 FPS. I have used it around the house taking pictures and video and so far it delivers good quality. I plan on using it on my vacation next week, can’t wait!

I bought the camera for my husband who’s a chef and wanted one to use while cooking and also for outdoor activities. It works great and convenient for use. It was perfect since it works just as good as a higher end camera and has the same features basically but half the cost.

I bought this for my daughter that used it on her travels throughout Europe.  She has taken it cave diving, swimming and hiking.  It works very well and the video quality is top notch.  The best feature of this camera is that it floats.
Great camera at a great price, lots of mounts to choose from. I plan on using it for mountain biking.
This is an amazing alternative to GoPro. The accessories are nice quality and have a wide variety of options. We couldn’t believe that this camera was such great quality for a quarter of the price.

I loved the price of course, and as a Science teacher I have found it valuable to use outside of the classroom to video different things that I use in my teaching to show kids different phenomena.The size and ease of use is great!

This camera works great. I thought that 50$ for everything it comes with was to good to be true but when I received it it blew me away as to how well it actually works. It has many different attachments, 2 batteries, and much more. The wide angle view is great for capturing everything you could need in a shot.

The company gives free items to people that post 5 star reviews, but the truth is the camera freezes constantly and won't video for more than a minute. Better to spend your money on go pro.. at least it's worth it for $100 extra.
works good for the u.t.v

I provide videographer services to my marketing clients and so far, I am really pleased with the quality of footage I get as well as how easy it is to use. I’m taking it to get footage of a bike ride this weekend along Florida’s Forgotten Coast. Super excited!

Are there better cameras out there? yeah. But this is a great deal at this price point. The picture is good. The color is more true to life than a certain famous brand, although that brand does do a little better in low light. The start/stop remote is super handy. All of the accessories are handy, and This kit gives you crazy amounts of accessories.

Image quality is good, the colors are vibrant and the in-camera sharpening is not too strong.The first device I received was defective because of a misaligned sensor, but the seller was quick to process the return and issue a re-order.  At under $50 you cannot go wrong with this camera and customer service is good!

This camera is simple and does a great job capturing pictures and video. Make sure to download the apps for either Android or Iphone and you can control the camera with your phone. One note though, the instructions will say maximum size SD card is 32gb. I have a 64gb card and have had no issues.

Did a lot of research over the past 2 weeks deciding what brand and make to get. Finally decided to spend a little now and upgrade later. But after playing with this for a few days, I see no need to upgrade anytime soon. This camera is all I wanted it to be. Awesome product for fraction of what a "name brand" would cost

This package contains a ton of mounts. If you were thinking of spending $300 on the expensive brand, don't do it. This one is great! I especially liked the remote access. It also has Wifi to connect to the app on your phone. Overall a great camera!

This is a 12 megapixel camera with 4K video. Waterproof case is good and numerous attachments for mounts are included. Photo quality is less than average compared to my iPhone 6s and I can not get videos to play at all. Overall I would spend a few extra dollars and buy a better platform to capture life with.
It's a nice product,  I can't wait to use it more each day.

I am still getting the hang of this camera but so far it's been great. I wear it on my lacrosse helmet and it picks up everything fine. My only gripe with it is that the batteries don't last too long so you have to record wisely.

This was my first AKASO camera, I bought it for our Disney Family cruise. When I came home I retrieved all the videos, and they were beautiful. I misplaced the camera and have no idea where it is, so I went out and purchased a second one from Amazon. I love this camera also

Purchased this camera as a gift for my husband.  The camera comes with multiple accessories and is waterproof.  The picture quality is excellent with a much cheaper price tag compared to a GoPro.  Camera is easy to use.  So far, we have been very pleased with this camera and would highly recommend it to anyone.
It is very helpful specially for a ballroom dance teacher like me!It captures the dance steps and patterns very well in a good, fine, wide angled manner.

Not good in low light or for any situation where you dont want fisheye obviously but if you're using it as intended on a sunny day the footage is amazing and it comes with about a million accessories. Comes with 2 batteries which is enough for a whole day of snowboarding.

This camera is the same exact as a GoPro but hundreds of dollars less! The camera quality is great, the audio is good, and the camera is easy to use! The app allowed me to upload all my pictures and videos in seconds! Amazing camera, must buy!

Camera has great quality, very small and portable but the screen is just the right size. Love the watch, so helpful when you have the camera strapped to something. Overall would recommend to others, especially for the price.

Do not buy if you expect to be able and get any type of support! I have not been able to get it to work with my iPhone app. I was not able to get the camera to connect with my phone. That would not have been a big thing but was not able to download in a format that my sd card or computer would recognize. Neet little camera seems to be well made from what I could see was picture quality was good.
Excellent equipment.  Pictures are clear.  Good quality.  Battery life is good.  The water proof case is strong and  the sound is pretty clear.

Super easy to operate. Love that it comes with two batteries and a dual charger. Bought this for a cruise I’ll be going on but obviously been playing with it. Worth more than what I paid for but since I’m not paying for a “name” it’s the best deal hands down.
It's not a bad unit if you're not willing to spend the money on the higher quality cameras. Bought it for hunting but it's hard to use in a pinch.
Great deal, great product. After looking at the reviews, I decided to take a chance on this. Glad I did, saved cash vs the other brand and it works great!
Me gusta bastante la grabación, no soy de marcas y gracias a esta camarita sigo siendo igual.Buen video buenas fotos.
A little shakey when running but overall it's a nice camera for the price
I think this is a good action camera for a great price. Got it for my kid on Christmas. He loves it. He is beginning to use it a lot. The camera has nice camera quality and is definitely worth it.
Did great in the mountains on a snowboarding trip fun watching my buddies face  plant.

I received this camera as a gift and just recently used it on my hike up Mt. Bierstadt and Mt. Elbert in Colorado last week.  I have had no problems and it just a great little camera.  Long battery life, light weight, great quality pictures and video.  I am very happy that I received this.

We got this just for something to play with in the pool, biking, etc. So far we have been happy with the camera. The build isn't the most solid, but keeping it in the protective case I sure will help. Menu is a little clunky, but really for the price tag and features, I really can't complain.

I was skeptical about buying a camera at this price point.  I bought it for a trip to the keys where we needed something to record our time on the boat.  I am blown away by the picture quality and ease of use.  I have recommended it to all of my friends to buy for their boats.

Was looking for action camera that was simple to use and didn't break the bank.  You can't go wrong with this product.  Fantastic camera! Simple to learn.  Great product and easy to use.  Highly recommend over the other higher priced models for a great camera. Family friendly!

Husband bought a flying boat, Yes, you read that correctly and I bought this camera with the accessory pack to attach to the boat to capture his adventures. Awesome camera, great quality picture, small, easy to use, simple instructions. Definitely recommend. Has multiple uses.

The product arrived on time,  The camera was packaged very well and has just about every accessory you would need for action use. Quality of the camera itself is 5 star. Ease of use is 5 star and the picture quality for video and still shots is 5 star.  The price is 5 star as compared to name brand cameras with the same features. It can't be beat. I have several friends with GoPro's and this is a quality product in their opinion as well.  Haven't had a ton of use but I will update as I use the camera.
Lots of accessories, 2 batteries, lightweight.

Purchased this camera for a week long trip to Colorado, spent some time riding in the mountains with lots of dust and took it white water rafting. It handled it all and the battery lasted longer than the someone else's GoPro that was with us. Overall I'm very happy with the purchase.

Great little camera. Needed one for the boat to capture fishing fun- so easy with the little wifi remote. Have two more on order. Great complete kit out of the box. Plan on setting one up for underwater use to video fish coming up.
Images displayed with a blacked out area in the lower right quandrant on both the camera and the iPhone. The item was apparently shipped with a cluster of dead pixels on the camera sensor.
use this for my motorcycle just for any liability purposes. Works great for what I need. Also, if I end up breaking it or it's stolen, it doesn't cost a lot like a go pro so that's a plus.
I really like the video quality, that’s mainly what I purchased it for and great value for the price, only thing I  would change would be having more specific instructions. Love it so far.
I use this for live racing video as at the track. Works good
Was WAY smaller than expected. Never used & wasn’t able to return.
The batteries only last about 30 minutes.  Could be my settings.

Awesome camera while it lasted. Bought for adventurous son for his 8th birthday to record some of the trip we took to the beach to celebrate the big day. Got plenty of footage around the condo after setting up the camera.  Unfortunately he ran into the ocean with it and lost it as soon as a wave hit him. 😭

I am very pleased with this camera. I can't give it 5 stars until I put it to the test. The mic. audio is awesome, and the video quality is even better. Tons of accessories, and I used it for youtube vlogging and it was perfect quality. The price is great compared to GoPros, and they are around the same. This camera has a lot of features to it to fit your every need.

I gave all medium stars because it forces you to write a review in order to receive the SD card. Without the SD card you can’t even use the camera so I have no idea if the quality of the camera is good or not. Anywho, this review is specifically so I can receive my “free accessories”.

I ordered the camera and received it the other day, and it appears to work great! I love the picture quality and the video quality. The sound quality for play back is a bit quiet, but when uploaded on the computer, the sound quality is great!  Excellent product and Excellent variery of mounts that are included. For someone who is looking for an alternative Action Camera instead of the GoPro series,  this would be efficient enough to take pictures and record videos.
The AKA50 EK7000 was easy to setup and simple to use. Time will tell if it holds up as well as my other, more expensive camera.

Just received the camera today and it works phenomenally. The packaging of the product was very protective and neat. The accessories that come along with it are a great bonus. At least Akaso provides you with some accessories, unlike some other brands. The video quality of the 1080p and 4k were great! The manual needs some tweaking for it is not very clear on how to operate the camera, but if you're electronic friendly, you will get around it. I am satisfied with my purchase and will be telling my friends and family about this budget friendly product. Great product so far and looking forward to purchasing more in the future.
Great camera. Bought as a birthday gift for my 10 year old and he loves it! Only problem has been the metal on the waterproof case is beginning to rust after using it in the water only 3 times.

Very satisfied with the purchased. Good live action camera with good quality video and photo with a bunch of accessories. The only downside is there is no instruction for how to use all the accessories although you can find it on youtube. Also there is no app barcode included either.

Just as good as GoPro, a fraction of the price and it comes with a stack of accessories?!!! I have two of these cameras and I love them. I'm sure there are some ultra nerds who can tell the difference but I'm an early adopting tech geek myself and I'm happy, extremely happy.
Great price

This thing is awesome!  Save your money and don't waste your time with the big name brand, buy two of these and a bunch of memory cards for the same price and record your vacation like a pro.  Might even make you famous on one of those viral video sites :).

I used it all last summer. It was great. The app takes some getting used to and it’s buggy. But for the price I paid I half expected it. True wide angle lens and great quality on the video. Even with the waterproof housing you can still pick of noise just fine.
dont buy finally gpt it to work one day tst video and now the camer will not stay on.only a month and a half

Just took this skiing and for the price it’s awesome.  Really pleased.  Plan on using this for snorkeling and surfing here soon.  Also love that it connects to an app on my phone so it’s easy to upload pictures and videos.
Bought this for my son for Christmas. He loves it!!

I was very excited for this product to arrive and upon first glance was great!  Unfortunately when looking into the product more I hooked it up to my computer to test it out.  There I could visibly see a hair, bubble or some sort of fiber that is very evident when capturing film.  I have filed a refund request and plan on reordering this product.  I will update this review once I have received the next camera and tested it out.

We bought this for our 8 year old for Xmas.  He was estancia.  It gets the job done for the fraction of the price of a GoPro.  It comes with a huge amount of accessories that I still have no idea what are used for.  The one thing that kind of bothers me is the battery life...one 30 minute video is all we can get out of one charge cycle.
