I recently used this camera to record a 5K that involves plenty of mud and it worked great! Waterproof case kept the camera from getting dirty or wet and the image resolution was great! One thing to add is you can’t get any sound if you use the waterproof case, which is understandable!
What can I say, for the price this sport camera is stellar. Comes with a bunch of mounting accessories. Easy to use. Interface is good. I'm looking forward to trying out that 98ft underwater aspect
I love this thing! Item is exactly as described!It comes with EVERYTHING!

I love this think...most of the bells and Whistles of a GO PRO for a 3rd pf the price. Great for 90% of regular users and you can't really tell the difference from the over priced  equivalents. Great buy for anyone looking to get into the Action Pro world or looking for an affordable upgrade.

Purchased in 2018, I wanted an action camera, but didn't want to commit to a big price since we only use it on family vacations.  I've had no issues, it's performed in all kinds of environments.  Totally worth it.  You do have to format the SD card before first use, but once that's done it's good to go.

This is a perfect camera for me--takes great pictures--and video--and is small enough to put in a front pocket and forget about it until it is needed.  Transferring pictures over wi-fi  can be a  bit tricky, but overall you can't beat this little gem for the money.

My daughter is 9 and wanted a camera that could be used to take pictures and video and be able to be used underwater.  She saved her money and bought this.  She loves to take videos and pictures on it! Great quality for such  a good price!!

Excellent camera!  I would compare it to a GoPro and for way less money. I have used it in snow,desert, and water. It comes with two batteries which is good because battery life could be better.Overall I am happy with it and will be using it for a hunt next week!
I snagged this on lightening deal.  For the price this camera delivers a great picture and value.  The sound is not great, but that was not important to me.
The camera is above avg and does a good job.

Bought for my grandson for Easter. Worked at first then would not let him power on. Very disappointing..called and they are sending a replacement , however it is taking a long time to get. So when we do get it im keeping my fingers crossed it works this time!

Not a bad action camera. The remote is a nice feature that isn't on many lower end action cams. 1080 at 60 fps for under 100 bucks is really good. The dynamic range isn't the best, and the sound is terrible through the plastic case (this also happens with real Gopros). However overall its great for beginners and is easy to use.
Good quality worth your money. For the price its a must have. I use this camera whenever I drive around. It comes with accessories.

I use this for taking videos of my bee hives...captures excellent sound and image quality! Check out my videos on YouTube by searching for my channel BeeTrapping by Christopher Myers and look for the video titled landing board I used this Akaso camera for it.

Bought this little while back and used several times. Picture and video for price is pretty good. Sound is alright, and not near as good in the waterproof case, (to be expected). Good little action camera and even better price. Thank you

The image quality is great! Almost like a go-pro but 1/10 of the price. May not be the best if you're looking for action sport shots and also has a short battery life if you're in the cold (like skiing), but perfect for cruising and nature viewing! Highly recommend for the quality and price
Customer service made sure that I was happy and satisfied, keep up the great work.

I love that this little camera is so easy to use. I bought it for a trip to the Galapagos Islands . I am getting the hang of using it before I go . So I dont miss a thing. I read other reviews and have discovered they were true. It is just as good as the go-pro. But much cheaper.

I have had no issues with this camera, my GoPro broke and I didn’t want to shell out the money for a new one. This one looks identical and costs 1/6th the price. It comes with a ton of accessories and it fits my go pro mounts!
Se ve un poco oscura la imagen

Easy to get started, works as it should, and video quality is great. You get tons of accessories and two batteries. Just pop in your MicroSD card and start a journey! Going to purchase more and give them as gifts this year!

Currently a student living in Puerto Rico and I wanted a cheap underwater camera for my beach travels. I am happy with the quality of the camera and all of the accessories it includes. This is a great purchase once you know how to use it :)
The camera is not too bad actually. The sound is awful.  The app is terrible.  The Wi-Fi seems to work OK but the app makes it pretty useless.
Bought it for my grandkids to learn how to make movies

I bought this for my son for Christmas so that he could record his snowboarding trips.  This is an amazing camera for the price.  The picture quality is great for what he uses it for.  The battery life is a little short but the two included batteries together last a while.
My son lost his go pro. Does the same tho g no joke!

Everything was nice and price/performance was great for a month - after it just stoped starting up. It shows startup logo and then freezes - doesn't connect to any device nor starts up on its own. So contacted technical support - ended up with returning item, just before packaging I removed SD card and deleted content tried again and it worked.So camera will not work if SD card is totaly full. Seller sent me another free camera for my trouble.

We've used the AKASO to film our family vacations for the past year.  We purchased the protective case and "extra" devices to use the camera: at the lake, beach, etc.  My daughter has easily taken the videos and put them to music and on a stick for us to watch, reflect, and remember the great times.

This product should be commended for the packaging and accessories but the camera itself cannot be recommended. The quality of the camera is just below expectation, an android camera is better than that of this camera. There is really no 4K quality it’s just so disappointing and stressful.

The camera is great. It’s light weight, and the 4K videos are fantastic. The only challenge that I have had is that when using the waterproof housing to record a video you are unable to use the microphone- which would have been helpful when film videos above water ... like when in a kayak.
I can’t believe people buy Go Pro’s for as much $$ as they do. This is the real deal. I was so skeptical at first but I thought “what harm could it to do try?” and I am so glad I ordered it.
Got this for my boyfriend soo he can showMe his 4 wheeler adventures it has great quality videos very clear we cant wait to use it for our future vacation!!

Great Product at a Great Price. With all attachment, extra battery, and remote wrist band. As good or better than product that cost $200 more. Thanks Akaso, keep up the great work. Highly Recommended A++
Took it to Disney—loved it!  It doesn’t do low light, but in outdoor settings the pictures are clear and crisp. Great shutter speed and water captures.
I liked that the camera came with different mounting plates. Unit was easy to hook up to phone. Camera comes ready to go minus the sd card. I would definitely buy another one.

Bought this for a Christmas present for my husband. He absolutely loves it. It did come with the stuff to mount to different things. Takes awesome pictures. He loves the fact that it's wifi enabled. The only thing is, I wish it came with the micro SD card.

Love love love, got it for a gift for my boyfriend’s nephew and he is obsessed! Just as good as a $400 dollar GoPro. Only thing is it’s not touch screen but once you learn how to use it, it’s so easy!

The shooting quality is very good. It came with a lot of accessories already, including a remote controller!! How nice is this!Really don't have anything to complain about with a $60 package. Haven't tested underwater performance yet, I will keep following the review. Glad I had this product!

We put the camera underwater to film some green sea turtles in Hawaii, and it was amazing. It looked like discovery channel footage when we put it on the TV. Battery life was great, pictures on land and underwater were all great
Picture is great! Sound is very muffled when the camera is in the waterproof case.

My wife and I got them this to document our trip in key west! This is exactly what we needed. It comes with many different mounts. We used this to video spearfishing/snorkeling adventures under water and it takes regular pictures also. For the money you can’t beat it! Very satisfied. The only thing you will need extra is a micro SD card.
Just realized that the battery life is really short and the stability is not good as well.
Awesome action camera. Very easy to use. High quality video. Seller is amazing. I had a problem with the batteries and they went out of their way to make it right. A+ service.

I thought this wouldn’t be the best action camera but it turns out it’s amazing. I use this to film mountain biking and it has some great picture quality and it’s very stable. I will probably use this in the ocean to film how I snorkel as well.
Amazing camera, I love it, we use it to film horseback rides and I attach it to rc airplane. I have always wanted an action cam but i couldn't afford one until now, thanks akaso

BETTER quality and LESS expensive than a GoPro!We bought this to take on our vacations we have planned, we took it on a helicopter last weekend to try it out and could not be more pleased. I have recommended this product to all of my friends and family!! PLUS it comes with so many gadgets and mounts that you pay extra for with a GoPro.

I bought this for my boyfriends motorcycle and it's nice to be able to go back and view our ride from the camera's perspective. The picture is crisp and clear and we've had no issues with keeping it in place on the motorcycle. Would recommend this product!
This is one of the best low-priced  best action cameras.The picture quality is good and the waterproof housing works perfect.
At first glance it seems to be a good camera. Def good for the price and compared to other name  brand cameras. Time will tell how it will survive.
I bought 3 of these for my grandkids and they absolutely love them. They take them camping and fishing,picture quality is excellent,good battery life,can’t get any better for the price.
Great camera for the price

Video lags when you watch it from memory card. Quality isn’t what I thought it’d be. Camera gets super hot when in use and ends up powering off. Save your money a purchase a real GoPro instead of this

I was a bit skeptical at first, but I've had it my Akaso 7000 for a few weeks now and I must say that I love it. You can't beat it for the price.Controls are a little strange and take some getting used to but the picture quality is pretty good. You won't regret it.

We are so impressed with the quality of this product. So much better than paying $200+ for something that works just as good. The quality of the video is excellent. It is the perfect size for carrying and traveling. We are so excited to continue to use this product!

So far I'm so happy that I bought an Amazon Warehouse unit. I saved about $13 for a new unit in a very minimal damaged box. Hopefully I will be able to update this review soon on the functionality of the unit.

This is a awesome substitute for an GoPro if you do not want to spend 3x the price! They have an app, which allows you to connect to the camera. The app allows camera timer and review the image before taking the picture. I truly enjoy this feature! I definitely recommend this product!

The latch of the waterproof cover popped up on the second day. I put it back in and tightened the screw. But it popped up again. I think the latch fixing quality is bad. I haven't even tried to use the camera underwater, and I'm afraid to try. Going to return it back (

so I needed an action camera for my traxxas aton but didnt wanna drop a bunch of money on a gopr. so i found this one and it is a great camera have a 64gb micro sd in there and it works great and cheaper then a gopr plus has a screen on the back unlike the hero 3 i was gonna buy so... yes iwould deffinently buy again and recommend this plus all the extras it comes with
This camera is perfect for my 10 year old grandson.  He wants to be able to create videos with his RC cars.The camera is good quality, easy to use and has plenty of accessories to get him started.
This camera is great for what I use it for. I use it for making training and how to videos.
Such an amazing product, Can not beat the price! Better than a GoPRO 5
For the price this is a great camera kind of cheap casing but I would rather buy one of these than a GoPro

This is a great Camera overall I gave it an overall 4 stars just for a minor defect in the camera. Once I turn the camera on it works great but if I turn if off  and try to turn it back on it doesn't work unless I take the battery out of the camera and put it back in and it resets itself.

I ordered this for my son, I did not want to spend a ton on a camera/ video camera. He has been want to make movies so I thought this would work for him. When we got it I could not believe the quality. Now I want one for me. And for under $100 you really can’t bet it.

Great camera for the price! I have used a G.P. before and this camera is just about the same for a fraction of the price! Only recommendation I would give to buyers who want to shoot 4k video is get at least a 64GB, or larger, micro SD card. I have a 32GB but it can only shoot 20mins of 4k video. No fault of the camera, 4k just takes up A LOT of space. Correction: I had to format my card with this camera and it will hold more 4K video.

If you’re looking for a great affordable action can’t go wrong with this one! Footage is clear and so are the pictures. It comes with plenty of accessories and extras to get you by for whatever you may need.
Great picture . When using water proof case your recorded volume is very low . But great product . So happy we go it for our summer vacation .

So far so good! Can't beat the price! The attachments took a little figuring out but I got it all figured out in about an hour. The underwater photos aren't that great, but it's nice to know if it's in its case and I drop it in the snow or puddle it will be okay. Takes great videos. I got my money's worth out of it on one vacation.

software and wireless control work flawlessly.  The picture and camera lens quality is...OK. I'd say 320p quality. The camera struggles with vibration inside on my FZ09; and, when riding at night it glares in light showing that the software isn't quite good enough to process the light.You get quite a bit of good with the purchase though. The actual picture and video software could be a lot better.
Purchased for my son and it was defective. The sound was messed up as if someone swam with it....so unfortunate! Return...

Just awesome!  You would think based on the price that there is no way it's even remotely comparable to any Go Pro camera.  But the Akaso EK7000 does just that.  It even comes with a lot of accessories all packed together for under $80.  You have all you need to start shooting right away.  Not to mention the camera can shoot in 4k.  I love mine and hope whoever reads this considers it as a great alternative to Go Pro.  I have nothing against Go Pros.  But if you want to shoot incredible video on your adventures while on a budget then pick this up right now.

Bought this for my son. Took it skiing last week and took some great video especially of jumps and wood skiing. Easy to use for first time. The images and audio are both crisp and clear. I would recommend highly.

I bought this camera to take with me snowboarding, and I consider it a piece of my riding gear now. It takes excellent video and photos both at night, and during the day (I've personally done both). The remote comes in handy on the mountains so you don't have to keep taking your gloves off. The app helps with reviewing the pictures you've taken throughout the day, and deleting them if you don't like them or if you're just trying to clear space. All in all, I would recommend this camera to anyone that's looking for an action camera.
Not a bad camera. Sound quality is terrible had to buy a couple different external mics.

Update 3/24/2020. Company went above and beyond to make sure I have a product that works as described. They sent me a new updated camera that works great. I recommend this new camera if your looking for a reasonably priced 4k camera that get the job done.
I bought this camera to record our daughters 14u travel softball team. The set up was so easy and the camera has a very clear picture.

I’m so excited to continue to make videos! Price is the best part... you don’t feel guilty beating it up.After playing with it... easy to use. Great quality video. Even my 9 year old niece was making movies within minutes!!!

Hello hope I can help someone. So far this product seems like a quality product. It takes pretty good video. Volume is pretty good. The only this i have noticed is if the lighting isn't good the quality is great. But it is a nice small video camera.
Honestly it’s great! Could not tell much of a difference compared to an older model go pro! Haven’t tested it for the underwater feature mainly because I bought for riding footage.
This thing works great. I have three different brands and this is the best by far.
Was given as a gift to a teenager and she loved it.

My camera just stopped working one day. Never got wet or fell. The screen started to act up and freeze one day and it never went away. The camera itself took great video and pictures and I enjoyed the wifi feature but you get what you paid for.

This camera was a gift for my husband for christmas. When he opened the box the waterproof covers front lens was scratch so bad it looked like it had been previously bought dropped several times and then returned. We were about to pack it up and return it, but upon closer inspection we realized it had a film over the waterproof lens section, obviously for protection during manufacturing. We have yet to try it out, but it looks nice and you cannot beat the price. I only gave it four stars because we do not know about performance yet.
The customer service is great but the camera is only ok.

I just bought this camera 2 weeks ago and use it twice. Today I noticed while diving this morning small bubbles where coming out of water resistant from the on and off button.  When got home I opened the water resistant case and it had water in it and the camera was wet. OMG !!!

This camera was a top wish on my kids' Christmas list this year. My son was so excited, but when he went to charge the batteries, we noticed the charger was broken. He was left in a puddle of tears until he realized he could use his sister's charger in the meantime.

This is a great little camera that takes great footage. The documentation is a little weak. You can send files to a phone after installing the app. I'll have to play more and read the forums to find out how to transfer them directly to a computer. I wish it came with more accessories. Hopefully Akaso will send me some for writing this review.

I must admit that, for the price, I was skeptical, but soon found that the Akaso Action Camera was a great value at a bargain price. I had little experience with video cameras and was delighted to find short, explicit instructions. They were easy to understand and made using the camera just as easy, right from the start. Picture taking and video were even easier and more versatile with the remote control. I could not believe the endless combination of the accessories for attaching the camera to almost anything. This is a great camera package that is fun and easy to use. I give it five stars.D. Harmon III
Easy set up works well for my swim training analysis.
camera came with a lot of hardware and mounting options. two batteries and charger, fpr the money its a  nice option to the 300.00 gopro, easy to use.
This is a great deal if you're on the fence about getting yourself an "action" camera. Does everything the name-brand one does at a fraction of the price. Very easy to use, great image quality too.

I ordered this after reading all the reviews.I honestly wasn't expecting such high quality out of something in this price range. I was wrong. I've taken a couple under water shots, and they've come out crystal clear. I can't wait to do my bridal shoot underwater now!
Buena calidad de imagen, viene con varios accesorios y con dos baterías. Lo mejor, sin duda alguna, es el precio. Nada que envidiarle a una GoPro.
I bought this for my son and he loves it. He takes it along when we travel and has enjoyed trying it out underwater. It is a great camera that takes nice pics and videos. Would definitely recommend.

Great alternative to GoPro action camera I’ve used both this camera and the GoPro 5. Only advantage the Hero 5 has is the touch screen in the back and maybe higher frame rate but I can justify the price of the GoPro compared to this camera.
This camera has ok image quality. It has a short battery life when recording, only about 1 hour. It does not come with a memory card.Rated 3 stars because of the short recording time/ battery life.

This was given out as a gift.The comments that he had told me, was that he was finding that he could not place the camera where he wanted to on his helmet.  He used it a couple of times and did not have bad reviews.

I have not used it at all, so I can’t comment on performance. I was very excited to get this, but when I opened the box, the package itself looked used and the camera has beach sand all over it. I’ll be sending this back.
Great value compared to similar pro cameras. Easy to use and I loved the quality settings.

Spent the best part of the morning getting the camera set up to record our motorcycle trip. Linked it to the Wi-Fi on the phone and got a message that the camera and battery were overheating and needed to be returned! Yes, they were hot! Have to wait for a refund, then order another camera but new one will not get here in time. Haven't they heard of testing the equipment before it ships out?

This is a great camera for someone who isn't ready to take the GoPro plunge. It was easy to use and went really well with the little drone I got. The 4k, image could be better since thats the point, but the 1080p image is a fantastic quality. and again, for the price, I'm good with that.
I was so extremely anxious to use it.  it did arrive on time as promised.  Price ok.I had trouble identifying that there was Memory Card needed.  I think that should be more prominently displayed.
The camera has one of the worst picture and sound quality I've seen.
Great quality! Well put together starter kit. Love that it comes with two batteries. Can't wait for baseball to start gain to checkout the wide angle view of the game.

The video quality and price is pretty good. I'm not sure if it's the sound quality on the outgoing speaker, the mic, or something else, but the sound output is scratchy and unrecognizable. I'll update the review once I transfer the video and see how it sounds then.

I was looking for a cheaper alternative to the go pro and let me tell you this does everything i need it to for the price . I highly recommend you purchase this action camera (: great quality, great sound and easy to use !

This is the best bang for the buck in action cameras, good image quality, wifi pairing is easy, accesories included are enough to get you started using the camera right away. I have been using this for a couple days now and can't complain. The only downside is that you cant use micro SD cards with greater capacity than 32gb. 10/10 would recommend.

My son is using this for action footage for driving his battery-operated car.  All the extra mounting accessories that come with the kit is super handy for mounting the camera in different positions. Pleased with the ease of use that a 7 year old can handle this rugged little camera!

Brought this camera to a quick trip to Miami and I was able to record amazing sting rays, it did everything I wanted and more. super excited to take it to more trips with me! Good quality and amazing that you can take it underwater. Good for the price,
Item as described

This camera and everything that comes with it is such a bargain! Everything works great and is easy to understand for beginners like me. You really do get a lot with for your dollar and you can tell it's quality. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a nice durable camera to film their adventures.
Works great for filming my riding sessionsthe pictures suck tho,
It's great if you don't want to spend too much. The sound quality is poor when it is in the case. Has different attachments so it really helps make it universal.
Great picture and easy to use but the battery only last about 25 minutes. Good thing it comes with two of them.
It looks like a toy than a real camera. The mic does not work properly, so I don't think I can use it. And for the camera you'll need a little luck to take a good shot.

Amazing quality at a great price. Many people feel you need to buy a GoPro just to get good quality action camera footage but with this camera you get amazing footage at a fraction of the cost. The kit comes with all kinds of hookups you will need along with a wristband to start and stop videos and photos. I have used this camera constantly and I've gotten some amazing photos and videos with it I suggest this camera to any beginner that wants to get into action video and photography
Used it during my scuba diving trips in Thailand, it is awesome! The quality of the video is soooo amazing especially with this price! Cannot tell the difference between this and GoPro! Awesome!
The camera quit working after three uses.  I even bought the extended warranty and I cannot get anyone to help me replace or repair the camera.  This Assurian extended warranty is a joke.

This camera is an excellent value. It delivers high quality video for a fraction of the price of the name brand action cameras. It also comes with essentially any accessory you would need. This camera is great for a beginner or anyone looking to get a good value.
Use your phone instead you get a better photo even though it's 4K there's no image stabilization and the colors are off but for $50 is a decent if you just need something to take photos
Fantastic little action camera. Mounted on helmet to test out and very impressed with camera.
you will not regret this camera I use it in FL when I go fishing and I consistently get clear vivid videos.

Great camera. Easy to use, shots and videos look great, and less than 100$. The wristband it comes with is also really nice as you can take pictues and videos without touching the camera. A fun thing to do is to link the camera to the app and view the feed from your phone, then strap it onto a remote control car and drive around your house or backyard from the phone. Would definitely recommend.
camera seems to work very well compared to other competitors and the price is so much better on the pocket!!
I’ve had gopros in the past and this is by far much better than any of them that I’ve had! If you’re looking for something and new to the activity action cams this is absolutely a great choice!

They say good things come in small packages. Well this is it!  This camera is tiny but has an enormous bang for the buck. The picture and video qualities are great. My kids love being able to take videos under water to show the family. High recommend this product.

So! After using my camera about 6 to 8 times! Ive noticed my batteries do not last long at all! Maybe 30 to 40 min!. I charge both of them the night b4 but with no luck at all they just dont last! Is anypne else having thst problem? Or do i jave bad batteries! Other then thst the pics r nice and the videos are cool as well! I will say thst the voices are muffled when its in the waterproof case! But other then that! Cool lil camera! Jus wished the batteries lasted longer!
Buggy software, thank to which I have lost few footages. I'm disappointed with the image even though I was using this camera in full daylight and very sunny day. Just can't recommend.

The quality of this product was beyond our expectations.  Very reasonable and came with so many different attachments.  The kids took it out sledding mounted on the snowboard helmets.  So much fun and looks like it will hold up well!

I owned one a while back and actually ended up destroying it. It's a very durable item I just put it through the ringer. So I bought a new one. I only get this brand.I'd recommend this over all the other cheaper action cameras on Amazon and even a go pro for the price.
Bought to have some fun recording trails throughout New England.  This little camera will not disappoint!
Good: picture qualityEasy of use
It's not a hero but it is close enough.  For the price this product is amazing.  I bought it for teenagers that are rough on things.  We use it kayaking, snow boarding, surfing and anywhere you want.
Hard to use both camera and mounts. Minimal institutions.  Not as functional as advertised.
Haven't tried the water resistant case yet. But it works well as a dash cam.
Bought this for my son to take on fishing trips.  He loves it!!
Love Akaso so far. Comes with two batteries and a ton of mounts and waterproof case. Super simple to use and the video quality is great. Has wi-fi connection and 4K video quality.

I couldn't believe how many gadgets and accessories it came with! I used it in Key West for our para sailing and jet skiing activities. Pictures had pretty good quality.  Would definitely buy again! Easy to download app and upload pics to your phone.

I bought this gift for my dad and decided to get one myself. This product is amazing!! The sound is clear and the picture quality is great. I was worried getting a product like this for only $60 but it is worth way more! It comes with a million pieces and grabs your attention for hours. My dad will love it!

Decent alternative to the popular “GoPro”, for the price, I received an amazing amount of accessories and an extra(?) battery. Regardless, I plan to use this as a helmet mounted camera during close quarters airsofting so we will see how this camera and the skeleton case holds up. Thanks AKASO!
Came early haven't had a chance to use it on my bike but the video and picture quality are great
Right out of the box it was better than I anticipated. I mounted it to my motorcycle and have yet to detect any major vibration issues. So far so good!

This is going to be my first underwater camera. I just tested in dry condition. It seems a quality product and built very well. It comes with a lot of fixtures, mounting brackets, etc. I like it. I am excited to see how it will perform underwater.

Excellent resolution and size/weight perfect for backpacking/canoeing.  Need a little more detail on what all the attachments are, but overall would recommend.  Attached to Tacoma Go-Pro mount perfectly!

I purchased this item as a Valentine’s Day gift for my boyfriend! He was very impressed with the quality of this product. This camera was able to record our vacation to the Bahamas, which included underwater recording. I would 10/10 recommend this product to others.
Have been using it as a Dash Cam But has a below 60minutea Battery life

I got this for FPV Free-styling testing it out being that im still waiting on my quad-copter parts I am very impressed on how far Action Cameras have come I remember back in 2015 they would have been super pricey for a 1080p+ Action camera Very impressed

The price was great.  Love that is waterproof.  Used it filming surfing behind the boat- used a head mount to get different views and standing on the back of boat on swim platform and held camera right on top of the water for another cool viewpoint.

I love this camera! This camera is your best BANG for you BUCK! I mean such great quality for such an affordable price! You can’t  go wrong the the AKASO EK7000! Picture and video quality are amazing and it comes with plenty of mounts and 2 batteries!! I’m glad I purchased this Action Camera.

I like the size of the ek7000. It’s a very nice camera, very easy to use and setup. Battery life is good. I plan to use it as a head mount for hunting season and the remote comes in super handy. Instead of have to reach up and turn it on, I can just start recording with the remote on my wrist!

So far it's just been going through set up but my Husband loves it already. The picture seems clear, the size and weight are perfect and he loves the wrist remote. He plans on wearing it to snorkel. Will update review when we actually get to use it out and about but so far we like what we see.

The product so far seems durable and High quality and comes with all of the necessary accessories out of the box. A few big pluses are it comes with 2 batteries and a dual battery charger. It was a little confusing as there were several small plastic parts to mount the device with no manual or explanation on how they assembe.

This camera is Amazing, and what’s even more amazing was the customer service! They were here to answer my questions and assured that my product arrived perfectly !  With out a doubt I am extremely satisfied.

AWESOME CAMERA!  I purchased two AKASO EK7000 4K WIFI Sports Action Cameras and was not disappointed. Great features and both performed very well. These items arrived earlier than promised. Great cameras at a fraction of the cost of GoPros. I highly recommend this camera.
These things are amazing for the price. Got two for my kids. They love them. One of them had a very touchy button but they shipped a new replacement with ease.
This product is pretty good I like that it came with lots of accessories. And the customer service is very helpful.
Wow, this is a very good camera, very crispy still and moving picture, definitely better than gopro as in price.
Got this camera for my husband this father's day and he loves it! Thank you for making good quality affordable!
The camera is very good! It has everything you need. Cant think of anything wrong with it. Great alternative to a gopro! The only slight problem is that it's hard to get the battery case on and off.

The app down work, it crashes all the time no way to get the videos off the camera. The only way I can get the photos or videos off the camera now is the SD card into a computer which defeats the purpose.

Not bad for the money. Camera is a little bright and the battery seems to be dying quick. There is a red button on the top that is pretty bright and noticeable. I also haven't found a way to adjust the lcd brightness. It also did not come w instructions. I still think pretty good
Clear video.  Only just started to utilize the camera but the shots from a moving ATV were surprisingly very good.

i just tested this  camera mounted on my bike. Rode to the store and back. The video is great quality!! Also the camera comes with more mounting accessories than I know what to do with. Unlike GoPro that forces you to buy the mounts separate from the already overpriced camera. Overall great value for the price. I highly recommend
Recently got this camera for four wheeling! So far the mounts hold up well to being bounced around. Pretty happy with my purchase. Alot cheaper than a go pro and is as good as one in my eyes!
easy to use and good quality

This is a great camera.  I purchased it for my husband who does airsoft sporting and it was perfect.  He attached it right to his vest and capture live video with sound. He uploaded the video and the imaging is so clear and the sound is clear. I would recommend this camera.

Very happy with this purchase. Very good  quality take amazing pictures. The price is incredible. I loved taking this action camera with me on vacation. There so much to do with it and the app on the phone is so easy to use. 5 Star rating.
It worked well for a few weeks then began to overheat badly with a few minutes even in the shade and would not record video. I am returning it.

I wasn’t expecting a “great” camera for the price, but I’m pleasantly surprised after using it. I got it mainly for riding motocross. The stability for the price is excellent. The picture quality is great and the ease of use is great. I would recommend this camera.

This is a great action camera overall.  Small, compact, tons of features packed in one, and the resolution is amazing with a 12 MP camera.  The only downside is that the color balance underwater is a bit tricky.  You will need to take a few videos to figure it out.

The camera worked very well for underwater pics and videos.  It also did well with regular pics and videos.  It was very useful for our trip to the Bahamas as we snorkeled every day.  It was reasonable priced and I would buy it again.

Quick shipping, thank you amazon and AKASO!  Awesome camera!!  Compared to some GoPro models this AKASO EK7000 does the job as good or even better!  Easy to set up and my WiFi connected with no issues.  I am excited as in 2 weeks I’m heading out to Cancun and will be filming and taking pictures with my new action camera.

I was going on a cruise and wanted to get in some dives during the cruise. I didn't want to spend alot of money on a GoPro. So I looked at alternatives. This camera so far has exceeded my expectations. I was able to take the camera down to 65 feet no problem. I snorkeled with it as well and used it while I was zip lining. During other parts of the cruise I used it without the underwater housing again not a problem. Many people on  the cruise asked me about the camera. I would recommend the camera as a low cost alternative to the more expensive GoPro.

Arrived the day after I ordered it! Everything is very easy to use and assemble, if something is unclear there are multiple YouTube videos by different people explaining how to use something or what something is. It comes with multiple mounts and the water proof case really is waterproof with rubber lining to keep it sealed from water and other elements. If you're too nervous to invest in an expensive GoPro in fear of it might getting lost or broken get this!! To me the video quality is better than a GoPro Hero, and it won't break the bank.

Let me say that the stability of your images aren’t going to be the best, let’s be real here.. however if all you need is an overhead view forward facing or underwater camera, it’s a no brainer. Wish the apps were a little more user friendly and doable.

This product was awesome! It came with two batteries and accessories. The camera is light weight and durable. Great camera for the price! We have a go pro as well as this camera and there is no difference in the video quality!
Total surprise at the quality of this camera! And the fact they gave me mounts, a waterproof case, AND an extra battery is amazing!
I wasn’t expecting much, but this thing is awesome.  Best bang for your buck, hands down.

Great shipping time, came within a couple days. Everything came exactly as advertised. Lots of extra mounts to configure it exactly how you want it. The extra battery is huge for for when you’re out and about and want to keep one in your pack for longer outings. All in all very happy with the product and the price point.
I got this to record my paintball games and it works really well at 1080p 60fps. I was surprised by how stable the camera was considering all the moving around involved in paintball games.

Amazing camera for the price. The quality of really great for $50. The camera doesn’t pick up a lot of audio so if you want to hear yourself I wouldn’t get this type of camera. Very nice look of the camera and again great quality and sturdy. Make sure to buy a micro SD card also.

Really nice camera for the price does everything we wanted. Purchase for my 12-year-old. He’s an extreme bicyclist and skateboarder/pogo stick bouncer. Also great for filming catching those big bass out of the pond.

When I received the camera, I was skeptical considering the price. This thing works just as well as my old Go Pro at a small fraction of the price. It has removable batteries  (I bought 3 more batteries) and easily connects to my edge 7 cell phone. You have got to get one of these.
Really good quality camera. The batteries last longer than my old camera's did and it records way longer. I really appreciate the time and hard work that was put into designing this camera.

I bought this camera for my son, who loves to set up the camera and film him self doing tricks on his skate board. The out of box ready was perfect. The pause play remote is such a key feature for him.And the ease of the Wi-Fi upload is perfect for him.

Good quality camera, easy to use, good accessories, I am having one problem with it though, when I try to start recording in 4K sometimes the camera freezes, unsure what the problem is but I can live with it due to the cheap price I paid for the camera.Update* Issue with recording was with my SD card, I would advise buying the highest quality SD card you can afford.
Not as good as a GoPro BUT it Works good and compatible with GoPro accessories.
Fell off my motorcycle and broke and pieces first time out never got to use it

Very pleased with the camera for indoor and outdoor activities. It comes with a variety  of mounting attachments, that are easy to use. The picture is sharp and clear. Extremely easy to upload and share  photos through social media.

Purchased for a ski trip. After some user error (not pointing high enough), vids came out great! Picked up good audio too. Sometimes didn’t know if it was on or not, but other than that, great purchase!
For a Go-pro knock-off this thing is great. Good video quality and nice accessories included

In preparation for our Caribbean Cruise we needed a good camera to film our adventures. This camera came with everything we needed to film our snorkeling/beach adventures to ziplining. The camera worked well and we paid a fraction of the price as the competition.
As described!  Not expensive and gets the job done

Love this little camera - the quality rivals my GoPro. Very convenient and comes with lots of mounts. I bought an extra set of batteries so I can record without worrying about a dead camera. Perfect gift as well!

I have no idea how this has gotten so many 5 star reviews. Got this for my 14 year old to put on his snowboard helmet, and it is cheap junk. Is a re branded Eken that sells for around $35 - $50. No image stabilization,  1080p video quality OK if you can get past the motion sickness inducing shaking, still photo quality is awful. Sent it back and ordered the Soocoo S100pro

This is my first "action camera", although I have been taking photographs on our vacations for decades.  The camera size, feature set, picture quality and overall value is amazing.  So far I have been pleased with all test shots.The included accessories allow for a wide variety of mounting: tripod, chest harness, helmet, or anything you can run a zip-tie around.

The size is perfect to carry in your pocket and the protective case helps keep dust out while riding the trails.  Easy to use haven't got to try it underwater yet but can't wait to shoot videos.  Had it mounted on the Side by Side and got to watch how close we came to hitting a deer.

I got this for my trip to Hawaii and I was surprised with the quality of video. It performed perfectly under water and during fast movement adventure activities. Even the picture quality is up to the mark. Definately delivers more than the price. A good alternative to go pro.

When opening the box, and unwrapping the contents. I was amazed at the range of mounts included!  I remember the Hero 5 Session my father in law purchases and the sheer lack of mounts!I’m hoping to take this camera hunting this weekend, and will update this review then.
Awesome
Omg.. my son just loved this.  Charged quick and off he went with it strapped to his you Fire trucks.  Easy to use for him also.

Bought this camera for an upcoming cruise. I've tried a few of the mounts and they aren't cheap or flimsy. I also do stand up comedy and it's work great in low light and the mic picks up a lot of sound.Great product.

This is a very good action camera with a very good price. The most convenient for me is the remote control which help me free to enjoy it. The package from AKASO is huge of accessories for the camera. I definitely like this guys.

This little camera is awesome for the $49 dollars and comes with great accessories. I started using to document my honey bee hive inspections but have already found many more uses. I had been looking at Go Pros but just couldn’t justify spending that much money then I found this little gem.

I was really excited when I received this sports cam.  I currently use a GoPro and a few other cameras to shoot footage aboard our sailboat, and this was to be a nice addition.Right out of the box I found that the remote does not work.  It flashes when I press the buttons, but the camera does not respond.  Then I download the app for both my iPad and my Andriod Galaxy Note 3.  I could never get the iPad app to connect.  All it would tell me is that the "preview feature" is not available.  The Android app worked once, crashed, and then I kept getting the same message as on the iPad after that.  These two features helped sell this camera for my purposes.
Clear pics and video. Money saver
I wanted a camera to take and record memories with my family at the beach or anywhere we go and this camera did just that! The quality is excellent and super easy to use!
easy to use will recommend to everyone

This is a good camera if your on a budget. I lost my first one. Liked it so much I bought it again. The battery life isn't the greatest. I use mine fore snowboarding so its probably due to the cold conditions.  But it comes with 2 batteries. Overall solid camera for the price.
Grandson loved this gift

Great camera and so easy to use. We ordered this for our 8-year-old, and so far it’s very intuitive and high quality! My son enjoys the ability to easily switch between photos and videos and we like the protective case that guards against drops!
Great product value

Used / using this product in multiple settings from family gatherings to snowboarding and snorkeling. The full kit of accessories is also a good start to outfitting the bike, helmet, etc and has been quite good so far.  Looking forward to exploring even more!

Went to the lake and took a few pictures all of them came out pretty good I would buy thisAKASO EK7000 4K WiFi Sports Action Camera Ultra HD Waterproof DV Camcorder 12MP 170 Degree Wide Angle again I do recommend this camera
Great gift for someone who loves to explore the nature.Got it for my son who plays soccer. He got some great videos from it.

In the past few days since purchasing this camera I've taken a long bike ride with it mounted on the handlebars and tested the waterproof case at the beach. I am extremely pleased with the quality of video I've gotten from it. The audio is better than I expected based on other reviews. I am very happy with this camera.

I love this action camera. For the price and size to carry around. Clarity is so nice and underwater video was surprising clear. Quality of camera plus the waterproof case and accessories were well made.
worked great
Perfect camera for my Hawaii vacation! I received the camera two days early.

Using this camera to document skills performance for scuba students. clear picture and wide field of view are excellent. Haven't tested to more than swimming pool depth, but looking forward to taking this camera on my planned spearfishing trip.
I like it better than my Hero GoPro. I strongly recommend a 128 gig u3 chip for long videotaping and 32 gig u3 for just dinking around.
LOVED this camera!! It was exactly what I wanted for such a great price!!

Loving this already! It was a gift from my wife and I plan on using it daily! Looming forward wearing it in the trails. In the water. When fishing.  Plus many more memories recorded with my family. Great great product!
Just bought this to run the tough mudder race with my brothers. We got some great video.  Lots of great accessories.

Highly recommend this product.  Not only does it take great video but it also comes with everything some of the higher end brands come with but at a fraction of the price.  We use it skiing and it has yet to fail us.

I use this camera in my property inspection business.  I wear it on my forehead, so it records whatever I see and say.  I have inspected four homes with it so far, and it does the job.  The wide angle lens distorts the image, but that is not important to my application.  Using the buttons to access the menu is becoming more familiar.  One gripe:  after my second use, the clip detached from its cheapie wire hinge somehow and was lost.  When I contacted Akaso about getting a new part they just told me that Amazon sold waterproof housings.  I see replacement housing latches are much better constructed.  I got through the day with the old housing wrapped in rubber band, but I would have preferred a camera with a better housing than that fancy box with that display case lid.  Really...just look at it!  Akaso, a plain brown box would suffice.  If I could I would knock you down half a star over the poor housing design, but I do like the little camera at this point, and battery life is okay.  And there is a review which says that the camera only records vids fifteen minutes long.  Mine will record one long vid that fills the drive if I so desire.  I'll revisit this in six months or so.

This is a cheap and easy to use camera. But it isn't 4K, it isn't wifi. The resulting video clearly looks like something that has been upscaled. Its not quality you'd upload or show around. Works fine as a dash cam.
Awesome product. I like it better than the gopros I have messed around with. Quality photos are a big plus. Plan on picking up their Native as well.

This camera has made my son's Easter! Easy to use and set up. Lots of movies and videos in the first 12 hours of opening it. Attached to his bike in less than 2 minutes! Great quality camera at a fraction of a GoPro

I purchased this AKASO EK7000 4K because I wanted to have a sports action camera that is suitable to my budget and to replace my old one. For the price that's less than $100 bucks and with all the accessories included with these package, I've got everything that I need to keep going anytime I want to go on a road bike. And also it's a perfect fit with my Feiyu Tech G4 3 axis gimbal. I haven't tried setting it at 4K video set up because as of now I don't have a 4K video input, but I'm amazed and very happy with the 1080 HD quality. I love this sports action camera.
The camera is good especially for the price. Easy enough for my kids to use it and it comes with lots of accessories. I like it and would recommend to others.
It's compact... Easy to use. Comes with A LOT of accessories and spare batteries! Definitely a bang for the affordable buck!

Received the product 1 day in advance of scheduled delivery date which was nice. Product packaging was in great shape. Opened camera and read the directions and started using the camera. Watched a video on Youtube to help with the workings of the camera which was a great help. I have now used the camera for video and still pics and this little camera works great! This is a sweet deal for the price. Would recommend this camera to my friends or family.

This action camera is a complete package. Along with the wide angle lens and 1080p video and photo quality, the camera comes with a water resistant case and 5 different mounts. The wifi connect via a mobile app for your phone makes shooting and viewing videos very easy and intuitive.  I plan on using this camera for my fishing adventures this summer
Image is not clear, not 4K

It works well for the price. My son uses it to record life on the farm and he and I have been impressed with the image quality and color. The sound is a bit harder to capture and hear all sounds but work adequately. The battery life is about 1hour for each battery. The settings are easy to change and understand. Overall a great little camera.

Absolutely found this camera to be great during vacation trips to the lake or camping when I don't want to take my bigger camera out. Love that it comes with water proof case to take it in the water to capture more memories as well. I am very pleased with this camera and always have it with me. ❤❤❤❤

Great when it worked for 2 days after that it was useless. The button seem like it was jammed. Very disappointed went snuba and snorkeling in Hawaii for 10 days and we had to rent a camera in Maui for the remaining days.

Great product and for a good price. Was able to start using it as soon as it came in and I’m really impressed with the quality of the videos even when using it to film bicycling videos over terrain that really shakes the camera. Really happy with the results.

Bought this for my family ahead of our trip to Florida (where it’ll get plenty of use!). The price and the quality is excellent; we’ve been tinkering with it and learning how to use it all week. The features and the picture are great. Can’t wait to make tons of new memories.
Better quality than expected. Comes with a charger and 2 batteries and lots of mounts-all compatible with the GoPro mounts. Great pics and videos. Well worth the price!

Seems like a nice cheaper alternative to the name brand action sports cameras. Haven't really put it to the test yet. Have only used it as a dash camera while racing stock cars at local race track. Video is clear and looks high quality

I bought this for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it! He is a very active, outdoorsy type and has been wanting a GoPro for a while, but after looking at reviews and accessories that came with them I decided to get the Akaso ek7000 and am so glad I did. My brother has a GoPro and was impressed with this camera. We took video and pictures on both to compare and we all thought the Akaso was just as good if not better than the GoPro! I have already recommended this to people looking for a sports camera.

So far I’ve tested it around my property, preparing for a trip to Hawaii. For the price, I’m really impressed so far. I’ll need to post an update once I use it in the ocean. Comes with tons of accessories for everything you can imagine.

I enjoy using this camera. I took the camerca sledding, it worked perfect recording then and has worked great still. The waterproof feature is fantastic!I would recommend this go pro. Very affordable price and works great.
Bought this camera for my husband to take diving with him. Package came earlier than expected and camera takes great quality pictures. Can't wait for him to try it diving!!

I have had this camera for three months now (COVID-19 purchase) and we have enjoyed it. Underwater pictures and video are clear and the set up is extremely easy. Most of all, the battery life will make it all day at the pool or the beach.

Arrives as described. Contains a variety of plastic mounting brackets/clips/clamps/options that give many different options for mounting. Camera is 2.25in wide x 1. 5in high x 1in thick. Comes with a clear plastic waterproof case custom fit with an extra replacement back. Comes with a USB cable and AC adapter for charging (does charge when connected to a computer). Does not come with an SD card which you will need to take video or photos.  I cannot speak to quality of image as I am not an experienced videographer but it seems great to a novice. The best thing about the camera is that it will stream the video to your Android cell phone using the free app you download (it has its own WiFi so does not require an Internet connection to stream to your phone). This is a great feature for everything from a temporary baby monitor to backup camera for hitching your trailer (used a flame of a candle on my bumper while the camera was in my truck cab and it streamed with no delay or latency to my G3 Android). If this thing does break/fail after a few months I will change the rating to LOVE.
Picture was crystal clear, easy to use. Like pretty much everything about this camera. Only thing I didn't like was sound quality could be better. All in all for the money, well worth it!

This is a great value for the money! The Camera is very simple to operate. It comes with a ton of GOPRO  style accessories. This is my second one. The grand son got the first one, and I had to also have it. He is 8 and shoots a ton of videos.
Needed a small camera for road trips, adventures and filming softball. This camera does it all.*Great battery life
It has all the feature you may need for personal use.I bought this for my hiking and daily blogging purposes and it fits perfect

Pros: cheap camera, shoots alright 1080p lots of accessories come with the cameraCons: not true 4k. The lenses is only 6mp you need at least 8mp to shoot 4k. Camera froze when trying to shoot 4k. After looking at reviews online it seems like I'm not the only one who has had this problem.

I was a little reluctant at first about getting the AKASO camera, but after using it for the last 3 months I'm in absolute love with it.  Camera quality is great, easy to use and battery life is fantastic.  Don't go spending an arm and a leg for any other camera, when you can get an awesome camera at a much more reasonable price!
The item shows as it is, it’s amazing quality BEST price for what you receive, I love the presentation and how compact it is. thank you!
This camera is just what I needed, and you cannot beat the price!

I bought this in September it had a problem with it. I contacted them when i came back from my vacation and they were quick to respond and send a replacement i very happy with the replacement and works fine. I love the customer relations.

My daughter and her boyfriend bought this camera, and I have to say I was convinced they'd be ripped off. How can you pack so many features and accessories into such a small price? Well -- they did it. We had a blast using the selfie stick and chest mount strap while skiing over Christmas. Video quality is great. I really like the playback screen and the ability to control the camera from the wrist controller. I highly recommend this camera for anyone who is looking for a great outdoor action camera!
Fantastic value for money. Useful accessories to go with the camera.
Nice camera for the price! Worked great for K9 videos.

First action camera I have purchased for myself. Saw do many reviews and YouTube videos. But when I saw the comparison to the gopro and the video quality on the Akaso was better I purchased it. Just arrived a few hours ago well packaged with no damage very user friendly layout with good accessories included. Charged it up, loaded an SD card and jumped in the pool did awesome !

The picture quality is good enough for my reports (which is what I most needed it for), but it's not extremely high quality. The various assortment of connectors are amazing, helps you mix and match for whatever best suits your conditions.

The quality is beyond what I was expecting.  So much included with this camera to get you started.  Two included batteries, this was a huge plus.  Keep one on charge with included USB and charger, keep recording!  My daughter has been recording and uploading everyday since Christmas!  Very happy, don't hesitate to purchase from this seller....quick, reliable, and exactly as advertised!

I bought this camera for my trip to Aruba and now on my trip day 2 and first day snorkeling the secure came open while snorkeling and the camera, videos and photos are gone.  I was truly hoping for a better camera and case and truly am saddened by the loss of it all!

This is the second Akaso Camera I have purchased (first one got lost on a hiking adventure)! We loved how easy it is to use and definitely the product for the price! It comes with all the different attachments and a remote but also works with all GoPro attachments as well. I love this item!

Got this in today. So far it works very well. Image is very clear and there are multiple settings for resolution. Comes with lots of accessories out of the box and the extra battery was a nice addition. If I remember I will report back again when I have used it more but so far I'm very pleased with it.

I found this item by accident. I am so surprised that it's so cheap. So I brought it without hesitation and I was thinking that I can return this item if it doesn't work after all. The fact is that the product works very well. I gave it to my boyfriend as a present and he likes it a lot.
Overall this camera is great the only gripe i had was not being able to hear much because of the casing blocked most of the noise. But overall awesome camera for the $$$.

We were a little skeptical due to having buying other cameras before they hype them up and the quality is horrid yet this one surprised us! Everything came in tact and once trying it out we love it! Awesome quality and a great price! A very pleasant surprise!
Great so far
You can’t go wrong with this product at this price.  Only thing missing is a parts list.  It comes with dozens of attachments most of which I have no idea what they are or how to use them.

The EK7000 comes with lots of accessories, puts out quality photos and videos, can be used under water.  It is a good quality camera and it is small and functional.  I use it on ATV rides, for moving fall color videos and photographing fish under my boat dock.  Fun Camera!

We recently purchased this product for my active son's birthday.  He likes to film while riding his bike and four wheeler.  The camera takes good quality videos and pictures from our experience so far.  We are very happy with our purchase and look forward to much more use.

I bought this as an action camera for my motorcycle. I have been using almost everyday for months now and can honestly say that this camera is amazing. It has held up and actually passed what I thought the quality would be. If you are thinking about this camera, go for it!
I really like using this camera for my YouTube channel. No complaints. Serves my purposes just fine. I liked it so much, I bought one for my 70 y/o neighbor. She loves it, and can use it easily.

We bought this for a cruise trip and it was great.  The sound even with the water proof case was great.  It recorded decently well in low light (inside the cabin) and recorded great in day light.  We used it all the time for our 7 day cruise and now have more video than we know what to do with.  I haven't done any sky diving or snow boarding off Everest with it, but for our family cruise / beach days in the Caribbean it was perfect.

First , I was impressed by the look and feel of the camera, it also comes with a lot of accessories, things you don't even know it existed, overall I am very happy with the product, right now I am only shooting video indoors, but as soon as pandemic eases, will start to fill outdoors.

Our son enjoyed mounting this to his bike to video is adventures, however I'm confident it would suffice for any outdoor activity (kids and adults alike) including under the water, which we haven't tried yet.  All-around a great value and good investment.
Takes good resolution video and pics for the price. I can see how old I look. I don't want to be old.
I bought this for my 10 year old son.  He loves it!  He is constantly using it everywhere! He especially loves to attach it to his bike helmet and record as he is riding his bike!
It’s okay... I bought a memory card. When I video the screen blacks out after a min. There were bubbles on the screen when I opened it.

I am using this camera for video and pictures from my Goldwing motorcycle for use on web site.Works great and the remote switch is a great asset for turning on and off. The options for mounting have come in very handy as I have mounted it to the bike. For the price and ease of operation I highly recommend the unit.
Shot one 20 second video and it never worked again. Did all the troubleshooting and tried my best to keep it, but had to return it. Bought a GoPro like I should've in the first place.

Fantastic product!! We already own a go pro but our 7 year old wanted one like his older brother. Extremely disappointed I didn’t find this sooner or we would have 2. The quality is is fantastic!! We can’t tell a difference between this one and the over priced go pro!
A very good product, with good resolution and good functionality!very good
This is an awesome buy! It came with all you need first time user mounts. I am really impressed with the ease of setting it up. The only thing I am bummed about it not having an sd card.

i Had an issue with the batteries not lasting very long. Based on my review they sent me 2 new batteries and charger. I have updated this to a 5 star review because they responded to my review and made things right.

The Camera is very user friendly for my 10 year old year son.  The camera came with a number of accessories to support using the camera riding his bike or running.  The remote control has been very useful for taking selfies.

Great camera and accessories.  I use it to tape pickup basketball by fastening to a fence post.  Battery dies withing 45 minutes but it comes with two so I charge one while using the other and substitute every 30-40 minutes.

This product is really excellent-  I purchased this action cam for a winter offshore fishing trip and I must say I was very pleased with its performance and how simple it was to use. The HD video quality was excellent & transferring files over via WiFi was really easy..I should also mention the wireless remote control with wrist band is great accessory and allows you to take pictures and shoot video so simply.

Used this for a video I am making and it is awesome!  Love the wi-fi capability and used it on the shoot.  I used a Gopro for a while and this was the basic one where you can't see anything and pray that the footage is ok.  This has the lcd in the back and the wi-fi capability is VERY usefull. This is WAY better than the GoPro, and I will probably buy 2 more!  Thank you AKASO!
This little camera has been a gem so far; have only had it one week.I would give it a 5, except the batteries seem to last less than 60 minutes.
I just got my camera in and have taken some photos and videos (haven’t tried underwater yet)  and they have been better than I expected! Great value!
Love this little camera.  Very intuitive, easy to follow setup.  Lots of accessories included.  Recommended.
Good value.. great camera. Plays hard and keeps ticking. Looking for a quality and inexpensive action camera? You found it!!

Everthing about this camera was pretty solid. The design is sleek. And high end quality. Rubber texture exterior for grip and picture / video quality is excellent. Easily comparable with expensive and higher end cameras. Excellent bang for buck camera. Highly recommended!

just got this product recently so i can bring it to new york. i did a test video and the quality was amazing for under $50! comes with a lot of very useful tools and best of all, this can be used in water! absolutely can't wait to bring it to new york to capture the city!
This thing rocks! Super wide view, crisp pictures and video. Lots of modes! I'm going to be able to do so much with this thing. I'm excited to see where it takes me.
Nice little camera for the money. Not as good as a go pro, though. Video has a greenish tent to it. Haven't figured out how to get rid of it. But, still does it's job.

Got this so I could video tape the dog standing on the gas tank riding the Harley with me. It has the wide angle because the handle bars are not far away and the waterproof in case we get stuck in a storm. I have been happy so far and will see how it does after putting many miles on it.
If you know these type of products this is good. Bought for my 8 year old grandson and too advanced for his age. For older kids or adults it is good.

Thrilled with this purchase. picture quality is better than I expected. all the mounting options are a plus, gives you choices of to try different mounting options. Had it on the slides at the swimming pool. Worked great! So it is waterproof. I couldn't ask for anything more. Thank you.
Awesome little camera. Replaced my GoPro Hero 4 that wouldn't turn on anymore. This thing hasn't missed a beat and was a fraction of the cost of a new gopro.

The Akaso EK7000 camera is a very good and inexpensive alternative to the GoPro. Video quality is great and battery life is pretty good considering the price.  One flaw I see is the battery indicator can be a little skewed in term of how much battery life is left available, Other then that all the little accessories that is complementary are great for mounting.

Bought this as a birthday gift for our son, EXCELLENT quality unit, great pictures. He used it underwater and on a bike, couldn't be any happier! Highly recommend to anybody who is looking for an Action Camera!
Works good

I needed an underwater camera, but also needed it to be not too expensive and do the job. This camera fulfilled both requirements. I was surprised by all the extras that came with it, and even though I don't need them all, they may be useful later. Not bad for a camera that's a fraction of the price of a GoPro.
Lots of options to choose from in the video resolution menu. Easy to use . Small size but tons of options.

Works great! If you dont want to spend more money to get the same thing, just take this one. Its light and stable. I use this for airsoft. The camera support 4k, and the video has really high quality. Great product.
Decent for the price. Pretty sturdy, but the battery life is dreadful. I used it on a mud run and got under 20 minutes of footage.
Why waste $300 on a Go Pro.  This little device does everything Go Pro does,  but had one huge advantage.  It records video in .mov format.  I can see and edit and upload my video right away.

I am impressed with the AKASO EK7000. It’s colors are natural and everything is sharp. The action camera comes with WiFi that can be used to pair it up with your phone. There is a reason why this camera is the #1 best selling action camera on Amazon.
This has been great so far. Such a better deal than the name brands. I took it for a swiftwater class and never had any issues. The battery life was pretty decent too.
Exactly as advertised- remote control and all! Took some GREAT videos with this already. Just like a more expensive brand

My step son kept asking us for a go pro for Christmas so I searched for it and came up with this. Was very impressed with the reviews and ratings so this is what we went with. Very reliable, great quality, perfect, , and clear! Awesome price as well. Would recommend!

Absolutely excellent. The footage this produces is indistinguishable from GoPro footage for almost any user. There is really no reason to spend the extra cash, unless you need the brand to help you look cool.
This product is top rated for its quality and performance, instructions and somewhat lacking friendliness for new users

The camera works well but the case is scratched and the box is in poor shape. It looks like the camera and pieces inside have been used and returned. The case for the camera is scratched and the second battery is not holding a charge. The camera quality is good though.
I've used this camera extensively and I must say it's quite good. The images are excellent and I've dropped it far too many times but everything works a good as new. I'm impressed.

It's been easy to use, I did loose one small part to tighten it down hope I can buy parts for it, haven't checked yet. a simple round nut to tighten camera down when I want to just adjust the camera alone and not move the mount. will see

I should’ve gotten a go pro to start with. So apparently, all the great reviews are from people that have gotten something free for their camera. This camera is horrible and you can’t hear the sounds unless is plugged to your camera.
Great for the money
Camera has been a fun addition to our family. It feels solid, the buttons are easy to operate inside the water proof case, and our 3 year old loves to strap it on his head and run around.

For the price this is a good option to avoid paying for the over priced GoPro. Functions are simple and easy to use. As far as quality of photos i have not been able to experiment with all the settings but so far I am very pleased with the pictures and movies i have shot. Connectivity has been a little challenging at times.

The camera works well enough for its price point. I like the camera but I’m thoroughly disappointed that the app WILL NOT let me download my photos or videos. What’s the point of using the camera if they’re just stuck on it? I’ll probably just buy a lifeproof case for my phone next time and ditch the camera.

I was looking for a good sports camera to record my activities without spending a lot of money. I was very pleased with the quality of the camera and all the accessories included. It was bery easy to connect my phone using the app. Very excited to take it on my next adventure!

Bought this for my 11 yr old, to do YouTube filming and her own stuff!! Its an amazing camera with tons of features. The waterproof case is wonderful, especially for younger kids that are clumsy. I would definatley recommend this camera for any 1st time operators!

Pretty sweet camera for the price not used for anything super crazy but works great and is surprisingly good quality stabilization and image quality. Definitely better than getting a gopro because of the price and how well it performs.
Nice camera my son love it

Be careful I suspect some fake reviews here. Comes with a lot of mounting options which is good but the camera itself doesn’t capture crisp video across the whole sensor. The left 1/3 of the image is a bit blurry. I ran it through some real life tests and after looking at the inferior video quality I bought a GoPro after all. $70 lesson learned

Received the camera quickly. Un-boxed everything and so many adapters should not have trouble mounting to anything. Tried both video and still photo and quality appears to be very good. Looking forward to using it quite a bit this summer.
Ok
Ordered this camera for my son. It works great. He loves it. Perfect camera for a great price. Highly recommend.
So far so good.  Affordable and has good accessories. Mounted mines to my Ar 15 and got great footage.  Hope it lasts.

Nifty little device. This was my first action cam so I don't have a good basis for comparison- however I've been quite impressed with this product, and at a fraction of the cost of a Gopro.Comes with the camera, waterproof case, remote and straps and other accessories. The included instructions were not too helpful but it seems pretty easy to figure out. Downloaded the EZ icam app for the iPhone and connected to the camera quite easily. The app allows for realtime feed, control of camera and also allows for editing of video though I haven't used that function yet.

This product is exactly what I needed. I'm not super into photography, but I wanted a go pro for times when I went snorkeling and for just when I wanted something small and compact. This device is exactly what I was looking for, it didn't break the bank and it produces great photos and works like a charm!

I use this on my RZR on the trails riding in the mountains and it is very durable and takes great video that I can transfer to DVD and watch for years to come very good camera and priced very well battery life is great and comes with 2 plus the charger
This little camera is a great deal for the price! I’m very happy with the image quality and ease of operation. It also comes with quite a few attachments I was not expecting 😊

Video quality is very good. Easy to operate and looking forward to using the camera with my bicycle. Only problem was that the first camera received had a broken waterproof case. This resulted in missing the opportunity to take on a planned vacation. As a result I have also ordered a second water proof case so I have it in reserve just in case.
I have not edited or downloaded any pictures yet. But it was very easy to use, I just wish it was easier to flip through pics and videos.
First one came damaged second one works good
The sound when in case is bad. But it is easy to use and the accessories are good quality.
Unusable unless you feel like carrying it around.  No accessories. Useless piece of junk. Don't buy.

Bought this for my 9 year old son and he loves it! It is very user friendly.  It is just like the other name brand Action Camera. It has all the same features and was a great deal. My son uses it on his bike, scooter and skateboard. It came with a waterproof case and a wrist remote. Its very durable. The picture quality is good and the app for iPhone is very user friendly. I highly recommend this camera!
The camera does what is says, great video under water!!! The videos are soooo clear. I'm glad I bought this item!!!
Unfortunately the cover of my battery broke and now I can’t used
This product comes with tons of extras which make it a great value. Don't expect them to be super rugged, but they get the job done.

I got it to mount on my dash for my drive across country. It worked fine when it worked but half the time I couldn't get the thing to any functional mode and then it would just freeze. Maybe mine was just shotty but I didn't get half the trip because it wouldn't work.

I recently purchased this camera twice in one week because of overheating issues. Poor design quality.  What's crazy is I bought the same model 2 years ago and that camera has never overheated.  I would just spend more money on a better quality camera.

Was very impressed with this little camera. For such a great price this thing really does its job.  Clear picture and smoothe video. Hooked right up to my samsung phone with no problem once I figured out the WiFi password for the camera. Should really have that in the instructions.

Very good camera. Quality is definitely not 4k but for the price is very good. I have not tested in water so i don’t know how it resist with water. Lots of accessories so is pretty good. I like the fact that you can instantly see the image or video on your phone.
So far everything is just fine. As a first time user of this kind of camera I love it!!! I can't wait to go hiking or to the parks and take some videos. For a low budget camera is really nice.
The WiFi is an added addition to earlier model.  Enjoy clear video on the motorcycle shooting back roads around America.

6/18/2020  did my research on action camera and picked this one the Akaso EK 7000 what a great little camera with great video and camera pictures and for the price great great deal. So look no further and buy this one!!! So I give it ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I love how stable it is and the quality of the video is very good. We took some videos while on our motorcycles ride with few friends over the weekend. They were all satisfied with with how the video and pictures came out
