I absolutely love my new AKASO EK7000Picture quality is better than expected amazing the stabilization is great during bike rides and activities and having WiFi and connected to your smart phone just makes it that much better

This camera is great i would recommend this if your going on a trip of to a lake or any trip involving water! the microphone is okay in the case you can’t really hear yourself talk. but other than that the camera is amazing

I've been looking around for a go-pro for our upcoming South Caribbean cruise but they're all so dang expensive!  Then I took a chance on what I suppose you could call a "Go-Pro knockoff".  It's not fair to call this product a knock off though because it's every bit as capable as the go-pro from what I can tell.  I took some sample videos underwater, in low light and daylight.  I'm very happy with the quality of the video and the high FPS option in 720P is awesome!  The 170 degree fisheye lens lets you capture all the action around you without missing anything important.It comes with a TON of accessory mounts for just about anything you can think of.  The buttons all actuate cleanly and accurately, although it's a bit cumbersome navigating through the menus with a lack of touchscreen.  The included remote works well- I'm not sure I'll use it on the cruise a lot but I can see using it while my hands are full on a bike ride for example.

Easy to use and the remote is awesome.  Great video and pic quality.  Doesnt come with any info on all the extra mounts you get so you have to figure that out on your on.  Only issue i am having is it seems to over heat and shut down while recording in the water proof case.  Anyone else had this issue?
Just doesn't record 4k video. It only records audio no matter what kind or size card you use. Save your money. These people are terrible to deal with.

I love how small and compact it is it's perfect for vacation, pictures are amazing and video is crystal  clear. I prefer to take this camera with me either on vacation or out to events that my bulky camara. Love it I just bought two more for family members as a gift.
This Akaso action camera EK7000 had worked good. I like the remote it's easy to use. The viewing screen isn't the best, but for the price I can't complain. I'm looking to try it the new model soon.
Great camera,Took me a while to figure it out but now it works great..Glad I didn't buy the Gopro since it can't be much better I don't think

Nice camera. The outer plastic case is not the best, no replaceable parts available. The lens cover portion cracked, and there is no replacement, not even an entire new outer case. The camera takes great 1080p video, and batteries life is good, 2 are provided.....

i love the camera!. came with a lot of accessories but the mounted base is broken. The camera supposed to be attached to this but instead is being moving around the plastic box. Im kind of scared that the camera hit too many times this box and have future problems. That's amazon delivery fault. But the package and everything else is complete.
Liked it very much. Did not need to pay soo much money for a GO PRO. The only thing i did not like is the app . No very good. As for the camera itself. Very good for the price.

Was super excited about this purchase. 1st use was a trial run and performed flawless. Headed to West Virginia for 3 full days of riding Atv’s with camera on the helmet. Noticed through recording sessions camera was shutting off. I thought was a battery saver type situation. WRONG!!!!! Got home and tried to start showing my family what we had been riding and every video recorded was corrupt. Very disappointed.
Akaso reached out to me and sent me a newer model and it works much better thanks!!
Over all this product is very good. However I wish the picture was a little bit clearer. The set up was a  Little difficult, But once it's set up it's easy to work.
This is an excellent alternative to the more expensive options out there. Great quality.

I bought this camera for filming volleyball games and practices, it's the perfect fit - small, durable, nice picture and sound quality.  Happy with my purchase, would highly recommend for this purpose!

I bought this camera for use in and around water. I haven't had the chance to test out the "waterproof" capability yet. I have used it to take some pictures and videos both in low inside lighting and brighter out side lighting. As for the resolution, I found that you need it to be bright for decent video quality. low lighting causes poor quality video and wouldn't recommend for indoor use. As for out side you get better quality video. 4K size videos but with SD to 720P quality video I would say. For the price of the camera I'm not sure if you would be able to beat this. The instructions that come with the camera don't go into enough detail I don't think. It took me a while to figure out how to change some settings no thanks to the manual. In the manual I says the camera is compatible with 8, 16, and 32GB micro SD cards, I bought and used a 64GB card because Amazon said it was Frequently bought together. I also used a older 8GB card I had laying around and saw no deference in video quality. Playback videos on the camera have very low sound that you can hardly hear. Although once you upload the video file on the computer you can hear it much better. I can't seem to get videos longer then about 10 minutes before it makes a new track. I'm not sure if this can be changed or not. The Camera app "Ez iCam" wouldn't work for me I kept getting a message saying the product is not a registered device and to return to the seller. I read that I should download and use "iSmart DV" It took a few tries to get the camera to connect. I played around with it for a few then when I tried it again the next day I wasn't able to connect to the camera and gave up after about 10 tries.
Unable to try camera it doesn’t take my micro SD card of 128gb. Gives a Card error message
Not sure how to make the pictures have a more natural color to them. The camera picks up too much green. Does anyone know how to adjust those settings on this camera?

I have to say I'm quite impressed.  I was looking for the more popular hero brand and came across the akaso at a much lower price.  It's my 1st camera and I couldn't be more happy.  I use it for my daughters basketball games as a coaching tool using different attachments (head mount...tripod).  Has the wide angle which helps is that department.  Highly recommended if your on a budget

So far so good. I have just received the camera and have done a fe test shots and videos. The build seems good on the camera and accessories. So far the only negatives are a poorly written (and limited) manual and the recommended app is a bit buggy.

The camera is very easy to use and came with a decent amount of accessories! The picture and video quality is impressive for a camera of this size, and I was able to use it on my recent vacation and got some great action shots. It has been durable so far as well.

The product is great, except for one significant flaw. The camera doesn't come with any sort of memory card, nor does it have an internal memory. As a result, immediately out of the box it doesn't record or take any photo/video. Without the memory card you can still hook up the camera to the app and get a feel for how the interface would work, etc., which seems to be very user friendly. The camera seems to come with everything else you could possible need: ample attachments, charger, and various mounts. Overall good product.
The camera is even tinier than expected (: the case seems very strong and I wouldn’t worry about dropping it.
The product quality appears great, working through the program selection was a bit klugy. However, the remote wristband was invaluable and a great addition to the product features.

Camera is easy to set up. Good clear image. Wished it would connect to my sons chrome book vs needing a phone connection. He is 7 and does not have a phone. We were hoping he could watch his action videos on his own device, which is my only reason to rate 4 stars.
Excellent quality for the price! 4k videos are just great quality!

I actually loved this camera up until it just stopped working. I received on the 14 of December 2016 Of course after the return/product eligibility expired  on the 31st of January 2017.In my opinion that is not acceptable for an electronic product. If anyone has any info as to why this happened or can help in any way please send me a message.
The camera would never video more than 10 minutes then it would shut off. It also fogged up on the inside of the lens and looked terrible!

I'm giving this product a 5 star it's beyond my expectation for the amount I paid.. I bought this for my trip to the Philippines. It's easy to use and it's good for beginners. The video and picture quality is realy fine. I would definitely recommend this product! It's worth it for the cheap price.

I am extremely unhappy with this product. My daughter just opened it for Christmas, we charged the batteries and turned it on and the screen has all of these lines going across it that you can't even see what you are doing. This product is a freaking joke!

Great camera, especially for the very affordable price! Took this on my island vacation and used it for our excursions and water sports we did while there. It was great having this to take fun water photos and I was truly surprised with how great the quality was underwater. Great purchase!

Works great.  Didnt realize the camera was so small.  Kids are bringing to caribbean in 2 weeks.  Will follow up on how it handles the water.  I do wish it came with an sd card so it worked out of the box.
Love this camera. Takes beautiful pictures and video. Can not go wrong buying this!! My only complaint is battery life. Even with that it's a great camera.

Great camera especially for the price. At a fifth of the cost of a gopro you can't go wrong. Shipped quickly and came with a ton of parts to get me started. Sound isn't top quality but its still decent.

Love this product the price is absolutely amazing and the camera quality is perfect! I love how easy it is to use and that I can get all the footage off and right onto my phone so easily. I got this camera for Christmas and it is still working great!
Great value.  One button feels loose but still functions normally.

I bought this camera specifically to use to video for snorkeling on vacation, but also used it to take still pictures throughout our trip. The picture quality was decent for it being an inexpensive camera, but I was very disappointing with the video quality-- especially because it is labeled as an "action camera". The videos were so choppy it was unwatchable.
Never really worked properly. Mounting kits are cheap and don't work well. A little difficult to use.
Surprisingly great for the value!! Camera quality is great and the lens is super wide. With the accessories it makes for a great camera with a wide range of uses.
Super portable. Excited to use for our upcoming trips!
Highly recommended - the quality is just as good as other brand names at half the cost. The accessories are great too!

This camera is awesome!  I was not going to spend GoPro kind of $ on my 10 year old.  He loves it.  had it mounted to his ski helmet and had a blast.  Customer service with this company was also awesome.  I ended up buying a second one for my other son.

Camera does a pretty good job for its size. It is easy to tote around and functions really good. I have not used it much yet. I will be great for action shots and use. The microphone is really muffled when water proof case is used.
i really love this action cam
Fast shipping, good packaging.  Camera was exactly as described.  Can’t wait to start recording my sons athletic events with this camera
Great camera, used it all weekend in cold weather, simple to use, won't cry if I lose it at this price.Easy to record, take pictures, and remove card to copy to computer.

so far so good, it came on time, came with exerything that was listed in the description  ive only had a chance to play around with it for a short tiime, but so far i am very impressed clear picture easy to use, and easy to understand instructions.  bought this to record myself playing drums, and to record my band during shows,  ill update as time goes by.

I pulled it out of the box, tried it out, and am blown away with how many uses I will have for this!  I am an angler and have bought thousands of dollars worth of underwater cameras.  This camera connects wirelessly to my phone and I can see underwater in real time... It is water proof (there are limits on how deep), which will work great in shallow water applications.  I am pleasently surprised with how much useful gear the AKASO came with.
Purchased as a gift for my active grandson. He uses it while riding his quad, bike and zip lining.  Picture quality is good but I would be concerned about it’s water resistants. Overall works great.
I love everything about it

Camera was not good at all. When trying to record in 4K, the camera would freeze and become unresponsive.I would have to take the battery out just to reset the camera. Holding the power button for long periods of time

It is a nice camera for a good price. It is super easy to use and comes with a lot of accessories which includes a waterproof case. There is wifi connections so you can use your phone to preview the images and take photos/videos. All around, a nice camera that won't break the bank.

This camera was great for both of my kids.  I bought it for them because they are always so active and it's the perfect size for them to capture their activities.  My son loves it for snowboarding and my daughter loves it for her and her horse.  The pictures are great too.
Ordered twice and both cases were scratched in front of the lens. Im assuming the cameras work fine but I hope the cameras are not refurbished. I appreciate the easy returns though.
It’s alright

Bought this so I could start marketing with my company more. Been a awesome tool to take before and after photos and videos. The price for the product is also amazing as I didn't want to spend what the big name companies were charging. Very happy, thank you!

I received this camera for my 10th birthday, and intend to use it for an online fishing channel. Taking it off it's mount on the box and figuring out how to insert the batteries was a little difficult, but so far, it seems like a solid camera, and I look forward to using it in the future.

We bought this to use on a cruise and snorkeling trip instead of risking our GoPro. It worked perfectly and we got some great shots of underwater wildlife as well as some video footage of dolphins and whales. Would suggest it to anyone looking for an affordable alternative.

This sport video recording camera, I am glad that I got it. It can record and take pretty amazing quality photos and videos, while providing wide angle shots of views and footage. Perfect for any outdoor adventures.
A little difficult to use and it does not come with a manual. But I will buy again.
Works as promised a great product

I've had the Akaso camera for 8 months and I love it. Within the 8 months I've used the camera on everything from snorkeling in Florida, cliff diving in Jamaica and took it on rides at Disney World. The camera has captured all those memories. Even the small things are great like underwater selfies with my daughters. I would recommend this camera to anyone.
For the cost hands down well worth the purchse..using on my jeep. Accessories galore..2 batteries ..wrist remote..freaking awsome..app is just as good as go pros.

This camera was everything that I needed for my recent ski and fishing trip.  The quality of the video was as good as cameras that are twice the cost.  The camera was very easy to learn how to use and easy to operate, even with thick ski gloves on.
Good backup camera but I won't be using it for audio recording as it sucks
Not sure this is defective one or not, first I record for video audio keep cut off and video played slow motion even I used 1080p, sent back for refund and not sure order other one or not!
My son used the camera on our recent ski trip.  It was easy to set up, easy to use, and easy to transfer video.  We were very happy with this purchase!

Very good camera! Definitely a better alternative to a GoPro. The pricing is way better, especially considering this is an "action" camera. If I spent $300 on a GoPro and broke it I would be super bummed. This is $80 and comes with the same features and way more accessories. Better buy!

Purchase for my nephew and was more excited to try it out than he was. Excellent camera for the price! Picture and video quality is very clear. Highly recommend to for anyone who is active and likes to capture their adventures.

Downloaded the software for my iPhone and up pops a message saying this camera is being recalled... I did notice it got really hot... but the software to control the camera is locked will not allow me to do anything with the camera!I did a chat with Amazon support... told him that it said to contact the place where the camera was purchased that it is being recalled for over heating... the brilliant support person asked me if there was a problem????
Need a light to go with this if you are going to use for diving. One diver had a stick and light attachment, he seemed to really like his. Video work well, again, just dark without a light.

I love being able to place the camera and turn it on and off from afar. It makes for beautiful picture quality without the fear of humans messing it up!Quality could be a little clearer and sound is a little muted, but all in all a good buy.

Great camera for a great price. The little camera fits my needs perfectly. Works with all my gopro  accessories. I purchased this camera to make dog videos and the manner in which I use this camera  just requires the most basic  functions and and those functions work well. Once you figure out the menu you are home free. If you have a hard time there are lots of youtube videos.
For the money, these things are killer. The sound quality isnt the best, but it's an action camera.
Amazing camera for the price.  Well built, and nicely packaged, great quality, tons of features and lots of accesories.
Good for the money. I was surprised by the number of mounts and accessories that were included. 2 batteries was a nice touch. Bought 2, we will see how they hold up. I would probably buy again.

This is my first action camera. I have been wanting on for a long time but the price was prohibitive. This Akaso EK7000 is a great value and performs very well. I may upgrade one day, but this camera does all I need.
For the price it did a fantastic job, and came with a lot of extras.
I was truly amazed at the video quality of this camera. and for the price you can not go wrong.

I am very active outdoors and was looking for something comparable to a GoPro to capture both pictures and video minus the price point. This was a great find and comes with a lot of great accessories; I especially love the wrist strap as well as providing two batteries.

Evidently if you review the product they send you a memory card and additional accessories. I haven’t been able to use it without the memory card but for this price the product Hass to be acceptable unless it totally doesn’t work. If it doesn’t work I will edit my review.

Great little action camera. I bought it for my 10 yr old and he loves it. He says it great for filming his brothers play basketball and riding their hover boards. Pic are clear and now I’m going to have to buy a couple more for the other kids.

Battery life is horrible. Half of the videos I take the files are corrupted and will not play. What video I do get is poor quality, extremely shaky,going in and out of shadows makes the screen struggle to keep up with changing light. I use it with a chest mount while biking which should be smooth. But video is always vibrating so bad it is an instant headache. Oh,it also stops filming and turns itself off without warning so you don’t get shots you think you are getting.

This product is awesome very easy to use and has lots of accessories to work with. I bought this camera to help record my daily travel routine and use it as my guardian angle when needing to provide truth to any situation I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
Got this as an alternative to a GoPro. It’s for our daughter who wanted to make her own adventure movies. So far it has proven to be everything we expected. Daughter loves it.
I got this camera to record my rides on my motorcycle. So far the mounts are solid, and I cant wait to start uploading my videos. Picture quality is impressive for such an inexpensive camera.
Great product, shipped quickly, thank you!
It is what is sold - and works amazing specially for the price
I bought this for our 8 year old granddaughter and she just loved it!  She needed help getting it setup, but once she started using it, she couldn't stop.  Very good product!

It is easy and fun to use.  It works great on my bike ride. I cannot wait to take is snorkeling in vacation. Easy to download pictures to I-phone.  I had one attachment part break and customer service was helpful and sent a replacement part at no charge.  Thanks Roger

It’s nice camera and anyone can buy this camera because the price is Cheap compared with other cameras, the quality is good and have all the pieces for installing cameras with any situation  and  I recommend it.
The camera was exactly what I needed, and for the price, you cannot beat it.  I am very happy with the picture quality and ease of use!  Purchase the camera - you will not be disappointed!

This camera is just insanely cheap for what it has to offer. It can record up to 4k (@25 fps if i'm not mistaken), and the video quality is very good, especially in well-lit environments. It also comes with a bunch of accessories (multiple types of mounts, 2 batteries, remote control, etc). If you don't want to spend hundreds of dollars on a Go Pro then this is your best alternative!

Spend hours trying to figure out the time lapse and finally after reading many reviews figured out that it's virtually impossible. The camera stores photos out of sequence so you don't get a smooth time lapse. It also does not work with 4K as it shuts off after five images.

I really recommend this camera! It came in packaged so neat with so many accessories! It comes with a clear water proof case which reallycomes in handy for summer time especially if your family loves taking pictures as mine does ! It’s the perfect size to tag along anywhere with you ! Picture quality is amazing !
The camera functionality was great, no issues, very clear image. So far very happy with my camera
Video quality is great, but photo quality could be better.  Battery lasts a long time.  Very easy to use.  Had no issues during our scuba dive to 60 feet.  Very happy with my purchase.
This Camera is one of the best you can get for the price it is nice quality and is a hundred dollars less then if you get a GoPro.

This camera requires a good solid sd card to work properly. This last weekend I took 2hrs of footage and over 50 pictures. Live the camera beats the hell out of GoPro's overpriced cameras.Update after having for a while, camera gets hot fast and freezes during recording. It's pretty much useless now!

This is a wonderful little camera. I am a motorcycle rider and was surprised by how the road didn't  affect the camera's stabilization. My state is not a biker friendly state so the camera comes in handy. The casing protected the camera from rain. Thanks
With my novice skills, it was the ideal inexpensive camera I needed. Multiple uses, easy to work, definitely waterproof, decent pictures, very happy

This product was a great buy and I highly recommend it. The price is much more reasonable than a GoPro and has just about the same quality. some GoPro are almost 4 times as much. For the price of the camera it has great quality! Mounts and accessories are included, which is a bonus! It also comes with a water proof case so its ready to use! The remote to me is great and allows easy recording and pictures. I would highly recommend the AKASO EK7000 4K WIFI Sports Action Camera.

If I could give no stars I absolutely would. Take pics but no videos, continues to freeze. Took off power save mode and everything. Automatically stops after 29 seconds and doesn't save videos. On vacation and cant get any videos, waste of money. Will be returning!!!

Despite the claims in other reviews and the Q&A, the resolution and quality are abysmal when used as a webcam. Couldn't get it to a higher resolution than 640x480 and the image quality was terrible and under-exposed. Will return.
Works great for my adventures with the kids!
Quality is really nice, and for the price tag it's a very sweet little camera! I've got a million ideas for things to photograph/video!
Very good price! The camera is pretty awesome, but the functions of this camera is quite complicated and the manual doesn’t give much detail on how to work it

We bought 2 of these for our adult kids. Son in school in Brazil and very "Techy!" He picked them out. Gave to both kids and his was "non-functioning from day 2!" It will cost more to have him send it back to us in States to return so it is a LOSS! We have not spoken to company because I do not have it here to return it. But extremely disappointed. Daughter says hers isn't working right either......

Great little camera, especially for the price.  So many accessories I haven't had a chance to use them all yet.  Good pictures and excellent video.  Camera gets hot when charging a battery so I would get an external charger.  Camera can power up in strange modes when swapping batteries.  May need some software updates.Overall though, I am very pleased with the EK7000.  For those of us who can't afford or do not want to lose/damage an expensive GoPro, this is the perfect alternative.  I may have to buy one or two more!
Battery cover was cheap and flimsy. Broke immediately upon trying to install cover. May have been broken already. bad design IMO,
I loved it it was very good felt nice looked good and everything was good quality. It felt like the same quality as a very expensive camera.
Great camera, got delivered open the package put the memory and battery and got recording that easy. Great price and good quality. will be giving to friends and family members as gifts.
Impressed so far
Can’t wait to use in the Bahamas
While opening the package a plastic piece broke right off.  Would not recommend...

I enjoyed this action camera so far I haven’t used it for anything super exciting  😂I’ve used it for crabbing in my backyard and I wanted to get certain angels cooking so check that out on YouTube @VIVACIOUS BEAUTIES to see how the quality is. 💯💚
This camera was quick and easy to set up, the picture quality is pretty impressive. Would definitely recommend. Great price, great product.

I wasn't ready to spend a huge amount on a Go Pro. This was a great purchase for the price. Comes with some mounting gear so you don't have to go out and buy anything. Very simple, I figured out how to us everything the first day.

Such a great deal for an amazing camera. It comes with tons of mounting accessories and even a wrist remote to control taking photos and videos. Also comes with a battery as well as a back up!! I’m buying another one for my significant other ASAP!

Just received it today and can already tell I’m gonna love it. It’s user friendly and the quality is amazing. It is very compact and perfect for on the go. The price is just amazing for the amount of accessories that it comes with and the quality. Would super recommend this product!!
So far so good, excellent video, familiar controls. Far more features than my older GoPro's. Very generous with the accessories. I have no complaints.
best action powersport camera ive had so far

This is a great deal! Not only is it a great camera but it also comes with so many mounts, so that you can capture so many cool shots. I love the waterproof case, and I definitely be using it a ton. I can’t wait to take this with me on all of my adventures!
Great product

My Daughter loves it!  She brings it in the pool with her and does flips off the diving board while holding it.  I've installed the attachment for her bike which she will use as well.  So far this has been a rewarding product that she saved to buy on her own.
Great camera.  Fun to use and great quality images. My one criticism is that the directions could have been more complete.

It's a great action cam. We purchased a head mount strap. There are a lot of good settings(like changing the exposure, photo resolution etc). Still have to explore all the features. We downloaded iSmart DV app, which lets you change the camera settings via app. Overall a great purchase, we are happy with it
For those who think they got a used one - make sure you take to film off your lens!I got this for my dad who uses it on his bike and loves it. Great customer service too!
Has as good of video quality as a hero3 if not better. Comes in a similar  case as a go pro and comes with alot of mounts.

Bought this as a gift for my kids. They love it! Cant wait to use it under water over the summer. Comes with a few accessories.**Update** kids used it when in Florida, they love it, easy to use, clear videos and great accessories
I am very pleased with this camera.  It is easy to use, takes great pictures and videos, and is durable.  I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a camera.

You want a gopro? Save your money and get this camera. Chances are you will be surprised with so many extras! case, case backing, latches and clamps and batterieS and DUAL charger and REMOTE!?!?! WHHAAAATTTT!!!Yeah, BUY IT!
I liked the price and the quality of the pictures

This is my first action camera I buy. The accessories it comes with along with the quality of the video are just insane! For the price I paid, I lucked out. I've been using this to record my soccer games and my weekly runs. I've used the remote control and it comes in handy when recording my soccer practice sessions. Anyhow, very good camera for the price and most importantly for the quality. No need to buy a more expensive camera
So far it's been okay, but I have yet to really use it.
A really good  camera and a great value for the money

Good camera, great quality for price. Perfect alternative for a Go Pro with a fraction of the price. Came with a bunch of accessories for any type of environment of filming or taking pictures. Definitely would recommend!

I always wanted a video camera for my motorcycle but could never bring myself to spend $400 for a GoPro. But for $50 I tried this one. I was very surprised at the ease of use and quality. It's a great buy!

Seems to work good. I wish they had software to remove the fish eye effect. The only other gripe I have is it does not come with the memory card or mini HDMI cable. We had to go out and buy them. In my opinion it should come with them. Other than that i works as good as my son in laws Go Pro.
Great sport camera, I use it for Paintball games, great price compare with a Go pro, and the resolution under the water is very good. It came with accessories.

Took this to Hawaii on open door helicopter tour. The remote on off switch was great. This comes with a lot of camera adaptors for attaching to many things. Some I'm still trying to figure out. Also used this underwater and it was perfect. Got some really nice underwater video. I think the picture quality is extremely good for this camera.

My son loves skiing with this camera mounted to his ski helmet.  It takes great video with good sound quality.  The small black sd card door, broke (may have been user caused) but it still works great.

This is not only a good camera but a great camera exactly what I needed and comes with plenty of attachments and a second battery, the video it take is crisp and the audio it takes is pretty good too! all in all great buy, may get a second one for more video angles
Easy to get going, great default settings, doesn't take long to charge batteries, tons of accessories

I recently bought this camera and start using it as soon as I got it, does very good quality videos. At the time I test it was around 5pm and wasn’t good quality light outside, but I’m surprised how good the picture quality was even on low light. Very competitive with GoPro which cost $200 to $400

We bought this camera for our son to use this summer on his high adventure outing with Boy Scouts. Can't wait to see the images he captures! He has experimented with the camera a little and so far we love. We would definitely recommend making this purchase.

This was the perfect camera for our trip.  We purchased this before going to Hawaii.  We knew we’d be wanting to take photos in the water and during action.  The camera was perfect!  Pictures are surprisingly clear (better than my iPhone) and it worked like a charm.  Would recommend.

I'm setting up my camera now and am very disappointed that the waterproof case arrived very scratched. No big deal except the spot where the lens sits is very scratched and expect it will affect the picture quality. Probably going to have to return this due to the scratches.
I use the camera for kayak fishing is it a go pro no but its a whole lot cheaper and does a good job

Awesome camera! I've been looking around for a couple months now for a good action camera and I'm really glad I did my research and picked this one.  This camera was recommended to me but I didn't believe it could be this good because of the price.  Totally recommend!!

Just received this today, but so far so good!  Shipped and delivered as planned, and quality is as expected. Packaging had the feel of a more premium product.Camera records high quality photos and videos, and I am extremely impressed with the value for the money!
loved the range, quality and durability and all the things you can do and attach to this camera, can literally take it anywhere

Finally took the camera for my first dive and was very disappointed. Camera got water in it from the waterproof case on the first dive. Could not take any pictures or videos afterwards . Now camera will not turn on because of water damage.

I was disappointed. My original unit wouldn't record in 4K and this unit had a button on the side that is used as the up arrow break prematurely. I was excited to see a competitor in the action cam genre because it drives prices down but product quality and reliability will always be a marketplace differentiator.

I just moved to Florida and was looking for a camera that also takes videos.  I stumbled upon this one and, after seeing some of the photos other reviewers had posted, decided to go for it.... and I am not sorry!  I needed a simple camera that takes AWESOME photos and this is it!  Not only is it perfect for my simple needs, the abundance of accessories that are included will allow me to become even more creative.  And, at only 1 pound and having a protective cover, I can simply through it in my purse and have it with me wherever I go.  Super happy I bought this for myself!

I did not want to spend $400 for a GoPro which I'm sure once I come back from any vacation the camera will just collect dust until I  need to pull it out two weeks before the next vacation. So I decided to get this instead, and this action does the job so I don't have to spend more money that will fit my generic needs.
It is a powerful camera for what you pay

For a tiny little camera it really delivers good quality video! I love that it comes with many of the accessories, a spare door and seal, and two batteries. I am looking forward to trying it in the Arkansas River next week.
Great product! Its really cool and can easily be compared to a gopro. The only thing i was concerned with was the lack of instructions explaining what each piece that was included was used for.

Great camera for the price. Need a little of post record editing to make the video look even better, but overall solid quality. Plenty of accessories included right in the box to place your camera wherever needed. Took the camera sking and flying with me and the video quality was really good. Two battieries included as well, to make sure you don't run out fo juice.

This camera is very durable and compact.  The picture is very clear and everything about it it high quality.  I bought this camera for my 10 year old son, and he takes it everywhere and films everything.  I would definitely recommend this item to others.
it worked , i used it on my track day event . great product ! :)

Purchased product last minute.  It was supposed to be delivered within one day. It took 2 days. Received product scratched and looks like it has been used. Couldnt return it because we needed to take it with us on our trip.
Hard to believe consumers would pay 5 times the price for name brand.  This camera is absolutely remarkable!!
This is my first action cam and can not be any happier, stabilization is great, picture is awesome and battery life is enough for a lot of recording..
Arrived quickly and quality looks great.

I just returned my second EK7000 camera.  The first camera worked great and I liked it, but one of the batteries was non functioning and the Akaso tech support refused to send me a new battery.  The second camera also has some battery issues and the camera does not work most of the time.  It will start recording, then freeze and the only way to unfreeze it is by removing the battery.  When it does successfully record without freezing, it will only properly save some of the video on to the SD card and save a couple of corrupted files that I still can not remove from the SD card using my computer.  This is using a top of the line SanDisk microSD card that worked perfectly in the first camera.  I really want one of these cameras to work for me so I will purchase one more in hopes that it actually works and comes with good batteries.Also, the sound recording is pretty terrible with both cameras I have tried, especially when in the waterproof case, but for an action cam that's ok, some don't record sound at all.

Great little camera for the price, very easy to use. Video quality is not that far off of my sony 4k action cam, picture quality i can see a difference when doing a timelapse, just doesnt match up to the sony, but still pretty good. The 1080p at 60 is where its at, videos seem smoother, battery a little weak but they give you 2 of them, realistically most action cam batteries are weak. Bought this for my daughter and find myself grabbing hers alot over my sony, just very easy to use.
We are really impressed with the quality of the video, the wifi capabilty makes it easy to view the video on another device. This is a really great camera and you can't beat the price!

just got it in today and we took it out to the beach to test it out. the waterproof case worked perfect. the remote that comes with made it easy to snap a picture and start or stop video. ive seen some reviews with poor quality video which worried me at first, but on my own testing the picture is Way better than expected. Very pleased!
camera came with no instruction book or SD Card..I have no clue what size of sd card to get or where to get it and how to set  it up with no instruction book..I'm leaving on vacation in 2 weeks.

I bought this to take with me to Tahoe to capture some footage of the last week before covid struck. Great camera. It held up nicely for the three days I used it. I can't wait for this all to be over so I can use it again on my next adventure.

I almost bought a GoPro over Christmas, but I wasn't sure if what I wanted is an action camera and for the price it would of been a waste if I didn't use it. When I saw the Akaso I decided it was a perfect time to give an action camera a try and after reading reviews and watching various videos it didn't take me long to make the decision to purchase it.As a newbie to action cams and who doesn't like to read manuals, I was a little overwhelmed with all the mounts and parts that came with the camera so my hate of manuals was defeated and I ended up having to take a peek to see what goes with what. I found out that most of them I would probably not use (like the helmet cam mounts) so I have to order the kit that has more useful accessories for my purposes. I plan on using mine for vacations where there are no helmets required but a lot of walking, some climbing, boating, and snorkeling. I can't wait to test it under water which I will do on my upcoming vacation and come back to update my review. I had no problem with the battery compartment as some reviewers had. I just used my nail and it popped right off.  I found the settings extremely easy to use, no manual required initially, but I did learn quite a bit just reading reviews which I found more helpful than the manual. The only issue I have had so far is that the the button to record doesn't always respond the first push when I want to stop recording. I have had to push it twice a few times. Maybe its not enough pressure, but I have no problems starting the recording, so I don't think so. So far so good on my first few videos, I really think for the price you can't beat this camera.
Got this camera a couple days ago and used it on my ski trip!! Works great and has amazing picture quality. Highly recommend for anyone who loves to capture their out door experience!
This camera will not accept a charge using a USB cable.  Very disappointed in this product.

For the price you can't beat this camera. I use it on the windshield of my boat and it holds up great to the rough water beatings. Clear images as well. I also like that I can link it to my phone and download picture and video without having to take it out and hook to a computer.
I really liked this camera. I had to return it because I think I got a defect, mine wouldn't turn on unless I removed the battery first. I upgraded to the Akaso V50 since it was on sale
very good camera would buy again
Camera lasted about a month before the charging port broke.  Very disappointed child.
Awful! Don’t recommend. Bought for month long trip in the Caribbean and it started leaking after week 1. No drops or anything.
My son loves it, glad I didn’t pay for the name brand ones.  The video quality is fabulous, he’s already editing and publishing videos.
I have to say this for the price is pretty good quality. Im happy with it and works for what i need it for so win win.
You dont need GoPRo :) Believe me :)
The camera worked fine for a few hours and then the onboard software froze up. I had to return it.
Just bought this camera and has a good quality for what I'm looking to do. Would recommend to friends and family.
Great product! Works great! Brings a lot of accessories and goddies. I'm positively impressed. May buy others down the road

This product worked great on our vacation!  From hiking the Smokey Mountains, White water rafting, and zip lining - this product took great video and pictures.  I would suggest this for anyone looking for a camera to keep up with your outdoor activities!

Camera functions great! the video quality is great in 1080p at 60fps.  While it does shoot in 4k the frame rate is only 25 for that which is slightly noticeable when viewing but really a minor flaw in what is otherwise a great value.  This also comes with a TON of mounts.  One for any occasion.  The audio is good enough within 15 feet or so.  Really a fantastic value for what you get, a perfectly functional action cam with a bunch of mounts, and it has a very straightforward interface and easy connection to the computer to transfer files as well.
Works great. Needed to buy memory card. But it's great quality
I love this camera for the value the only thing I am not a huge fan of is the quality of the sound that it picks up. Otherwise it is a great bang for your buck in comparison to buying a $400 GoPro
I love love love my camera I should have been bought this! I highly recommend. Video and picture quality A1! Definitely recommend for vlogging because That’s exactly what I’m using it for. 5 stars

I purchased this handy camera at the last minute and we were able to figure out how to use it in no time!  I was able to capture priceless videos of us swimming with otters. What a great price for such awesome technology!!  Highly recommend!
A good camera for the price, have used it a lot and still satisfied.

This product is outstanding. It comes with multiple mounts of different applications, two batteries and a charger. Another pro to purchasing this camera is the waterproof case that comes with a second back door. The audio of the camera while inside the case is not the best. Very good camera overall.

Product works better than I ever dreamed it would for the price. There are so many different mounts included it is incredible. The waterproof enclosure is PERFECT for so many applications! I haven't tried everything but what I have tried and used has been fantastic!

What you see is definitely what you get! This is a great action camera for the price. I've used a GoPro and it is pretty much the same less the high price. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking to buy an action cameraIt give it 5 stars but you need to buy more batteries. It does come with an extra battery. However, using the video mode and WiFi at the same time will drain the battery in about 35 minutes.

Great camera for the price, tons of mounting options! Learned that 32gig was the max after ordering a 128 sd card but to my surprise the 128 works. Easily connects to pc with no special software, reads the camera as an extra drive where you can just pull your files.

After purchasing and returning a piece of crap camera bought on one of Amazon's "Lightning Deals," I purchased this camera. The quality and feel of the camera is very good. It also comes with quite a few accessories, which was a pleasant surprise. I'm definitely happy with my purchase and would recommend it to anyone that's on the fence about whether or not they should purchase it.

This is a great camera for the price. I didn’t feel like spending hundreds of dollars for a go-pro, I found this product and didn’t think it would be good as a go-pro but I bought it anyways. I was so wrong, this little thing can put the go-pro a run for his money. I took the camera on a few snowboarding trips and a snorkeling expedition and it still cranking, the video quality is just as good as a go-pro. I would recommend this product over a go-pro.

I bought this camera for my son. He uses it when we go bike riding and he loves it. It was easy to set up and mounted it to his helmet. Now my husband wants one too, will be ordering again.
the battery last for 30 minutes very weak, the remote doesnt always work.  When you do action video, it seems to miss and glitch,

Bought this camera acouple of weeks ago to take on vacation. Easy setup, no problems with the wifi mode and mini sd card. Comes with 2 batteries. 1 battery can last taking 200 pictures and 5 min of video. Pictures come in clear, and the extra assesories all made well. I already have recommended this camera to a dozen people.  Why buy a $300 go pro when you can get the same quality for a fraction of the price!
Battery life sucks
The videos that are recorded are ok in quality but the picture and voice does not line up when played on video camera and recording anything over 720p is very jerky.

I have been loving this camera/video recorder. Very simple to use and has more features than my older GoPro. I got the 12mp but if you need the extra quality, shoot for the 20mp for just a few bucks more. Really glad I stumbled upon this great find.

Talk about value... This is probably the best bang for your buck camera on Amazon. Yes, it's not the BEST camera on the market, but it's not trying to be. Unless you're looking for top of the line quality for professional reasons, this is the action camera to buy.
Really great product!Fast delivery, lots of accessories, simple to operate, very good picture quality, has a video loop option so you don’t need to manually erase old videos.
Bought this for our honeymoon!Took it with us snorkeling in the ocean in Mexico. Got some really cool video underwater of fish. Loved having this!

I bought this camera to use as a dash cam, but I like the versatility that I can attach this to my bike or helmet primarily to take action shots.  I have it on 1080p (60fps), the mic is pretty weak, but the video is crisp and clear, and I can see the potential of simply adding music to the videos using an editor.  As a dash cam, I noticed the battery tended to heat up, so I took it out of its water proof case, and used one of its attachments to hold just the camera to my car mount, this seems to resolve some of the over-heating. Not all of the attachments included with the camera have instructions, you just have to figure it out yourself, for example I’ve figured out how to connect it to my selfie stick, and tri pod using the included attachments.  For the price and for what you get, this is a great value.  Additional accessories I’ve bought are extra batteries with charger so I don’t have to plug the actual camera to charge the battery, car mount and micro SD card.  I also downloaded the app Ez iCam, which lets you control the camera wirelessly through Wi-Fi, and this doesn’t appear to use my smart phone’s data plan, as one reviewer pointed out its pretty much an alternate to bluetooth.  But opening the files of the SD card from my PC, the videos weren’t broken up in 10 minute intervals as another review mentioned, just the length of the recording session.  Bottom line:  This camera is a great value, I enjoy its ease of use and versatility, and it will definitely come in handy.

I really like the camera.  Had a few issues with the attachments and HDMI port, but am in the process of working things out with Akaso.  They have been very acceptable in working out a resolution and in fast communication.  I have no problem recommending their product.

I purchased this product over the GoPro Hero based on price and recommendation from a Best Buy employee. After reading the reviews I was satisfied and decided to make the purchase. I was surprised with all of the accessories that were included. Everything fits with universal accessories. The camera is easy to operate. I however would prefer that when the camera is turned on that it is set to camera verses the video. It took some getting use to. I used this camera on a Caribbean vacation. It takes excellent land photos. Very clear and with great color. The wide lens  makes for beautiful landscape photos. This camera does not take good pic in dusk/dark. No flash. The underwater photos turned out well. I had many people ask me about my camera and even offered to buy it off of me. I would suggest this camera to anyone. I like the durability and ease of the camera. I used this in underwater, outdoors and  land with the waterproof case and with out.  This is a great buy for the price and quality.

I bought this action camera for my sons to use while fishing. It was very easy to figure out. My 11-year-old son was able to sync it to his phone and wears it comfortably with a chest mount for hours. The resolution and quality are comparable to the much more expensive Go Pro.

I was looking for a good and inexpensive alternative to the GoPro action camera's. I did some research and tried to compare the many brands/versions on the market. Based on the many reviews for the AKASO EK7000 4k camera and the price point of under $100, I wanted to see if I found a GoPro alternative. I have only had the camera for about a month now and I am quite pleased. Now...GoPro has some features that are better in terms of the quality of the sound/audio, but for this price point the quality is pretty darn goodl! The waterproof casing is sturdy and fits snug. I have not truly tested it in a pool or ocean yet, but I hope to do that in the upcoming months. I like that AKASO comes with an extra battery and the wrist remote. Syncing the camera to my smartphone was pretty easy using wifi. The camera is lightweight and has a 2 inch LCD display screen on the back. There are many pluses on this little action camera. This was definitely a good and inexpensive alternative to the GoPro's!

I like the ease of the unboxing and the look and feel of it. I think its really good buy. I would recommend. I will use for social media pictures and I think it will be great for that at the gym. A really amazing buy thank you so much for creating a great product.

I like the product a lot. it is simple to use and paired well with my iPhone. the wifi is a bit slow and the battery life is of course a bit on the low end but they do include 2 batteries so that's not really that big of a problem. The mounts that come with the camera are great and fit my friends go pro camera, the quality is on par with a go pro 2. I would purchase this as a gift for some one.
Nice little action sports camera. Comes with a good selection of mounts and accessories.
This is great very compact camera that is easy to use and lightweight.  Photo and movies quality excellent.  Comes with a nice accessory package.  Absolutely love it.

Just received it today. Its arrived with a nice accessory bundle, but missing a head strap and a floating handle. You need to order them separately.I shot a short video from my window and it  looks great.

So far I love my Akaso camera. It has been exposed to VERY cold temperatures (double negative digits) and has been reliable. I struggle using the app. Though it IS user friendly, my longer videos will not load on the app.
I love my little camera.. can’t wait to go on vacation...

I bought this camera for my 12 year old son. He has used this camera to take pictures and video.  He has used it in the pool, while sliding and snowmobiling to take videos. The images and quality come out great every time.

I’m a fisherman and needed something that wasn’t too expensive or too cheap. Then I found the Akashi ek7000! Thing is amazing! It works perfectly for what I’m filming and has awesome quality! And the accessories that come with it are perfect for my use!

The product is really easy to use. The instructions that came with the camera make it really easy to set up. The camera came with two batteries which is awesome so that you will always have a charged battery. It also comes with a dual battery charger.

To start off I must say I am no professional camera man. I did a lot of research into this product and many of its competitors prior to purchasing. It was interesting that the capabilities were expected to be comparable to that of an overpriced GoPro, and to make it even more attractive it was a fraction of the price. I have played around with a couple different models of the GoPro and I must say that I am thoroughly happy that I bought an action camera for much cheaper but with the same, if not better, quality than those that are outrageously priced. The functionality of the camera is fairly basic and requires little to no previous experience with action cameras. The menu is user friendly and easy to navigate.The package comes with a dozen or so attachments. Still trying to figure out what some of them are for, but that's not necessarily a bad thing. I will say that during a test shot, i took the camera (inside the waterproof case) out for a drive. Although i did not notice any evidence while playing back later, i did notice that condensation had gotten into lens of the waterproof casing. Not that the camera was at risk, because there is an air gap of sorts within the structure of the case at the lens part. Not sure whats up with that, but it very well could have been the fact that I live in the deep south and the humidity can be pretty unforgiving around here.

The camera came on time for my next ski trip. It looks very well done. Materials and the feel is like an expensive ones.I tested in my pool and dove 8' took a few pictures and all look very good quality.

This is a great camera for the price. You get sufficient mounts and a waterproof case. I have yet to test it while snorkeling, but above ground the picture is stable and has good color quality. The camera is also very easy to use and lightweight.
This camera was easy to set up and easy to use. The picture quality is good. The overall quality of the camera and the accessories were very good.
This Item is awesome.

Bought this on an impulse when I came across it from reccomendation via Amazon. The previous customer reviews sealed the deal and I would certainly agree with other happy customers. I have used this camera more than any other because of the convenience and small size and I have been coming up with new ideas for its use. Better than expected video and picture quality. The free app (android) works well as an interface to control the camera remotely and to view/delete stored items which is better than trying to navigate through the menu just using the buttons on the camera. The only drawback to this camera is that it needs a good amount of ambient light for best results (i.e. underwater shots when fishing don't turn out so well however images came out good at a water park in clear swimming water). My kids love this camera as well when I strapped it to them on a water slide; they keep asking to use it for all kinds of stuff. I purchased extra batteries and fast micro SD cards with my original order because of doubt of performance with other cameras but I quickly found out that the batteries last a good amount of time for my use (actual time unknown but I have been using the same battery for 3 days and still have half life left). I would reccomend not skimping on the sd cards as slower and lower grade cards can hinder speed and performance. I can't speak for the higher priced comparison but this camera has certainly won me over for a fraction of the price.

The picture/video quality is awesome! Going to order another one for a family member as a gift. Highly recommend!

Great Camera!Totally worth the price!

We use the camera for motorcycle riding as well as mountain biking.  We like it so much we bought a second camera! The picture/video is very stable and clear.  The items was shipped very quickly and included all of the accessories  that were advertised.  We were impressed with the number of mounting brackets that are included. The camera/casing is very durable and well made.  And the price is by far the most competative, very affordable!
The camera is awesome.. so worth the money.. I takes great pictures and video recording.. has many attachments for body bike and helmet and even selfy slick

This camera did its job and more for the price! I'm using this for our trips to amusement parks! This camera is great, just like the other big name brand cameras. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a great action camera at a great price!

this is an amazing product. i thought i needed a $400+ go pro to create content for my channel but this action camera knocked it out of the park it doesn’t have ies but for the price ill probably buy another one for my wife.

Nice camera, works well, worth the price. App is worthless for me, it connects but only displays some status info and won't do anything more, and the lack of documentation means this will go unresolved, I'm sure.
This camera is amazing!!! I love it... I recommend this product 100% works . If you want save money and get a niiiiiice camera, I suggest you this product

The camera is great for keeping on a tripod or a wriststrap. The waterproof case is fantastic for recording in the pool. The 1080 p seems to be better than the 4k at times but the quality is well worth the price.

Nice, still trying to figure out all that it offers. Can't wait for ski season.  Took it bear hunting,  was still trying to figure it out was hard with the low light,  hope to try again with low light activities.

I am enjoying the camera. I found it easy to use on my Can-Am Spyder RT. Love having the ability to record rides across roads less travelled. Would like a better-written manual as I am still discovering new ways to do things; but Google helps. The wrist control makes it really simple when wearing motorcycle gloves. If I hadn't purchased two (one for me, and one for my husband) I would buy again.
Great little camera especially for the price. Used it on the motorcycle for a rides and it works great. Ready for summer so I can use it underwater at the lake and pool.

Pleasantly surprised by the video quality and ease of use. Remote control works as it should. I was a bit concerned about purchasing a 64GB SD card as I was getting mixed signals as to what size actually works in these cameras but the 64GB works flawlessly. Battery life seems a bit short but so far I've only recorded in pretty low ambient temperatures so the extra battery comes in handy. Accessories seem to be of good quality. Bottom line is you'd be hard pressed to find a better camera for the price.

This is a great camera with good quality pictures and video. It comes with several diffeerent types of mounts and a decent cleaning kit. The remote works well. Great option if you don't want to spend several times more on a GoPro.

Perfect Action Camera.  Everything you need is in the box for mounting.  Fast shipping, well protected.  Many Thanks for a great product.  BTW, I ordered 2 of the camera's, one for the boat, another for my daughter.
Absolutely love this camera! This is my first one and I'm beyond impressed!
Very good camera. The picture quality at night and colour balance are not perfect, but for the price, this is perfect!
Product is great. Haven’t used it yet. But everything looks great. Small, sleek, cool camera. Comes with great accessories and 2 batteries!!
This is the best camera I've ever had my brother had a go pro 8 and we both agree that this camera is way better I recorded some of my toys and it made them look real.
This is a great little camera. We bought this for my son for his 10th birthday!  He loves it and has been using it a lot. Really glad that it comes with 2 batteries!
I use it when i go hiking, It works great, nice picture quality. Easy to use
It works good.
We took this on a cruise loved this camera so much and a great price
So far so good. Easy to use.

The Pros: The camera is exactly as described.  It comes with everything in the pictures and the camera and accessories are actually decent quality as well.  From past experience, when you buy an off brand GoPro product its normally pretty cheap.  But this stuff was actually pretty good.  The quality of the video is very good.  I own a Hero+lcd and the video is very comparable in quality.  I would definitely buy another one of these cameras.The Cons:  I didn't see anywhere that in order to shoot the higher quality modes you needed a class 10(high speed) micro SD card.  I assumed my micro SD cards i was using with my GoPro would work. (which could be my mistake).  The only other thing i dont care for is if the camera is on and I try to load it into the waterproof housing and snap the cover shut, it will start recording.

This is the first camera that I have ever purchased like this and it has set the bar high for any purchases in the future. Easy to use, performs just as described and well worth the price! I have already recommended it to friends and family.
Great value for the money I will be buying another at some point.
The camera was better than expected. It does exactly what I wanted. I'm using it as a wireless camera on my boat to see what is behind me. The waterproof case is a great extra. Fantastic price.

I ordered two similar cameras from another company. I knew they weren't top of the line, but the image quality was horrible at best. Once I got this camera and saw the quality of the 4k image I was satisfied. I am using it to record my wedding ceremony accompanied with another handful of cameras. The remote control is going to help immensely with this as well. I also like the rechargeable batteries and charging station.
This product gets a 4/5 because the waterproof case actually leaks, so water got in my camera from a test run. Also the battery life is only about 30 mins sadly from my experience.
My son was very happy with this, does everything he wants, just FYI when it is in the waterproof plastic case it does not pick up sound very well.
Only downfall battery dies soo quick takes okay photos for the price your getting sounds isn't too bad videos underwater are okay as well cant beat the price.
This product is a good one. Quality is on par with the go pro. 1080. It fits all my old go pro telescopes and short handles so I didn’t need to change the accessories!!
This is a great 1st camera. It took getting use too but now I am comfortable with it and can’t wait to do more.

This is a great Camera all in all comparable to a GoPro. I use it everyday for my rides. MAIN ISSUE is the battery life, idk if I got a defective set of batteries but they only last me 10-12 minutes at most when recording... hopefully the seller will reach out to me soon.
Love the camera so far. Son loves to use it on his bike. I use it for documenting vacations, just playing around and son uses it on bike, and to capture fun things. You'll love it.

Great little camera for the price. Works just like my friends more expensive model. Pictures and videos come out great. Easy to use on land and in the water. Lots of accessories that come along with the camera
Great little camera. Wish the packaging came with better labeling for all the accessories. Also wish the audio recorded when using the waterproof case.

I bought this camera for getting some cool videos, without having to pay the price of a go pro and I love this camera so far. I've only had it for a few days, but it has been great for the things I have done with it already!
real nice
Excellent Quality!
First Impression:camera looks sturdy & the design is very similar to GoPro.

This is our second Akasa Sports Action Camera, the first we bought for our daughter, who is heading off to college, so we got a second one for our younger daughter.  The camera is easy to use and the quality of the video is excellent.  The only thing to note is that the memory card is not included in the kit.  But definitely a great option when looking for a sports action camera.

My daughter loves the camera, she has used the hell out of it since it arrived.  Its been in the pool several times with no issues and it produces great quality images/video.  Great product at a great price!

I bought this for our son and his family for Christmas. Son is a bit of techy, so I was nervous if it would meet his needs. He was thrilled, and put it to use right away.  This is a really good camera and the price can't be beat.  It came with a lot of accessories, and even a coupon inside for more free. I highly recommend
This product is very good, the picture quality is pretty good, but the sound is not great on the device, but it is fine when you transfer the file to the computer. It comes with good accessories.

The camera films above and underwater well. Pictures are very clear. When the camera is in the waterproof case the audio is not very good. But outside of the case, the audio quality is just fine. Be sure to get an SD card. The camera requires one to record. Overall, I highly recommend the camera.

Excellent quality video and pictures. Great value since it comes with all the accessories. Why buy an expensive GoPro when you can buy this? It does all the same and comes with all the accessories for much cheaper!

I was slightly skeptical of all of the five star reviews but I decided to give it a chance. Ultimately, it really didn't meet my personal standards. First of all, one of the accessories shown in the description was missing. Second, the water proof case wasn't the best build quality and it had quite a few marks on it from the factory. The two major factors for my two star review though were due to the battery cover and the video quality. In general, a lot of the video quality wasn't even as good as what my iPhone can produce and it seemed to issues being played in both Quicktime and VLC. Now, the battery door is a huge issue for me. It's not hinged to the camera itself which makes it way too easy to lose due to how small it is. The battery door is also quite difficult to get off with your finger nail.Now, I understand that this is a very cheap product but I felt that it really wasn't worth it for what it is. Sure, it has a small form factor and it works with all the GoPro mounts. If you absolutely need a camera to work with that system, this might be satisfactory. I don't think that the camera's design gives it a lot of durability and the user interface isn't all that intuitive either.
Works and very usable for the rare times I want video. I can't justify the more expensive types for my limited use.

Honestly. This camara was amazing right out of the box. Camara quality is amazing. And all the adapters it comes with. I love it. Microphone  is not that great so I recommend tracking down an adapter for one. Other then that. No complaints.

I found this product very useful. It’s water proof, the battery life is long and the quality of the camera is fascinating. I recommend this product for everyone wanting to do stuff on camera outdoors!
if you're looking for an inexpensive action camera for hikes or in the ocean, this is it! I took it on a few hikes in California and it has great resolution for such a cheap price!

I just received this camera and it came in good condition. It comes with extra things I did not know it came with so that was a pleasant surprise! So far I enjoy this camera, and I look forward to testing it out more in the future.I would recommend this camera to somebody who wants a good underwater camera that doesn't cost a fortune.

Simply put, this is a great camera with awesome features and accessories. You’ll get a great product for a very fair and competitive price. I’m thinking about buying a 2nd one. I cannot stress enough how happy I am with my purchase.Buy one and you’ll also love it. I am giving it 5 stars. Very satisfied customer here.

Just like 1000 of other. It a great camera and 1080p 60 is the best setting. Going to us in mud run. Come with a water proof case and one that has vents in the back. Don't think twice. This is a great buy.

Overall great quality for the price margin vs purchasing a go pro for very similar image quality and other capabilities. Although the battery seems to die quickly, having a few spaces is very handy for those long video capturing days.

Took this camera on a family cruise vacation and it was a blast to use. Easily portable and great image above and below the water. Several people on our excursion wanted to know where we got ours. Would highly recommend!

It's been a few hours since I've gotten my camera and everything is great. I've already recorded some test footage in 1080p60 & 4k & it came out great when I uploaded to my computer. Had a little struggle with the app but I figured it out.
I thought the quality would be at least the same as a iphone Xr. Turns out the quality is probably as good as a older generation phone like a galaxy s3.

I got this camera because I couldn't bring myself to drop $400 for a Go Pro that I'll probably end up destroying...the stuff I record gets a little tough on the equipment.  This thing is great.  The footage quality is great, and it's simple to use.
I used this product for videoing parkour & video games.  I like this camera, especially it's size!The video is quality & the battery lasts for awhile.

Excellent camera for the price, I really like the fact that the camera came with 2 batteries.  Good selection of mounting accessories came with camera.  Love the variety of video and photo modes. Really like the included remote.
Great product for the price (especially when it's on sale).  Image quality is as good as it can get in that price range, as long as you don't need image stabilization it's an excellent product.

It does not come with a memory card and it does not work without a memory card. Once you buy a memory card and upload the video to your computer, you will find the video quality is choppy and essentially useless.

It is very easy to use and set up, got started in 5 min.  Tough and great for youth to use.  Purchase price compared to other products like it is great.  Happy with the image/video quality and the underwater video is just as good.  Highly recommend.
Only downside is that every time you have to replace the battery, you lose the day and time and it needs to be reset.
Great alternative to GoPro as this device offers all the same basic functionality for a fraction of the cost.

I just got this action camera about a week ago to bring with me on a trip.  I leave for my trip tomorrow morning and I just realized that the water proof case broke.  I've only taken it out of the case to charge.  And somehow the plastic piece that you use to mount the camera broke! I'm so frustrated. I haven't even been able to use it and it has already broken.  How is it suppose to with stand any environment when the case broke on its own while taking the camera out in order to charge it.

Great little GoPro for a fraction of the price of a name brand GoPro. The first video was a bit fuzzy but I’m sure it’s user error and not the camera. Easy enough for my son to use- this was a gift for my 10 year old son from his grampa

i like everything about it for a 50 dollar camera. It comes with a lot of accessories and the batteries last long. And they charge really fast. They have really good customer service. I highly recommend getting this camera.
So far so good! More bells and whistles than the go pro!
My wife, my kids and I have been enjoying how easy it is to operate. A live view on either the back of the device or remotely on a smart device (usually my phone) is really nice.
Works pretty well for a good price point.

Camera is easy to set up and easy to record the fun. We installed this camera on our off road vehicle and we now have proof of how much fun we have. I highly recommend this camera for all your video recording needs!

Camera was great....the first and only time it worked.  Took it on a trip to a wedding and half way through the wedding it shut off. When I turned it back on it showed on the screen “card error”. I’ve tried different SD cards in it and still receive the same message every time

We bought this for a trip to Europe and it’s perfect. We aren’t high tech camera people, but wanted to capture some moments along the trip. This was the perfect price point and a great value. Videos and pictures are great!
I can't believe how well this camera performs for the price point. Lot's of goodies included as well... several mounts and two batteries. Awesome deal.
Great product, easy to use and quality is 4k

Got this camera for an upcoming road trip and so far it works like a charm. Very intuitive from the start and user-friendly to people who may be using an action camera for the first time. The attachments it comes with are also quite comprehensive!

Truly amazing action camera, the same if not better than the major name brand out there. Build quality and picture quality I would say are on par with the major brand. App and camera menu's are super easy to use and navigate.

Love this little camera!! The video quality is as advertised. The app that connects to your phone is user friendly. The attachments that already come with the camera fit with a selfish stick I already have. There are so many options with these pieces. Cannot wait to use while diving and playing tourist in Hawaii!!

This little guy did not disappoint! Took this camera on my trip to Puerta Vallarta and it was exceptional and super convenient to connect to iPhone on the fly and upload videos to share online within seconds!
The best camera that I ever bought for my motorcycle. Really simple to install it. I love it. Very good quality and resolution.
Worked great underwater. Took it diving under 60 feet. Easy to use and hold steady. Happy with my purchase.

This camera is great for the price especially.  I watched several side by side reviews vrs the hero5 and I just couldn't see $300 difference.  Great camera so far and Im happy I went with hit camera. I use it for hiking and occasionally as a dash cam and it works perfect for both. Still photos are not bad either.
Excellent product with lots of accessories for a great price.  Needed to see why my dishwasher wasn't cleaning the top rack and this, along with a dive light, worked perfect ! !

I bought this camera for my sons 11th birthday. He has enjoyed using it on his dirt bike and around the house. We haven’t been anywhere yet with water to test the underwater capabilities but we love the camera and quality of the pictures it takes!

Was looking for a action camera for under $100. Didn’t want to shell out the $$ for a GoPro, especially since this is my first time buying one and didn’t know how much use I’d get out of it. Haven’t had a chance to use it, but the packaging was great and made me feel confident the camera would be too. Can’t wait to book my next Colorado trip and try it out!

I don't think I could justify purchasing a professional GoPro camera for a trip, so I went with this option and was impressed with the photos and videos. It worked well underwater and photos from the trip turned out good.

I have liked everything about this action camera except for the battery life -- with continuous recording I typically get 75minutes on 1080P 60FPS.  Just buy a few extra batteries and you will be set.

Do some research before buying this cam.I bought this cam to mount on my JetSki. What I later learned is, thr bazillion clips, mounts and adjustments needed to get a decent continuos anngle is simply a hassle ..
I have this mounted to the handlebars of my bike and it works great. Good picture and video quality. Battery life is pretty good. The phone app is okay but I prefer to connect it to the computer.

I bought this for my father  for Christmas and I've yet to get the camera to work. I bought a Sandisk Ultra Plus 32gb, High Class 10 card and I can't get the camera to format the card. I'm heading to the store to by a new one (different brand) to see if this works but if there are any suggestions from customers I'd sure like to know what I'm doing wrong?

Great quality product for the price. Easy to setup and use as a standalone camera, with remote and with the app.  Came with many mounting accessories.  Easy to switch modes and I liked the timelapse setting options.

I like this small camera. It is really convenient. The screen is clear. The videos and pictures are very clear. It comes with 2 batteries which is good so you don’t lose any interesting pictures or videos during your trip. Using the Wifi to connect the camera to your phone is the best feature so you can watch everything from your phone and download whatever you want there. I recommend this brand!

I really liked this product. It was simple to use and the app made it really helpful too. I recommend this if you want a good 4K camera and it comes with everything you need like different pieces for mounting it the only thing it didn’t come with was a sd card
