Bought this for my 10 year old son to create videos with his electronic devices.  He is having a blast.  It is easy to use and will have so much fun in the pool this summer with it as well.  Very comparable to GoPro at a MUCH more reasonable price.

It's great! The picture quality is fantastic. Very easy to use. The app is a great idea for an action camera. The watch is an awesome addition and the camera itself is sleek and light weights. Comes with everything you need to get started. Highly recommended!
The unit keeps freezing when trying to switch between photo or video mode. you have to shut down the unit and restart.

Great camera especially for the price! Used it on a cruise and it took amazing pics above and below water. On one snorkeling trip we had the camera under the water for over an hour and it worked great. Tons of accessories come with it. After buying it I had to watch a couple tutorial videos on Youtube before using it because the manual doesn't give very much description. I would HIGHLY recommend this camera.

Finally a camera that does what it is supposed too do, take quality videos and photos. Had a geekpro that had poor quality all around. This Akaso has not let me down. Camera has been through  rain, snow, cold and hot conditions. This is the only camera that is trail ready that travels with me. Only issue is i ordered a black one and was sent a blue one. I can live with that. The remote makes things so easy to toggle on and off pics and video.
I love it. While filming I didn't think it was gonna come out good but once I opened it up on my computer  the picture is beautiful. I might be getting a second one for my car!
Pros: Good picture/video quality, actually waterproofCons: A bit smaller than expected, the mic doesn't work while the waterproof shell is on, WiFi share is not noob friendly.

I love the exposure on this camera. The simple fact that it comes with numerous mounts and accessories is such a bonus. It makes it all more than worth the price. Definitely pick one up if you want a budget gopro and you wont be disappointed.
Used it to record my tennis match and the footage is crisp. Very great small awesome cam for the price! You definitely get your money’s worth for an affordable quality camera.

Great product for the price. Tons of mounts and accesories included, it really is the definition of bang for your buck. Taken a few videos of my daughters and they turned out great, cant wait to get out on the water with it on my kayak!!

Good camera using 4 of them to shoot live band rehearsal, image is good and clear.  The remote feature is great to get all cameras shooting at the same moment to sync later. .. using a separate audio capture device for clearer sound

We loved the ease of use. Bought it for our 11 year old. Had a little trouble figuring out how to upload the video to an iPad. Solved the he problems with a card reader accessory. Love that it came with an extra battery.
Todo pude grabar pero el momento más importante de mi viaje no se grabó nunca se pudo ver el vídeo
Bought 5 of these for my son and nephews for Christmas. They are easy to setup, picture quality is great, and the kids are having a blast with them!
Love it works great

This camera is well worth it. I received one as a gift and could not believe the quality. Awesome picture and videos. I hunt and fish a lot and having a durable waterproof camera is a must. I would highly recommend this product.

This action camera was well worth the money. I love it and would buy it again. The charge on the batteries lasted a long time. It came with alot of attachments and the quality is amazing. It does everything it is supposed to and more.

Bought this little camera for a recent cruise. I really struggled between purchasing this camera or a used GoPro. I made the right choice!  I am very pleased with the quality of the video both above the waterline and below with the waterproof case. I used it for both video and still pics, daytime and nighttime.  This little camera gave me the quality I wanted for a price I appreciate!
This is my second one and they work great for outdoors.

Took it on my camping trip and got some awesome high quality shots! Definitely perfect for ourdoor adventures, and more durable than a phone so you can safely take pictures anywhere outdoors. Also an AMAZING deal.
Fairly easy to use and extra accessories easy to obtain. Great picture with App and WiFi features very helpful.
Great product for the price. No, it’s not a GoPro, but I don’t shoot enough film to justify spending that much.
Exactly what I needed.  We have used this out and about as well as in the pool.  Great way to capture memories!
Price is ok . I love the  built in Wifi . Also  the wrist watch remote comes very handy .
Awesome

Honestly, I think this camera is better than the GoPro. You don’t have to waste money on it. If you need a cheap and good quality camera choose this one. I love how this comes with a remote that you can attach on a wrist strap.
Nice ca,era but poor instructions. If you’re not tech savvy, don’t buy
What a great camera!!!  I used it to record. My kids wakeboarding.  The video was high quality, and you couldn’t tell when I went over numbs in the lss as lake.  Worth the money for sure!!
Perfect camera at a great price! The photos and video are clear, you can control from your phone, and it comes with a ton of attachments.Can’t wait to see all the great things I can do with it.

I absolutely love this camera!  It does everything I hope for... for fraction of price of other competitors.  It is impressive camera and I highly recommend for novice like me to get into filming world.It was def. good buy.
My son is having so much fun with his camera!  It started with silly videos around the house, but now he can get out and record him sledding and skiing.  Can't wait to take it to the beach in summer!

This product is sooo cool! Good vid! Not very good audio in case but it works for what I need it for. Am going  to use it for vid of my adventures . I think a very cool thing about this is the button for your rest
I wanted the brand name so bad but didn’t want to spend the cash, this is a great item and I saved hundreds!
I don't have a more popular camera, but I'm guessing this one is every bit as good. I am very happy with my EK7000.
Colors are better than the GoPro i first used. Given that I'm using it in a racecar it is surprisingly stable
I've had this unit for almost 9 months. Taking it into the pool and the lake has been a lot of fun. So many great videos of my kids and family.
Original product package arrived opened. Multiple parts were missing individual packaging. No voice while replying recorded video on the phone. Very poor voice quality while replaying on camcorder.
We love our camera! It takes amazing pictures

The Akaso EK7000 is an awesome product.  Great value for the product you get.  I've used different type of products and would greatly recommend this camera for anyone especially if very active with kids.

This camera has been a lot of fun so far. Easy to use right out of the box, clear video and picture, stabilization works great, cancels out strong wind noise no problem. I like that it comes with so many attachments and a spare battery. Several different resolutions and frame rates to choose from. The remote control app has worked well so far and stays connected at good distances away from the camera, and the wristband control is also a great feature to operate handsfree or where I wouldn't want to take my phone. So far I am very pleased.

Took this out today on our walk with the dogs had a great time filming them on the trail without having f to hold camera or cell phone and kept our hands free toco from the dogs. Will be buying this for Christmas Gifts
First of all I am a beginner when it comes to cameras. However, this camera it's amazing. You can even take pictures or videos underwater and still have an excellent quality.
My son uses the product. He mentioned that it is a good little camera for the price.

Perfect action cam for my daughter! She mounted it to her bike and loves making action videos! She can also take it off and make other short video clips. Clear picture, easy to use. Quality camera! It's actually the 2nd one we have in the house.
excellent camera, I use it every day when I go to work on my motorcycle.  good image and quality.  It was a good purchase.
Liked the remote and the waterproof case.Disliked the low frame rate for good video quality.
Product was perfect and exactly what we hoped for! Love everything about it and recommend to anybody!
This is by far better than a Gopro, it is 1/4 of the price and much better qualityHas more attachments and wireless remote. Perfect!
This little camera performed flawlessly on our cruise. We used it for taking pictures as well as underwater on a snorkeling excursion. The video is beautiful.
I've searched on the market for an action camera and that was the best one in overall that I've found. Video and photo quality is so good for a $60 camera!
Takes a decent picture. Will record about 1hr video in 1080p on battery.
Product accessories not good. Lost while on my kayak due to wind

I got this as a last minute replacement for my gopro and it exceeded all of my expectations! Technology has sure come a long way. I'm amazed at how a camera this affordable can keep up with the more expensive leaders in the market. Would recommend!
What a super great deal on this bundle package with this little camera.

Compared videos posted online of GoPros vs EK7000 and decided this camera was up to the job.  I added a Zhiyun 3 axis (made for GoPro) and it works well. Also added an EC Technology 22400 external battery/charger.  It powers the camera for 6 hrs with no issues.  I'm using a Samsung 64gb cards which hold 6 hrs of 1080/30fps video.Unit comes with various mounting brackets.  I created another using a battery charger clamp that holds to the top of a Polaris ATV.  Videos riding around the Ranch are great.  Even without the 3 axis gyro, they are pretty vibration free.  Great for catching those unexpected times when a critter pops up just in front of you.

Really liked the camera functionality. I have filmed my son doing tricks on his bike as well as hiking in the woods.  4K quality video. I would recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for an inexpensive way to capture memories.

i like this camera worked right out the box, does what i need it to and the fact that it records in 4k is a plus. i got for recording in my car when driving for the price is 100x better then a gopro camera.. highly recommend it!!

I have owned Go-pro cameras in the past and have always liked the capabilities but not the price.This camera is on par with all that a go pro can do for a fraction of the price. I love it! Highly recommend

This camera is absolutely awesome for the price. Very good picture quality and very easy to use. The only negative is that it does not do well in low light, although that was not expected for the price.
Recieved the camera and so far its everything it said it would be . Cant wait ti try the quality on our ride this weekend
I love this camera. My friends like the quality as well. I just wish it came with a body connection.
This camera is really awesome. It was totally worth the price. I wanted to get a go pro but I saw this cheap camera and bought it. It is really easy to use and good quality!

Great quality and easy to use. Purchased for an 11 year old and was very easy to work and figure out. The wrist band is super helpful when taking videos and pictures. I have not yet tested it with water. I would recommend this product for all ages.

Just took it out yesterday for the first time and hoping it is going to be ok, time will tell. So far I am finding it is easy to use but the attachments are a bit confusing, using YouTube to figure it all out:-)

Bought this for my grandkids to play with.  They love it.  Really nice quality for the price.  Makes them feel like YouTube stars.  Have not tried the waterproof case but seems nice.  Overall, happy with the gift and I do recommend.

I bought this camera not expecting too much, but I was blown away. The picture quality is great, and you get every accessory that you need, included!! I got one for my friend for his birthday, I highly recommend!!
I liked the quality of the video/pictures. There are many cameras that say 1080 or 4K but are false, but this one isn’t. It actually has good quality. It is also very easy to set up and learn to use.
My husband love it! Thanks so much!
what i wanted
It was hard to understand at first, Its worth the money, and takes good quality vids..
Great camera for the price. Bought two for my kids and they loved them.

This action cam is great. If your looking for an affordable camera with excellent video quality, this is the one to buy. A lot of bang for your buck. I'm thinking of getting another one to get a 2nd viewing angle on my fishing kayak.

Love this little camera. We took it to a theme park and it took great video of the rides and animals. Pictures are good too. Looking forward to taking it kayaking. Love that it has the waterproof case, and all of the great mounts and accessories it comes with!
This is such an awsome camera for the excellent price I paid and I can't wait to go out on the bike trials with it!!!! Thanks AKASO !!!
I bought this Camara for my kids ski trip, results were amazing. Worth it, money well spend. Lot better then gopro.

bought the camera for a winter diving trip.  Very easy to learn how to use in under 24 hrs and worked perfectly under water to 30 feet on 1st use.  Great action camera!!Had some issues with waterproofing @ 60 feet but worked with them and received a replacement.  Working great now!

This camera is amazing. It is just the same quality and look as a $600 Go Pro. I would rather pay 60 instead of 600. it has all the same features and may even be better than a Go Pro. I love it and working for me so far. Would by again.

This camera has worked just as well as many GoPro's that I have used in the past. Whether you are looking for a budget option or just trying to find a good quality action camera. This is definitely one to consider!

Bought this camera for my son as a gift. I didn’t want to pay the GoPro price for a camera. He used it diving on vacation at the beginning of March and it worked very well. The picture quality was very good and it was easy to use.
really great camera for the money.  No external mic is a problem.
Ready to make video memories

This is a very great product I was skeptical at first but was amazed by the quality of the camera. The only downfall is the app, the app crashes constantly. Other than the app I am more than happy with my purchase.
Not that awesome, but a nice action camera for the price. It would have been better if they added some key accessories with it
Camera is awesome. It comes fully loaded. More pieces than I know how to use. My gFirst GoPro style camera.
The camera is good price for that Quality. But if you have more budget get something different
I have already used this camera for snorkeling and whitewater rafting and it holds up great! Both the images and the videos have exceeded my expectations. It is also very easy to use!
Was expecting the get what you pay for with this but wasn't the case with this action cam records great video with clear picture first ever action cam and for a budget but I am highly impressed

Great product so far.. couldn't wait to use it so I mounted it right up and drove around the neighborhood. I have a big trip coming up off roading. In Colorado and wanted to capture everything. Thos is easy to use.

Bought this item for my 11 year old step son. I have seen him use it and he enjoys using it everywhere. It comes with lots of attachments and is very simple to use. Price is a plus compared to the high dollar ones.

I was looking for gopro for a cruise trip but found this for half of the price. This is the first time I am using sports camera but I absolutely liked it. The Quality of the picture is great and using it while snorkeling is priceless. having a peace of mind in the water that you are not going to loose $300 camera by accident. The only mistake happened was I always end up running out of battery for the prime time. I realized that I need to plan well and carry more than one battery all the time. The best money I spent for the vacation. Love it!!
The product is selling lower price than lighting deal and the quality is not that good.
So much fun to use down at the springs.

I wanted to really like it because of the extra accessories but thats probably the only reason why it is a good buy. I would return it if I can and buy something else instead. They should focus on improving the camera features and not the additional items they combine with the product.
This is a nice camera, but it overheats and the app does NOT work!
Haven't had a chance to put it in action yet, but initial tests are good.  Can't beat the price.  Intend to use it with the included remote to self film my bow hunts this fall.
Seems to be working very well so far. I have no real knowledge of cameras so I can't tell if this is "better" than others, but it takes good picture and video and works intuitively.

Took a chance on this product to save some money from buying the Go Pro and it was a great buy video quality and images are great. We use them on our helmets for trail riding quads and dirtbikes comes with endless attachments great buy
This product never worked. I took two videos and then it stopped turning on. Being the only camera I took on my trip to Egypt, I was very dissapointed.
Should be supplied with a basic operators manual. Not have to print out long PDF file.

I was just in the Bahamas and this camera worked flawlessly, I was very impressed. The only issue that i found was that after several days of snorkeling 3-4 hours a day the the pin in the waterproof case started to rust and made the door of the case harder to close and stay closed. I would recommend the upgrade to the brave 5, if you are going to be in the water. Otherwise a fantastic camera for the dough.
Bad product

I just got the camera today and it comes with every accessory that you may need. We are planning to take it on a vacation to Central American and it has everything we need for our upcoming trip. Bonus that it comes with an extra battery!
4k is choppy and unable. You get what you pay for. I would not recommend this product and regret the purchase

I buy so many things on Amazon that I find it cumbersome to write reviews for all of them. Although, I had to review this product after I used it. First of all, I received the package in a day after I placed the order. I planned a ski trip for the weekend and being a beginner/intermediate at skiing, I wanted to record how it feels and also just for the experience. I started looking at GoPro but it was expensive even for a basic model especially when I'm not a professional. Then I saw the Akaso sports camera and from the price point, you just can't beat it. Coming to the quality of it, I thought the pictures and the video would be decent, as with a 12MP camera and a HD video recording capability at 60fps, it can't go bad. To my surprise though, even in the cloudy weather I got some really good pictures. The wide angle camera is just great. I need not worry about which way my camera should point as it covers a lot of area. I later took a video too and I loved it. Apart from the camera in general, there are a ton of accessories that come with it which are really useful. Overall, I definitely recommend this product not only from a price point but also after being satisfied with the quality of it.
Works as advertised

I love how this product is water proof and how easily it was too use , it was not complicated at all . The quality is really nice . The only thing I didn’t like was it did not include a sims card and a selfie stick .
Great camera for the price! Was blown away by all the attachments that it came with! It also included 2 batteries and a charger.

The camera is great. It is a good value for the money and takes great pictures and video. I am really satisfied with my purchase. I am glad I did not spend extra money on a GoPro because this is better. This is my second time buying this because the last was was stolen. Great value

I got this for my dad for Christmas and it fits his bike perfectly. It comes with a bunch of accessories and mounts for gear, and the UI is super easy to learn. This product, compared to GoPro, is affordable and does the job just as intended.
Had to return the camera bad picture distortion during video recording. Unable to repair through tech support. Waiting for replacement.

I bought this for my husband for Christmas, and we have used it on a few hikes to record videos and take pictures. It has been very reliable, and it is easy to use! We like the size of it and how user friendly it is. Would definitely recommend!
Works great and has a great features!

I tried it out when I got it home & the quality seems to be very good. The water proof case does not leak. I will update my review after my vacation. My only complaint is that the battery doesn't last as long as I would like. Overall I give it an A+.

So far this has been awesome. Definitely for the price it’s hard to beat. Seems sturdy and will be a great little camera for my outdoor adventures. Major plus with all the included accessories as well. Walking and recording with the camera wasn’t as bad as I thought it was going to be.

Very happy with this camera.  Great picture quality and videos are very sharp.  All the features and accessories are easy to use and assemble.  The wifi and remote feature is great.  Great value for the price.  Definitely going to be a go to for holiday presents for family and friends.
Perfect for my daughter to play with and get experience with filming in different environments.
Cant beat it for the price. The extra battery is needed - I recorded about 35 minutes before the battery died. Footage looks great. Fits all my GoPro accessories too.

The camera works ok outside of the water, but it won’t start as soon as you enter the water. The screen will only show the Mgcool logo. I checked and double checked the plastic case, and everything was installed as instructed. I was not able to use the camera under water, and that made me very disappointed.

It is an amazing camera. Super clear image. Light weight. Lots of mounts and parts,  so you can use it anywhere. 2 battery is so helpful.  It is just perfect plus very reasonable price.  Great camera.
Easy to set-up and use.  I will use it as a gift for my friends who need a camera to supplement their cell phone.  I wish it could record sound while in waterproof case.
This was bought for my son for his birthday.  He absolutely loves it.  Great camera and super easy to use.

Great Xmas gift to my skateboard video editor! Haven't had a chance to try out all the features and accessories but so far so good and for the price you can't beat it. Can't wait to see it used for many skateboard edits to come.
This is supposed to be a gopro alternative. Never messed with a GoPro so I can't make a comparison.It has all the features I was looking for and then some.
Excellent product except the waterproof case had a crack in the face. I wouldLike a new one. I don't want to
Just wish they had included a case and a booklet of instructions.

Es un producto bueno, bonito y barato. Trae con el alrededor de 10 accesorios baterias,cargador para las baterias, control remoto, chaleco entre otras cosas. Si estas buscando algo economico y bueno este es el producto a comprar

I got this to try and share my experiences of fly fishing and some of the fish that I catch. Not only did the camera catch it but it made it very easy to start recording with the wrist control! Great product!

My brother in law is loving it. He likes he can see the footage on his phone when he's recording. Colors are vibrant! He wants to buy himself some more of these handy guys! He does have an older gopro but you can't beat the price. I was a bit worried when he tried charging it...the cable was losing the connection to the camera and it would stop charging. He's a very practical guy and made it work. He is very happy with it...and he's a picky guy. Great gift!
Bought for my teenage son to use on our cruise.  This little camera works great.  I just wish it had come with a handheld adapter.
Good quality camera, especially for the money. Who needs a GoPro when this option is available?

this camera was amazing at its job of filming underwater, but could use a little better quality on the above water side, i personally don't think its 4k but i guess so be advised the remote is SPLASH PROOF not water proof so thats also a misconception. all around great camera!

My son bought this to be able to take videos of him outside, biking and having adventures. The camera works really well. We thought it came with a SD card, but it didn't. So other than that, we love this product.

Bought this for a trip only to find out I can't upload the pictures to my phone when I'm here because it won't connect wirelessly. The solution of the customer service was a pause and an "oh" return in and buy another one. Terrbile technical support and product you get what u pay for
This was a gift for my grandson and he loves it
Got this for the wife. She loves it and says the batteries die WAY to fast but okay because it came with 2 but would really like a better quality battery

I took this camera with me on my trip to Costa Rica, and it was such a great camera! the battery lasted me all day long throughout my excursions and the video quality was impeccable. I really enjoyed how easy it was to capture all of my wonderful moments in the jungle of Costa Rica, though I do wish there was a seflie stick available, the camera was worth the money!

Bought it for snorkeling trip, all went well.  In regards to all the accessories sent with the camera, I had to research online how to use them.  Felt the instructions could be more helpful in explaining their use.  Otherwise, very happy with purchase.

I really like this little Action Camera. The video quality is Superve in comparison to the branded action Camera out there. The price is awesome, you could get 3 of this Akaso for the price of one GoPro. So I really like this.

Not bad for the price. I wish it came with a booklet instead of visiting the site for setup instructions. A lot of tools came with it and an extra battery. Cant wait to really put it to use for my fishing trips.

Using the AKASO EK7000 4K  to document my fishing experiences.  Perfect budget friendly camera for stills and action! Would definitely recommend,  especially as a backup or for several different views of action.

This is one of the best purchases I have made! Bought it for my son to take underwater pictures in our pool. Pictures and videos are so clear. My son figured out how to use without instructions! Love love love!!
Camera plus accessories good. Packaging was exceptional. Picture quality is good for the price.
Happy so far
Cheap no frills camera.  Pretty much a low end smart phone camera in a box..

I am still learning this camera, but so far I am trilled with it. The camera with all the attachments being so much better priced than the G_PR _ brand, I wasn't sure what to expect. This thing can perform with theirs all day. Only problem I have is the product description states it is compatible with 64gb micro sd card. The User Manual does not list the 64gb card, only 8gb,16gb and 32gb. I ordered the Samsung 64 Pro Select with this camera. Going to try it and see what happens.

I purchased this for an upcoming cruise.  I was a little concerned that because of the price I would be sacrificing quality but I have been pleasantly surprised.  This is a good action camera and I am looking forward to all the fun stuff I can do with it.
This is a great alternative to the Go Pro. I use this for filming trails while riding dirt bikes and the camera really holds up to the terrain. Happy with my purchase!
This little camera does wonders, I didn’t expect it to be this good. The quality of the camera is top notch and I’d buy it again for sure. Neat little action camera

Died after about 8 hours of use over a 3 month period.  Will no longer power on and is now 2 months past its support date at only 4 1/2 months old....  I don't know how I missed that this company doesn't even have a legit website or offer a warranty of any kind as I just don't buy electronics without warranties (sure, I have no doubt I had the option to buy an extended plan at an additional 50% cost but opted not to I'm certain - my bad).  They have no website listed on any of the product material from the manual to the box it comes in.  This was a tragic error on my part but a terrible product on theirs.  This is a prime case of "you get what you pay for" so we're going with GoPro now.  Everyone I know that has one has gotten 100x their money's worth compared to what we got from this landfill plug.
Battery drains quick but good quality video for price
Great camera for the money.
This product is absolutely everything I wanted and the price is also amazing!The camera and picture quality and almost professional and the video is 1080p at 60 fps which is perfect for anything.

This camera is AMAZING! The video quality is as great or BETTER than GoPro. I am extremely satisfied with this purchase! After you take video or pictures, send them straight to your phone! The only complaint I have is that there are no instructions for the accessories or how to use them! Would recommend this camera to anyone who loves the outdoors and water!

I gave this to my son as a gift. He is a film major and was looking for a action camera. After reading the previous reviews I felt pretty comfortable in ordering this camera. Within 1 day of him having it he told me how great it was. The quality of the product itself is strong and we'll made. Better yet though, the quality of his filming was awesome. He was thrilled with all he was able to capture and all the different ways he was able to capture it. Overall this purchase was a 100% win!!!!

We got this product for our son who wanted a "GoPro" for skiing.  He loves this product, it works great, has a remote control, and tons of accessories.  Great quality videos and pictures without the big cost!

This camera seems to have everything you’d want to mount or carry it around with you. In or out of the water. We are looking forward to using it to take pictures of the kids swimming and playing for years to come!
Easy to use!

Really loved this camera so much that I will be purchasing another one.  The video quality is excellent.  We will be cruising in October an will enjoy using this camera on our snorkeling trip.  I would recommend this product.
What a great camera! The fact that the cost is much lower than a Go Pro is a bonus! It comes with just about every attatchment imaginable. I’m buying a second one!

Got this for my 9 year old gymnast for her birthday.  She has had so much fun with it and the remote has been perfect.  We took it to disneyland and it captured better video then my 1500.00 DSLR!!  Very happy with this purchase so far!
Double Stick tape isn't very strong, my camera fell from windshield on a warm day. Luckily wasn't  drivingor it could have been a safety issue . I highly recommend using 3M double sided tape !
Thank you very much don’t know what I won’t do without you
liked the twin batteries it comes with. Get about a solid hour of filming before you need to change battery. very impressed with the camera for the price.

I got this for my son for his birthday and the first thing he did was use it for a school project. He got an A! I’m glad I chose this product as it is awesome to watch video feed from his projects and he is now doing a lot more outside to capture great videos and pictures!

This is an absolutely amazing budget action camera. The only place it falters, I've found, is the after purchase support with things like apps. GoPro wins in that department, but at 1/6th cost you can't really blame them on not spending the dollars for apps. Personally I won't ever use the app anyways, but if I'm doing an honest review I'd say that's a weak spot.

I didn’t know what to expect when i got this camera. But now i am in love with it and it takes the best videos and picture. I recommend you get this camera. For that price, it is a must have especially if you go on trips alot!

My son loves this camera. It is easy to assemble and is truly comparable to an expensive GoPro. Completely my fault in not reading that the SD card is not included, but with so many extras, ordering an SD card is no big deal!

I have used this camera for different things like to film work out or hockey and this has worked great. I didn't want to spend the money for the GoPro so I tried this and I found it just as good from others that have a GoPro.

I really like this camera it has all the accessories you need to have fun with it , and since it’s a waterproof camera you can use it practically anywhere you go and I didn’t had to pay hundreds to get a really good product!!

I got this item to film for a skiing family trip. I love the amount of accessories provided with the camera that allow a very diverse mounting system. For those wondering, it does not come with an SD card but the additional cost is minimal.
I really enjoy mi new toyGood quality of videos and pictures

This is probably the best budget camera ever! If I don’t know what camera to start with this is the best choice. First it’s small and waterproof it also has really good picture quality. It also has good accessories that comes with it. Therefore it’s the BEST camera I have used
Well got this for my husband, he's loving it. He bought more mounts to put it on his helmet and fender on our trike, his truck...surprised he hasn't put it on our dog..oops, that might happen ;)
Fantastic
Very good picture quality for the price. I didn’t expect it to look that good. I haven’t tried it under water yet, but I will on my next vacation. I feel it’s worth the money so far.
Really like the camera so far. I been putting it through the ringer and its holding up great. I'll be taking it to Puerto Rico soon and im really looking forward to using it in the climate.
Nice camera, remote doesn't work all the time though.  Better than expected picture quality.  Easy to use once you read the directions!

This camera is so amazing and easy to use! Arrived so quickly in perfect condition and works incredible, just as described. The price is incredible for all that you get and the quality of the video is great! Definitely worth it!

We are so so sad! We bought this for our daughter for Christmas from Santa and upon opening the box, the waterproof case for the camera WAS ALREADY BROKEN! We hardly had a chance to even explore the camera. So disappointed.

The seller mailed my 2 action cameras very quickly.  Everything was as was stated in the description.  Used the camera first in my house to see how it worked and was very pleased with the picture quality even indoors.  I am so glad I decided on this product.

The device arrived as expected. Nice packaging, with descriptive manuals. Initial tests have impressed me so far. We have an old slow SD card, so video is kinda "meh" but I'm operating under the assumption that the card is the reason. I'll update the review if it doesn't pass muster, but I have little doubt about the problem. Pictures are clear, and connection to Chromebook, and Windows based systems is seamless. I tested the Android app and it seemed to work with no issues. Setup took some tinkering, but it works great so far.
Great action camera! Included everything but a memory card. Appears sturdy and of good quality. My son and myself will enjoy it outdoors.
Beach
I have already used it different times in different environments and it has always worked perfectly, with nice pictures and videos for such a reasonable price!
I bought this camera for my 13 year old soon and he loves it. He uses it while skiing, in the lake, etc...Easy to use, great product, recommend it!

Always wanted an action cam to capture our family vacation.  The photo and video quality is not as good as my DLSR of course, but in a bright sun light outside, it looks pretty good.  It comes with many accessories, including the one that can attach to my ski pole which can turn into like a selfie-stick.  Can't wait for my next ski trip coming up. We have plans to go snorkeling and zip lining in the Caribbean too, and this should serve well.  Best of all, you can't beat the value of this product, as many others have already mentioned.
Got the product on Saturday and very impressed from the initial recordings. Easy to use. Looking forward to using it in different settings!
Very nice video quality for what we were using it for - just wish I could say the same for the audio.
There were no instructions but there are plenty of you tube videos with all of the detail that you may need.
Bought this for our 8 year old grand daughter. She had no roblems operating it and uses it almost daily Great buy.

Thought this was a good alternative to a GoPro and was really excited to use it but when I tried to connect to the app to upload videos there was a message saying this product was not registered and to return it to the seller. The seller did contact me with an alternative, however that really turned me off and I don't want to deal with something I need to do a work arounds for. Did not get to see the videos or pictures on a computer but they seemed ok. Takes better pictures at night than my Samsung Galaxy s7. It also came with a ton of accessories which was awesome but I think I'll just spend the extra money for a GoPro to save myself any hassles with uploads, etc.

I bought this little camera for my husband to take with him snowmobiling. Needless to say he's come back with some awesome videos! I was amazed at the picture quality, phenomenal! And it's very easy to manage even while on the snowmobile. This camera definitely competes with an expensive GoPro. Glad I didn't have to spend that money, and still got a fantastic camera that does everything we need it to and more. Great buy for sure!

When I got my EK7000 Akaso camera I was exited to try it out and had high hopes for it. Thankfully it turned out great! It was easy to set up and I had fun recording and taking pictures with my family.
Was to complicated to put together, so many pieces had to go to a camera store for help. I ended up giving it away

Read the reviews before I bought this and they said nothing but great things. The camera I received is far from what I read it was. The batteries die in about 15 minutes and the sound is very echo like and the picture is definitely not 4K. I also don’t like how the waterproof case leaks. I wish I would of just bought a GoPro.
The interior fogs up, the remote stopped working and the strap broke on the first day I used it. Not the best quality so just save your money and save up more to buy something a bit more robust.

Great camera for the money. Super easy to use, the remote is very handy and LOTS of free mounts! Will be buying a few more of these (still for less than the price of the big name competitor). May not have every bell and whistle but again, for the price, cant go wrong ......4K too!!!
Good camera, but the battery can only last for 2 hours, which is not really enough for me. I hope there are batteries with larger volume.

I absolutely love this go pro, I've only had it a few days and it is so awesome came in great packaging with a lot of accessories. Can't wait for all the videos I take for drumming and swimming since it's waterproof. If you want a nice but affordable GoPro I highly recommend this one. Thank you so much for this awesome product and fast shipping.
You can't get a better bang for your buck. We are seriously in love with this product. Can't wait to take it on the slopes in a couple weeks!

I was given this camera as a gift for the holidays. I have used it a few times so far and am very happy with the camera as well as the accessories it comes with. The wrist band is an awesome option to use while shooting and I have not see that with many other cameras. I will be looking into getting more accessories shortly. The app is not the most well designed but it is easy to pair and is convenient. Overall I am more than satisfied.
Worked great for shooting wake surfers off the back of the boat. Good picture quality and easy to use.

This is a great camare to record motorcycle rides I had lost the first one I bought on the highway but customer service reach out to me and are an awesome help on getting a new camera so if your looking for a camera to take with on your rides I would recommend this or the akaso ek7000 pro

Bought this for a trip to Hawaii and it worked great! Took it snorkeling, whale watching, and just driving around. I have great pictures from it that I am going to treasure forever. Works great for the price!
For the money this is one of the best cameras I’ve ever purchased 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼  Highly recommend to whoever wants a camera as good as a GoPro!

This camera is a fantastic deal!!! The videos and pictures are great! The wrist remote works perfectly and is super easy to use! My only complaint is the sound quality could be a little better,  but for the price you can't beat it!!!
For a first time user and don’t want to spend the big bucks this is great.

This camera is incredible. It is very similar to a GoPro but much cheaper. I will be taking it on vacation with me on a cruise to the Caribbeans. Hopefully it will work just as well under water.It comes with plenty of attachments and accessories to help you take the perfect picture or capture video where ever you may be travelling to. I am very satisfied with my purchase.

This is a very nice little camera.  I really didn't expect much for the little money it cost.I've been playing with it about non-stop all day. I think it will be just what I am looking for.  It is going to travel with me and be used a lot more.
So far I love this thing. No issues
Amazing camera for the price. Compared to the GoPro I would recommend this for the better value. Water-resistant case Works however I have not taken it underwater yet
Good camera so far really looking forward to using the 4K and 1080 60p, going to mount it to my car dash for my channel so far loving it and I didn't brake the bank !

Wasn’t sure how well it would be compared to the GoPro but was very surprised of how well the quality and the image is on the camera for only $50. I’m just using it for riding videos but man is way better then spending $300

Great little camera. Way less expensive then other name brands but has all the same qualities and more. I love the remote control and additional replacement parts. Contains a lot of extras for a versatile sports enthusiast.

Received the camera Thursday Apr.6. Was working great, really can't complain. Took about 15 to 20 videos  with it all weekend and all looked great. Battery was low so decided to put it to charge and that's where the problem started. Went to unplug it because it had been charging for about 4+ hrs and camera won't turn on. Thinking maybe I put it charge wrong or didn't plug it in right, I plugged it back on and tried to turn it on. Once plugged camera turned on fine and showed that battery is full. As soon as I unplug it, boom! Off again. Tried this again, and just like before it would turn on while plugged and once unplugged it would turn right back off. Thinking maybe it's the battery that's messed up I went and grabbed the other battery and replaced it with the old one. Result? The same as before! Only this time when I unplug it and try to turn it on, it stays in the presentation screen, the "Akaso EK7000" screen. Needless to say I will be returning this camera and I'm pretty dissapointed by this. Thanks but no thanks Akaso.

Camera is overall great deal. 2.7k at 30 frames is perfect for clear recordings. 1080p @ 60 frames is great for fast moving videos. Great price and comes with many accessories. I’ll definitely recommend this as a starter sport camera.

This is well worth the money.  I was looking for a budget waterproof camera for a cruise and I wasn't expecting to be able to find one for that low of a price.  I'm not familiar at all with the other competition and how they compare but for how infrequently i'll use it, it was definitely a great buy.  no complaints.
Every bit as good as the more expensive camera ie Go Por
For the price, at first I was skeptical, even with the high rating. I'm pleasantly surprised. I used it on the back of my husband's motorcycle, and it worked wonderfully. Really satisfied.
We love this camera! It works just as well as the name brand action cameras.
It is a great budget option if you’re in the market for a action camera. Does everything you need an action camera to do. Plain and simple it is not a bad buy whatsoever.

I wanted to get a GoPro, but the price point was too high for me to consider. I was about to pull the trigger on the GoPro Hero, when this guy showed up.  It had all the things the GoPro didn't have.  4K video, WiFi connectivity and a bunch of accessories.  I was able to try it out last night.  I used it to shoot some footage at home, a YouTube video.  I made the mistake of leaving it in the Waterproof case for this, which muffled my voice, my mistake.  I took it out and gave it another try, the audio picked up just fine.  You get 2 batteries, and at 1080P 60fps, I'd say that's a couple hours of video based on what I shot last night, probably a little more.  I haven't tried 4k yet, but obviously, the better the quality, the more power consumed.It says on the packaging that it supports up to a 32GB micro SD card, but I bought a 64GB card and that is working just fine.  I did notice that the videos shoot in chunks instead of one long video.  depending on the quality you choose, the length of the video in this chunk will be longer, but the size is the same, nearly 1.7 GB.  I happen to like this, it helps to find what you are looking for when putting videos together.  You will find some reviews that say the video keeps restarting, but this is by design apparently, and from what I read, is similar to GoPro behavior.

Product takes excellent videos and still shots. Have not used it underwater as of yet but plan to next week to scope out our boat bottom. I would give this a five star but the instruction manual leaves a lot to be desired and the wifi app works well except for some reason on the latest update I am unable to download the video from the camera to the ipad. I can watch it but not save it on the ipad.
does everything i want to do with it. No issues with picture quality. As it sits, I wish there was a better built in microphone, but that is the difference with the price of this one.
I love the accessories that come with the camera. The size of it is perfect for construction. I got the camera just in time to try it out. It feels much more expensive than what i got it for.

WOW, what a bargain.  My son has a go pro hero3 and  he paid three times more money.  He used this and said it it just as good if not better.  I am very pleased with everything.  I especially like the wrist remote.  very simple to use!

This is a great small action camera unfortunately it is worthless since battery does not last more than 25 minute on, so great camera bad battery set, even with the 2 batteries included, that will be less than an hour of play time.
We just got it! My daughter has been taking photos with it all day. Seems to be pretty good, especially for the price.

Just got my new cam! Wow I am very impressed by this unit! Very well built, comes with lots of goodies to.picture quality is beautiful! Great cam for a great price! I would recommend this to anyone interested.
i was pleased with how it worked under water... It did the job.
Bought for a Christmas present for my husband.  He loves it
I can't believe the quality of this camera based on the price. The camera 4k is quite sharp and the image stabilization seems pretty impressive so far. I am really blown away.
comes with a bunch of attachments and really easy to set up and use.
I'm still starting to use it but it looks pretty good for the price!
Great value. Love it so far!!!! Definitely worth the money.

This is a great beginner go pro i use it for snow biking water sports and more it comes with a water proof case not useable with a mic so not a good motovlog camera but a great diving camera and water sports camera

I received this camera for Christmas to take on a vacation to South East Asia. The camera was super easy to use. By downloading the app onto my iPhone I was able to upload pictures throughout my 5 week vacation and send them to friends and family. I took the camera scuba diving at 30 meters underwater and the case proved to be waterproof. The pictures underwater did not turn out as well as I would have hoped, but then again we were just that far from direct sunlight.
What a great little action camera. Have use it to record from my van as well as my e-bike.No issues at all. Simple to use and the remote is a great feature.  And you cant beat the price!

I was pleasantly surprise by the quality and features of this little camera.  There are tons of adapters and mounts that came with the camera.  I plan to mount it to my Jeep and record all the off roading adventures.  I love it.
The camera is amazing and is exactly what I was looking for!

I feel a lot safer taking this camera on our river floats, Hiking, and other family oriented adventures than my phone. Easy assembly. And for a 1st time buyer in this field of cameras i couldnt be happier with my purchase.

I was really surprised with how quality this camera was. I use it for a lot of car videos (mudding, long drives rain or shine, filming car work etc) ive been nothing but happy with the product, the money was 100% worth it.

Great camera, fabulous price! Our son opened the camera for Christmas along with a new mountain bike helmet. We’ve been watching clear videos of his time on the course every day since. We can’t wait to test out the waterproof features when the weather warms.
Bought for my husband for hunting and stuff. Not quite as clear as a go pro but def a handy little camera.
Awesome camera
Great camera for my 10 yr old to use to take action shots while doing all kinds of sports.

This is a great camera for the price. The images are very clear. My son recieved this for christmas to video his "stunts" and absolutely loves it. We havent tested all of the features but so far we are very pleased with our purchase.
I am happy with this camera. You get the most bang for your buck. Picture quality is good, picture is excellent, and image stabilization is great. I highly recommend this camera.
This is like GoPro but with lesser battery and not so good mobile APP.but the quality is good and it wouldn't hurt my feelings that much if accidentally loose it.
Really get loaded up with accessories. Wasn't expecting all of this. Pretty awesome. Still yet to try it out, but so far it's looking good.
I only can reproduce 8 out of 16 videos I made. HALF of the videos are corrupt and CAN'T BE RESTORED, lost them forever. I'd rather buy a used GoPro instead of a budget camera like this one
Love this camera. The picture quality is great. Can not wait to take this scuba diving.  It is a wonderful alternative to the more expensive Go Pro.
Love this!  Easy to use and high quality like goPro.  Love the remote and the wifi features!  Recommended if you don't want spend a lot for a goPro
The camera quality on this camera is very good and stable!  I didn't want a super expensive GoPro for fear of losing it. Connecting to WiFi can be a tricky at times but I have no complaints.

This camera is awesome i was really skeptical but after a day with it it is great the picture is crisp and clear the image stability is good and the image quality is really great. Only issue is that its light but that not a terrible thing
Love the size
Nice little camera, easy to install app, easy instructions for use. After doing the research, you cant beat it on price.  Super excited to capture some underwater video with it.
Great price and a awsome product. Purchased for my 12 year old to do goofy fun videos. Great product fraction of price and you get all the accessories included.
Awesome camera, used it a lot while traveling very durable. Also great for surfing and snowboarding picture is very clear and I am very happy with this product!

Great deal for a great little camera! Bought this for taking pictures in / under the water and didnt feel like spending hundreds. It certainly has some quirks and a learning curve, but it works great and definitely can't beat the price! Photo quality is great,

Just got this and I’m super excited! It came with a lot of accessories and I’m most excited cause it has a remote. It has good weight to it and seems super easy to use. Can’t wait for my trip to use it !!

Great price for a very nice action camera. Sure beats the $200+ I was going to spend on a Go PRO, not to mention the accessories for the Go PRO work for this camera. My biggest issue is the lack of documentation concerning how to assemble the accessories.

Performs very well. Overall very happy with it, and the image quality. Only quirk is sometimes I can't tell when I'm recording and when I'm not. There may be an audible setting i don't have on, but I just have to be careful and mindful.
Great quality for the price. Use it when i ride my motorcycle. Clear images and doesn't distort. Battery doesn't last too long.

I have used this for a month...good picture but when it comes to video recording where it be wifi or not, it always lags and skips which i love to go outdoors but a video that is meant to capture extraordinary pictures just lags and glitches is useless. Also used in my car but quickly realized it was no good as it would skip or lag every 5 seconds.
Pretty good for a non-GoPro camera! Also comrs with extra battery and lots of accessories
Amazing item.
Worked well for a sailing trip to the carribean. Accessories that come with it to fixate/hold camera in multiple situations are confusing and not well explained.
For $50 you get a travel camera with a ton of accessories including charging, mounting, and waterproof gear. The picture quality is pretty decent for the price and size. Overall great deal!
Great product. The only thing I would want different is an included app setup instruction guide. Other than that 10/10
It came with a ton of accessories and a nice charger. I am impressed by the quality! Thank you
went with me abroad and never failed me once. it is good to have something that helps you remember good things in you life.
Cameras suitable. however when I tried to get my extras they offer couldn't get in touch.
I was looking for an inexpensive camera to film some of my fishing adventures while I wade along a local river. This camera works perfectly. It’s easy to use and has great video quality.

Stop working after 3 months. I bought the insurance protection and they said it should be covered by the manufacturer. Amazon inform that I can't return it after 30 days.  So don't waste your money, buy a recognized brand instead. What I don't understand is why this product is Amazon Choice?

This is my first action cam and I am really excited. I bought it since I wanted something to connect to my snorkel mask for a trip to Hawaii. I have done a few test shots and even let my 9 yr. old use it a bit. Love it so far and can't wait to get some nice pictures/video. Lots of accessories so I can attach it to almost anything.

Item works great.  Purchased camera to take on a beach vacation.  Used it in the ocean, at the beach, in the pool, etc. with no issues.  Video quality was very good.  Note that we did not use the wrist mounted remote control or the wi-fi app.  Videos were transferred with a card reader, which worked fine.This is the first action camera we have purchased and have been very pleased.  Highly recommended.
Poor video and batteries died quick. Sent it back
‏Great deal for a great little camera‏record well, takes good quality pictures, and good quality sound

I absolutely love this camera!! It is way better than a GoPro and when it says #one I'm underwater photography cameras it's not lying! It's great because it comes with many different mounts and a waterproof case that is magic! We put a paper towel in the case,closed it and left it underwater overnight and we opened it the next day and the paper towel didn't have a single drop on it! So overall it saves you so much money. Don't waste your money on a 400$ GoPro when you can get this one for 80$!!
Great camera for the price pic's are not bad, could be a little clearer. Videos are great clearity is awesome.

Just received my new AKASO EK7000. I just say that I was pleasantly surprise by how many attachments came with the camera. This will be my first action camera and I recommend it for anyone getting started. LOVE the fact that it works with its own app allowing WiFi connections.

Ordered to have a 2nd sport camera, (1st is the original Go Pro model).  This thing performs as it should.  Video quality is great.  Sounds is ok when not in the waterproof case.  We enjoy it and my kids enjoy using it in their various activities!
This camera is well worth the price. Tons of mounting options. We use it on my sons helmet to capture his motos. So far so good and its been through a couple bad crashes. I would buy again.
I love it for the price I also have a go pro but to be honest I would buy another one with no question

Wow, what a great value! I'm just starting to test it out, but I think it has great video quality and is so versatile. Just starting to test it out, but I really like the options this camera will give me in video to complement my DSLR and Camcorder My main purpose is to provide interesting B-roll shots for my documentaries and wide angle shots of interviews for jump cuts.

Takes amazing pictures stabilization is great too even while riding off road! Haven’t gotten to test the waterproof part it so far everything I have read there isn’t really anything bad you can say about this camera!
This camera does all I need for my motovlogging. Simple to use, lightweight, compact and a real bargain. Those $400 cameras can go to the pros!
I bought this for my daughter and she loved it.The quality is really good.she tried it underwater and the picture came out really good.i definitely recommend buying this!
I love it. It does what I wanted to do and the family loves watching me fish
This is my second review of this product. I liked it so much after getting my son one that I got myself one. I have a gopro and this is my go to now. Very happy with both my purchases.

Very pleased with the camera and the accessories, but upon unplugging the cable from the battery charger for the first time, the charge port detached from the microchip inside the charger rendering the charger useless and broken.

Great camera with an awesome price. My sister bought the gopro and I got this one to use on a trip to Cancun. We used it for snorkeling and other adventures. It’s same quality as the GoPro if not better. Very satisfied.

This is a nice camera for the price. The case is waterproof and works well and it comes with several accessories. I do however wish it had a zoom feature and the picture could be a little more clear especially in motion.

Purchased this unit to mount on my motorcycle so that i can chronicle my club rides. So far it has performed outstandingly. The price is reasonable. Expensive isn't always better. Highly recommend this product.
Easy to use, simple file structure on the SD Card great quality, and awesome price!  Recommended!
Surprised 4-buttons control easier than what I'D expected.Takes a unbranded 32Gb card.
Bought for my son as a Christmas gift. Have already taken several videos but still want to put to work outside but still a little to cold. Wish it had internal memory.
This has great picture quality, both stills and video. I attached it to a golf cart and drove around and was quite pleased with it. I would recommended it for first timers.  Did not get it wet (yet.)
Product was shipped fast and works great. Was exactly as described. Very good product for the price. Will recommend.

Amazing customer service I opened the box and one of the mounts was over tightened so it was broken. They replaced it right away. I just sent a picture and that was it!Very easy to use quick charge and two batteries makes for an easy time. Very durable when I went snorkeling it was very strong waves and at one point I hit the rocks with the camera not a scratch to the case. There was only three down sides in my mind one is that it always starts in video mode not camera and you can't change the boot option. I like photo more than video but that is just me. Second is the ability to click and have a focused picture but this is not a sport camera so don't compare the two. Finally they have an app for the phones to use for wifi pictures. Not their app but the one they recommend it is slow to respond like you push the button you hear click on the phone pause and then click on the camera.
Love the camera. This is the second camera we have gotten this one better then the last. You can do so much with it and capture so much. Worth the money to get.
Great purchase
Wonderful little product! Awesome video quality.  Bought this to record our glacier hike on our Alaskan cruise in a month.  Super excited for the quality and value.  Highly recommend for casual use.
Love this camera only complaint is on buy surfaces it could be a little smother but quality is great

Work better than i expected. It’s come out nice fit in a hand , model look beautiful , i can’t wait to try the product out for my youtube videos. Thanks a lot , definitely will spread words about the products

The compact size is nice. For the price, the picture is decent. The waterproof case seems decent....I can’t say how much pressure it can take.  This product couldn’t take extreme abuse but, it’s a great entry level camera for kids.

What a great action camera,  especially for the price.  Very easy to navigate and use even for the technologically challenged.  It comes with all the accessories needed to attach it to about anything you can think of.

The device stopped working today, one month after buying. The video files are all corrupted (MOV format. Not able to copy/import them to a Mac). The camera doesn't play them back either. My phone connects to the camera's Wi-Fi network but the accompanying app doesn't recognize it, so, doesn't let me view the recorded videos. It costs a lot less than some of the popular action cameras, but evidently, it goes out a lot sooner also. Not worth it, in my opinion.

I bought my camera on 23rd Nov 2016 an now the batteries are not charging in the camera i bought an external charger with 3 additional batteries because i thought the battery was the problem only to realise now wen i finally collect the external charger the camera is not powering on with the new or old batteries..... HELP!?!? Is there any warranty so i can have it changed or what  can i do????????

received my ek7000 camera just in time for Christmas. What a great little camera at an amazing price easy to setup and start using great quality pictures. Love the intuitive controls and wifi connection.  So glad i got this for Xmas

Pretty amazed at the price point. The camera looks well built, comes with a ton of accessories and was easy to use. The wi-fi app is also great, works well with barely any lag. I do video production for a career, so I've used GoPros and other cameras before. I must say the value in this camera can't be denied.
This is the biggest piece of garbage I have bought in Amazon. The battery life is terrible and the picture quality is horrible. Don’t waste your money on this garbage.
We just received this product, but so far it is great comes with a lot of accessories, but it would be easier to have paper instructions instead of online ones.
I just received my Camera and I love it, it was easy to assemble on both Helmet and The Bike Handle Bars... The Picture was nice & clear... I’m going to love using this Camera

For the price its a tremendous deal. Make sure to buy a Micro SD Card. It does not come included with the purchase. Overall the camera does what it needs to do, and no problems so far. The WiFi feature is pretty cool!
This product has many great features in the camera and comes with many different items that help in many ways. I definitely love this product and would recommend it to others
Great camera at a great price. Loving the display on the back. Bought for fishing and haven't been able to test it out much yet, but am very happy with this purchase so far!
Camera exceeded my expectations. The price is far beyond the value. I have been using it nonstop for motorcycle trips!
Took this to Hawaii with me in November and used it while snorkeling.....it was very easy to use and worked great! Good quality for the price!
It's ok, lots of cool hookups that it comes with, I like the water proof case it came with but when I try to record in 4k it just records the audio, but I will play around with it some more

I bought this camera right before my wife and I went on our honeymoon so that I would be able to document the trip and it was amazingly helpful to have!! The camera is very customizable with the type of video, quality and even sounds that the EK700 makes. The battery life is fantastic and the amount of accessories this camera comes with is worth the price alone! Very happy to have this camera and at such a fantastic price.

We ordered this for our 10 year old son who is always on the go and wants to capture his adventures. For a 10 year old this is perfect and doesn't cost as much as a genuine GoPro. It came with everything we needed to get him started. The only thing that I did not like was the fact that the camera had come loose during the shipping process and was rattling around in the plastic box. I would definitely recommend this to others.
This is the perfect low budget gopro camera. I love this thing so much and use it for so many things. The waterproof casing is a very handy tool and it also comes with many more accessories.
Customer service is by far A++++++.  Camera works excellent. Thank you
Just the right size for our Cruise to the Caribbean --- snorkel, jet ski, parasailing, and sightseeing.... Making a movie for sure of our "week in the Sun"
Worth it
This camera isn't too bad for the price. The batteries don't stay charged in temperatures under 40 degrees.
I like it better than the GoPro’s that I have except for the battery life. the battery life is not as long.

I really do enjoy my Akaso EK7000. I've gotten a lot of really good videos over the past couple months! The only thing I dont particularly like it is the lack of stability. Besides that it is a great accessory to own!
Love the go pro. It was a gift for our son for Christmas and he loves it. Easy to use and very durable. Love the price.

I'll keep this short, as I really don't have much to talk about. Overall I think it's a really good deal, considering the features you get for the price. In the box there's a small booklet that asks you to post a 5 star rating for free accessories, which made me skeptical of the positive reviews on Amazon. However, I think it does live up to the positive reviews. My main complaint has to do with the customer service. The waterproofing case that comes with the camera came with severe scratches, especially where the camera lens sits, which significantly affects the video quality. Believing that it must be pre-owned (which was not acceptable considering that I paid full price), I sent them an email about the issue and they replied quickly. However, after giving them what they asked for (store name, order number, etc.), they have gone dark... So now I'm stuck with this pre-owned, scratched up case that destroys the video quality no matter what I do. Inspect your item carefully once you get it for such signs.
Great camera. It came with a lot of accessories so I was really super excited when I tore open the box like a kid on Christmas. Thanks for making me the happiest person ever.
I purchased this for my son he enjoys it very much. have not tried the water resistant on it yet. He uses it a lot to record playing video games he is playing or riding his bike around.
Works great so far

After putting my GoPro Hero 4 through the washing machine, i was on a quest for a new cam at a better price. I tried the Apeman, and the video quality really sucked, which made me question all the positive reviews on these discount camera....Went for the AKASO against my better judgment, and I'm impressed. Video is as clear as the GoPro and its a quarter of the price. Will absolutely buy another if I break this one.
So far so good I will give update just don’t know what app on apple is it. Other than that thanks
No idea why but it stops recording after 30 secs. Sometimes after 1 min. I didn’t understand what the problem is.

Thank you Akaso. I received my Akaso ek7000 sports action camera today. I used the camera to  record 4k video for about 10minutes. It is a fantastic camera. The quality of the video is great as advertised. The still photos are also really great. Really a perfect product for the money I spent.Ofcourse, I suggest this product for others who looks for an action camera with 4k professional quality video.
This thing is not that bad, video is really great and  you get a lot of items with it.

I was surprised at the level of the quality for the price.  Bought this for my 9 year old grandson for Christmas and he likes to put it on his bike, on his snowboarding helmet and even on the dog! Easy to use and comes with lots of extras.

Overall camera quality appears to be very good. Accessories are strong and fit together nicely. Picture is great with high quality image. Great alternative too high price cameras without sacrificing quality.

I bought this to use on my motocross helmet and it works great! I am also going to use it documenting our adventures in Jamaica. It is not a go pro. But are u a professional videographer? Me neither. You really can't ask for more considering the cost. I would buy again.

Bought this for my 6 yr old who wants to be a vlogger.  Very easy to use for a first time. Good quality for the price. Only tried it in the pool  and it is waterproof . My son is having a blast using it.

This is a great camera for the price. Bought it for a trip where I was going to do a lot of diving and snorkeling. It took great underwater pictures and was easy to switch between still pictures and video.

Perfect for my helmet. Video resolution is good. Mic volume is lil low, but not bad. Really liked the camera. Best part it came with a lot of accessories that I never expected. Excited to record my trip.

Great camera! Got it for my 7 year old son who plays multiple sports and loves being outside.  He has recorded himself climbing rock walls, hitting baseballs, shooting hoops and riding his bike.  The download of the videos and pics is so easy that after showing him how to do it once, he is able to do it by himself.  The quality of the video is good and the sound is pretty good too! Great camera for a third of what the brand one costs!

This camera is really nice.  Its way better than my phone camera.  Its simple to use and takes great video.  I use it for work doing exercise videos and for play from any type of sport to jumping into water.  It does a great job.
I purchased this item thinking it would be a bargain deal that's comparable to GoPro. They're incomparable and I wished I would've spent a little extra for a much better quality GoPro.

This camera is a great deal for the money.  It is a high quality camera that is not at a premium price.  The waterproof casing works really well and the underwater shots are amazing.  It is great that the camera comes with an extra battery so that you can have one charged and ready to go and not have to worry about a dead battery.  I would recommend this to anyone wanting an action camera but don't want to shell out 300+ dollars on the camera.  Just as good as any of the high priced action cameras.
This Sports Cam is very nice, I like the remote of this Cam & the video quality. Very satisfied

This camera is really cool and great for the price! The remote didn’t work while the camera was underwater, but besides for that, it’s performance is flawless! It takes incredibly clear pictures underwater. Very happy with my product.
Purchased this item for my husband as a Christmas gift. Great quality for the price.

This camera is very comparable to GoPro in terms of picture and video quality. Worth the money and comes with full set of accessories I can use. I don't have to spend extra for the accessories which is a very good money saver for me. I love how fast this item was shipped!
Everything I hoped it would be and more I love this camera. It’s a fraction of the price of a go pro and it’s almost it’s equal.

For the price I would buy this 3 more times before buying a name brand. Picture/video quality is nice and crisp and accessories it came with work very well.. battery life isn't amazing but it gets the job done
I think i was expecting better but I get what i pay for.
Did not leak down to 30'.  Easy to use and change modes while underwater.  Image and video download interface is fast.  Plenty of storage space.  Lots of accessories.  Excellent customer service.

I got this for my son who is an extreme skier.  I've always wanted to watch him ski, but I'm nowhere near as good as he is.  This amazing camera allows me to see him ski without endangering my own life.  We are also using it to show my older parents how well my three younger boys are doing skiing.  Great, easy to use camera!!
Husband loved it. Even though it's not a name brand we are used to, the product does the job.

Bought for my daughter for her birthday.  Seems to work well.  Very cool to use it for live video to my iPad via the app!  Haven’t used in the water yet, but I did order the floating hand stick (sold separately)

The camera shoots great video and this is going up against more expensive cameras. I had issues with some videos getting corrupted. They sent me a replacement camera making me a very satisfied customer.

Great little camera. Love all the accessories it came with but I haven’t been able to use it because I dont have the micro sd card needed. 4 stars because the sd card is the only thing needed that it didn’t come with.
So many parts were daunting. Found a really cute YouTube explaining the camera. PIECE OF CAKE! GREAT PICTURES!

Came in a seal package. I liked that. The camera quality is great. Comes w a dual charger station, the charger, the camera, the water proof case & the strap on watch. Easy setup. Worth every penny!  Highly recommend.
Purchased as a gift for 12 year old who likes to shoot action videos outside.  It has worked well. Price was the main factor in the purchase.
Got the camera when promised nicely packaged easy to set up was up and filming within 3 hours no problem had it for about a week so far no problems had a GoPro this is my go-to camera from now on
It's a decent camera for the price.. Best for videos.. Stills aren't great!Didn't took that long for the wifi button to stop working.. No big deal as I don't use it but still..

DO NOT, DO NOT, DO NOT buy this camera if you want audio while the waterproof case is on.  I purchased it to take on kayak trips and the audio is super low and inaudible when you have the case on.  The picture is fine for the money.
This product is perfect for our 9 year granddaughter that is starting a U-Tube video  - Sister's Gaminggreat quality - amazing price.  Would recommend this product!!
It is great my kids Love it and can’t wait to go scuba diving with it. We tried it out on my kids bike and it was amazing. Also we strapped onto our extremely energetic dog and it was great as well

This the the best action camera for the value. It's extremely easy to setup and use. It comes with all the necessary accessories including the waterproof case which is pretty awesome. The remote is also useful as it can capture the shots when the camera is sitting on a tripod. Great for family pictures shots.

I have to gripes with the camera. Everything is exactly as expected except for the waterproof housing case. How in the world are there scratches already on it. They aren't even small unnoticeable scratches. These scratches are huge and make using the camera in the housing annoying

I've only had it for a few days but so far it works really well and I found it easy to use. I've never had a camera like this that's made for motion so there's a learning curb but it works for what I need it.
So far so good! My daughter was so excited to get this Christmas morning. Easy transfer and picture is pretty great! Good deal for the price!
Quite impressed with the quality and the videos for this prince range. Also comes with a lot of mounting accessories, and I also like that comes with the second battery and remote.
For visual only...the audio is pretty muffled.

This is a great product and very good quality for the price. We bought it for our 8 year old son for Christmas and he uses it all the time, especially when he ia huntinf and fishing. It is so nice that my husband was jealous and now wants one of his own. Looks like we will be buying another one!

For the money, this camera is a very good value.  I've only had it a couple of days, but I am very happy with the video quality.  The picture looks great.  I'm looking forward to taking it on vacations.
great little camera with many many accessories that I have no clue what are they since are not mentioned in the 2 little pages English section of the manual

It's easy to use with a lot of customization you can do to the camera to get the desired picture or video out of the camera and the phone compatibility is very convenient allowing you to remote control the camera from a decent ways away.

This is a great sports/ helmet camera for the price! It has similar features as the GoPro but the price is much more reasonable especially if you are giving it to a 12 year old! He has used it on his kayak, ski, and bike helmets!
I love it!! I haven't gotten around to using it yet. You need a micro SD card before you can operate it. Nevertheless, once I get mine, I know it'll be perfect!

This is the second Camera i purchase as a gift the first one for my son who is serving the military an use it for training HE LOVES IT. The second one i bought it for a co-worker and he is using it for manufacturing purchase he like it.thank you

I used the cam for home videos and hiking videos.  Easy to set up, small and compact and the app syncs up well and is easy to use.  This was a purchase I didn't think I needed, but now I use it all the time.  Would recommend.
It comes in very good packaging very easy to see what you have and for the price very good quality. Another that’s good about it that it has a remote to take a picture and video, it’s pretty amazing.
I bought this for a Christmas present for my 12-year-old son. Great product for the price. Does everything it claims to do. He has used it several times mounted on his mountain bike for trail riding.
