I love this camera! The price makes it perfect. If I were to find a downside it would be the quality of the audio. The sound in the videos is on the low side and somewhat distant.

I bought this to have some fun and adventures with. I am new to this action camera life stuff!  Made a video of some finds in my in laws barn, and can’t wait to use it fishing and hunting this summer!

Absolutely the best camera I have ever purchased, it is used on a 68 camaro in the drag races! I get so many compliments on the quality of the videos! Best action camera, plus you can’t beat that price when it works better then all those expensive ones!
Funciona a la perfeccion. Incluyendo la app es perfecta para recordar las actividades familiares y esas aventuras con mi hijo.
The size is perfect for my needs.

My husband recieved this camera as a gift and loves it. He has used multiple times for wrestling tournament and soccer games. Catches all the action, never misses a beat. Great for still shots or fast action videos.

This camera is amazing! I purchased this camera to do some testing within a water enclosed area and the end results were phenomenal. We were able to capture exactly what was need without jeopardizing a good picture.

It feels like it might break if i drop it ,  the connecting process  was a lil sketchy but finally  got it . Recording is great , playback is great . Not sure if microphone is supposed  to be quality  , picks up noise but is soft upon playback .

I did find several youtube videos that were really helpful figuring out most of the features.I used the camera for the first time the other day while out rabbit hunting with a buddy and his dogs.  I was really impressed with the quality of the video.  Playing the day back on my computer the video was so clear and crisp I could see every pine needle and blade of grass. So far the video and picture quality looks god-awful. The "4k" barely passes for something resembling grainy sort-of hd video, the 720 setting makes it look like a camcorder from the 90s, if even that good. Most cellphones nowadays take much clearer and better quality pics and videos than this cheap camera.Then theres the wifi connectability, which is a joke. To use the camera with your phone you need an app that they completely stopped updating so it only works on phones still running OS's from 3 years ago, nothing current. Didnt find that out until i bought it and tried to download it of course.

This camera is straight garbage. I've noticed some negative feedback regarding the battery, but that was never a problem for me because the camera would freeze up after 15 minutes max of video time (even at the lowest bit rate, 720p@60 Hz). If you long-pressed the front button, you could get it to re-start, but at this point your file system would usually be corrupted, and you're unable to retrieve your files. I've tried three different brands of class 10 micro SD cards (SanDisk 64gb, Samsung 128gb, Lexar 32gb). Oh, and the "Ez iCam" Android app won't connect to the camera. If you are unfortunate enough to already own this camera, for what it's worth I discovered some other Android apps that will actually connect - "iSmart DV", "SBCapp" and "iSport Cam".I think all the positive reviews are disingenuous. The package includes a card implying you will get a free gift for a positive review. Stay away.

Very goog until now. It brings several accesories. Battery does not last much, it's better buying the extra batteries and charger because the camera charges only directly connected to the cam. The app does not work on Iphone 6s you must download another one PNJ iCam does the job.
Video quality is excellent! useful just like a go pro, but at a much affordable price. Excellent customer service!

First off let me thank all of those before me for the wonderful reviews for this budget action camera.  I recently purchased the EK7000 camera and have only played around with it at home for a few hours, but was immediately impressed.  The camera is easy to use with simple menu's that are navigated from button's on the camera.  I was able to figure out how to navigate the menu's without looking at the user manual.  Evidently Akaso assumed most users would figure this out right away because the user manual is not very detailed, but the instructions are sufficient if you need them for reference.  Video quality appears to be what I would consider "very good" in comparison to some of the older action camera's I have used.  I don't own a GoPro, so I can not compare the two, but there are several great reviews on Amazon and Youtube of folks comparing the two and I felt from what I saw that the Akaso is actually better than the GoPro for video clarity, sharpness and color.  This definitely helped with my decision to purchase the Akaso.The camera came with several different mounts and accessories which was very nice.  Instructions with the camera on how the accessories go together were not very clear, but for most you will figure it out!  We also purchased a separate accessory pack for some additional mounts we felt we might need.  We are using a Sandisk Ultra Micro SDXC 64GB card with the camera and it appears to accept it with no problems.  The manual mentions the camera will accept 8GB, 16GB and 32GB, but as mentioned, the 64GB appears to work just fine.  The camera most likely will not be concerned about the size of the card but may be more picky about the quality and the speed of the card! If in question, you should check with Akaso customer service (cs@akasotech.com).

I have used this camera just like I have with competitors products in the past and it performs the same.  I have not owned it for long but feel that for the money it hit all the requirements I was expecting!

The Camera is very good for the price , It takes descent pictures and videos, although the protective housing fogged a little bit from the inside and made the videos a little blurry by the end during some long videos, it's still a good deal on an action camera in my opinion.

I'm extremely satisfied with this product and will be buying more.
just bad

This camera is more trouble and frustration than it's worth, due to a software flaw that routinely fails to save the movies you record with it. I have missed out on capturing a lot of exciting memories on video because the camera only saves the movies you record about 60% of the time. Reformatting my micro SD cards in or out of the camera did not resolve the problem, which was unpredictable and seemingly occurs at random. Image quality is passable in bright sunlight, but in shade or low light the quality drops precipitously. Build quality is fine.

I had purchased one of these cameras to add to my live music recording capabilities (shots of drummers and high birds eye) and after trying it out one time during a production, I ordered more. Although i would defiantly not call this a 4k camera because the quality is not that, but it looks really nice at 1080p at 30fps. Other than that i am happy with the product, its a good value. I do wish however you can turn off the screen while recording in order to save on battery power. So far I am VERY impressed with this camera. It isn't professional level, but for most consumers it will be perfect. Picture quality is good, The WFi feature is poorly implemented couldn't get it to work and I am a technical person. The remote works well. comes with a ton of mounting options.

Arrived in great condition and promptly, nil issues with international deliverySuper value for money and fairly easy to use (many youtube videos too if you get stuck at any time), found having the extra battery very useful when I'm out on trips. The wifi function also worked well with my iPhone, and it can be used with most action camera accessories out there. Am really happy with the purchase!
This camera is amazing, great quality, it's great for making timelapses.

It comes with a water proof casing which is very handy for my snorkeling trip. It even comes with 1 spare batteries. The video quality is decent with good lighting and it is very simple to use. The image is distorted but I guess it is common for camera with very wide angle (~170), and it is fine for my underwater video. The battery door is hard to open and is not easy to change the battery while moving. Overall, it is a camera with great value and I am happy with it.
Bought this for my 14 year old son for Christmas.  It works great recording from a dirt bike, Utv and bicycle.  Very satisfied!
This camera is great for the cost.  With all attachment it is easy to use.

I was really blown away at the quality of this item, given the price, as compared to gopro. I've used this camera on many expeditions for mountain climbing, biking, and white water rafting. so far i have had 0 complaints. excellent product at an excellent price
I bought this camera for my son but I’m the one using it, I took it to the Dominican Republic and the Bahamas , snorkeling. And it’s very good, easy to use.
Definitely worth it especially for the price it is. Pictures and videos came out so clear and the case itself definitely did the job in the water. Amazing product.
It is not 4K, that is false. However, the image is pretty good and the camera works very well. The worst things is the battery. It lasts around 1 hour.
This is a great product for a great price. Image quality was better than I had hoped. I was a little unsure about the purchase at first because it was so affordable but it was totally worth it.

The unit I received connected to WiFi twice, and then stopped connecting. I tried rebooting the unit, rebooting my iPhone, and couldn't get it to connect. Customer service was unresponsive. The recording quality was fine, but without WiFi, you can't monitor in real time how the shot is framed.

Really small and lightweight with a nice rubbery suede-like body. Simple to use and configure, and the wrist remote is fantastic. All of the accessories, mounts and spare battery it comes with make it a great buy. The LCD screen makes viewing what you are snapping vid or photos of a breeze and it has a playback feature to review with. It also has an iOS/Android app which connects via WiFi, remote controls the camera and has a realtime video feed that is perfect for adjusting the tilt of the camera when it is mounted on your head.The action cam is awesome and takes clear and crisp video. Now I can easily shoot some video while riding my bicycle and I am going skiing next week and looking forward to wearing the action cam on my head for some point-of-view vid of the slopes!

Directions are not that good. The app to upload the videos keeps loosing connection. When we tried to upload the video to Facebook we are still having issues. I am not sure if it's the phone or ap but when we try to listen to the video you cannot hear the audio. The audio can be heard through the ICam itself. The main issue we have though is the icam app. It freezes or looses connection. The quality of the video is great though. Wish there was more details to figure this out better.
Awesome little camera! Comes with a ton of mounts. Got this for my son to put on his bike and just to play around with. I would for sure recommend!
Exactly as advertised an an excellent camera.  Easy to figure to operate right out of the box.  The remote is perfect for mountain or skiing.  I would highly recommend this camera
The packaging was good, bang for the buck. Used it under water and the quality of video is phenomenal. Taking it on my diving trip to Bahamas will update the photos soon.So far happy with the producy

The picture on the camera is great, but the batter like is terrible. 1 fully charge battery brand new last about 2 hours and not recording the entire time either. It also shuts down after a while of inactive use do the battery should have lasted longer

I loved my GoPro hero3, however on a recent trip to Kona the camera was knocked out of the waterproof case on a rock and got wet. So I was reluctant to spend several hundred dollars to buy another GoPro. I purchased the Asako EK7000 and I must say that I am shocked by the Quality and ease of use by this Camera. The video quality is excellent. The wifi works perfectly with the App that is provided. The price cannot be beaten!!!!!!
This is a good camera for the price. The picture quality is way better than I thought it would be. One of the mounting buckles broke after one use so I advise using the GoPro brand instead.

I have to say I'm quite impressed. I can't say it's GoPro quality, but it does all that I need at a much lower price. Image quality is acceptable for recording trail rides in my Jeep, which is why I bought it. I haven't had it long, so I can't speak to how long it might last under the conditions to which I'll be exposing it, but so far, so good.
Awesome camera so far.  Great video and images.  Quality mounts.  Mount instructions are a little difficult to sort through, but easy once you figure them out
Worked well for my needs.  Not a prefect device, but the picture quality was better than I thought.
Works as advertised

Bought this for multiple uses. I use is when going kayaking, way easier than trying to get my phone out for pictures. Also use it when taking my dogs out hiking. Keeps my hands free and ready for anything.
Just purchased this camera and really happy with the quality! The kit comes with many accessories and mounts for just about anything! Two batteries as well. Highly recommended.
Very impressed with image quality. I wouldn't say it go pro quality but still great. Used under water whole snorkeling and worked perfect.
Very happy with this purchase, only the sounds do not work but any everything else is exelente
The quality is shockingly great. I love it! And it came with a bunch of extra stuff

I got mine as a Christmas gift and I really like it. Very easy to use and it came with a bunch of extra braces. I definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a good quality camera for a great price.

I just love this EK7000. It works just as it says it does. The only gripe I have is it does not show you how to use the accessories that it comes boxed with, meaning the different mounts. But if you can figure it out with ease just by playing aroumd with it.
Just got this camera in the mail and seems to be a good camera for the $40 i payed for it. Will be using this on an upcoming camping trip and will update my review after that.

I purchased this camera as a Christmas present for my 10yr old son. It was perfect for him and is very durable. He likes to mount it on his bike. It came with a lot of accessories. It functions just like the name brand camera but is a lot less expensive.
>>Great product--Great price--BUY HERE<<
Since the recall you can no longer use the app with the camera which is a huge issue seeing that's how I pulled all my files off the camera.
Only have used this once. Mounted this to the front of my bike and road some trails at the park on a sunny day.This baby took beautiful crystal clear video footage and pictures!

Needed a camera to record some trail riding. The value of this 4K action camera is like the quality of its shots: spectacular!  Couldn't a Go-Pro, then I noticed this 4K action camera on Amazon. You can't beat it for the price!

I ordered this camera to take to the Bahamas in a few weeks to use for snorkeling. I am a little disappointed, as straight out of the box, the water proof case already had scratches on the lens portion and effects the picture quality. Also, as I tried to gently open the battery compartment door to put the battery in, the very fragile latch broke… so not really what I was expecting… contemplating returning this camera and looking for a different one that is more durable.. I am a professional videographer and photographer, so I know how to insert and remove batteries, this shouldn’t have broke this easily… I did glue it back together , but not sure it will hold
Your not going to find a more capable entry level cam than this AKASO EK7000. Packed with the remote, wifi linked to your phone or tablet, lots of mounting options.
No zoom. Who does that! Now I’m stuck with this camera. Don’t do it. Otherwise if zooming is something you see as an unnecessary luxury then rock and roll.

I purchased this product for my 12 year old son who asked for a go pro for Christmas. I was hesitant to spend that much and found this as a cheaper alternative and he was definitely NOT disappointed. Not only is this camera much cheaper but also came with many of the accessories and mounts he was wanting including the waterproof housing. It was easy to set up and begin using right away.  He plans to use it while swimming, hunting, skateboarding, biking, hiking and fishing. This bundle is perfect for him!
easy to use
What a great deal!  I think, so far, this is much better than the gopro. Very clear, haven't used it enough yet; but sets up easy,.. and the value of the kit is why its 5 stars
This product came with some many accessories! Brought this as a birthday gift and they loved it. Being used for travel and skiing trips. Great for on the go videos. Image quality is great.
great camera but we had to return it twice and then gave up.  great customer service.  charge port would not work on one, and the scroll button was broken on the other.

Seemed like a cheap knockoff at first glance. After using it and checking out all the accessories it came with I love it! Directions for the accessories would have been nice but all else was a great buy.

Did my research for my wife’s birthday and chose this more budget friendly option over the GoPro. Thank goodness I have! Saved myself $$ and honestly my pictures look better than my friends’ with GoPros.
